PHRAG STON PAR NUS NA SPANGS RTOGS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I BDAG
NYID CHEN PO RNAMS LTA

SMOS KYANG CI DGOS, DES NA DAM PA'I SKYES BU 'GA' ZHIG SKYES
CHEN GZHAN GYI

'KHRUNGS RABS SU 'BYUNG BA LA 'GAL BA CI ZHIG MCHIS TE DAM PA DE
DAG GIS SPRUL PA RE

RE KHO NA LAS STON MI NUS PA MA YIN PA'I PHYIR TE, DPER NA BOD
KHA BA CAN 'DI 'PHAGS

PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI 'DUL ZHING YIN PA'I DBANG GIS SNGON DANG
DA LTAR GYI SKYES CHEN

MANG PO ZHIG GI SPRUL GZHIR 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS NYID
'BYUNG BA DANG,

'KHRUNGS RABS SKU 'PHRENG 'GA' ZHIG KYANG GCIG PAR 'BYUNG BA
MTHONG DANG THOS BZHIN PA

YIN NA GANG RUNG ZHIG MIN ZHES SU ZHIG GIS SMRA BAR NUS, TSUL
'DI LTAR DU

DPYOD SHES NA RMONGS RTAGS DANG PHYOGS 'DZIN GYIS KUN NAS
BSLANGS PA'I BLO NGAN GU

DOG GI 'CHING BA LAS GROL TE DAM PA RNAMS LA DAG SNANG PHYOGS
MED DU SKYE BAR 'GYUR RO,,

YANG 'GA' ZHIG 'DI SNYAM DU, 'O NA, SKYE BA 'DZIN PA'I DAM PA DE
SA LA GNAS

PA'I 'PHAGS PA'AM, TSOGS SPYOR LA GNAS PA'I SEMS DPA' LTA BU
ZHIG YIN NA,

DE'I SPRUL GZHI DANG 'KHRUNGS RABS LA SANGS RGYAS SOGS 'DREN DU
RUNG NGAM MI RUNG ZHE NA,

DE 'DRA BA'I GANG ZAG RNAMS DON LA SANGS RGYAS DANG SEMS CAN
GANG YIN RANG CAG SO

SKYE PHAL PAS RGYUD TSOD MA RTOGS PAR KHA TSON GCOD PAR DKA'
MOD, 'ON KYANG DON LA

@051 SANGS MA RGYAS PA'I GANG ZAG ZHIG YIN NA NI SANGS RGYAS
SOGS DANG THUGS RGYUD GCIG

PAR NI GA LA 'GYUR, DE LTA NA YANG GDUL BYA SO SOS SANGS RGYAS
BYANG SEMS RNAMS KYI

RNAM ROL TU MOS NAS GSOL BA BTAB NA NI, DE DAG GI THUGS RJE
CHAGS THOGS MED PA'I

DBANG GIS DE DANG DE'I BYIN RLABS 'JUG PAS NA, GDUL BYA'I NGOS
NAS NI DE LTAR DU

MOS PA NGES PAR RUNG BA MA ZAD, BSAM SBYOR DE LTAR MED MI RUNG
DU DGOS PA ZHIG KYANG

YIN PA NI BSHES GNYEN BSTAN TSUL GYI GDAMS PAS SHES PAR NUS LA,
BLA MA RANG RANG

GIS NGOS NAS NI RANG BLO RANG LA LKOG TU MA GYUR PA YIN PAS NA
RANG GI RGYUD TSOD RANG GIS

SHES PAR NGES PAS DE DANG BSTUN PA LAS, SLOB MAS MOS PA LTAR
RANG YANG DE LTAR

YIN NAM SNYAM PA'I MNGON PA'I NGA RGYAL 'CHANG NA NI G-YANG SAR
LHUNG BA'I SGO 'JIGS SU

RUNG BA YIN NO, ,YANG, DE TZAM YANG MA YIN PAR DENG SANG DUS
DBANG GIS

BLA MA'I MING TZAM ZHIG THOGS NA, ZHABS PHYI DANG YON BDAG SOGS
KYI RMONGS ZHEN

GYIS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE GZHAN MGO BSKOR BA'I SLAD DU DAM PA
BZANG BZANG PO 'GA'

DANG 'GA'I SPRUL PA YIN ZHES 'PHRENG BAR BSGRIGS PA RNAMS NI
SNYIGS MA'I RANG TSUL

BDO BA TZAM DU ZAD PAS 'THAD MI 'THAD KYI SGRUB BYED SMRA MA
DGOS PAS RNAM DPYOD DANG

LDAN PA DAG GIS BZANG NGAN 'BRING GSUM GYI DBYE BA DE RNAMS LEGS
PAR KHONG DU CHUD

PAR BYOS SHIG ,DES NA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO TZONG KHA PA LTA BU
NI, BSKAL PA MANG

PO'I SNGON NAS SANGS RGYAS PA'AM, SKU TSE 'DI NYID RANG LA ZUNG
'JUG GI GO 'PHANG

MNGON DU MDZAD PA GANG GI DBANG DU BYAS KYANG, DON DU NYI SHAR
SBAR MOS MI KHEGS

PA LTAR SRAS BCAS RGYAL BA KUN GYI MDZAD PA'I KHUR CHEN GCIG TU
BSNAMS PA'I 'GRAN

ZLA MED PA'I SKYES CHEN ZHIG YIN PA GZU BOR GNAS PA KUN LA MTHUN
SNANG DU GRUB PAS NA

@052 'KHRUNGS RABS 'GA' ZHIG TZAM 'PHRENG BAR SPAL BA'I SGO NAS
BDAG NYID CHEN POR SGRUB

DGOS PA ZHIG MA YIN MOD, DE LA BRTEN NAS MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA

SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR RNAMS SU'ANG SPRUL GZHI 'KHRUNGS
RABS SOGS SA BON

TZAM LAS 'GOD PAR MA MDZAD PA NI, BLO CHUNG CI RIGS KYI BSAM PAR
RJE TZONG KHA PA RJE

BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYI RNAM SPRUL YIN ZHES PA TZAM ZHIG RI BO
DGE LUGS PA RNAMS KYIS

RANG 'DOD KYIS SMRA BA LAS, SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS, LHA DANG BLA
MA SOGS KYI LUNG

GIS ZIN PA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS SOGS MED 'DRA SNYAM PA DAG KYANG YOD
TSOD SNANG BAS DE

DAG LA SMAN PA'I SLAD DU, GZHAN ZER GRAGS GTAM TZAM MA YIN PAR
YID CHES TSAD MAR

GYUR BA'I LUNG GIS ZIN PA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS 'GA' ZHIG TZAM SMOS PA
YIN LA,

DE DAG  GI NANG DU GRUB MTHA' GZHAN GYI SKYES CHEN 'GA' ZHIG GI
RNAM ROL BZUNG BA RNAMS KYANG

GSAL TZAM SMOS PA'I DGOS PA YANG, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI RGYAL
BA'I DGONGS PA RMA

MED PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG PA NYID 'DZIN CING
SPEL BA'I THUGS BSKYED

KHO NA LAS RANG PHYOGS LA RMONGS ZHEN DANG, GZHAN PHYOGS LA
SDANG SHUGS KYI CHA PHRA MO TZAM

MI MNGA' YANG, BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE KHO NAR DGONGS TE LTA GRUB
RNAM THAR GTZANG BAR MDZAD

PA'I DON MA GO BAR, GZHAN PHYOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG 'DI NI BDAG CAG
RNAMS KYI GRUB MTHA'

LA SDANG ZHING GNOD PAR MDZAD PA ZHIG GO SNYAM NAS ZHING DAM PA
LA BSOD NAMS MA YIN

PA'I LAS GSOGS PA RNAMS LA SMAN PHYIR DU BKOD PA YIN NO, ,DE
LTAR DOGS PA CUNG

ZAD BCAD ZIN NAS 'DIR SMOS PA'I SKU 'PHRENG RNAMS SDOM GYI TSUL
DU 'GOD NA DE BZHIN

GSHEGS PA KLU'I RIGS MCHOG ,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA MOS PA RAB TU
DGA' BA'I

SNYING PO, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS, BYANG SEMS SNYING STOBS
CHEN PO,

@053 BYANG SEMS NOR BU BZANG PO, BDAG CAG GI STON PA'I SPYAN
SNGAR SHEL DKAR GYI

'PHRENG BA PHUL NAS THUGS BSKYED PA'I KHYE'U, DGE SLONG PADMA'I
NGAD LDAN, DGRA

BCOM PA NYE BAR 'KHOR, DGRA BCOM PA NYER SBAS, SLOB DPON PADMA
'BYUNG

GNAS, MGON PO KLU SGRUB, dO MBHI HE RU KA ,LA WA PA, L'U HI PA,

SKA BA DRI MED 'OD, DGA' LDAN BYAMS PA'I ZHABS DRUNG DU BYANG
SEMS 'OD ZER

'PHRENG BA, JO BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA, MNGA' BDAG MAR PA LO
TZA,

MNYOS STON CHOS 'BAR, DVAGS PO LHA RJE, DAN 'BAG SMRA BA'I SENG
GE ,

BAL YUL YAM BU'I MCHOD GNAS BYANG SEMS KYI TSUL 'DZIN PA, LHA TI
SDE SNOD 'DZIN

PA DAR MA SENG GE ,KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA CHEN PO, RGYA GAR
BANGGA PA TAR

'KHRUNGS PA N'A GA R'A DZA, BRAM ZE'I BU MO SA BRTAN, SKU TSE
'DI'I SNGA MA KHA

CHE'I PAndI TA MA TI BHA DRA RNAMS YIN LA, DA DUNG LUNG BSTAN
GZHAN DU BYAMS PA'I SPRUL

PA YIN PA DANG, BEE RO TZA NA DANG, SGOM PA TSUL KHRIMS SNYING
PO SOGS

KYANG YIN PAR GSUNGS SHING, DES NA GONG DU SMOS PA'I PAndI TA'I
SKYE BA BDUN DANG,

STON PA'I DRUNG NAS DA BAR SKU SKYE BCU BDUN BZHES TSUL NI 'DI
DAG CI RIGS PA YIN PAR

SEMS LA, DE LAS GZHAN DU PAndI TA KHO NA'I SKYE BA BRGYA BZHES
TSUL SOGS MTHA'

DAG NI SO SO SKYE BOS BRJOD PA'I YUL LAS 'DAS SHING, 'KHRUNGS
RABS 'DI DAG

LAS LUNG BSTAN SOGS SU GSAL BA 'GA' ZHIG GI RNAM THAR RAGS TZAM
GONG DU DKOD PA

LTAR LAS, LA LA ZHIG GI RNAM THAR ZHIB PA'I KHUNGS MA RNYED
CING, PAn GRUB

GRAGS CHE RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR NI GZHAN DU GSAL BAS 'DIR YI GES
'JIGS NAS MA BKOD

DO; ;SMRAS PA, RGYAL BAR GYUR KYANG RGYAL SRAS TSUL BZUNG NAS, ,

@054 RNAM PA KUN TU RNAM MANG DON MDZAD TSUL, ,NAM MKHA'I MTHA'
BZHIN NAM YANG RTOGS

MIN PA'I, ,NGO MTSAR 'DI NI NGO MTSAR KUN GYI PHUL, ,LA LAR DE
BZHIN

GSHEGS PA'I BKOD PA DANG, ,RES 'GA' RGYAS SRAS SAR GNAS SEMS
DPA'I

TSUL, ,GZHAN DU DGRA BCOM GRUB BRNYES PAn CHEN SOGS, ,SNA TSOGS
SPRUL PA'I

ROL MO 'BYAMS SU KLAS, ,BRGYA PHRAG NYAL 'GRO'I SNOD DU ZLA BA'I
GZUGS, ,'BAD

RTZOL MED PAR DE SNYED 'CHAR BA LTAR, ,GDUL BYA'I MOS NGO DANG
'TSAMS SGYU MA'I GAR, ,

JI SNYED STON PA 'DREN PA KUN GYI LUGS, ,'JAM DBYANGS RNAM ROL
RJE BTZUN TZONG KHA PA, ,

'JAM DBYANGS NYID PHYIR MKHYEN BRTZE 'PHRIN LAS KUN, ,'JAM DPAL
DNGOS DANG KHYAD

PAR PHRA MO TZAM, ,KUN MKHYEN SRANG LA GZHAL NA'ANG DMIGS SU
MED, ,TSUL

DE'ANG MCHOG DMAN PHAL LA THUN MONG DU, ,GRAGS SHING GRUB NA
SGRUB ZIN SGRUB PA LTAR, ,

'KHRUNGS RABS 'GA' ZUNG TZAM GYI MKHAR BA LA, ,BRTEN NAS DAM PAR
SGRUB DGOS GA

LA YIN, ,'ON KYANG 'GA' ZHIG BLO GROS BUG PA'I SGO, ,THOS CHUNG
MUN

PAS SGRIB PA'I RANG TSUL LAS, ,MA MTHONG MA THOS RGYU MTSAN DU
BYAS NAS, ,LOG

PAR RTOG PA RNAMS LA SMAN PHYIR DU, ,YID CHES TSAD MA'I LUNG GI
NOR BU'I BZHIN, ,

DRI MED RIG PA'I PHRA TSOM GYIS SPUD PA'I, ,DON LDAN GTAM GYI
SBYOR BA 'GA' ZHIG

TZAM; ;SPEL BA'I MGRIN PA CUNG ZHIG BTEGS BYAS SO, ,ZHES PA NI
BAR

SKABS KYI TSIGS BCAD PA'O,, ' ,,DA NI SKU 'PHRENG PHYI MA RNAMS
KYI 'BYUNG

RNAMS KYI 'BYUNG

TSUL BRJOD PA LA, DE YANG SKABS 'DIR 'BYUNG RIM GYI DBANG DU
BYAS NA, SKU

TSE 'DI NYID KYI RNAM THAR 'GOD PA'I RJES SU 'KHRUNGS RABS PHYI
MA RNAMS 'GOD DGOS PA

LTAR SNANG NA YANG, LUNG BSTAN PHAL CHE BAR 'KHRUNGS RABS SNGA
PHYI RNAMS DKYUS

@055 GCIG TU GSUNGS PA LTAR, DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU YANG DKYUS
GCIG TU GNANG

'DUG PA DANG, RNAM THAR GZHAN DAG TU YANG SNGA PHYI NGES MED KYI
TSUL DU BKOD

PAR MDZAD 'DUG PA MA ZAD, 'KHRUNGS RABS PHYI MA'I 'BYUNG TSUL
YANG RAGS RIM

LAS MANG DU BRJOD MA DGOS PAS NA, 'DIR YANG DKYUS GCIG TU BKOD
RJES

SKU TSE 'DI NYID KYI RTOGS BRJOD RGYAS PAR BKOD NA 'JUG PA BDE
ZHING RGYAS BSDUS 'BREL

CHAGS PAR MNGON PAS DE LTAR DU 'GOD NA, DE YANG BLA MA DBU MA
PAS RJE BTZUN 'JAM

DPAL DBYANGS LA RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I SKU SKYE SNGA PHYI
SOGS ZHU BAR MDZAD PA'I LUNG

BSTAN DU, SKU SKYE 'DI'I PHYI MA DGA' LDAN DU RGYAL BA MA PHAM
PA'I CHOS KYI MDUN SAR THEG

PA CHEN PO'I 'BYOR PA DPAG TU MED PA LA LONGS SPYOD PAR 'GYUR
ZHING, MTSAN LA BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA' 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO ZHES BYA BAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES
GSUNGS SHING,

DE'I LO RGYUS RJE NYID LA ZHUS PA NA, 'DI'I PHYI MA DGA' LDAN DU
'GRO BA 'DI LA RANG

BLA MA DBU MA PA, BLA MA PHYAG RDOR BA SOGS MANG PO ZHIG KHA
'CHAM PAR 'DUG

CES DON LA DE LTAR DU ZHAL GYIS BZHES PAR SNANG, BLA MA PHYAG
RDOR BAS GSUNGS

TSUL NI, RJE BTZUN PHYAG RDOR BAS GSANG BA'I BDAG PO LA, BLO
BZANG GRAGS

PA SKYE BA RTING MA GAR SKYE ZHUS PAR, DGA' LDAN DU BYAMS PA'I
DRUNG DU BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO ZHES BYA BAR SKYE, DE NAS 'DZAM GLING
GZHAN DU SEMS CAN

GYI DON LA DGONGS TE CHOS RGYAL GCIG TU SKYE BA BZHES NAS SEMS
CAN GYI DON DPAG TU

MED PA 'BYUNG NGO, ,GSUM PA 'DZAM GLING 'DIR RGYA GAR SHAR
PHYOGS SU PU RI

TZA ZHES BYA BA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU PAndI TA DZNY'A NA SHR'I
ZHES BYA BAR 'KHRUNGS, 'KHOR NYIS

STONG 'DU ZHING, 'KHOR RNAMS KYANG TSOGS LAM CHEN PO DANG, SBYOR
LAM LA GNAS PA

@056 SHA DAG 'BYUNG, ZHES DANG, RJE PHYAG RDOR BA'I GSANG BA'I
RNAM THAR LOG RTOG MUN

SEL DU, YANG DUS LAN GCIG YI DAM LA GSOL BA BTAB CING MAndAL
PHUL NAS,

BDAG LA SLOB MA SGRUB PA MTHAR PHYIN PA JI TZAM YONG, DE DAG GI
LUNG BSTAN

GSAL BA ZHIG GSUNGS 'TSAL, ZHES GSOL BAS, GSANG BA'I BDAG PO

BYON NAS 'DI SKAD GSUNGS, LAS KYI RDO RJE GDUL BYA'I YUL DU GYUR
BA'I BU SLOB

'BYUNG TSUL RNAMS KHYED RANG GIS SHES PAR NUS MOD, 'ON KYAN
BTZAN SAR PHYIN

PA'I SLOB MA BRGYUD 'DZIN MANG DU 'BYUNG STE, DE RNAMS KYI NANG
NAS KYANG 'DI LTAR,

BLO BZANG GRAGS PA 'GRAN ZLA KUN DANG BRAL, ,SH'AKYA'I RGYAL
PO'I DRUNG DU SEMS MCHOG

BSKYED, ,ZHING 'DIR MDO DANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS SPEL, ,'DI
NAS 'PHOS

TE DGA' LDAN GNAS SU 'GRO ,'JAM DPAL SNYING PO BYAMS PA'I SRAS
MCHOG DE, ,

MYUR DU 'TSANG RGYA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES DANG, MCHOG
DE, ,

BDAG GI LUNG BSTAN LAS, LUS 'DI BOR TSE DGA' LDAN DU, ,BYAMS
PA'I

DRUNG 'GRO CHOS NYAN 'GYUR, ,'JAM DPAL SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA,
,SEMS CAN

KUN LA BRTZE BA STE, ,DE NI SA BCU'I MTHAR PHYIN TO, ,ZHES
GSUNGS PA RNAMS

SO; ;GZHAN YANG PADMA'I BKA' CHEMS LAS, 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL PA
GDUL

BYA BSTAN PA'I BDAG ,MDO SNGAGS BSTAN 'DZIN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA
ZHES, ,

MI RABS BRGYAD DU MDO SNGAGS RGYAS PAR STON, ,ZHING 'DI 'DAS NAS
BYAMS PA'I

DRUNG DU 'GRO ,DE YI BRGYUD 'DZIN TSE GCIG SANGS RGYAS YIN,
,RANG BYUNG

BSKAL PA CHEN PO LA, ,DGRA BCOM THOB PAR THE TSOM MED, ,CES
DANG, GRUB

CHEN SANGS RGYAS KYIS DAG SNANG LA AYON DU BYON NAS SLOB DPON LA
DRI BA ZHUS PA'I GRAS

@057 SU'ANG, BOD YUL NA CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA 'DI SKAD
CHE, KHONG SEMS

GAR BSKYED, PHYI MA GAR GSHEGS ZHUS PAS, SEMS BSKYED THUB PA'I
DRUNG

DU BSKYED, ,SKYE BA KUN TU 'GRO DON MDZAD, ,SMON LAM GCIG GI BYE
BRAG GIS, ,

SEMS DPA' DE LA SMAD PAR BYED, ,KYE MA SEMS CAN SNYING RE RJE,
,'BREL

TSAD DON LDAN SNYING STOBS CAN, ,SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA'I 'KHOR GYIS
BSKOR, ,SANGS

RGYAS BSTAN PA BSRUNG BSKYED BYED, ,SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU AA LA LA,
,GRIB DANG

GZA' GDON DAG LA 'DZEMS, ,TSE LA BAR CHAD YONGS NYE BAS, ,GTZUG
TOR

RNAM RGYAL LA SOGS PA'I, ,BAR CHAD BZLOG PA'I CHO GAR 'BAD, ,RE
ZHIG

BYAMS PA'I DRUNG DU 'GRO ,SEMS DPA' GSER GYI ME TOG GRAGS, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA'I SEMS DPA' GSER GYI ME TOG NI 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO
DANG DON GCIG YIN

PAR DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG LAS GSUNGS, DE SOGS GSAR RNYING GI
LUNG BSTAN

MANG PO ZHIG MTHUN PAR BYUNG BA LAS 'GA' ZHIG DA DUNG 'OG NAS
KYANG RIM PAR 'CHAD

PAR 'GYUR BA RNAMS KYI DON LTAR, SKU TSE 'DI'I RTING MA LA DGA'
LDAN DU RGYAL TSAB

MI PHAM MGON PO'I DRUNG DU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAL 'JAM DPAL SNYING
PO ZHES PAR GYUR

NAS THEG CHEN CHOS KYI BDUD RTZIR LONGS SPYOD PAR MDZAD LA, DE'I
PHYIR MKHAS GRUB THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PAS DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MAR, RGYAL BA'I SPYAN SNGAR
BYANG CHUB SPYOD PA BLANGS, ,

DGA' LDAN GNAS SU 'JAM DPAL SNYING POR GRAGS, ,KHA BA CAN 'DIR
BLO BZANG

GRAGS PA'I DPAL, ,RGYAL SRAS THU BO KHYOD LA GSOL BA 'DEBS,
,ZHES DANG,

'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DPAL LDAN PAS, ,DGA' LDAN GNAS
SU MI PHAM

CHOS RJE'I DRUNG, ,RGYAL BA'I SRAS PO 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO ZHES,
,'JAM DPAL

@058 DBYANGS DANG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO YIS, ,GSAL BAR LUNG BSTAN
RJE BTZUN CHOS

KYI RJE, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA YIN NO, ,DE'I RJES SU 'BYON TSUL LUNG
BSTAN RNAMS

SU MTSAN DNGOS SU GSAL BA NI, GONG DU DRANGS PA LTAR, 'DZAM
GLING GZHAN

DU CHOS RGYAL GCIG TU SKYE BA BZHES PA DANG, DE NAS RGYA GAR
SHAR PHYOGS SU PAndI

TA DZNY'A NA SHRI ZHES PAR 'KHRUNGS PA RNAMS DANG, MTSAN GYIS MA
GSAL BA NI,

GSANG BDAG GI LUNG BSTAN LAS, GSANG 'DZIN LAS KYI RDO RJE LA,
,SNGON NAS

NYE BAR 'BREL BA YI, ,BLO BZANG GRAGS PA 'DI NYID NI, ,SANGS
RGYAS KUN

GYI SPRUL PA STE, ,PAn CHEN RKYANG GI LUS BZUNG NAS, ,MDO DANG
SNGAGS KYI

DON BSHAD CING, ,NGES PA KHO NAR 'TSANG RGYA'O, ,RGYA GAR RGYA
NAG BAL PO DANG, ,

DBUS GTZANG MDO KHAMS YUL PHYOGS SU, ,SKYE BA BZUNG ZHING 'GRO
KUN RNAMS, ,

THAR PA'I LAM LA 'KHRID PAR MDZAD, ,'JAM PA'I DBYANGS NI LHAG
PA'I LHA, ,

DBYANGS CAN MA NI LAS RGYA STE, ,NGES PA KHO NAR BYANG CHUB BO,
,'PHAGS

PA'I SLOB MA BSDU BAR BYED, ,CES 'DZAM GLING 'DI KHO NAR YANG
RGYA GAR RGYA NAG BAL

YUL SOGS DANG, ,NANG TSAN BOD YUL 'DIR DBUS GTZANG MDO KHAMS
SOGS KUN

TU MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I RNAM ROL MTHA' KLAS PAS 'GRO BA'I DON
MDZAD DANG MDZAD PAR

'GYUR BA DANG, DER MA ZAD BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM RIN PO CHE PHA
CHOS NYI SHU

RTZA DRUG GI YA GYAL 'BROM GYIS 'BUL MO CHE MDZAD PA LAS 'PHROS
PA'I MA 'ONGS LUNG BSTAN

DU; BDAG GI SPRUL BA DAM PA GCIG ,RES 'GA' DGE SLONG NYID DU
SPRUL, ,

DES NI GNAS DE SKYONG BAR BYED, ,RES 'GA' BYIS PA'I GZUGS SU
'ONG, ,

RES 'GA' DBUL PHONGS SPRANG PO'I GZUGS, ,RES 'GA' BYOL SONG BYA
KHYI'I

@059 GZUGS, ,RES 'GA' GSOL 'DEBS DBYANGS KYI GZUGS, ,RES 'GA'

YIG 'BRU GZUNGS KYI GZUGS, ,GRAGS PA CAN GYI DGE SLONG NGO,
,BSTAN

GNAS BAR DU YANG YANG 'ONG, ,DE NI BRGYUD PA NYID DANG MTSUNGS,
,KHRIMS

LDAN DE YIS BYIN RLABS SHING, ,SKYES BU GSUM NI DON GNYER BA'I,
,BYA BA

MYONG BA BRGYA PHRAG TZAM, ,GNAS DER BSAM GTAN SGOM PAR BYED,
,DE LA'ANG CUNG

ZAD LTA BAS GNOD, ,'DOD YON BDUD KYI G-YAB MO 'BYUNG, ,BSAM
GTAN CHAGS

SDANG DAG LA 'CHAR, ,'ON KYANG SPRUL PAS BYIN RLABS PAS, ,LHA
DANG BCAS PA'I MCHOD

PA'I GNAS, ,BKUR 'OS NYID DU NGES PAR 'GYUR, ,MDOR NA GNAS MCHOG
DE DAG TU, ,

DANG PO BZHI GRVA NAS BZUNG STE, ,THA MAR STONG PHRAG PHYED DANG
GSUM, ,BSLAB PA GSUM

LDAN SH'AKYA'I SRAS, ,'GRO BA KUN GYI MGON DU 'GYUR, ,GNAS DER
PHYOGS DANG

PHYOGS MTSAMS NAS, ,DGE 'DUN DPAG MED 'DU BAR 'GYUR, ,SPYIR YANG
LAS CAN

PHYOGS BCUR 'PHRO, ,PHYI YI RGYA MTSO DAG DANG MTSUNGS, ,CHU BO
BRGYA YIS GANG

MI NUS, ,CI TZAM ZHIG GIS DMA' MI NUS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I LUNG
BSTAN

'DIR, GRAGS PA CAN GYI DGE SLONG ZHES RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I
MTSAN SGRA DNGOS

SU SMOS NAS, DE'I SPRUL PA BSTAN PA NAM GNAS KYI BAR DU YANG
YANG 'BYON PA

DANG, ,DE YANG SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI RNAM 'GYUR GCIG TU MA NGES
PAR SNA TSOGS

SU 'BYUNG BA DANG, DE DAG GI THUGS RJE DANG BYIN RLABS LA BRTEN
NAS SKYES BU GSUM

GYI LAM THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM BYED PA'I GANG ZAG BRGYA PHRAG LA
SOGS PA JE MANG DU

'DUS NAS RI BO DGE LUGS PA ZHES PA'I BSTAN PA RGYA CHER 'PHEL BA
NA, GZHAN

PHYOGS 'GA' ZHIG MA BZOD PAS LTA SPYOD KYI TSUL LA KHA ZER ZHING
'PHYAS GDAGS PA CUNG

@060 ZAD 'BYUNG BA DANG, DAD PA CAN MANG POS BSOD NAMS KYI ZHING
DU BKUR BA'I 'DOD

YON LA BRTEN NAS THOS BSAM PA DANG SPONG BA PA 'GA' ZHIG THOS
SGOM LAS G-YEL TE

RNAM G-YENG DANG CHAGS SDANG GI DBANG DU 'GYUR BA SRID NA YANG,
RJE BDAG NYID CHEN

PO NYID KYI BYIN RLABS DANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI MTHUS 'DUS PA DMANGS
RNAMS MANG THOS TSUL

LDAN GYI BRTUL ZHUGS KHO NA LA GNAS PAS LHA DANG BCAS PA'I 'GRO
BA'I BSOD NAMS KYI

ZHING DANG, YON YONGS SU SBYONG BA'I GNAS LAS NYAMS PAR MI 'GYUR
BA DANG, MDOR

NA GNAS MCHOG DE DAG TU, ,ZHES PA NAS, SE 'BRAS DGA' GSUM GYIS

GTZOS PA'I PHYOGS DANG PHYOGS BRAL GYI 'DUS SDE SPYI DANG, NANG
TSAN GDAN SA CHEN

PO DANG RGYUD GRVA RNAM GNYIS SOGS 'DI DAG TU DANG POR BZHI GRVA
TZAM NAS RIM GYIS JE MANG

GIS DUS PHYIS GRVA SA GRVA TSANG RNAMS SU BRGYAD STONG SOGS
STONG SOGS NAS NYUNG MTHA' STONG

PHRAG PHYED GSUM GYI MTHA' BRTEN PA 'BYUNG BA DANG, DE DAG KYANG
LAM BSLAB PA GSUM

GYI NYAMS LEN DANG, LUNG SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI'I
'CHAD NYAN LA GCIG

TU BRTZON PAS 'GRO BA KUN GYI MGON SKYABS GCIG PUR 'GYUR BA
DANG, DE LTA BU'I

SNYAN GRAGS DANG 'PHRIN LAS LA BRTEN NAS RGYA HOR BOD SOGS KYI
SA PHYOGS KUN NAS THOS

BSAM SGOM GSUM DON DU GNYER BA'I SKYES BU DPAG TU MED PA PADMO'I
MTSO LA NGANG MO

BZHIN DU 'DU BA DANG, ,YANG DE DAG LAS THOS SGOM GYI NOR GYIS
PHYUG PA MANG PO ZHIG

RIN PO CHE'I GLING NAS NOR BU LON PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR RANG RANG
GI YUL DANG, DE

LAS GZHAN PA DAG TU'ANG BSKYOD NAS ZHVA SER COD PAn 'CHANG BA'I
RING LUGS RGYA CHER SPEL

BA SOGS 'GRO 'ONG GI 'DU 'GOD RGYUN MI CHAD KYANG, JI LTAR RGYA
MTSO CHEN PO NI CHU

KLUNG BRGYA PHRAG SPRO BA DANG BSDU BA CI RTZOM YANG 'PHEL 'GRIB
SDANG, BRI GANG GI RNAM

@061 PA CHA TZAM MNGON PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR 'BYUNG BA SOGS BSTAN
PA'I SGO NAS DON DU SPRUL

PA'I RNAM ROL SNA TSOGS ZAD MTHA' MED PAS 'GRO DON MDZAD PAR
LUNG BSTAN ZHING,

DE YANG ZHING 'DIR STON TSUL MTSON PA TZAM TE GZHAN DU PHYOGS
BCU RAB 'BYAMS KYI ZHING

KHAMS MTHA' KLAS PAR DE DANG DE 'DRA BA'I RNAM SPRUL DANG 'PHRIN
LAS 'KHOR BA JI SRID PA

DE SRID DU STON NA DE'I TSUL MTHA' DAG KUN MKHYEN PAS KYANG
BRJOD PAR MI NUS TE,

MDO PHAL PO CHE LAS, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GANG G'A'I KLUNG GI
BYE MA SNYED KYI RDUL

PHRA RAB KYI GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAS SA RE RE NA
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA

JI SNYED BZHUGS PA DE THAMS CAD KYI MDUN NA 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL
RE RE BZHUGS

NAS THUGS BSKYED PAR GSUNGS PA LTAR RO, ,YANG, NAM ZHIG GDUL
BYA'I

MOS NGOR SLAR YANG SANGS RGYA BA'I MDZAD PA STON PA'I TSUL LA,
MA CIG LAB SGRON

GYI LUNG BSTAN DU, BU MO KHYOD KYIS DRIS PA'I BYANG SEMS DE, ,MA
'ONGS

BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS BDUN PA YIN, ,DA LTA BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SNYING STOBS

CHE; ;SNYIGS DUS LOG SPYOD BOD YUL 'BYUNG BA'I TSE, ,DGE SLONG
TSUL

'DZIN GRAGS PA'I MTSAN THOGS TE, ,GANG GI ZHING DU SENG GE'I NGA
ROR GRAGS, ,

KHRIMS 'CHAL LOG SPYOD SPOBS PA ZIL MNON PAS, ,KHRIMS 'CHAL BAG
MED

YANG DAG KHRIMS LA SBYOR, ,THUB NYID SROL BSTOD BSTAN PA'I PHYAG
RTAGS 'DZIN, ,

BSTAN PA GSAL BAR BYED PA'I DGE SLONG NGO, ,MTHA' YAS RGYUD
SDE'I TSOGS LA

DBANG BSGYUR ZHING, ,RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I DGONGS PA'I BCUD
PHYUNG NAS, ,

GDUL BYAR GYUR PA'I SKAL LDAN TSIM PAR MDZAD, ,CES BSKAL BZANG
SANGS RGYAS

BDUN PAR SANGS RGYA TSUL GCIG DANG, RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA ROR
SANGS RGYA TSUL GNYIS,

@062 GSUNGS PA DANG, YANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS DANG THUGS
RGYUD GCIG PA'I PHYIR,

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KUN TU GZIGS SU SANGS RGYA TSUL DANG GSUM
'BYUNG BA LAS,

DANG PO NI, MI 'JED KYI ZHING 'DI'I BSKAL PA BZANG PO LA 'TSANG
RGYA BA'I MDZAD

PA STON PA'I DBANG DU BYAS PA YIN LA, PHYI MA GNYIS NI MI DBANG
'JAM DPAL DBYANGS

KYI DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU, MA 'ONGS PAR DKON MCHOG BRTZEGS
PA'I RDUL MED

BSAGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DANG, NGO MTSAR RMAD
BYUNG BKOD

PA GNYIS KYANG DON GCIG LA, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG
DAG PAR

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KUN TU GZIGS DANG, DAG PA'I SNANG BA
RNAMS SU BYUNG BA'I

RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA RO GNYIS KYANG GCIG PA AE YIN SNYAM, ZHES
GSUNGS PA LTAR DON

GCIG TU BYAS KYANG MI 'GAL LA, DON THA DAD PA YIN PA'I DBANG DU
BYAS NA YANG GDUL

BYA'I SNANG NGOR SANGS RGYAS TSUL LAN DU MAR STON PA NI JI SNYED
CIG 'BYUNG STE, DPER NA

RANG CAG GI STON PA THUGS RJE CAN LTA BU LA MTSON NA, DKON
BRTZEGS 'DUS PA BCU

DRUG PA YAB SRAS MJAL BA'I MDO LAS, SNGON 'DAS PA'I DUS BSKAL PA
DPAG TU MED

PA'I SNGON ROL TU 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANG G'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA
SNYED KYI ZHING GCIG TU GYUR

PA DER, BDAG CAG GI STON PA SH'AKYA SENG GE 'DI NYID RDZOGS PA'I
SANGS RGYAS DBANG PO'I

TOG CES BYA BAR GYUR TE MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS GYI TSUL BSTAN PAR
GSUNGS PA DANG,

MDO SDE PADMA DKAR PO LAS, BSKAL PA BYE BA KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA
STONG GRANGS MED DPAG

TU MED PA NAS, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB
'DI MNGON PAR

RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS MDO KYI, NGAS SKABS SKABS SU THABS MKHAS
PA 'DI LTA

BU DAG SEMS CAN RNAMS 'DUL BA'I PHYIR BSTAN TE, GNAS DER NGA LA
RDZUN DU SMRA BAR

@063 'GYUR BA GANG YANG MED DO, ,ZHES DPE DANG BCAS TE RGYA CHER
GSUNGS PA'I MTHAR,

DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DON GYI RNAM PA 'DI NYID RGYAS PAR
STON CING, DE'I

TSE TSIGS SU BCAD PA 'DI DAG BKA' STZAL TO, ,BSKAL PA BYE STONG
BSAM GYIS MI

KHYAB PA, ,DE YI TSAD NI NAM YANG MED PA NAS, ,BYANG CHUB MCHOG
RAB DE NI

NGAS THOB STE, ,NGAS NI RTAG TU CHOS KYANG RAB 'CHAD DO, ,BYANG
CHUB SEMS

DPA' MING 'DI YANG DAG BZUNG, ,SANGS RGYAS YE SHES LA NI DE DAG
'GOD, ,

SEMS CAN BYE BA KHRAG KHRIG MTHA' YAS PA, ,BSKAL PA BYE BA MANG
POR SMIN PAR

BYAS, ,MYA NGAN 'DAS PA'I SA YANG BSTAN BYA STE, ,SEMS CAN RNAM
PAR 'DUL

PHYIR THABS BRJOD DO, ,DE TSE NGA NI MYA NGAN MI 'DA' STE, ,'DI
NYID NA NI CHOS

KYANG RAB STON TO, ,ZHES DANG, YAB SRAS MJAL BA'I MDO LAS, BYE
BA

BRGYAD CUR RGYAL BA NYID, ,SANGS RGYAS NYID DU BSTAN GYUR KYANG,
,DA DUNG CHOG

PA'I 'DU SHES BSAL, ,BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU THUGS KYANG 'JUG ,STONG
GSUM

DRUG CU RTZA GCIG GI ,SANGS RGYAS ZHING RNAMS DAG MDZAD PAS, ,JI
LTAR THUB

PA THABS MKHAS PA, ,RGYAL BA KHYOD NI KUN GYIS 'TSAL, ,DA DUNG
DANG PO

THUGS BSKYED PAR, ,DE DANG DER NI YONGS BSTAN TE, ,DA DUNG DU
YANG 'DREN

PA KHYOD, ,SANGS RGYAS MANG PO STON PAR MDZAD, ,CES BSKAL MANG
SNGON NAS

SANGS RGYAS ZIN KYANG DA DUNG 'TSANG RGYA TSUL LAN DU MAR STON
PAR GSUNGS PA DANG,

GRUB MTHA' 'OG MA'I DBANG DU BYAS NA YANG ZHING BYE BA PHRAG
BRGYAR SPRUL PA'I RNAM ROL BYE

BA PHRAG BRGYAS SANGS RGYAS TSUL SOGS MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS TSANG
BAR BSTAN PA BSHAD PA

DANG, RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA YANG NGES DON DU SANGS RGYAS ZIN KYANG
GDUL BYA THUN MONG

@064 BA'I MOS NGOR SEMS DPA'I TSUL BZUNG NAS MA 'ONGS PA NA
'TSANG RGYA BA'I MDZAD PA STON

PAR GSUNGS PA DANG, MGON PO KLU SGRUB SA DANG PO LA GNAS BDE BA
CAN DU BYON

PAR BSHAD PA DANG, YANG, SKU TSE DE LA ZUNG 'JUG BRNYES PAR
GSUNGS PA DANG,

MA 'ONGS PA NA DANG BA'I 'OD CES BYA BA'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS SU
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA

YE SHES 'BYUNG GNAS 'OD CES BYA BAR 'TSANG RGYA BAR GSUNGS PA
SOGS DANG MTSUNGS PAR,

RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO YANG SNGON DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KLU'I RIGS
MCHOG TU SANGS RGYAS

ZIN KYANG, THUN MONG BA'I NGOR RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS SA BCU'I
DBANG PHYUG GI TSUL DU

BZHUGS PA DANG, SNYIGS DUS MA DAG PA'I 'GRO NGOR GSUM LDAN RDO
RJE 'DZIN PA NGUR

SMRIG 'CHANG BA'I SKUR BSTAN NAS BAR DOR ZUNG 'JUG MNGON DU
MDZAD PA'I TSUL BSTAN PA

DANG, SLAR YANG BSKAL PA BZANG PO 'DI NYID LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA
SPYAN LEGS DANG,

ZHING KHAMS GZHAN DU RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA RO DANG, KUN TU
GZIGS SU SANGS RGYA TSUL

GSUNGS PA RNAMS 'GRO BA 'DUL BA'I THABS MKHAS KYI SGYU 'PHRUL
'GAL BA MED PA NYID

DU SHES PAR BYA'O, ,GONG GI MA GCIG LAB SGRON GYI LUNG BSTAN DU,
BSKAL

BZANG SANGS RGYAS BDUN PA ZHES GSUNGS PA NI, 'KHOR BA 'JIGS NAS
RTZIS PA'I

BDUN PA NI MA YIN TE, BYAMS PA NAS RTZIS PA'I BDUN PA DANG,
'KHOR BA

'JIGS NAS RTZIS PA'I BCU GCIG PA SANGS RGYAS SPYAN LEGS YIN PAR
RNAM THAR SKAL

LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG SOGS LAS GSUNGS SHING, DE NI
MDO SDE BSKAL

PA BZANG PO LAS, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SPYAN LEGS KHYIM BDAG TSE,
,DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA LEGS PAR SGRA SGROG LA, ,KHANG PA BRTZEGS PA DAG
NI PHUL NAS

KYANG; ;DANG POR BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED DO, ,ZHES THUGS

@065 BSKYED TSUL DANG, YAB YUM RIGS RUS 'DUS PA SOGS KYI KHYAD
PAR YANG,

DE NYID LAS, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SPYAN LEGS SKYE BA'I YUL NI
BZANG BYED CES

BYA'O; ;RIGS NI BRAM ZE'O, ,'OD NI DPAG TSAD BCU GNYIS SO, ,YAB

NI RIN PO CHE ZHES BYA'O, ,YUM NI GSAL BA ZHES BYA'O, ,SRAS NI
RGYU SKAR

RGYAL PO ZHES BYA'O, ,SHES RAB CAD RNAMS KYI MCHOG NI BLO GROS
MTHA' YAS ZHES

BYA'O; ;RDZU 'PHRUL CAN RNAMS KYI MCHOG NI SENG GE'I 'GROS ZHES
BYA'O, ,

'DUS PA DANG PO LA NI NYAN THOS SUM 'BUM MO, ,GNYIS PA LA NI
NYIS 'BUM BRGYAD

STONG NGO, ,'DUS PA GSUM PA LA NI NYAN THOS GSUM 'BUM DRUG STONG
NGO, ,

SKU TSE'I TSAD NI LO BDUN KHRI'O, ,DAM PA'I CHOS NI LO DUNG
PHYUR PHRAG GSUM GYI

BAR DU GNAS SO, ,SKU GDUNG NI RGYAS PAR 'GYUR RO, ,SANGS RGYAS
BCU

PO DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DANG PO DE DAG GIS SEMS CAN RNAMS YONGS SU
SMIN PAR MDZAD

PA DE SNYED CIG NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DE GCIG PUS KYANG MDZAD
PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA LTAR RO, ,YANG NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG BKOD PA'I ZHING DU
RGYAL BA SENG GE'I

NGA ROR 'TSANG RGYA BA'I LUNG NI GONG DU GSAL BA RNAMS SU MA
ZAD, GZHAN YANG SLOB

DPON PADMAS MDZAD PA'I BSKUL BYANG GI LUNG SNGAR DRANGS PA'I
'PHRO LAS, RGYAL BA'I

SRAS PO GRAGS PA'I MTHA' CAN DES, ,SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO LONGS
SPYOD RDZOGS SKUR

BSGYUR, ,PHA RGYUD ZAB GNAD PHRA MO'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG, ,MTHA'
BZHI SPROS

BRAL RIG PA'I LTA BA YIS, ,SKAL BZANG GDUL BYA MANG PO SMIN GROL
MDZAD, ,

ZHING 'DI'I SKU YI BKOD PA LEGS BSDUS NAS, ,NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG
BKOD PA'I

'JIG RTEN DU, ,RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA NGOR MNGON 'TSANG RGYA,
,DE YI PHYAG

@066 GI MCHOD SDONG CHEN PO LAS, ,'OD ZER BYE BA'I PHUNG PO RAB
TU 'GYED, ,CES

DANG, MDO SDE GDAMS NGAG 'BOGS PA'I RGYAL PO'I BSTAN PA DVANGS
SNYIGS 'BYED

PA'I LE'U'I LUNG GONG DU DRANGS PA'I 'PHRO LAS, BLO BZANG ZHES
BYA'I MING CAN 'BYUNG, ,

'KHOR NI RNAM MANG BSDU BAR BYED, ,CHOS SPYOD BCU YI RGYUN
'DZUGS SHING, ,LHA

KHANG KA BA SHING LO CAN, ,NGA YI GZUGS SKU RNAM GNYIS LA, ,DBU
RGYAN 'BUL

ZHING MCHOD PAR BYED, ,STON PA'I MDO BZHIN GSUNG SGROG CING,
,SNYAN PA'I

DBYANGS KYIS GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,NGA LA GSOL BA RAB 'DEBS NAM,
,BSTAN

PA LO STONG BAR DU GNAS, ,DE NAS 'PHOS NAS SHAR PHYOGS KYI,
,RMAD BYUNG

BKOD PA'I 'JIG RTEN DU, ,SENG GE'I NGA RO ZHES BYAR 'GYUR, ,DE
LA DAD BYED ZHING

DER SKYE, ,ZHING MCHOG DE NI KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS, ,ZHES SOGS MANG
DU BYUNG LA,

RGYAL BA SENG GE NGA RO'I SKU'I TSAD NI DPAG TSAD GCIG SKU TSE'I
TSAD NI BSKAL PA

DPAG TU MED PAR BZHUGS, 'OD NI DPAG TSAD DU MA, SKU MDOG NI
LJANG

SNGON MRGAD KYI MDOG CAN, PHYAG G-YAS PA CHOS 'CHAD KYI PHYAG
RGYA DANG,

G-YON MNYAM BZHAG GI STENG NA BDUD RTZIS GANG BA'I LHUNG BZED
BSNAMS PA'I BDUD RTZI'I

KHA DOG GZHAN LAS KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA, DE'I DBUS NAS BDUD
RTZI'I 'OD ZER

LAS GRUB PA'I MCHOD SDONG CHES CHER 'PHAGS PA'I DBUS CUNG ZAD
MTHO BA, 'OD

ZER SNA TSOGS PA KUN TU 'PHRO BA, BDUD RTZI DANG KHA DOG RIGS
GCIG PA,

ZHING DE'I GDUL BYA DBANG PO RAB RNAMS KYIS MCHOD SDONG DE NYID
MTHONG BA'I MDO LA LTA BA

RNAM DAG DANG 'BREL BA'I SNGAGS KYI RTOGS PA RANG 'KHRUNGS SU
RGYUD LA BSTAR NAS BDUD

RTZI MNGON DU BYED PA, DBANG PO 'BRING DANG MTHA' MA RNAMS LA
GSUNG GIS LTA BA RNAM

@067 DAG DANG 'BREL BA'I SNGAGS 'DOMS PAR MDZAD PA TZAM GYIS SA
LAM GYI RTOGS PA MNGON

DU 'GYUR BA STE, MDOR NA 'KHOR GYI TSOGS RNAMS THAMS CAD LTA BA
RNAM DAG DANG

'BREL BA'I SNGAGS LAM LA BRTEN NAS 'TSANG RGYA BAR 'GYUR BA SHA
STAG YIN CES RJE BTZUN

'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYIS RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO LA LUNG
BSTAN TSUL GONG DU

DRANGS PA'I 'PHRO LAS GSAL BAR BYUNG ZHING, TSUL DE DAG MKHAS
GRUB THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PAS TSIGS BCAD DU SDEBS PAR MDZAD PA RNAM DAG GANGS RI MA
LAS, RGYAL

BA SENG GE'I NGA RO'I SKU TSE NI, ,BSKAL PA DPAG MED THA MAL SKU
YI TSAD

DPAG TSAD GCIG PA MRGAD MDOG LTA BU, ,DPAG TSAD DU MA'I 'OD LDAN
PHYAG G-YAS

KYIS, ,CHOS 'CHAD G-YON PA MNYAM BZHAG LA GNAS PA'I, ,BDUD
RTZIS

GANG BA'I LHUNG BZED DE DBUS NAS, ,BDUD RTZI'I 'OD SDONG MCHOD
SDONG CHER 'PHAGS PA,,

GRANGS MED 'OD ZER 'GYED PA LHAM MER GSAL, ,ZHING DE'I GDUL BYA
DBANG PO

MCHOG RNAMS KYIS, ,MCHOD SDONG DE NYID MTHONG BA'I MDO NYID LA,
,THEG MCHOG

LAM BZANG RGYUD LA MNGON DU BYED, ,CES SOGS GONG DANG MTHUN PAR
GSUNGS PA'I

MTHAR, SKYE BA KUN TU LUS DANG SROG LA YANG, ,MI BLTA SNGAGS KYI
CHOS TSUL KUN

BZUNG STE, ,RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA ROS SANGS RGYAS PA, ,DE YI
'KHOR GYI DANG POR BDAG

GYUR CIG, ,CES GSUNGS PA DANG, MKHAR NAG LO TZ'A BAS, BLO BZANG
DGE BA'I

BSHES DE SANGS RGYAS SKU, ,MRGAD LHUN PO MTSAN DPES BRGYAN PA
BZHIN, DPAG

MED 'OD KYI GONG BU LHAM ME BA, ,RGYAL BA SENG GE'I NGA RO SGROG
LA BSTOD, ,CES DANG,

BGRANG YAS ZHING RNAMS BSDOMS BA'I DPAL MNGA' BA, ,NGO MTSAR
RMAD BYUNG BKOD PAR

GRAGS PA DER, ,BDAG CAG SKYES NAS RGYAL BA MNYES BYED CING,
,SENG GE'I NGA RO'I

@068 SRAS KYI THU BOR SHOG ,CES DANG, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO
BZANG BSKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSOS, BYANG SHAR NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG BKOD PA'I
ZHING, ,RNAM

'DREN SENG GE NGA RO'I ZHABS DRUNG DU, ,'KHOR GYI THOG MAR SKYES
NAS MDO RGYUD

LA; ;THOS BSAM SGOM PAS RTAG TU 'DA' BAR SHOG ,CES SOGS SKYES

CHEN BDAG NYID CHEN PO DU MAS BSTOD SNGAGS DANG SMON LAM MDZAD
PA MTHA' YAS SO, ,

YANG, 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI ZHING GI BKOD PA RDUL MED YANG DAG
BSAGS

PAR DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KUN TU GZIGS SU SANGS RGYA BA'I TSUL
SNYING RJE PAD DKAR

LAS GSUNGS PA LTAR NA, SNGON BSKAL PA CHEN PO 'DZIN PA LA GLING
BZHI PA 'DI NYID

DU 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I RGYAL PO RTZIBS KYI MU KHYUD CES PA
BYUNG STE, DE LA SRAS

MIG MI 'DZUM LA SOGS PA STONG DANG, RGYAL PHRAN BRGYAD KHRI BZHI
STONG MNGA' ZHING,

DE'I MDUN NA 'DON GYI GTZO BO BRAM ZE RGYA MTSO'I RDUL ZHES PA
LA SRAS RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO

SOGS BRGYAD CU DANG, SLOB MA STONG DANG BCAS PA BYUNG BA LAS,
SRAS RGYA MTSO'I

SNYING PO KHYIM LAS NGES PAR BYUNG NAS MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR
SANGS RGYAS PA'I MTSAN DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA RIN CHEN SNYING PO ZHES BYA BAR GYUR PA NA, BRAM
ZE RGYA MTSO'I RDUL

GYIS RGYAL PO RTZIBS KYI MU KHYUD SRAS STONG DANG BCAS PA LA
THABS MKHAS PAS LAN DU

MAR BSKUL NAS BYANG CHUB TU THUGS BSKYED DU BCUG PA BZHIN, DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA

RIN CHEN SNYING PO'I SPYAN SNGAR RANG RANG GI SANGS RGYAS KYI
ZHING BZUNG ZHING BYANG CHUB CHEN

POR SEMS BSKYED PA LAS, BRAM ZE'I SRAS BRGYAD CU DANG, SLOB MA
STONG

SOGS RIM PA BZHIN RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RNAM PAR GZIGS DANG,
GTZUG TOR

CAN SOGS SU LUNG BSTAN, BRAM ZE CHEN PO RGYA MTSO'I RDUL NYID
DANG, RIG BYED SLOB PA

@069 STONG DANG BCAS PA BDAG CAG GI STON PA SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO
SOGS BSKAL PA BZANG PO'I

SANGS RGYAS STONG RTZA LNGAR LUNG BSTAN, RGYAL PO RTZIBS KYI MU
KHYUD 'JIG RTEN GYI

KHAMS BDE BA CAN DU SANGS RGYAS TSE DPAG MED DANG, SRAS THU BO
MIG MI 'DZUM

NI SPYAN RAS GZIGS TE SANGS RGYAS 'OD ZER KUN 'PHAGS DPAL
BRTZEGS KYI RGYAL PO

ZHES PA DANG, SRAS GNYIS PA GZHON NU MU KHYUD NI MTHU CHEN THOB
STE RAB TU BRTAN

PA YON TAN NOR BU BRTZEGS PA'I RGYAL PO ZHES PA DANG, SRAS GSUM
PA DBANG PO'I

TSOGS NI RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS TE, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KUN
TU GZIGS

SU 'TSANG RGYA BA SOGS RGYAL BU STONG DU TSANG BAR LUNG BSTAN
PA'I TSUL RGYAS PAR GSUNGS

SHING, MDO SDE GZHAN LAS BSHAD TSUL CUNG MI 'DRA TZAM BYUNG RUNG
DON GCIG PA

YIN LA, DE'I TSE RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS THUGS BSKYED
PA DANG ZHING BZUNG

BA'I TSUL NI, MDO DE NYID LAS, DE NAS BRAM ZE RGYA MTSO'I RDUL
GYIS SNGA MA RNAMS

BZHIN DU RGYAL BU GSUM PA DBANG PO'I TSOGS ZHES BYA BA LA SMRAS
PA DANG, DES THAL MO

SBYAR NAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RIN PO CHE'I SNYING PO LA 'DI SKAD
CES GSOL TO, ,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS BDAG GIS BCOM LDAN 'DAS DGE SLONG GI DGE 'DUN
DANG BCAS PA LA

YO BYAD THAMS CAD KYIS BSNYEN BKUR BGYIS PA GANG LAGS PA DANG,
BDAG GIS

LUS DANG NGAG DANG YID KYIS LEGS PAR SPYAD PA GANG LAGS PA DANG,
RJES SU YI

RANG BA 'DI DANG LDAN PA'I BSOD NAMS KYI PHUNG PO GANG LAGS PA
DE DAG THAMS CAD BLA NA

MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU BNGO'O,
,SANGS RGYAS KYI

ZHING NYON MONGS PA CAN DU NI BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS
PA'I BYANG CHUB MNGON PAR

RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA BA LA MI BGYI ZHING SHIN TU MYUR BAR THOB
PAR YANG MI BGYI LAGS SO,,

@070 JI SRID DU BDAG BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
BYANG CHUB MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR

'TSANG MI RGYA BA DE SRID DU BYANG CHUB KYI SPYAD PA SPYOD CING,
PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN

GYI KHAMS MTHA' YAS MU MED PA GZHAN DANG GZHAN DAG GI SANGS
RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS

RNAMS MTHONG BAR GYUR CIG ,BDAG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYAD PA
SPYOD PA NA,

GANG DAG BDAG GIS DANG POR BYANG CHUB YANG DAG PAR 'DZIN DU
STZAL BA DANG, BDAG

GIS GANG DAG DER DANG POR BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED DE,
BYANG CHUB KYI

SEMS LA RAB TU BKOD PA DANG, GANG DAG BDAG GIS PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA RNAMS

YANG DAG PAR 'DZIN DU STZAL ZHING BTZUD DE, RAB TU BKOD PA'I
SANGS RGYAS BCOM

LDAN 'DAS GANG DAG BDAG GIS BYANG CHUB YANG DAG PAR 'DZIN DU
STZAL BA DE DAG SANGS

RGYAS KYI ZHING GANG GA'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED KYI RDUL PHRA
RAB KYI RDUL SNYED KYI SANGS RGYAS KYI

ZHING DAG NA CHOS STON PAR MDZAD PA RNAMS KYANG BDAG GI LHA'I
MIG GIS MTHONG BAR GYUR

CIG ,BDAG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYAD PA SPYOD PA NA, DE LTAR
SANGS RGYAS

KYI MDZAD PA BGYI CING JI SRID DU BDAG GIS SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING
DU SEMS CAN GANG DAG

SKYE BAR 'GYUR BA DE DAG 'DI LTA STE, DPER BGYI NA, TSANGS RIS
KYI LHA RNAMS LTA

BUR 'GYUR BA DE BZHIN DU BDAG GIS SEMS CAN RNAMS KYI BSAM PA
YONGS SU SBYANG BAR

BGYI ZHING BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYAD PA SPYOD PAR BGYI'O, ,CI
NAS STONG GSUM GYI

STONG CHEN PO'I GANG G'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED DAG SANGS RGYAS
KYI ZHING GCIG TU 'GYUR BA DE

LTAR SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING GI YON TAN BKOD PA YONGS SU SBYANG
BAR BGYI STE, SANGS

RGYAS KYI ZHING DE'I RVA BA DAG KYANG SRID PA'I RTZE MO'I MTHAR
THUG CING RIN PO CHE DU MAS KUN

NAS GNAS PA DANG, RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS DAG GIS SPRAS PAR GYUR
CIG ,SANGS

@071 RGYAS KYI ZHING DE'I SA GZHI THAMS CAD NI BEEd'URYA 'BA'
ZHIG LAS BGYIS PAR GYUR CING,

RDUL DANG GOR MA DANG GSEG MA MA MCHIS SHING, SA GZHI RNYOG PA
DANG 'DRES

PA MA MCHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DE NA BUD MED NI MING DU GDAGS PA YANG
MA MCHIS

PAR GYUR CIG ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD NI RDZAS TE SKYE BAR GYUR CIG
,DE

NA SEMS CAN RNAMS ZAS KHAM GYIS 'TSAL BA MA MCHIS PAR GYUR CIG
,DE NA

SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DGA' BA'I ZAS DANG CHOS KYI ZAS DANG LDAN PAR
GYUR CIG ,

SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DE NA NYAN THOS DANG RANG SANGS RGYAS
RNAMS NI GDAGS SU YANG MA MCHIS

PAR GYUR CIG ,SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DE NA THA BA DANG, DRI MA
DANG, ZHE

SDANG DANG, 'CHAB PA DANG BRAL ZHING TSANGS PAR SPYOD PA YONGS
SU DAG PA LA GNAS

PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' 'BA' ZHIG GIS YONGS SU GANG BAR GYUR
CIG ,DE NA BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA' THAMS CAD KYANG SKRA BREGS SHING CHOS GOS NGUR
SMRIG 'TSAL BA SHA STAG

'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG ,SKYES MA THAG TU 'OD CHEN PO DANG LDAN PAR
GYUR CIG ,DE

DAG GI SUG PAR RIN PO CHE'I LHUNG BZED RO BRO BA SNA TSOGS KYIS
YONGS SU GTAMS PA

DAG 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG ,BYUNG MA THAG TU 'DI SNYAM DU GANG BDAG
CAG ZAS

KHAM GYIS ZA BA NI BDAG CAG GI CHA MA YIN GYI, GANG BDAG CAG
'JIG RTEN GYI

KHAMS GZHAN DAG TU DONG LA, SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS BZHUGS TE
'TSO

ZHING BZHES PA DAG LA ZHAL ZAS 'DI DBUL BAR BYA'O, ,SANGS RGYAS
KYI NYAN THOS

RNAMS DANG, SKYE BO SDUG BSNGAL BA RNAMS LA YANG BYIN PAR BYA'O,
,YI

DVAGS KYI GNAS RNAMS SU YANG SONG LA BKRES PA DANG SKOM PAS LUS
RAB TU 'BAR

BA'I SEMS CAN RNAMS LA YANG ZAS 'DI BYIN PAR BYA'O SNYAM PA'I
DRAN PA THOB PAR GYUR

@072 CIG ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE DAG GIS DE
LTAR SEMS

BSKYED MA THAG TU BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA'I SPYOD PA DANG LDAN
PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN KYANG THOB

PAR GYUR CIG ,ZHES SOGS NAS, BDAG GI BYANG CHUB KYI SHING NI RIN

PO CHE SNA BDUN RNAM PAR BKRA BAR SNANG ZHES BYA BAR 'GYUR ZHING
SBOMS SU NI GLING BZHI PA

KHRI MCHIS PAR GYUR LA, KHO RA KHOR YUG GI KHYON NI STONG GSUM
PA BCU MCHIS

PAR GYUR CIG ,BYANG CHUB KYI SHING DE'I DRI DANG, 'OD KYIS SANGS
RGYAS KYI

ZHING MTHA' DAG KHYAB PAR GYUR CIG ,DE'I DRUNG DU RIN PO CHE SNA
TSOGS KYIS SPRAS

PA'I RDO RJE'I GDAN RAB TU ZHI BA BZOD PA'I YE SHES SHIN TU
'GYED PA'I DRIL YANG DAG

PAR GZHOL BA ZHES BGYI BA GLING BZHI PA LNGA'I KHYON TZAM MCHIS
LA, 'PHANG DU NI

DPAG TSAD BRGYAD STONG BZHI BRGYA MCHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,BYANG CHUB
KYI SHING DE'I DRUNG DU

RDO RJE'I GDAN LA BDAG SKYIL MO KRUNG BCAS TE MCHIS NAS, YUD
TZAM DE NYID LA

BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB MNGON PAR
RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA BAR

GYUR CIG ,YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I BAR DU SKYIL MO KRUNG
DE MI 'JIG MI

'GROL BAR 'GYUR ZHING BYANG CHUB KYI SHING DE'I DRUNG NAS MI
LDANG BAR GYUR CIG ,BDAG

BYANG CHUB KYI SHING DRUNG DU GNAS SHING RDO RJE'I GDAN LA MCHIS
BZHIN DU SANGS RGYAS DANG

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPRUL PA DAG SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING BGRANG
BA LAS 'DAS PA GZHAN DAG

TU 'GYED PAR GYUR CIG ,SANGS RGYAS RE RES KYANG SNGA DRO GCIG LA
SEMS CAN RNAMS

LA CHOS STON CING, DE NYID KYI SNGA DRO LA YANG SEMS CAN BGRANG
BA LAS 'DAS PA SNYED

DAG BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB YANG DAG
PAR 'DZIN DU STZOL BA

DANG, RAB TU 'GOD PA DANG, PHYIR MI SDOG PA LA 'GOD PAR GYUR CIG
,DE BZHIN

@073 DU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPRUL PA DAG KYANG BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA'I BYA BA BGYID PAR GYUR

CIG ,BDAG GIS BYANG CHUB THOB PA NA PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN GYI
KHAMS BGRANG BA LAS

YANG DAG PAR 'DAS PA GZHAN DAG TU YANG BDAG GI LUS GDA' BAR GYUR
CIG ,CES

SOGS ZAB PA DANG RGYA CHE BA'I SMON LAM CHEN PO DE DAG BTAB PA
NA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS

KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SKYES BU DAM PA LEGS SO LEGS SO, ,KHYOD
KYANG MKHAS

SHING GSAL LA YID GZHUNGS PA YIN TE, KHYOD KYIS NI SMON LAM SHIN
TU BZANG POR

BTAB PO, ,RIGS KYI BU KHYOD NI SHIN TU YON TAN DANG LDAN ZHING
SHIN TU YE SHES

DANG LDAN PAS NA, GANG GI PHYIR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DON GYI
PHYIR DE LTAR RAB

DANG MCHOG BLO GROS BKRA SHIS PA BYAS SHING, SANGS RGYAS KYI
ZHING GI YON TAN

BKOD PA RAB MCHOG BZUNG BAS DE'I PHYIR, RIGS KYI BU KHYOD 'JAM
DPAL ZHES

BYA BAR GYUR CIG 'JAM DPAL KHYOD NI MA 'ONGS PA'I DUS NA BSKAL
PA GRANGS MED

PA GNGGA'I KLUNG GNYIS KYI BYE MA SNYED 'DAS NAS, GRANGS MED PA
GSUM PA LA BAB

PA NA, LHO PHYOGS LOGS SU 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DAG PA RDUL BRAL
YANG DAG BSAGS

ZHES BYA BA ZHIG 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR TE, DER 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS MI
'JED KYANG

'DUS SHING KHONGS SU CHUD PAR 'GYUR LA, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING
DER DE LTA BU'I

YON TAN BKOD PA 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR TE, 'JAM DPAL KHYOD NI ZHING
DER BLA NA MED

PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR
'TSANG RGYA BAR 'GYUR TE,

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS
RGYAS KUN TU

GZIGS ZHES BYA BAR 'GYUR RO, ,KHYOD KYI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I
'KHOR KYANG DE LTA BUR

YONGS SU DAG PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES LUNG BSTAN PAR GSUNG LA, MDO
SDE DKON MCHOG

@074 BRTZEGS PA LAS KYANG DE DANG PHAL CHER MTHUN PAR BYUNG NGO,
,DE LTAR RJE BTZUN 'JAM

DPAL DBYANGS BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS
PAS SANGS PAS LUNG JI SKAD

BSTAN PA BZHIN DU RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS KYANG 'TSANG RGYA BA'I
MDZAD PA STON PAR NGES PA NI,

NGES DON DU RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DANG THUGS RGYUD GCIG
LAS GNYIS SU MA

MCHIS PA NYID KYIS 'GRUB PAR NUS PAS LUNG BSTAN SOGS KYIS SGRUB
PA LA LTOS MI DGOS

MOD, 'ON KYANG BLO CHUNG LA LA DAG YID CHES PA'I SLAD DU GSAL
BAR LUNG GIS BSTAN

TSUL KYANG 'GOD NA, GSANG SNGAGS SNGA 'GYUR DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS
PA'I RGYUD MNGON

BRJOD BLA MA LAS, MA 'ONGS BYANG GI PHYOGS SU 'BYUNG, ,MING GI
THOG MA BLO ZHES BYA,,

BZANG O? PO'I SPYOD PAS BSTAN PA SKYONGS, ,GRAGS? PA KUN KHYAB
SKYE BA NI, ,'JAM

DPAL ZHING GI BKOD PAR 'GRO ,ZHES GSUNGS TE, RGYUD 'DI'I RGYA
DPE SLOB DPON PADMAS

NUB PHYOGS AYON YUL NAS RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS BLANGS TE, DA LTA YANG
BSAM YAS NA

BZHUGS ZHES 'JAM DBYANGS NYI MA BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR

SKAL LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG LAS BYUNG NGO, ,DE LA
SOGS PA'I SGRUB BYED

MANG YANG MTHA' DAG 'GOD MA DGOS TE SNGAR SMOS PA RNAMS KYIS
SHES PAR NUS PA'I

PHYIR RO, ,DE DAG NI SKU 'PHRENG PHYI MA'I 'BYUNG TSUL ZUR TZAM
SMOS PA'O, ,'DIR

SMRAS PA, KUN KHYAB LHA YI RDZING RING NAM MKHA'I MTHA', ,KUN
GYIS BSKAL PAR

BSAM KYANG RTOGS BYAS DBEN, ,DEO? BZHIN SEMS CAN KHAMS DANG
GRANGS KYI TSAD, ,

DEO? YANG GZHAL BAR BYA BA'I YUL LAS 'DAS, ,GDUL BYA'I KHAMS KYI
RANG TSUL

JI LTA BAR, ,BDAG NYID CHE 'DI'I SKU DANG ZHING KHAMS DANG,
,MDZAD PA'I

'PHRIN LAS LA SOGS YON TAN GYI, ,TSUL YANG GCIG NAS GNYIS SOGS
SU YIS

@075 BGRANG, ,MA LUS LTA CI BYIS PA'I SNANG NGOR YANG, ,MI PHAM
MGON DRUNG

'JAM DPAL SNYING PO DANG, ,'DZAM GLING 'DIR YANG CHOS RGYAL PAn
GRUB SOGS, ,

MA 'ONGS SPRUL PA' RNAM ROL RGYUN CHAD MED, ,BSKAL BZANG RNAM
'DREN NYI MA STONG

GI NANG, ,GZUGS DANG ZLA BA'I GRANGS GYUR DE BZHIN GSHEGS,
,SPYAN LEGS ZHES

BYA'I 'DREN PA BLA MED DU, ,MNGON PAR RDZOGS SANGS RGYA BA'I
MDZAD PA STON, ,NGO

MTSAR RMAD BYUNG BKOD PA'I 'JIG RTEN DU, ,BDE GSHEGS SENG GE'I
NGA ROR SANGS

RGYAS TE, ,ZAB MO'I LTA DANG RDO RJE THEG PA YIS, ,'GRO MANG
PHYIR MI LDOG


PA'I SA LA BKOD, ,'JAM DPAL NYID KYIS BDAG GIR MDZAD PA'I ZHING,
,RDUL

BO RU, ,MNGON SANGS RGYA BA'I TSUL YANG STON PAR 'GYUR, ,BSKAL
MANG

SNGON NAS MNGON PAR BYANG CHUB KYANG, ,DA DUNG YANG YANG 'TSANG
RGYA'I TSUL STON PA, ,

GDUL BYA 'DUL BA'I RMAD BYUNG THABS MKHAS LA, ,SKYAR DANG ZLOS
PA'I SKYON DU 'DZIN

NA 'KHRUL, ,TSAD DANG BSAM LAS 'DAS PA'I YON TAN GYI, ,NGO MTSAR
SNYING

NAS DRAN TE MOS GUS KYANG, ,LHAG PAR GZENGS SU BSTOD NAS GSOL
BTAB NA, ,

DE LTA'I 'BRAS BU BSKYED PAR GDON MI ZA, ,ZHES PA NI BAR SKABS
NAS DRAN TE MOS GUS KYANG, ,LHAG PAR GZENGS SU BSTOD NAS GSOL

BCAD PA'I 'PHRENG BA'O, ,ZHES KHYAB BDAG RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA
THUB DBANG RDO RJE

'CHANG DANG NGO BO DBYER MA MCHIS PA 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO
TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I

RNAM PAR THAR PA THUB BSTAN MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG NGO MTSAR NOR
BU'I 'PHRENG BA LAS,

MDO RGYUD GSUNG RAB DU MA'I LUNG KHUNGS DANG BCAS TE SPRUL GZHI
NGOS BZUNG BA DANG, THUN

MONG SNANG TSUL DU SKU 'PHRENG SNGON MA RNAMS KYI BYUNG BA DANG,
PHYI MA'I 'BYUNG TSUL MDO TZAM

@076 BRJOD PA BCAS KYI SKABS TE GNYIS PA'O,, ' ,,GSUM PA BYE
BRAG SKU TSE 'DI NYID KYI

RTOGS BRJOD RGYAS PAR 'GOD PA NI, DE YANG MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG

LAS, SOS KA CHAR SPRIN RGYAS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS CAN, ,DPYID KYI
DPAL MO ME TOG

DO SHAL DGOD, ,RMA BYA GZHON NU ROL PA'I RTZED 'JO STON, ,'DI
DAG 'JIG RTEN YA

MTSAN CI YANG BYED, ,MKHAS RNAMS YID KYI BRTAN PA NYAMS BYED PA,
,DAM PA'I

SPYOD PA RMAD BYUNG BRJOD PA'I GTAM, ,SKAL BZANG RNA BA'I BCUD
LEN BSGRAGS PAS KYANG,,

THUB RNAMS YID NI CI YANG CHAGS PAR 'GYUR, ,GZHON NU NYID DANG
NGES PAR 'BYUNG

BA'I TSUL, ,DON CHEN GNAS LA DKA' BA LHUR BLANGS PAS, ,RGYAL BA
DGYES

PA'I GO 'PHANG MCHOG BRNYES PA, ,'DI DAG NGO MTSAR GTAM GYI
GLENG GZHI YIN, ,

ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR GYI SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA NGO
MTSAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I

YON TAN GYIS YONGS SU GTAMS PA SNGON MED PA'I LEGS PAR BSHAD
PA'I GTAM GYI

DGA' STON 'GYED PA'I SA BCAD KYI 'PHRENG BA LA, SNGAR BRJOD ZIN
DANG 'OG NAS BRJOD

 GYUR GYI MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS DU MA'I LUNG BSTAN DANG 'BREL BAR
YUL DUS YAB YUM

RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I BRGYUD DU SKYE BA BZHES SHING GZHON
NU NYID NAS DAM PA'I

YON TAN RMAD DU BYUNG BA BDAG GIR BZHES TSUL, KHYIM NAS KHYIM
MED PAR

MNGON PAR BYUNG STE BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I SGOR ZHUGS NAS RIM
GYIS DBUS GTZANG DU BYON

TE MDO PHYOGS KYI THOS BSAM RGYA CHER MDZAD TSUL, BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS PA DGE

SLONG GI DNGOS PO BZHES SHING RDO RJE THEG PA'I TSUL SOGS LA
SLOB PA DANG DAM PA RNAMS

LAS ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BDUD RTZE NOD DE THOS PA'I DON RNAMS RANG
GIS RTZE GCIG NYAMS SU

BZHES SHING GDUL BYA GZHAN LA YANG 'DOMS PAR MDZAD TSUL, DE LTAR
MDZAD PA'I LAG

@077 RJES LAS LUNG DANG MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I YON TAN MTHA' DAG
LA MNGA' BSGYUR PA'I

MKHAS GRUB 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I GO 'PHANG MTHON POR GSHEGS NAS
BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA

MA RTOGS LOG RTOG GI DRI MA BSAL TE BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO BSHAD
SGRUB RNAM PAR DAG PA'I

RING LUGS KYI SROL BSTOD PA'I SGO NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON RLABS
CHEN MDZAD TSUL,

MDZAD PA DE DAG GI NANG NAS KYANG GTZO BOR GYUR PA NI 'CHAD
RTZOD RTZOM GSUM DANG,

MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM, GRUB PA'I GO 'PHANG BRNYES PA DANG BCAS
PA'I SGO NAS

BSTAN 'GRO'I DON MDZAD TSUL NYID YIN PAS DE DAG SLAR YANG SDOM
BSHAD KYI TSUL DU RTZAL

DU BTON NAS GO BDER BRJOD PAS MCHOG DMAN KUN LA NGES PA BSKYED
PA, ZHING 'DIR

RE ZHIG SKU TSE 'DI'I GDUL BYA RDZOGS NAS RTAG 'DZIN CAN RNAMS
CHOS LA BSKUL PHYIR MYA

NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I MDZAD PA STON TSUL, GSUNG SKYES SLOB MA'I
TSOGS JI LTAR

BYON TSUL DANG BCAS RNAM PA BDUN GYI SGO NAS 'CHAD PA LA ZHUGS
SO, ,DANG PO NI,

RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'DI'I LUNG BSTAN SKU 'PHRENG SNGA PHYI
DANG 'BREL BA PHAL MO CHE NI GONG DU

BKOD ZIN KYANG, DA DUNG DE DAG TU MA GSAL BA SKU TSE 'DI NYID
KHO NA'I DBANG

DU BYAS PA'I LUNG BSTAN MANG DU MCHIS PA RNAMS KYANG PHYOGS GCIG
TU 'GOD NA,

'JAM DPAL RTZA RGYUD KYI NANG TSAN PHAN YON NYES DMIGS KYI NUS
PA BSTAN PA RAB 'BYAMS

SO DRUG PA LAS, YI GE BA ZHES SDOM BRTZON GRAGS, ,DE LAS GZHAN
PA DANG

YIG RA, ,DANG PO'I YI GE BA GRAGS PA, ,STON PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN
DON

YANG BYED, ,BLO LDAN DANG PO YI GE MA, ,DE BZHIN SDOM BRTZON DAD
PA 'BYUNG, ,

RNAM PA DU MAR SDOM BRTZON GSUNGS, ,DE TSE MTHA' YAS 'BYUNG BAR
'GYUR, ,

SDOM BRTZON THAMS CAD BSGRAGS PA YANG, ,STON PA'I BSTAN PA GSAL
BAR BYED, ,

@078 BSTAN PA DE TSES STENG DU, ,RNAM PAR NYAMS SHING SNANG MED
LA, ,STON PA'I

GZUGS BRNYAN YID DU 'ONG, ,BYED PAR 'GYUR BA THE TSOM MED,
,THAMS CAD

BYANG CHUB LUNG BSTAN TE, ,NGA YI BYANG CHUB MCHOG THOB 'GYUR,
,DE BZHIN 'JIG

RTEN SBYIN GNAS 'GYUR, ,SRID PA GSUM GYI MTHAR YANG BYED,
,SNGAGS DANG

RGYUD LA MNGON BRTZON PA'I, ,GRAGS PA 'DZIN PAR SHES PAR BYA,
,ZHES GSUNGS

PA 'DI SNGA RABS PA 'GA' ZHIG SLOS DPON DBYIG GNYEN GYI LUNG
BSTAN DU 'DOD PA NI MI

'THAD PAR GSUNGS TE, DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG LAS, SNGA RABS PA
RNAMS

'DI NYID YI GI BA DANG MA 'GYUR GYI KHYAD SOGS NAS DBYIG GNYEN
LA NGOS BZUNG YANG

DBYIG GNYEN GYI DUS BSTAN PA MA NYAMS PA DANG, PHYIS GLANG DAR
SOGS KYIS BSTAN

PA BSNUBS SHING 'DUL BSTAN NYAG PHRA BA RJE 'DIS GSAL BAR MDZAD
PA DANG, STON

PA DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I SKU TSAD JO BO RIN PO CHE LA LONGS
SPYOD RDZOGS PA'I SKU RGYAN

YID DU 'ONG BA PHUL BA SOGS KYIS RJE 'DIR 'KHRUL PA MED PA GSAL
BAR BSTAN,

ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, RNAM THAR SKAL LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD
STONG LAS

KYANG, KHA CIG 'DI MKHAS MCHOG DBYIG GNYEN LUNG BSTAN PA'I TSIG
YIN GSUNGS

KYANG, YI GE DANG PO BAR GRAGS PA MTSUNGS KYANG, GRAGS PA 'DZIN
PA SHES

PAR BYA, ,ZHES 'BYUNG BAS DBYIG GNYEN GYI MTSAN LA GRAGS PA ZHES
MI 'BYUNG BAS

RJE NYID KYI LUNG BSTAN DU 'KHRUL PA MED DO, ,ZHES GSUNGS SHING,
,DE YANG

YI GE BA ZHES SDOM BCON GRAGS, ,ZHES PA DANG, DANG PO'I YI GE BA

GRAGS PA, ,ZHES PA GNYIS NE RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MTSAN BLO
BZANG GRAGS PA

ZHES PA'I MTSAN GYI THOG MA LA BLO ZHES PA'I MING GZHI'I MI GE
LA BA 'BYUNG BA DANG,

@079 GRAGS PA ZHES PAS MTSAN GYI MTHA' MA GSAL BAR BSTAN PA YIN
LA, DE LAS GZHAN

PA DANG YIG RA, ,ZHES DANG, BLO LDAN DANG PO YI GE MA, ,ZHES PA
GNYIS NI RGYAL

TSAB DAR MA RIN CHEN LUNG BSTAN PA STE, YI GE GONG 'OG GAB
DKRUGS KYI TSUL DU BYUNG

PA YIN CING GAB TSUL JI LTAR ZHE NA, TSIG PHYI MA, BLO LDAN DANG
PO YI GE MA,,

ZHES PAS MTSAN GYI PHYED DANG PO LA DAR MA ZHES 'BYUNG BA DANG,
DE LAS GZHAN

PA DANG YIG RA, ZHES PAS, PHYED GNYIS PA'I DANG PO RIN CHEN ZHES
PA'I RA

YIG BSTAN PA'I PHYIR, ,DE YANG YIN TE, TSIG RKANG DE GNYIS KYI
PHYI MA, DE BZHIN

SDOM BRTZON DAD PA 'BYUNG, ,ZHES PA NAS, STON PA'I BSTAN PA GSAL
BAR BYED, ,

CES PA'I BAR GYI RKANG PA LNGAS SRAS KYI THU BO GZHAN YANG LUNG
BSTAN PA STE, DE BZHIN SDOM

BRTZON DAD PA 'BYUNG, ,ZHES PA'I DAD PA NI GRANGS GSUM GYI MING
GI RNAM GRANGS YIN

PAS, RGYAL TSAB RIN PO CHES MTSON TE, MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE
DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN RIN

PO CHE STE SRAS KYI GTZO BO RIN CHEN RNAM PA GSUM DANG, RNAM PA
DU MAR SDOM BRTZON

GSUNGS, ,ZHES PAS, LUNG BSTAN RNAM DAG YOD PA'I THUGS SRAS BDUN

SOGS DANG, DE TSE MTHA' YAS 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES SOGS TSIG

RKANG GSUM GYIS, GZHAN YANG DE 'DRA BA'I MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN
MTHA' YAS PA

'BYUNG BA DANG, ,DE THAMS CAD KYIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO
RNAM PAR DAG PA CHES

CHER GSAL BAR MDZAD PA BSTAN PA STE TSIG DON 'DI RNAMS RNAM
DPYOD CAN RNAMS KYIS

RTOGS SLA BA'I DBANG DU MDZAD NAS SNGON CHAD KHA GSAL BAR 'KHOD
PA ZHIG MI 'DUG KYANG,

DUS PHYIS BLO GROS CAN NYUNG BAR SNANG BAS GSAL TZAM BKOD PA YIN
LA, SLOB MA'I

BYUNG TSUL ZHIB PA NI MJUG TU 'CHAD PAR 'GYUR ZHING, BSTAN PA DE
TSE SA STENG DU, ,

@080 ZHES PA MAN CHAD NI GONG GI DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG GI LUNG
SOGS KYIS SHES PAR NUS

SO; ;LUNG BSTAN GZHAN YANG, LHA MO DRI MA MED PAS ZHUS PA'I MDO
LAS,

BYANG PHYOGS GANGS RI'I RGYUD KYI SAR, ,DGE BA LDAN PA'I SA
PHYOGS SU, ,DAM

PA'I CHOS NI RGYAS PAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES DANG, MDO SDE RGYAN LAS, DE

LTAR BLO BZANG SKYO BA MED LDAN BRTZE BA CAN, ,SNYAN PAR RAB
GRAGS CHOG BZANG

SHES LDAN PA YI, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' LEGS PAR SMRA BA YIN PA
STE, ,

BSHAD PAS SKYE BO'I NANG NA NYI MA BZHIN DU LHAM, ,ZHES MTSAN
SGRA DANG BCAS GSAL

BAR BSTAN, RGYAL PO BKA' 'BUM GYI DUS KYI MTHA' MA JI LTAR
'BYUNG LUNG BSTAN

PA LAS, DE NAS BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO SGRUB PA PO, ,BYANG CHUB
SEMS DANG LDAN

PA'I DGE SLONG NI, ,YON TAN DPAG TU MED PA'I DAM PA 'BYUNG,
,GSANG

SNGAGS MNGON PAR GRUB PA'I DGE SLONG NI, ,DAM PA MANG POS BSNYEN
BKUR BYED

PAR 'GYUR, ,DE NAS KHYAD PAR BSNYEN BKUR CHER MDZAD PA, ,DGE
SLONG

BYANG SEMS SHAR PHYOGS SKU 'KHRUNGS PA, ,GSANG SNGAGS 'CHANG
ZHING SKYES CHEN DAM

PA NI, ,SNYING PO'I MTHA' BRTEN RNAL 'BYOR CHEN PO DES, ,ZHAL
YANG BSGYUR

ZHING BSNYED BKUR CHEN PO MDZAD, ,DE LA BSNYEN BKUR CHER BYED DE
DAG NI, ,

'PHAGS BA'I GANG ZAG DGE SBYONG SHA STAG GO ,DE PHYIR DE DAG KUN
LA GUS PA BSKYED,,

DE DAG CI PHYIR 'PHAGS PA YIN ZHE NA, ,SANGS RGYAS RNAMS LA
MDZAD PA CHEN PO

MDZAD, ,DE PHYIR DE DAG 'PHAGS PA'I GANG ZAG GO ,DE LTAR 'PHAGS
PA'I

GANG ZAG RNAMS 'BYUNG ZHING, ,'KHOR NI LEGS GNAS STON PA'I GSUNG
RAB DANG,,

STON PA'I SKU GZUGS DNGOS SU BZHUGS PA DANG, ,RI BO YON TAN CAN
YANG DE NA

@081 YOD, ,CES PA'I LUNG BSTAN 'DI SNGON RABS PA RNAMS KYIS SGOM
PA TSUL KHRIMS

SNYING PO'I LUNG BSTAN DU BZHED PA SOGS SNA TSOGS BYUNG RUNG,
DON DU RJE BDAG

NYID CHEN PO 'DI NYID THUB BSTAN LNGA BRGYA PHRAG BCU'I SGRUB
PA'I LE'U'I DUS SU BYON PA DANG,

SHAR PHYOGS ZHES PAS 'KHRUNGS YUL SHAR PHYOGS TZONG KHA'I YUL
DANG, SNYING PO'I

MTHA' RTEN ZHES PAS YONGS RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN BZHES PA'I MTSAN KUN
DGA' SNYING PO DANG,

ZHAL BSGYUR ZHES PA DANG, STON PA'I SKU GZUGS DNGOS SU ZHES PAS
JO BO SH'AKYA

MU NI LONGS SKU'I CHA BYAD CAN DU BSGYUR BAR MDZAD PA DANG,
BSNYEN BKUR CHEN PO

MDZAD CES PAS MNYAN YOD CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA
CHEN PO 'DZUGS PAR

MDZAD PA SOGS DANG, RI BO YON TAN CAN ZHES PAS GDAN SA DGA' LDAN
RNAM PAR

RGYAL BA'I GLING BTAB PA'I GNAS 'BROG RI CHEN PO GSAL BAR BSTAN
PA BCAS TSIG DON

SNGA PHYI THAMS CAD NAS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LUNG BSTAN
NYID DU 'KHRUL PA MED LA,

YANG, RJE'I RNAM THAR 'GA' ZHIG NAS LUNG BSTAN 'DI DANG, SNYING
RJE PAD

DKAR LAS, DES NGA'I SKU GSUNG GI RTEN ZHIG CING RAL BA RNAMS
MTHONG NAS GSER

GYIS BRGYAN PAR BYED, GDUGS DANG RGYAL MTSAN DANG BA DAN DANG
DRIL BU G-YER KHA'I

DRA BAS G-YOGS PAR BYED, CES SOGS KYI LUNG 'DI GNYIS KYIS SGOM
PA TSUL

SNYING DANG, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO GNYIS KA LUNG BSTAN TSUL
DANG, SGOM

TSUL DANG RJE TZONG KHA PA THUGS RGYUD GCIG PAR GSUNGS PA YANG
SNANG STE 'GAL BA YOD

PAR NI MA MNGON NO, ,RGYAL BO BKA' THANG LAS, DE PHYIS 'DUS PA
NYI

SHU RTZA LNGA LA, ,SH'AKYA'I ZHING KHAMS 'PHRUL SNANG GTZUG LAG
KHANG, ,SMON

LAM DAG PAS BYANG SEMS GZHAN DON MDZAD, ,'DUS PA'I MCHOG GYUR
'PHAGS

@082 PA 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES 'PHRUL SNANG DU SMON LAM CHEN MO
SOGS GZHAN DON RGYA

CHER MDZAD PAR LUNG BSTAN, YANG PADMA THANG YIG LUGS GCIG LAS,
DGA'

LDAN ZHES BYA'I DGON GNAS DAM PA RU, ,MKHAS PA'I MCHOG GYUR MDO
RGYUD DON

LA MKHAS, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG SPRUL GSANG SNGAGS BKA' SGO 'BYED,
,'GRO BA'I

DED DPON LAM STON SA MKHAN NI, ,BLO DANG BZANG GI MTSAN CAN
SKYES BU 'BYUNG, ,

GSANG MTSAN LAS RAB RDO RJE BDE BA RTZAL, ,ZHES DANG, YANG LUNG
BSTAN

GZHAN ZHIG LAS, AYON NGA YI THUGS SPRUL SNYING RJE CAN, ,BEE RO
KHYOD KYI 'OD

ZER CHA GCIG LA, ,SKU LUS GCIG LA BKOD PA MI 'DRAS BRGYAN, ,BEE
RO

TZA NA'I SKYE BA GCIG ,DBUS PHYOGS DGE LDAN ZHES BYAR 'BYUNG,
,BYANG

SEMS BLO BZANG ZHES GRAGS PA, ,SANGS RGYAS YE SHES SKYE BA GCIG
,BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA'I 'KHOR DU SKYE, ,'KHOR BLON PHYAG RDOR ZHES PAR
GRAGS, ,

ZHES GSUNGS, GZHAN YANG GTER LUNG GI RIGS MANG DU SNANG ZHING,
BKA'

GDAMS GLEGS BAM PHA CHOS LE'U NYER DRUG PA LAS, THA MAR BSTAN
PA'I ME RO

DAG ,GRAGS PA'I MTSAN GYIS GSO BAR BYED, ,DU MA'I PHAN BDE SGRUB
BYED PA'I,,

DE YANG GNAS MCHOG DAM PA YIN, ,ZHES DANG, YANG, GRAGS

DANG YANG GRAGS RIN CHEN GYI, ,GRAGS PA'I MTHA' BZUNG DPAL DU
GRAGS, ,

BLO GROS SHES RAB GZHAN DU GSAL, ,GZHAN YANG GRAGS PA'I MTSAN
RAB CAN, ,

MANG POS 'GRO BA'I BDE SKYID BSKRUN, ,ZHES RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PA
CHEN PO'I MTSAN

YONGS RDZOGS DANG, GZHAN YANG ZHES 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN SOGS

RJES 'JUG GRAGS PA'I MTSAN CAN MANG POS 'GRO BA'I BDE SKYID
BSKRUN PAR BSTAN,

@083 YANG, PHA CHOS THOR BU'I TSOMS SU, SHAR NAS ZLA BA'I DKYIL
'KHOR

MDZES, ,ZHES PA YANG RJE 'DI NYID YIN PAR GSUNGS, LHO BRAG MKHAR
CHU'I

GNAS BSHAD LAS, TZONG KHA'I YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, ,'GRO DON
DBUS

SU SKYONG BAR BYED, ,MDO SNGAGS BSTAN KHRIMS SROL YANG 'BYUNG,
,ZHES DANG,

YANG, MA GCIG GI GCOD GYI RNAM BSHAD CHEN MO'I LUNG BSTAN DU,
DUS

DE DANG MTSUNGS PA'I DUS NA SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA'I 'DUL
KHRIMS LA DA LTA BAS CUNG

GSAL BAR BYED PA ZHIG SMAG RUM DU GLOG 'KHYUG PA TZAM ZHIG 'ONGS
TE GSUNGS,

DE LA BSOD NAMS RGYAN GYIS ZHUS PA, MA GCIG LAGS, DE 'BYUNG BA
LA DA

LTA 'DI NAS LO JI TZAM YOD, SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RGYAL KHRIMS DANG
CHOS KHRIMS

NYAMS PA LA, SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA GLOG TZAM GSAL BA DE MA
GCIG RANG GI

THUGS RJE YIN NAM CI 'DRA YIN, RGYU CI LAS BYUNG BA YIN, DE'I
DUS KYI SNYIGS

MA LNGA 'BYUNG BA LA RTAGS CI 'DRA YOD LAGS ZHES ZHUS PAS, MA
GCIG GI ZHAL

NAS; BU MO LEGS PAR NYON LA YID LA BZUNG DANG, NGAS BSHAD DO,

SNYIGS MA DE NAS BZUNG STE LO BRGYA PHRAG LNGA 'DAS PA NA DKYIL
DU PHYIN TO, ,SNYIGS

MA DE'I DUS SU BSTAN PA GSAL BAR BYED PA NI NGA MA YIN NO, ,DE
GSAL BAR BYED

PA'I SKYES BU DE NI DA LTA RGYA GAR GYI PO TA RI'I SHAR LHO
MTSAMS SU BZHUGS SHING, SEMS

CAN GYI DON LA DKA' BA MDZAD PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DE NI
KHYAD PAR DRAN PA DANG LDAN

PA; KHYAD PAR SHES PA DANG LDAD PA, KHYAD PAR SNYING STOBS DANG
SDAN PA ZHIG

YIN TE, RES SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG PO LA CHOS ZHU BA, RES MGON PO

BYAMS PA LA CHOS ZHU BA, RES MGON PO TSE DPAG MED LA CHOS ZHU
BA, RES MGON

@084 PO 'JAM DPAL DANG, KU KU RI PA LA CHOS ZHU NUS PA, SEMS CAN
GYI DON BYED PA LA

THUGS BSKYED SHIN TU CHE BA, SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG PHYUG SHIN TU
KHROS PA NAG PO PHYAG

DRUG PA'I MGON CHEN DE BRAN BZHIN DU NYAN NAS BSTAN PA SRUNG BAR
BYED PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' DE, SNYIGS MA DE'I DUS SU 'DIR BYON NAS DGE SLONG GI CHAS
SU ZHUGS NAS

SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA GSAL BAR BYED PA YIN NO, ,ZHES DANG,
YANG, LAB SGRON

GYI LUNG BSTAN LAS, BU MO KHYOD DRI BA HA CANG YANG RIM ZHING,
KHYAD PAR YANG SNYIGS DUS

BSTAN PA LA BYA BA BYED PAR NUS PA'I DGE SLONG DE'I DRI BA LA
NAN CHER GDA' STE LEGS SO, ,

DE BAS NA BU MO KHYOD KYI DRI MA NAN CHE BA DE SANGS RGYAS KYI
BSTAN PA LA GUS PA YIN PAS

NYON DANG, RGYAL KHRIMS CHUG PA'I DUS SU SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN
PA GSAL BAR BYED

PA'I DGE SLONG GCIG 'BYUNG BYA BA DE, DA LTA BSHAD PA'I DGE
SLONG GRAGS PA'I MTSAN

THOGS PA 'DI YIN, DGE SLONG DES BSTAN PA 'CHOL BA MANG DU BYUNG
BA RNAMS TSAR GCOD

CING, YANG DAG PA'I DON DANG BSTAN PA RNAM DAG GI KHRIMS SROL
GTOD PA NI, 'DZAM

BU'I GLING DU THUB PAS CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA DANG, SNYIGS DUS BOD
DU DGE SLONG GRAGS

PA'I MTSAN CAN BYUNG NAS CHOS SROL GTOD PA NI MTSUNGS TE, ZHES
DANG, YANG,

KHYAD PAR BSTAN PA GSAL BYED DGE SBYONGS MCHOG ,MTHA' YAS RGYUD
SDE'I CHOS

RNAMS MNGA' BRNYES PA, ,RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I DGONGS PA'I BCUD
PHYUNG NAS, ,

DRI MED GSUNG ZER RAB TU RGYAS PA YIS, ,MTHA' YAS 'GRO BA'I
RMONGS MUN BSAL

BAR BYED, ,BSLAB GSUM SDE SNOD GSUM SOGS GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS,
,LHAG

PAR GSAL BYED DON RNAMS MNGON PHYUNG NAS, ,GDUL BYAR GYUR PA'I
SKAL LDAN TSIMS

PAR BYED, ,CES DANG, YANG MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE RIG PA'I KHU
BYUG CHE BAR

@085 SKYE BA BZHES SKABS DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PAS LUNG BSTAN
MDZAD PA GONG DU DRANGS PA'I

KHONGS NAS KYANG, MA 'ONGS SNYIGS MA'I DUS KYI MTHAR, ,MTHA'
KHOB KHA

BA'I YUL LJONGS SU, ,BLO BZANG ZHES PA'I SKYES BU YIS, ,ZLA MED
STON PA'I

BSTAN PA DANG, ,NGA YI LUGS BZANG SPEL BAR BYED, ,GDONG MAR CAN
GYI SKAL

LDAN RNAMS, ,MYUR DU SMIN CING GROL BAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES GSUNGS,

DE SOGS GZHAN YANG MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS DU MA NAS DNGOS SHUGS CI
RIGS PA'I SGO

NAS LUNG BSTAN TSUL SHIN TU MANG YANG KHA GSAL BA RAGS RIM LAS
MTHA' DAG 'GOD

PAR MA LANGS SHING, 'GA' ZHIG NI 'OG TU RNAM THAR DNGOS GZHIR
SKABS SU BABS

PA DE DANG DE DAG TU 'GOD PAR BYA'O, ,YANG, PHYOGS ZHEN GYI KUN
SLONG NGAN

PA'I GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS LHAS SBYIN GYI BRTUL
ZHUGS LHUR BLANGS TE

LUNG BSTAN 'DI DAG LA JI MI SNYAM ZHING, LAS 'BRAS LA KHYAD GSOD
KYI BSAM SBYOR

'JIGS SU RUNG BAS RANG BZO'I TSIG NGAN 'PHRENG BAR BSGRIGS NAS
LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA

YOD TSUL SOGS SGRO SKUR SNA TSOGS SMRA BA BYUNG 'DUG KYANG, DE
DAG NI RANG NYID LTOS PAR

BCAS PA TSE RABS NAS TSE RABS KYI BAR DU NGAN 'GRO MI BZAD PA'I
GNAS SU GTAN BSDOD

BYED PA'I RGYU SGRUB PA TZAM LAS, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I
GSANG GSUM MDZAD

'PHRIN DANG BCAS PA LA NYI SHAR SBAR MOS 'GEBS PA'I KLAN KA RDUL
TZAM 'JUG PA'I

SKABS MED PA'I LUNG RIG RNAM DAG GI DGAG BZHAG NI 'OG TU RIM PAR
BRJOD PA LAS

RTOGS PAR 'GYUR RO, ,DE LTA BU'I YID CHES TSAD MAR GYUR PA'I
LUNG BSTAN RTZOD

MED RNAMS KYI DON LTAR, 'GRO BA'I DON DU BSAM BZHIN SRID PA JI
LTAR BZUNG BA'I

TSUL NI, DE YANG KUN GZIGS YE SHES KYI NYI MA NGAG DBANG BLO
BZANG RGYA MTSOS

@086 MDZAD PA'I 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTOD PA DPYID KYI RGYAL MO'I
GLU DBYANGS LAS,

DAG PA'I ZHING GI BKOD PA RGYA MTSO'I RDUL, ,YE SHES RANG SNANG
LAS GRUB 'OG

MIN GYI, ,NGO MTSAR SGYU MA'I ROL RTZED THEMS SKAS LAS, ,RGYAL
SRAS DAM PA'I

RNAM PAR BDE BAR BYON, ,RNAM 'DREN KUN GYI MKHYEN PA'I PHUNG PO
GANG, ,GCIG GYUR

'JAM MGON MI YI SRID PA'I GAR, ,BSAM BZHIN RNAM PAR ROL PA'I
MDZAD PA LA, ,

BSKAL BZANG RGYAL BA STONG GIS BSGRUN DU MED, ,CES GSUNGS PA
BZHIN SANGS RGYAS BCOM

LDAN 'DAS RNAMS SPRUL BA'I MDZAD PA STON PA NA, YE SHES RANG
SNANG LAS GRUB PA'I 'OG

MIN GYI ZHING DU LONGS SPYOD RDZOGS SKU NGES PA LNGA LDAN GYI
NGO BO LAS CUNG ZAD G-YO BA MED

BZHIN DU SPRUL PA'I RNAM ROL NGO MTSAR SGYU 'PHRUL DRA BA'I BKOD
PA MTHA' KLAS PA STON PA NI

CHOS NYID YIN PA LTAR, RGYAL KUN MKHYEN PA'I PHUNG PO 'JAM MGON
MI'I SRID PAR

BSAM BZHIN DU RNAM PAR ROL PA'I TSE NA'ANG, THUGS ZAG MED CHOS
KYI DBYINGS

LAS CUNG ZAD G-YO BA MED BZHIN DU, YUL DANG, DUS DANG, YAB

YUM RIGS RUS CHO 'BRANG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA LA GZIGS PA DRI MA MED
PAS GZIGS

SHING BRTAGS PA'I SGO NAS LHUMS SU ZHUGS PAR MDZAD PA LAS GANG
DU SKYE BA BZHES PA'I

YUL GYI KHYAD PAR NI, MDO KHAMS LA STOD SMAD GNYIS LAS SMAD KYI
CHAR GTOGS

SHING DGE BCU TSANG BA'I SA'I CHA, SHAR TZONG KHA ZHES GRAGS PA
SNGAR DUS KHA BA CAN

PA RNAMS GYI RJE BO LHA BTZAN PO DAG GI MNGA' RIS KYI CHAB 'OG
TU GTOGS PA'I YUL GYI

LJONGS LA 'DI NYID YON TAN PHUL DU BYUNG BAR RGAN RABS TSAD MAR
GYUR PA DAG GI BRGYUD

PA'I NGAG LAS GLENG ZHING BSNGAGS PAR BYED PA'I YUL GRU DE LTA
BU LA MNGON PAR GZIGS

SHING, YAB NI DA RA KHA CHE KLU 'BUM DGE ZHES BYA BA MAL GYI
RIGS PHUN SUM TSOGS

@087 PA'I BRGYUD LAS BYUNG BA, DPA' ZHING SGRIMS LA BRTUL PHOD
PA, DES ZHING

'DZANGS LA GSAL ZHING YID GZHUNG PA, DKON MCHOG BLA MAR 'DZIN
PA'I MOS GUS

DANG LDAN ZHING DBUL PHONGS LA BYAMS PA, DAD PA DANG GTONG BA'I
NOR GYIS PHYUG

PA; 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA LA RGYUN
DU ZHAL

'DON MDZAD PA SOGS RNAM DKAR 'BA' ZHIG LA GCIG TU BRTZON PA YA
RAB BZANG PO'I

NGANG TSUL DANG LDAN PA DE NYID DANG, YUM NI SHING MO AA CHOS
SAM, SHING BZA'

AA CHOS SU GRAGS PA BUD MED KYI SKYON DANG BRAL BA, G-YO SGYU
CHUNG ZHING RANG BZHIN

BZANG BA, KUN LA SRONG POR SMRA BA, NYAMS THAG DANG MGON MED PA
LA LHAG

PAR BRTZE BA, RNAM KUN PHYAG DANG BSKOR BA, YIG DRUG 'DREN PA
SOGS SGO

GSUM DGE BA'I BYA BA 'BA' ZHIG GIS DUS 'DA' BA ZHIG STE, DE LTA
BU'I YAB YUM

KHYAD PAR CAN LA RNAM PAR GZIGS SO, ,YAB YUM 'DI GNYIS LA SRAS
DRUG MNGA' BA

LAS BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'DI BZHI BA YIN CING, DGA' LDAN CHOS
'BYUNG DU SRAS GSUM

GYI 'OG MAR 'KHRUNGS ZHES GSUNGS PA YANG GSUM GYI 'OG MA BZHI
PAR 'KHRUNGS PA'I DON

NYID DU SNANG NGO, ,RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG GDUNG CHOS
GCIG PA TZAM DU

GTOGS PA LA NI MI NGO STONG PHRAG LONGS PA YOD CING BDUN BRGYUD
MA CHAD PA'I GNYEN DANG

SNAG GI GNYEN MTSAMS KYANG SHIN TU RGYAS PA ZHIG STE, DE DAG LAS
SNGA PHYIR RAB TU

BYUNG BA BLANGS PA MANG PO ZHIG BYUNG BA THAMS CAD KYANG BRTUL
ZHUGS RMAD DU BYUNG ZHING,

RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I MIG CAN SHA STAG YIN PAR GRAGS SO, ,LHUMS
SU ZHUGS

PA'I TSUL NI MDZOD LAS, GCIG NI SHES BZHIN DU 'JUG GO ,GZHAN NI
GNAS

PA YANG GZHAN NI, ,'BYUNG BA'ANG GZHAN NI THAMS CAD RMONGS,
,ZHES 'KHOR

@088 LOS BSGYUR RGYAL LA SOGS PA RNAMS MNGAL DU 'JUG PA SHES LA
GNAS PA DANG 'BYUNG

BA MI SHES PA DANG, NYAN THOS DANG RANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS KYIS
'JUG PA DANG,

GNAS PA SHES LA 'BYUNG BA MI SHES PA DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYIS
'BYUNG 'JUG GNAS

GSUM THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR GSUNGS PA'I PHYI MA DANG MTHUN PAR
'KHOR BA PA RNAMS LA

RJES SU CHAGS PA'I SNYING RJE TSAD MED PAS NI NYE BAR DRANGS,
GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI

MOS PA DANG BSAM PA'I RJES SU MTHUN PA'I SKU'I BKOD PA JI LTAR
STON PA NI THUGS SU CHUD,

'BYUNG 'JUG GNAS GSUM GYI 'GRO 'ONGS MNGON SUM DU MKHYEN PA'I
DRAN PA DANG SHES

BZHIN NI YANG DAG PAR LDAN PA DANG BCAS PA'I SGO NAS LHUMS SU
ZHUGS PA LAS THA MAL PA

LTAR RMONGS PA DANG GYA TSOM GYIS NI MA YIN NO, ,DE LTAR YUM GYI
LHUMS SU 'JUG

PAR NYE BA DANG, ZHUGS MA THAG PA'I GNAS SKABS SOGS NAS BZUNG
YAB YUM

DANG; YUL MI KHYIM MTSES SOGS LA RMIS LTAS SOGS KYI DGE MTSAN
BZANG ZHING

KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA JI LTAR BYUNG BA NI, MI SPRE LO MJUG YAB
KYI MNAL LAM DU,

RGYA NAG RI BO RTZE LNGA NAS 'ONGS ZER BA'I BTZUN PA ME TOG GI
'PHRENG BA DU MA SPEL BA'I

CHOS GOS DANG, SUM CU RTZA GSUM GYI SHING LO YIN ZER BA DAR SER
PO 'DRA BA'I SHAM

THABS CAN, PO TI 'KHYER BA ZHIG BYUNG NAS NGA KHYED LA GNAS ZHIG
G-YOR BA YIN ZER

NAS KHANG THOG NA MCHOD KHANG ZHIG YOD PA'I NANG DU SONG BA'I
SNANG BA BYUNG BAS, YAB

NYID MTSAN BRJOD KHO NA ZHAL 'DON DU MDZAD CING YOD PAS 'JAM
DBYANGS KYI RNAM SPRUL YIN

SNYAM PA BYUNG BA DANG, YANG, LCANG LO CAN NAS PHYAG NA RDO RJES
'PHANGS SAM

SNYAM PA'I GSER GYI RDO RJE 'OD 'BAR BA ZHIG YUM LA THIM PA RMIS
PAS BU STOBS LDAN

ZHIG SKYE BA YIN NAM ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, YUM GYI MNAL LAM DU ME
TOG GI THANG

@089 ZHIG TU BUD MED STONG PHRAG GCIG GRAL LA 'KHOD 'DUG PA'
KHROD DU MO RANG YANG BZHUGS

'DUG PA LA, SHAR NAS KHYE'U DKAR PO BUM PA 'DZIN PA ZHIG DANG,
NUB

NAS BU MO DMAR MO RMA BYA'I SGRO MDONGS SDER MA TZAM YOD PA ZHIG
G-YAS SU BZUNG,

ME LONG CHEN PO ZHIG G-YON DU BZUNG NAS BYUNG BAS DE GNYIS GROS
BYAS STE BUD MED THAMS

CAD LA 'DIS RUNG NGAM, 'DIS RUNG NGAM ZHES KHYE'U DES BU MO DE
LA 'DRI ZHING,

BU MO DES BUD MED GZHAN RNAMS RE RE LA SKYON RE BTAGS PA'I MTHAR
KHYE'U DES YUM NYID

LA MDZUB MO BTZUGS NAS RUNG NGAM ZHES 'DRI BA LA BU MO DES 'DZUM
BYAS NAS RUNG ZER

BAS, KHYE'U DES YUM LA'O NA KHYED KYIS KHRUS GYIS ZER TE, BUM
PA'I NANG NAS CHU

SPYI BOR BLUG CING, JI LTAR BLTAMS PA ZHES SOGS DBYANGS DANG
BCAS NAS KHRUS BYAS PAS,

LUS KYI DRI MA DAG NAS BDE SANG SANG BA'I SNANG BA ZHIG BYUNG
BAS GNYID SAD NAS LUS YANG

BA DANG, SEMS BDE BA SOGS KYI DGE MTSAN DU MA BYUNG STE, GANG GI
RTAGS YIN NAM SNYAM

THE TSOM DU GYUR PA BYUNG BA DANG, YANG, YAB DANG KHYIM MTSES
YUL MI RNAMS KYI RMI LAM DU,

DGE 'DUN MANG POS LHA SA'I JO BO RIN PO CHE DBUS NAS GDAN DRANGS
TE YAB KYI NANG DU

PHEBS PA RMIS PA DANG, DNGOS SU NYI ZLA SKAR GSUM DUS GCIG LA
SHAR BA DANG, NYIN

PAR ME TOG GI CHAR BAB PA DANG, SPOS KYI DRI NGAD BZANG PO 'THUL
BA DANG, NAM

MKHA' LAS ROL MO'I SGRA BYUNG BA DANG, SA G-YO BA LA SOGS PA
NGO MTSAR BA'I

LTAS DU MA YUL DE'I SKYE BO KUN LA MTHUN SNANG DU GRUB PAR YONGS
SU GRAGS SO, ,

DE NAS ME BYA HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES BCU'I NUB MO YUM GYI MNAL
LAM DU DGE 'DUN LA

SOGS PA'I SER SKYA'I SKYE BO PHO MO BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PAS RGYAL
MTSAN DANG RNGA BO CHE LA

SOGS PA ROL MO'I BYE BRAG MTHA' YAS PA BZUNG STE, SPYAN RAS
GZIGS BYON PA

@090 LA BSU BA BYED ZER GYIN 'DUG PAS PHYOGS KUN TU BLTAS PAS MA
MTHONG, DE RJES NAM

MKHAR BLTAS PAS SPRIN GYI GSEB TU GSER SKU RI BO TZAM PA 'OD ZER
NYI MA LTAR PHYOGS

THAMS CAD DU 'PHRO BA, CHOS KYI SGRA DBYANGS SGROG PA ZHIG LHA'I
BU DANG BU MO YIN ZER

BA CHA LUGS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DU MAS BSKOR BA ZHIG MAR MAR BAB
BYUNG BAS GSER SKU

DE RIM BZHIN JE CHUNG JE CHUNG DU SONG STE SPYI BO'I THAD TZAM
DU SLEBS PA'I TSE MTHO GANG TZAM

SHIN TU MDZES PA ZHIG TU GYUR NAS LUS LA THIM PA'I MTHAR, DE'I
'KHOR RNAMS DANG

BSU BA RNAMS KYANG RANG LA THIMS SHING, DE MTHONG BA'I SKYE BO
GZHAN DAG MANG POS RANG

LA PHYAG DANG BSKOR BA DANG, MCHOD PA DANG, BKRA SHIS BRJOD PA
SOGS RMIS PAS

DE'I PHYI NYIN NANG PAR NAS RIG PA DVANGS PA, SKYID SNANG CHE
BA, DE PHYIN CHAD MA BRTAGS

MA DPYAD PA'I DUS NA'ANG NGA'I LUS 'DI LA BRNYAS BCOS MI NYAN
SNYAM NAS GCES SPRAS DANG

GTZANG SPRA LA BRTZON PA SOGS RANG SHUGS KYIS BYUNG BAR SNANG,
DES NA SNGON CHAD RJE

BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I RNAM THAR RNAMS SU LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA'I LO
ZLA DUS TSES 'DI ZHES

DNGOS SU GSAL BAR 'KHOD PA MI SNANG YANG, GONG GI YUM GYI MNAL
LTAS PHYI MA

'DI BZHIN BYA LO ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES BCU'I NUB MO BYUNG TSUL
RJE BTZUN RTOGS LDAN 'JAM

DPAL RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SU GSAL
BAS MNAL LTAS

NGO MTSAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA'I DUS
KYANG ME BYA HOR ZLA DANG

PO'I TSES BCU'I THO RENGS NYID YIN PAR SOM NYI MA DGOS SHING,
ZLA BA 'DI NI STON

PA THUGS RJE CAN GYIS MNYAN YOD DU MU STEGS STON PA DRUG CHO
'PHRUL RNAM PA DU MAS TSAR

BCAD PAR MDZAD PA'I CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BAR GRAGS PA'I DUS CHEN KHYAD
PAR CAN YIN LA,

DE'I NANG TSAN TSES BCU NI STON PA 'KHOR BCAS RGYAL PO BZHIS
MCHOD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN...

@091 'DAS KYIS SKU'I BKOD PA GCIG GIS RGYAL CHEN BZHI'I RIGS KYI
SA NAS SRID RTZE'I BAR

DU YONGS SU GANG BAR MDZAD PA 'KHOR MANG PO KUN GYIS MTHONG
ZHING, DAM PA'I CHOS

BSTAN PA YANG KUN GYIS THOS PAS THAMS CAD BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG
CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED PA

SOGS RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I CHO 'PHRUL RLABS PO CHE BSTAN PA'I DUS
CHEN YIN LA, DES NA

LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA'I ZLA TSES KHYAD PAR CAN 'DI DANG, GONG DU
BKOD PA'I YUL MI KHYIM

MTSES SOGS KYI RMI LAM DU DGE 'DUN MANG POS LHA SA'I JO BO RIN
PO CHE SHING RTA LA GDAN

DRANGS NAS BYON PAR RMIS PA SOGS NI, DUS MTHAR THUB PA'I BSTAN
PA NYAMS PAR

MNGON DU PHYOGS PA NA SLAR YANG MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN BSGRENGS
STE NYIN MO LTAR GSAL

BAR MDZAD PA LA THUB DBANG RANG NYID DNGOS SU BYON PA DANG SGO
KUN NAS KUN TU MTSUNGS

PA'I MDZAD 'PHRIN NGO MTSAR CAN BDAG GIR DU BZHES PA DANG, STON
PAS MNYAN YOD

DU CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO BSTAN PA'I MDZAD PA SLAR YANG MDZAD PA
DANG MTSUNGS PAR LHA LDAN SMON

LAM CHEN MOR GRAGS PA GSAR DU BTZUGS PA'I MDZAD CHEN 'GRAN ZLA
MED PA STON PAR

'GYUR BA SOGS KYI DGE MTSAN SNGA LTAS MNGON DU GYUR PA YIN LA,
YAB KYI MNAL

LAM DU RGYA NAG RI BO RTZE LNGA NAS 'ONGS ZER BA'I BTZUN PA BYON
PA NI, RJE BTZUN 'JAM

DBYANGS NYID MTHON MTHING RAL PA'I ZUR PHUD DOR TE GSUM LDAN
NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I RNAM

PAR BYON PA YIN NO ZHES PA'I BRDA MTSON DANG, YANG PHYAG RDOR
GYIS RDO RJE 'PHANGS

PA YUM LA THIM PA RMIS PA DANG, ,YUM GYI MNAL LAM DU, SPYAN RAS
GZIGS

BYON PA LA BSU BA BYED PA YIN ZER BA RMIS PA RNAMS NI, GONG DU
DRANGS PA'I BKA'

GDAMS GLEGS BAM GYI LUNG DU, ,NGA NI SNYING RJE CHEN PO NYID,
,NGA LA SPYAN RAS

GZIGS SU GRAGS, ,LUS NGAG YID GSUM ZHI 'JAM PAS, ,'GRO BA KUN
GYI

@092 DPAL DU GYUR, ,'JAM PA'I DPAL DU'ANG 'GAL BA MED, ,GDUL
DKA'

'DUL BA NGA YIN NA, ,PHYAG NA RDO RJER 'GAL BA MED, ,DE GSUM
RIGS GSUM

MGON PO NYID, ,PHYOGS SU MA ZAD DNGOS YIN NO, ,ZHES RIGS GSUM
THUGS

RGYUD GCIG PAR GSUNGS PA NYID DON LA GNAS PAS NA GSOL 'DEBS
YONGS GRAGS

DMIGS BRTZE MAR YANG, DMIGS MED BRTZE BA'I GTER CHEN SPYAN RAS
GZIGS, ,

DRI MED MKHYEN PA'I DBANG PO 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS, ,BDUD DPUNG MA
LUS 'JOMS

MDZAD GSANG BA'I BDAG ,ZHES 'BYUNG BA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
BLO BZANG

BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG LAS KYANG, ,RGYAL KUN MKHYEN PA'I
RANG GZUGS 'JAM

DPAL DBYANGS, ,RIGS DRUG 'GRO LA SNYING RJE'I PAD DKAR CAN,
,MTHU STOBS

MNGA' BDAG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA'I LHA, ,RIGS GSUM SGYU 'PHRUL RDO
RJE TZONG KHA PA, ,

ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI RJE BTZUN 'JAM
DBYANGS SU MA

ZAD RIGS GSUM THAMS CAD 'DUS PA'I NGO BO NYID DU BYON PA YIN NO
ZHES LHUMS SU

ZHUGS PA'I DUS NYID NAS 'DOMS PAR MDZAD PA YIN LA, YANG YUM GYI
MNAL

LAM DU GSER SKU RI BO TZAM PA ZHIG JE CHUNG DU GYUR NAS MTHAR
SPYI BOR THIM PA RMIS PA

NI; BDAG NYID CHEN PO RNAMS SKYE BA 'DZIN PA'I TSE THA MAL PA'I
BAR SRID BZHIN DU

SNGON DUS KYI SRID PA KHO NA'I SHA GZUGS 'DZIN PA'I SGO NAS MA
YIN PAR RNAM PA KHYAD PAR

DU 'PHAGS PA GZHAN DANG GZHAN GYI SGO NAS 'JUG PAR MDZAD PAS NA,
GNAS

SKABS 'DIR YANG GSER BTZO MA'I KHA DOG DANG LDAN PA'I RJE BTZUN
'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU'I

RNAM PAS LHUMS SU ZHUGS PAR MNGON LA, BSU MI DANG 'KHOR RNAMS
SKU LUS LA

THIMS PA NI, DE DAG KYANG RJE BTZUN NYID KYI SPRUL BA'I BYE BRAG
GCIG LAS DU MAR 'CHAR

@093 BA LAS GZHAN DU MED PA NYID DU NGES PAS SO, ,DE'I PHYI NYIN
YUM LA THUGS RIGS

DVANGS PA DANG SKYID SNANG CHE BA SOGS BYUNG BA NI, SNGON STON
PA THUGS RJE CAN LHUMS SU

ZHUGS PA'I TSE NA'ANG YUM SGYU MA LHA MDZES KYIS, ,GSER GYI DRA
BAS LEGS G-YOG SPYI

GTZUG DMAR, ,THAL DKAR MCHE BA DRUG DANG RAB LDAN ZHING, ,DUNG
DANG KHA BA

DNGUL MDOG LTA BU YI, ,GLANG PO'I MCHOG CIG KHONG DU SONG SNYAM
BYED, ,DE

ZHUGS NAS NI BDAG GI LUS DANG SEMS, ,SNGON CHAD MTHONG THOS
MYONG BAR MA GYUR PA'I,,

GYA NOMS BDE BAS SHIN TU BDE GYUR TE, ,BSAM GTAN MNYAM PAR BZHAG
PA BZHIN

DU GYUR, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS DANG KUN NAS MTSUNGS SO, ,YANG
YUM

GYI MNAL LAM DU, BUD MED STONG PHRAG GI KHROD DU RANG NYID
BZHUGS PA LA, KHYE'U

DKAR PO ZHIG DANG, BUD MED DMAR MO ZHIG GROS KYI SGO NAS RUNG MI
RUNG BRTAGS

PA BYED PA'I KHYE'U NI SPYAN RAS GZIGS DANG, BUD MED NI SGROL
MA'I RNAM SPRUL TE

'JIG RTEN NA BUD MED MANG YANG SU RUNG RUNG GIS BDAG NYID CHEN
PO RNAMS MNGAL DU

'DZIN PAR MI NUS PAS CHO RIGS BTZUN LA RANG BZHIN BZANG BA SOGS
LEGS PA'I YON

TAN KHYAD PAR CAN DANG LDAN PA ZHIG DGOS PAS NA GZIGS PA DRI MA
MED PAS DPYAD PA'I

SGO NAS YUM NYID LA RNAM PAR GZIGS PA'I TSUL DANG, KHYE'US 'DZIN
PA'I BUM

CHU NI YE SHES KYI BDUD RTZI YIN LA, DES KHRUS BYAS PAS MNGAL
GYI DRI MA SBYONG BA

DANG, RMA BYA'I SGRO MDONGS KYIS GRIB DANG MI GTZANG BA LAS
SKYOBS PA DANG, MTSAN

DPE'I SNANG SNYAN RMA BYA'I MDONGS KYI 'JA' RIS DANG, ME LONG
NANG GI GZUGS BRNYAN

BZHIN DU SKU'I SKYE MCHED MTHA' DAG GSAL ZHING RDZOGS LA SO SOR
MA 'DRES PA 'CHAR BA

MTSON PA STE MNAL LTAS 'DI DAG LA RGYAS BSHAD BRJOD PAR BYA BA
MANG YANG YI GES

@094 'JIGS PAS DE TZAM LAS MA SPROS SO, ,DE LTAR LHUMS SU ZHUGS
PAS ZLA DGU

NGO BCU 'DAS PA NAS BLTAMS PA'I DUS LA NYE BAR BAB PAR GYUR LA,
BLTAMS PA'I

DUS TSES KYANG NGES CAN GSAL BAR 'KHOD PAR MI SNANG RUNG, RIG
PAS DPYAD NA

STON PA THUGS RJE CAN LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA DANG, SANGS RGYAS PA
DANG, MYA

NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I MDZAD PA GSUM KA BSTAN PA'I DUS SA GA ZLA
BA'I TSES BCO LNGA LA

MTSUNGS PA LTAR, BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'DI YANG DANG POR SKU BLTAMS
PA DANG, MTHAR

MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I MDZAD PA GNYIS CHAR HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES
NYER LNGA MKHA' 'GRO

'DU BA'I DUS CHEN KHYAD PAR CAN NYID LA BSTAN PAR NGES SO SNYAM
SHING, SUM PA CHOS

'BYUNG DU SMIN DRUG ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS KYI RDZOGS PA GNYIS
PA'I THO RENGS SKAR CHEN SHAR

DUS ZHES GSAL BA'ANG YI GE NOR BA LAS DON DMAR PHYOGS KYI RDZOGS
PA GNYIS PA TSES

NYER LNGA RANG LA DGONGS PA STE, JI LTAR NA, LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA'I
DUS TSES

ME BYA HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES BCU NAS RTZIS PA'I TSE LO DE'I HOR
ZLA BCU PA'I TSES BCU

YAN GYI ZLA BA RIL PO DGU 'DAS SHING, DE NAS NGA MTHONG BCU DANG
BCAS NA DUS TSES

DE GAR 'GRIG PAR SNANG BA'I PHYIR, 'ON KYANG SNGON CHAD RNAM
THAR RNAMS SU HA CANG GSAL

BAR MA 'KHOD PAS NA DE LTAR YIN NO ZHES NGES PAR KHA TSON GCOD
DU NI MI BTUB MOD,

GANG LTAR KYANG ME BYA HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES NYI SHU NAS NYER
LNGA TSUN LA NI NGES PAR YIN PAR

SEMS SO, ,CHOS 'BYUNG YID KYI MDZES RGYAN DU, RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO DE SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO NYIS
STONG BRGYA DANG DGU BCU

RTZA GCIG ,JO BO GSHEGS NAS SUM BRGYA DANG GNYIS 'DAS PA, HOR
SHUN

RTZI RGYAL POS RGYA NAG LA DBANG BSGYUR BA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I
ME BYA LO YIN PAR GSUNGS,

@095 DE'I TSE NA'ANG YUM GYI MNAL LAM DU DGE 'DUN LA SOGS PA'I
KHROMS CHEN PO TSOGS PA

RNAMS KYIS MCHOD PA'I BYE BRAG BZANG ZHING TSAR DU DNGAR BA DU
MA 'KHYER NAS MCHOD KHANG

MJAL DU 'ONG BA YIN ZER BA LA, MCHOD KHANG GANG DU YOD DRIS PAR
SNGAR GYI

KHYE'U DKAR PO DE 'ONG NAS CHU SHEL GYI LDE MIG ZHIG BZUNG STE
MCHOD KHANG 'DI NA YOD CES

YUM RANG GI BRANG DBUS NA SGO CHUNG SER PO ZHIG 'DUG PA PHYE
BA'I NANG NAS SNGAR LUS LA

THIM PA'I GSER SKU DE BTON SONG BAR, SKU DE DRI MAS CUNG ZAD
NOGS 'DUG PA LA

SNGAR GYI BUD MED DMAR MO YONGS NAS BUM CHUS KHRUS BYAS, RMA
BYA'I SGROS BYAB, RGYA

GAR KYI SKAD YIN SNYAM PA'I DAR DIR MANG PO DBYANGS SU LEN CING,
KHROMS KYI SKYE

BO RNAMS KYIS SKU DE LA MCHOD PA 'BUL BA DANG GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I
SNANG BA BYUNG BA'I..

MOD LA MNAL SAD PA'I THO RENGS KYI CHA LA SKAR CHEN LHAG GER
SHAR BA DANG STABS GCIG

TU BDE BAR SKU BLTAMS PAR SNANG NGO, ,TSUL 'DI DAG KYANG SNGON
GZHON NU DON

THAMS CAD GRUB PA LHUMS SU BZHUGS PA'I YUM GYI LHUMS RGYAL SRAS
KYI NYE BAR SPYAD PA

RIN PO CHE'I BKOD PA ZHES PAR BYIN GYIS BRLABS NAS ZLA BA BCUR
ZAG MED KYI BDE BA..

LA LONGS SPYAD CING LHA MI'I SKYE RGU KHRI PHRAG SUM CU RTZA
GSUM SMIN PAR MDZAD PA DANG,

LUM BI'I CHAL DU YUM GYI RTZIBS LOGS G-YAS NAS SKU BLTAMS MA
THAG TSANGS PA DANG..

BRGYA BYIN GYIS KA SHI KA'I RAS KYIS BLANGS, DGA' BO DANG, NYER
DGAS SKU KHRUS

GSOL BA SOGS DANG MTSUNGS PAR THA MAL PA'I MIG NGOR MA GYUR PA
LAS GZHAN DU YUM KYI

LHUMS YE SHES RANG SNANG LAS GRUB PA'I GZHAL MED KHANG GI BKOD
PAR BYIN GYIS BRLABS

NAS MCHOG TU GYUR PA'I 'GRO BA MANG PO'I DON MDZAD CING BZHUGS
PA DANG, BLTAMS

PA'I TSE NA YANG MNGAL GYI SGO NAS MA YIN PAR YUM GYI THUGS KA'I
BRANG DBUS KYI SGO PHYE NAS

@096 BLTAMS PA DANG, BLTAMS MA THAG NAS LHA'I KHYE'U RNAMS KYIS
LAG GIS BLANGS SHING, d'A

KI MA RNAMS KYIS YE SHES KYI BDUD RTZIS SKU KHRUS GSOL TE MNGAL
GYI DRI MA THAMS CAD SBYONG

BA DANG, BKRA SHIS KYI GLU DBYANGS DAR DIR DU SGROG PA DANG,
DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I LHA

KLU'I TSOGS KYIS MCHOD PA'I KHYAD PAR NAM MKHA' GANG BAS MCHOD
PA LA SOGS PA MNGON

SUM NYID DU BYUNG BA'I DGE MTSAN YANG DAG PAR MNGON LA, THO
RENGS SKAR CHEN 'CHAR BA

DANG DUS MNYAM DU BLTAMS PA YANG, SKAR CHEN 'DI NI GZA' PA WA
SANG DU GRAGS PA RGYU

SKAR GYI DBUS NA CHES CHER 'PHAGS PA KUN LA GRAGS SHING GRUB PA
LTAR, THUB PA'I BSTAN

'DZIN GRANGS MED RGYU SKAR GYI DBUS NA PA WA SANG LTAR CHES CHER
GSAL BA 'GRAN ZLA MED

PA'I BDAG NYID CHEN PO YIN NO ZHES GSAL BAR MTSON PA'O, ,RJE 'DI
NYID SKU BLTAMS

PA'I LO DUS 'DI NI STON PA SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO
NYIS STONG CHIG BRGYA

DGU BCU RTZA DGU 'DAS PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME BYA LO YIN PAR
DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG

LAS GSUNGS SO, ,DE LTAR SKU BLTAMS BA'I PHYI NYIN DE KHAR YUL
DER BZHUGS PA'I

BLA MA CHOS KYI RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN CES PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS
'JIGS MDZAD RDO RJE'I GRUB

PA BRNYES PA ZHIG YOD PA DES MNGON PAR SHES PAS THOGS MED DU
MKHYEN NAS RTEN 'BREL

KHYAD PAR CAN BSGRIGS PAR DGONGS TE GSOL ZAN DANG BDUD RTZI RIL
BU BSRES PA'I RIL

LU DANG, SRUNG MDUD, RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BRIS SKU BYIN RLABS
CAN GCIG,

BU CHUNG BSKYANGS LUGS KYI YI GE DANG BCAS PA NYE GNAS TSUL
KHRIMS DANG LDAN PA ZHIG LA

BSKUR BAR MDZAD LA, DUS PHYIS YAB KYIS RJE NYID LA BKA' DRI ZHUS
PAR, NGAS

RMI LAM DU RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG MJAL BAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAR
GSOL BA BTAB,

KHYAD PAR DU ZHAL YANG YANG BSTAN DU GSOL ZHES ZHUS PAS, TZONG
KHA'I PHYOGS SU

@097 ZHAL GZIGS NAS, SANG PHOD DA TZAM LUNG PA 'DI'I MDA' RU
'ONG, DE BAR

BDE BAR GYIS GSUNGS BYUNG BAR, DE GANG YIN DPYAD PA'I PHYIR TING
NGE 'DZIN LA

MNYAM PAR BZHAG PAS KHYED GYI BUR 'DUG PA THIGS PA YIN ZHES
GSUNG SNANG STE, TSUL

'DIS KYANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI 'JAM DPAL DPA' BO RDO RJE
'JIGS BYED DNGOS

YIN PAR LUNG RIGS GZHAN GYIS SGRUB MI DGOS PA NYID DO, ,RJE'I
RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BA'I

GTAM BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA ZHES PAR SKU BLTAMS PA'I DUS TSES 'DI
ZHES KHA GSAL MA

'KHOD KYANG TSIG 'GROS LTAR NA DPYID DUS ZHIG LA NGOS 'DZIN PA
LTA BUR SNANG RUNG GONG DU..

SMOS PA LTAR LHUMS SU ZHUGS PA'I DUS NAS RTZIS PAS DUS 'KHOR
LUGS KYI STON ZLA THA..

CHUNG HOR ZLA BCU BA NYID DU NGES TE, MKHAS GRUB 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PAS MDZAD

PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR RAS BRIS BZHENGS LUGS TZINTA MA nI'I
'PHRENG BAR YANG, SPREL

LO'I MTSAN LTAS NAS BZUNG RIM BZHIN 'GOD PAR MDZAD PA LAS KYANG
'DI LTAR BYUNG STE,

,SPREL LOR YAB KYI MNAL LAM DU 'JAM DPAL RGYA BAN GLEGS BAM CAN
GYI RNAM PAS MCHOD

KHANG DU PHEBS PA RMIS PAS BU SHES RAB CAN YONG NGAM SNYAM PA
DANG, ,LCANG LO CAN

NAS PHYAG RDOR GYIS RDO RJE 'PHANGS PA YUM LA THIM PAS BU STOBS
LDAN ZHIG SKYE BA YIN

NAM SNYAM PA DANG, ,YUM GYI MNAL LAM DU ME TOG GI THANG DU SHEL
GYI KHYE'U DANG,

MKHA' 'GRO MAS KHRUS BYAS PA DANG, KHYIM MTSES GZHAN GYIS JO BO
RIN PO CHE GDAN

DRANGS PA RMIS PA DANG, NYI ZLA SKAR GSUM CIG CHAR SHAR BA, NYIN
PAR YANG

ME TOG GI CHAR DANG, NAM MKHA' NAS ROL MO DANG, SA G-YO BA SOGS

DANG, CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN LA MNAL LAM DU RDO RJE 'JIGS
BYED ZHAL GZIGS

SHING, DNGOS SU MTHONG BA DGOS ZHES GSOL BA BTAB PAS, TZONG
KHA'I NGOS

@098 BSTAN NAS SANG PHOD DA TZAM LUNG PA 'DI'I MDA' RU YONG, DE
BAR BDE BAR GYIS

GSUNGS PAS RJE 'DI 'KHRUNGS PA MKHYEN, ZHES PA RNAMS KYIS SPREL
LO'I MJUG

GI MTSAN LTAS DANG, BYA LOR YUM GYI RMI LAM DU SPYAN RAS GZIGS
BSU BA YIN

ZHES SKYE BO THAMS CAD RNGA ROL MCHOD RDZAS SNA TSOGS 'KHYER NAS
'GRO BAR BLTAS PAS,
