'KHOR GYIS BSKOR BA

GNAS

@202 RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DANG, ,GTZUG TOR RNAM RGYAL 'PHAGS MA
'OD ZER CAN, ,

BAR CHAD KUN SEL GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR SOGS, ,LHAG PA'I LHA RNAMS
YANG

YANG GSAL BAR GZIGS, ,DPAL LDAN + RGYAL SRAS KLU SGRUB RJE BTZUN
SANGS RGYAS

BSKYANGS, ,'PHAGS PA LHA DANG DPAL LDAN ZLA BA'I ZHABS, ,RNAL
'BYOL DBANG

PHYUG KLU YI BYANG CHUB RNAMS, ,MNGON SUM BYON NAS RGYUN DU RJES
BZUNG BA, ,

DPAL LDAN + SA GSUM BRNYES PA'I 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED DANG, ,KUN
MKHYEN

GNYIS PA RGYAL SRAS DBYIG GI GNYEN, ,'PHAGS PAS RJES BZUNG
PHYOGS KYI GLANG PO

RNAMS, ,MNGON SUM BYON NAS + DPAL LDAN + SMRA BA'I ZLA BA CHOS
KYI GRAGS

PA DANG, ,YON TAN 'OD DANG RGYAL SRAS SH'AKYA 'OD, ,ZHI BA LHA
DANG DPAL LDAN

AA BHYA YA, ,MNGON SUM + DPAL LDAN X AINDRA BO DHI DPAL LDAN SA
RA HA, ,

L'U HI PA DANG RJE BTZUN DRIL BU'I ZHABS, ,NAG PO SPYOD PA
PADMA'I NGANG TSUL SOGS, ,

MNGON SUM + DPAL LDAN + 'DI DAG GZHUNG LA BRTEN NAS RANG GZHAN
LA, ,

PHAN PA RGYA CHER 'GRUB PA'I RTEN 'BREL ZHES, ,'JAM DPAL DBYANGS
KYIS GSAL BAR

LUNG BSTAN PA, ,GZHAN DON LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I SEMS DPA' CHE,
,DPAL

LDAN + ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS KYI DON LTAR, BCOM LDAN RJE BTZUN
'PHAGS MA SGROL

MA DANG, GTZUG TOR RNAM PAR RGYAL MA, 'PHAGS MA 'OD ZER CAN,
GTZUG

TOR GDUGS DKAR MO LA SOGS PA'I LHAG PA'I LHA DU MA ZHIG GNAS DUS
DE NAS BZUNG

STE SNGA PHYI NGES MED KYI TSUL DU ZHAL YANG DANG YANG DU MNGON
SUM GSAL BAR GZIGS LA,

DE BZHIN DU DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, A'ARYA DE WA,
SLOB DPON SANGS

RGYAS BSKYANGS, KLU'I BYANG CHUB, DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PA LA
SOGS PA ZAB MO LTA

@203 BA'I BRGYUD PA'I PAntI TA DANG, 'PHAGS PA THOG MED SKU
MCHED, SLOB DPON PHYOGS

KYI GLANG PO, DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PA, SLOB DPON YON TAN 'OD
DANG, SH'AKYA

'OD, LHA DBANG BLO, ,RGYAN MKHAN PO, KA MA LA SH'I LA, AA BHYA
YA LA SOGS

PA RGYA CHEN SPYOD PA'I BRGYUD KYI PAntI TA DANG, RGYAL PO
AINDRA BO DHI, BRAM ZE

CHEN PO SA RA HA, SLOB DPON CHEN PO L'U HI PA, DRIL BU PA, NAG
PO

SPYOD PA LA SOGS PA'I GRUB CHEN RNAMS LA SOGS PA RGYA GAR PAn
GRUB DU MA'I SKU'I SNANG

BA DNGOS SU GSAL BAR GZIGS, 'DI DAG KYANG NYAMS SNANG YIN PAS
GTAD PA

CHER MED DAM DGONGS PA LA, SNGAR BZHIN RJE BTZUN 'JAL DPAL
DBYANGS KYIS,

NYAMS SNANG RANG GA BA MIN PAS DE DAG LA GSOL BA DRAG TU THOB,
'DI DAG GI GZHUNG

LA BRTEN NAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'GRUB PA'I RTEN
'BREL YOD DO ZHES LUNG

BSTAN PA NI NGES PAR DON LA GNAS PA STE, SHING RTA CHEN PO RNAM
GNYIS LA SOGS

PA 'PHAGS YUL MKHAS PA DE DAG GI BZHED SROL GZHUNG LUGS RGYA
MTSO LTA BU RNAMS KYI

'CHAD NYAM GYI SROL DANG, GZHUNG LUGS DE DAG GI DGONGS DON GDAMS
PAR SHAR

TE GDAMS DON LTAR NYAMS SU LEN PA'I SGRUB PA'I SROL DANG, GRUB
THOB RNAL 'BYOR

GYI DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO DE DAG GIS RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI
DGONGS PA JI BZHIN BKRAL

BA'I GSANG BA SNGAGS KYI RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I DBANG LUNG MAN
NGAG DANG, BSHAD BKA'I

SROL, LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL, LAM
BGROD

TSUL, 'BRAS BU SGRUB TSUL LA SOGS PA MDO SNGAGS BSHAD SGRUB KYI
BSTAN PA RNAM

PAR DAG PAS, STOD DZA TI'I DRI BSUNG RNAM PAR 'THUL BA NAS SMAD
ZA 'OG THAGS SU

BSKRUN PA'I YUL GRU CHEN PO'I BAR YUG GCIG TU KHYAB STE, 'GRO BA
RNAMS DAM

@204 CHOS BDUD RTZI'I DPAL LA CI DGAR LONGS SPYOD DU YOD PA 'DI
DAG RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA NYID KYI THUGS RJE 'PHRIN LAS KHO NA'I MTHU LAS BYUNG BA NI
KUN GYI MNGON SUM GYI YUL

DU GYUR BA 'DI KHA YIN PA'I PHYIR RO, ,YANG GSANG RNAM TSIG BCAD
MA LAS, ZHI

LHAG ZUNG DU 'BREL BA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYIS, ,TING 'DZIN YAR NGO'I
ZLA LTAR 'PHEL

BA NA, ,BCOM LDAN RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED RAB BRJID PA, ,ZHAL PHYAG
YONGS

SU RDZOGS PA'I SKU MCHOG GZIGS, ,DPAL LDAN X ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR
GNAS DER

BZHUGS SKABS BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SKU ZHAL
PHYAG YONGS SU

RDZOGS PA SHIN TU CHE ZHING GZI BRJID BZOD PAR DKA' BA ZHIG
MNGON SUM DU ZHAL

GZIGS SHING, DUS DE NAS BZUNG STE NYIN RE BZHIN 'JIGS BYED KYI
BDAG 'JUG

BZHES PA NAM YANG MA CHAG PAR MDZAD PA DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS,
'JAM

DPAL DBYANGS DANG RJE BTZUN BLA MA YI, ,THUGS KAR SHES RAB RAL
GRIS 'BREL BA

LAS, ,ZAG MED BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN THUGS KAR ZHUGS, ,LHAN SKYES
BDE BA'I TING

'DZIN BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS, ,DPAL LDAN + ZHES GSUNGS TE, SNGAR GONG
DU

BYUNG BA LTAR RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS LA SANGS RGYAS BYANG
SEMS KYI 'KHOR DU MAS

BSKOR BA ZHIG DNGOS SU GZIGS PA'I RJE BTZUN GYI THUGS KA'I NANG
NAS PHAR RAL GRI'I

YU BA ZUG CING, RJE'I THUGS KAR RAL GRI'I RTZE MO ZUG PA LA,
BDUD RTZI'I

RGYUN KHA DOG DKAR SER SHIN TU SNUM PA 'OD KYI CHU RGYUN 'DRA BA
ZHIG RJE BTZUN GYI THUGS KA

NAS RAL GRI'I STENG LA BRGYUD DE NA RA RA BYUNG NAS RJE'I THUGS
KAR ZHUGS PAS SKU'I NANG

THAMS CAD ZAG MED KYI BDE BA CHEN PO DPAG TU MED PA BRJOD PAR MI
NUS PA 'DRA BAS

YONGS SU GANG BA 'KHRUNGS, DUS DER NGO MKHYEN PA DANG MI MKHYEN
PA'I 'KHAR DU MA KA

@205 GDANGS NAS BDUD RTZI BZED BZHIN 'DUG PA LA 'GA' ZHIG GI
KHAR BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN MANG

DU 'GRO ZHING, 'GA' ZHIG GI KHAR NYUNG ZAD TZAM RE 'GRO BA DANG,
'GA'

ZHING GIS KHA GDANGS KYANG CUNG ZAD KYANG MI 'GRO BA DE 'DRA
BA'ANG 'DUG CES BKA' STZAL

BAR SNANG, DE LA RJE NYID KYI GSUNGS LAS, KA TA RA YI GRONG
KHYER DU, ,SKYED

MOS TSAL NI RNAM PAR RGYAS, ,BUNG BA MANG PO DE LA ROL, ,BDUD
RTZI MCHOG KYANG

'THUNG BAR SNANG, ,ZHES BRDA' TZAM ZHIG LUNG BSTAN MDZAD LA,
DE'I NANG TSAN

BUNG BA MANG PO DE LA ROL, ZHES PA NI GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI NANG
NAS MANG PO ZHIG

GIS RJE NYID KYIS JI LTAR BSTAN PA'I LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI NYAMS
LEN LA 'BAD PA LAS

BDE STONG GI TING NGE 'DZIN BRNYES PA DU MA ZHIG SNGAR RJE NYID
ZHAL BZHUGS PA'I SKABS DANG,

DUS PHYIS KYANG 'BYUNG BAR LUNG BSTAN PA DANG, BDUD RTZI MCHOG
KYANG 'THUNG BAR SNANG,,

ZHES PA NI MCHOG GI DNGOS GRUB BRNYES PA YANG MANG DU 'BYUNG
BA'I DON DANG, DE LAS

GZHAN BDUD RTZI MA THOB KYANG THOB TU RE BAS KHA GDANGS PA RNAMS
NI LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI

NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON PAR BYAS KYANG SKAL BA'I DBANG GI TSE 'DIR
BDE STONG GI TING NGE

'DZIN MA THOB NA'ANG, TSE RABS GZHAN DANG DMA' MTHA' RMAD BYUNG
BKOD PA'I 'JIG

RTEN DU RJE NYID RGYAL BA SENG+GA'I NGA ROR SANGS RGYAS TSUL
BSTAN PA'I TSE BDUD RTZI THOB PA'I

RTEN 'BREL GYI LUNG BSTAN YIN TSUL RJE KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYIS
MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR

LAS BYUNG ZHING, DES NA, KA TA RA YI GRONG KHYER ZHES PA YANG
BOD GANGS CAN GYI

LJONGS DANG, SKYED MOS TSAL NI RNAM PAR RGYAS, ,ZHES PA NI
LJONGS 'DIR RJE

BTZONG KHA PA NYID KYI THUGS RJE LAS MDO SNGAGS SPYI DANG, KHYAD
PAR DU ZAB GSANG

BLA NA MED PA'I RIM GNYIS KYI LAM GYI TSUL RNAM PAR RGYAS PA'I
DON DU NGES SAM SNYAM MO,,

@206 YANG RNAM THAR 'GA' ZHIG LAS, GZIGS SNANG DE DAG BYUNG BA'
SKABS SHIG

RJE BTZUN GYI GSUNG LAS, GANG LA GNAS PA MED PAR NI, ,SEMS NYID
NAM MKHA'

LTA BUR SGOMS, ,DE YI GROGS RNAMS KUN LA 'BAD, ,BSE RU LTA BUR

GNAS PAR BYA, ,'DU 'DZI DAG KYANG SPANG BAR BYA, ,NANG DU MNYAM
PAR BZHAG

PAR BYA, ,BYANG CHUB CHEN PO MNYES PAR BYA, ,LAS KYI RNAM PAR
SMIN PA GDON MI ZA,,

NGES PAR 'BYUNG DANG BYANG CHUB SEMS SGOM STE, ,DRAN PA'I ME
CHEN RGYUN CHAD MED

PAR SBAR, ,YUL DRUG BUD SHING NGES PAR TSIG PAR 'GYUR, ,'KHOR
DANG MYA

NGAN 'DAS PA'I CHOS RNAMS KUN, ,SNGON CHAD GANG GIS MA DMIGS MI
DMIGS PHYIR, ,

NAM MKHA' BZHIN DU DE YI MTHA' DANG BRAL, ,YUL GYI SNANG BA NAM
MKHA'I PADMA

BZHIN, ,SEMS KYI 'DZIN PA BDE GSHEGS SU YIS RNYED, ,DBYINGS RIG

GCIG PA MO GSHAM BU YIS SGRUB, ,DE 'DRA GANG YIN DE DAG RGYAL
BA'I LAM, ,

ZHES GSUNGS ZHES 'KHOD DO, ,MDOR NA GNAS DER DE 'DRA BA'I DAG
PA'I GZIGS

SNANG MTHA' KLAS PA BYUNG ZHING, ,DE NAS RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS
KYI GSUNG GIS

BSKUL BA BZHIN RDZING PHYI'I GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG BSO MDZAD PAR
DGONGS NAS DPYID KYI DUS

LA BABS PA NA 'OL KHAR BYON, ,DE YANG RDZING PHYI'I GTZUG LAG
KHANG DER SNGON GAR

MI YON TAN G-YU DRUNG GIS BZHENGS PA'I JO BO BYAMS PA'I SKU LI
'DRA MI TSAD LHAG TZAM

SHIN TU BYIN RLABS CHE ZHING, NGO MTSAR PHUL DU BYUNG BA ZHIG
BZHUGS PA DANG,

GTZUG LAG KHANG RNAMS KYANG BKOD PA MDZES SHING BDE BAR GSHEGS
PA'I SNANG BRNYAN

LDEB BRIS SOGS BYIN RLABS KYI TSAN KHA DANG LDAN PA DU MAS GTAMS
PA ZHIG YIN NA'ANG,

DUS PHYIS LHA RIS THAMS CAD NYAMS SHING SHIN TU GOG ,JO BO'I SKU
DE LA'ANG SRI

@207 ZHU BKUR STI SOGS MED PAR RDUL KHROD NA 'O BRGYAL ZHING,
SKU LA BYA BRUN DANG THAL

BA SOGS MI GTZANG BAS GOS PAR GYUR PA GZIGS PAS THUGS KYIS MA
BZOD PA'I SPYAN

CHAB BYUNG ZHING, DE'I ZHIG BSO'I SLAD DU THOG MAR GTZUG LAG
KHANG GI RTZIG PA

DANG THOG DANG ZHAL BA SOGS 'OL KHA STAG RTZE PA LA 'CHOS DGOS
ZHAL LTA GNANG BA BZHIN

KHONG GIS KYANG DE DAG THAMS CAD LEGS PAR BKA' BZHIN DU BSGRUB,
DE NAS

RI MO BA SOGS KYI CHA RKYEN RNAMS RJE DPON SLOB RNAMS RANG GI
PHYAG RDZAS KYIS SGRUB PAR

BRTZAMS PA'I TSE, DPON SLOB BCU GNYIS YOD PA'I PHYAG RDZAS GTOR
CHA SOGS

GANG YOD LA RI GONG BTAB PAS DNGUL ZHO BCU GNYIS LAS MA ZIN PAS
JI LTAR MDZAD RNGO

MA THOGS PA LA, RNAM SRAS PA 'DZIN GTOR ZHIG BCAS NAS 'PHRIN LAS
'CHOL

BAR DGONGS PA'I TSE MAR MED PA LA BTZUN PA ZHIG GIS MAR GROD BU
GANG PHUL,

DE LA 'DZIN GTOR BCAS NAS 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BAS DE'I SANG NYIN
RANG LA 'BROG PA

'GAS MAR THUD MANG PO BKAL TE PHUL, DE NAS BZUNG STE 'BUL BA
MANG PO RIM BZHIN

BYUNG BAS YO BYAD KYIS PHYAG CUNG ZAD KYANG THOGS PAR MA GYUR
CING, 'DIR MA ZAD CHOS

LDAN GYI DGOS PA KHYAD PAR CAN GZIGS PA'I SKABS GZHAN DU'ANG
RNAMS SRAS LA MAR GYI

GTOR MA DANG BCAS TE 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BAS YO BYAD DPAG TU MED PA
BLO BUR DU BYUNG

BA'I LO RGYUS MANG DU YOD CES MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS
GSUNGS, DE NAS YAR

LUNG PHYOGS NAS KYANG LHA BZO BA TSON RTZI 'KHYER NAS RI MO'I
DANG BLANGS LA 'ONGS PA'ANG

MANG DU BYUNG, DE'I TSE RI MO PA RNAMS KYANG BSNYEN GNAS DANG
GSO SBYONG GI SDOM PA LA

BKOD NAS 'BRIR BCUG PA DANG, LAS BYED PA'I MI GZHAN RNAMS KYANG
THA MAL PA'I TSIG

SMRA BA SPANGS NAS SMON LAM GYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA SOGS SHAS CHER
KHA TON DU BYED PA'I SGO

@208 NAS LAS SGRUB PA LA GZHOL DU 'JUG PAR MDZAD, DUS DER RJE
BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS

KYI GSUNG GIS, RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA MGON PO LA PHYOGS BCU'I SANGS
RGYAS THAMS

CAD KYIS 'OD ZER CHEN POS DBANG BSKUR BA LA GZHI GYIS LA BSTOD
PA RTZOMS SHIG CES

BSKUL BAR MDZAD PA LTAR, BYAMS MGON GYI BSTOD PA RIN PO CHE GSAL
BA'I SGRON ME

ZHES PA GSUNG RTZOM MDZAD, ,DE BZHIN DU BDE BA CAN DU SKYE BA
'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM

ZHING MCHOG SGO 'BYED DANG, RANG NYID MA 'ONGS PA NA GANG DU
SPRUL PA'I SKUR 'TSANG RGYA

BA'I MDZAD PA STON PA'I ZHING YONGS SU BZUNG BA'I SMON LAM YANG
RJE BTZUN GYI GSUNG GIS

BSKUL NAS RTZOM PAR MDZAD LA, DE YANG GSANG RNAM GSOL 'DEBS LAS,
BDE

BA CAN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM DANG, ,MI PHAM MGON GYI YANG DAG
DON BSTOD PA, ,

DON GYI NGO BO GO RIM 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS, ,GSAL BAR GSUNGS NAS
TSIG SBYOR

LEGS SBYAR BA, ,DPAL LDAN + ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR GONG GI BSTOD PA
DANG SMON

LAM DE DAG GI DON GYI NGO BO DANG GO RIM SOGS RJE BTZUN 'JAM
DBYANGS NYID KYIS JI

LTAR GSUNGS PA RNAMS NGED KYIS TSIG SBYOR DU BSGRIGS PA YIN CES
RJE NYID KYIS BKA'

STZAL PAR SNANG, YANG DE NYID LAS, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN RAB GNAS
MDZAD

PA'I TSE, ,DAM TSIG PA LA YE SHES MNGON SUM ZHUGS, ,GANG GIS
BYIN GYIS

BRLABS PA'I LHA TSOGS RNAMS, ,SKYE RGU'I BSOD NAMS ZHING DU LEGS
GRUB PA, ,

DPAL LDAN ZHES GSUNGS PA'I DON NI, DE SKABS THOG MAR RJE BTZUN
'JAM PA'I

DBYANGS KYI ZHING BKOD BZHENGS PA'I SKYA RIS BTAB TSAR BA LA RAB
GNAS ZHIG MDZAD PAS

RJE BTZUN GYI SKU DNGOS SU BYON NAS THIM SONG BA'I GZIGS SNANG
BYUNG ZHING, DE NUB

DE'I SKU MDUN LA KONG BU CHUNG NGU ZHIG TU MAR ME BKANG STE SROD
KYI MGO NAS PHUL BAS

@209 SANG NYIN PHYED KYI BAR DU MA ZAD PAR 'DZIN PA BYUNG, DE
BZHIN DU ZHING BKOD RE RE

BRIS TSAR RIM GYIS RAB GNAS MDZAD CING MAR ME PHUL BA LA MA
BZUNG BA GCIG KYANG MA

BYUNG ZHING, RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I GNAS SKABS GANG DU'ANG YE SHES
PA DGUG BSTIM

MDZAD PA NA LHA DE DANG DE'I RNAM PAR THIM SONG BA'I SNANG BA MA
BYUNG BA MED CES BKA' STZAL

TE; DES NA RTEN DE DAG NI RGYAL BA DNGOS DANG KHYAD PAR MED PA'I
MCHOD PA'I ZHING

BLA NA MED PA NYID DU SHES PAR BYA STE, ME TOG CHUN PO LAS, RAB
GNAS MDZAD

TSE GANG GANG DAM TSIG PAR, ,YE SHES DE DE SLAR YANG MNGON SUM
THIM, ,DE

PHYIR YA MTSAN RTEN GYI LJON PA RNAMS, ,MCHOD PA'I ZHING DU
RGYAL BA DNGOS YIN NO,,

ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR RO, ,DUS DER SANGS RGYAS SUM CU RTZA LNGA'I
SKU 'BRI BAR BRTZAMS

PA'I TSE, LHA BZO BA RNAMS KYIS SKU MDOG PHYAG RGYA SOGS JI LTAR
'BRI BA MA SHES

NAS RJE NYID LA ZHUS PAR, GSOL BTAB MDZAD PAS JI LTAR 'BRI BA'I
GO RIM DANG

MTHUN PAR RGYAL BA SUM CU SO LNGA'I SKU RIM GYIS GZIGS SNANG
BYUNG BA BZHIN SKU MDOG

PHYAG RGYA SOGS 'DI DANG 'DI LTA BUR BRIS SHIG CES ZHAL LTA
GNANG NAS 'BRIR BCUG

PAR MDZAD LA, 'DI DANG SNGAR 'OL KHA CHOS LUNG DU SANGS RGYAS SO
LNGA'I ZHAL GZIGS

PA DANG, GZHAN YANG DE 'DRA BA SNGA PHYI NGES MED RGYUN DU NAR
MAR BYUNG BA RNAMS PHYOGS

GCIG TU GSANG RNAM TSIGS BCAD MA LAS, YAN LAG BDUN PA'I CHO GA
MDZAD PA'I

TSE; ;SANGS RGYAS SUM CU SO LNGA MNGON SUM DU, ,RANG RANG SKU YI
DBYIBS

DANG PHYAG MTSAN SOGS, ,JI BZHIN RGYUN DU GZIGS PA CHOS KYI RJE,
,DPAL

LDAN + ZHES GSUNGS PA YIN NO, ,DE LTAR RI MO SOGS LEGS PAR GRUB
NAS 'JAM

DPAL GSANG LDAN GYI DKYIL 'KHOR BZHENGS TE BYAMS MGON GYI SNANG
BRNYAN GTZO BOR GYUR

@210 PA'I RTEN DANG BRTEN PA MTHA' DAG LA RJE NYID DKYIL 'KHOR
GYI GTZO BOR BZHENGS NAS

RAB TU GNAS PA'I RIM PA RGYAS PAR MDZAD CING, DE SKABS SLOB MA
SKAL LDAN

BCU LHAG PA ZHIG LA 'JAM DPAL GSANG LDAN GYI DBANG CHEN YANG
BKA' DRIN DU STZAL,

DE'I TSE RAB GNAS DNGOS GZHI'I NYIN RJE NYID RGYUN GYI THUGS DAM
MA CHAG PA'I THOG ,

LAS BYED DANG, BYA BA'I DUS TSIG 'DZIN PA MANG PO ZHIG GI THUGS
DAM DGE SBYOR

DANG BYA BA SOGS KYANG SNGAR LAS CHES SNGA BA'I TSOD LA ZIN PAS,
'DI CI ZHIG SNYAM

STE GRIB TSOD BTZUGS SHING ZHIB TU BRTAG PAR DE NYIN NYI MA TSAD
LAS CHES RING DU GYUR PAR

SNANG NGO ZHES DU MA ZHIG MTHUN PAR GLENG BA BYUNG STE, DE NI
SNGON RGYA GAR DU GRUB CHEN

'BIR WA PAS RGYUN GYI NAM PHYED LA SLEB TSOD BAR DU NYI MA BZUNG
BA SOGS KYI RNAM THAR

DANG MTSUNGS PA STE GANG SNANG LA 'DOD RGUR DBANG BSGYUR BA'I
RTAGS YANG DAG GO ,

GZHAN YANG LAS CAN 'GA' ZHIG GI RMI LAM DU MKHA' 'GROS RI MO
'BRI BA MTHONG BA DANG,

LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA'I GZIGS SNANG LA SANGS RGYAS
RABS BDUN SOGS

RGYAL BA DU MA NAM MKHA'I LAM NAS BYANG PHYOGS SU BYON PA GZIGS,
GANG DU BZHUD

CES GSOL BAS RDZING PHYI'I RAB GNAS LA SPYAN 'DREN GYIN 'DUG CES
GSUNGS PA LTAR,

DUS PHYIS ZHAL 'DZOMS SKABS RTZIS PAS MKHAN CHEN LA GZIGS SNANG
BYUNG BA'I TSES

GRANGS DANG RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I TSES GRANGS GNYIS MTHUN PAR
BYUNG SNANG LA, DES

NA RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS DNGOS SU SPYAN 'DREN
NUS PA 'DI LTA BU GRUB

RTAGS PHAL DANG PHAL GYI DO ZLA MA YIN PA SHES PAR GYIS SHIG
,RAB STON MDZAD

PA'I SKABS SU GDAN SA PHAN TSUN GYI MDO SMAD TSONG PA SOGS NAS
GOS DAR SOGS KYI

'BUL BA MANG DU BYUNG BAS RTEN 'BUR DU DOD PA RNAMS KYI NA BZA'
DANG LOGS BRIS...

@211 THAMS CAD LA ZHAL KHEBS DANG BCAS PA LEGS PAR PHUL BA SOGS
BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO

BA YONGS LA LHAG PAR SMAN PA'I MDZAD PA RLABS CHE BA ZHIG DUS
DER GRUB PAR MDZAD DO,,

DE NAS RIN PO CHE LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN PA LA
BU MA DKAR MO ZHIG

GIS, BYAMS PAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I GANG ZAG 'JAM DPAL DANG
GNYIS

SU MED PA, LHA MO DBYANGS CAN MAS RIG PA STER BAR BYED PA'I
SKYES BU PHUN SUM

TSOGS PA ZHIG DANG SKYE BA BCO LNGA'I GONG NAS 'BREL BA YOD
CING, SKYE BA 'DIR

YANG PHAN TSUN DPON SLOB TU 'BREL BA'I RTEN 'BREL YOD PAS GDAN
DRANGS NAS CHOS

BKA' LA SRIS MA 'JUG PAR BYIN, PHAR LA YANG CHOS ZHUS ZHES SOGS
LUNG BSTAN PA

LA BRTEN NAS MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA THUGS MOS GUS TSAD MED PA
'KHRUNGS TE RJE NYID

LA 'DIR CIS KYANG NAS PHEBS PAR ZHU, BKA' 'DRI ZHU BA'I 'DUN
PA'ANG YOD LA SKU

TSE BSRING BA'I RTEN 'BREL BSGRIGS PA SOGS KYI SNYAN BSKUL YANG
'BUL BA LAGS, ZHES

PA'I GSUNG YIG NAN CHER BYUNG BAR BRTEN NAS DGUNG LO SO DGU PA
SHING PHAG LO LA

MNYAL BRGYUD DE LHO BRAG BRA'O DGON PAR BYON, DE YANG MKHAN CHEN
PHYAG RDOR BA 'DI NYID

NI SKU TSE SNGON RABS DU MA NAS SPANGS RTOGS KYI YON TAN BSAM
GYIS MI KHYAB PA BRNYES

SHING, DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DNGOS KYIS RJES SU BZUNG BA, BSAM
GTAN LA MNYAM

PAR BZHAG PA NA SNGON GYI SKYE BA LNGA BRGYA TZAM GZIGS SHING,
SKYE BA BCU DRUG NI NYAL

BA'I RMI LAM DU'ANG DRAN ZHES ZHAL GYIS 'CHES PA, BZHUGS KHANG
GI PHYI NANG DANG GNAS

RI'I DBUS MTHA' SOGS SU SKYE BO GANG YOD KYIS SPYOD LAM RNAM
BZHI CI BYAS SGRIB MED DU

GZIGS PAS TSUL MIN BYED PA DAG LA ZHAL TA MDZAD PA, MTSAN TZAM
KHA TON DU BYED PA

DAG LA'ANG 'BYUNG PO'I 'TSE BA MI 'BYUNG BA SOGS CHE BA'I YON
TAN BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB

@212 PA DANG LDAN PA ZHIG STE, DE DANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO
GNYIS YI DAM GYI LUNG BSTAN

LTAR SKU TSE DU MA NAS GAR 'KHRUNGS, GAR BZHUGS THAMS CAD DU
LHAN CIG PAR BYON NAS

PHAN TSUN GCIG GI NGANG TSUL GCIG LA MNGA' BA BZHIN DU CHOS KYI
SKYES 'BUL RES DANG,

SMON LAM GYI NUS PA BSGRUB RES, ZAG PA MED PA'I MCHOD TSOGS KYI
BSNYEN BKUR

RES SOGS KYI 'BREL BA RMAD DU BYUNG BA GRUB PA ZHIG YIN PAR
SNANG LA, 'DI DUS KYANG

THOG MAR MJAL DU NYE BA'I TSE, MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA LA MGON
PO BYAMS PA 'BYON

GYIN YOD CES PA'I SKAD LHANG BA ZHIG SNYAN LAM DU BYUNG, DE DUS
RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA

RGYA MO RI 'PHRED LA PHEBS PA'I TSOD DU 'DUG CES GSUNGS, DE NAS
BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS

CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA'I DUS CHEN HOR ZLA DRUG PA'I TSES BZHI'I
NYIN BRA'O DGON PAR PHEBS

SKABS MKHAN CHEN GYIS BSU BA LA BYON PA NA RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL
DBYANGS 'OD KYI DRA BAS

MDZES PA ZHIG BYON PA GZIGS SHING, RJE NYID KYIS BLA MA MKHAN
CHEN PHYAG NA RDO RJE

DNGOS SU GZIGS PA DE'I BSUS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SHIN TU LDIR BA
BEEd'URYA LTAR DVANGS

PA LA SBRUL SNGO KHRAS SPRAS PA GZIGS 'DUG PA NI SNGAR LAS
KYANG GDUL BYA 'PHRIN LAS

RGYAS SU 'GRO BA'I BRDA' YIN PAR GSUNGS, DE NUB RANG MKHAN CHEN
LA BLA MA'I RNAL

'BYOR ZHIG GSAN PAS PHYAG NA RDO RJE RJE NYID LA DNGOS SU THIM
PA'I GZIGS SNANG DPON SLOB

GNYIS KA LA BYUNG, DE'I THO RENGS MKHAN CHEN GYI SNYAN LAM DU
BYAMS PA NYID LA BSLAB

BTUS ZHUS ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG NAS RJE NYID LA GSUNG BAR ZHUS PAS,
YI DAM LHAS DE SKAD

GSUNG NGAM ZHUS PAS GSUNGS LAGS ZHES GSUNG BA LTAR, MKHAN CHEN
GYIS GTZO

MDZAD PA'I LHO BRAG GI DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA BSLAB BTUS LA SOGS PA'I
CHOS MANG DU

GSUNGS, CHOS GSAN SKABS MKHAN CHEN GYI GZIGS SNANG LA RJE NYID
KYI DBU'I STENG NA RJE

@213 BTZUN BYAMS PA, SKU DPUNG G-YAS SU 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO,
G-YON DU LHA MO

DBYANGS CAN MA BZHUGS PA DANG, MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA DANG PHYAG
DRUG PAS GTZO

BYAS PA'I CHOS SKYONG MKHA' 'GRO BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PAS BSKOR
ZHING GZHAN YANG DKAR

PHYOGS LA DGA' BA'I LHA 'DRE'I TSOGS MANG PO CHOS NYAN ZHING
'DUG PA GZIGS PAS

SNGAR BAS LHAG PA'I MOS GUS THUN MONG MA YIN PA 'KHRUNGS, MKHAN
CHEN SKU RKYANG

LA'ANG GRVA LNGA'I DBANG LA SOGS PA'I DBANG RJES GNANG MANG DU
GNANG, RJE NYID KYIS

MKHAN CHEN PA'I DRUNG NAS GRUB CHEN NYID KYI BKA' 'BUM DANG
BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I

BKA' BAB GNYIS KYI KHRID, PHYAG NA RDO RJES GSUNGS PA'I GSANG BA
BSAM GYIS

MI KHYAB PA'I KHRID LUNG RJES GNANG, PHYAG RDOR SKU LNGA'I RJES
GNANG, ZHU LAN RDO

RJE'I 'PHRENG BA, ZHU LAN GCES PHRENG GI LUNG RJES GNANG, PHYAG
NA RDO RJE KHYUNG

LNGA'I DBANG DANG RJES GNANG, DREGS PA KUN 'DUL GYI DBANG, RTA
MGRIN DPA'

BO GCIG PA ZHAL GSUM PHYAG DRUG GI RJES GNANG SOGS GSAN, DE DAG
GI TSE DBANG

DANG RJES GNANG GI BYA BA RNAMS d'A KI MA RNAMS KYIS BYED PA
DANG, BLA MAS BDUD

RTZI KA P'A LA GANG RJE NYID LA PHUL BA DER LBUB GSUM SHAR BA'I
NANG DU 'JAM DBYANGS,

DZAM LHA, RNAM SRAS RNAMS RE RE NAS BZHUGS PA SOGS NGO MTSAR CAN
MANG DU BYUNG,

RJE'I 'KHOR BLA MA 'JAM DKAR BA SOGS DAG PA'I 'KHOR SLOB MANG BA
RNAMS LA'ANG

MKHAN CHEN GYIS CHOS LUNG MANG DU STZAL, RJE DPON SLOB THAMS CAD
LA MKHAN CHEN

NYID KYANG THUGS SHIN TU GUS PA 'KHRUNGS, DE'I STOBS KYIS BDAG
LA YON TAN BAG

RE SKYES PA BYUNG ZHES BKA' STZAL, RJE RIN PO CHER GDAMS NGAG
RNAMS STZAL DUS

PHAL CHE BAR MKHAN CHEN GYI DBU THOG TU SH'AKYA THUB PA, G-YAS
SU PHYAG NA RDO RJE,

@214 G-YON DU GDUGS DKAR MO RNAMS BYON GYIN 'DUG PA NI BAR CHAD
MI 'BYUNG BA'I

RTAGS SU 'DUG CES GSUNGS, DE NAS RE ZHIG NA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN
POS BDAG LA

LTA BA'I SKOR GYI THE TSOM 'GA' ZHIG MCHIS PAS, DE SEL BA LA
RGYA GAR SHING GI

RI NA RJE MI TRA CHEN PO BZHUGS PA'I DRUNG DU 'GRO 'DOD PAS DE
LA BAR CHAD MI 'BYUNG LAGS

SAM ZHUS PAR, BLA MAS YI DAM LA ZHU BAR MDZAD PA'I LAN DU, LTA
BA'I GNAD

RNAMS BDAG GI YI DAM LA ZHUS PAS CHOG PAR 'DUG  ,RGYA GAR LA BYON
NA KHYED

RANG RJE MI TRA DANG MJAL ZHING RDO RJE GDAN GYI MKHAN PO MDZAD
PA SOGS 'GRO PHAN NGO MTSAR

BA 'ONG NA'ANG, 'KHOR RNAMS KYI TSE'I BAR CHAD DU 'GYUR BA 'DUG
CING, DES

NA KHYED KYI 'KHOR 'DI RNAMS TSOGS SBYOR GYI LAM CHEN PO LA GNAS
PA SHA STAG TU 'DUG

PA 'DI DAG BAR CHAD KYI DBANG DU SONG NA MI LEGS SHING, KHYED
RANG YANG RGYA GAR DU

BZHUGS NAS TSUR MI 'BYON PAR SNANG BAS, DE BAS BOD PHYOGS 'DIR
BSTAN PA LA

PHAN PA'I THABS LA 'BAD NA 'GRUB PAS DE BZHIN DU MDZAD 'TSAL CES
SHOL 'DEBS PAR

MDZAD PA LTAR RJE NYID RANG LA'ANG RJE BTZUN GYIS GSUNGS PAS DE
BZHIN DU MDZAD PA'I

THUGS DGONGS GTAD, DE NAS LTA BA'I GNAD RNAMS YI DAM LA ZHUS PAS
BDUD

RTZI SMAN MCHOG CES PA'I GDAMS PA GNANG NAS 'DIS MA TI BHA DRA
SHRI'I THE TSOM SEL LO

GSUNGS, MA TI BHA DRA SHRI DE GANG LAGS ZHUS PAS, BLO BZANG
GRAGS PA SKYE

BA 'DI'I GONG PAndI TA'I SKYE BA BDUN DU SEMS CAN GYI DON BYAS,
SKYE BA 'DI GA'I

GONG DU'ANG KHA CHE GRI STAN DU PAndI TA MA TI BHA DRA SHRI BYA
BAR SKYES ZHES SOGS SNGAR GONG DU

BKOD PA LTAR GSUNGS SHING, GZHAN YANG RJE'I SKU 'PHRENG SNGA
PHYI SOGS YI DAM

LA MANG DU ZHU BAR MDZAD PA RNAMS KYI LUNG BSTAN PHAL CHE BA NI
GONG DU BKOD PA RNAMS KYIS

@215 SHES SO, ,DE NAS YI DAM GYI BKA' BZHIN RDZING PHYI'I JO BO
LA BSTOD PA TSANGS PA'I

COD PAn ZHES PA 'GRO BA SDUG BSNGAL GYIS MNAR BA RNAMS LA THUGS
RJES GZIGS PA'I

GSOL BTAB DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA'I RTAGS CHA TSANG BA DANG BCAS
PA PHUL NA,

DUS PHYIS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA'I GZHI MA 'DUL BA'I BSLAB
KHRIMS SHIN TU DAR BA'I

RTEN 'BREL YOD CES MKHAN CHEN NAS BSKUL BAR MDZAD PA MA ZAD, RJE
NYID RANG

LA'ANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYIS DE LTAR GSUNG GIS BSKUL
BA BZHIN,

BSTOD PA TSANGS PA'I COD PAn DON BZANG TSIG SBYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS
PA BKA' RTZOMS SU

MDZAD PA DE DANG, CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM, MKHAR SIL, LHUNG BZED,

GDING BA, CHU TSAGS SOGS DGE SBYONG GI YO BYAD TSANG MA DANG
BCAS TE RDZING PHYI'I

BYAMS PAR 'BUL BSKUR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU RTZA LNGA LA SKU
TSE'I BAR CHAD

ZHIG YONGS NYEN 'DUG PAS DE SEL BA'I PHYIR DU DPAL 'KHOR LO CHEN
PO BDUD RTZI THIG

PA'I BSKYED RDZOGS ZAB MO DE RJE NYID LA GNANG ZHING, DA LAN 'DI
NAS TZ'A RI DANG MNYAL

SOGS LA BYON NA BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHRAL DANG PHUGS SU
PHAN PA'I THABS KHYAD PAR

CAN 'GRUB PA 'DUG CING, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAS GRUB ZHIG GI SKU'I
SNANG BA DANG BSTAN

BCOS LA BRTEN NAS ZAB MO'I DON LA DPYIS PHYIN PA'I NGES PA RNYED
PA YOD PAS DE LTAR

MDZAD PA DANG, DE NAS RE ZHIG BAR DU 'CHAD NYAN KYANG MDZAD NA
'GRO PHAN CHE TSUL SOGS

YI DAM GYI LUNG BZHIN BKA' ZHIB PAR STZAL, GZHAN YANG DE 'DRA BA
MANG DU GSUNGS

PA LAS 'GA' ZHIG NI 'OG TU BRJOD 'GYUR GYIS GSAL ZHING, RJE NYID
NAS KYANG LHO BRAG

GI GRVA BU SLOB SKYE BO'I TSOGS DANG BCAS PA LA GSUNG CHOS KYANG
MANG DU GSUNG BA SOGS

LHO BRAG TU ZLA BA BDUN DU BZHUGS, MKHAN CHEN NAS RJE'I SKU BSOD
RGYAS PA'I PHYIR

@216 DU RNAM SRAS LA GTOR MA PHUL BAS DE'I NUB MO RDO RJE RNAM
'JOMS LA RNAM SRAS BZHIS

BSKOR BA ZHAL GZIGS SHING, DE'I SGRUB THABS LAS MTHA' DANG BCAS
PA GSUNGS PA

SOGS NGO MTSAR DAG PA'I SNANG BA 'BYAMS SU KLAS SO, ,LHO BRAG
MKHAN CHEN DANG MJAL

TSUL GYI LO RGYUS 'DI RNAMS NI, RJE'I DNGOS SLOB BSHES GNYEN KUN
DGA' BZANG

PO DANG, MDO KHAMS PA RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN MANG

PAS MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA MJAL BAR BYON NAS KHONG RNAMS KYIS
MKHAN CHEN LA BDAG

CAG GI BLA MA DAM PA TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS KHYED KYI MTSAN BRJOD
PA NA MTSUNGS MED NAM

MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN PA ZHES DANG, LHO BRAG RJE BTZUN PHYAG RDOR BA
'DI SKAD GSUNGS

ZHES BKA' DRIN CHE ZHING NGO MTSAR BA'I BSNGAGS PA MDZAD KYIN
'DUG PAS RJE TZONG KHA PA DANG

MJAL DUS NGO MTSAR BA'I GZIGS SNANG DANG, RTAGS RTEN 'BREL
'BYUNG TSUL RNAMS

GSUNG 'TSAL ZHES NAN CHER ZHUS PA'I NGOR MKHAN CHEN NYID NAS
BKA' STZAL TSUL GYI ZIN

BRIS NYUNG NGU YI GER 'KHOD PA ZHIG 'DUG PA LTAR BKOD PA'O, ,DES
NA TSUL 'DI

DAG NI BDAG NYID CHEN PO NANG PHAN TSUN GYI GSANG BA BSAM GYIS
MI KHYAB PA'I RNAM THAR KHO

NA LAS SO SKYE THA MAL PA'I MNGON SUM GYI SPYOD YUL DU NI GA LA
'GYUR ZHING, 'ON

KYANG RNAM PAR THAR PA YI GE'I LAM DU 'KHOD PA TZAM ZHIG RANG
CAG GI MTHONG THOS KYI YUL

DU GYUR PA 'DI YANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO YAB SRAS KYI THUGS RJE
DANG BYIN RLABS KYI MTHU

KHO NAR SHES PA'I SGO NAS DKON PA'I 'DU SHES CHES CHER BSKYED DE
SNYING THAG PAS GSOL

BA 'DEBS PA LA 'BAD PAR BYA'O, ,'DI SKOR GYI GZIGS SNANG LA SOGS
PA RNAMS RJE

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID NAS SU LA'ANG GSAL BAR BKA' MA STZAL
RUNG, RJE'I SLOB MA

'GA' ZHIG GIS MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BAR BKA' DRI ZHUS PA LAS
MKHAN CHEN NYID KYIS

@217 BKA' STZAL BAR SNANG STE, DE NYID KYI GSUNG LAS, YANG PHYIS
CHOS 'KHOR GYI DUS ZHIG  ,

RJE DKA' BZHI BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I SLOB MA BSHES GNYEN KUN
DGA' BZANG PO DANG,

YI DAM GYIS LUNG BSTAN PA'I SLOB MA MDO SMAD GSER LDAN PA DHVA
DZA BHA DRA SOGS DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN MANG PO BDAG MJAL DU BYON BYUNG BAS KHONG RNAMS KYI
GSUNG NAS, BDAG

CAG GI BLA MA DAM PA TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS KHYED KYI MTSAN BRJOD
PA NA MTSUNGS MED NAM

MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN PA ZHES PA DANG, LHO BRAG RJE BTZUN PHYAG RDOR
BA 'DI SKAD GSUNGS

ZHES SOGS BKA' DRIN CHE ZHING NGO MTSAR BA'I BSNGAGS PA MDZAD
KYIN 'DUG PAS, RJE

TZONG KHA PA DANG MJAL BA'I DUS NGO MTSAR BA'I GZIGS SNANG DANG
RTAGS RTEN 'BREL BYUNG

TSUL RNAMS GSUNG 'TSAL ZHES NAN CHER ZHUS PA'I NGOR RAGS RIM
ZHIG BRJOD NA, BDAG

GIS BDUN CU LON DUS BU MO DKAR MO ZHIG NA RE, BYAMS PAS BYIN
GYIS BRLABS

PA'I GANG ZAG ZHES SOGS GONG DU JI LTAR BKOD PA RNAMS GSUNGS
PA'I MJUG TU DKA'

BZHI PA DANG MJAL TSUL ZUR TZAM BKOD PA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS PAS, 'DI
DAG KYANG

RAGS BSDUS TZAM LAS MTHA' DAG NI YIN PAR MI SNANG STE, GSUNG DE
NYID LAS, RTAGS

NGO MTSAR CAN MANG ZHIG BYUNG STE BSHAD KYIS MI LANG ZHES GSUNGS
PAS SO, ,DES

NA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO DANG MJAL SKABS RJE BTZUN PHYAG RDOR BA
DGUNG LO BDUN CU YIN

PAR SNANG LA, GONG DU YI DAM GYIS LUNG BSTAN PA'I SLOB MA DHVA
DZA BHA DRA ZHES PA NI,

RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I DNGOS SLOB MKHYEN RAB NAM MKHA' DANG
MNYAM PA GUNG RU BA RGYAL

MTSAN BZANG PO YIN PAR SEMS SHING, DE LA RNAM DPYOD CAN DAG GI
DOGS PAR,

GUNG RU BA RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO 'KHRUNGS YUL KHAMS LHO RDZONG PA
YIN PA DANG, RNAM THAR

'DIR MDO KHAMS GSER LDAN PA DHVA DZA BHA DRA ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR
NA 'BRI CHU'I RGYUD DU

@218 'KHRUNGS BA ZHIG YIN 'DRA ZHES DOGS SLONG MDZAD KYANG, GSER
LDAN ZHES PA SA GZHI'I

MING LA'ANG 'JUG NA MDO KHAMS KYI SA CHAR 'KHRUNGS PA ZHES
GSUNGS RGYU LAS, CHU BO

GSER LDAN LA GSUNGS RGYU MIN 'DRA BA MA ZAD, RJE'I DNGOS SLOB
KHROD DU GUNG RU RGYAL

MTSAN BZANG PO MA YIN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO ZHES PA ZHIG AE
YOD MI SHES 'DRA YANG

DA DUNG DPYOD LDAN RNAMS KYIS DPYAD PAR MDZOD CIG  ,'DI SKOR LA
RJE RTOGS LDAN

PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SU, 'OL KHA
LA SOGS

PAR BYON NAS BYAMS PA GLING LA SOGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG LA ZHIG
GSO MDZAD, DE

NAS THUGS DGONGS LA KHA BA CAN NA DA LTA YOD PA'I BKA' BSTAN
BCOS MAN NGAG DANG

BCAS PA LEGS PAR NYAN CING KHONG DU CHUD NAS, DA DUNG THE TSOM
SOM NYI LA SOGS

PA'I SGRO 'DOGS GCOD PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU DBU MA DANG SNGAGS
KYI SKOR, BYE

BRAG TU GSANG 'DUS DANG BDE MCHOG GI SKOR RNAMS GTAN LA 'BEBS
PA'I CHED DU RGYA GAR

DU BYON NAS, AO TAN NA LENDRA LA SOGS PA RNAMS SU KLU'I BYANG
CHUB SOGS LA GTUGS

PAR DGOGS TE DPON SLOB BCU GSUM TZAM RTAGS DANG RMI LAM SOGS LA
DPYAD NAS,

SMON LAM DANG RTEN 'BREL GCIG TU BSGRIGS TE MNYAL NAS LHO BRAG
LA LAM GTOD, RGYA

GAR SHING GI RI NAS LAM BYAS GRUB THOB MI TRA DZO KI DANG MJAL
NAS MA GHA DHAR 'BYON

DGONGS TE LHO BRAG TU GSHEGS, GRUB CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA NAM MKHA'
RGYAL MTSAN DANG MJAL

NAS RGYA GAR DU BYON NA RJE RANG RIG PA'I GNAS BCO BRGYAD LA
MKHAS PA'I PAntI TA RDO RJE

GDAN GYI MKHAN PO BYED PA ZHIG TU 'GYUR NA'ANG SKU TSE THUNG BAS
SLOB MA RNAMS LA PHAN

DKA', DE BAS BOD DU BZHUGS NAS 'JAM DBYANGS LA GSOL BA THOB
DANG, MYUR

DU RJES SU 'DZIN PA 'DUG GSUNGS NAS KHONG RANG LA MNGA' BA'I
LUNG MAN NGAG RNAMS DANG,

@219 KHYAD PAR DU MTSAN NYID LAM RIM LA SOGS PA BKA' GDAMS KYI
CHOS SKOR RNAMS DANG,

PHYAG RDOR GYI SGRUB SKOR, DE'I RDZOGS RIM LA SOGS NYAMS KHRID
DU MDZAD, DE NAS

MTSUR MNYAL DU BYON, ZHES GSUNGS SNANG STE, DON DU RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA NI DAM

CHOS 'TSOL BA LA NGOMS PA MED PA'I BRTZON 'GRUS THUGS RGYUD LA
RANG CHAS SU MNGA'

BA'I STOBS KYIS SNGAR BOD DU THOS SGOM DE TZAM MDZAD PA DE DAG
GIS KYANG THUGS MA TSIM

PAR NGES PAR RGYA GAR RANG DU 'BYON DGONGS PA ZHIG SNGAR NAS
THUS LA RGYUN CHAGS SU

YOD PA LTAR, 'DI DUS KYANG MKHAN CHEN NAS LHO BRAG TU 'BYON DGOS
GSUNG BA BZHIN

THOG MAR LHO BRAG TU BYON, DE NAS MKHAN CHEN GYIS SHOL 'DEBS MA
MDZAD PAR BKA'

'KHROL NA LAM BSKYANGS TE NGES PAR RGYA GAR DU 'BYON PA ZHIG YIN
PAR SNANG NGO, ,

GONG DU RJE PHYAG RDOR BA DANG MJAL SKABS GZIGS SNANG SOGS KYI
LO RGYUS 'DI DAG

GSANG BA'I RNAM THAR SOGS SU'ANG ZUR TZAM LAS 'GOD PAR MA GNANG
ZHING, RJE

KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS
CHUNG BAR 'GA'

ZHIG TZAM ZHIG 'GOD PAR MDZAD KYANG MTHA' DAG GSAL BAR MA 'KHOD
'DUG PA RJE NYID

BKA' DOGS PA'I DBANG GIS YIN PAR SNANG RUNG, LO RGYUS 'DI DAG
DPE RGYUN

YANG SHIN TU DKON PA BCAS NAM ZHIG NAS 'OG GI GTER LTAR GYUR
DOGS PAS BDAG

GIS RANG GZHAN GYI DAD PA'I GSOS KHO NAR BSAMS NAS RANG GI MIG
LAM DU GANG GYUR

PA RNAMS GSAL BAR BKOD PA LAGS NA, BLA MA LHA DANG d'A KI SRUNG
MAR BCAS PAS

SGRIB PA DANG NYES PAR MI 'GYUR BAR BYIN GYIS BRLAB TU GSOL LO,
,DES NA

TSUL 'DI DAG LA ZHIB TU BSAMS NA BDAG NYID CHEN PO YAB SRAS 'DI
RNAMS NGES PA'I

DON DU RIGS GSUM LA SOGS PA RGYAL KUN 'DUS PA'I NGO BO YIN PAR
LUNG RIG GTAN

@220 TSIGS GZHAN GYIS SGRUB PA LA LTOS MI DGOS PA NYID DO, ,DE
NAS MKHAN CHEN GYI

BKA' BZHIN RGYA GAR DU 'BYON RGYU SHOL NAS SLAR YANG MNYAL DU
BYON, MNYAL NAS

LO ROR PHEBS TE LO RO STONG STAG TU ZLA BA LNGA TZAM BZHUGS NAS
THUGS DAM LA GCIG

TU 'GRUS PAR MDZAD, DER DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO BRIN LAS
PAS MDZAD

PA'I BSTAN RIM CHEN MO GDAN DRANGS BYUNG BA LA BSU BA MDZAD
CING, MCHOD PA PHUL

NAS ZHIB TU GZIGS PAS RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KYI DGONGS DON MTHA'
DAG GANG ZAG

GCIG GIS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL DANG, LAM GYI NGO BO, GRANGS NGES GO
RIM

SOGS SHING RTA CHEN PO GNYIS KYI BZHED PA DANG LHAG PAR MTHUN
PAS THUGS NGES CHEN PO

'KHRUNGS SHING, DER BSTAN RIM TSAR GCIG GSUNGS, MNYAL DU BYON
PA'I

SNGA PHYI 'DI DAG ZHIG LA SNGAR GONG DU 'KHRUNGS RABS 'CHAD PA'I
SKABS SU ZUR TZAM SMOS

PA LTAR, MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO DANG MJAL 'PHRAD MDZAD
PAR SNANG LA 'DI

SKOR RNAM THAR CHEN MOR GSAL KHA MA 'KHOD RUNG RNAM THAR ZUR PA
GZHAN DAG TU GSAL

ZHING, MJAL DUS SNGA PHYI'I SKOR RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS
MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM

THAR RAS BRIS 'BRI TSUL GYI GO RIM LTAR NA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN
DANG MJAL 'PHRAD GRUB NAS

SLAR MNYAL DANG LO ROR BYON, DGE BSHES BRIN LAS PA'I BSTAN RIM
GZIGS PA

DANG, BSTAN RIM GSUNG TSUL RNAMS BKAD PA'I RJES SU, G-YON DANG
PO

MNYAL BRAG GOR DU MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO LA MNGON DBU
SOGS GYI LUNG DANG,

SHAR BA'I LAM RIM, BE BUM SNGON PO RTZA 'GREL, SPYOD 'JUG  ,BLO
SBYONG

SOGS BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA MANG PO
RDZOGS PAR GSAN,

ZHES 'BYUNG BA'I GO RIM LTAR NA LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN DANG MJAL
RJES SLAR MNYAL DU... 

@221 PHEBS NAS MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS PA DANG THOG MAR MJAL BA
LAS DE'I GONG DU MA MJAL

BA 'DRA ZHIG SNANG RUNG, 'JAM DBYANGS NYI MA BSTAN PA RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I

RJE'I RNAM THAR SKAL LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG LTAR NA,
LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN

DANG MA MJAL GONG DU MNYAL DU MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO
DANG MJAL ZHING,

MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS PA DE LHO BRAG PHYAG RDOR BA'I BLA MA YIN
PAR SNANG BAS DE LA LHO BRAG

PHYAG RDOR BA'I SKU CHE BA'I YON TAN RNAMS BKA' 'DRI MDZAD PAS
THUGS NGES CHER GYUR

NAS LHO BRAG TU BYON PA DANG, LHO BRAG NAS MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR
BAS, BDE

MCHOG PHO BRANG BRAG GOR DU ZHES SOGS KYIS MNYOS STON CHOS 'BAR
DANG MTSO SNA PA

SOGS LA BSNGAGS PA MDZAD TSUL DANG, SLAR YANG RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PAS BRAG

GOR DU PHEBS PA SOGS KYI LO RGYUS GSAL BAR SNANG BAS, DES NA
RNAM THAR RAS

BRIS KYI SKABS SU RI MO'I 'JUG PA BDE PHYIR MJAL THENGS SNGA
PHYI GNYIS KA PHYOGS

GCIG TU BSDOMS NAS 'GOD PAR MDZAD PA YIN 'DUG PA LAS, GZHAN LHO
BRAG

MKHAN CHEN DANG MA MJAL GONG PHEBS LAM MNYAL BRGYUD NAS BYON
SKABS MKHAN CHEN CHOS

SKYABS DANG THOG MAR MJAL BA YIN PAR SNANG STE, DE DAG GI LO
RGYUS RNAM THAR SKAL

LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG LTAR ZUR TZAM 'GOD NA, DE
YANG MKHAN CHEN CHOS

SKYABS PAS BRAG GOR GYI DBEN GNAS RIN CHEN GLING DU PHYIR MI
LDOG GI RTAGS MA THOB PAR

THEM PA 'DI LAS MI 'DA' ZHES SKU MTSAMS LA BZHUGS SKABS, RJE
NYID LHO BRAG

TU 'BYON PA'I LAM ZHOR MNYAL DU MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS PA MJAL
BAR BYON PAS,

MKHAN CHEN GYI MNAL LAM DU AA TI SHA BYON TSUL DANG, SANG NYIN
RJE DANG MJAL NAS

MDO SNGAGS KYI GSUNG GLENG MDZAD PAR AA TI SHA DNGOS SU GZIGS
TSUL SOGS GONG DU

@222 BRJOD ZIN PA LTAR DANG, DE NAS MKHAN CHEN GYIS RJE NYID LA
GOS KHA GSUM 'BREL

ZHIG PHUL NAS CHOS ZHU BAR RTZOM PA NA RJE'I ZHAL NAS, KHYOD NYI
MA LTA BU'I DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN LA BDAG SRIN BU ME 'KHYER LTA BUS CHOS 'CHAD PAR
RNGO MI THOGS, CIS

KYANG THUGS BZHED MDZAD NA RNAL 'BYOR PA RTEN 'BREL LA MNGA'
BRNYES PAS SNGON LA MKHAN

CHEN PAS BDAG LA GNANG BAR ZHU ZHES NAN CHER MDZAD PAS, MKHAN
CHEN GYIS RJE

RIN PO CHE LA LAM SGRON GYI 'GREL PA MTSO SNA BA'I LAM RIM TSANG
BAR GSUNGS,

DE'I DUS RJE'I ZHAL NAS, NGA DE'I TSE DER GYUR TO, ,ZHES GSUNGS
TE, DE

NI RJE NYID SNGAR KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA'I SKYE BA BZHES PAR
ZHAL GYIS 'CHES PAR SNANG,

RJE RIN PO CHE NAS MKHAN CHEN PA LA AA TI SHA'I GDAMS PA TSANG
BAR GSUNGS SHING,

GZHAN YANG GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RIM LNGA'I LAM GYI GNAD RNAMS
DANG, KLU SGRUB

YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS PA'I GNAD SOGS MDO RGYUD KYI GNAD DON MANG
DU GSUNGS,

YANG MKHAN CHEN PAS RJE NYID LA GRO LUNG PA'I BSTAN RIM DANG
MTSO tIK SOGS GSUNGS,

DE SKABS RJE'I ZHAL NAS MKHAN CHEN PA LA, KHYOD KYI SLOB MA GRUB
CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA

DE BLA MA GANG LA THUG ,SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI YON TAN JI LTA BU
LAGS ZHUS PAS, BLA MA

DANG PO MKHAN CHEN RGYAL SRAS BZANG PO LA THUG ,DE LA SPYAN RAS
GZIGS KYI GSUNG GI

SNANG BA RGYUN CHAD MED, DE RJES RGYAL BA'I RGYAL TSAB MON GRVA
PA TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS LA

THUG ,DE LA MNGON SHES THOGS PA MED, MDO RGYUD KUN LA MKHAS
SHING KHYAD PAR

MNGON PA'I SDE SNOD LA MKHAS PA DBYIG GNYEN DANG MTSUNGS, PHYAG
NA RDO RJE KHYUNG LNGA'I

GSUNG GI SNANG BA RGYUN CHAD MED, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DE NYID
LA YON TAN GANG

YOD KHYED RANG GIS DGONGS PA DE LTAR LAGS, GZHAN YANG RGYA MA
RIN PO CHE DANG RI

@223 ZAN RNGOG PA RNAMS LA THUG ,GRUB CHEN PA KHO RANG SLOB DPON
A'ARYA DE WA DANG, SANGS

RGYAS YE SHES ZHABS KYI SPRUL PAR PHYAG NA RDO RJES MKHAN CHEN
MON GRVA PA LA GSUNGS TSUL

SOGS BKA' STZAL PAS RJE NYID MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA LA THUGS
NGES CHE BAR 'KHRUNGS

DE NAS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LHO BRAG TU BYON, MKHAN CHEN CHOS
SKYABS PA DE DE SNGON THANG

SAG PA'I GZHIR LTA BA LA GOM PA SHAS CHER YOD PAS, RJES GSUNGS
PA'I DBU

MA'I LTA BA LA KHRID DKA' BAR BYUNG NAS RJE BTZUN MI G-YO MGON
LA, RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS

PA'I LTA BA 'DI GANG LAGS ZHUS PAS, THUB PA SANGS RGYAS LA
'KHRUL PA MED, LTA

BA RNAM DAG MTHAR THUG PA DE RANG YIN, BLA MED RDO RJE THEG PA'I
SKABS SU'ANG LTA BA

RNAM DAG DE LAS MA 'DAS PAS DE LA GTZO BOR GYIS GSUNGS, 'O NA,
MTSO

SNA PA'I LTA BA DE LTAR LAGS SAM ZHUS PAS, DE YANG KLU SGRUB KYI
LTA BA SKYE BA'I PHYIR

YIN, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NOR BZANG DANG BLO BZANG GRAGS PA LA
DBYER MED CES

GSUNGS PAS DE PHYIN CHAD MKHAN CHEN PAS KYANG RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I LTA BA LA THUGS

DAM GTZO BOR MDZAD PAS PHYIR MI LDOG PA'I RTAGS RNAMS KYANG RING
MIN NYID DU THOB BO, ,

RJE NYID LHO BRAG PHYAG RDOR BA DANG MJAL TSUL GONG DU GSAL BA
LTAR NAS, DE SKABS

GRUB CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA'I ZHAL NAS, BDE MCHOG PHO BRANG BRAG GOR
DU, ,'KHOR

LO BDE MCHOG LA WA PA, ,DE YI RNAM 'PHRUL CHOS 'BAR ZHES, ,THUB
DBANG

DE YI ZHABS LA 'DUD, ,SLAR YANG 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI ,RNAM
'PHRUL

KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA PA, ,RGYAL BA'I SRAS KYI THU BO LA, ,DPAL
LDAN 'KHOR

LO BDE MCHOG DANG, ,DBYER MED RTZA BA'I BLA MA MCHOG ,KUN MKHYEN
MON GRA'I

ZHABS LA 'DUD, ,'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG GI ,SKU GSUNG
THUGS

@224 KYIS MNGON SUM DU, ,RJES GZUNG BYIN RLABS THEG MCHOG STON,
,RGYAL SRAS BZANG

PO'I ZHABS LA 'DUD, ,CES SOGS DANG, MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS PA'I
CHE BA'I

YON TAN SOGS GSUNGS, DE NAS SLAR YANG RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
BRAG GOR DU

PHEBS SKABS BRAG GOR NAS RGYANG GRAGS GCIG TU KHYAB PAR TSUL
KHRIMS KYI DRI NGAD BSAM

GYIS MI KHYAB PA ZHIG SHANGS KYI DBANG POR SIM PAS SU ZHIG GI
YIN NAM DGONGS PA

'KHRUNGS, DE DUS MKHAN CHEN SANG SHER BA YANG GNAS DER BZHUGS
YOD PAS RJE

NYID LA CHOS BKA' STZOL PAR GSOL BA BTAB PA BZHIN SANG SHER BA
DPON SLOB RNAMS LA

ZLA BA GCIG GI BAR DU SNGA DRO PHYI DRO SROD GSUM LA CHOS THUN
RE RE MDZAD NAS LAM SGRON

SOGS DANG, KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS DON GYI BKA' LUNG DANG
RJES GNANG SOGS

MANG DU GNANG, DE MTSAMS NAS KUN MKHYEN CHOS SKYABS PAS NYIN
GCIG NYE GNAS

LA DE RING RTA SGA RGYOB CIG ,RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA GDAN 'DREN
PA LA RTA RGYUG BYED PA

YIN GSUNGS CHIBS PA CHIBS TE RJE DPON SLOB GDAN 'DREN LA BYON PA
BZHIN, MKHAN

CHEN SANG SHER BAS RJE'I PHYAG PHYI MDZAD NAS RIN CHEN GLING DU
PHEBS, DUS DER RJE'I

ZHAL NAS MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS PA LA KHYED NYID THUGS DAM MTHAR
PHYIN TE PHYIR MI LDOG

PA'I RTAGS THOB PA THUGS LA BTAGS ZHES GSUNGS PAS, KUN MKHYEN
CHOS SKYABS

PA DANG MKHAN CHEN SANG SHER BA SOGS RJE TZONG KHA PA LA GZHAN
RGYUD RTOGS PA'I MNGON

MKHYEN THOGS MED DU 'DUG DGONGS THUGS DAD CHES CHER SKYES, DE
SKABS SKYE BO

THA MAL PA GZHAN GYIS KYANG KUN MKHYEN CHOS SKYABS PAS PHYIR MI
LDOG GI RTAGS THOB PA

YIN 'DUG CES GLENG BA BYUNG 'DUG ,MKHAN CHEN SANG SHER BA CHOS
GRVA LA BYON PA NA

SNGAR GYI TSUL KHRIMS KYI NGAD PA DE YAL SONG BAS RJE NYID NAS
DRI NGAD BZANG PO DE MKHAN CHEN

@225 SANG SHER BA'I YIN PAR DGONGS NAS MOS GUS 'KHRUNGS TE 'DI
LTAR, RJE BTZUN MKHA'

'GROS DNGOS SU BYIN RLABS NAS, ,TSUL KHRIMS DRI BZANG NGAD KYIS
NANG KHYAB PAS, ,SKAL

LDAN GDUL BYA'I NYON MONGS GDUNG BA SEL, ,TSUL KHRIMS MTHAR
PHYIN ZHABS LA PHYAG

'TSAL LO, ,ZHES BSTOD BSNGAGS MDZAD PAR GRAGS SO, ,DES NA KUN
MKHYEN CHOS SKYABS

PAS PHYIR MI LDOG GI RTAGS MNYES NAS RJE NYID SLAR BRAG GOR DU
PHEBS PA'I DUS 'DI

NI LHO BRAG NAS BYON TE LO RO STONG STAG TU ZLA BA LNGA BZHUGS
NAS SLAR MNYAL DU PHEBS

PA'I DUS DER YIN PAR SEMS LA, LAR NAS RJE NYID SNGAR MNYOS STON
CHOS 'BAR DANG,

KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BAR SKYE BA BZHES PA'I THUGS BSKYED DANG
'PHRIN LAS KYI PHYI RJES SKYONG

BAR MNYAL PHYOGS SU BSTAN 'GRO'I DON MDZAD NAS YUN RING TZAM
BZHUGS PA YIN

'DUG PAS, KUN MKHYEN CHOS SKYABS PA SOGS LAN 'DI GNYIS SU MA ZAD
YANG

YANG DU MJAL 'PHRAD MDZAD PA GOR MA CHAG GO ,DE NAS DGUNG LO
BZHI BCU PA ME BYI LO

MNYAL SMAD GSAL RJE GANGS KYI YAR 'DREN DGON PAR DBYAR THOG GCIG
RJE BTZUN 'JAM

DBYANGS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS PA SOGS THUGS DAM LA BRTZON ZHING
BZHUGS PA'I TSE, RJE

BTZUN GYI ZHAL NAS RGYA GAR GYI PAndI TA GCIG GI GZHUNG LA BRTEN
NAS RING POR MI THOGS

PAR DBU MA'I LTA BA RTOGS PAR 'GYUR ZHES LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN GYI
GSUNG DANG MTHUN PA'I

LUNG BSTAN STZAL, DE'I TSE DPON SLOB RNAMS MTHUN RKYEN DKON PAR
BYUNG BA LA RNAM

THOS SRAS LA GTOR MA PHUL DGOS PA'I MTSAN MAR DGONGS NAS GTOR MA
PHUL BAS MYUR

DU MTHUN RKYEN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA LHAG DANG BCAS PA BYUNG ZHING
RNAM SRAS KYI ZHAL YANG

GZIGS, DE NAS LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN GYI BKA' BZHIN TZA RA'I GNAS
GZIGS LA 'BYON

PAR DGONGS TE DPON SLOB SUM CU LHAG TZAM GYIS MNYAL NAS TZA RI
MA CHEN LA BYON,

@226 DER ZHAG 'GA' BZHUGS NAS RI PA RNAMS LA MANG JA GNANG SBYIN
DANG BCAS PA MDZAD, RI

KHROD GZIGS SHING BDE MCHOG GI BDAG 'JUG LA SOGS PA GNANG, NGO
MTSAR BA'I

LTAS MANG DU BYUNG ZHES RNAM THAR DU 'KHOD KYANG GSAL CHA 'GOD
PA MA GNANG 'DUG RUNG,

DON DU DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI LHA TSOGS, GNAS GSUM GYI d'A
KI CHOS SRUNG

LA SOGS PA DU MA ZHIG GI ZHAL MNGON SUM DU GZIGS PA GDON MI ZA
BA NYID DU MNGON,

DE NAS TZ'A RI'I ZHABS SKOR LA 'BYON PA'I LA KHA ZHIG NAS MAR
PHEBS DUS GNAS 'DIR

YANG NANG MCHOD DANG BCAS PA'I TSOGS 'KHOR RANG BYED PA MI 'ONG
DGONGS PA ZHIG

THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS PAS, DE MA KHAD NAS ZHABS KYI KHOL BU ZHIG LA
BLO BUR DU TSER

MA ZUG PA 'DRA BA'I TSA ZUG DANG SNYUNG ZUG CHEN PO RANG YOD PA,
SKRANG PA NAG PO CHEN

PO DANG BCAS PA ZHIG BYUNG BA LA SKABS SHIG NAS NANG MCHOD DANG
BCAS PA'I BDE MCHOG

GI TSOGS 'KHOR ZHIG MDZAD PAS TSOGS 'KHOR MA GROL BA NAS SNYUN
ZUG MED PAR DE MA

THAG GZHI MED DU DVANGS SO, ,'DI LA TZ'A RI BA RNAMS KYI GNAS
BSHAD DU, DE

SKABS RJE'I ZHABS LA SNYUN GZHI BYUNG BAR MA MKHA' 'GRO RNAMS
KYIS ZHAL DNGOS SU BSTAN

NAS, GNAS 'DI 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I DKYIL
'KHOR YIN

PAS NANG MCHOD 'BUL BAR MDZAD DGOS ZHUS PA LA BRTEN NAS NANG
MCHOD DANG BCAS PA'I

TSOGS 'KHOR MDZAD TSUL DANG, YANG MKHA' 'GRO MA RNAMS KYIS, GNAS

DAG PA MKHA' SPYOD DPAL GYI TZ'A RI TRA, ,BKA' BRGYUD BLA MA
RNAMS DANG YI DAM

LHA; ;MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYONG RNAMS LA GSOL BA THOB, ,CES GSUNGS
PA LA RJE'I

ZHAL NAS, LAS NGAN SDIG SGRIB DAG PAR BYIN GYIS RLOBS, ,RKYEN
NGAN BAR CHAD ZHI BAR

MDZAD PA DANG, ,MCHOG DANG THUN MONG DNGOS GRUB STZAL DU GSOL,
,ZHES THUGS SMON

@227 MDZAD PAS SNYUN LAS DVANGS TSUL DANG, TSIG 'DI'I GSOL BA
THOB CES PA GSOL BA

'DEBS ZHES PA'I TSIG TU BSGYUR NAS TSIG RKANG DRUG PO DENG SANG
TZA RI'I GNAS SKOR BA

RNAMS KYIS 'UR 'DON DU BYED PA YANG DE DUS NAS BYUNG BA YIN CES
GLENG ZHING, DE

SKABS ZHABS SNYUNG NAS PHUG PA ZHIG TU BZHUGS PA LA DENG SANG
TZONG KHA PHUG TU GRAGS

SHING, DE'I NANG RJE'I SNANG BRNYAN ZHIG KYANG BRIS TE SNANG LA,
GZHAN YANG LO

RGYUS KHA SHAS 'DUG KYANG KHUNGS DAG MIN CHA MA RTOGS PAS MA
BRIS SHING, GANG

LTAR YANG DUS GSUM DNGOS SU MKHYEN PA'I LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN GYIS
GNAS 'DIR

'BYON PAR BSKUL BA LA DGOS PA KHYAD PAR CAN DU MA ZHIG YOD NGES
PAS, GNAS

'DIR BYON NAS LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI RTOGS PA MANG PO ZHIG THUGS
RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS

SHING BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA YONGS LA SMAN PA'I RTEN 'BREL GYI
SGO DU MA ZHIG 'GRIG PAR NI

GOR MA CHAG STE, CI'I PHYIR NA, DE LTAR TZA RI'I GNAS GZIGS GRUB

NAS MNYAL DU BYON PA'I LAM BAR MO LA ZHES PA'I LA RTZAR ZHAG
BZHUGS MDZAD PA'I NUB

MO; RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON SKU SHIN TU CHE BA LHUN PO LTAR MNGON
PAR BRJID PA

ZHIG GIS, RIGS KYI BU KHYOD KYIS SANGS RGYAS 'JIG RTEN DU BYON
PA 'DRA BA ZHIG

'ONG BA SHES PAR BYOS SHIG CES SENGGE'I SGRAS DBUGS DBYUNG
ZHING, SPRO BA BSKYED

PAR MDZAD PA DNGOS SU BYUNG BA'I PHYIR, DE LA MKHAS GRUB THAMS
CAD MKHYEN PAS,

THUB BSTAN PADMO'I TSAL LA 'JIG RTEN 'DIR, ,KHYOD NI RGYAL BA'I
NYI MA JI BZHIN ZHES, ,

MI PHAM MGON POS KHYOD LA MNGON SUM DU, ,DBUGS DBYUNG MCHOG TU
BSNGAGS

LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES DANG, 'DI'I THAD KYI GSANG BA'I RNAM
THAR RIN

CHEN SNYE MA LAS, DE BAS NA SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RJE BTZUN BLA
MA 'DI NI RGYAL BA'I

@228 BSTAN PA LA RGYAL BA NYID DANG KHYAD PAR MA MCHIS PA'I TSIG
GIS BSNGAGS PA NI RANG BZHIN

BRJOD PA STE, SHES LDAN DAG GIS STON PA NYID DANG MTSUNGS PAR
CI'I PHYIR BLTA BAR

MI BYA, ZHES GSUNGS SHING, GSANG RNAM TSIGS BCAD MAR GZIGS SNANG

'DI DANG SNGA PHYIR BYAMS PA'I GZIGS SNANG BYUNG BA RNAMS GCIG
TU BSGRIL NAS,

G-YAS G-YON PHYAG GIS CHOS 'CHAD PHYAG RGYA CAN, ,BZANG PO'I
BZHUGS STANGS MDZAD

PA'I BYAMS MGON GYIS, ,SLAR YANG STOBS BCU MNGA' BA GSHEGS PA
BZHIN, ,

RGYAL BA'I MDZAD PA SGRUB PAR LUNG BSTAN PA, ,DPAL LDAN + ZHES
GSUNGS SO,,

TSUL 'DI DAG DANG GONG DU LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LA THOG MAR YI DAM
GYIS LUNG BSTAN PA

RNAMS KYI DBANG DU NA RJE NYID BYAMS PA'I SPRUL PAR YANG NGES PA
STE, LHO BRAG GRUB

CHEN GYI GSUNG LAS, MA 'ONGS 'GRO BA'I DED DPON BYAMS MGON GYIS,
,

SNYIGS DUS 'GRO LA THUGS RJES NYER DGONGS NAS, ,GANGS CAN DPAL
DU BYON PA'I

TZONG KHA PA, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I ZHABS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES
GSUNGS

PAS SO, ,DE NAS RE ZHIG MNYAL SMAD SENGGE RDZONG DU BZHUGS TE
THUGS DAM GYI KHONGS

NAS DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RDZOGS RIM YAN LAG DRUG LA SOGS PA'I
LAM GYI

GNAD RNAMS LA DPYAD PA PHUL PHYIN DU MDZAD PAS MI 'KHRUL BA'I
NGES PA 'KHRUNGS SHING,

'CHUG MED KYI GZER THABS TE MI 'JIGS PA'I SPOBS PA BRNYES, DE'I
TSE BCOM

LDAN 'DAS DUS KYI 'KHOR LO DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SKU'I GZIGS SNANG
NAR MAR 'ONG ZHING,

NUB GCIG GI TSE DE'I ZHAL NAS, KHYOD KYIS DUS KYI 'KHOR LO 'DI
LA RGYAL PO ZLA

BA BZANG PO BYON PA 'DRA BA ZHIG 'ONG BA YOD DO, ,ZHES GSUNG BA
BYUNG DE LA RJE NYID

KYI BKA' LAS, SNGON CHAD DUS 'KHOR LA BSHAD PAS PHAN THOGS 'JIGS
RUNG TZAM

@229 ZHIG MA BYUNG, RANG RGYUD LA GO BA RNAM PAR DAG PA SKYES PA
LA DGONGS PA YIN 'ONG

ZHES SBAS PA'I TSUL DU BKA' STZAL ZHING, DON 'DI GSANG RNAM GSOL
'DEBS

LAS, RGYUD KYI MTHAR THUG DPAL LDAN DUS 'KHOR LO'I, ,YAN LAG
DRUG

GI GNAD RNAMS DGONGS PA NA, ,BCOM LDAN DUS KYI 'KHOR LO MNGON
SUM GZIGS, ,

ZLA BA BZANG PO 'DRA BAR LUNG BSTAN PA, ,DPAL LDAN ZHES GSUNGS
SO, ,DER

BZHUGS SKABS DBYANGS CAN MA'I GSUNG GIS DGUNG LO LNGA BCU RTZA
BDUN THUB, DE

BAR RANG GZHAN GYI DON DPAG TU MED PA 'GRUB CES GSUNGS PA LA,
RJE BTZUN

RNAM PAR RGYAL MA SOGS LA GSOL BA BTAB CING BSNYEN SGRUB MANG DU
BYAS PAS DE LAS

RING ZHIG THUB PAR MI 'GYUR RAM ZHUS PAS, DE DAG PHAL CHE BA
SNGON GYI SMON LAM

GYI SHUGS DANG, CHOS RAB TU RNAM 'BYED KYI SHES RAB LA THUGS
'DUN CHES PA

LA SOGS PA'I DBANG GIS BLO GROS GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BA'I RGYU
'BA' ZHIG TU SONG

BAS SKU TSE LA DE TZAM DU PHAN PA MA BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS PA ZHIG
BYUNG, BLA MA RTOGS

LDAN PA LA RJE BTZUN GYIS GSUNG BAR, DA PHYIN CHAD SKU TSE'I BAR
CHAD LA SGOS SU

DMIGS PA'I BZLOG THABS DANG, SKU TSE BSRINGS PA'I PHYI NANG GI
RTEN 'BREL LEGS

PAR BSGRIGS NA DKA' SE BA ZHIG LA BZLOG PAR NUS SO, ,ZHES GSUNGS
PA'I RGYU

MTSAN DE RNAMS GZHAN LA NI MA BSHAD, NGED RANG GIS ZHE ZON BYAS
NAS THABS MANG

DU BGYIS PA YIN NA'ANG LO LNGA BCU RTZA BZHI'I BAR DU BZLOG PA'I
MTSAN MA MA RNYED CES

GRAGS SENG BA LA GSUNGS SHING, NGA BZHI NAS NGA BRGYAD BAR DU
BZLOG THABS

MDZAD TSUL RNAMS NI 'OG TU GSAL LO, ,DE YANG GTZO BOR RJE THAMS
CAD MKHYEN

PA NYID LA RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU DANG GSUNG GI SNANG BA
RGYUN MI CHAD DU 'BYUNG BAR

@230 MA ZAD, BLA MA RTOGS LDAN PA CHEN PO 'DI LA YANG RJE BTZUN
GYI SKU GSUNG GI SNANG BA

BYUNG BA LA GONG DU SMOS PA LTAR RJE NYID NAS BRTAG DPYAD LAN DU
MAR MDZAD PAR 'KHRUL

MED DU THUGS CHES SHING, PHRAL GYI CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BA DANG,
LHAG PAR

CHOS KYI GO YUL GNAD CHE BA RNAMS DRI GTUGS MDZAD PA NA 'DI DANG
'DI BZHIN GYIS DANG,

LO ZLA TSES GRANGS 'DI TSUN CHAD LA RTOGS PA 'ONG GSUNG BA RNAMS
JI LTA BA BZHIN DU BYUNG

BAS SNGON GYI BAG CHAGS 'JOG LUGS KYI PHYOGS NAS BYIN RLABS 'JUG
PAR SLA BA ZHIG

YIN PAR SNANG ZHES RJE NYID KYIS BKA' STZAL ZHING, 'KHOR SLOB
KYI KHROD NAS RJE

BTZUN GYI SKU DANG GSUNG GI SNANG BA BYUNG BA 'GA' ZHIG YOD PA'I
NANG NAS RTOGS LDAN PA

'GRAN GYI ZLA MED YIN TE, RJE NYID NAS BLA MA DBU MA PA LA ZHU
YIG GNANG BA'I NANG

DU'ANG, KHYED KYI RJE BTZUN GYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS KYIS NGED LA
PHAN PA SHIN TU CHE,

'KHOR GYI GSEB TU RJE BTZUN KYI SKU DANG GSUNG GI SNANG BA 'GA'
ZHIG LA BYUNG BA'I NANG NAS

GCIG LA GSUNG GANG BYON NGES DON DU 'BYON PA ZHIG BYUNG GSUNG BA
DE RJE BTZUN DAM PA

RTOGS LDAN PA YIN NO, ,ZHES PA 'DI DANG GONG GI SKU TSE'I BAR
CHAD BZLOG THABS

KYI SKOR RNAMS RJE BLO GROS LEGS BZANG GIS MDZAD PA'I GSANG RNAM
RIN PO CHE'I 'PHRENG

BA LAS BYUNG NGO, ,MNYAL SMAD SENGGE RDZONG DER BZHUGS SKABS RJE
BTZUN LA RTZE GCIG

GSOL BTAB MDZAD PA'I SGO NAS SNGAGS MTSAN NYID KYI LAM GYI NGO
BO DANG, GO RIM

GRANGS NGES SOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR ZHI LHAG GI NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD
RNAMS ZHUS

PAR LAN MDOR BSGRIL BA RE STZAL NAS, DA NGED LA YANG YANG 'DRI
MI DGOS,

SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DGONGS 'GREL SHING RTA CHEN
PO RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I

GZHUNG CHEN MO DAG LA ZHIB PAR DPYOD DANG, NGED KYIS BSTAN PA
RNAMS DANG PHAL CHER

@231 MTHUN PA SHA DAG 'ONG, MI MTHUN PA RE TZAM BYUNG NA 'DOR
'OS GDAMS NGAG TU 'DOD

PA RNAMS LA BAB KYI GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS 'DOR DU MI RUNG, MAN
NGAG RNAM PAR DAG

PAS LDE MIG BYAS NAS MDO RGYUD DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA RNAMS
LA DPYAD PAS DPYAD

PA RDZOGS PA'I TSAD NI, LUNG RIGS KYI LAM NAS DRANGS PA'I NGES
PA RNYED NAS BLOS

DON DER THAG BCAD KYANG GTING NAS MI BDE BA'I RNAM PA MED PA
ZHIG 'ONG, DE DUS

DON DE LA DPYAD PA RDZOGS PA YIN NO ZHES GSUNGS TE PHYIN CHAD
TSAD DE 'KHRUL MED RANG

ZHIG BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS, GZHAN YANG DE NAS BZUNG STE SGO GSUM GYI
BYA BA CHOS LDAN

CI BYED THAMS CAD BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON DU GYIS ZHES
GSUNGS PAS DE LTAR DU

MDZAD CES GSUNGS, GSANG RNAM RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BAR RJE BTZUN GYI
GSUNG 'DI DAG

STZAL YUL MNYAL GYI GSAL RJE GANGS SU YIN PAR 'KHOD KYANG, MKHAS
GRUB RIN

PO CHES MDZAD PA'I GSANG RNAM DU MNYAL SMAD SENGGE RDZONG NYID
YIN PAR GSUNG NGO, ,

DE YANG DUS SKABS 'DI DAG GI SNGA ROL NAS GSUNG RAB LA DPYAD PA
YONGS SU RDZOGS MOD

KYANG THOS DON GDAMS PAR SHAR BA DANG, GDAMS DON NYAMS SU LEN PA
ZHIG MA BYUNG

NA THOS BSAM BYAS PA'I NGAL BA DON DANG BCAS PAR MI 'GYUR BAR
GZIGS NAS BYA BRAL

LA MA 'BYON PA'I GONG DANG, BYON PA'I GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU
BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN

'JAM DBYANGS DBYER MED LA GSOL BA SHUGS DRAG TU BTAB PA'I SGO
NAS DA DUNG GZHUNG

LUGS KYI DON LA DPYAD PA DANG, DPYAD PA'I DON RNAMS 'TSANG RGYA
BA'I NYAMS LEN

GYI GDAMS PAR 'CHAR BA DANG, GDAMS DON TSUL BZHIN NYAMS SU BZHES
PA SOGS

LA 'BAD BRTZON DRAG PO RGYUN CHAGS SU MDZAD CING, DE LTAR MDZAD
PA'I LAG RJES LAS

MDO SNGAGS KYI GNAD DON MTHA' DAG GDAMS NGAG TU 'CHAR BA'I TSUL
NI RJE NYID KYI RTOGS

@232 BRJAD LAS, DE NAS GDUL BYA'I BLO MUN SEL BA'I MCHOG ,'JAM
DPAL DBYANGS LA

SHUGS DRAG RGYUN RING GI ,DAD PA BRTAN POS GZHUNG LUGS GDAMS PA
RU, ,

'CHAR PHYIR GSOL BTAB RGYU TSOGS KUN LA 'BAD, ,TSUL 'DI BSAMS
SHING 'DUN MA

LEGS NAS GDA', ,BKA' DRIN CHE'O RJE BTZUN MKHYEN PA'I GTER, ,DE
LTAR

'BAD PA'I KLU SGRUB THOGS MED LAS, ,RIM BZHIN BRGYUD PA'I BYANG
CHUB LAM RIM

LA; ;THUN MONG MIN PA'I NGES PA RNYED GYUR NAS, ,ZAB MO'I GZHUNG
MCHOG

PHAR PHYIN GDAMS PAR SHAR, ,TSUL X ZHES PAS MDO PHYOGS KYI
GZHUNG LUGS

SPYI GDAMS PAR SHAR BA'I TSUL DANG, BYE BRAG TU, BYANG PHYOGS
'DI NA TSAD MA'I

GZHUNG LUGS LA, ,ZHES SOGS KYIS TSAD MA'I GZHUNG LUGS GDAMS PAR
'CHAR TSUL

SNGAR GONG DU BKOD ZIN PA LTAR DANG, DE NAS BYANG SA MDO SDE
RGYAN GNYIS PO, ,LEGS

PAR SBYAR TE TSUL BZHIN RAB 'BAD PAS, ,MI PHAM CHOS RJE'I GZHUNG
DANG RJES 'BRANG

GI ;GZHUNG KUN NYAMS SU LEN PA'I GDAMS PAR SHAR, ,TSUL + ZHES
PAS BYAMS

MGON DANG THOGS MED YAB SRAS RJES 'BRANG DANG BCAS PAS BSTAN
PA'I MNGON PA GONG

'OG GI GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS DANG, 'DUL BA'I SDE SNOD DANG BCAS PA
RNAMS KYI GNAD DON

GDAMS PAR SHAR BA DANG, LHAG PAR ZAB CING RGYA CHE'I GSUNG RAB
TSOGS, ,BSGRIGS PA'I

GO RIM NYID LAS LAM GYI GNAD, ,KUN LA NGES STER BSLAB PA KUN
BTUS LA, ,BRTEN

NAS MDO SDE KUN LAS BTUS PA SOGS, ,KLU SGRUB LUGS KYI GZHUNG
MCHOG DU MA'I DON,,

NYAMS SU LEN PA'I RIM PA LEGS PAR MTHONG, ,TSUL + ZHES PAS MGON
PO KLU SGRUB

YAB SRAS RJES 'BRANG DANG BCAS PA'I BZHED SROL DBU MA'I GZHUNG
LUGS RNAMS KYI GNAD

DON MTHA' DAG GDAMS PAR SHAR ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU DBU MA THAL
'GYUR BA'I THUN MONG

@233 MA YIN PA'I LTA BA RNAM DAG MGON PO KLU SGRUB KYI DGONGS PA
JI LTA BA BZHIN 'KHRUL MED

DU RTOGS TSUL ZHIB PA 'OG NAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR DANG, DE BZHIN DU
'BRAS BU RDO RJE THEG

PA'I SKOR LA MTSON NA, DE NAS BSAM GTAN PHYI MA RNAM SNANG NI,
,MNGON PAR BYANG

CHUB SANGS RGYAS GSANG BA YIS, ,LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I MAN NGAG LA
BRTEN NAS,,

LAM GYI GNAD KUN LEGS PAR GDAMS PAR SHAR, ,TSUL X DPAL LDAN DE
NYID

BSDUS PA'I LAM GYI GNAD, ,TING 'DZIN GSUM GYIS BSDUS PAR MTHONG
BA NI, ,CUNG

ZAD SLA YANG LAM DER ZAB MO'I DON, ,SGOM TSUL RTOGS PAR DKA' BA
PAn CHEN NI,,

SANGS RGYAS GSANG BAS RTZA BSHAD CHA MTHUN RGYUD, ,RNAM GSUM
SBYAR TE TSUL BZHIN

BSHAD PA DANG, ,RGYUD SDE GSUM GYI ZAB MO'I NYAMS LEN RNAMS,
,SGOM RIM JI

BZHIN BSHAD PAS BLO MUN BSAL, ,TSUL + ZHES PAS RGYUD SDE 'OG MA
GSUM GYI

ZAB DON NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL MTHA' DAG DPYIS PHYIN PAR THUGS
SU CHUD PA DANG,

KHYAD PAR DU YANG, THUB PA'I LEGS BSHAD KUN GYI MTHAR THUG PA,
,DPAL LDAN

RNAL 'BYOR BLA NA MED PA'I RGYUD, ,DE YI NANG NAS SHIN TU CHES
ZAB PA, ,DPAL

LDAN GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD RGYAL LA, ,SMRA BA'I DAM PA KLU
SGRUB 'DI SKAD GSUNGS,,

RTZA BA'I RGYUD DU LAM GYI GNAD RNAMS NI, ,MTHA' DRUG TSUL
BZHI'I RGYA YIS BTAB STE

GNAS, ,DE PHYIR BSHAD PA'I RGYUD KYI RJES 'BRANGS NAS, ,BLA MA'I
MAN NGAG

LAS NI SHES BYAR GSUNGS, ,TSUL DE GNAD DU GZUNG NAS MAN NGAG GI
,MTHAR

THUG MDOR BYAS SPYOD BSDUS RNAM BZHAG SOGS, ,'DUS PA 'PHAGS PA'I
SKOR

GYI GNAS KUN LA, ,RING DU 'DRIS PAR BYAS TE RTZA BA'I RGYUD,
,SGRON MA LtA

BUR GSAL BAR BYAS PA LA, ,BRTEN NAS BSHAD RGYUD CHEN PO LNGA
DANG NI, ,LEGS

@234 PAR SBYAR LA 'BAD PA CHEN POS SBYANGS, ,SBYANGS PAS 'DUS
PA'I RIM GNYIS SPYI

DANG NI, ,KHYAD PAR RDZOGS PA'I RIM PA'I GNAD KUN RNYED, ,TSUL +
DE YI

MTHU LAS BDE DGYES DUS 'KHOR SOGS, ,RGYUD SDE MANG PA'I GNAD DON
GDAMS

PAR SHAR, ,DE DAG BDAG GIS GZHAN DU BSHAD PAS NA, ,'DIR NI RNAM

DPYOD CAN LA SGO TZAM ZHIG ,CES RGYUD SDE KUN GYI MTHAR THUG
RNAL 'BYOR BLA NA MED PA'I

PHA RGYUD, MA RGYUD GNYIS MED KYI RGYUD DANG BCAS PA THAMS CAD
KYI SMIN BYED KYI DBANG DANG,

GROL BYED KYI LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI GNAD DON MTHA' DAG DANG,
DE'I NANG NAS KYANG CHES

CHER ZAB CING PHUL DU BYUNG BA DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD KYI
DGONGS DON MTHA' DRUG

TSUL BZHI'I RGYAS BTAB PA RNAMS RGYA 'GREL DANG, MAN NGAG ,BSHAD
PA'I RGYUD

RNAMS LA BRTEN NAS LAM BSKYED RDZOGS KYI GNAS MTHA' DAG DANG,
KHYAD PAR DU RDZOGS

PA'I RIM PA LNGA'I NANG TSAN 'OD GSAL, SGYU LUS, ZUNG 'JUG DANG
BCAS PA'I GNAD

DON PHRA ZHING PHRA BA RNAMS NYAMS LEN GYI GDAMS PA'I MTHAR THUG
TU 'CHAR ZHING, JI

LTAR GDAMS PAR SHAR BA LTAR TSUL BZHIN DU NYAMS SU BZHES PA LAS
MDO PHYOGS NAS

BSHAD PA'I SA LAM GYI RTOGS PA DANG, SNGAGS KYI BSKYED RDZOGS
KYI RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR

CAN DPAG TU MED PA THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS SHING, RANG NYID KYIS
BRNYES PA'I LAM

DRANGS PO LA GDUL BYA RNAMS BKRI BA'I TSUL YANG 'DUL BA KA RI KA
NAS BZUNG STE, PHA

RGYUD GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BAR THAMS CAD RIM GYIS GANG ZAG GCIG
'TSANG RGYA BA'I LAM

DU GRU BZHI LAM GYIS 'KHYER BA'I THABS LA 'KHRID PA LAS, THUN
MONGS LAM GYIS RGYUD

MA SBYANGS PAR SNGAGS NYAMS SU LEN PA SKAD ZER NAS GANG THOD
THOD DU 'JUG PA DANG,

SNGAGS PAR KHAS CHES NAS 'DUL BA'I BCAS MTSAMS KHYAD DU GSOD PA
DANG, BYANG

@235 CHUB KYI SEMS DANG LTA BA RNAM DAG GI GO BA TZAM MA RNYED
PAR RTOGS PA MTHON POR SNYEG TU

'JUG PA SOGS RNAM PA KUN TU MI MDZAD PAR GDUL BYA LAM LA BKRI
BA'I THABS LA SHIN

TU MKHAS PA SOGS 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I 'GRO BA'I DED DPON YIN PA NI
DA DUNG 'OG TU YANG..

RIM PA BZHIN DU 'CHAD PAS SHES PAR 'GYUR LA, DE'I PHYIR MKHAS
GRUB THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG LAS KYANG, LAR YANG BYA BRAL LA BYON PA NYID
NAS RGYAL BA'I GSUNG

RAB MTHA' DAG GI DON TSIG SPYI TZAM DU MA LUS PAR DA LTA LAS
DANG PO PA NYID NAS NGANG

GIS RGYUD LA BSKOR NAS NYAMS SU BLANGS PAS CHOG PA'I TSUL, LAM
GYI NGO BO, GRANGS

NGES, GO RIM SOGS THAMS CAD SHING RTA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI LAM SROL
DANG MTHUN PA

ZHIG MED DU MI RUNG BAR GZIGS NAS BLA MA YI DAM LA GSOL BA DRAG
TU BTAB CING,

GSUNG RAB DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA MTHA' DAG LA ZHIB TU DPYOD
PA RGYUN MI CHAD DU

MDZAD PAS, THOG MAR BSHES GNYEN BSTEN PA NAS 'GO BRTZAMS TE
MTHAR ZHI GNAS

DANG LHAG MTHONG LA SLOB TSUL BAR GYI THEG PA CHE CHUNG THUN
MONG DANG, THEG CHEN THUN MONG

MA YIN PA'I LAM SPYI DANG, DE'I STENG DU SNGAGS KYI THABS MKHAS
KYI KHYAD PAR THUN MONG

 
MA YIN PA RNAMS SNON PA BTAB NAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL, LAM GYI NGO
BO DANG GO RIM

GRANGS NGES LA PHYIN CI MA LOG PA'I NGES PA 'KHRUNGS NAS GSUNG
RAB DGONGS 'GREL DANG..

BCAS PA GANG LA YANG KHOL TON RE TZAM MA YIN PAR THAMS CAD GANG
ZAG GCIG 'TSANG

RGYA BA'I CHA RKYEN DU SBYAR NAS NYAMS LEN GYI PHYOGS SU SHES
PA, DE YANG BSHAD PA TZAM

MA YIN PAR DA LTA BLO MTHO DMAN DBANG PO RAB 'BRING MTHA' MA
GANG YIN GYI RGYUD LA BSKOR

NAS DMIGS RNAM GYI RIM PAR NYAMS SU LEN PA'I LAG LEN DU 'KHYER
BDE ZHING 'CHUN CHE BA,

SEMS 'DUL BA'I RIM PA 'BA' ZHIG LHUR MDZAD PA'I SGO NAS GDUL BYA
MCHOG DMAN

@236 THAMS CAD JI LTAR BKRI BA'I RIM PA LA MNGA' BRNYES SHING,
GANGS RI'I KHROD 'DIR

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYI GDAMS PA BYANG
CHUB LAM GYI

RIM PA'I MTSAN NYID DANG SNGAGS KYI THEG PA'I LAM GYI RIM PA
PHYIN CI MA LOG PAR GTAN LA

PHAB PA'I SHING RTA'I SROL 'DI NYID YA MTSAN PAR GZIGS SHING,
DE'I SROL LA THUGS

NGES CHER 'KHRUNGS, DPAL AA TI SHA'I GDAMS PA'I SROL LA YANG DGE
BA'I BSHES

GNYEN CHEN PO PO TO BA SOGS KYI GDAMS PA YANG RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I
THUGS NGES YOD

MOD KYI, 'ON KYANG LHAG PAR BLA MA LO TZA BA CHEN PO BLO LDAN
SHES RAB KYIS MDZAD PA'I

BSTAN RIM DANG, DE'I SRAS KYI THU BO DPAL LDAN GRO LUNG PAS
MDZAD PA'I BSTAN RIM

CHEN MO SOGS DANG RANG NYID KYIS DGONGS PA'I LAM GYI RIM PA
RNAMS MTHUN SHAS CHE ZHING

SROL PHUL DU BYUNG BAR GZIGS SO, ,DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA'I GDAMS PA
DE YANG GSUNG

RAB DGONGS 'GREL GYI BSTAN BCOS MAN NGAG MTHA' DAG LAM GYI RIM
PA GCIG TU

BSGRIL NAS STON PAR SNANG BAS, 'CHAD SHES PA DANG NYAN SHES PA
GNYIS KYIS BSHAD CING

NYAMS SU BLANGS NA MAN NGAG CHUNG CHUNG DU MA ZAD GSUNG RAB
MTHA' DAG GI GUNG 'GRIG 'ONG

BAR SNANG BAS, LAM THUN MONG BAS BLO SBYONG BA NAS 'KHRID DGOS
PA'I GDUL BYA RNAMS LA

KHRID KYI RNAM GRANGS MANG PO STON PA MA BYAS GSUNGS SHING, 'DI
KHO NA'I STENG NAS GTZO

BOR 'KHRID PAR MDZAD DO, ,ZHES GSUNG NGO, ,DE LTAR ZUR BSHAD
CUNG ZAD SPROS NAS

DKYUS KYI DON LA 'JUG PA NI, DE NAS MNYAL GYI GSER PHYE 'BUM PA
LA MCHOD PA CHEN PO

PHUL ZHING, GNAS DER GDUL BYA RNAMS LA 'DUL BA'I CHOS MANG DU
GSUNGS TE YON

TAN THAMS CAD KYI GZHI KHAS BLANGS PA'I TSUL KHRIMS DAG DGOS PA
YIN, NGED LA NI SO

SO THAR PA'I PHAM LHAG SBOM PO DANG BCAS PA'I LTUNG BA 'ONG MA
MYONG, LTUNG BYED NYES BYAS

@237 DANG BCAS PA 'GA' RE BYUNG BA RNAMS LA BSHAGS SDOM BYED
GSUNGS NAS MDZAD CING,

'KHOR RNAMS KYANG TSUL DE LA SBYOR BAR MDZAD, LHAG PAR RJE BTZUN
'JAM DBYANGS KYI

GSUNG GIS RAB TU BYUNG BA'I RTAGS CHA LUGS YONGS RDZOGS DANG
'DUL BA'I PHYAG LEN PHRA

ZHING PHRA BA TSUN CHOD NAS BYED DGOS GSUNG BA LA, DUS KYI DBANG
GIS MTHA' DAG RANG

GIS KYANG SGRUB DKA', GZHAN GYI BLOR YANG MI LDAN PA'I RGYU
MTSAN ZHUS PAR DE LTAR MI

'GRUB PA MI 'ONG BAS BSTAN PAR BSAM NAS NAN GYIS BYED DGOS
GSUNGS PA BZHIN, DE

PHYIN CHAD 'DUL BA'I BCAS MTSAMS PHRA ZHING PHRA BA THA NA RUNG
CHU 'DEBS PA TSUN CHAD MA

NYAMS PA LAG LEN DU BSTAR ZHING, DPON SLOB THAMS CAD KYIS PHEBS
BZHUGS KYI GNAS

SKABS KUN TU CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM, 'DING BA, LHUNG BZED, CHU TSAG
SOGS DGE

SBYONG LA 'OS PA'I RTAGS CHA LUGS TSANG MA 'CHANG BAR MDZAD PAS
'DUL BA 'DZIN PA'I

SNYAN PAS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB CING, DE NAS BZUNG STE RTAGS CHA
LUGS PHUN SUM

TSOGS PAS RIM GYIS SA STENG THAMS CAD KHYAB PAR GYUR LA, 'DI
LTAR DU MDZAD PA YANG

YI DAM GYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR BSTAN PA NYAMS PA SEMS KYIS
MA BZOD NAS

'DUL BA'I SROL KA LEGS PAR BTZUGS PA YIN GYI GZHAN LAS KHYAD DU
THON PA TZAM ZHIG

DON DU GNYER NAS BYAS PA GA LA YIN ZHES BKA' STZAL TE, PHYI RABS
GANGS RI'I

KHROD KYI SKYE BO YONGS LA RGYAL BA NYID DANG MTSUNGS PA'I BKA'
DRIN LHAG PAR DU CHE BA YIN

TSOGS GSUNGS SHING, THUGS RJE'I SHUGS KYIS GRONG BA'I SKYE BO'I
TSOGS DPAG

KYANG BSNYEN GNAS DANG

SKYABS 'GRO SOGS PHRAL DANG YUN DU PHAN PA'I DGE BA LA RAB TU
SBYOR BAR MDZAD,

@238 RJE NYID KYIS THOG MA MDZAD PA'I SGO NAS THAMS CAD BSKUL TE
TSVA TSVA 'BUM THER MANG PO

BTAB CING, PHYIS KYANG TSUL DE LTAR SGRUB PA LA BSKUL BAR MDZAD,
DE NAS

MNYAL STOD RA GRONG DU BYON NAS DBYAR BZHUGS MDZAD PA'I TSE,
SLOB DPON RIN PO

CHE DAR MA RIN CHEN PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DBUS SU BYON TE CHOS SDE
RNAMS SU GRVA SKOR MDZAD

PAS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PAS KHYAB PAR GYUR NA'ANG, RJE 'DI'I SNYAN
PA GSAN PAS

JI 'DRA ZHIG GU DGONGS NAS MJAL BA LA PHEBS TE THOG MAR DRI BA
MANG DU ZHUS PAR,

RJE 'DIS RTOGS LDAN LA SKYE BA'I DGOS PA 'GA' ZHIG SLONG BAR
MDZAD PA LA LAN GYI

SPOBS PA MA BYUNG ZHING, DE NAS CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I RIGS LAM LA
BRTEN NAS

GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD THAR 'DOD RNAMS LA MED MI RUNG DU NYAMS SU
LEN PA'I GDAMS

PA'I GNAD LUNG RIGS DANG BCAS PA THOG CIG GSUNGS PAS, DBANG RNON
CHOS

KYI SPYAN LDAN YIN PA'I DBANG GIS DE MA THAG THUGS SU CHUD DE
DNGOS STOBS KYI RIG PAS

GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD NYAMS LEN DU BSGRIL NAS STON PA'I SNGON MED
PA'I LEGS BSHAD

KYI BDUD RTZI BGO SKAL DU THOB PAS THUGS RANGS PA'I DGA' BA
DANG, 'DI NI THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS PA CIG CHAR DU STON
PA'I SMON LAM RLABS PO

CHE GRUB PA ZHIG KHO NA'O SNYAM PA'I DAD PA DRAG PO MNAN PAS MI
NON PA GNYIS 'GRAN PA

BZHIN DU 'KHRUNGS SHING, AE MA'O DA NI BDAG BLA NA MED PA'I DAM
PA'I MGON GYIS

ZIN PAR GYUR TO SNYAM DU DGONGS NAS PHYAG MANG DU MDZAD CING
ZHABS SPYI BOR BLANGS TE,

BDAG BLA MA RJE BTZUN CHEN POS SNANG BA STZAL NA DENG PHYIN CHAD
SKU DANG GRIB MA BZHIN DU ZHABS

'BRING DU RJES SU 'BRANG BAS THUGS RJES BZUNG 'TSAL ZHES DAD
PA'I NGA RO SPYAN CHAB DANG

BCAS TE ZHU BA PHUL BAS, RJE NYID KYIS KYANG DGYES BZHIN DU ZHAL
GYIS BZHES TE

@239 'KHOR GYI THOG MAR NAM YANG 'BRAL BA MED PAR MDZAD DO, ,'DI
SKOR DGA'

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU, RJE DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS RTZES DANG DU GRVA
SKOR ZIN PHRAL 'JAM

MGON BLA MA'I GRAGS PA GSAN PAS RTZOD PA MDZAD PAR MNYAL GYI RA
GRONG DU BZHUGS

PA'I DRUNG DU BYON PAS SPYIR SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI YON TAN DANG,
KHYAD PAR DU RTON PA

BZHI'I BSHAD PAS SHIN TU DAD DE LO BCU GNYIS KYI BAR ZHABS PHYIR
RGYUN 'THUD NAS CHOS

GSUNG TSAD GSAN, GSAN TSAD BZUNG, BZUNG TSAD BRJED DU MA BCUG
PAR

MDO SNGAGS MTHA' DAG LA THOGS PA MED PA'I MKHYEN PAS MKHAS PA
RNAMS LEGS

BSHAD KYIS YID 'PHROG PAR MDZAD CES GSAL LA, YANG ZANG ZANG NI
RING PA 'CHI

MED PAS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR GSER GYI MYU GU LAS, RGYAL TSAB DAR
MA RIN CHEN

DE NYID LA, RJE RIN PO CHE RED MDA' PA CHEN POS KYANG, RTZOD
BZANG MCHOG

GYUR DAR MA RIN CHEN DE, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR DBUS GTZANG GNYIS
KA RU RTZOD

PA BZANG BA'I GRAGS CHOD CING, RIG PA YANG RNO MYUR ZAB GSUM YOD
PA LA BRTEN

NAS RJE TZONG KHA PA DANG MJAL BA'I THOG MAR RJE'I GSUNG RE RE

DPON DKA' BCU PA RANG GA LE GSON CIG ,KHYOD KYI KHAS LEN DE MI
'THAD DE,

DE LTAR NA 'DI LTAR 'GYUR ZHES DANG, DES NA 'DI LTAR YIN TE
RGYUD DAM MDO'I

RGYA GZHUNG KHUNGS MA NAS 'DI LTA BU BSHAD PA'I PHYIR ZHES PA'I
LUNG RIG CUNG ZAD TZAM

BZANG POR

@240 RTA ZHAL BA DANG, SLOB DPON CHOS KYI BZANG PO RNAMS KYIS
GSUNGS ZHES BYUNG YANG,

'DI SKOR LA BRAG G-YAB BLO BZANG BSTAN PAS MDZAD PA'I RGYAL
TSAB KYI RNAM THAR YON TAN

CHU GTER LAS, RGYAL TSAB RIN PO CHES G-YAG RONG GNYIS LUNG RIG
GIS PHAM

PAR NUS PAS THUGS RGYAL NAS, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG RTZOD
PA'I BSAM PAS

PHEBS DE'I DUS RJE RIN PO CHE CHOS GSUNGS PA DANG THUG PAS THOG
MA NAS RTZOD PA'I

SKABS DBYE DGOS PAS BRNYAS THABS MDZAD PAR DGONGS NAS DBU ZHVA
YANG MA PHUD PAR

CHOS GRVAR BYON PA RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS GZIGS TE, CHOS
GSUNG 'PHRO MA BCAD

BZHIN DU KHRI LAS GZHOL NAS BZHUGS PAR, SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE
YANG THUGS

BZHIN PAR BZHUGS NAS RJE

TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS GSUNG BSHAD MDZAD PA GSAN PAS, SNGON CHAD
MKHAS PA GZHAN

KHENGS PA'I RI PO

DE'I TSE RJE'I BZHUGS

@241 SKU DRUNG DU BYON PAR SNANG YANG, YUN RING PO'I DPYAD PA MA
DGOS PAR RJE BDAG

NYID CHEN PO'I LEGS BSHAD RMAD DU BYUNG BA 'GA' ZHIG TZAM GYIS
THUGS RANG DBANG

MED PAR CHES TE DUS DE RANG NAS ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS NOD PA'I
SLOB MAR GYUR PA STE,

MKHAS PA MKHAS PA'I NANG NA MDZES, ,ZHES PA YANG TSUL 'DI DANG
'DI 'DRA BA LA

ZER BA YIN NO, ,DE SKABS MNYAL DU CHOS 'KHOR ZHIG 'DZUG PAR
BZHED NAS RA

GRONG MKHAN PO LA ZHAL TA GNANG BAS KHONG GIS SBYIN BDAG GI
MTHIL LEN ZHUS SHING,

GZHAN YANG DAD 'BUL MANG DU BYUNG BA LA BRTEN NAS MNYAL PHYOGS
DGE 'DUN GYI SDE PHAL CHE

BA'I SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA THAMS CAD BSDUS TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO ZHAG
MANG PO'I BAR DU

BKUR PHUN

SUM TSOGS PA SGRUB, DE YANG MNYAL GYI SDE PA RNAMS PHAN TSUN
GRAL SOGS LA YE

MI 'CHAM PAS LHAN CIG TU TSOGS PA MI SRID PA TZAM YIN NA'ANG, DE
DUS RJE NYID

KYI THUGS RJE'I STOBS DANG THABS MKHAS PA'I DBANG GIS THAMS CAD
RTZOD PA MED CING

DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR GYUR LA, RJE NYID
NAS DAD CAN

SO SO LA DAD 'BUL DANG RGYUN PA'I BSNYEN BKUR KHAS LEN DGE BSKUL
SOGS KYI ZHAL TA

GNANG BAR YANG THAMS CAD SPRO DGA' DANG BCAS PAS LHUR LEN PA
GYUR SNANG TE, DE

DUS PHYIS KYANG

CING, DE DAG

GI TSE NI SNGAR LTAR THAMS CAD RTZOD PA MED LA CHOS 'KHOR DE LAS

'GOD MI BYED CES

@242 MYAL PHYOGS SU BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON RMAD DU BYUNG
BA RGYA CHEN PO RNAMS LEGS

PAR MDZAD ZIN NAS SLAR YANG 'OL KHAR PHEBS NAS 'O DE GUNG RGYAL
GYI LHA ZHOL DBEN

GNAS LHA LDINGS SU LO GCIG BZHUGS TE THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES KYI
RNAL 'BYOR DANG,

'KHOR RNAMS LA'ANG CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, LHAG PAR THAL RANG GI
LTA BA'I GNAS RNAMS

LA BYA BRAL LA 'BYON PA'I GONG NYID NAS DE BAR DU DPYAD PA NAR
MAR MDZAD NA'ANG,

MTHAR THUG PA'I GNAS LA MI BDE BA GTAN NAS LOG PA'I NGES PA
'DREN MA THUB, GNAS

DER BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS THA MI DAD DU BYAS
NAS GSOL BA SHUGS

DRAG LAN MANG DU BTAB CING RIG PA'I DPYAD PA ZHIB PAR MDZAD PAS
NUB GCIG LA MNAL

LAM DU, MGON PO KLU SGRUB DANG 'PHAGS PA LHA, SANGS RGYAS
BSKYANGS, ZLA

BA GRAGS PA, LEGS LDAN 'BYED RNAMS RANG BZHIN YOD MED KYI GNAS
LA 'BEL

GTAM GYIS BKA' BGRO BA MDZAD KYIN 'DUG PA'I NANG NAS SLOB DPON
SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS

YIN ZER BA'I PAndI TA SNGO SANGS SKU BONGS CHE BA ZHIG GIS, DBU
MA'I RGYA DPE ZHIG

PHYI NYIN TZA SHE'I 'GREL PA BUDDHA PA LI TA GZIGS PAS 'BAD PA
MED PAR THAL 'GYUR PA'I

LTA BA'I GNAD MTHAR THUG PA DANG, DGAG BYA'I MTSAMS 'DZIN SOGS
LA SNGAR

DANG MI 'DRA BA'I NGES PA GTING TSUGS PA 'KHRUNGS SHING, MTSAN
'DZIN GYI DMIGS

GTAD THAMS CAD ZHIG ,DE KHO NA NYID KYI DON LA MTHA' GZHAN DU
DOGS PA'I SGRO 'DOGS

LHAG MA MED PAR DRUNG PHYUNG STE GNAS LUGS KYI DON JI LTA BA
BZHIN MNGON SUM DU GZIGS

PAS SNGAR LHO BRAG TU MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA DANG, MNYAL GYI
GSAL RJE GANGS KYI

YAR 'DREN DU RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS GNYIS KYI LUNG BSTAN DU RGYA
GAR GYI PAndI TA ZHIG

@243 GI SKU'I SNANG BA DANG DE'I BSTAN BCOS LA BRTEN NAS ZAB
MO'I DON LA DPYIS PHYIN PA'I

NGES PA RNYED PAR GSUNGS PA YANG DON LA NGES PAR GNAS PAR DGONGS
SHING PHYIN CHAD

RANG RE'I RJES 'JUG RNAMS LA SLOB DPON SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS KYI
'GREL PA 'DI'ANG

BLTA DGOS ZHES YANG YANG GSUNG BA'I RGYU MTSAN YANG, 'DI LA
BLTAS NA LTA BA'I

GNAD LA NGES PA LHAG PAR RNYED PA'I RTEN 'BREL ZHIG YOD PAS DE
LTAR BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS

LTAR BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS SHING, RTZA SHE'I RGYA CHE'I 'GREL MDZAD
PA'I SKABS SU'ANG GZHUNG GI DKA' BA'I

GNAD PHAL CHE BAR SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS KYI 'GREL PA RE DRANGS
PA'I BSHAD PA CHED KYIS

MDZAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN YANG DE YIN PAR GSUNGS, DE'I TSE ZAB MO
RTEN CING 'BREL BAR

'BYUNG BA GSUNG BA'I STON PA SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA SHES
NAS DAD PA LHAG PAR

BRNYES PA'I SHUGS KYIS DRANGS TE, RTEN 'BREL GSUNG BA'I SGO NAS
BSTOD PA LEGS

PAR BSHAD PA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA'ANG MDZAD DO, ,GONG GI
GZIGS SNANG BYUNG TSUL

SOGS 'DI DAG KYANG GZHAN NGOR MNAL LAM DU BRNYED PA TZAM DANG,
'GREL PA BUDDHA

P'A LI TA GZIGS PA'I RKYEN GYIS LTA BA MTHAR THUG BRNYES TSUL
GSUNGS PA LAS, DNGOS

GNAS LA YUL DER SLOB DPON DE DAG GI ZHAL MNGON SUM DU GZIGS
MTHAR

THUG GI LTA BA'I GNAD RNAMS BGRO GLENG DANG NYAN BSHAD KYI TSUL
GYIS DNGOS SU 'DOMS SHING

BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAR MDZAD PA LAS PHYIN CI MA LOG PA'I LTA BA
BRNYES PA ZHIG YIN

PAR SNANG STE, RJE'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BA'I GTAM BRGYA RTZA
BRGYAD PA LAS, KHYAD PAR DU

ZAB MO'I LTA BA PHYIN CI MA LOG PA'I PHRA BA'I GNAS NGES PAR
BZHED PA NA, DPAL

MGON KLU SGRUB, 'PHAGS PA LHA, SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS, ZLA BA
GRAGS

PA; LEGS LDAN 'BYED RNAMS ZHAL GZIGS SHING, 'PHAGS PA YAB SRAS

@244 RNAMS RTEN 'BREL RANG BZHIN YOD MED KYI BGRO GLENG DANG
NYAN BSHAD KYI TSUL DU DAM PA

'DIS 'TSOL BAR BZHED PA'I DKA' GNAD RNAMS GO BAR MDZAD PA DANG,
RES 'GA'

SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS KYIS BUDDHA P'A LI TA'I DON RNAMS DANG, ZLA
BAS 'JUG PA'I DON

DANG, 'PHAGS PA LHAS BZHI BRGYA PA'I DON SOGS PAndI TA SO SOS
BSTAN BCOS SO

SO'I DON RNAMS RANG 'GREL GYI TSUL DU RANG RANG GIS 'CHAD PA
DANG, GLEGS BAM

DBU LA BZHAG PAS DE'I MOD LA DOGS PA'I CHA PHRA MO'ANG CHOD PAR
MDZAD PA NI RMAD DU BYUNG

BA'I GTAM BDUN CU RTZA BZHI PA'O, ,ZHES DANG, RNAM THAR LEGS
BSHAD KUN

'DUS LAS KYANG, KHYAD PAR DU SLOB DPON SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS
BYUNG NAS 'GREL

PA BUDDHA P'A LI TA'I STENG NAS RTZA SHE TSAR GCIG GSUNGS PAS,
DE'I PHYI DE NYIN PAR

'GREL PA DE 'BUL MI BYUNG BAS RTEN 'BREL 'GRIG STE DBU MA'I LTA
BA PHUN SUM TSOGS

PA SHAR ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, RGYU MTSAN DES NA MKHAS GRUB
THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PAS KYANG, KLU SGRUB 'PHAGS PA LHA DANG SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS,
,ZLA BA'I ZHABS

KYIS GANG TSE BYIN RLABS PA, ,DE YI MOD LA ZAB MO'I CHOS NYID
LA, ,'KHRUL

PA'I DRI MA SPANGS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES DANG, GSANG RNAM
TSIGS

BCAD MA LAS, RGYAL SRAS KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS GTZO 'KHOR LNGA, ,ZAB
MO RTEN

'BYUNG GTAM GYI BGRO BA MDZAD, ,DE YI NANG NAS DPAL LDAN SANGS
RGYAS BSKYANGS, ,

RGYA DPES BYIN RLABS 'PHAGS PA'I DGONGS PA'I 'KHRUNGS, ,DPAL
LDAN + ZHES

GSUNGS PA RNAMS KYANG DE DANG MTHUN PA YIN LA, SPYAN SNGA BLO
GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS

RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA BSTOD PA LAS KYANG, SRID PA'I RTZA BA
DRUNG 'BYIN ZHING, ,

ZAB ZHI SPROS PA KUN BRAL BA'I, ,LAM MCHOG GDUL BYA'I TSOGS
RNAMS LA, ,

@245 KHYOD KYI THUGS SU CHUD DE BSTAN, ,MDOR NA SGRUB BYA'I CHOS
KYIS NI, ,RTAG LTA MA

LUS KUN SEL ZHING, ,GTAN TSIGS KYIS NI CHAD LTA KUN, ,SEL BAR
DPA'

BO KHYOD KYIS GSUNGS, ,DE NI CHOS RNAMS THAMS CAD KUN, ,MTSAN MA
CI DANG

CIR SNANG YANG, ,SNANG BA DE DANG DES STONG PAR, ,DPA' BO KHYOD
KYIS LEGS

PAR MKHYEN, ,MI MKHAS RNAMS NI STONG NYID KYIS, ,LTA BAS CHAD
LTA'I G-YANGS

SU LHUNGS, ,KHYOD NI STONG NYID LTA BA YIS, ,RTAG LTA SEL BA LTA
CI SMOS, ,

CHAD PAR LTA BA'ANG STONG NYID KYI, ,LTA BA KHO NAS SEL BA LAGS,
,STONG PA NYID NI KHO

NA LA, ,RGYU 'BRAS RTEN 'BREL KUN 'THAD CING, ,GZHAN DAG LA'ANG
MA 'THAD

PAR, ,MTSUNGS MED KHYOD KYIS DGONGS PA LAGS, ,ZHES PA'ANG LTA BA
BRNYES

PA'I TSUL DE LTA BU LA BSNGAGS PAR MDZAD PA YIN NO, ,DE LTAR KHO
NA NYID KYI DON

LA SGRO 'DOGS LHAG MA MED PAR CHED DE STONG PA NYID LA THUGS
RTZE GCIG TU MNYAM PAR

'JOG PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN LHUR MDZAD CING, YANG DAG PA'I DRAN
SHES KYIS LEGS

PAR BSKYANGS PA'I GOMS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PAR MDZAD PA'I STOBS
KYIS, RJE NYID KYI

ZHAL NAS, DA LTA LEGS PAR GOMS PAS RJES THOB TU'ANG SNA TSOGS
PA'I SNANG BA

'DI THAMS CAD STONG BZHIN DU SNANG BA'I SGYU MA LTAR 'CHAR GYI,
STONG PA NYID KYIS RGYAS

MA THEBS PA'I SNANG BA RANG GA BA CHER MI 'CHAR BAR 'DUG ,CES
GSUNGS SHING,

NYAMS MGUR LAS KYANG, MNYAM GZHAG NAM MKHA' LTA BU'I STONG NYID
DANG, ,

RJES THOB SGYU MA LTA BU'I STONG PA NYID, ,GOMS NAS THABS SHES
ZUNG DU 'BREL BA

YIS, ,RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA'I PHA ROL 'GRO BA BSNGAGS, ,DE LTAR
SHES NAS
                   
PHYOGS RE'I LAM GYIS NI, ,TSIM PA MED PA SKAL BZANG RNAMS KYI
LUGS, ,

@246 RNAL 'BYOR NGAS KYANG NYAMS LEN DE LTAR BYAS, ,THAR 'DOD
KHYOD KYANG DE BZHIN

BSTEN 'TSAL SO, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,DES NA TSUL 'DI DAG NI RNAM
PAR THAR

PA NGO MTSAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA LAS KYANG CHES RMAD DU BYUNG BA,
RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS

PAS KYANG BSTOD PA'I 'PHRENG BAS YANG DANG YANG DU BSNGAGS PAR
BYA BA'I YUL YIN NA

BDAG CAG GIS LTA SMOS KYANG CI 'TSAL, DE'I PHYIR MKHAS GRUB SMRA
BA'I NYI MAS

BO PHAL PA RNAMS KYI BLO YUL DU BYA DKA' BA TZAM GYI BSNYEN
GZHAG TING

'DZIN MCHOG GIS LEGS GOMS SHING, ,RJES THOB TU YANG SGYU MA LTA
BU'I THUGS, ,

SKAD CIG G-YO BA MED LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES BSNGAGS PAR MDZAD
PA YIN NO, ,

GZHAN YANG 'DI'I THAD KYI RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS LAS, DE
YANG BLA MA

'DI NI GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR, BLA MA DANG YI DAM THA MI DAD DU
BYAS NAS GSOL BA

'DEBS PA DANG BSAGS SBYANGS SOGS LA RTZE GCIG TU BRTZON PAR
MDZAD CING, SKYE

BO PHAL PA RNAMS KYI BLO YUL DU BYA DKA' BA TZAM GYI BSNYEN
SGRUB LA RGYUN MI CHAD DU BRTZON

PAR MDZAD PAS LHAG PA'I LHA DU MAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I TSUL
DPAGS PAR DKA'

BA YOD LA, KHYAD PAR DU RGYAL BA KUN GYI YAB GCIG RJE BTZUN 'JAM
PA'I DBYANGS KYI

ZHAL MNGON SUM DU YANG YANG GZIGS SHING DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN
MDZAD PA'I STOBS

KYIS GSUNG RAB MTHA' DAG GI DON LA 'KHRUL PA MI MNGA' BAR GYUR
PA YIN LA, JI 'DRA

BA'I RTOGS DKA' BA ZHIG YIN NA'ANG THOG MAR RIG PAS ZHIB TU
DPYAD PAS PHAL CHER

DGONGS 'ONG, DE LTAR MDZAD KYANG THUGS NGES MTHA' CHOD PA 'DREN
MA THUB PA

RNAMS LA BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS THA MI DAD PA
LA GSOL BA DRAG TU BTAB

CING MndAL PHUL BAS, DE MA THAG 'BAD MED DU DPYIS PHYIN PAR
DGONGS NAS 'ONG

@247 BA BSNYON MI NUS PAR YOD LA, GZHAN YANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS KYI SKU DANG

GSUNG GI SNANG BA SOGS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA ZHIB PAR NI DNGOS SU
YONGS LA BSGRAS

PAR MI NUS MOD, 'ON KYANG GSUNG RAB KYO DON LA TSUL JI LTAR
DPYOD, DPYOD PA

RDZOGS MA RDZOGS, NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD, GDUL BYA JI LTAR BKRI
,'KHOR

JI LTA BU BSTEN, GNAS JI LTA BUR BZHUGS PA SOGS PHAL CHER RANG
BZOS ZHUGS

PA MA BYAS, ZHES GSUNG NGO, ,ZHES DANG, RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD

KUN 'DUS LAS, DES NA RJE RIN PO CHE 'DI'I GRUB MTHA' RNAMS 'JAM
DBYANGS KYI

GRUB MTHA' YIN GSUNG NGO, ,ZHES DANG, YANG DPA' BO RDO RJE
BRGYUD NAS 'JAM

DBYANGS LA MTSAN NYID KYI BSHAD NYAN KHO NA DANG, SNGAGS KYI
DBANG BKA', RGYUD

KYI BSHAD NYAN, SGOM SGRUB NYAG GCIG BYED PA RNAMS BSTAN PA'I
RGYUN LA GANG PHAN, BDAG

GIS JI LTAR BGYI, PHYI MA ZHING KHAMS GANG DU SKYE, KHYAD PAR
BDE BA CAN DANG DGA'

LDAN GANG DU 'BREL PA CHE ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA SKU TSE 'DI
PHYI THAMS CAD KYI 'DUN MA

RNAMS ZHUS PAS GSAL BAR GSUNGS SHING, KHYAD PAR DU SNGAGS MTSAN
NYID GNYIS

KA'I SGO NAS BSTAN PA LA BYA BA GYIS, DBANG BKA'I RIGS MA BYED,
GZHAN DU

TSE THUNG BAR 'GYUR ZHING DNGOS GRUB LAS RING DU 'GYUR BA DANG,
BSTAN PA LA PHAN

THOGS KYANG CHUNG DU 'GRO GSUNGS PAS, ZHAL BZHUGS DUS SU RJES
GNANG RE TZAM

MA GTOGS DBANG BSKUR GTAN MI MDZAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN DE YIN
GSUNGS, ZHES DANG,

RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR PA'I GTAM BRGYA BRGYAD PA LAS KYANG, GZHAN
YANG DAM PA 'DI

NYID KYI MDZAD PA GANG DANG GANG MDZAD DANG, GNAS GZHI GANG NAS
GANG DU 'BYON PA

DANG, THUN MONG GI 'KHOR RAB BYUNG GI SDE DANG, KHYIM PA'I KHROM
SOGS SPYI'I

@248 CHOS SGO CI ZHIG DBYE BA DANG, THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I SLOB
MA DAG LA GDAMS PA

GANG DANG GANG STON PA DANG, SKU'I SKYE BA SNGA PHYI'I DUS NAS
LAS 'BREL GANG DANG GANG

YOD PA DANG, PHYI RABS KYI SKYE DGU'I PHAN BDE'I RTZA LAG TU
GANG DANG GANG GIS 'GYUR

BA'I RTEN 'BREL GYI SGO DANG, THA NA'ANG NYI MA GCIG GI MDZAD
SPYOD KYANG YI DAM LHA

LA ZHUS NAS YI DAM GYI GSUNG KHO NA LA DPANG DU MDZAD PA LAS,
GZHAN DU LHAS LUNG

DU MA BSTAN PA'AM, GSUNG LAS 'GAL BA'AM, 'JIG RTEN SNANG GRAGS

KYIS BSGYUR BA'I GZHAN DBANG DU SONG BA YI MI MNGA' ZHES GSUNGS
TE, DES NA RJE

NYID DON LA RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS DANG NGO BO GCIG PA MA ZAD,
THUN MONG BA'I

SNANG TSUL YANG RJE BTZUN NYID KYIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MDZAD
DE, BLA MA DBU MA

PAS LO TZ'A MDZAD PA'I GNAS SKABS NAS BZUNG PHRAL DANG YUN GYI
MDZAD PA'I SGO MTHA'

DAG ZHU BAR MDZAD LA, PHYIS NAS NI RJE NYID RANG LA RJE BTZUN
GYI ZHAL NAM 'DOD DU

GZIGS PA'I SGO NAS BLANG DOR GYI GNAS KUN 'DAMS PAR MDZAD PAS,
SKU GSUNG

THUGS KYI MDZAD PA DMIGS KYIS GSAL BA PHRA MO TSUN CHAD KYANG
'OS MI 'OS YI DAM

NYID LA ZHU BAR MDZAD PA LAS GYI TSOMS SU MI GNANG ZHING, DE
YANG GTZO BO NI GDUL

BYA RNAMS LAM PHYIN CI MA LOG PA LA BKRI BA'I SLAD DU GSUNG RAB
DGONGS 'GREL DANG

BCAS PA'I DKA' BA'I GNAD THUGS KYIS MA CHOD PA RNAMS DANG, PHAN
BDE'I 'BYUNG

GNAS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE RNAM PAR DAG PA 'PHEL ZHING YUN DU GNAS
PA'I THABS TSUL,

GDUL BYA RNAMS LAM LA BKRI BA'I 'JUG SGO GANG ZAB, 'CHAD RTZOD
RTZOM GSUM DANG SGOM

SGRUB NYAMS LEN GYI 'BAD LUGS, 'GRO BA RNAMS PHAN BDE LA SBYOR
BA'I RGYU TSOGS RLABS

PO CHE GANG LA 'BAD DGOS SOGS GZHAN DON DU 'GYUR BA'I THABS 'BA'
ZHIG GTZO BOR

@249 BTON NAS ZHU BAR MDZAD LA, YI DAM GYIS CHED DU GSUNG GIS
BSKUL BA NA'ANG BSTAN

'GROR PHRAL YUN PHAN 'GYUR GYI BSHAD SGRUB KYI MDZAD PA 'DI DANG
'DI LTAR MDZAD DGOS

SOGS 'DOMS PA LAS, LA TOG LEGS NYES DANG, MNAG PHYUGS KYI 'PHEL

'GRIB, TSONG KHE'I SGYU THABS, KHA MCHU'I RGYAL PHAM SOGS 'JIG
RTEN 'DI

SNANG GI BYA BZHAG NI ZUR TZAM YANG ZHUS GNANG LTA BZHAG THUGS
KYI GU LA BSAM PA TZAM

YANG MI MNGA' ZHING, JI LTAR LUNG BSTAN PA RNAMS KYANG RANG GI
THUGS YUL DU BZHAG

NAS DE DANG DE'I 'JUG LDOG MA NOR BAR MDZAD PA LAS GZHAN LA CHED
KYIS GSUNG BA LTA

BZHAG SRAS KYI MTHU BO 'GA' ZHIG TZAM GYIS PHYAG DANG BCAS TE
NAN GYIS GSUNG BAR

BSKUL NA'ANG 'GA' ZUNG TZAM LAS MI GSUNG ZHING, GANG GSUNG BA
RNAMS LA'ANG

MANG POR MI BSGRAGS PA'I BKA' RGYAS BTAB PA LAS, DGE BSKUL YIN
TSUL LA
 
BSNYAD NAS LUNG BSTAN BYUNG ZHES TSONG ZONG LTAR BKRAMS PA NI
RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU MI

MDZAD PAS, DES NA ZHAL GZIGS LUGS DANG LUNG BSTAN LUGS 'DI 'DRA
BA BYUNG NA LUNG

BSTAN PA'I DGOS PA CHES CHER DON DANG LDAN PA NYID DU SHES PAR
BYOS SHIG, ,YANG

GONG DU DRANGS PA'I RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SU, RJE BTZUN
GYIS DBANG BKA'I

RIGS MA BYED GSUNGS PA LTAR RJES GNANG TZAM LAS MA GNANG GSUNG
BA'I DON, MANG

PO'I TSOGS DANG KUN LA MNGON MTSAN CAN GYI SGO NAS DE LTAR NAM
YANG MI GNANG BA'I

DON LA DGONGS PA LAS, SNOD LDAN SKAL BA MCHOG GI GANG ZAG KHYAD
PAR CAN 'GA'

ZHIG TZAM LA SHIN TU GSANG BA'I SGO NAS KYANG GNANG MI CHOG PA
DANG, MA GNANG BA'I

DON NI MIN 'DRA STE 'OG TU BRJOD 'GYUR GYIS SHES LA, LAR NAS
DBANG BKA'I RIGS

BZHED PA'I TSE SLOB MA

'JUG PA LAS RJE NYID NAS

KYIS MDZES

MKHA' LA

TU, ,LUS

,STONG DANG RTEN
