PO KHYOD KYIS BRNYES, ,DE LAS MNYAM RJES KUN TU STONG NYID KYI,
,RGYA LAS

NAM YANG 'GONGS PAR MA GYUR CES, ,SNYAN PA'I GTAM 'DI RNA BAR
SON PAS

@252 KYANG, ,SRID PA HRUL POR BYED PA NYID DU 'GYUR, ,SKU GSUNG
THUGS KYI RNAM

THAR PHRA MO'ANG, ,'JAM DBYANGS DNGOS KYI LUNG GIS BSTAN GYUR
NA, ,'GRO

LA DON DU MI 'GYUR MDZAD PA NI, ,CHA TZAM RGYAL BAS DPYAD KYANG
DMIGS SU MED,,

CES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI DON BSDU'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAG GO ,ZHES
KHYAB BDAG RJE

BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA THUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG NGO BO DBYER
MA MCHIS PA 'JAM MGON

CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA BA CHEN PO'I RNAM PAR THAR PA THUB
BSTAN MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG

NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA LAS, BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA DGE
SLONG GI DNGOS PO

BZHES SHING RDO RJE THEG PA'I TSUL SOGS LA SLOB PA DANG, DAM PA
RNAMS LAS

ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI NOD DE THOS PA'I DON RNAM RANG GIS
RTZE GCIG NYAMS SU

BZHES SHING, GDUL BYA GZHAN DAG LA YANG 'DOMS PAR MDZAD PA'I
TSUL SOGS

LAS BRTZAMS NAS BRJOD PA'I SKABS TE LNGA PA'O,, ,,SA BCAD BZHI
PA,

DE LTAR MDZAD PA'I LAG RJES LAS LUNG DANG MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I
YON TAN MTHA' DAG

LA MNGA' BSGYUR BA'I MKHAS GRUB 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I GO 'PHANG
MTHON POR GSHEGS NAS

BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MA RTOGS LOG RTOG GI DRI MA BSAL TE BSTAN
PA'I SNYING PO BSHAD

SGRUB RNAM PAR DAG PA'I RING LUGS KYI SROL BTOD PA'I SGO NAS
BSTAN 'GRO'I DON RLABS

CHEN MDZAD TSUL LAS BRTZAMS TE BRJOD PA NI, DE NAS STON GYI DUS
LA BABS PA NA

'OL KHAR BYON, DGUN DPYID 'GAR PHUG TU BZHUGS NAS 'OL KHA'I DGE
'DUN

RNAMS LA CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, DE NAS AE TE'U RAR BYON NAS DBYAR
BZHUGS MDZAD

CING AE PA'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, SKYE BO THA
MAL PA GZHAN DAG

DU MAR 'DUS PA RNAMS KYANG SKYABS 'GRO DANG BSNYEN GNAS SOGS KYI
DGE BA'I LAM LA

@253 BKOD, GNAS 'DIR BZHUGS DUS RJE BTZUN MI LA'I GSUNG BGROS
BAR DO'I DRIS LAN

GYI SKOR GZIGS PAS GSANG SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA'I GNAD THUN MONG MA
YIN PA LA THUGS

NGES CHEN PO 'KHRUNGS TE GSUNG BGROS DE LA MCHOD PA RGYA CHEN
PO'ANG 'BUL BAR MDZAD

CES RNAM THAR SKAL LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG LAS
GSUNGS, DE SKABS

SLOB MA'I THU BO TSA KHO DPON PO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA NAS SNGA
SOR KHAMS SU PHEBS GONG

RGYAL RONG GI YUL DU DGON SDE GRANGS BCAD ZHIG 'DZUGS RGYU'I DAM
BCA' PHUL BA LTAR

TSANG BA'I MTHA' MA LA DA TSANG DGON PA ZHES PA BTAB NAS GNAS
TSUL ZHU YIG PHUL BA'I

LAN DU TSUL KHRIMS SRUNG BA'I BSLAB BYA DANG, LAM GYI GTZO BO
RNAM GSUM BRTZAMS

NAS BSKUR BAR MDZAD CING, 'PHRIN YIG GI MJUG TU, CHOS KYI BLO
LDAN

NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA KHYOD, ,KHO BOS SMRAS PA'I RJES SU ZHUGS
SHIG DANG, ,

TSE RABS KUN TU SPYOD DANG SMON LAM KUN, ,MTSUNGS PAR SPYOD DE
NAM ZHIG 'TSANG

RGYA'I TSE, ,BDUD RTZI'I BGO BSHA' THOG MAR SBYIN PAR BYA, ,ZHES
STZAL ZHING,

PHYIS SLAR YANG YI GE PHUL BA'I LAN DU LAM RIM CHEN MO BRTZAMS
NAS BSKUR BAR MDZAD

DO; ;DGUN DUS 'OL KHA'I BRAG GDONG DU BYON NAS ZAB LAM RIM GNYIS
KYI RNAL

'BYOR LA GCIG TU BRTZON BZHIN PAR BZHUGS, DE NAS RDZING PHYI'I
JO BO CHEN PO BYAMS

PA'I DRUNG DU MJAL ZHING, GNAS DER CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS
MCHOD LA DGONGS NAS

ZHAG BCO LNGA'I RING LA MCHOD PA RGYA CHE ZHING BKOD PAS YID
'PHROG PA RGYUN MI CHAD DU 'BUL

BAR MDZAD PA'I THOG ,BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN 'BA' ZHIG LA DGONGS
PAS 'PHRAL

DANG YUN DU PHAN BDE RGYAS PA'I THUGS SMON RLABS CHE BAR MDZAD,
'DI'I SKABS SU MCHOD

YUL SPYAN 'DREN PA'I THUGS DMIGS MDZAD PA NA, SHAR PHYOGS KYI DE
BZHIN GSHEGS

@254 PA THAMS CAD KYI SKU MDOG DKAR PO RNAM SNANG GI RNAM PA CAN
GYIS SHAR PHYOGS KYI NAM

MKHA'I KHYON THAMS CAD GANG BAR 'KHRIGS PA DANG, DE BZHIN DU LHO
DANG NUB DANG

BYANG DANG STENG GI NAM MKHA' THAMS CAD RIM BZHIN RIN 'BYUNG,
'OD DPAG MED,

DON GRUB, MI BSKYOD PA'I RNAM PA CAN GYI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PAS
KHYAB STE, STENG DANG

LOGS KYI NAM MKHA' THAMS CAD BAR MTSAMS MED PAR DE BZHIN GSHEGS
PA'I SKUS

GUR PHUB PA LTAR GYUR PAS MCHOD PA BDAG GIR MDZAD PA'I GZIGS
SNANG DNGOS SU YANG

YANG BYUNG ZHING, DE'I DUS MCHOD YUL DANG MCHOD PA THAMS CAD LA
BDE STONG GIS

RGYAS BTAB CING PHUL BAS DE THAMS CAD BDE STONG GI RNAM ROL DU
'CHAR BA BYUNG GSUNGS,

PHYIS LHA SAR SMON LAM CHEN MO MDZAD PA'I DUS SU'ANG GZIGS SNANG
DE 'DRA BA NAR MAR

BYUNG ZHES GNAS RNYING PA KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM
THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG

NGOGS SU GSAL LA, YANG, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD

PA'I GSANG BA'I RNAM THAR DANG, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS MDZAD
PA'I RNAM THAR RAS

BRIS 'BRI TSUL RNAMS SU SMAN LUNG GI RGYA SOG PHUR CHO 'PHRUL
MCHOD PA MDZAD DUS GZIGS

SNANG DE DANG DE DAG BYUNG TSUL 'DUG PA NI LO SNGA RTING GI
KHYAD PAR LAS GNYIS KA YIN PAR

SNANG STE, 'DI GNYIS SU MA ZAD LO SNGA PHYI SO SOR GNAS DE DANG
DE DAG TU CHO 'PHRUL MCHOD

PA MDZAD RES BZHIN 'DI 'DRA BA'I GZIGS SNANG RGYUN MI CHAD DU
BYUNG BA ZHIG YIN 'DUG

NA; MTHA' GCIG TU GNAS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG TU BYUNG GZHAN DU MA BYUNG
NGAM SNYAM PA'I GU

DOGS BYA MI DGOS SO, ,DE NAS DPYID DUS DE KHAR SLOB DPON DKA'
BCU PA DAR

MA RIN CHEN PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS GTZO MDZAD, SDE SNOD 'DZIN
PA NYIS BRGYA LHAG TZAM

LA MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, RDZING PHYIR BZHUGS SKABS
DE MO THANG PA BLO

@255 GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MJAL TE SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI 'DU
SHES 'KHRUNGS SHING, RJE

RIN PO CHES KYANG BTZUN CHUNG LAS 'BRAS PA ZHES BSNGAGS PAR
MDZAD, DE SKABS GRVA

GZHON BLO GROS GSAL BA DGU SKYOR MO LUNG DU SLOB GNYER LA RDZENG
BAR MDZAD CES KYANG

BYUNG, NYANG PO PHYOGS NAS SKAL LDAN GYI GDUL BYA MANG POS KHA
ZHE MED PA'I MOS

GUS CHEN POS GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS NYANG PO MDANG MDO'I
DGON PAR BYON NAS

DER DBYAR BZHUGS MDZAD, PHYOGS DE'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA CHOS 'KHOR
MANG DU BSKOR

ZHING, SKYE BO GZHAN DAG GI TSOGS LA'ANG 'DI PHYI'I PHAN PA RGYA
CHEN PO SGRUB PAR MDZAD,

NYANG PO MDANG MDOR BYON SKABS 'PHRANG ZHIG NAS DBU ZHVA LHUNGS
PAS CHU BRGYUD 'DIR NGA'I

BSTAN PA CHU BO'I RGYUN BZHIN 'ONG, ZHVA GANG DU CHAGS PA DER
DBU MA'I BSHAD SROL 'BYUNG

ZHES LUNG BSTAN PA LTAR, NYANG PO SANG SING SGANG THEG CHEN CHOS
'KHOR GLING BYUNG ZHES

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA GSUNGS TE DES NA SNGAR SANG SING DGON DU
DBU MA'I 'CHAD NYAN

YANG DAR BA GOR MA CHAG GO ,YANG, SNGA RABS DAG GI GSUNG RGYUN
LA, NYANG PO NAS

KONG PO PHYOGS SU 'BYON DGONGS PA'I LAM BAR DU BUD MED ZHIG LA
'DI NAS MAR SA CHA

JI DANG JI SKAD BYA BA YOD BKA' 'DRI MDZAD PAR, BSHAN PA THANG
DANG KHRAG MDOG

THANG ZER BA SOGS YOD CES ZHUGS PAR, TSIG BKRA MI LEGS PAR
DGONGS TE ZHVA SER

THANG ZER BA NAS MA PHEBS PAR RTEN 'BREL GYI SLAD DU DBU ZHVA
DANG, CHOS GOS KYI

SNE TSAL, CHAB SHUB BCAS CHU BRGYUD LA BSKUR BAS DBU ZHVA 'GAG
PA'I SAR SANG SING

DGON DANG, CHOS GOS KYI TSAL BU 'GAG SAR SNE TSAL DGON DANG,
CHAB SHUB

'GAG SAR CHAB RI BO DGA' LDAN CHAGS PA YIN CES BYUNG, YANG, DGA'

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO NYANG PO
MDANG MDOR BYON SKABS,

@256 DBU ZHVA DANG, PHYAG MKHAR CHUR LHUNGS PAS BSTAN PA CHU
BO'I RGYUN LTAR RING ZHING NYON

MONGS PA'I SKOM NAD SEL BA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU PHYAG MKHAR GANG
DU GNAS PA DER PHAR

PHYIN GYI BSHAD GRVA DANG, DBU ZHVA CHAGS PA DER DBU MA'I BSHAD
GRVA 'BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS

PA BZHIN PHYAG MKHAR RI KHAR CHAGS PAS RI KHA CHOS SDE NI ZHES
SOGS DANG, 'JAM

MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I DNGOS SLOB SEMS DPA' CHEN PO CHOS
'PHAGS PAS NYANG PO

SANG SING SGANG NGAM THEG CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING BTAB, RJE'I DBU
ZHVA CHAGS PA'I RTEN

'BREL GYIS DBU MA'I BSHAD SROL LEGS PAR DAR ZHES GSUNGS PA LAS
CHOS GOS KYI SNE

TSAL DANG, CHAB SHUB CHU BRGYUD LA BSKUR BA SOGS MA GSAL ZHING,
GANG LTAR KYANG

DBU ZHVA CHAGS SAR SANG SING DGON CHAGS PA DANG, DER DBU MA'I
BSHAD SROL DAR BA

BCAS LA LO RGYUS RNAMS MTHUN PA DANG, ZHVA SER THANG ZHES PA'I
BAR DU'ANG PHEBS

NGES KYIS DA LTA ZHVA SER THANG DU RJE'I BZHUGS KHRI DANG ZHABS
RJES YOD CING, DE MAN

CHAD DU MA PHEBS KYANG BSTAN PA DAR BA'I SLAD DU THUGS BSKYED
DANG RTEN 'BREL NI RGYA CHER

MDZAD PA ZHIG GO  ,DE'I SKABS SU DPON CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG POS
RNGOG LO CHEN PO'I

SGRON TE SKYID

SOS KYI DUS LA BABS PA

BZHI PA RNAMS GYI BSHAD PA

GRAGS 'DOD SOGS

KYI KUN NAS BSLANGS PA MA YIN PAR RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NYID KYI

KYANG DE 'DRA BAR, ,

'JUG PAR BYIN

DAG DAM

PHYIN CI MA LOG

CING, TSANG LA MA NOR BAR SKYE BA ZHIG BYUNG NA SNYAM PA'I GZHAN

KYIS MKHAS

CHE BA RNAMS

@258 BLANGS PA'I SEMS BSKYED KYI BSLAB BYA RNAMS LA JI LTAR SLOB
PA'I TSUL MTHA' DAG PAR

SHES NAS TSUL BZHIN DU SLOB PA ZHIG MA BYUNG NA, DE'I THEG PA
CHEN PO PA MING TZAM DU

'GYUR BAR DGONGS SHING, GSANG SNGAGS RDO RJE THEG PA LA 'JUG PAR
'DOD PAS

KYANG LAM THUN MONG BA LA BLO LEGS PAR SBYANGS PA'I STENG DU,
BLA MA BSTEN TSUL THEG

CHEN THUN MONG BA'I SKABS SU BSTAN PA LAS KYANG CHES KHYAD PAR
DU GYUR PA ZHIG GI SGO NAS,

DUS SU KHAS BLANGS PA'I DAM TSIG DANG SDOM PA RNAMS MIG GI 'BRAS
BU LTAR GCES PAR

SDOM PA ZHIG

MA BYUNG NA, KHAS BLANGS PA'I DAM TSIG YAL BAR DOR NAS SNGAGS
KYI LAM LA SLOB

MNGA' RIS NAS BYON,

@259 SKABS RJE BTZUN RE MDA' PAS RJE LA PHYAG MDZAD PAR RJES DE
LTAR MI MDZAD PAR ZHU ZHES

NAN GYIS BZLOG PAR MDZAD PA SOGS PHAN TSUN GCIG LA GCIG GUS PA'I
NGO MTSAR BA'I

RNAM THAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA KUN LA MNGON SUM DU GYUR, GNAS DER
DPON SLOB GNYIS

KAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHER BSKOR BAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN
PHYED LNGA BRGYA TZAM

'DUS SHING, DE DUS GSANG PHU'I DGE BSHES PHAR TSAD KYI STON PA
BZANG BA LDAN MA

NA MKHAS PA

RE MDA' BA, DBUS NA MKHAS PA TZONG KHA PA ZER BAS KHYED YAB SRAS
GNYIS DBUS

GTZANG GI BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR GYUR GDA' ZHING, DA LTA ZHAL
'DZOMS PA'I DUS

LKOG TU MI

RIG GI DGAG

SGRUB MDZAD NAS YIN MIN GYI KHO THAG CHOD PA'I CHOS 'KHOR YUN
RING DU BSKOR DU GSOL,

DE BAS NA RE MDA' PAS GANGS BU LE DANG, CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS
PAS 'O DE

GZHUNG DU BSTAN

BYANG RVA SGRENG

DANG, GSANG 'DUS

PA CHEN PO

DMIGS RNAM,

RIN PO CHE CHOS KYI

SBYOR LA SOGS PA GSAN

GNYIS KAS PHYAG BTEGS

NAS PHEBS SHING, RIN PO CHE LO TZ'A BA SKYABS MCHOG DPAL BZANG
PO DANG BCAS

PA'I CHOS RJE RNAM PA GSUM GA GNAM RTZE LDENG DU AA RA CHEN PO
BYANG CHUB YE SHES KYI GTZUG..

NOR GYIS

BSAM RGYA CHEN POS

THOG DRANGS PA'I

GYIS BZHES,

BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DI

GYA

@262 PAR GSUNGS PA NYID THUGS LA CHES LCI BAR GYUR PAS, 'DUL
BSTAN RIN PO CHE

RE GSUNGS PA DANG LHAN CIG ,'DUL BA'I PHYAG LEN GZHI BCU BDUN
NAS GSUNGS

PA YAN CHOD RNAMS DANG,

RNAM 'BYED NAS BYUNG BA'I BCAS PA PHRA RAGS LA SOGS PA RNAMS KYI
NGO BO, GO

RIM, SRUNG TSUL LA SOGS PA ZHIB CING PHRA BA DANG, BCAS PA DE
DAG LAS 'DAS

TSE GANG 'DAS PA'I LTUNG BA THAMS CAD RANG RANG GI MING RIGS
KYIS PHYIR 'CHOS PA'I CHO GA

'DUL BA NAS JI LTAR BSHAD PA BZHIN GYI PHYAG LEN RNAM PAR DAG
PA'I SROL LEGS PAR

BTZUGS, DE'I TSE 'DUL BA GSAN PA PHAL CHE BAS KYANG RANG RANG GI
RGYUD LA BRTAGS

NAS, LTUNG BA PHRA RAGS THAMS CAD BSHAGS YUL MANG NYUNG GI BYE
BRAG DANG, DNGOS  PO SPANGS PA'I CHAD LAS SNGON DU GTONG BA SOGS
JI LTAR BSHAD PA BZHIN DU PHYAG LEN LA

BTAB NAS PHYIR BCOS MDZAD DE, DENG PHYIN CHAD PHYAG PHYI BA
GNYUG MAR GNAS

PA PHAL CHE BAS NYIN RE BZHIN YANG RANG RANG GI RGYUD LA BRTAGS
NAS LTUNG BA DANG YUN DU

MI 'GROGS PAR PHYIR 'CHOS PA DANG, YO BYAD BYIN RLABS, RUNG

KHANG GCOD PA, NUB LHAG NYAL SRUNG BA SOGS KYI PHYAG LEN PHRA MO
DAG LA'ANG CHES

RNAMS LA LTA

THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PAS, DES NA SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA SO SO THAR PA'I

NO, ,ZHES

@263 GSUNGS PA DANG, GNAS RNYING PA KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYI GSUNG
LAS, SPYIR

NA GANGS RI'I KHROD DU BSTAN PA SNGA DAR LA DPAL LDAN ZHI BA
MTSO DANG, PADMA SAm BHA

WAS BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG PA'I SROL BTZUGS PA LA BAR SKABS ZHIG
STONG PA NYID KYI GO

BA GNAD DU MA SONG BAS THABS KYI CHA LA SKUR BA 'DEBS SHING, YID
LA BYED PA

THAMS CAD 'GOG PA'I RGYA NAG GI MKHAN PO HVA SHANG GIS BSTAN PA
DRI MA CAN DU BYAS PA NA,

SLOB DPON CHEN PO KA MA LA SH'I LAS TSUL DE LEGS PAR BKAG NAS
RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA JI BZHIN DU GTAN LA PHAB PAS SKU DRIN CHE
LA, PHYI DAR LA RGYUD SDE'I DON LOG PAR

BZUNG BA LA BRTEN NAS PAndI TA DANG, RNAL 'BYOR BAR RLOMS PA
'GA' ZHIG GIS

BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA TSANGS PAR SPYOD PA LA GNOD PA CHEN PO BYAS
PA NA, SKYES BU DAM

PA MGON PO AA TI SHAS LEGS PAR BKAG CING, GZHAN YANG LOG PAR
BZUNG BA

RNAMS NUB PAR BYAS NAS PHYIN CI MA LOG PA'I BSTAN PA 'PHEL BAR
MDZAD PAS KHA BA CAN

PA THAMS CAD LA SKU DRIN GYIS LHAG PAR DU KHYAB PA YIN, DE LTAR
MDZAD KYANG DA DUNG

RIM BZHIN CHES SNYIGS MAR SONG BA'I DBANG GIS SNGA DAR DANG PHYI
DAR GNYIS KA'I DUS

KYI LOG RTOG GI RI MO RNAMS LANGS PA'I KHAR, SNGAGS DANG PHA ROL
TU PHYIN PA DANG,

THOS PA DANG SGOM PA LA SOGS PA PHAN TSUN TSA GRANG LTAR 'GAL
BAR BSAMS NAS SUN

'BYIN PA DANG, DE THAMS CAD KYIS KYANG DAM PA'I CHOS 'DUL BA'I
BSLAB KHRIMS

RNAM PAR DAG PA SNYING THAG PA NAS SUN 'BYIN PAR BYED PAS, KHA
BA CAN GYI LJONGS

'DIR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA GZUGS BRNYAN TZAM ZHIG LHAG MAR GYUR
PA'I TSE, RJE

RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID DAM PA'I CHOS 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM RLABS PO
CHE YONGS SU GRUB

PA'I MTHUS, BYANG PHYOGS KYI RGYUD 'DIR BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE GSO
BA'I SLAD DU

@264 NYE BAR BYON TE, BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON BSAM GYIS
MI KHYAB PA DAG LA

RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I BRTZON PA DRAG PO LHUR MDZAD PAS, DENG SANG
GI DUS NA GRUB MTHA'

GZHAN DAG GI'ANG GRVA PA SLOB GNYER PA'I MGO BYED SLOB DPON SOGS
DANG, SGOM

CHEN PA'ANG CUNG ZAD DRAG PAR RLOM PA PHYIN CHAD CHANG DANG DUS
MIN GYI KHA ZAS SOGS

'KHYOL NYOG TU SPYOD PA LA NGO TSA BAR BYED PA DANG, SNGON DUS
GRVA SA CHEN PO'I BTZUN

PA PHAL CHE BAS KYANG GDING BA DANG, LHUNG BZED LA SOGS PA'I DGE
SBYONG GI YO

BYAD DAG NGO SHES PA TZAM YANG MED CING, BLA GOS DANG THANG GOS
SNAM PHRAN DANG

GLEGS BU SBYAR BA LA SOGS PA NI RNA BAS KYANG THOS PAR MA GYUR
PA LAS, DENG

SANG KHA CHE DANG RGYA NAG GI BAR THAMS CAD DU DGE SBYONG GI
RTAGS DANG CHA LUGS RNAM PAR

DAG PA THANG GOS DANG SHAM THABS KYI GZAN LA SOGS PA TSUN CHAD
'CHANG ZHING PHYIN GYIS

RLOBS PA LA SOGS PA'I PHYAG LEN DANG, BYIN LEN, RUNG CHU, CHU
TSAG

'CHANG BA, NUB LHAG NYAL, 'CHANG 'BRAL 'JOG PA, ME REG ,

RIN PO CHE LA REG PA, SKYES PA GCOD PA SOGS SRUNG BA DANG, DUS
DRAN

BSTEN PA, RUNG BA BYED PA'I TSUL, RUNG KHANG BYIN RLABS LA SOGS
PA'I BSLAB

PA'I GZHI PHRA MO GCIG YAN CHAN LA'ANG NAN TAN DU BYED PA'I DGE
SBYONG GI TSUL DANG MTHUN..

PAS KHYAB PAR GYUR PA 'DI 'DRA BA NI RJE RIN PO CHE 'DI KHO NA'I
THUGS RJE LAS BYUNG PA

YIN CING, DER MA ZAD RANG RA'I CHOS BRGYUD 'DZIN PAR KHAS MI LEN
PA'I GRVA PA

RNAMS KYI NANG NA'NG, CHOS GOS, GTING BA, LHUNG BZED TZAM 'CHANG

ZHING, CHANG DANG PHYI DRO'I KHA ZAS LA 'DZOMS PA TZAM YOD PA
'DU DAG KYANG, BDAG

CAG RNAMS KYI SKYABS GNAS DAM PA RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO 'DI
'BA' ZHIG GI BKA' DRIN

@265 DANG 'PHRIN LAS LAS BYUNG BA MA YIN NA GZHAN GANG NAS
BYUNG, BLO GROS DANG LDAN ZHING

GZU BOR GNAS PA RNAMS KYIS ZHIB TU DGONGS PAR ZHU ZHU, 'DI DAG
NI DA LTA DNGOS SU

SNANG BAS SHES PAR SLA LA, MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM RNAM PAR DAG PA'I
SROL PHYE ZHING GDAMS

PA'I GNAD RNAMS GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I TSUL NI GSUNG RAB MDZAD PA
DAG LAS SHES PAR

BYA DGOS BAS, ZHAL GYI GDAMS PA RNAMS LA DPYAD NA NGES PA MNGON
SUM BZHIN DU

SKYE BAR 'GYUR BAS 'BAD NAS BTZAL BAR BYA DGOS SO, ,ZHES GSUNGS
PA 'DI DAG NI

CAM BU DANG ZOL BSTOD KYI RAB BTAGS DANG, 'DOD ZHEN GYIS BSLANGS
PA SOGS MIN

PAR BSTAN PA'I GNAD JI BZHIN DU MKHYEN PAS SNYING NAS RANG DBANG
MED PAR YID CHES

SHING, GUS PAS THUGS RGYUD GTING NAS 'KHUL BA'I GSUNG YANG DAG
PA STE, DA LTA

'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DIR SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG
PA NYAMS PA MED TZAM..

DU GNAS PA 'DI RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' DRIN KHO NAR NGES
NA'ANG, DA DUNG BSTAN

PA'I GNAD MGO ZHING PHYOGS LHUNG GI LING TOG GIS BLO MIG 'GRIB
PA CI RIGS PA'I

BSAM BLO LA, 'DUL BA NI THEG PA DMAN PA'I CHOS YIN PAS DE LA
RTZIS SU BYED PA

NI DBANG PO BRTUL BO'I LUGS SROL YIN NO SNYAM PA DANG, DE BZHIN
DU THUN MONG LAM

SBYANG LA GAL BO CHER 'DZIN PA YANG MYUR DU 'TSANG RGYA BA LAS
RING DU BYED PA YIN PAS

DANG PO NAS SNGAGS KYI LAM LA ZHUGS NA 'DUL BA SOGS DE DAG GI
SRUNG SDOM GANG YANG..

DGOS PA ZHIG MIN NO SNYAM DU RANG YANG DE LTAR SEMS SHING GZHAN
DAG KYANG TSUL DE LA

'KHRID DE BSTAN PA'I GZHI RTZA DANG, LAM GYI RTZA BA RMANGS NAS
BSHIG PAR BYED PA

CHES MANG BAR SNANG NA, DE DAG LA DGAG SGRUB KYI RNAM BZHAG
MTHA' CHOD PA ZHIG

'OG TU 'GOD PAR SPRO BAS 'DIR MANG DU MA SPROS SO, ,GZHAN YANG
GNAS DER CHOS

'KHOR LO MANG DU BSKOR,

DE SKABS ZHIG RJE TZONG KHA PAS RJE BTZUN RE MDA' PA CHEN PO LA,
DRI MED MKHYEN PA'I

RAS GZIGS, ,

PA PHUL

PO 'JAM DPAL

BRTZE MA'I

LUS

THON NAS RJE BTZUN RE

ZHOL DU DBEN GNAS BTAB

DAG RIG PA'I LAM NAS

TSUL DANG SBYAR

TE SNGON MED PA'I LEGS BSHAD KYI PHUL CHEN PO STZAL BAR MDZAD,
DE LA MKHAS GRUB

SNGON LAN GCIG

KYANG MA MYONG BA'I LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I BDUD RTZI'I RO PHUL DU
BYUNG BA MYONG BAS YID KYI

DUS 'DA' BAR BYED

CING, DE PHYIN CHAD KYANG SKABS SKABS SU GSUNGS PAS, SNGON CHAD
GANGS RI'I KHROD

'DIR TSAD MA TSIG GI NA YAm MAm, PHYI'I GO RGYA GCOD PA'I TSE
BSTAN BCOS GZHAN BLTA

BA LA BLO CUNG ZAD DRAG TU 'GRO BA'I YAN LAG TZAM DU NYE BAR
MKHO BA'O SNYAM DU 'DZIN

PAR ZAD KYI, 'DI NYAMS LEN LA MKHO BA'I THE TSOM TZAM ZHIG SU
LA'ANG MED PAS

PHAL MO CHE ZHIG DON MA YIN PA'I BLO BSKYED PAR BYED PA DE LTAR
LA, DA LTA BLO GROS

DANG LDAN ZHING GZU BOR GNAS PA DAG GIS 'DI NYID NYAMS LEN STON
PA'I BSTAN BCOS

RMAD DU BYUNG BAR PHYOGS MTHONG TZAM YOD PA 'DI NI, RJE RIN PO
CHA 'DI 'BA' ZHIG

GI THUGS RJE LA BRTEN PA YIN TE, 'DI TZAM KYI BKA' DRIN YANG
GANGS CAN PA YONGS

KYIS GSAB PAR SLA BA MA YIN NO, ,ZHES BKA' STZAL TO, ,DES NA
SNGAR

DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL BRTZAMS NAS LE'U DANG
PO LA NYID KYIS

RANG 'GREL MDZAD, LHAG MA LA LHA DBANG BLO 'GREL BA RTZOM DU
BCUG PAR, DAN

PO BRTZAMS TE GZIGS PHUL BAS, CHUL BSKYUR GSUNGS, GNYIS PA PHUL

BAS ME LA BSREGS, GSUM PA'I MJUG TU, PHAL CHER SKAL BA MED NYID

DANG, ,DUS LA'ANG SDOD PA MED PA'I PHYIR, ,GOMS PA'I PHYIR NA
MDOR

@275 BSDUS NAS, ,DKA' 'GREL 'DI NI 'DIR BYAS SO, ,ZHES SBYAR TE
PHUL BAS

'PHROS DANG TSIG ZUR GYIS BSTAN PA NGES PA'I DON RNAMS MA BYUNG
BA 'DUG STE, TSIG

GIS DNGOS SU BSTAN PA'I DON BYUNG 'DUG ,GSUNGS NAS BZHAG ,NGA'I
RIG

PA 'DI GZHAN GYIS MA NOR BAR MI SHES PAR 'DUG DGONGS NAS, RNAM
'GREL DU,

SKYE BO PHAL CHER PHAL LA CHAGS SHING SHES RAB RTZAL MED PAS NA
LEGS BSHAD RNAMS, ,

ZHES SOGS KYI TSIGS BCAD 'DI GSAR DU BSNAN PAR MDZAD PA YIN CES
GRAGS TE,

DES NA 'PHROS DANG TSIG ZUR GYI BSTAN PA'I NGES PA'I DON YANG
NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD KHYAD

PAR CAN STON PA RNAMS SU NGES LA, DE'I PHYIR DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS
PA NYID KYIS

DE LTAR BSTAN YOD PA DNGOS SU GSUNGS KYANG, SNGON CHAD MKHAS PA
RNAMS LA DOGS PA

TZAM MA BYUNG RUNG, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS MKHYEN RAB KYI RTZAL
RMAD DU BYUNG BAS LEGS

PAR GSAL BAR PHYE STE DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I DGONGS PA GTING
PHYIN PA KUN LA

'DOMS PAR MDZAD PA 'DI LTA BU NI, CHOS KYI GRAGS PA NYID SLAR
YANG DNGOS SU BYON PA

DANG KHYAD PAR GANG ZHIG MCHIS, TSUL 'DI KHO NAR BSAM NA YANG
RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL

DBYANGS KYI SGYU 'PHRUL NYID DU SOM NYI DANG BRAL BA'I NGES PA
RNYED PAR SNANG NGO, ,RGYAL TSAB

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS RJE'I GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS BTAB PA'I TSAD
MA'I BRJED BYANG NGAM,

TSAD MA'I LAM BSGRIGS SU GRAGS PA'ANG 'DI DUS MDZAD PA YIN NO,
,SMRAS PA,

PHYOGS DANG PHYOGS BRAL SKAL LDAN NGANG MO'I KHYU, ,MTHA' DAG
DBYAR SKYES CHU 'DZIN

JI BZHIN DU, ,BOS PA MED PAR KHYOD DRUNG BSNYEGS PA NI, ,LEGS
BSHAD

BDUD RTZI MYONG BA'I SLAD DU YIN, ,DE DAG RNAMS LA RANG RANG
SKAL BA DANG, ,

'TSAMS PA'I CHOS KYI RGYUN BZANG BGO SKAL DU, ,BKYE BAS RING NAS
BSAGS PA'I

@276 RMONGS CHEN DRI, ,MA LUS DUS GCIG PHYIS PA BZHIN DU BYAS,
,THEG CHEN

GZHUNG LAM RGYAL SRAS TSUL KHRIMS DANG, ,DNGOS GRUB RTZA BA
BSHES GNYEN BSTEN TSUL

DU; ;NGES PHYIR DE DAG RNAMS KYI BLANG DOR GNAD, ,BRTZE BAS GDUL
BYA'I TSOGS

LA 'DOMS PAR MDZAD, ,BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA SO SOR THAR PA YI, ,'DUL
KHRIMS NYID DU

RGYAL BAS BSNGAGS NA YANG, ,CHOS RLOMS PHAL GYIS GCAN GZAN RTZVA
SNGON BZHIN, ,

MTHONG YANG DA DUNG MI LEN 'DOR BAR BYED, ,GSANG CHEN SNGAGS
PA'I GRAL DU DOG

TSANGS KYIS, ,'DUL BA'I BCAS MTSAMS KHYAD DU GSOD PA LA, ,RANG
YANG BRTZON ZHING

LJONGS 'DIR MANG, ,

MAR GYUR TSE MGON

KHYOD KYI, ,DAM CHOS 'DZIN PA'I THUGS BSKYED DUS SMIN PAS, ,'DUL

BSTAN GSO BA'I CHOG DAG LA BRTZON, ,DE MTHUS RANG BZHIN GRUB
MTHA' DZIN PA

MDANGS KYIS SA CHEN KHYON, ,GUR KUM TSOS KYIS SPRAN PA JI BZHIN
GYUR, ,

BCAS PA'I GNAD 'GAG PHRA ZHING PHRA BA TSUN, ,TSUL BZHIN NYAMS
SU LEN PA'I SKYES BU

NI; ;NYE BA 'KHOR DANG MTSUNGS PAS MTHA' DBUS GZHI, ,'GENGS BAS

'DUS PA DANG POR CO 'DRIR BYED, ,DENG SANG DUS NA'ANG RGYAL
BSTAN SNYING PO 'DI, ,

NYAMS PA MED PAR SHAR NUB YUL GRU'I BAR, ,KHYAB CING GDAL 'DI
MGON KHYOD BKA'

BSDUS PA, ,BKA' BAB CHE BA BZHI LDAN LEGS BSHAD NI, ,BKA' DANG
GDAMS

@277 NGAG KUN GYI PHUL DU BSKRUN, ,CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I ZAB
DGONGS RGYA MTSO'I GTING, ,

CHOS BZHIN DPOGS PA'I ZAB DON NOR BU'I GTER, ,CHOS LDAN GDUL
BYAR 'BAD

MED BKYE BAS NA, ,CHOS GRAGS SLAR YANG BYON KYANG DE LAS CI, ,DE
SOGS

MGON PO KHYOD KYIS SKAD CIG RER, ,BSHAD DANG SGRUB PAS RGYAL
BSTAN SPEL BA'I

TSUL, ,RE RE'I MTHA' YANG RTOGS PAR NUS MIN NA, ,MTHA' DAG GLENG
BA'I

SPOBS PA SU YIS BSTEN, ,CES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD
PA'O, ,

DE NAS MI'I DBANG PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS GSOL BA NAN CHER
BTAB PA LA BRTEN

NAS 'ON BDE CHEN STENG DU PHEBS, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA BRGYA PHRAG
DU MA 'DUS PA DANG

BCAS PA RNAMS KYIS DE NYID DU DBYAR GNAS PAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES,
RGYAL BZANG SMON

MKHAR NAS ZHABS TOG GI RIM PA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA BSGRUBS,
GDUL BYA RNAMS

LA BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID DANG, DBU TSAD KYI DKA'
PA'I GNAD DU MA LHUG

PAR 'GROL BA'I CHOS KYI 'KHOR LA MANG DU BSKOR, DE NAS 'O DE
GUNG RGYAL GYI LHA

ZHOL 'OL DAG'I BYAMS PA GLENG DU PHYAG PHEBS, DON GNYER CAN
RNAMS LA LAM RIM

DANG BSKYED RDZOGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, DE NAS DPON SLOB
RNAMS DGUN GYI SKU

MTSAMS SHIN TU DAM PA'I NGANG NAS THUGS DAM 'BA' ZHIG LHUR MDZAD
PA'I SKABS SU, RJE

BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI GSUNG GI SNANG BAS, SLOB DPON KLU
BYANG GI RNAM GZHAG

RIM PA LA tI KA RTZOMS DANG, PHAN THOGS CHEN PO 'ONGS ZHES BSKUL
MA BYUNG BAS

DE MA THAG TU DGOS PA'I YIG CHA RNAMS BSAGS NAS BKA' RTZOM MDZAD
PA LA ZHUGS

PAS RTZOM PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN TE DON GNYER CAN RNAMS LA'ANG
ZHIB PAR GSUNGS,

DE YANG SPYIR DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RIM PA LNGA'I NGO BO, ,GO
RIM, GRANGS

@278 NGES, RIM PA SO SO'I BYED LAS SOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR DU RIM
PA GSUM

PA'I SGYU LUS SGRUB TSUL GYI SKOR SOGS 'DUS PA'I RTZA BSHAD KYI
RGYUD DANG, 'PHAGS

PA YAB SRAS LNGA'I GZHUNG NAS BYUNG BA'I DON THUN MONG MA YIN PA
RNAMS DPYIS PHYIN PA ZHIG

LEGS PAR MKHYEN NAS LO BCU LHAG TZAM SONG BA LA DA BAR DU SMRA
MA NUS, DA NAS ZUR

TZAM SMRAS PA YIN CES RJE NYID KYIS BKA' STZAL TE, DES NA GSANG
CHEN RDO RJE THEG

THUGS SU CHUD NAS RING ZHIG LON KYANG, RE ZHIG SNOD MIN RNAMS
'DUS PA'I RDZOGS

RIM RIM PA LNGA'I NANG TSAN RIM PA GSUM PA'I SGYU LUS SGRUB TSUL
GYI GNAD THUN MONG MA

YIN PA RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI DGONGS DON BZHIN SLOB DPON
'PHAGS PA YAB SRAS KYIS

CHEN POS DRI

SU CHUD NAS RING ZHIG

'BYUNG BA SOGS KYIS

MNGA' BA LAS

GZHAN DAG LA SHIN TU GSANG BAR MDZAD LA, DUS LA BAB NAS SNOD
LDAN RNAMS LA

@279 LA 'DUD, ,CES BSNGAGS PAR MDZAD PA YIN LA SGYU LUS KYI SKOR
SOGS LA SNGON

PAR MA

NUS PA MA YIN NO, ,DE

MAS GSOL BA NAN

RNAMS KYIS AA BHYA'I

GZHUNG LA BRTEN NAS BSTAN BCOS BRTZAM NA BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN
LA PHAN THOGS RGYA CHEN

PO 'ONGS ZHES LUNG BSTAN PA RNAMS KYI DON BZHIN, RGYUD SDE
BZHI'I LAM GYI LUS YONGS

RIM PA MDZAD DE, SDE SNOD

'DZIN PA DU MA LA SNGAGS KYI LAM RIM RGYAS PAR GSUNGS, DE YANG
RJE NYID NAS THUN MONG

BA DAG GI NGOR GSUNG RIGS SU SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO RTZOM PA 'DI LA
SNGAR RGYA SOG PHUR

GRUB CHEN RNAMS KYI LUNG BSTAN BYUNG BA DE LTAR MA GTOGS, DUS
KYIS GTUGS

PA DANG, RTZOM PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN PA BYED DGOS PA BYUNG BA'I
DON GYIS GSOL BA

YUN RING DU 'DEBS LONG MA BYUNG BAS, RGYU MTSAN KHYAD PAR CAN
GZHAN MED CES

BKA' STZAL MOD KYANG, DON DU RGYUD SDE BZHI'I GNAD DON MA LUS PA
LA RJE BTZUN

BA'I SGO NAS RTZOM PAR

LEGS BSHAD KUN

@280 KYIS DPYAD NA RIGS PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES DANG, DE LTAR 'JAM

GYI YAB GCIG 'JAM

,RGYAL BA'I

THOS PAS RING

GI RE BA'I 'BRAS BU MCHIS PAR MDZOD, ,CES GSUNG ZHING, LHA 'DI'I
MTSAN

RJEN PAR MI STON PAR MKHYEN PA'I GTER ZHES GSUNG NGO, ,DE DUS

RO COG GI DON

RNAMS GSUNGS PAS, LUNG BDE LA GSANG SNGAGS NANG ZHES GSUNGS
SHING, GZHAN

GNAS PA NYID DO, ,

DE'I TSE BAR CHAD KYI LTAS SHIN TU RTZUB PA CI RIGS PA BYUNG,
DGE BSHES GCIG GNYIS

KYANG 'DAS PA LA, DPON SLOB RNAMS KYIS SKU MTSAMS DAM PAR MDZAD
DE, THUGS

DAM DANG BZLOG PA SOGS LA SHIN TU 'GRUS PAR MDZAD PAS TSOGS MED
PAR BZLOG ,

DE'I TSE BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB THABS BDUD

TU 'PHEL BAR GYUR, DE YANG BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'DI NI THA MAL PA
DAG GI SNANG NGOR '

PA'I SKABS SU SKU

NAS THUGS ZHIB BCUG NA MA GTOGS, GZHAN DE RNAMS THUGS KYIS CIR

@291 MA GUS PA DANG, BRNYAS PA BYAS PA MA LAGS NA'ANG, MI MANG
PO DANG NAM

'PHRAD PA'I DUS RNAMS SU NAD DRAG PO 'BA' ZHIG 'ONG BA BYUNG
BA'I DON GYIS, 7BKA'

LUNG BZHIN DU SGRUB PAR MA NUS PA LA NAM MKHA' DANG 'DRA BAR ZAB
LA SHIN TU RGYA CHE BA'I

THUGS KYIS MI DGYES PA MI MDZAD PA THUGS LA DGONGS PAR ZHU,
SNGON GYI DUS SU BYON

PA'I CHOS RGYAL CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS 'JIG RTEN 'DI'I KHRIMS LUGS
DANG, 'JIG

RTEN PHYI MA'I CHOS LUGS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU LEGS PAR DAR BA'I
THUGS KHUR CHEN PO

BSNAMS 'DUG PA'I LUNG BZHIN DU, DA LTA'I DUS SU GONG MA CHEN
PO'I THUGS

DGONGS RNAM PAR DAG PA DANG, MDZAD PA NGO MTSAR BAS LHA DANG
BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN

GYI YID MGU BAR BYED PA'I GTAM SNYAN PO YANG DANG YANG DU THOS
PAS, BDAG CAG

'DI PHYOGS NA YOD PA'I RAB BYUNG DRAG PA PHAL MO CHES, 7GONG MA
CHEN PO'I

SKU TSE DANG RGYAL SRID YUN RING DU BRTAN PA'I SMON LAM RNAM PAR
DAG PA YANG DANG YANG DU

'DEBS KYIN YON PA'I TSUL 'DI DGONGS PAR ZHU ZHING, DE LTAR YIN
LAGS NA DE

LA SA SKYONG CHEN PO'I 'PHRIN LAS KYIS JI LTAR SKYONG, CHOS KYI
RGYAL PO NYID KYIS

MKHYEN PAS BDAG CAG 'DRA BAS ZHIB TU MI SPOBS LAGS, ZHES GUS PAS
PHUL

BA'I ZHU YIG SPYAN LAM DU 'BAB PA'I THABS KYI RTEN MTSON PAR
LI'I YUL NAS SPYAN

DRANGS PA'I SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SKU GCIG ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SH'AKYA
THUB PA'I GSER

SKU GCIG ,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI GSER SKU GCIG ,DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL 'PHEL BZHIN PA GSUM, SEL BRA GCIG ,

YANG DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL GCIG ,RGYA GAR GYI GRUB
CHEN RGYA DANG BOD

GNYIS KAR SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD PA'I SKU
DRIN CAN JO BO CHEN PO

@292 LHA GCIG GI GDUNG RUS LAS BYON PA'I RING BSREL GCIG RNAMS
PHUL, BYI BA

LO ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BCU DGU LA YUL DBUS NAS PHUL BA'I ZHU
YIG ,CES

'BUL BAR MDZAD DE 'DI YANG ZHU YIG GI NGO BSHUS 'KHRUL MED 7
GZHUNG SA'I PHYAG

DPE'I KHROD DU YOD PA LAS LHAG CHAD MED PAR BSHUS SHING, 'DI'I
'BUL RTEN

GYI GRAS SU SEL BRA GCIG ZHES PA GANG YIN MA SHES KYANG MA PHYIR
'DUG PAS DE NANG

LTAR BRIS PA YIN LA 'GA' ZHIG GIS RING BSREL 'PHEL BZHIN PA GSUM
SBREL GCIG

ZER RGYU LAS, SEL BRA GCIG CES PA MA DAG PA YIN CES GSUNGS 'DUG
STE

DPYAD PAR MDZOD, 7GONG MA CHEN POS RJE TZONG KHA PAR PHUL BA'I
RTEN CHOS KYI GRANGS

MNGON RTOGS SOGS GONG BSAL TSUR 'BUL PHAR 'BUL GYI ZHU YIG LE
TSAN GNYIS NANG

GSAL GO BSDUR BAR, TSUR PHUL ZHU YIG NANG GSAL GOS YUGS BDUN
ZHES PA

DANG, DAR MDOG CAN YUGS BDUN ZHES PA GNYIS NYIS ZLOS YIG SKYON
BYUNG TSOD

DANG, GZHAN MA MING 'BOD LUGS SOGS MA GCIG PA LAS KHA GRANGS
PHAL CHER

'GRIG GI 'DUG PA DOGS SEL TZAM DU BKOD CING, YANG, RNAM THAR

CHEN MO RNAMS SU 'DI SKABS RGYA YUL DU SKU TSAB SLOB MA MNGAGS
TSUL KHA GSAL BAR

MA 'KHOD KYANG, GSER YIG PA RNAMS NAS CIS KYANG RJE NYID PHEBS
MA THUB

RUNG, SLOB MA BZANG NGES ZHIG GNANG DGOS ZHUS DON, BYAMS CHEN
CHOS

KYI RJE SH'AKYA YE SHES MNGAGS PAR MDZAD LA, CHOS RJE RIN PO
CHES KYANG BKA'

BZHIN RGYA NAG TU BYON NAS 7GONG MA T'A MING RGYAL PO'I DGONGS
BZHED MTHUN PA'I BSHAD

SGRUB 'PHRIN LAS KHYAB GDAL DU CHE BAR MDZAD NAS SLAR YANG BOD
DU PHEBS PA SOGS

ZHIB PA 'OG TU SLOB MA BYON TSUL GYI SKABS NA GSAL LO, ,YANG
RNAM THAR DAD PA'I

@293 'JUG NGOGS SOGS SU 7GONG MA TA MING RGYAL PO 'I GDAN ZHU
GSER YIG SOGS THENGS

GCIG LAS BYUNG TSUL MA GSAL YANG RJE RTOGS LDAN PA CHEN POS
MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR

LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SU, MI DBANG T'A MING RGYAL POS NAN CHEN POS
RGYA YUL

DU SPYAN 'DREN PA'I 'JA' SA DANG, PHYAG RTEN GYI RNAM PA DU MA
DANG, T'A SHIN

BRE BOS GSER YIG DANG BCAS PAR LAN MANG DU SPYAN DRANGS KYANG MA
BYON PAS, DA

RES 'BUL BA BYED ZER NAS PHAN YUL BRGYUD NAS NAM LANG TSE SE RA
CHOS SDINGS SU SLEB

PAR BYAS, ZHES BYUNG BA LTAR NA DE GONG NAS SPYAN 'DREN PA'I
'JA' SA PHYAG RTEN SOGS

LAN MANG DU BYUNG YANG BDAG GIR MA MDZAD PA NYID DU NGES LA,
YANG, RNAM

PA GCIG TU NA RJES 'BYOR GYI GSER YIG PA RNAMS NAS DANG PO 'I
CHAR SPYAN 'DREN PA'I

SBYOR BA MANG DU BRTZAMS KYANG ZHAL GYIS MA BZHES SHING, MJAL DU
YANG MA GNANG BAR

BRTEN RJES SOR GSANG STABS KYIS SKU DRUNG DU BCAR RTZIS BYAS
PA'I DON YIN SHAS CHE SNYAM

DU'ANG DOGS PAS JI LTAR YIN BLO GROS DANG LDAN PA RNAMS KYIS
DGONGS PAR 'TSAL LO, ,

DE YANG SKABS 'DIR GONG MA T'A MING RGYAL POS GSER YIG 'BUL
SKYES DANG BCAS GDAN

'DREN PA'I PHO NYA MNGAGS PA DANG, RJE NYID NAS THOG MAR MJAL
'PHRAD KYANG DKA'

DKA' LTAR MDZAD CING, RJES SU THABS LA MKHAS PA'I BKA' RMAD DU
BYUNG BA STZAL BA'I

SGO NAS 'BYON DU MA BZHED KYANG SKU TSAB TU BYAMS CHEN CHOS KYI
RJE MNGAGS PA SOGS KYI

TSUL 'DI DAG THUN MONG BA'I SNANG TSUL TZAM LAS YANG DAG PAR NA,
RJE TZONG KHA PA NA RJE

BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS NYID YIN PAR MA ZAD, GNAM BSKOS GONG MA
SA'I TSANGS

PA CHEN PO'ANG, RJE BTZUN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG 'JAM
DPAL RGYA MTSO'I

GSUNG LAS, SA BCU'I DBANG PHYUG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS, ,SA
CHEN

@294 CHOS KYI KHRIMS LA 'GOD PA'I PHYIR, ,SA BDAG MI YI GAR
MDZAD TSANGS PA CHE, ,

SA STENG BSTAN 'GRO'I MGON ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, ,'JAM DPAL
DBYANGS NYID

KYI RNAM 'PHRUL YIN PAS 'DI 'DRA BA'I MDZAD PA LA BRTEN NAS YON
MCHOD DU 'BREL BA'I

TSUL GYIS, DON DU SKU'I BKOD PA GCIG GIS MDO SNGAGS YONGS RDZOGS
KYI BSTAN

PA'I SNYING PO GSER ZHUN 'CHANG BA'I RING LUGS KYI SROL RGYA
CHER BTOD CING, RNAM

'PHRUL GCIG GIS SA CHEN PO LA DBANG BA'I STOBS KYI 'KHOR LO
BSGYUR BA CHEN PO 'I RNAM

PAR BSTAN NAS BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO 'DI NYID LA SRI ZHU BKUR STI
GZENGS BSTOD RMAD DU

BYUNG BA DANG, CHAB 'BANGS MTHA' DAG KYANG 'DI NYID LA GCIG TU
DAD CING GUS PA

LHUR LEN PA LA SBYOR ZHING, LOG PAR 'KHU BA MTHA' DAG BSOD NAMS
DANG DPUNG

PA'I STOBS KYIS TSAR BCAD CING SRUNG BA SOGS LA 'KHOR YUG GI
LCAGS RI CHEN PO

DANG MTSUNGS PA STE, DE LTA BU'I YON MCHOD ZUNG DU 'BREL BA'I
THABS MKHAS KYI

MDZAD PA'I MTHU LAS, DENG SANG SNYIGS MAR GYUR PA'I DUS GYI
MTHAR YANG RI BO DGE

LUGS PA ZHES GRUB MTHA' GZHAN LAS LHAG PAR KHYAD DU THON PA'I
DAR RGYAS YUN DU GNAS

PA 'DI LTA BU BYUNG BA YIN NO, ,DE NAS RTZA SHE'I RNAM BSHAD
CHEN MO YANG MDZAD ZIN

CING, GNAS 'DI NYID DU DGA' SKYOR ZUL GSUM GYI GDAN SA PA DANG,
THANG SAG

PA'I GDAN SA ZUR PA LA SOGS PA SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DRUG BRGYA TZAM
'DUS PA RNAMS LA

RTZA SHE'I RNAM BSHAD CHEN MO'I STENG NAS BSHAD LUNG RGYAS PA
DANG, GZHAN YANG BYANG

CHUB LAM RIM, DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED, BZHI BRGYA PA, GSANG SNGAGS
LAM RIM,

RTZA LTUNG DANG, BLA MA LNGA BCU PA'I BSHAD LUNG LA SOGS PA CHOS
KYI 'KHOR LO ZAB

CING RGYA CHE BAR BSKOR, SNE'U NAS DBYAR GNAS KYI BDAG RKYEN
GYIS MTSON DPON

@295 SLOB SPYI SGOS THAMS CAD KYI ZHABS TOG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
MDZAD PA DANG BCAS CHOS

MTHUN GONG 'PHEL GYI NGANG DU LO GNYIS TZAM SER CHOS SDINGS SU
BZHUGS, LO PHYI

MA'I DGAG DBYE THON PA DANG MI DBANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS
GSOL BA BTAB PA LA

BRTEN NAS SKYID SMAD GRUM BU LUNG DU PHYAG BTEG ,PHYAG PHYIR
BYON PA'I BSHES GNYEN

LNGA BRGYA TZAM LA MI'I DBANG POS PHOGS DANG ZHABS TOG PHUL DU
BYUNG BA MDZAD, GZHAN

YANG PHYOGS THA DAD NAS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI LEN
PAR 'DUS PA DANG

BCAS KHYON DGE 'DUN STONG LONGS PA TSOGS SHING DGUN BZHUGS KYANG
DE KHAR MDZAD,

LAM RIM DANG, BDE MCHOG L'U HI BA'I SGRUB THAMS DANG, MA RGYUD
KYI

RDZOGS RIM SOGS ZAB CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHER BSKOR, SNGA SOR
SER NAS PHYAG

MI 'DEGS PA'I GONG TZAM NAS LHA SAR SMON LAM CHEN MO GSAR 'DZUGS
MDZAD RGYU'I

THUGS KYI 'DUN PA BTANG STE, DPON NAM MKHA' BZANG PO LA'ANG ZHAL
TA BYON, KHONG

PAS KYANG LHA SA'I DKYIL 'KHOR STENG DANG SENG G-YAB SOGS KYI
ZHIG GSO RLABS CHEN

MDZAD CING, SMON LAM GYI MCHOD PA'I YO BYAD RNAMS KYI STA GON
YANG LEGS PAR

MDZAD, GZHAN YANG GRUB BU LUNG DU BZHUGS KYI RING LA 'BRI KHUNG
DANG RVA SGRENG,

'ON DANG 'OL DGA' TSUN CHAD KYI SDE DGON, MI CHEN, YON BDAG ,

BU SLOB KYI TSOGS LA DAD 'BUL BSKUL BA PHYOGS PHYOGS SU MNGAGS
PA SOGS KYI ZHAL

TA DANG THUGS STZOL CHER MDZAD CING, MI DBANG GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN PA LA'ANG

ZHAL TA ZHIB PAR BYON, DE LTAR MDZAD PA'I THUGS RJE'I SHUGS KYIS
DAD 'BUL KYI

DNGOS PO 'I 'BYOR TSOGS MTHA' YAS SHING DPAGS PAR DKA' BA BYUNG,
SMON

LAM GYI THUGS 'DUN MDZAD PHYIN CHAD BDAG NYID CHEN PO DPON SLOB
RNAMS RANG LA'ANG PHYAG

@296 TU YO BYAD CI BYUNG PHAL MO CHE SMON LAM GYI CHA RKYEN NYID
DU BSNGO BAR MDZAN DO, ,SMRAS PA,

MKHYEN PA'I GTER GYI GSUNG GSANG RTA BDUN GYIS, ,DRANGS PAS
GSANG CHEN THEG

PA'I LEGS BSHAD KYI, ,SNGON MED NYIN BYED MCHOG 'DIR SHAR BA
YIS, ,

'BRAS BU'I THEG PA'I PAD TSAL DUS GCIG PHYE, ,ZAB GSANG LAM GYI
RIM PA'I

GNAD SPYI DANG, ,KHYAD PAR THOB BYA'I GNAD DON MTHAR THUG PA,
,'OD GSAL

SGYU LUS ZUNG 'JUG DANG BCAS PA'I, ,DKA' BA'I GNAS KUN MA SBAS
LHUG PAR

DKROL, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS JI LTAR DGONGS PA'I DON, ,'PHAGS PA
KLU SGRUB

YAB SRAS KYIS DKROL BA, ,SNGON CHAD PHYOGS 'DIR PHAL GYIS MA
RTOGS KYANG, ,GANG

GIS LAG MTHIL SKYU RU RA BZHIN STON, ,TSE GCIG 'TSANG RGYA'I LAM
BZANG ZLA MED KYI, ,

THEG PAR MCHOG DMAN KUN GYIS GLENG MOD KYANG, ,MTHAR THUG GNAD
DON KHONG DU

MA CHUD NA, ,MYUR DU 'TSANG RGYAR 'DOD KYANG YID SMON TZAM, ,'DI
LTA'I TSUL

LA LEGS PAR BSAMS BYAS NA, ,RANG CAG KHA BA CAN PA'I YID CAN LA,
,RGYAL DANG DE

SRAS GZHAN LAS LHAG PAR DU, ,BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I NGO MTSAR SHES
PAR 'GYUR, ,

DAM CHOS BDUD RTZI'I GRU CHAR 'BEBS PA'I TSE, ,NAG PHYOGS BDUD
SDE'I 'TSUB MA LDANG

GYUR KYANG, ,BYAMS PA'I TING 'DZIN GCIG GIS GZHIL MDZAD PA'I,
,TSUL

'DI ZAS GTZANG SRAS DANG DBYE BA CI, ,GRUB PA'I BSTI GNAS SE RA
CHOS SDINGS SU, ,

ZAB DON NYAMS SU BZHES LA BRTZON BZHIN PAR, ,ZAB MO DBU MA'I
RNAM BSHAD LA

SOGS PA'I, ,ZAB GSANG LEGS BSHAD RGYA CHE THANG MAR GDAL, ,SMRA
BA'I NYI MA

MKHAS MCHOG DGE LEGS DPAL, ,MJAL BA'I MOD LA YAB SRAS SKYES RABS
SU, ,

'BREL BA'I NGANG TSUL GSAL BAR MNGON GYUR PAS, ,DPYOD LDAN MTHA'
DAG LAG

@297 PAD SNYING GAR ZUM, ,GANG GI MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO'I SNYAN
GRAGS RNGA, ,SRID

PA'I KHONGS NA CHES CHER LDIR BA YIS, ,SHAR PHYOGS SA YI TSANGS
PA'ANG MOS GUS

KYI; ;RGYA MTSO'I RBA RLABS CI YANG MKHA' LA PHYUR, ,BSNGAGS
TSIG NOR BUS SPUD PA'I

ZHU 'PHRIN DANG, ,SRID NA RIN THANG CHE BA'I BDOG PA'I SKYES,
,RIGS GZUGS 'BYOR

PAS MTHO BA'I MI SNA SOGS, ,'BAD PA CHEN POS KHA BA'I LJONGS
'DIR MNGAGS, ,

GDUL BYA'I SNANG NGOR GSHEGS BZHUD MA BZHED KYANG, ,ZHU 'PHRIN
SGO NAS YON MCHOD

THUGS 'DRES PA'I, ,TSUL 'DIS ZHVA SER BSTAN PAS 'DZAM GLING
KHYON, ,KHYAB PA'I

RTEN 'BREL SGO 'PHAR PHYE BAR GYUR, ,CES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI
BSDU BA'I TSIGS SU

BCAD PA'O, ,DE NAS SNGON RGYA GAR 'PHAGS PA'I YUL GYI GRONG
KHYER KHYAD PAR DU

'PHAGS PA MNYAN YOD KYI GNAS SU, BDAG CAG GI STON PA MNYAM MED
SH'AKYA'I RGYAL

POS, MU STEGS KYI STON PA RDZOGS BYED DANG, KUN TU RGYU GNAG
LHAS KYI BU

DANG, SMRA 'DOD KYI BU MO 'I BU YAN LAG RGYAL BA CAN DANG, MI
PHAM SKRA'I LA BA

CAN DANG, KA TYA'I BU NOG CAN DANG, GCER BU PA GNYEN GYI BU STE
MU STEGS STON PA

DRUG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA SOGS NAG PHYOGS KYI SDER GTOGS PA THAMS
CAD CHO 'PHRUL

CHEN POS TSAR BCAD CING PHAM PAR MDZAD DE BDUD KYI RGYAL MTSAN
NI YONGS SU BSNYIL,

BSTAN PA LA DAD PA'I DKAR PO 'I PHYOGS RNAMS RGYAL BAR MDZAD
PA'I SGO NAS DAM PA'I

CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN PHYOGS BCUR BSGRENGS PA'I DUS KHYAD PAR CAN
MNYAN YOD CHO 'PHRUL

CHEN PO'I DUS CHEN DU GRAGS PA 'DI NYID LA, SNGON RGYA GAR
'PHAGS PA'I YUL DU'ANG

CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RNAMS KYI SKU RING LA BDE BAR GSHEGS PA'I RTEN
GSUM KHYAD PAR CAN

RNAMS LA MCHOD PA'I BYE BRAG BZANG ZHING MTHA' KLAS PA DU MA
DANG, DGE 'DUN GYI SDE

@298 RNAMS LA ZANG ZING GI BSNYEN BKUR RGYA CHEN PO DANG 'BREL
BAR MCHOD PA DANG, SMON

LAM GYI BYE BRAG 'BYAMS SU KLAS PA'I SGO NAS 'GRO BA DPAG TU MED
PA'I BSOD NAMS KYI

SGO 'PHAR PHYE BA'I SROL BZANG BAR MA CHAD DU DAR ZHING, BOD YUL
'DIR YANG SNGON

GYI DUS NAS BZUNG DE LTA BU'I SROL BZANG PO RIM PAR MCHIS MOD
KYANG, DUS

KYI 'GYUR BA SNA TSOGS PAS STAR CHAGS MIN CI RIGS MA ZAD, LHAG
PAR MCHOD

PA DANG SBYIN PA SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI 'DU 'GOD HA CANG RLABS CHE
BA'I SROL YANG PHAL MO

CHE LA MA DAR BA LA, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NAS GTZO BO THUB
BSTAN SPYI DGOS DAR

RGYAS YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, MTHA' DBUS KYI SKYES 'GRO BGRANG
BA LAS BRGAL

BA'I RGYUD LA RNAM DKAR GYI 'BREL BA RLABS PO CHE 'JOG PA'I SGO
NAS THAR PA DANG THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA'I GZHI RTEN RMANGS NAS TSUGS PA DANG, 'JIG RTEN
GYI KHAMS KUN

PHAN PA DANG BDE BA'I SNANG BA DKAR POS YUGS GCIG TU KHYAB PAR
'GYUR BA SOGS KYI

THUGS BSKYED TSAD MED PAS KUN NAS BLANGS TE, DE GONG NAS KYANG
LO LTAR GAR BZHUGS

KYI GNAS SU CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM CHEN MO'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA RGYA
CHE CHAG MED DU MDZAD PA

NAS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I NANG TSAN SA MO GLANG GI LOR RVA SA
'PHRUL SNANG GI GTZUG

LAG KHANG DU JO SH'AKYA YID BZHIN NOR BU NYID KYI SPYAN SNGAR
CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM CHEN PO'I

MCHOD SBYIN GYI 'DU 'GOD RLABS CHE BA MDZAD PAR DGONGS TE, GONG
DU BRJOD MA THAG

PA LTAR MI DBANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PA SOGS LA BKA' BKOD GNANG
DON BZHIN TSANG

MAR DGE BSKUL GYIS KHYAB PAS RNAM DKAR GYI YO BYAD MTHA' KLAS
PA'I 'BUL BA DANG,

TSON RTZI GSER SHOG SOGS BZANG ZHING GYA NOMS DPAG TU MED PA
BYUNG BAS, SA BYI

LO 'I STON DUS TZAM NAS LHA SAR ZHAL TA MDZAD DE LHA BZO BA MANG
DU BSAGS, LHA

@299 SA'I BRIS 'BUR GYI SKU RNAMS LA BAR LAM SRI ZHU MA BYUNG BA
YUN RING BAS SNANG BRNYAN PHAL

MO CHE DRI MAS SBAGS PAS SKU MDOG TZAM YANG NGES DKA' BA'I GNAS
SU GYUR PA RNAMS

DRI BZANG GI CHU LA SOGS PAS LEGS PAR BKRUS, DAG BYED KYI RDZAS
KHA NA MA THO BA

MED PA RNAMS KYIS YONGS SU DAG PAR BGYID PA'I THOG ,SLAR TSON
BZANG PO RNAMS

KYIS NYAMS PA MTHA' DAG BSOS SHING, GSER SHOG LA SOGS PAS LEGS
PAR

SPRAS TE GSAR DU BZHENGS PA DANG GNYIS SU MA MCHIS PAR MDZAD,
GZHAN YANG

BZO RIG PA DU MA BSAGS NAS GOS DAR GYI 'BUL BA BYUNG BA RNAMS LA
SKU GZUGS

RNAMS KYI NA BZA'I KHYAD PAR DU MA DANG, RGYAL MTSAN DANG BDAN
LA SOGS PA'I BYE

BRAG DU MA TSEMS PA SOGS STA GON GYI RIM PA RNAMS LEGS PAR 'DU
MDZAD, DE NAS

BYI LO ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I SMAD TZAM LA GRUM BU LUNG NAS PHYAG
BTEGS TE LHA SAR BYON,

GNAM GANG GI NYIN SNYAN GSAN 'BEBS PA'I MCHOD PA MDZAD, DGE 'DUN
STONG PHRAG

BRGYAD LHAG TZAM 'DUS PA LA, DPON SLOB RNAMS RANG GIS SBYIN BDAG
MDZAD NAS MI RE

LA MAR LHA SRANG GI NYAG BZHI TZAM RE DANG, JA DKAR ZHO DRUG CU
RTZA GRANGS KYI MANG JA

DANG BCAS PA'I 'DZUGS STON DRANGS, RJE NYID DGUNG LO NGA GSUM DU
PHEBS PA SA MO

GLANG GI LO HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES GCIG NAS BCO LNGA'I BAR CHO
'PHRUL CHEN PO 'I DUS KYI

MCHOD PA DNGOS GZHI MDZAD PA LA, DE YANG SNGON 'PHAGS PA'I YUL
GYI SBYIN BDAG RGYAL

PO GSAL RGYAL LA SOGS PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR, DUS 'DIR YANG TSES
GCIG

NAS NYIN SO SOR DMIGS GSAL KYI SBYIN BDAG DANG, DE DAG GI ZANG
ZING GI BKUR

STI JI LTAR SGRUB TSUL DANG BCAS PA RNAMS 'OG TU DKYUS GCIG TU
'GOD PAR BYA LA,

SNGA 'PHROS RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO RANG NAS SMON LAM CHEN MOR
MDZAD PA JI LTAR MDZAD TSUL

@300 RNAMS RAGS RIM SDOM GYI TSUL DU BKOD NA, JO BO SH'AKYA NE'I
SNANG BRNYAN LA

GSER BZANG PO 'BA' ZHIG GI RGYU TSOGS LAS SGRUB PA'I DBU RGYAN
LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS

PA RIGS LNGA'I SNANG BRNYAN 'PHUL MA 'BUR DOD DAR DPYANGS KYANG
GSER LAS BYAS PA,

RIN PO CHE NAL DANG, MU TIG DANG, G-YU LA SOGS PA SRID NA DKON
ZHING RIN

THANG CHE BA'I RIN PO CHE'I PHRA TSOMS DU MAS MDZES PAR BYAS PA
SOGS BZO BKOD PHUN

SUM TSOGS PA DANG LDAN PA DANG, JO BO MI BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG BCU
GCIG ZHAL GNYIS

SO SOR DNGUL DKAR LHAD MED KYI RGYU TSOGS LAS SGRUB PA'I DBU
RGYAN BZO BKOD RMAD DU

BYUNG BA DANG BCAS PA 'BUL BAR MDZAD, JO BO SH'AKYA MU NE'I SKU
MDUN DU DNGUL GYI

LHUNG BZED CHE TSAD DU LONGS PA, DE'I KHA LA 'TSAMS PA'I DNGUL
GYI MAndAL DANG

BCAS PA, JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS, BCU GCIG ZHAL DANG BCAS PA LA CHO
'PHRUL

GYI RING NYIN RE BZHIN ZHAL GSER CHAG MED DANG, TSES BRGYAD DANG
BCO LNGA RNAMS

SU SKU YONGS RDZOGS LA GSER CHAB DANG BCAS PA 'BUL BAR MDZAD, JO
SHAK GNYIS

DANG THUB PA GANGS CAN MTSOS GTZO MDZAD PA'I RAB BYUNG SPRUL
SKU'I RNAM PA CAN GYI 'BUR

SKU THAMS CAD LA, GOS DAR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA LAS GRUB PA'I BLA
GOS DANG

SNAM SBYAR, SEMS DPA' SEMS MA BCU DRUG SOGS DANG, KHRO BA'I RNAM

PA CAN LA SOGS PA LA DAR BZANG PO DANG, GAN GOS LA SOGS PA'I
STOD G-YOGS

SMAD G-YOGS DANG, GZHAN YANG MDO MANG PO LAS BYUNG BA LTAR
GTZUG LAG KHANG

CHE CHUNG RNAMS KYI TOG DANG BYA 'DAB LA SOGS PA'I RTZE ZUR PHAN
TSUN DU THA GUS SBREL BA

THAMS CAD LA BA DAN DANG, RNGA YAB DANG, DRIL BU LA SOGS PAS BAR

MA CHAD DU MDZES PAR BAS SHING, PHYI'I SKOR LAM CHEN MO'I PHYI
ROL NAS SHING

@301 CHEN PO 'PHANG SHIN TU MTHO BA RNAMS LA GOS DAR SOGS LAS
BYAS PA'I BA DAN CHEN PO

'JIGS SU RUNG BA LA PHYOGS SKYONG DE DANG DE'I SKUS TOG LA RGYAN
CING, DE DANG DE'I SNGAGS

BA DAN NYID LA BRIS PA BCO LNGA PHYOGS SKYONG BA BCO LNGA BO
RANG RANG GI PHYOGS SU LEGS PAR

BTZUGS NAS NUB RE BZHIN DE DAG GI RTZA BA'I GTOR STEGS KHAR
PHYOGS GTOR GTONG BA

DANG, DE DAG GI BAR BAR DU GDUGS DKAR LA SOGS PA'I RGYAL MTSAN
RANG RANG GI CHO

GA BZHIN DU LEGS PAR BTZUGS SHING, SHER PHYIN GYI MDO SDE LAS
BYUNG BA LTAR BA DAN

DANG RGYAL MTSAN DE DAG GI SHING RNAMS THA GUS SBREL BA LA PHAN
DANG, RNGA G-YAB DANG,

DRIL BU SOGS PAS BAR MA CHAD DU MDZES PAR BYAS PA NI 'JA' TSON
KUN NAS BKRA BAS

NAM MKHA'I KHAMS KHYAB PAR BYAS PA LTA BU DANG, NYIN PAR YANG
KHYAMS NANG MA YAN

CHAD LA MAR ME BRGYA PHRAG BZHI RE TZAM DANG, BAR SKOR LA BRGYA
PHRAG LHAG PA DANG, PHYI

SKOR LA RDO RING GI 'GRAM, JO BO RIN PO CHE'I ZHAL DRANG THAD DU
KONG BU CHEN PO GRU BZHI

BA PHYOGS RE LA 'DOM TSAD MA GSUM GSUM YOD PA DE NYID, MAR GYIS
LEGS PAR

BKANG BA LA SDONG BU 'TSAMS PA RE BSKRUN PA LAS 'BAR BA'I ME LCE
NI GSER GYI MCHOD

SDONG GIS NAM MKHA'I KHAMS 'GOG PAR BYED PA LTA BUS THOG DRANGS,
RDZA'I KHOG MA CHEN

PO MAR GYIS BKANG BA LA SDONG BU MI CHEN PO'I LAG PA'I SBOM
TZAM, 'PHANG MDA' TSAD

LHAG TZAM LA SBAR BA'I MAR ME'I 'PHRENG BA BAR THAG 'TSAMS PAR
BKOD PAS PHYI SKOR GYI

PHYI RIM 'KHOR BA DANG, GZHAN YANG RVA MO CHE, KLU SBUG ,PO TA
LA, GUNG THANG RNAMS SU'ANG

MAR ME DU MA DANG, MTSAN MA NI BAR SKOR GYI RTZIG 'GRAM 'KHOR BA
DANG, KHYAMS RVA PHYI

MA'I KA TSAR JI LTAR YOD PA BZHIN DU MAR ME'I 'PHRENG BA BKOD
PAS MIG GIS BLTA BA

TZAM YANG BZOD DKA' BAR BYAS TE, JI LTAR SA CHEN PO LA MNGON PAR
BKRA BA'I SGRON

@302 ME'I 'PHRENG BAS, LHA'I LAM LA 'KHRIGS PA'I RGYU SKAR GYI
TSOGS LA 'PHYA BA GSAL

BAR BYED PA'I SO SO'I 'OD ZER GYIS MTSAN GUNG LA BAB PA'I MUN
PA'I TSOGS DPUNG

DANG BCAS PA'ANG RAB TU ZHUM ZHI NGA NGO TSA BAS SA'I 'OG TU
SONG STE KUN GYI MIG LAM DU

MI MNGON PAR GYUR LA, RVA MO CHE DANG PO TA LA TSUN CHAD KYI
LCANG MA'I LCUG PHRAN GZHON NU

DAG GI RANG RANG GI LUS KYI GRIB MA'ANG NYIN MO JI LTAR SA LA
BAB PAS NYIN MTSAN GYI KHYAD

PAR MI PHYED PA LTAR DU GYUR CING, RGYU SKAR GYI TSOGS NI 'DI
LTAR NYI MA BRGYA PHRAG MANG

PO ZHIG CIG CAR SA GZHI LAS THON TE BDAG CAG RNAMS GNAS NAS
SKROD PAR CHAS SAM

SNYAM DU 'JIGS PA LHUR LEN PA'I BAB COL GYIS MTSAN PHYED LA NAM
MKHA'I LAM BTANG

STE RGYA MTSO CHEN POR BROS PA LTAR, MTSAN MO'I GUNG LA STENG DU
MNGON PAR BLTAS PA NA

NAM MKHA' MAR ME'I 'OD KYI GOS DANG BCAS PA'I KHA DOG DMAR SKYA
NYID DU MTHONG BA MA

GTOGS RGYU SKAR GCIG GI GZUGS KYANG MTHONG BA'I YUL LAS 'DAS PAR
GYUR TO, ,

GZHAN YANG NYIN RE BZHIN YON CHAB BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA GSAR DU
MNGON PAR BSHAMS PA

LA KHA CHE'I DRI BZANG SBANGS PA'I KHU BAS KHA LEGS PAR BSGYUR
BAS BEEd'U RYA SER PO'I

ZHUN MA SNOD KYI 'PHRENG BAR BLUGS PA LTAR GYUR CING, GUR KUM
GYI RO MA NI NYIN RE

LA'ANG BRE GRANGS DU MAR LONGS PA DANG, DE BZHIN DU SPOS KYI
RGYAL MTSAN DANG, GDUGS

DANG, SPOS SNOD THA DAD DU MNGON PAR BSREGS PA LA SOGS PA'I DRI
BZANG POS PHYI

ROL 'KHOR YUGS THAMS CAD NYIN MTSAN BAR MED DU MNGON PAR KHYAB
CING DU BA RNAMS NI

BAR SNANG LA SPRIN SNA RING PO DAG DANG PHAN TSUN 'DUS PAS LDA
LDI BRES PA LTA BU DANG,

THA NA PHYI SKOR GYI LAM TSUN CHOD KYANG SPOS KYI CHUS CHAG CHAG
BTAB PAR BYAS NA NANG SKOR GYI

SA GZHI GZHAN DAG LTA CI SMOS, KONG BU CHEN PO'I G-YAS G-YON
DU SA STEGS KYI KHAR

@303 RTZAM KHAL BRGYA RE LAS BYAS PA'I LHA BSHOS RGYAN BZANG PO
DPAG TU MED PAS SPRAS PA DANG,

'PHYAR BA DANG BTZUGS PA LA SOGS PAS LHAG PAR MDZES PAR BYAS PA
DAG MNGON PAR

BSHAMS SHING, GZHAN DU ZHAL ZAS MDA' TSAD LHAG TZAM LA RGYAL
SRID RIN PO CHE

SNA BDUN LA SOGS PA'I RGYAN YID 'PHROG PAS BRGYAN PA BRGYA RTZA
BRGYAD RE NYIN RE BZHIN

GSAR DU 'BUL BAR MDZAD, ZHAL ZAS RNYING PA RNAMS NI BDAG GIR
BYED PA MED PAR

SKYE BO PHONGS PA SPRANG PO'I TSOGS LA LTOS MED DU BYIN PAS,
PHONGS PA DAG BKRES

PA'I 'DU SHES KYI 'CHING BA LAS GROL NAS BZA' BTUNG GIS TSIM PA
LHAG PAR THOB PAS

SLAR BZA' BA YID LA MI BYED PA LTA BUR GYUR TO, ,GZHAN YANG RJE
NYID KYIS GYERE

MAS 'PHRANG NAS GTER DU BZHES PA'I DNGUL DAM RTA MGO MA LA SOGS
PA NGO MTSAR BA'I

MCHOD PA'I BYE BRAG MTHA' YAS PA DANG, RGYAL SRID RIN PO CHE SNA
BDUN DANG,

BKRA SHIS PA'I RTAGS BRGYAD DANG, RDZAS BRGYAD LA SOGS PA LHA
MI'I 'DOD YON

PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I BKOD PA YID 'PHROG PA DPAG TU MED PA MNGON
PAR BSHAMS SHING,

DE THAMS CAD RJE BLA MA NYID KYIS SNGAGS DANG PHYAG RGYA DANG
TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS BDE BA CHEN

PO'I NGO BOR BYIN GYIS BRLABS NAS, SDOM BRTZON SDE SNOD 'DZIN
PA'I 'DUS PA'I

TSOGS DANG BCAS MDO DANG RGYUD SDE NAS BYUNG BA'I CHO GA RNAM
PAR DAG PAS MCHOD DE

PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS PA THAMS CAD YONGS SU MNYES
PAR MDZAD PA DANG,

BSTAN 'GRO 'BA' ZHIG LA DGONGS PA'I THUGS BSKYED SHUGS DRAG POS
THUB BSTAN RIN

PO CHE 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS SU MI NUB YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG,
SEMS CAN MTHA'

DAG LA PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYUN MI CHAD DU 'BYUNG BA'I SMON LAM
GYI MTSAMS SBYOR RNAM PAR

DAG CING RGYA CHEN PO NYIN RE BZHIN DU MDZAD LA, TSUL DE DAG LA
GSANG BA'I RNAM

@304 THAR GSOL 'DEBS SU, CHOS 'KHOR LHA SAR CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I
DUS, ,

NGO MTSAR BKRA SHIS SNA TSOGS BRGYA BKOD PA'I, ,MCHOD PA BDE BA
CHEN POR BYIN

BRLABS NAS, ,PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS MNYES PAR MDZAD,
,CES

GSUNGS PA YIN NO, ,DE DAG GI TSE SNGAR RDZING PHYI DANG, RGYA
SOGS PHU SOGS SU

GZIGS SNANG BYUNG BA DANG MTHUN PAR PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL BA RNAMS
MCHOD PA'I YUL DANG

SMON LAM GYI DPANG POR SPYAN DRANGS PA'I TSE, SHAR PHYOGS KYI DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA

THAMS CAD RNAM SNANG GI RNAM PA CAN GYIS SHAR PHYOGS KYI NAM
MKHA' THAMS CAD KHYAB PAR

'KHRIGS PA DANG, DE BZHIN DU LHO PHYOGS PA THAMS CAD RIN 'BYUNG,
NUB

PHYOGS PA THAMS CAD 'OD DPAG MED, BYANG PHYOGS PA THAMS CAD DON
GRUB,

STENG GI CHA THAMS CAD MI BSKYOD PA'I RNAM PA CAN GYIS BAR
MTSAMS MED PA GUR PHUB PA

LTAR GYUR TE MCHOD TSOGS BDAG GIR MDZAD PA'I GZIGS SNANG RGYUN
MI CHAD DU BYUNG STE,

GSANG RNAM GSOL 'DEBS LAS, PHYOGS BCUR BZHUGS PA'I RGYAL BA SRAS
BCAS

RNAMS, ,RNAM DAG SMON PA'I DPANG POR SPYAN DRANGS TSE, ,RANG
RANG PHYOGS KYI

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA YI, ,SKU YI BKOD PAS MCHOD PA BDAG GIR MDZAD,
,

CES GSUNGS SO, ,GZHAN YANG DE DUS GRUB CHEN KU COR RTOGS LDAN
PA'I GSUNG

LAS, SMON LAM GYI SKABS LTUNG BSHAGS ZHAL 'DON MDZAD PA'I TSE,
PHYOGS KYI

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DE DAG GI 'OG TZAM GYI NAM MKHAR SANGS RGYAS
SUM CU SO LNGA DANG,

SMAN BLA BDE GSHEGS BDUN, BYAMS PA, TSE DPAG MED, SGROL MA,

GDUGS DKAR, DBYANGS CAN MA, GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CU SOGS BZHUGS PAR

GSUNGS LA, YANG MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR BA'I GZIGS SNANG LA, RJE
BDAG

@305 NYID CHEN PO'I DBU'I STENG NA RIGS GSUM MGON PO BZHUGS
SHING, MTHA' BSKOR

DU DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I SRUNG MA PHAL CHE BAS MEL TSE MDZAD
CING BZHUGS PA GZIGS

PA DANG, YANG, DE DUS KU COR RTOGS LDAN LHA SA'I RAG KHAR MTSAMS

MDZAD YOD PA NAM ZHIG GROL NAS BYON PAS GLANG CHEN GDONG NAS
GRUB CHEN SHA WA RI DANG

MJAL BAR GAR 'BYON ZHUS PAR, NGED CAG GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CU RNAMS
CHOS RJE BLO

BZANG GRAGS PAS SMON LAM GYI MGON DU GDAN DRANGS PA LAS GZHAN
RNAMS PHEBS ZIN,

KHO BO CUNG ZAD PHYIS PA YIN GSUNG BA DANG, GZHAN YANG LAS DAG
PA MANG PO'I

MTHONG SNANG LA NAM GUNG LA GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CU SKOR BA SMON
LAM
MDZAD PA DANG, LHA

KLUS SKOR BA RGYUN MI CHAD DU BYED PA MTHONG BA SOGS NGO MTSAR
BA'I YON TAN MTHA' KLAS

SHING, DGE 'DUN SKYE BO'I TSOGS DANG BCAS PA LA NYIN RE BZHIN
SLOB DPON DPA'

POS MDZAD PA'I SKYES RABS NAS CHOS THUN RE YANG CHAG MED DU
GSUNGS SO, ,DE'I

TSE LHA MCHOD MI MCHOD RNAMS KYI MTHIL LEN DANG, PHYOGS PHYOGS
NAS 'DUS PA'I

BLA MA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN, MI DPON SOGS DANG 'BUL BSKYEL BA LA
BYON PA THAMS

CAD DANG, BZO RIG PA SO SO LA SOGS PA THAMS CAD KYI SNE LEN
DANG, CHAS

KA RNAMS KYI DO DAM LA SOGS PA MTHA' DAG DPON NAM MKHA' BZANG PO
KHU DBON GYIS

DAD PA DANG GTONG BA RGYA CHEN POS GUS PAS BSGRUBS SHING, BDAG
PO CHEN PO MI DBANG

GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS KYANG MCHOD PA SOGS KYI MTHIL LEN THUGS
KHUR RGYA CHER

BZHES PA DANG, GZHAN YANG 'OG NAS 'CHAD 'GYUR LTAR 'BRI KHUNG
SOGS SBYIN BDAG

FKHAG MANG NAS DAD 'BUL DANG, BSTEN BKUR MANG BAS ZHAG BCU DRUG
GI RING LA

NYIN LTAR DGE 'DUN KHRI RA CAN TZAM LA MANG JA NYIN 'KHYONGS,
SNGA DRO BZHES THUG

@306 THENGS GNYIS, TSA GRO DANG BCAS PA CHAG MED DU BYUNG ZHING,
TSA GRO LA DGE

'DUN TSOGS PA'I TSE BSOD NAMS CHE BA LA DGONGS NAS GRAL DU TSA
GRO MI BZHES PAR

SKOR BA MDZAD PA'I DGE 'DUN YANG STONG LHAG TZAM RE YOD PAR
SNANG, DE BAS

KYANG SKYE BO MI NAG PA'I TSOGS 'DUS PA NI SHIN TU MANG BA KHRI
PHRAG DU MAR YOD PAR SNANG

LA; RJE NYID KYI THUGS RJE'I SHUGS KYIS DE TZAM DU 'DUS PA'I
SKYE BO THAMS CAD KYANG

PHAD TSUN TSIG RTZUB MO TZAM GYI 'THAB MO MNGON MTSAN CAN BYED
PA SOGS GCIG KYANG MED

PAR DGA' ZHING MDZA' BA LHUR BYED PA DANG, SKOR BA GZHAN GYI
SKABS LTAR GLU GZHAS

DANG, RKANG BRO, CHANG 'THUNG BA LA SOGS PA BAG MED PA'I SPYOD
PA MTHA' DAG RANG

SHUGS KYIS RGYANG RING DU BSRINGS TE, THAMS CAD RANG BZHIN GYIS
RGYUD 'JAM PA DANG,

DAD PA DANG DGE BA LA SPRO BA SOGS KYI GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR PAS
NYIN MTSAN 'KHOR YUG

TU CHOS NYAN PA DANG, PHYAG DANG, SKOR BA DANG, SMON LAM 'DEBS
PA

DANG, GZUNGS KHA TON DU BYED PA SOGS 'BA' ZHIG GIS DUS 'DA' BAR
GYUR LA,

DE YANG MTSAN PHYED RANG GI DUS LA BAB PA NA PHYI SKOR BYED PA
NYIN MO BAS CUNG ZAD NYUNG BA

MNGON PA TZAM MA GTOGS SKOR BA BYED PA BAR CHAD PA NI CUNG ZAD
KYANG MA BYUNG NGO, ,

DE SKABS SHIG NYAMS SNANG BZANG POR YOD PA'I THUGS DAM PA ZHIG
GI MNAL LAM DU,

BUD MED CHEN PO ZHIG GIS LAG PA GNYIS KYIS GTZUG LAG KHANG LA
'KHYUD 'DUG ,

CI BYED BYAS PAS ME'I GNOD PA SRUNG BA YIN ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG
'DUG PA LTAR, DE'I

PHYI NUB KONG BU CHEN PO'I MAR KHU PHAL MO CHE RDZOGS, MAR GSAR
PA MA BLUGS

PA'I MTSAMS SHIG TU KONG BU'I NANG GI RAS RDOG RNAMS DANG, MAR
LHAG DANG BCAS

PAR ME 'BAR NAS SHIN TU CHE BA'I ME'I PHUNG POR GYUR TE, SKYE BO
THAMS CAD 'JIGS

@307 SHING SKRAG PAR GYUR PA LA RJE NYID DE MA KHAD GZIMS CHUNG
DU BYON NAS THUGS DAM LA

BZHUGS PAS RLUNG SIR BU CUNG ZAD KYANG MA LDANG ZHING, DKA' BA
MED PAR THABS

RNAMS KYIS SHIN TU BZLOG SLA BAR BYUNG NAS DE MA THAG ZHI ZHING
GNOD PA CUNG ZAD KYANG MA BYUNG

BA DANG, YANG THUGS DAM PA NYAMS SNANG SHIN TU BZANG BA ZHIG GI
MNAL LAM DU, LHA

SA'I NYE SKOR GYI GZHI LAS SKYE BO'I TSOGS GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA
THON NAS, THAMS CAD

NAM MKHA' LA YAR THAL BYUNG DU 'GRO BA ZHIG 'DUG PA LA, 'DI CI
YIN BYAS PAS NGED

RNAMS JO BO RIN PO CHE LA 'DI LTAR MCHOD PAS TSANGS PA'I 'JIG
RTEN DU 'GRO BA YIN

ZER BA BYUNG 'DUG PA LTAR 'GRO BA TSAD MED GRANGS MED DPAG TU
MED PA THAR PA DANG THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA'I SA LA 'GOD PA'I 'PHRIN LAS RLABS CHEN TSAD MED
PA ZHIG DUS SKAD

CIG NYID LA GRUB PAR MDZAD DO, ,SMRAS PA, LHA LDAN 'PHRUL SNANG
GANDO LA CHEN

POR, ,LHA YI LHA MCHOG SH'AKYA MU NE'I DRUNG, ,LHA MI KUN GYI
BSOD NAMS SPEL

BA'I SLAD, ,LHA MCHOD SMON LAM CHEN MOR GRAGS PA TSUGS, ,SNGON
BYUNG STON

PA'I CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO LA, ,RJES SU YI RANG DGE BA RGYA CHEN
PO, ,DPAG MED

'GRO BA'I RGYUD LA BSKRUN PA DES, ,SRID PA'I GZHI 'DI HRUL PO
NYID DU BYAS, ,LHA

DANG MI YI MKHO DGU'I DNGOS PO KUN, ,MA BOS DBYAR GYI SPRIN
TSOGS JI BZHIN DU, ,

'BAD MED DUS GCIG 'DUS PA'ANG MGON KHYOD KYI, ,THUGS BSKYED RGYA
MTSO GYEN

DU PHYUR BA'I MTHU, ,SDE SNOD 'DZIN DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PO
SOGS, ,KHRIMS

LDAN MKHAS GRUB 'DUS PA NGANG MO'I KHYU, ,GRANGS MED CHOS KYI
RDZING BUR 'DUS NAS

KYANG, ,'KHOR GSUM BYA BA'I MGRIN RNGA CI YANG 'KHROL, ,MTHA'
DBUS SKYE BO

BGRANG BYA'I YUL 'DAS PA, ,PHYOGS 'DIR 'DUS NAS MCHOD DANG
BSNYEN BKUR DANG, ,

@308 PHYAG SKOR KHA BTON LA SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI, ,BYA BAS NYIN
MTSAN BYE BRAG PHYED MA

GYUR, ,MNYAN YOD RGYAL BYED TSAL DE JI BZHIN DU, ,CHOS DANG ZANG
ZING GNYIS KA'I 'DU

LONG GIS, ,'KHOR YUG KHYON 'DI 'GENGS PA'I LTAD MO LA, ,GTZANG
MA'I LHA RIGS

MAN CHOD BLTA BAS BREL, ,PHYOGS BCUR BZHUGS PA'I RGYAL DANG DE
SRAS KUN, ,NAM MKHA'I

LAM NAS CHU 'DZIN BTIB PA LTAR, ,DNGOS SU BYON NAS MCHOD TSOGS
BDAG GIR DU, ,

BZHES PA'I BSKAL BZANG MNGON SUM GYUR 'DI MTSAR, ,MCHOD DANG
MCHOD YUL MCHOD

PA'I DNGOS PO KUN, ,NGO BOS GRUB PA MED PA'I RANG GSHIS LAS,
,BDE

BA CHEN PO'I PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PA YI, ,ZUNG 'JUG DGA' BA'I NGO
MTSAR 'KHOR MO

YUG ,CES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA'O, ,DE LTA BU'I
CHO 'PHRUL

SMON LAM CHEN MO DE'I RING LA TSES GCIG NAS BCO LNGA'I BAR
'PHAGS PA'I YUL GYI BYUNG

BA DANG MTHUN PAR NYIN RE BZHIN SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO'I KHYAD PAR
MI 'DRA BA DANG, DE

DAG GIS BKUR BSTI ZANG ZING GI MCHOD SPRIN JI LTAR SPROS PA SOGS
RAGS TZAM 'GOD NA,

DE YANG SNGON 'PHAGS PA'I YUL DU GRONG KHYER KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS
PA MNYAN YOD CES

BYA BAR, DUS KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES
GCIG GI DUS SU,

SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA THEG PA CHEN PO LA RING NAS
ZHUGS PA'I RGYAL PO

GSAL RGYAL GYIS SBYIN BDAG MDZAD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS
ZAS KYI BYA BA

DANG, TSEMS SHING GI BYA BA MDZAD ZIN PA'I 'OG TU TSEMS SHING SA
LA BTZUGS PA,

DE MA THAG TU MTHO KHYAD DANG, YAL GA DANG, LO MA KHO RA KHOR
YUG TU

DPAG TSAD LNGA BRGYA PA'I SHING ZHIG SKYES PAR GYUR, DE SKYES MA
THAG PA DE LA ME TOG

SHING RTA'I 'PHANG LO TZAM SKYES SHING, 'BRAS BU NI BRE LNGA
TZAM SHONG BA'I BUM PA

@309 CAN DU GYUR, RTZA BA DANG, YAL GA DANG, 'DAB MA LA SOGS PA

THAMS CAD RIN PO CHE SNA BDUN DU GYUR NAS KHA DOG RNAM PA SNA
TSOGS PA 'TSER ZHING

'BAR BAS NYI MA DANG ZLA BA'I 'OD KYANG ZIL GYIS MNAN ZHING,
DE'I 'BRAS BU'I RO

NI LHA'I BDUD RTZI'I RO BAS LHAG PA DANG, DRI BSUNG GIS PHYOGS
KUN TU KHYAB NAS

SKYE BO KUN GYI YID TSIM PAR MDZAD PA DANG, DRI ZHIM PO DANG
LDAN PA'I RLUNG GIS YAL

GA DANG LO MA BSKYOD PA NA, SHIN TU YID DU 'ONG BA'I CHOS KYI
SGRA BYUNG NAS THAMS CAD

DAD PAR BYAS TE, LHA DANG MI DPAG TU MED PAS MNGON PAR MTHO BA
DANG, NGES

PAR LEGS PA'I 'BRAS BU THOB PAR MDZAD PA'I CHO 'PHRUL DANG PO
BSTAN TO, , ' SNGON

BYUNG BA'I DUS KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR SA MO
GLANG GI LO HOR ZLA DANG PO'I

TSES GCIG GI DUS SU, 'JAM MGON BLA MA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA DPAL
BZANG PO'I

ZHAL SNGA NAS DPON SLOB RNAMS KYIS LHA MCHOD MI MCHOD KYI SBYIN
BDAG MDZAD DE, MNYAM

MED SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I GSER GYI DBU RGYAN DANG, LHA SKU RNAMS
KYI GSER CHAB KYI

RGYU BCAS LA GSER ZHO SUM BRGYA DANG DRUG CU RTZA BRGYAD, DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA

MI BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG, 'PHAGS PA BCU GCIG ZHAL GNYIS KYI DBU
RGYAN LA DNGUL RKYANG

SPOR BRGYA DANG SUM CU RTZA GSUM, JO BO SH'AKYA MU NI LA DAR GYI
CHOS GOS GSUM,

DNGUL GYI LHUNG BZED, MKHAR SIL, JO BO RNAM GNYIS KYIS GTZO
MDZAD PA'I LHA

RNAMS KYI NA BZA'I RGYU LA, TA HUN GYI BER THUL GCIG ,BZANG GOS
BTZEM

MA BZHI, GOS YUG BCU, GAN DAR YUGS BCU GNYIS, 'BRING DAR

YUGS DRUG CU RTZA GNYIS, LING YUGS BZHI, PHAN BCO LNGA, RGYAL

MTSAN BZHI, KA GDAN DRIL MA DRUG ,RAS YUG BRGYA DANG DRUG CU RE
GSUM,

@310 RAS YA NYI SHU RTZA DGU ,SNAM BU DANG, TSON DANG, RTA SGA
DANG, RAL GRI

DANG, SMAN SOGS LA GONG BYAS GSER ZHO BDUN CU DON BZHI, MCHOD
ME'I

RGYU LA MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL BRGYA DANG DGU BCU, ZHAL ZAS SOGS
KYI RGYUR RTZAM KHAL

BRGYA DANG DGU BCU, NAS KHAL BZHI BRGYA, DGE 'DUN TSOGS PA
SPYI'I TSOGS

STON GYI RGYUR RTZAM KHAL NYIS BRGYA NYI SHU RTZA DRUG ,GOS DAR
SNAM PHRUG LA SOGS PA

LA SRANG BRGYA, JA NAG KHAL BCU DRUG ,JA DKAR KHAL BZHI BCU ZHE
BDUN,

GSER ZHO DRUG BRGYA DANG DRUG CU THAM PA, DNGUL SRANG BZHI BRGYA
DANG BZHI BCU THAM PA,

NAS KHAL DRUG BRGYA, MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL SUM BRGYA DANG DRUG
CU RNAMS PHUL BA'I

SGO NAS CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO BSTAN PA'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA BSGRUB
PAR MDZAD PA NI SKABS DANG

PO'O, , ' THOG MA'I DUS CHEN DE NYID KYI NYIN SGRUB BRGYUD BSTAN
PA'I 'JUG

NGOGS GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL GYI PHAG MO GRU NAS, LUS CAN GYI
'DREN PA MNYAM MED

CHOS KYI RJE SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS BZANG POS LHA MI'I
MCHOD CHAS LA ZHAL GSER

DANG DBU RGYAN GYI RGYUR GSER ZHO NYI SHU RTZA LNGA, DE BYINGS
DKAR ME, ZHAL ZAS,

SMAN GYI RNAM GRANGS, GOS DAR GYI GDUGS, RGYAL MTSAN, 'PHAN,

MCHOD RNGA, MAndAL, RIN PO CHE'I BUM PA, TSEN, DRI BZANG, DGE

'DUN GYI MANG SKOL, 'GYED, 7RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I DRUNG DU
'BUL BA DANG BCAS

PA LA RIN GONG SPYIR DNGUL SRANG LNGA BRGYA SKOR GYI MTHUN RKYEN
MDZAD DE, SKYE RGU MTHA'

DAG GI PHAN BDE'I RTZA BA SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BSTAN
PA'I SNYING PO SDOM PA

GSUM GYI NYAMS LEN DANG, BSHAD SGRUB CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO PHYOGS
DUS KUN TU DAR

DGONGS PA YONGS SU

@311 RDZOGS SHING, ZHAL BZHUGS PA RNAMS KYI SKU TSE MDZAD 'PHRIN
RGYA CHE LA DAG CING RGYUN

MI CHAD PAR CHOS LDAN GYI BZHED DON MTHA' DAG YID BZHIN 'GRUB
PA'I SMON LAM SKYABS

'JUG BCAS ZHU BAR GYUR TO, ,' YANG, SNGON GYI DUS CHO 'PHRUL ZLA
BA'I TSES GNYIS

KYA DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA GRONG KHYER STONG
YANGS PA'I CHOS KYI RGYAL PO

AU TRA YA NAS MDZAD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS SKU'I G-YAS
G-YON DU RIN

PO CHE'I RI GNYIS SPRUL TE, SHIN TU MTHO BA, MDZES PA, RIN PO
CHE

RNAM PA SNA TSOGS PA'I KHA DOG LTAR 'TSER ZHING, RI DE LA ME TOG
DANG 'BRAS BU

RAB TU RGYAS PA LAS SGRA SKAD SHIN TU SNYAN PA 'BYUNG BA, RI
GCIG GI RTZE MO LA 'BRAS

BU RO BRGYA DANG LDAN PA 'JAM ZHING MNGAR BA BYUNG STE MI MANG
PO DAG GIS YID BZHIN DU RE BA

TSEM PAR BZA' BA, RI GCIG GI RTZE MO LA RTZVA SHIN TU 'JAM PA
DANG MNGAR BA SKYES

TE; DUD 'GRO'I SKYE GNAS SU GYUR PA RNAMS KYIS BZA' ZHING BDE LA
YID BZHIN

DU TSIM PAR GYUR PA DAG SPRUL ZHING, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS MI DANG
DUD 'GRO DE

DAG LA CHOS CI RIGS SU BSTAN PAS SEMS RNAM PAR GROL TE BLA NA
MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU

SEMS BSKYED PA DANG, DUD 'GRO DE DAG NGAN SONG GI LUS SPANGS TE
MTHO RIS KYI

LHAR SKYE BA SOGS DNGOS SU MTHONG BAS THAMS CAD DAD PAR BYAS TE,
LHA MI DPAG

TU MED PA MNGON PAR MTHO BA DANG, RNAM PAR GROL BA'I 'BRAS BU
THOB PAR MDZAD

PA'I CHO 'PHRUL GNYIS PA BSTAN TO, , ' SNGON BYUNG BA'I DUS
KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG

RJES SU MTHUN PAR SA GLANG HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES GNYIS KYI DUS
SU, 'BRI KHUNG

RDZONG NAS MI DBANG RIN PO CHE GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS SBYIN
BDAG MDZAD DE, MNYAM

MED SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I DBU RGYAN DANG, LHA RNAMS KYI GSER CHAB
KYI RGYUR GSER ZHO

@312 BZHI BCU, JO BO MI BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG, 'PHAGS PA BCU GCIG
ZHAL GNYIS

KYI DBU RGYAN ZHAL 'DEBS SU DNGUL GYI PHUD PHOR GSUM, THEB RTZE
GCIG ,

DE BYINGS DAR TA HUN GYI CHOS GOS GCIG ,YANG DAR GYI CHOS GOS
SKYER KHA GCIG ,

SKU SHAM GCIG ,STAN KHEBS CHE BA GCIG ,LHA DAR PAR MA YUGS GCIG
,

DAR YUGS BCU BZHI, RGYAL MTSAN DANG, KA PHAN GYI RGYUR GOM YUGS

SNA TSOGS, GA BUR SOGS SMAN SNA, 'BRU MAR SOGS GTZO BOR MI DBANG

NYID KYIS THOG DRANGS, GZHAN DAG LA BSKUL BA BRAG TSAB, LA GO ,

SPANG SA, 'CHAD KHA, BLA MA RAL GCIG PAS KLUNG SHOD NAS BSKUL BA
KHRA KHUNGS

RTZE LA YAN SDOM PAR, MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL PHYED NYIS STONG
DANG NYI SHU THAM PA,

RTZAM KHAL BRGYA DANG LNGA BCU, DGE 'DUN TSOGS PA SPYI'I STON
CHAS LA MAR THUD KHAL

SUM BRGYA, RTZAM KHAL SUM BRGYA, SHA KHOG DGU BCU GO GCIG ,MANG

JA'I RGYUR JA DKAR 'DEGS KHAL BZHI BCU, MAR KHAL SUM CU SO
GNYIS, SPYI

'BUL JA DKAR SGAM GCIG BCAS PHUL TE CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS KYI
MCHOD PA BSGRUB

PA NI SKABS GNYIS PA'O, , ' YANG, SNGON CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES
GSUM

GYI DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA RGYAL PO SHUN RTZI
DA LAS MDZAD PA'I TSE,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS ZHAL GYI CHU SLAR SA LA 'PHO BA RIN PO CHE'I
RDZING BUR GYUR NAS KHO

RA KHOR YUG TU DPAG TSAD NYIS BRGYA YOD PA, RIN PO CHE SNA BDUN
GYIS RNAM PAR

SPRAS PA, KHA DOG RNAM PA SNA TSOGS SU 'TSER BA, RDZING BU DE'I
CHU YON TAN

BRGYAD DANG LDAN PA, RDZING BU'I ZHABS KYANG RIN PO CHE SNA BDUN
GYI BYE MA GDAL BA,

PADMA CHE KHYAD SHING RTA'I 'PHANG LO TZAM RNAM PA SNA TSOGS
KYIS GANG BA 'DI LTA STE, PADMA

@313 SNGON PO DANG, SER PO DANG, DMAR PO DANG, DKAR PA DANG, LEB

RGAN LA SOGS PA'O, ,PADMA DE DAG GI DRI YANG SHIN TU MNGAR ZHING
'PHRO BA,

PADMA'I KHA DOG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU 'OD ZER YANG 'TSER TE, DE'I
'OD ZER GYIS

RNAM PA KUN TU SNANG BAR BYAS SHING, 'KHOR MANG PO THAMS CAD
KYANG RIN PO CHE'I

RDZING DE LA RAB TU DGA' BAS BLTA BA, DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS
'KHOR MANG

PO DE DAG LA YO BYAD BYAR NAS CHOS RNAM PA SNGA TSOGS CHUB TU
SEMS BSKYED, LA LA NI

ZHING RTOGS PAR MDZAD PA LAS NI BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU
SEMS BSKYED, LA LA NI

'BRAS BU THOB NAS MTHO RIS KYI LHAR SKYES, BSOD NAMS KYI LAS
BSKYED PA YANG

DPAG TU MED PA THOB PAR MDZAD PA'I CHO 'PHRUL GSUM PA BSTAN TO,
, ' SNGON BYUNG BA'I

DUS KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR CHOS 'KHOR DPAL GYI
LHA SAR SA GLANG HOR

ZLA DANG PO'I TSES GSUM GYI DUS SU RGYAN BU LHUN GRUB RGYAL
MTSAN SKU MCHED YUM SRAS

KYIS SBYIN BDAG MDZAD DE LHA MCHOD MI MCHOD KYI RGYUR, ZHAL GSER
SPOS DANG BCAS PA,

MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL DRUG BRGYA DANG GSUM, JA SIG GSUM, RTZAM
NAS KHAL SUM

BRGYA, SHA KHOG LNGA BCU, BSNGO RTEN DANG BCAS PA PHUL, DE DANG
DUS MTSUNGS PAR BLA MA

YANG BLO BA DANG, DPON BSOD RIN PA GNYIS 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA NAS,
LHA MCHOD LA MAR

KHAL SUM BRGYA DRUG CU, GSER SRANG PHYED, RTZAM KHAL DRUG CU,
MCHOD 'BRU KHAL

NYI SHU RTZA BDUN, 'PHAN GYI RGYU LA DAR YUGS LNGA, RAS KHRU
LNGA MA BCO LNGA, SPOS

DKAR KHAL PHYED, SI LA AA KA RU'I SBYOR SDEBS BCAS PA'I SPOS NAG
BRE GANG, SPOS

RENGS STONG, SDONG RAS LA CHA THER GSUM, DGE 'DUN GYI BSNYEN
BKUR

LA MAR THUD KHAL BRGYA DANG PHYED DRUG ,SHA KHOG SUM CU SO GSUM,
JA SIG

@314 GSUM, RTZAM KHAL BDUN CU DON GNYIS, BUR LTANG GNYIS LA RGYA
MA NYI SHU RTZA

GCIG ,TSI LU RGYA MA DGU ,TSVA 'BO GANG RNAMS PHUL TE CHO 'PHRUL
CHEN PO'I

DUS KYI MCHOD PA BSGRUB PA NI SKABS GSUM PA'O, , ' YANG, SNGON
CHO

'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BZHI'I DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU
'PHAGS PA RGYAL PO AINDRA

WAR MAS MDZAD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE'I NYIN RIN PO
CHE'I RDZING DE'I NGOS

BZHIR YUR BA CHEN PO BRGYAD BRGYAD YOD PA CHU PHYIR YANG 'KHOR
ZHING RDZING DE NYID DU 'BAB

PA; CHU 'BAB PA'I SGRA LAS DBANG PO LNGA DANG, STOBS LNGA DANG,
BYANG

CHUB KYI YAN LAG BDUN DANG, 'PHAGS PA'I LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD DANG,
RNAM

PAR THAR PA GSUM DANG, MNGON PAR SHES PA DRUG DANG, PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA

DRUG DANG, SNYING RJE CHEN PO DANG, BYAMS PA CHEN PO DANG, DGA'
BA CHEN PO

DANG, BTANG SNYOMS CHEN PO DANG, TSAD MED PA BZHI STE CHOS RNAM
PA SNA TSOGS

KYI SGRA BYUNG STE, SKYE BO RNAMS KYIS CHOS SGRA DE DAG GI DON
TSUL BZHIN DU RTOGS SHING

KHONG DU CHUD PAS SANGS RGYAS SU GYUR PA'I 'BRAS BU DANG, MTHO
RIS LHAR SKYE BA

DANG, BSOD NAMS MCHOG BSKYED PA YANG RAB TU MANG PO THOB PAR
MDZAD PA'I CHO

'PHRUL BZHI PA BSTAN TO, , ' SNGOD BYUNG BA'I DUS KHYAD PAR CAN
DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN

PAR SA GLANG CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BZHI'I DUS SU BRAG DKAR
NANG SOS SBYIN BDAG BYAS

NAS, LHA MCHOD KYI RGYUR MAR KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG BCO LNGA, JO
BO RIN PO

CHER T'A HUN GYI NA BZA' GCIG DANG ZHAL GSER, DBU RGYAN GYI
G-YU KHRA, SPOS

DKAR BRE BZHI, SPOS RENG MDA' TSAD MA STONG DANG NYIS BRGYA, BA
DAN DKAR PO

GCIG ,'PHAN GCIG ,MCHOD 'BRU NAS KHAL LNGA BCU NGA LNGA, ZHAL
ZAS

@315 RGYUR RTZAM KHAL BDUN CU DON GSUM, DGE 'DUN GYI ZHABS TOG
RGYUR, RTZAM

KHAL BRGYA DANG BDUN CU, MAR THUD KHAL BRGYA DANG SUM CU SO
GSUM, JA KHAL

LNGA BCU, THUG RDOR RGYUR SHA SKAM KHOG NYI SHU RTZA LNGA, MNGA'
'OG NA YOD PA'I

GRA DGON PA, DGON GSAR BA, GRU BZHI BA, SHA RA HOR PA, THAR

RGYAS PA, LHA PHYUG ,RO SKAM, LDAN, BA LAM, 'BROM, YER PA, CHOS

LUNG YAN KUN BSGRIL BA NAS LHA MCHOD LA MAR KHAL DRUG BRGYA DANG
DGU BCU, RTZAM NAS

KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG BCU BZHI, ZHAL GSER DANG DBU RGYAN RGYUR
GSER ZHO PHYED DANG DGU,

NA BZA' NGO BZHI, BLA BRE GSER 'JAM GCIG ,DAR CHA'I RGYUD DAR
YUGS BZHI BCU

RTZA BDUN, KA BSGRIL BUB BZHI, SDONG RAS RGYUL THER GCIG DANG,
PANG KHEBS KYI

RAS GCIG ,SPOS RENG SUM STONG, GSER ZHO DO RI BA'I GUR KUM, ,BUM
PA

NYI SHU, DGE 'DUN GYI ZHABS TOG RGYUR JA SIG GSUM DANG SDUM GCIG
,KA RA

GSUM, YANG,

BRGYA DANG DRUG CU RTZA

SRUNG GI BA DAN

BA DAN,

GYI RGYAL MTSAN

NYE DBANG

SU, SBYIN BDAG

'KHOD PA LAS,

TSE 'PHOS SO, ,

YANG NA GI SOGS

@325 PHUL TE CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA SGRUB PA NI
SKABS BRGYAD PA'O, ,SKABS

'DIR GONG GI GZHIS KA'I MNGA' 'OG GI CHOS SDE CHE CHUNG SOGS
DANG, NANG SO BCAS

BSGRIL BA ZHES PA MAN CHAD KYI DNGOS PO'I SDOM KHONGS SU, DE'I
GONG GI GSER DANG

PHRA RGYAN SOGS KYIS GTZOS PA'I DNGOS PO RNAMS 'GRIL BAS NYIS
ZLOS YIN 'DRA YANG,

SNGAR GYI YIG RNYING DKAR CHAG TU DE LTAR 'KHOD 'DUG PAS DGOS PA
ZHIG YOD SHAS CHE

SNYAM DE NANG LTAR BKOD PA YIN NO, ,' YANG SNGON CHO 'PHRUL ZLA
BA'I TSES DGU'I DUS

SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA TSANGS PA'I RGYAL POS SBYIN
BDAG MDZAD PA'I TSE,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI SKU TSANGS PA'I LHA LA THUG GI BAR SHIN TU
MTHO BA LHANG NGE LHAM MER

BZHUGS PA SPRUL NAS 'OD ZER CHEN POS GNAS KUN TU SNANG ZHING
GSAL BAR MDZAD PA

THAMS CAD KYIS MTHONG BA DANG, GSUNG YANG THOS PAR GYUR NAS, DE
LA BCOM LDAN

'DAS KYIS CI RIGS SU CHOS RNAM PA SNA TSOGS PHYE ZHING BSTAN
PAS, 'KHOR MANG POS BLA

NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED DE 'BRAS BU THOB PA DANG,
LHA DANG MIR SKYE BA'I DGE

BA'I RTZA BA BSKYED PA YANG GRANGS MED PA'I CHO 'PHRUL DGU PA
BSTAN TO, ,' SNGON BYUNG

BA'I DUS KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR SA GLANG HOR
ZLA DANG PO'I TSES DGU'I

DUS SU GZIMS G-YOG RNAMS KYIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS NAS LHA MCHOD LA,
DBU RGYAN DANG

ZHAL GSER RGYUR GSER ZHO NYI SHU RTZA DRUG DANG ZHO GSUM, PHAN
GYI RGYUR DAR YUGS

GNYIS, DAR LING KHA SUM CU SO GSUM, RAS BUB BCU, LI KHRI DANG

SPANG MA LA GSER ZHO NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS RI BA, SPOS DKAR LTANG
RTZE GCIG ,G-YU PHRA

DRUG ,MTSAL THUR SRANG GANG, DGE 'DUN GYI CHOS STON LA MAR LHA
SRANG GI KHAL

BRGYA DANG DRUG CU RE GNYIS, RTZAM KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG BDUN CU
DON GSUM, JA

@326 SIG BZHI DANG ZHO BZHI, SHA KHOG NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS, TSIL
LU KHAL BZHI, YANG

DE NYIN LHA SA GNAS KHAG GNYIS KYIS LHA MCHOD MI MCHOD RGYUR MAR
KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG

BRGYAD CU GYA DRUG NYAG BCO LNGA, NAS KHAL BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU
ZHE BRGYAD, BUR

BA BDE BA CAN PA DANG BCAS PAS MAR KHAL DGU BCU GO DGU ,RTZAM
KHAL BRGYAD CU

FGYA DGU DANG BRE BCU GSUM, RGYA GRONG PAS MAR KHAL DGU BCU
PHYED GO BRGYAD, RTZAM

KHAL BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CU GYA GCIG ,SNYE STOD PAS MAR KHAL NYI
SHU RTZA LNGA, RTZAM

KHAL SUM CU DANG BRE GSUM, AA 'BRUG GIS RTZAM KHAL BCU RNAMS
PHUL TE CHO

'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA BSGRUB PA NI SKABS DGU PA'O, ,
' YANG

SNGON CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BCU'I DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR
DU 'PHAGS PA RGYAL PO

CHEN PO BZHIS MDZAD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI SKUS RGYAL PA
CHEN PO BZHI'I

RIGS NAS SRID PA'I TSE MO LA THUG GI BAR DU YONGS SU GANG BAR
MDZAD CING SKU DE DAG

LAS KYANG 'OD ZER CHEN PO BYUNG BA YANG 'KHOR MANG PO THAMS CAD
KYIS MTHONG BA DANG,

DE DAG LA DAM PA'I CHOS CI RIGS SU BSTAN PA YANG GSAL BAR THOS
PAS LHAG PAR

DGA' BA SKYES SHING, BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED
NAS 'BRAS BU THOB PA DANG,

LHA MI'I DGE BA'I RTZA BA BSKYED PA YANG GRANGS MED PA'I CHO
'PHRUL BCU PA BSTAN TO, ,

' SNGON BYUNG BA'I DUS KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR
SA GLANG HOR ZLA DANG

PO'I TSES BCU'I DUS SU, YON BDAG BSOD NAMS 'PHEL GYIS MGO BYAS
PA'I GNYER

PA RNAMS NAS SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE, BSTAN PA SPYI'I RIM GRO DANG,
DPON GRAGS

PA BZANG PO'I THUGS DGONGS RDZOGS PA, PHA MA'I DRIN LAN BSAB PA
SOGS KYI

SLAD DU LHA MCHOD RGYUR DBU RGYAN LA GSER ZHO BZHI, ZHAL GSER LA
ZHO DRUG DANG SE

@327 BA GSUM, COD PA nA CHE BA GCIG ,BA DAN DKAR HRIL GCIG
,MCHOD

RTZA LNGA, SDONG RAS

ZHO BZHI,

NAS KHAL

SUM BRGYA'I TZAM PA, MAR KHAL NYIS BRGYA LNGA BCU TZA BDUN, JA
SIG BZHI,

KHAL BRGYA,

'TSO'I BAR

DU LO RE BZHIN GSHIN RJE'I BA DAN BSO BA'I DAM BCA' BAS PHUL, 7
YANG DE

NYID BYA YUL RIN PO CHE'I GRA NANG GIS, ZHAL GSER DANG DBU RGYAN
LA GSER GZHO BCO

BRGYAD, JO SH'AKA YID BZHIN NOR BUR DAR CHEN DUR KHA'I SNAM
SBYAR GCIG ,

,BA DAN

THOB, LA

CHO 'PHRUL BCU GCIG

@332 BCU GSUM GYI DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA RGYAL

BZHUGS TE, SKU'I

LTE BA NAS 'OD ZER GNYIS ZHIG BYUNG NAS SKU LAS 'DOM BDUN TZAM
'PHAGS PA, DE'I

STENG NA PADMA RE RE YOD PA'I PADMA RE RE LA YANG SANGS RGYAS RE
RE SPRUL ZHING,

SANGS RGYAS DE DAG GI LTE BA NAS KYANG 'OD ZER BYUNG BA RNAM PA
GNYIS SU GYES NAS 'DOM

GANG TZAM DU 'PHAGS PA'I STENG NA PADMA RE RE DANG, DE RE RE'I
STENG NA SPRUL PA'I

SANGS RGYAS KYANG RE RE BZHUGS PA, DE BZHIN DU MTHAR GYIS STONG
CHEN PO'I 'JIG

RTEN GYI BAR DU DE DANG 'DRA BA SHA DAG SPRUL PA RNAMS, 'KHOR
MANG PO THAMS CAD

KYIS MTHONG NAS NGO MTSAR DU GYUR PA LA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS CI
RIGS PAR CHOS

BSTAN PA LAS, BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED PA DANG,
PHYIR MA LDOG

SKYE BA GRANGS

DUS KHYAD

TSES BCU GSUM GYI DUS SU,

'PHRUL CHEN PO'I

DUS KYI MCHOD PA BSGRUB PA NI SKABS BCU GSUM PA'O, ,' YANG SNGON
CHO

'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BCU BZHI'I DUS SU SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU
'PHAGS PA RGYAL PO AU

TRA YA NAS MDZAD PA'I TSE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA RGYAL PO AU TRA YA
NAS ME TOG GTOR

BA DANG, GTOR BA'I ME TOG RNAMS DE MA THAG TU RIN PO CHE'I SHING
RTA STONG NYIS BRGYA

LNGA BCUS STONG GSUM GYI STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS KUN
SNANG ZHING THAMS CAD

KYIS MTHONG BAR BYAS SO, ,DE DAG LA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS CI RIGS
PAR NAD

PA LA SMAN BTANG BA BZHIN DU DAM PA'I CHOS BSTAN PAS KHA CIG NI
BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB

TU SEMS BSKYED DE PHYIR MI LDOG PA'I SA LA GNAS PA DANG, LHA
DANG MIR SKYE BA

YANG GRANGS MED PA'I CHO 'PHRUL BCU BZHI PA BSTAN TO, , ' SNGONG
BYUNG BA'I

@334 DUS KHYAD PAR CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN PAR SA GLANG HOR
ZLA DANG PO'I CHOS BCU BZHI'I

DUS SU, BU TSAL BA DANG, LAS CHEN RDOR RGYAL BAS SBYIN BDAG ZHUS
TE,

BU TSAL BAS LHA MCHOD RGYUR GSER CHAB GSER ZHO BCO BRGYAD, DKAR
ME MAR KHAL

BDUN CU PHYED DON BRGYAD, DGE 'DUN GYI CHOS STON LA MAR LHA
SRANG GI KHAL BRGYA

DANG DGU BCU PHYED GO LNGA, THUD KHAL NYI SHU RTZA BDUN, RTZAM
KHAL NYIS BRGYA DRUG

CU RE BDUN, THUG RDOR MAR KHAL BCU GCIG  ,SHA KHOG GNYIS, JA
ZHIB

BRDUNGS RGYA MA PHYED BCU GNYIS, TSVA KHAL GNYIS, BSNGO RTEN
KHRA PHRUG GCIG  ,

CHEN RDOR RGYAL

PAS, 7 GONG MA CHEN PO'I SKU'I RIM GRO DANG, PHA MA'I DRIN LAN
BSAB PHYIR DU

LHA MCHOD LA MAR KHAL BCU DANG, MCHOD 'BRU KHAL BCO LNGA, DGE
'DUN

GYI CHOS STON LA NAS KHAL BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CU GYA BRGYAD KYI
RTZAM PA, ZHIB DO GCIG  ,

MAR KHAL BRGYA DANG NYI SHU RTZA DRUG  ,JA SIG GSUM, JA RDOR MAR
KHAL BCO LNGA,

THUG RDOR SHA KHOG LNGA, BSNGO RTEN GOS CHEN GYI SKU BER GCIG
,7 DPON

DPAL GYIS ZHAL GSER ZHO DO, 7 DPON YON GYIS DBU RGYAN ZHAL 'DEBS
GSER

ZHO GSUM, ZHAL GSER ZHO DO, DKAR ME MAR KHAL PHYED DANG BRGYAD,
ZHAL

ZAS RGYU RTZAM KHAL LNGA, PHAN RGYU DAR YUGS GNYIS, DGE 'DUN GYI
CHOS STON LA,

KHAL PHYED DANG

THUG

RDOR SHA KHOG PHYED GSUM, BSNGO RTEN PHRUG NGUR KHA GCIG  ,7 MUN
