@335 CHUNG PAS DBU RGYAN DANG ZHAL GSER LA GSER ZHO BDUN, DNGUL
SPOR BDUN, 7 BSAM

'GRUB GLING PA BKRA SHIS RGYAL POS MAR KHAL SUM CU, 7 PHAN YUL
SMON MKHAR

BAS MAR KHAL BRGYA DANG PHYED GNYIS, NAS KHAL DRUG CU, 7 RAM PA
BAS

MAR KHAL SUM CU PHYED SO GSUM, 7 DAN 'BAGS PAS MAR KHAL BZHI BCU
ZHE

GSUM DANG NYAG LNGA, NAS KHAL NYI SHU RTZA DRUG DANG BRE LNGA, 7
YOG THANG PAS

MAR KHAL BZHI BCU ZHE BRGYAD RNAMS PHUL TE CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I
DUS GYI MCHOD PA BSGRUB

PA NI SKABS BCU BZHI PA'O, , ' YANG SNGON CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I
TSES BCA LNGA'I DUS SU,

SBYIN BDAG KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA RGYAL PO GZUGS CAN SNYING POS
MDZAD PA'I TSE,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS RGYAL PO LA 'DI SKAD CES, RGYAL POS ZHAL ZAS
KYI SNOD SBYOR

CIG CES BKA' STZAL PA BZHIN SNOD SBYAR BAS, GDUGS TSOD KYI DUS
LA BAB PA NA

SNOD KUN ZHAL ZAS RO BRGYA DANG LDAN PA RNAM PA SNA TSOGS PAS
GANG STE 'KHOR MANG PO

THAMS CAD LA CHOG PAR GYUR TE, DE DAG GIS ZOS PAS LUS SEMS RAB
TU BDE

BAR GYUR TO, ,DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS PHYAG SA LA BRTEN PA
DANG, DMYAL

BA'I GNAS BCO BRGYAD DAG NA SEMS CAN TSAD MED PA DMYAL BA'I SDUG
BSNGAL MYONG ZHING,

DE DAG SO SO NAS 'DI SKAD SMRAS TE, BDAG CAG GIS SNGON SDIG PA
JI LTA BU ZHIG

BYAS NAS SDUG BSNGAL 'DI LTA BU MYONG BAR GYUR, ZHES SMRAS PA,
'KHOR MANG

PO THAMS CAD KYIS THOS SHING MTHONG BAR MDZAD PAS, 'KHOR THAMS
CAD SNYING RJE BA'I

SEMS BSKYED DE NGUS SHING BA SPU LANGS PA TZAM DU SKRAG PAR GYUR
TO, ,DE NAS BCOM

LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE DAG LA CI RIGS PA'I CHOS BSTAN PAS TSIM PAR
GYUR NAS, LA

LA NI BLA NA MED PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED, LA LA NI PHYIR
MI LDOG PA'I SA LA

@336 GNAS, LA LA NI LHA DANG MIR SKYE BA'I DGE BA'I RTZA BA
GRANGS MED PA BSKYED PA'I CHO

'PHRUL BCO LNGA PA BSTAN TO, ,' SNGON BYUNG BA'I DUS KHYAD PAR
CAN DE DANG RJES SU MTHUN

PAR SA GLANG HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES BCO LNGA'I DUS SU, THOR BU
BA RNAMS NAS SBYIN

BDAG ZHUS TE LHA MCHOD LA, RGYA MA RIN CHEN SGANG PA SDE DGON
GYIS MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL

SUM BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU, SDONG RAS RGYU RAS DO GCIG  ,ZHAL GSER
DANG DBU RGYAN LA

GSER ZHO PHYED DANG BCU, 7 DGE 'DUN SGANG PAS MAR KHAL BRGYA
DANG BDUN, RTZAM

NAS GOS DAR SOGS LA DNGUL SRANG BCU GSUM, SRAS KHANG PAS MAR
KHAL NYI SHU PHYED

RTZA GNYIS, NAS KHAL PHYED DANG BDUN, RAS BAR MA'I BLA BRE GCIG
,

RAS KHRU BCU BA GCIG  ,SKAM DGON PAS MAR KHAL BZHI BCU ZHE
GNYIS, BTZAN

DGON PA DANG PHRAN TSOGS GZHAN GYIS MAR KHAL BDUN, RIN CHEN
SGANG PAS DGE 'DUN

GYI CHOS STON LA MAR KHAL BRGYAD, JA DKAR ZHO GANG, BUR LTANG
GCIG  ,

7 CHOS 'KHOR DGE 'DUN MKHAN SLOB DANG BCAS PAS LHA MCHOD LA GSER
ZHO DRUG DANG

SE BA BZHI, MCHOD 'BRU NAS KHAL LNGA BCU, MCHOD ME'I RGYU MAR
KHAL BZHI,

SDONG RAS RGYU RAS KHA CHUNG SUM CU, PHAN RGYU DAR YUGS GCIG KHA
'KHYAR

BCU DRUG  ,DGE 'DUN GYI CHOS STON LA RTZAM RGYU NAS KHAL NYIS
BRGYA NYI SHU, MAR

THUD KHAL BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA, JA NAG KHAL GNYIS, SHA SKAM KHOG
GCIG  ,

7 YANG DGE BSHES 'BYUNG GNAS SENG GES GTZO BYAS BRA'E RNAMS KYIS
LHA MCHOD LA,

MAR LHA SRANG GI KHAL SUM BRGYA DANG NYI SHU RTZA GSUM, DAR YUGS
LNGA, PANG

KHEBS GCIG  ,DGE 'DUN GYI CHOS STON LA THUD KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG
GCIG  ,JA

THUG RDOR MAR KHAL BCU, 7 DOG BDE BAS LHA MCHOD LA, MAR KHAL
BRGYA DANG BZHI

@337 BCU PHYED ZHE GNYIS, NAS KHAL DGU BCU PHYED GO GSUM, RTZAM
KHAL NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS,

7 SBA BRAN SGANG RGYUD PAS LHA MCHOD LA MAR KHAL BRGYA DANG BCU
NYAG LNGA, NAS KHAL

SUM CU SO DRUG DANG BRE BRGYAD, RTZAM KHAL BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA
DANG BRE BCU GCIG  ,

7 NYANG BRAN PAS LHA MCHOD LA, MAR KHAL BDUN CU PHYED DON GNYIS,
7 DGE

SBYONG DGE BLO BAS LHA MCHOD LA MAR KHAL BRGYAD, NAS KHAL BCU
GNYIS DANG BRE

BCO LNGA, RTZAM KHAL LNGA BCU NGA BRGYAD DANG BRE BZHI, SDE BZHI
BAS MAR KHAL

BRGYA, NAS KHAL DRUG CU DANG BRE BCO LNGA, 7 RTZAM KHAL LNGA
DANG BRE PHYED BCO

BRGYAD RNAMS PHUL TE CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA
BSGRUB PA NI SKABS BCO LNGA

PA'O, ,DE LTA BU'I CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM GYI MCHOD PA CHEN PO JI
SRID THUB BSTAN RIN

PO CHE GNAS PA DE SRID DU RGYUN MI CHAD PA'I PHYAG SROL BZANG PO
DANG, SKYE DGU RNAMS

MA 'ONGS PA NA RGYAL BA BYAMS PA 'JIG RTEN DU BYON PA'I TSE 'DUS
PA DANG POR SKYE BA'I RTEN

'BREL DU SMON LAM GROL NYIN BYAMS PA'I SNANG BRNYAN MCHOD TSOGS
DU MA DANG BCAS TE PHYI

SKOR LA GDAN 'DREN PA'I PHYAG LEN YANG 'DZUGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,DE
LTAR GTZO BO

RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO NYID KYI THUGS BSKYED SMON LAM
TSAD MED PA'I MTHU DANG,

GNAS SKABS KYI LHAN CIG BYED RKYEN MI'I DBANG PO GRAGS PA MTSAN
DPAL BZANG

POS BKA' LUNG ZHAL TA MDZAD PA SOGS LAS, DGE 'DUN RNAMS DANG,
'BRI

KHUNG PA SOGS STOD SMAD KYI SDE BA CHE CHUNG THAMS CAD DANG,
NANG SOS THOG DRANGS

PA'I MCHOG DMAN BAR PA THAMS CAD KYIS DAD GUS DANG, GTONG BA'I
SEMS RGYA

CHEN POS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE RANG RANG GI 'BYOR 'KHOS DANG BSTUN
PA'I LHA MCHOD, MI

MCHOD KYI BKUR STE SGRUB LUGS GONG DU YI GER 'KHOD PA DANG MA
'KHOD PA SOGS TSANG

@338 MA GCIG TU BSGRIL BAR, LHA MCHOD KYI RGYUR GSER ZHO BRGYAD
BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CHU

THAMS PA, DNGUL SPOR BRGYA DANG BDUN CU DON BZHI, PHRA RGYAN RIN
PO CHE

NAL RDOG PO GCIG  ,G-YU CHE BA GCIG  ,CHUNG BA BRGYAD, MU TIG
CHE

CHUNG NYIS BRGYA SUM CU SO GNYIS, GSER SHOG STONG BAM GNYIS,
BRGYA

BAM GSUM, LEB BRGYAD CU, SKU CHOS NYI SHU, STOD G-YOGS DANG

SHAM BU GSUM, STAN KHEBS GSUM, STOD LE GSUM, BLA BRE GSUM,

RMA BYA'I GDUGS GCIG  ,RGYAL MTSAN LNGA, PHAN NYI SHU RTZA DRUG
,BA DAN

GCIG  ,RNGA ZLUM LNGA, DUNG GNYIS, RNGA DKAR BDUN, DRIL BU CHE
BA

BRGYAD CU GYA LNGA, CHUNG BA BRGYA DANG BRGYAD, ME TOG GI PAR
BCU, ZANGS

PHYE KHAL GSUM BRE PHYED DO, ,DRI BZANG DANG SPOS KYI RGYU BZANG
SMAN SNA TSANG LA RI GONG

GSER ZHO LNGA BCU NGA DGU ,SPOS DKAR LTANG RTZE GNYIS DANG, SIL
MA KHAL

LNGA BRE BZHI, SPOS PHAN BRGYAD, SPOS RENG KHRI PHRAG GSUM DANG
STONG PHRAG BRGYAD,

BRGYA PHRAG GNYIS, CHAG CHAG GI RGYUR SPOS PHAD BU NYI SHU RTZA
LNGA, AA KA RU

SKYAL PA GANG, MCHOD MI'I RGYU MAR KHAL KHRI PHRAG GCIG DANG
DRUG BRGYA NYI SHU THAMS PA,

RTZAM KHAL NYIS STONG DANG PHYED BCO LNGA, MCHOD 'BRU KHAL NYIS
STONG LNGA BCU NGA BRGYAD,

MAR NAG KHAL SUM CU, GOS TA HUN YUGS GNYIS, TA HUN GYI BER THUL

GCIG  ,KHA THI TA HUN YUGS GCIG  ,GOS TSEMS MA DRUG DANG, YUG

BCU GCIG  ,LING YUGS DRUG  ,GAN DAR YUGS BCU DGU ,DAR YUGS

BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU ZHE BZHI, GOS LING KHA SUM CU SO GSUM, DAR
NYI SHU

RTZA BZHI, KA BSGRIL SNGO DMAR DKAR GSUM NGO NYI SHU PHYED RTZA
BDUN, 'JU LANG

@339 CHE BA GNYIS, CHA THER BCU GCIG  ,RAS KHRU BCU MA DANG,
LNGA MA, PANG

KHEBS 'DRES PA BRGYA DANG NYI SHU RTZA BRGYAD, 7 DGE 'DUN GYI
CHOS STON LA, JA

DKAR KHAL NYIS BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU PHYED ZHE BZHI, JA NAG SIG
BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU

PHYED ZHE LNGA, BU RAM KHAL BCO BRGYAD, KA RA LTANG DRUG  ,MAR
THUD KHAL

BZHI STONG BRGYA DANG DRUG CU RE BRGYAD, SHA KHOG BZHI BRGYA
DANG BZHI BCU ZHE GNYIS,

RTZAM KHAL LNGA STONG, NAS KHAL NYIS STONG SUM BRGYA SUM CU SO
BZHI, TSVA KHAL

SUM CU PHYED SO DRUG  ,TSIL LU KHAL BDUN CU DON GNYIS, GSER ZHO
DGU

BRGYA DANG NYI SHU RTZA GCIG  ,DNGUL SPOR NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS,
MDZO RTA SNAM PHRUG

SOGS LA RI GONG GSER ZHO LNGA BRGYA BCAS THOB CING, GONG DU BKOD
PA RNAMS DANG

GUNG 'GRIG MIN RE GNYIS YOD 'DRA YANG SNGAR GYI YIG RNYING LTAR
BKOD PA STE, DE LTA

BU'I TSUL GYIS 'GRO BA DPAG TU MED PA BSOD NAMS DANG YE SHES KYI
TSOGS RGYA CHEN PO

GSOGS PA'I SKAL BZANG LA BDE BLAG TU 'GOD PAR MDZAD CING, PHAN
BDE'I

'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO
THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS

THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I BKA' DRIN
TSAD MED PA STZAL BAR..

MDZAD DO, ,7 'DIR SMRAS PA, SNGON TSE GRONG KHYER CHEN PO MNYAN
YOD DU, ,

SA CHEN CHOS KYIS SKYONG BA'I MI'I BDAG PO, ,GSAL RGYAL AU TRA
YA NA LA SOGS DANG, ,

TSANGS DANG BRGYA BYIN LA SOGS SKABS GSUM GTZO, ,MGON MED ZAS
SBYIN LA SOGS

KHYIM BDAG GI ,TSUL 'DZIN LHA MI'I SBYIN BDAG DU MA YIS, ,MCHOD
DANG

BSNYEN DU BKUR BA'I ZANG ZING GI ,'BYOR TSOGS NAM MKHA' 'GENGS
PA'I TSUL DU

SPROS, ,THUB DBANG SMRA BA'I ZLA BA DE YIS KYANG, ,NYIN RE BZHIN
DU RGYA CHEN CHO

@340 'PHRUL GYI, ,BKOD PA BLA NA MED PA'I NGO MTSAR NI, ,'BYAMS
SU KLAS PA'I

DGA' STON SPEL BA DANG, ,LHAN CIG MTHO RIS LHA DANG MI'I BSOD
NAMS, ,DPAG

MED BSKRUN DANG 'BRAS BU'I SAR 'GOD DANG, ,BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU
SEMS BSKYED LA

BRTEN NAS, ,THEG CHEN LAM LAS PHYIR MI LDOG PA DANG, ,RNAM PAR
'DREN

PA'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA SOGS, ,GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG MNGON MTHO
NGES LEGS

SAR, ,'GRO BA GRANGS MED BKOD PA'I NGO MTSAR GTAM, ,DENG SANG
DUS

NA'ANG DBYAR GYI RNGA BZHIN GYUR, ,DE BZHIN SNYIGS MA'I DUS KYI
YANG MTHA' 'DIR, ,

RGYAL BA DNGOS DANG RNAM DBYER MA MCHIS PA'I, ,MTHONG BA DON
LDAN JO SHAKA RNAM

GNYIS SOGS, ,SRID NA DKON PA'I RTEN MCHOG DU MA DANG, ,SA DANG
LAM

LA GNAS PA'I SEMS DPA' NAS, ,SO SO SKYE BO'I DGE 'DUN YAN CHOD
KYI, ,

KHRIMS LDAN NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I 'DUS PA'I SDE, ,PADMO'I MTSO
LA NGANG MO LTAR

'DUS SHING, ,KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA CHOS KYI RJE, ,'JAM
MGON BLA MA

BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL, ,GTZO BOR BZHUGS PA'I SRAS BCAS RGYAL
BA'I TSOGS, ,

LHA YI LAM KUN 'GENGS PA'I SPYAN SNGA RU, ,CHOS KYI SPYAN MNGA'
BSOD NAMS BZANG PO

DANG, ,'BRI KHUNG CHOS RJE GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS, ,CHOS DANG
SRID KYIS MNGON PAR

MTHO BA DANG, ,DAD DANG GTONG BA'I BLO GROS LDAN PA YI, ,MCHOG
DMAN BAR BA'I SKYE BO

MTHA' DAG GIS, ,RANG RANG 'BYOR TSOGS BSTUN PA'I ZANG ZING GI
,MCHOD PA'I SPRIN

DANG PHYAG SKOR GSOL 'DEBS SOGS, ,LUS DANG NGAG GI DGE BA'I
PHUNG PO DANG, ,

ZHING LA MCHOG TU GUS PA'I DAD PA DANG, ,DMAN LA GCIG TU BRTZE
BA'I SNYING RJE DANG, ,

'KHOR BAR YID RAB 'BYUNG BA'I SKYO SHAS DANG, ,GNAS LUGS DON LA
SEMS PA'I

@341 LTA BA DANG, ,RIM GNYIS RNAL 'BYOR MCHOG LA GZHOL BA SOGS,
,SGO GSUM

DGE BA'I BYA BA 'BA' ZHIG GIS, ,NYIN MTSAN 'KHOR MOR 'DA' BA'I
DGE MTSAN

GYIS, ,PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL KUN YONGS SU MNYES PAR BYAS, ,DE LTA'I
RLABS

CHEN MDZAD PA BZANG PO'I MTHUS, ,'PHAGS PA'I SA KUN DOG POR BYAS
PA DANG, ,

LHAN CIG 'KHOR BA'I GNAS 'DI STONG GYUR ZHES, ,LHA MI KUN GYI
MGRIN PA'I LAM

LAS SGROG ,MGON PO KHYOD KYI MDZAD PA'I CHA SHAS LA'NG, ,SLOB
PA'I NUS

PA SHIN TU DMAN GYUR KYANG, ,RJES SU GUS PA'I YID KYIS TSE RABS
SU, ,SLOB

PA'I SMON LAM RGYUN CHAD MED PAR 'DEBS, ,ZHES PA NI BAR GYI NGAL
BSO'I TSIGS SU

BCAD PA'O, ,' BAR 'DIR RANG GZHAN GYI RGYUD KYI LOG RTOG DANG
DOGS PA NGAN PA

SEL ZHING, DAD GUS GONG 'PHEL DU BYA BA'I SLAD DU DGAG SGRUB KYI
RNAM BZHAG ZUR TZAM

SMRA NA, DE YANG RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO 'DI NYID NI RING MO
ZHIG NAS RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS

'DZIN PA LA THUGS BSKYED DANG SMON LAM KYI MTHU GRUB PA'I DBANG
GIS SNYIGS MA'I DUS

'DIR RGYAL BA'I BZHED SROL RNAM PAR DAG PA'I RING LUGS RI BO DGE
LDAN PA ZHES PA'I

BSTAN PA GSER SBYANGS BTZO MA BYI DOR BYAS PA LTA BU 'DI NYID,
STOD DZA TI'I DRI BSUNG RNAM

PAR 'THUL BA NAS SMAD ZA 'OG THAGS SU BSKRUN PA'I YUL GRU CHEN
PO'I BAR 'BYAMS

GDAL YUGS GCIG TU KHYAB PA NA, GRUB MTHA' GZHAN PHYOGS PA'ANG
CHOS KYI SPYAN DANG

LDAN PA DAG NI DAD GUS KYIS THAL MO SBYAR ZHIG, BSTOD BSNGAGS
KYI ME TOG 'THOR

BAR MDZAD PA 'OG NAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR RUNG, PHYOGS 'DZIN DANG
PHRAG DOG GI KUN SLONG

NGAN PAS RGYUD GTAMS SHING, RNYED BKUR 'DOD SRED KYI GZHAN DBANG
DU GYUR PA'I BLUN

PO 'GA' ZHIG GI SNYING LA MI BZOD PA'I ZUG RNGUR GYUR NA'ANG,
RJE'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI

@342 BSTAN PA'I TSUL LA CHOS DANG MTHUN PAR BRGOL BA DANG BSUN
'BYIN PA'I SPOB PA NI CHA

TZAM MA RNYED PAS CI BYA LTOL MED DU GYUR PA NA, SLOB DPON
PADMA'I GSUNG LA KHA G-YAR

BA'I LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA DAG BRTZAMS NA 'GA' ZHIG GI RGYUD LA
DOGS PA DANG THE TSOM SKYE

BAR 'GYUR RO SNYAM NAS BLUN TSIG 'PHRENG BAR BSGRIGS PA 'GA'
ZHIG LKOG LAB KYI TSUL DU

SPEL BA RNAMS SNGON BYON RI BO DGE LUGS BA'I MKHAS GRUB PHAL MO
CHE'I SPYAN LAM DU MA

SON CING, DUS PHYIS MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO BRAG SGO RAB 'BYAMS PAR
GZHAN PHYOGS

PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS, DRI BA'I TSUL DU ZHUS PAR DGAG PA'I RIM PA
'GA' ZHIG

GNANG 'DUG PA LAS, RANG PHYOGS MKHAS PA GZHAN DAG NAS DGAG LAN
SOGS CHER

MA MDZAD 'DUG PA NI LUNG BSTAN 'DI DAG DPYOD LDAN GYIS NI MTHONG
TZAM NYID NAS BLUN

POS BYAS PAR TSAD MAS NGES PAS NA, JI SKAD DU, 'PHEN ZEL RIN
CHEN LA BLTA YI, ,

MGAL DUM LA NI SU ZHIG SPYOD, ,CES GSUNGS PA LTAR MKHAS PAS DGAG

PA MDZAD PA'I 'OS SU MA GZIGS NAS BTANG SNYOMS SU MDZAD MOD
KYANG, JI SKAD DU,

NYI MA'I 'OD ZER SHAD BA NA, ,'BYUNG PO'I BYA RNAMS LONG BAR
'GYUR, ,ZHES

PA LTAR RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I 'PHRIN LAS NAM MKHA' DANG
MNYAM PAR GYUR PAS BSTAN

PA THAMS CAD KYI NANG NAS GSER ZHUN 'CHANG BA'I RING LUGS 'DI
NYID RGYAL MTSAN GYI TOG

LTAR CHES CHER 'PHAGS SHING, NYID MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR LTAR 'GRAN
ZLAS DBEN PAR

GYUR PAS SMRA BA NGAN PA MTHA' DAG RANG SHUGS KYIS BAG LA ZHA
BAR GYUR MOD, 'ON

KYANG DA DUNG MTHA' KHOB DANG CHA 'DRA BA'I YUL GRU 'GA' ZHIG TU
RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I CHOS

DANG GANG ZAG LA DMOD CING SHUNG BAR BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG YOD TSOD
DU SNANG BAS DE DAG GI

RJES SU, JI LTAR LUG DANG RMONGS PA'I 'PHRENG, ,GCIG SONG RJES
SU RGYUGS

@343 PA NYID, ,CES DANG, BLUN POS GRAGS PA'I RJES SU 'BRANG,
,KHYI RGAN KU

CO 'DON PA LA, ,RGYU MTSAN MED PAR GZHAN DAG RGYUG, ,CES PA LTAR
BLUN

PO 'GA' ZHIG RTOG DPYOD MED PAR RJES ZLOS KYI TSUL DU ZLO ZHING,
GZHAN DAG

LA YANG SGROG GANG THUB BYED PA SOGS YOD PAR SNANG MOD, DES NA
SPYIR NGAN PA'I

RANG GSHIS NI, 'JAM DBYANGS SA PAn GYIS, NGAN PA JI LTAR BCOS
GYUR

KYANG, ,RANG BZHIN BZANG PO 'BYUNG MI SRID, ,SOL BA 'BAD DE
BSKRUS NA YANG, ,

KHA DOG DKAR PO 'BYUNG MI 'GYUR, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR BCOS SU
DKA' BA DANG,

LHAG PAR DU YANG LAS NGAN GSOGS PA LA SHIN TU GOMS PA DAG LA NI
BSAM PA BZANG

POS JI TZAM SMRAS KYANG RNA BA'I LAM DU 'GRO BA SHIN TU DKA' BAS
BTANG SNYOMS SU CI

BDER BSKYUR BA NYID 'OS SU CHE MOD, 'ON KYANG 'DI 'DRA BA'I GAN
'CHAL GYIS DA

DUNG YANG MANG PO ZHIG GI RGYUD LA DOGS PA DANG THE TSOMS NGAN
PA SKYE BA DANG, DENG

DUS RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA NYUNG BA'I DBANG GIS LUNG NGAN 'DI
DAG LA DGAG PA TZAM

MED NA, NGES PAR TSAD MAR GYUR PA'I LUNG ZHIG GO SNYAM NAS LOG
RTOG GI SA BON

RGYUD LA BSKRUN PAS RNAM SMIN BRNAG PAR DKA' BA MYONG BAR 'GYUR
BA SOGS LA MA BZOD

PAS LHAG BSAM BZANG POS DGAG SGRUB CUNG ZAD 'GOD NA, DE YANG
SLOB DPON

PADMA'I GSUNG LA KHA G-YAR BA'I LUNG BSTAN YIN TSUL TSIG DAM
DUM KHA SHAS YOD

'DUG PA'I NANG NAS SNGON CHAD MIG LAM DU SON PAR, LEGS KAR SKYE
BA MDO KHAMS

PHYOGS NAS 'BYUNG, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SPRUL PA YIN NGES ZER,
,BSTAN

PA'I MGO NYES MDZAD SPYOD GLING LOG MKHAN, ,SPRUL PA'I SKU LA
RIN CHEN RGYAN 'DOGS

SHING, ,THEMS PA'I 'OG NAS DAM SRI'I SROG SNYING BTON, ,SH'AKYA
MU NI'I RAB

@344 GNAS CHUG PA'I MTHUS, ,NYI ZLA MTHO GANG KHRU GANG MAR BAB
PAS, ,GANG PO'I

GZA' SKAR GNAS MED 'KHRUG PAR 'GYUR, ,GLING LOG LO GCIG ZLA BA
BCU GSUM

'BYUNG, ,ZHES DANG, YANG, LUNG BSTAN 'DI KHA'I TSIG YI NAM,

GZHAN ZHIG TU DRANGS PAR, KHYOD KYI GSUGS BRNYAN BGYIS PA'I 'DRA
'BAG LA, ,

MA 'ONGS DUS NA 'GRO PHAN CHER 'BYUNG TSE, ,BDAG GIS LOG PA'I
RGYAN CHA 'DOGS

PAR SHOG, ,CES DANG, YANG 'GA' ZHIG TU, SPRUL SKU'I DBU LA LONGS

SKU'I SPROG ZHU SKYON, ,NYI ZLA DPAG TSAD TZAM GYIS DMA' RU
SONG, ,ZER BA SOGS

SMYO LAM 'DRA BA'I BAB COL SNA TSOGS SMRA BA RNAMS LA MKHAS PA'I
DBANG PO BRAG SGO RAB

'BYAMS PAS PADMA BKA' THANG LA SNGA RABS PA'I RANG BZO'I TSIG
LHAD KYI SKYON ZHUGS PA

RNAMS DGAG PA DANG CHAB GCIG LUNG BSTAN YIN TSUL GONG 'KHOD
RNAMS LA'NG GNAD DU

'KHEL BA'I DGAG PA MDZAD 'DUG KYANG, 'DI DAG PAR DU MA 'KHOD PAS
DPE

RGYUN SHIN TU DKON PAR SNANG BAS PHAL MO CHE'I MIG LAM DU SON PA
MED 'DRA BAS DE DAG

GI LUNG YANG 'DIR ZUR TZAM 'DREN NA, DE LA DANG POR, LEGS KAR
SKYE BA MDO

KHAMS PHYOGS NAS 'BYUNG, ,ZHES PA 'DI LA BRAG SGO RAB 'BYAMS
PA'I GSUNG DU,

SPYIR LEGS PA'I KRMA ZER BA NI LOS YOD KYANG, STON PA'I DUS SU
YOD PA'I DGE

SLONG LEGS PA'I KRMA ZER BA GANG NAS KYANG BSHAD PA'I KHUNGS
BDAG GIS NI MA MTHONG,

ZHES DANG, MDO SDE RNAMS SU STON PA'I RIM GRO BA KUN DGA' BO LAS
YOD PAR MA

BSHAD, CES GSUNGS PA RNAMS NI NGES PAR DON LA GNAS TE, DE YANG
DA LTA'I

BKA' THANG SHEL BRAG MA SOGS KYI TSIG RIS SU, DANG POR DGE SLONG
LEGS PA'I

KRMA ZHES PA'I STON PA'I NYI GNAS BYAS TSUL DANG, DE NAS NAM
ZHIG NAS LOG LTA

@345 BYAS TE, LO NI NYI SHU RTZA LNGA KHYOD G-YOG BYAS, ,YON
TAN TIL 'BRU TZAM

ZHIG NGAS MA MTHONG, ,ZAS GTZANG SRAS PO RGYAL SRID MA ZIN PA'I,
,GO MA CHOD

KYI MI 'KHYAMS RKANG 'DREN PO, ,ZHES SOGS SKUR PA BTAB CING
KHROS NAS 'GRO

TSUL DANG, LEGS KAR GYI BLO LA MDO SDE BCU GNYIS KHA TON DU BYED
RGYU YOD TSUL

SOGS NI BKA' THANG DU BLUN PO GZHAN GYIS RANG BZO'I TSIG LHAD
BCUG PA NGES PAR

YIN TE, STON PA SANGS RGYAS KYI RTOGS PA BRJOD PA'I MDO SDE
RNAMS SU SH'AKYA THUB

PA'I RIM GRO BA KUN DGA' BO MA GTOGS SNGA PHYI GNYIS BYANG BAR
GANG NAS KYANG MA BSHAD

LA; LHAG PAR DGE SLONG LEGS PA'I KAR MA ZHES PAS BYAS PAR BSHAD
PA NI BDAG

CAG GIS KYANG GANG DU'ANG MA MTHONG ZHING, DE LA KHO NA RE,
KHYOD KYIS MA

MTHONG SHES BYA MANG, ,BONG BUS MA BGROD LAM 'PHRANG MANG, ,ZHES
PA LTAR

KHYOD RANG MTHONG RGYA CHUNG BAS LAN PAR SNANG BAS KHYOD KYIS
MA
MTHONG BA TZAM YIS MA BYUNG

BAR KHAS LEN MI THUB PO ZHE NA, 'O NA BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS
BYINGS DANG MI 'DRA

BA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA LA RIM GRO BA SNGA RTING GNYIS
BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS TSAD LDAN GYI

MDO RGYUD 'DI NAS GSUNGS ZHES PA'I KHUNGS STON RGYU ZHIG DGOS
PAR SNANG YANG SNGON CHAD

RNYING MA BA'I MKHAS PA SU LA'NG KHUNG STON RGYU MA BYUNG BA MA
ZAD, RIS MED MKHAS

GRUB GZHAN GYI GSAN GZIGS KYI YUL DU'ANG GYUR MI 'DUG PAS DE'I
KHUNGS TSAD LDAN

MED PA NI DE GAS GRUB CING, DE BZHIN DU DGE SLONG LEGS KAR LA
MDO SDE BCU

GNYIS KHA TON DU BYED RGYU YOD PAR BSHAD 'DUG PA, LEGS KAR GYI
RGYUD KYI MDO

SDE BCU GNYIS PO DE STON PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA'I BKA'
YIN NAM, DE MIN

SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNGS SOGS GZHAN ZHIG GI BKA' YIN,, DANG PO
LTAR NA, STON PA

@346 SH'AKYA THUB PAS MDO SDE BCU GNYIS GSUNGS PA LEGS KAR GYIS
THOS PA MA ZAD, BLO LA

BZUNG NAS KHA BTON DU'ANG BYED BZHIN DU, YON TAN TIL 'BRU TZAM
ZHIG NGAS MA MTHONG

ZHES MNGON SUM LA BSNYON NAS SKUR PA BTAB PA MI 'THAD, PHYI MA
LTAR NA MA YIN TE,

DE'I TSE 'OD SRUNGS SOGS KYI BSTAN PA 'GAG ZIN BA'I PHYIR, DE LA
KHO NA RE, SKYON

MED DE, DGE SLONG LHAS SBYIN YANG SANGS RGYAS LA LOG PAR LTA BA
YIN NA YANG, DE'I

RGYUD LA CHOS KYI PHUNG PO GCIG YOD PAR BSHAD PA DANG MTSUNGS SO
ZHE NA, MI MTSUNGS

TE; DGE SLONG LHAS SBYIN GYIS SANGS RGYAS KYI SKU GSUNG THUGS
KYI YON TAN MTHONG

NAS DE DAG LA 'GRAN SEMS KYIS LOG PAR ZHUGS PA LAS, LEGS KAR
BZHIN

DU YON TAN TIL 'BRU TZAM MA MTHONG BA MA YIN PA'I PHYIR DANG,
NGES DON DU LHAS

SBYIN DANG, MU STEGS STON PA DRUG SOGS SANGS RGYAS NYID KYI
SKU'I YIN TAN GYI CHE BA

'DON PA'I SLAD DU GDUL BYA 'DUL BA'I THABS MKHAS KYI SPRUL PA
YIN PAR NGES DON GYI

MDO SDE SOGS LAS GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GAL TE LEGS KAR KYANG DE DAG
DANG 'DRA BA'I

SPRUL PA YIN NO ZHE NA, LEGS KAR ZHES NGAN NGAN POR BZUNG BA DON
MED PA NYID DU

ZAD DO, ,DES NA SANGS RGYAS LA SNYING THAG PA NAS LOG PAR LTA
BA'I LAS KYI SGRIB

PA TSAN PO CHE DANG LDAN PA'I GANG ZAG GI RGYUD LA MDO SDE BCU
GNYIS 'BAD MED DU THON

PA'I SHES RAB MI SRID PAS TSUL 'DI YANG RIGS PA'I GTAM MA YIN
NO, ,YANG BKA'

THANG DU, LEGS KAR SKYE BA DE'I PHYI MA LA ME TOG LDUM RAR YI
DVGAS SU SKYE BAR BSHAD

PA DANG, YANG LO RGYUS 'GA' ZHIG TU, LEGS KAR STON PA'I MDZAD
PAR LOG

MTHONG BAS, ,SA YI THONGS BYE DMYAL BA CHEN POR SKYES, ,ZHES
KYANG BSHAD

'DUG RUNG GONG DU LUNG RIG GIS BKAG PA LTAR SANGS RGYAS KYI RIM
GRO BA DGE SLONG

@347 LEGS KAR ZHES PA NI MA BYUNG BAR NGES LA, DER MA ZAD SANGS
RGYAS LA LOG LTA TSAN

PO CHE SKYES PA'I GANG ZAG NI PHYI MA MNAR MED LA SOGS PA'I
DMYAL BA'I GNAS SU TSE

BAR BSKAL LA SOGS PAR GNAS DGOS PAS RING POR MA LON PAR MI LUS
TZAM YANG

THOB PA'I GNAS MED NA LO RGYUS 'DI DAG GANG NAS BSAM KYANG 'THAD
PAR MA MTHONG ZHING,

DE LA BRTEN NAS BRAG SGO RAB 'BYAMS PA'I GSUNG DU, TSUL 'DI DAG
LA DPAGS

NA; DANG POR BKA' THANG DU TSIG LHAD BCUG NAS RJES SU LUNG BSTAN
NGAN PA ZHIG BRTZAM

BSAM PA YIN 'DUG CES GSUNGS PA LTAR KUN SLONG NGAN PA 'GA' ZHIG
GIS DE LTAR

BGYIS PA'AM, YANG NA, BKA' THANG DU 'DIS MI TSAD PA'I LHAD ZHUGS
SNA

TSOGS YOD PA DUS PHYIS KYI RNYING MA'I MKHAS GRUB KYI GTZO BO
RGOD TSANG SNA TSOGS RANG

GROL GYIS KYANG ZHAL GYIS BZHES PA MA ZAD LHAD ZHUGS JI DANG JI
YOD MKHAS DBANG BRAG

SGO RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG, SNA TSOGS RANG GROL SOGS KYI DRI BA
RTZOD LAN RNAMS

SU BLTAS NA SHES PA LAS 'DIR THAMS CAD 'GOD PA SKABS SU MA BAB
CING, DES

NA SNGAR 'GA' ZHIG GIS RANG BZO'I TSIG LHAD BCUG PA DE DUS PHYIS
KYI BLON PO PHYOGS

ZHEN CAN ZHIG GIS MTHONG BA NA BRTAG DPYAD MA SHES PAR STON PA'I
RIM GRO BA DGE SLONG

LEGS KAR ZHES PA ZHIG BYUNG SHAG DANG, GANG ZAG NGAN PA ZHIG YIN
SHAG GIS DE'I SKYE

BA RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YIN ZHES PA'I LUNG NGAN ZHIG BRTZAMS
NA RJE TZONG KHA BA'I MDZAD

'PHRIN SNYAN GRAGS DANG, RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I BSTAN PA LA GNOD
PAR 'GYUR RAM

SNYAM PA'I KUN SLONG GIS BYAS PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, DE NI NYI MA'I
DKYIL 'KHOR

LA MDZUB MO BTZUGS NAS 'DI NI MUN PA'I RANG BZHIN NO ZHES SMRA
BA LTAR BLO GROS DANG

LDAN PA SU 'DRA ZHIG GI YANG RNA LAM DU 'GRO BA MA YIN TE, CI'I
PHYIR NA, RJE

@348 TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NI TSAD LDAN GYI MDO RGYUD DU MA NAS
LAN CIG MIN PAR LUNG BSTAN TSUL

SNGAR GONG DU DRANGS PA LTAR DANG, DE'I NANG NAS SLOB DPON PAD
'BYUNG NYID KYIS,

DGA' LDAN ZHES BYA'I DGON GNAS DAM PA RU, ,MKHAS PA'I MCHOG GYUR
MDO RGYUD

DON LA MKHAS, ,ZHES PA NAS, BLO DANG BZANG GI MTSAN CAN SKYE BU
'BYUNG,

GSANG TSAN LAS RAB RDO RJE BDE BA RTZAL, ,ZHES DANG, BEE RO TZA
NA'I SKYE

BA ZHIG ,DBUS PHYOGS DGE LDAN ZHES PAR 'BYUNG, ,BYANG SEMS BLO
BZANG

ZHES GRAGS PA, ,ZHES SOGS KYI RTZOD MED KYI SKYES BUR LUNG BSTAN
BZHIN DU,

PHYOGS GCIG NAS LEGS KAR GYI SKYE BA YIN ZHES SNGA TSIG RJES
'GAL GYI LUNG BSTAN CI

LA MDZAD, DER MA ZAD RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I RNAM THAR NI GONG
DU BKOD PA LTAR,

SKU GZHON NU NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I SGOR ZHUGS,
DBUS GTZANG DAG

PA'I ZHING DU BYON NAS MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG LUGS KUN LA THOS BSAM
GYI SGRO 'DOGS

LEGS PAR BCAD, THOS DON NYAMS SU BZHES PAS SA LAM GYI RTOGS PA
KHYAD PAR

CAN DU MA THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS
KYIS DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN DNGOS SU MDZAD DE YANG DAG PA'I LTA BA DANG, LAM RIM
PA GNYIS KYI

DKA' BA'I GNAD SOGS LA THE TSOM GYI DRA BA DRUNG NAS PHYUNGS,
DBU MA'I LTA BA PHU

THAG CHOD PA BRNYES PAS STON PA SANGS RGYAS KYI YON TAN LA
SNYING THAG PA NAS NGES SHES

'KHRUNGS TE ZAB MO RTEN 'BREL GYI SGO NAS BSTOD PAR MDZAD, DE LA
SOGS PA MDOR

NA BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MA RTOGS PA DANG LOG PAR RTOG PA'I DRI
MA DRUNG NAS PHYUNGS TE

GSER SBYANGS BTZO MA BYI DOR BYAS PA LTA BUR MDZAD PA SOGS DUS
KYI MTHA' 'DIR RJE

TZONG KHA PAS BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD PA TZAM DUS MTSUNGS PA
DANG PHYIS BYON PA'I MKHAS

@349 GRUB GZHAN LUS KYANG MA MDZAD PA MNGON SUM TSAD MAS GRUB PA
DE LTAR YIN NA, LEGS

KAR SANGS RGYAS LA LOG LTA SKYES PA'I GANG ZAG DES SKYE BA PHYI
MA LA LUNG RTOGS KYI YON

TAN DE TZAM THOB, BSTAN PA LA BYA BA DE TZAM BYAS PA DE LOG LTA
SKYES PA'I MTHU LAS

BYUNG BA YIN ZER RAM, RGYU GANG LA BRTEN NAS BYUNG ZER BLO MNAL
DU PHAB NAS BSAM

NA SHES SO, ,7YANG, SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SPRUL BA YIN NGES ZER, ,

ZHES PA NI, DMIGS MED BRTZE BA'I GTER CHEN SPYAN RAS GZIGS,
,ZHES PA

LA MA RANGS PA'I TSIGS STE, DE LTAR ZER YANG DON SPYAN RAS GZIGS
KYI SPRUL PA

MIN ZHES ZER RGYUR SNANG RUNG, RJE BLA MA NI SPYAN RAS GZIGS SU
MA ZAD RIGS

GSUM KUN 'DUS KYI NGO BO YIN PAR TSAD MA'I LUNG GIS GRUB CING,
MANG DU

BRJOD MA DGOS TE, DENG SANG DMIGS BRTZE MA'I BSNYEN PA TSAD LDAN
SONG BA'I GANG

ZAG GIS RIGS GSUM SPYI SGRUB KYI SGO NAS LAS TSOGS DE DANG DE
DAG BSGRUB NA JI LTAR

BSHAD PA'I LAS KUN BDE BLAG TU 'GRUB BZHIN PA MNGON SUM DU GYUR
PA 'DI KHA YIN NA

LUNG RIG GZHAN GYIS BSGRUB PA'I NGAL BA BSTEN MA DGOS SO, ,BSTAN
PA'I MGO

NYES MDZAN SPYOD GLING LOG MKHAN, ,ZHES PA NI TSIG NGAN MU COR
DU SMRA BA TZAM LAS

SNYING PO MA MCHIS PAS LAN BYA MA DGOS SHING, SPRUL PA'I SKU LA
RIN CHEN RGYAN 'DOGS

SHING, ,ZHES PA NI RANG GI NANG 'KHROL PHYIR BSTAN PA'I TSIG
STE, DE YANG LUNG

BSTAN 'DI RTZOM MKHAN GYI MKHAS PA 'GANGS CHEN DE'I BSAM BLO LA,
STON PA SH'AKYA

THUB PA MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU YIN PA DANG, MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU DGE
SLONG YIN DGOS

PA TZAM ZHIG RNA BAS THOS PA RTAGS SU BKOD NAS, SPRUL SKU YIN NA
DGE SLONG GI RNAM PA

CAN ZHIG NGES PAR DGOS PA YIN 'DUG SNYAM PA ZHE PHUGS SU BCUG
NAS DGE SLONG LA RIN

@350 PO CHE'I RGYAN 'DOGS PA MI 'OS ZHES ZER RGYUR SNANG RUNG,
DE NI SPRUL SKU LA MCHOG

GI SPRUL SKU, SKYE BA SPRUL SKU, BZO BO SPRUL SKU GSUM DANG,
SPRUL SKU

KHYAD PAR CAN SOGS DU MA YOD PA MA SHES PA'I RDZOB RTAGS YANG
DAG STE, SPRUL SKU

LA SANGS RGYAS, BYANG SEMS, YI DAM ZHI KHRO, MKHA' 'GRO ,CHOS

SKYONG GI RNAM PA CAN LA SOGS PA JI SNYED CIG 'BYUNG NA, DE
THAMS CAD LA RIN PO

CHE'I RGYAN MI 'OS PA YIN NAM SOGS SHIG ,YANG RNAM PA GCIG TU,
MCHOG

GI SPRUL SKU DGE SLONG GI RNAM PA CAN LA DBU RGYAN 'BUL BA MA
'OS ZER RGYU YIN ZHES

SMRA NA, DGE SLONG GI RTEN LA DBU RGYAN SOGS MI RUNG NA, DGE
SLONG LA SNGAGS

BLA MED KYI DBANG SOGS BSKUR BA'I TSE DBU RGYAN THOR TSUGS, RIGS
LNGA, DAR

SPYANGS, STOD G-YOG ,SMAD G-YOG ,RIN PO CHE'I RGYAN SOGS LHA'I

CHAS 'JUG RNAMS SBYIN DU MI RUNG BA DANG, DGE SLONG RDO RJE
'DZIN PAS SNGAGS KYI

BDAG 'JUG SOGS LEN PA'I TSE YANG LHA'I CHAS 'JUG BYED MI RUNG BA
SOGS KYI SKYON DU

'GYUR LA, STON PA THUGS RJE CAN NYID KYIS KYANG AYON GYI YUL DU
RGYAL PO AINDRA

BO DHI SOGS LA DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I DBANG BSKUR BA'I TSE
DKYIL 'KHOR GYI GTZO

BO MI BSKYOD RDO RJE LA SOGS PA'I RNAM PAR BZHENGS PA DANG, DE
BZHIN DU DPAL LDAN

'BRAS SPUNGS SU DUS KYI 'KHOR LO LA SOGS PA'I GSANG SNGAGS KYI
CHOS 'KHOR RNAMS

BSKOR BA'I TSE DKYIL 'KHOR GYI 'KHOR LO DE DANG DE'I RNAM PA CAN
DU BZHENGS NAS GSUNG

PA YIN NA DE THAMS CAD STON PA SH'AKYA THUB PA'I MDZAD PAR MI
'OS ZHES SMRA RGYU YIN NAM,

DES NA JO BO RIN PO CHER DBU RGYAN PHUL BA NI, SPYIR NA JO BO'I
SNANG BRNYAN 'DI NYID

GRAGS PAS SNGAR GYI...

@351 LUGS DANG MTHUN PAR BYA BA SOGS DANG, LHAG PAR DGOS PA'I
GTZO BO NI DBU RGYAN

PHUL TE LONGS SKU'I CHA BYAD DANG MTHUN PAR MDZAD PA'I RTEN
'BREL LAS, NGES PA LNGA

LDAN GYI STON PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR 'KHOR BA MA STONG GI BAR DU
'GRO BA'I BSOD NAMS KYI

ZHING DU BRTAN PAR BZHUGS PA SOGS KYI SLAD DU YIN LA, DBU RGYAN
PHUL ZHING SMON LAM

CHEN MO'I RGYUN BTZUGS PA SOGS KYIS BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA'I PHAN
BDE BLA NAS BLAR

'PHEL TE SNYIGS MA'I DUS KYANG RDZOGS LDAN BZHIN DU GYUR BA
MTHONG BZHIN DU, KUN SLONG

NGAN BA'I DUG CHUS MYOS PAS, SH'AKYA MU NI'I RAB GNAS CHUG PA'I
MTHUS, ,NYI ZLA MTHO

GANG MKHRU GANG MAR BAB PAS, ,DANG PA'I GZA' SKAR GNAS MED
'KHRUG PAR 'GYUR, ,

ZHES SOGS ZER BA'I BSAM DON GYI GTZO BO NI, DBU RGYAN PHUL BA'I
TSE LCAGS GZER

BTAB YOD RGYU BA'I KHUL GYIS RAB GNAS NYAMS TSUL BYAS NA RGYUS
MED KYI MI RNAMS KYI

BLO LA AE 'THAD SNYAM PA DANG, DE LA BRTEN NAS NYI ZLA BAB PA
SOGS KYI NGAN LTAS

BYUNG TSUL LAB NA RGYAB SKYOR DU AE 'GRO SNYAM PA YIN 'DUG
KYANG, LCAGS GZER

BTAB MIN MIG GIS BLTAS SHING LAG PAS NYUL NA SHES PAS LUNG BSTAN
KHUNGS MA DAG

YIN PA'I RGYU MTSAN NI 'DI GCIG PUS KYANG SHES PAR NUS SO, ,'DI
DAG GI LAN

ZHIB PA NI MKHAS DBANG BRAG SGO RAB 'BYAMS PA'I GSUNG DU, NYI
ZLA NI 'JIG RTEN DE

KHA'I SEMS CAN SPYI MTHUN GYI LAS LAS GRUB PAS, GSUNG RAB NAS
BSHAD PA'I

THOG MTHA' BAR GSUM GYI BYA BA BYED TSUL LAS GZHAN PA'I RJE RIN
PO CHES DBU RGYAN PHUL

BAS RAB GNAS NYAMS NAS NYI ZLAS YAR MAR DU BLO BUR BA'I BYA BA
BYED BSAM PA NI,

MI LA MI'I SEMS DANG LDAN PA RNAMS LA NI MI 'BYUNG BAS DE LTAR
MA BYAS ZHES SGRUB MI

DGOS PA 'DRA STE, SNGAR JO BO SA 'OG TU SBAS PA'I DUS SU'ANG RAB
GNAS NYAMS

@352 NAS NYI ZLA MAR BAB SNYAM PA'I DOGS PA NI KHYI RGAN RGYA'O
LA YANG MA BYUNG 'DUG PAS SO, ,

JO BO LA DBU RGYAN 'BUL DUS DBU LA LCAGS GZER BTAB PAS RAB GNAS
NYAMS ZHES

PA'I DOGS PA ZHIG DE KHA'I DUS KYI MIG BU DANG MI LDAN PA'I MI
PHAL CHER ZHIG LA BYUNG

BYA'O, ,ZHES

BA NI,

RAB GNAS NYAMS PA'I DOGS PA ZHIG MI RNAMS KYI SEMS LA SHAR NA,
DE'I NGAN

RTAGS SU NYI ZLA MAR BAB, GLOG 'KHYUG ,THOG BAB, SKAR MDA'
RGYAB,

GZA' DU BA MJUG RING SHAR, NYI ZLA GZA' 'DZIN BYUNG, SA G-YOS,
SDIGS

BYUNG, 'KHYUG RGYAB, DGU TSIGS LOG ,THAL RLUNG LANGS PA SOGS KYI
NGAN

LTAS SKRAG RNGAMS DPE MED ZHIG BYUNG BAR MI RNAMS KYI GO RU RE
BA YIN 'DUG ,GLING

LOG LO GCIG ZLA BA BCU GSUM 'BYUNG, ,ZER BA NI, GTI THUG LA SONG

BA'I GSHIS KYIS GLING LOG GI DON NI MA SHES, RNA BAS DE 'DRA
ZHIG THOS PA NA MI

SHIS PA GO BA LOG PA 'DRA BA ZHIG BYUNG BAR GO RU RE BA DANG, DE
YANG GRANGS NGES

'DOGS KHA PO BYAS NA BDEN PAR 'DZIN AE YONGS BSAM PA YIN 'DUG
KYANG, KHO

RANG DANG RIGS MTHUN BYUNG NA MA GTOGS SUS BDEN BAR 'DZIN, LHAS
SBYIN GYIS DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU LA NGAN SEMS KYIS KHRAG PHYUNG BA'I DUS
SU'ANG NYI ZLAS MAR MA

BAB NA, SANGS RGYAS KYI SKU LA DBU RGYAN SGRON PAS NYI ZLA MAR
BAB YONGS SNYAM PA NI CHOS

KYI SGRA MI GRAGS PAR SKYES NA MA GTOGS MI 'BYUNG, MTSAMS MED
LNGA DANG NYE BA'I

MTSAMS MED LNGA BYAS KYANG NYI ZLA MGOR BAB YONGS SNYAM PA NI SU
LA'ANG MI 'DUG NA,

YID MUG DE GCIG PU'I SEMS LA CI SHAR NA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS
KYIS SHES

@353 PAR SNANG BAS SKYAR DU BRJOD MA DGOS LA, GZHAN YANG LUNG
BSTAN 'DI DAG GI TSIG

RIS GONG DU DRANGS PA, KHYOD KYI GZUGS BRNYAN BGYIS PA'I 'DRA
'BAG LA, ,

BDAG GIS LOG PA'I RGYAN CHA 'DOGS PAR SHOG ,CES PA'ANG LEGS KAR
GYIS

SMON LAM BTAB PA YIN ZHES ZER 'DOD PA MA ZAD, DGE SLONG GI RNAM
PA CAN LA

DBU RGYAN PHUL BA DGE SLONG LA MI 'OS PA'I RGYAN CHAR SONG BA
YIN ZHES ZER RGYUR SNANG MOD,

TSIG RIS 'DI DAG LA DPAGS NA LUNG BSTAN 'DI RTZOM PA PO'I GANG
ZAG DE'I PHUGS

KYI ZHE 'DOD LA, DGE SLONG GI RTEN CAN LA DBU RGYAN PHUL BAS
'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA

LA GNOD PA YIN ZHES PA ZHIG SHIN TU ZER 'DOD CHE BA YOD 'DRA
YANG, 'DUL

BA'I BSTAN PA NI SNGAR GONG DU BKOD PA LTAR BOD 'DIR BAR SKABS
SU BDAG MED LTA BUR

SONG BA LA RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS DAG THER LAN CIG MIN PAR
MDZAD NAS, PHYAG

LEN PHRA ZHING PHRA BA TSUN CHAD THUGS NYAMS SU BSTAR ZHING SPEL
BAR MDZAD PAS 'DZAM BU'I

GLING GI YUL GRU PHAL MO CHER NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I GANG ZAG GIS
KHYAB CING, LHAG

PAR JO BOR DBU RGYAN PHUL BA DANG, SMON LAM CHEN MO 'DZUGS PA
SOGS TSUN CHAD

NAS DE BAS KYANG JE RGYAS KYIS DA LTA'I DUS SU'ANG 'DUL BSTAN
TSANG LA MA NOR BA MTHA'

DBUS SKYES 'GRO MCHOG DMAN KUN GYIS NYAMS SU LEN BYAR YOD PA 'DI
NI, RJE TZONG

KHA PA CHEN PO'I THUGS RJE LAS GZHAN DU MED PA KUN GYI MTHONG
CHOS SU GYUR PA'I DBANG

GIS 'DUL BSTAN LA GNOD NI ZER MA SHES, DE BAS GZHAN DU ZER RGYUS
PHONGS

PAS NYI ZLA MAR BAB PA SOGS SHES BYA LA MI SRID PA 'GA' ZHIG
'BYUNG ZHES PA'I BLUN

GTAM 'DI DAG LAB DGOS BYUNG BA YIN PAR SNA NGO, ,7 THEMS PA'I
'OG NAS DAM

SRI'I SROG SNYING 'DON, ,ZHES PA'ANG SNGON DU LUNG BSTAN YIN
KHUL GYI TSIG NGAN 'DI

@354 LTAR BRTZAMS NAS, RJES SU DE'I KHUNGS BSKYEL KHUL KYIS SLOB
DPON PADMAS DAM

SRI SPUN DGU GA'UR BCUG NAS THEMS PA'I 'OG TU BSNAN PA, RJES SOR
RJE TZONG

KHA PAS BTON PA YIN 'DUG CES PA'I GTAM 'CHAL ZHIG DANG BCAS SPEL
'DUG MOD,

DE NI MKHAS DBANG BRAG SGO BA'I GSUNG DU, BOD 'DI 'DRE SRIN DU
MAS GANG BA'I

GNAS YIN PAS GDON GYI GNOD PA CHEN PO YONG GI 'DUG PA DANG,
RGYAL 'GONG

ZHUGS PA SOGS 'DRE'I 'TSUB CHA THAMS CAD RJE RIN PO CHES BYAS
PAR KHAG NGAN 'JOG

AE THUB BSAM PA RED, CES GSUNGS PA LTAR KUN SLONG GI GTZO BO NI
DE TZAM ZHIG

RANG YIN 'DUG MOD, GANG LTAR SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RJE TZONG KHA
PA'I RING LUGS

MDO SNGAGS RNAM PAR DAG PA'I BSTAN PA 'DI DAR BA NA, BSTAN 'DZIN
DU KHAS CHES

NAS CHANG DANG BUD MED LA BYUNG RGYAL DU SPYOD PA'I BSTAN PA'I
RMA 'BYIN MKHAN RNAMS RANG

SHUGS KYIS NYAMS DMA' RU SONG BA 'DI DAM SRI'I SROG SNYING BTON
PA'I MTHU YIN NA MA

GTOGS, GZHAN MA SROG SNYING BTON LUGS 'DI BYAS DANG, DE BTON PAS
BSTAN PA

LA GNOD LUGS 'DI BYUNG GI LO RGYUS TIL 'BRU TZAM YANG SHOD RGYU
MED DO, ,DES NA LUNG

BSTAN 'DI DAG NI SUS BYAS 'DIS BYAS KYI KHUNGS JI BZHIN NI MA
RNYED DE, 'GA' ZHIG

GIS CHEN PO SHAKA MCHOG PA DANG, PADMA GLING PA GNYIS GROS MDZAD
NAS RDO'I GA'U KHA

SBYAR GYI NANG DU, KHYOD KYI GZUGS BRNYAN BGYIS PA'I 'DRA 'BAG
LA, ,ZHES SOGS KYI

SHOG SGRIL BCUG ,KHA KHRO CHUS BSDAMS NAS YAR 'BROG MTSO NANG DU
'PHANGS, PADMA

GLING PAS 'DON MKHAN MDZAD PA YIN TSUL DU, NGA NI MKHAS PA YIN
PAS 'DI RTZOMS

SHING, ,KHYOD NI GRUB THOB YIN PAS 'DON DGOS ZHES, ,MKHAS PAR
RLOMS PA'I

CHEN PO SH'AKA MCHOG DANG, ,PADMA GLING PAR BCOS PA'I SNYING
CHEN GNYIS, ,GROS NGAN

@355 BTAB STE YAR 'BROG MTSO NANG DU, ,ZHES SOGS KYI LO RGYUS
ZHIG 'DUG PA 'DI

YANG DGE LUGS LA ZHEN CHE BA'I GANG ZAG ZHIG GIS GONG GI LUNG
NGAN DE DAG LA SEMS

MA RANGS PAS SH'AKA MCHOG PA DANG, PADMA GLING PA GNYIS LA KHAG
BZHAG NAS BYAS

PA 'DRA STE, BRAG SGO RAB 'BYAMS PA'I RTZOD LAN DU, GANG LTAR
PAn CHEN SHAKA

MCHOG KYANG HA CANG BLUN PA RANG NI YIN 'DOGS MA KHA, LUNG BSTAN
'DI NA RNAM DBYE

CUNG ZAD KYANG MI SHES PA'I RMONGS PA'I NANG NAS KYANG RMONGS PA
ZHIG GIS, PADMA

THANG YIG LA BLTAS NAS BYAS PA 'DRA, ZHES GSUNGS PA BDEN PAR
MCHIS SHING,

YANG BRAG SGO BAS MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR LUNG
BSTAN GYI ROL MOR, CHEN

PO SH'AKA MCHOG PA YANG 'KHRUNGS TZAM NAS RJE RIN PO CHE LA
SDANG BAS ZHUGS PA ZHIG NI

YIN 'DUG ,THOS BSAM MDZAD NAS KYANG KHUNGS RNAMS LA NAN TAN MI
MDZAD PAR,

'DRA 'GRIG GI DGAG PA DPAG MED DANG NGAN RTZOMS TSIGS BCAD MA
MANG DU BRTZAMS, DE

NAS PADMA GLING PA DANG GROS MDZAD NAS YAR 'BROG GTER LUNG
BRTZAMS PA YIN ZHES ZER,

CHEN PO SH'AKA MCHOG PA DPYOD PA DANG LDAN PA ZHIG GIS DE LTAR
MI BRTZOM BSAM KYANG PHAL

CHER BDEN PA 'DRA STE, SE RA RJE BTZUN PAS SHAKA LAN DU, GAL TE
RIG PAS

MA THUB NA, ,LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA BRTZAMS PA DANG, ,GDUG 'DRE'I
SPRUL PA

YIN ZHES SMRAS, ,DE 'DRAS GZHAN LA GNOD MI NUS, ,RANG NYID 'DI
PHYIR

PHAM 'GYUR BAS, ,DE PHYIR BAG YOD MDZAD DU GSOL, ,ZHES TSIG BRDA
SPROS

PAS SO, ,ZHES DANG, PADMA GLING PA LA KHAG BYUNG BA LA NGES PA
MED KYANG,

'DI MKHAR RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS PAS LCAGS KYI RDO RJE'I GTER THAMS
CAD 'DI'I DUS SU

BYUNG ZHES GLENG BAS DE BDEN NA NA 'DI YANG BDEN PAR NGES SO,
,ZHES PHYOGS GCIG

@356 NAS SK'AKA MCHOG PA DANG, PADMA GLING PA GNYIS LA KHAG
BYUNG BA LTAR PHAL CHER MIN

NAM DGONGS PA ZHIG KYANG BYUNG 'DUG RUNG, PADMA GLING PA LA NGO
'DRA GNYIS BYUNG TSUL

ZHIG KYANG 'DUG PA LTAR NA 'DRA MIN DES MA BYAS PA'I NGES PA NI
GA LA MCHIS KYANG, PAn

CHEN SHAKA MCHOG PAS BRTZAMS PA NI MIN PAR NGES TE, CI'I PHYIR
NA, SH'AG MCHOG PA DE

RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA MA GUS PA ZHIG YIN 'DUG KYANG, GZHUNG
LUGS LA SBYANGS PA

MDZAD CING MKHAS PA'I KHUR CHE TZAM BZHES PA ZHIG YIN 'DUG NA,
LUNG BSTAN BRTZAMS

KYANG 'DI BAS 'DRA CHAGS TZAM DANG, 'BREL MTSUNGS TZAM ZHIG
YONGS RIS LA

BLUN GTAM LAG PAS 'KHYOG TSAD 'PHRENG BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI 'DRA
RANG NI MI GSUNG BAR

NGES SO, ,YANG 'GA' ZHIG GTER STON SNANG RTZE BAS BYAS ZHES ZER
YANG, DE

YANG MIN 'DRA STE, BRAG SGO BA'I GSUNG DU, GTER STON SNANG RTZE
BAS RJE RIN PO CHE

LA LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA NI BRTZAMS YOD SHAS CHE YANG, LEGS KAR GYI
SPRUL BA YIN

ZER BA'I LUNG BSTAN 'DI NI MA BRTZAMS PAR TSAD MAS NGES TE, LUNG
BSTAN 'DI

NI YID BZANG RTZE BA BZHUGS DUS NAS BYUNG ZHING, YID BZANG RTZE
BA RJE'I ZHABS

LA THUG PA DANG, GTER STON SNANG RTZE BA NI NANG PA GZHU KHANG
PA DANG SKU NYE YIN PAS

BAR KHANG GI SENG GE MI GDONG CAN GYI 'OG NAS GTER 'DON DUS
DRUNG PA YANG PHEBS

DGOS ZHES ZHAL SNGA NAS GZHU KHANG PAS KYANG PHEBS PA RGAN PO
RNAMS KYIS DRAN 'DUG ,

CES GSUNGS PAS DUS MI MTSUNGS PAR NGES SO, ,GANG LTAR LUNG BSTAN
NGAN PA 'DI

DANG 'DI 'DRA BA BRTZAMS PA'I RGYU MTSAN NI, RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR
LUNG BSTAN GYI ROL

MOR, RJE RIN PO CHE LA LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA BYED PA'I RGYU MTSAN
NI, GRUB MTHA'

GZHAN DAG LTAR RIM GYIS BYUNG BA MA YIN PAR, LO SKOR GCIG TZAM
GYI NANG DU GRUB

@357 MTHA' RIS MI GCIG PA'I MKHAS PA PHAL CHER SLOB MAR 'DUS,
'JIG RTEN GYI

CHE DGU THAMS CAD KYIS ZHABS LA BTUD DE RI BO DGE LUGS PA ZHES
SHA MO RDOL BA LTAR

SKAD CIG LA BYUNG BAS THABS CAD MIG HUR RE LUS, BYA THABS DANG
BRAL BAS 'GA'

ZHIG GIS GTER LUNG YIN TSUL BRTZAMS, GO SH'AKA SOGS KYIS KHA
NGAN MANG DU BYAS,

DUS PHYIS GTER STON SNANG RTZE BAS KYANG KAR DGE'I KUN SLONG LA
BRTEN NAS CHOS RGYUS GTAN

NAS MED PA'I LUNG BSTAN YANG BYAS, ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA LTAR KUN
SLONG PHYOGS

ZHEN SDANG SHUGS KYI GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR PAS SRAN MI BZOD PA LTA
BUR SONG RUNG BYA THABS

KYIS DBEN PAS LUNG NGAN 'DI DAG BRTZAMS DGOS BYUNG BA YIN PAR
SNANG LA, 'DI

DANG 'DI 'DRA'I LUNG BSTAN GZHAN DAG KYANG KHA SHAS YOD TSOD
SNANG RUNG MIG LAM DU MA

GYUR CING, GONG DU BKOD PA 'DI DAG NI KHA NAS 'DON RGYU LCE MIN
PA MED PA'I BLUN

PO SNYING KHAMS CAN, PHRAG DOG GI DUG CHUS MYOS, LOG RTOG GI
'DAM DU TSUD,

RANG 'DOD KYI ZHAGS PAS ZIN, RMONGS ZHEN GYI MUN PA 'THIB PA
ZHIG GIS SO SO'I

'KHOR SLOB GTI THUG KHA SHAS DANG, SHA MAR RTZAM PA SOGS KYIS
PHAN 'DOGS PA'I SBYIN

BDAG 'GA' ZHIG TZAM RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I PHYOGS SU KHA 'CHUS DOGS
KYI SDUG BSNGAL

GYIS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE 'DI 'DRA ZHIG BRTZAMS NA, RMONGS RGAN DE
DAG LA BZANG

NGAN 'BYED PA'I BLO GROS MED PA'I DBANG GIS GANG SMRAS PA DE DAG
YIN SHAG GIS BDEN

PAR 'DZIN YONG SNYAM PA'I LTOGS 'DOD KYI BSAM PA DE TZAM ZHIG
GIS SBYAR BA YIN

'DUG CING, SUS BYAS 'DI BYAS KHA GSAL MI 'GOD PA'ANG LUNG RIG
TSAD LDAN

GYI DGAG PA BYUNG NA LAN GYIS PHONGS PAS NGO TSA SNYAM PA DANG,
PHYOGS GCIG NAS

DUS DER CHE DGU MTHA' DAG RJE TZONG KHA PA'I ZHABS LA 'DUD PA
SHA STAG LTA BUR SONG BAS

@358 RGYAL KHRIMS GYI CHAD PA'I 'JIGS PA YANG BYUNG DOGS PAS
MING MED KYI YIG BSKYUR DANG

MTSUNGS PAR BKOD DGOS BYUNG BA LAS GDONG DNGOS SU BSTAN MA NUS
PA'I RANG RTAGS

BCAS, DES NA MING MED KYI YI GE LA 'JIG RTEN RANG GA BA DAG
KYANG TSAD 'DZIN MI

BYED PA LTAR NA, 'DI DAG LA'ANG LAN BYA BA'I 'OS SU MI SNANG
YANG DENG SANG PHAL MO CHE

BLO GROS DMAN ZHING LEGS NYES 'BYED PA'I MTHU CHUNG BAS LAN ZHIG
MA MTHONG NA BDEN

PAR BZUNG NAS RANG GZHAN MANG PO LOG PA'I LAM DU 'KHRID PA MANG
BA RNAMS LA SEMS

KYIS MA BZOD PAS DGAG SGRUB MDOR BSDUS TZAM ZHIG SPEL BA YIN NO,
, 7'DIR

SMRAS PA, MDO SNGAGS BSTAN LA RMAD BYUNG MKHYEN RAB KYIS,
,BSREGS BCAD BDAR

BA'I GSER BZHIN LEGS DPYAD PAS, ,MA RTOGS LOG RTOG THE TSOM
DRUNG PHYUNGS TE, ,

DRI MED RGYAL BA'I DGONGS ZAB MNGON DU GYUR, ,DE LTA'I LAM SROL
BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS

LDAN GYIS, ,TSUL BZHIN 'DZIN PA'I RNAM DAG RING LUGS LA, ,RI BO
DGE LDAN PA

ZHES SA GSUM NA, ,SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PA DBYAR GYI RNGA BZHIN LDIR,
,DZA TI'I DRI BSUNG

'THUL BA'I YUL GRU NAS, ,ZA 'OG THAGS SU BSKRUN PA'I NOR 'DZIN
BAR, ,GSER

ZHUN MDANGS KYIS MDZES PA'I RING LUGS KYIS, ,SKAD CIG MIG 'PHRUL
BZHIN DU KHYAB

GYUR TSE, ,PHYOGS SU LHUNGS BA'I CHOS RLOMS PHAL MO CHE'I,
,RNYED BKUR

SNYAN GRAGS TSUL LA GNOD GYUR PAS, ,PHRAG DOG DUG CHUS MYOS PA'I
GZHAN DBANG

GIS, ,SNYING LA ZUG RNGU'I TSER MAS ZIN NA YANG, ,BSTAN PA'I
SNYING PO RNAM

DAG RING LUGS LA, ,CHOS BZHIN RGOL BA'I KLAN KA PHRA MO TZAM,
,SMRA BA'I

NUS PA CHA TZAM MA MCHIS PAS, ,CI BYA RTOL MED NGANG TSUL LA
'PHYAN TSE, ,

LUNG RIG TSUL DANG 'GAL BA'I BLUN PO'I TSIG ,'PHRENG BAR BSGRIGS
LA LUNG

@359 BSTAN SGRO BTAGS NAS, ,RANG RANG RIGS MTHUN MGRIN PA BZANG
PO'I KHYUR, ,

SPEL BA'I NGAL BA CI YANG KHUR DU 'KHYER, ,DE NI 'OD ZER STONG
LDAN NYI MA'I GZHIR, ,

BLTAS NAS 'DI NI MUN PA'I 'KHOR LO'O ZHES, ,GLENG DANG MTSUNGS
PHYIR RNAM DPYOD

LDAN PA'I TSOGS, ,RNA BA GTOD PA TZAM YANG CHES DKON NA, ,LUNG
DANG RIG

PAS 'GOG PA LA ZHUGS KYANG, ,SMYON PAR LAN DU SMRA BA JI BZHIN
DU, ,'GYUR

PHYIR SNGON BYON MKHAS DBANG PHAL CHER GYIS, ,LAN DU MA MDZAD
SNYING RJE'I YUL DU

BZHAG ,DE LTA MOD KYI DENG DUS MKHAS PA BAS, ,BLUN PO MGO 'PHANG
MTHO BA'I

DUS NGAN 'DIR, ,BLUN PO'I RJES SU BLUN PO MANG ZHUGS NA, ,NGAN
'GRO'I

GNAS KUN DOG POR BYAS DOGS NAS, ,LUNG RIG LAM LAS DRANGS PA'I
DGAG

SGRUB KYI, ,RNAM BZHAG NYUNG ZAD TZAM ZHIG KHO PO YIS, ,SPEL BA
'DI YANG

LHAG BSAM BZANG PO YIS, ,KUN NAS BSLANGS KYI PHYOGS LHUNG BSAM
PAS MIN, ,

DE PHYIR DPYOD LDAN DAG GIS TSUL 'DI LA, ,ZHIB MOS BRTAGS NAS
RANG GZHAN

NGAN SONG DU, ,'KHRID PA'I BSAM SBYOR DAG LAS RGYAB PHYOGS TE,
,DAD GUS

BAG YOD TSUL LA GNAS PAR RIGS, ,ZHES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI GTAM DU
BYA BA'I

TSIGS BCAD DO, , ' GZHAN YANG MDZAD CHEN 'DI DAG GI SKOR LA
MKHAS

GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG DU, DE YANG 'GA' ZHIG 'DI SKAD
DU GLENG STE,

SNGON CHOS RGYAL SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS KA BA SHING LO CAN DU GTER
DU SBAS PA'I DKAR CHAG

GI SHOG RIL JO BO CHEN PO DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA LA MKHA' 'GROS
LUNG BSTAN TE GTER

NAS BYUNG BA LA SHOG RIL GSUM YOD DE, BLON PO RNAMS KYIS MDZAD
PA'I ZLA BA

'OD 'JO, JO MO RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I DAR DKAR GSAL BA, RGYAL PO
RANG NYID

@360 KYIS MDZAD PA'I BKA' CHEMS KA KHOL MA'O, ,DE LA RGYAL PO
RANG GI BKA' CHEMS DE'I

NANG NAS BSTAN PA LA BYA BA MDZAD PA DANG, JO BO RIN PO CHE LA
MCHOD PA MDZAD PA'I

SKYES BU DAM PA 'DI 'DRA BA 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR ZHES PA'I LUNG
BSTAN MANG DU YOD PA LA,

KHONG RANG NAS BRGYUD PA'I RGYAL PO 'BYON LUGS DANG, LO CHEN RIN
BZANG 'BYON

PAR LUNG BSTAN PA'I RJES NAS RNGOG LO CHEN PO LUNG BSTAN, DE NAS
DE'I LEGS

BSHAD NYAMS TE CI YANG YID LA MI BYED PA LAM GYI MCHOG YIN ZER
NAS KUN RDZOB KHYAD DU

GSOD PA'I LTA NGAN DAR BAR 'GYUR BAR LUNG BSTAN, BAR SKABS SU
DVAGS PO LHA RJE

KHU DPON GYIS LHA SA LA ZHIG BSOS DANG ZHABS TOG PHUN SUM TSOGS
PA MDZAD PAR LUNG

BSTAN, DE NAS DUS PHYIS RIG PA LA MKHAS PA DAG GIS GONG GI LTA
NGAN DE LTA BU CUNG

ZAD NYAMS PAR BYED PA LUNG BSTAN CING, DGE SLONG BYANG SEMS RDO
RJE 'DZIN PA

ZHIG GIS JO BO'I ZHAL BSGYUR ZHING, MCHOD PA PHUL DU BYUNG BA
MDZAD PAR LUNG

BSTAN PA NI RJE BLA MA 'DI NYID YIN NO ZHES ZER TE, JI SKAD DU,
BKA' CHEMS

LAS, DE NAS KHYAD PAR BSNYEN BKUR CHER MDZAD PA, ,DGE SLONG
BYANG SEMS

SHAR PHYOGS SKU 'KHRUNGS PA, ,GSANG SNGAGS 'CHANG ZHING RNAL
'BYOR CHEN PO NI, ,

SNYING PO'I MTHA' RTEN SKYES CHEN DAM PA NI, ,ZHAL YANG BSGYUR
ZHING BSNYEN BKUR

DAM PA MDZAD, ,DE LA BSNYEN BKUR CHER BYED DE DAG NI, ,'PHAGS
PA'I GANG

ZAG DGE SBYONG SHA DAG GO ,ZHES 'BYUNG BA'O, ,ZHAL YANG BSGYUR
ZHES PA NI,

JO BO RIN PO CHE SNGAR DBU RGYAN DANG MI LDAN PA LAS DBU RGYAN
DANG BCAS PA NYID DU ZHAL BSGYUR

BA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS SHING, GONG GI BKA' CHEMS KYI LUNG BSTAN 'DI
LA

SNGAR GYI YI GE 'GA' ZHIG TU YIG NOR GYIS, DGE SLONG BYANG SEMS
SHAR LHOR SKU

@361 'KHRUNGS PA, ,ZHES 'KHOD PA LA BRTEN NAS 'GA' ZHIG GIS
DVAGS SGOM TSUL

KHRIMS SNYING PO'I LUNG BSTAN DU NGOS 'DZIN PAR MDZAD MOD,
SGOM PA TSUL KHRIMS

SNYING POS KYANG JO BO RIN PO CHE RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS LA
NYAMS BSOS SRI ZHU BKUR

STI RGYA CHER MDZAD PA RNAMS BKA' CHEMS LAS LUNG BSTAN TSUL
YOD PA NI, MKHAS

GRUB RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG GONG DU BKOD PA LAS SHES MOD KYANG,
DRANGS MA THAG PA'I

LUNG BSTAN 'DI LA NI SNGAR GYI YIG RNYING KHUNGS DAG RNAMS SU,
DGE SLONG BYANG SEMS

SHAR PHYOGS SKU 'KHRUNGS PA, ,ZHES 'KHOD PA LTAR RJE TZONG KHA
PA NYID KYI LUNG BSTAN

DU RTZOD PA MED PA YIN LA, GONG GI MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE'I
GSUNG 'DI DAG NI,

SNGAR GONG DU LUNG BSTAN NGAN PA RTZOM PA RNAMS KYI DGAG PA
YANG DAG TU YANG DON GYIS

SONG BA YIN NO, ,DE NAS LO SNGA PHYI 'DI DAG TU RJE NYID KYI
ZHABS 'BRING DU BYON PA'I

'KHOR RNAMS 'BYON BZHUD MANG BAS CUNG ZAD THUGS BSUN PAR GYUR
NAS, GDAN SA

DBEN DGON ZHIG 'DING BA'I ZHU BA SNGAR NAS YANG YANG 'BUL GYIN
YOD PA LTAR, DE'I TSE

SDE PA DANG BU SLOB YON BDAG SO SO NAS KYANG DGON PA RNYING PA
'BUL BA DANG, GSAR BA

'DING BA'I BDAG RKYEN BYED CES GSOL BA 'DEBS PA YANG MANG DU
BYUNG BA LA, DGONGS

PA'I MTHIL DNGOS GZHI NI RJE BTZUN GSANG BDAG GIS, DBANG BSKUR
RI YI 'DEBS

DAG TU, ,BTZUN MO SDING GI NGOS PHYOGS SU, ,DGE 'DUN DPAG MED
'DU BAR 'GYUR, ,

RI NI GANG YIN 'JAM DPAL MCHED, ,MNGA' RIS BYANG KHAMS KUN GYI
SKYABS, ,PHYOGS

BCUR SDE DGON RGYAS PA 'BYUNG, ,ZHES SOGS RTZOD MED KYI LUNG
BSTAN DU MA'I

DON LTAR DBANG BSKUR RI'I ZHOL 'BROG RI BO CHE NYID DU GDAN SA
'DEBS PA'I DUS LA

BAB PAR MNGON SUM DU GZIGS SHING MKHYEN NA'ANG, SKYE BO MANG
PO'I THE TSOMS

@362 DANG DOGS PA SEL ZHING SGRO SKUR GYI KLAN KA MI 'JUG PA'I
SLAD DU, GONG GI SMON

LAM CHEN MO'I SKABS DAD LDAN SO SOS ZHUS PA RNAMS DANG, RJE
NYID KYI DGONGS

BZHED SOGS GANG BZANG JO BO RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG DU GSOL BA BTAB
NAS MAR ME DANG

MNAL LAM SOGS KYI LTAS BRTAGS PAS, THAMS CAD KYI NANG NAS
'BROG RI BO

CHE BZANG BAR BYUNG STE, SMON LAM GROL BA DANG RJE NYID KYIS
KYANG ZHABS KYIS BCAGS

SHING SA GZHI BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA SOGS MDZAD, DE NAS DPYIN
SNGON MA LA SE RA

CHOS SDINGS SU BZHUGS TE, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DRUG BRGYA TZAM LA
RTZA SHE DANG, BYANG

SA'I TSUL KHRIMS LE'U, SGRUB THABS KUN BZANG, LAM RIM LA SOGS
PA'I

MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, DE NAS SPYAN SNGA RIN PO
CHE BSOD NAMS

BZANG POS GSOL BA NAN CHER BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS DPYID RTING MA
LA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN

PO DPON SLOB NYIS BRGYA TZAM GYIS ZANGS RI'I PHU CHEN DU BYON,
SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE

BSOD BZANG BA NYID DANG, MKHAN CHEN RGYAL BZANG BAS GTZO MDZAD
THEL PA'I RI DGE

MANG PO DANG, GZHAN YANG SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA MANG DU 'DUS PA
RNAMS LA LAM RIM

SOGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, DE NAS SRAS KYI THU BO SLOB DPON
DKA' BCU BA DAR

MA RIN CHEN DANG, SLOB DPON 'DUL 'DZIN PA RNAM GNYIS KYIS THOG
MA MDZAD PA'I

DGE 'DUN PHAL CHE BAS 'BROG RI BO CHER BYON TE, RJE NYID KYI
BKA' BZHIN GDAN SA

DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING BTAB PA'I DBU TSUGS PA NA,
PHYOGS DANG NYE SKOR

GYI YON BDAG DANG, SER SKYA'I SDE BA THAMS CAD KYIS DAD
BSLANGS KYI 'BUL BA

DANG, SGYU LUS KYI BKUR STI SOGS TSAD MED PA DGA' SPRO DANG
BCAS TE BSGRUB PAS

GLANG LO DE KHA'I NANG LA GZIMS KHANG GIS THOG DRANGS PA'I
BRANG KHANG RDZOGS PAR GRUB PA

@363 BDUN CU LHAG TZAM DANG, GZHI BTING BA BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL
BA BYUNG, BRANG

KHANG SO SO PHAL CHE BA LA'ANG 'DUL BA NAS JI LTAR GSUNGS PA
BZHIN DU, DANG POR

GZHI BRTAG PA DANG, BRTAGS NAS DGE 'DUN LA GSOL BA DANG, DE
NAS

DGE 'DUN GYI GNANG BA SBYIN PA DANG, LAG GI BLA BSKO BA DANG,
RDO BTEG

PA'I MTHA' LAS BYUNG BA'I RUNG KHANG GCOD PA DANG, KHANG PA'I
TSAD LAS MA LHAG

PAR BRTZIGS PA SOGS KYI PHYAG LEN DAG THER CAN MDZAD PAS MKHAR
LAS KYI PHYAG LEN

TZAM GYIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE GSAL BAR MDZAD PA NI RMAD
DU BYUNG BA'I RNAM PAR THAR

PA'O, ,'DI LO DBYAR 'OL KHA BAS GDAN DRANGS PA BZHIN DBYAR
GNAS 'OL KHA

BSAM GTAN GLING DU MDZAD NAS, 'OL KHA DANG DVAGS PO SOGS KYI
RAB TU BYUNG BA

MANG PO DANG BCAS PA LA CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, MNYAL GYI RAB
GRONG DGE BSHES 'DAS

PAR KHONG RANG GIS KHA CHEMS BZHAG PA LTAR NYE 'BREL SHUL NA
MCHIS PA RNAMS KYIS KYANG

G-YO ZOL MED PAR, ,RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POR GSER PHYE MA MGUR
ZHO STONG PHRAG GCIG

GIS THOG DRANGS DNGUL LA SOGS PA'I 'BUL BA DPAG TU MED PA
BYAS, STON

KA SOGS KYANG PHYOGS DER RANG GZHAN GYI DON RGYA CHEN PO
MDZAD, DE SKABS 'OL

KHA BSAM GTAN GLING DU SKU MTSAMS DAM PO BCAD NAS BLA MA DANG
YI DAM THA MI DAD DU

DMIGS PA LA GSOL BA SHUGS DRAG PO MANG DU 'DEBS PAR MDZAD
CING, DPAL

GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RDZOGS RIM RIM PA LNGA'I NGO SPROD CHEN MO
RIM PA LNGA GSAL BA'I

SGRON ME RTZOM PA'I THUGS 'DUN BTANG NAS ZIN BRIS 'DEBS PAR
MDZAD PA'I SKABS SU,

MNAL LAM GYI LTAS NGO MTSAR BA BYUNG BA BSNYEL BAR GYUR NA MI
RUNG SNYAM DU DGONGS NAS,

BRDA'I TSIG GIS RNAM PAR BCINGS PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA YI GER
MDZAD DE, KUN

@364 GYI YID LAM DU MI 'GYUR PA'I GNAS JI LTA BAR BZHAG PAR
MDZAD PA DE NI 'DI YIN TE,

RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA GUS PAS PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,BYA
GHA'I GONG GI TZANDRA NI, ,

MIG DANG ZLA BA'I GRANGS GSUM LA, ,BGRO BA MDZAD PA'I CHU
'DRES CHUS, ,KA LA

SHA BKANG STER RTZIS BYED, ,PHUL BYUNG NAS NI SUM BRGYA BCU,
,SONG ZER YAB

GCIG DKYIL 'KHOR GTZO, ,BGRO BA MDZAD PA GNYIS KYANG SNANG,
,GRANGS

BZHI PA LA RNAM PA CAN, ,KHRI YI STENG NAS RTZA BA NI, ,GTAD
NAS 'DI DAG

GYIS ZHES TSE, ,SNGAGS RGYAS LAN GSUM BTEG SNGON GYI, ,DE
'DRA'I LTAS

GO LNGA PA LA, ,LHO YI THUGS BCUD DAM PA LA, ,'PHRIG TSUD DE
NAS DRUG PA LA, ,

NGES RNYED DE NAS BDUN PA LA, ,RTOGS BSRES LAS NI SHIN TU
NGES, ,SHID

ZAN ZHES PA'ANG DE NAS GO ,DE 'DRA'I NGO MTSAR RMAD DU BYUNG,
,BRJED KYI

DOGS NAS YI GER BKOD, ,DE DON SGRUB PA MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,CES
GLANG GI ZLA BA

BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES BDUN LA 'OL KHA'I BSAM GTAN GLING DU BRIS
PA DGE LEGS SU

GYUR CIG ,CES BYA BA'O, ,DE DAG GI DON RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA'I GSUNG

NGAG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS DGROL
BAR MDZAD PA NI 'DI LTAR,

DE YANG BYA GHA NI STAG GI SKAD DOD YIN LA, DE'I GONG ZHES PA
GLANG GI LO GO BAR

BYA BA'O, ,TZANDRA NI ZLA BA'I MING YIN LA, MIG NI GNYIS DANG,
ZLA BA NI

GCIG YIN TE, GCIG GI BRDA' YIG G 'OG TU GNYIS YIG BZHAG PA NI
BCU

GNYIS YIN PAS ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA GO BAR BYED PA'I, ,GSUM PA
ZHES BYA BA NI

ZLA BA DE'I TSES GSUM GYI MTSAN MO'O, ,DE'I TSE RGYAL BA KUN
GYI YAB GCIG RJE 

BTZUN 'JAM PA'I RDO LHA BCU DGU'I DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS SU RDZOGS
PAR SNANG ZHING,

@365 DKYIL 'KHOR GYI GTZO BOS RGYAN BZANG PO SNA TSOGS PAS
SPRAS PA'I RIN PO CHE'I BUM PA

CHUS BKANG BA ZHIG RJE NYID LA STER RTZIS MDZAD CING, KA LA
SHA NI BUM PA STE BUM

PA'I CHU 'DI JO BO CHEN PO DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA MNYES THANG GI
SKYI CHU'I 'GRAM NA BZHUGS

DUS RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DANG, RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA GNYIS
SKU GSUM

DANG GNYIS GANG YIN LA CHOS KYI BGRO BA MDZAD PA'I CHU 'DRES
PA'I CHU YIN, 'DI JO

BO CHEN PO NAS BZUNG STE DA BAR LO SUM BRGYA DANG BCU SONG,
DE'I BAR DU STER SA

MA RNYED, DA KHYOD LA STER BA YIN NO ZHES GSUNGS SHING, DE'I
TSE CHOS KYI

BGRO BA MDZAD PA PO RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA DANG 'JAM DBYANGS GNYIS
KYANG SNANG NGO, ,

ZHES GSUNGS TE, 'DI'I SKABS KYI SKU GSUM DANG GNYIS ZHES PA NI
SANGS RGYAS

KYI SKU LA CHOS LONGS SPRUL PA'I SKU GSUM DANG, CHOS GZUGS KYI
SKU GNYIS

KYI THA SNYAD BYAS PA DON LA KHYAD PAR MED KYANG GRANGS MI
MTHUN PA JI LTAR YIN GYI BGRO BA

MDZAD PA NI TSUL BSTAN MTSON PA TZAM TE, DON DU RJE BTZUN 'JAM
PA'I DBYANGS NAS

BRGYUD PA ZAB MO LTA BA'I BRGYUD DANG, RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA NAS
BRGYAD PA RGYA CHEN SPYOD

PA'I BRGYUD GYI GDAMS PA'I CHU BO GNYIS 'DRES DANG, DE'I
KHONGS NAS RDO RJE

'CHANG DANG, TILLI, N'A RO NAS BRGYUD PA'I NYAMS LEN BYIN
RLABS KYI BRGYUD  

PA STE, BRGYUD PA GSUM LDAN GYI GDAMS PA'I CHU BO MTHA' DAG JO
BO RJE DPAL

LDAN AA TI SHA LA MNGA' BA LTAR, JO BOS KYANG GANGS RI'I KHROD
'DIR DAR RGYAS

SU MDZAD LA, DE NAS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA TZONG KHA PA CHEN
PO MA BYON GYI BAR BRGYUD

PA GSUM GYI GDAMS PA'I CHU RGYUN MA NYAMS PAR GNAS KYANG,
BSHAD PA DANG SGRUB

PA GNYIS KYI SGO NAS CHES CHER DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD PA DANG, MA
RTOGS LOG RTOG GI

@366 DRI MA MTHA' DAG BSAL NAS RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA RMA MED PA
JI LTA BA BZHIN DU GSAL BAR

MDZAD PA'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR BKA' BAB
PA NI MAR ME MDZAD

SLAR YANG BYON PA DANG MTSUNGS PA'I RJE TZONG KHA PA KHO NA
YIN NO ZHES RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I RDO

RJE NYID KYIS MDO SNGAGS YONGS RDZOGS KYI BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR
DBANG BSKUR BA'I LTAS SU

MNGON NO, ,7 YANG, ZLA BA DE KHA'I TSES BZHI'I NUB MO RIN PO
CHE SNA TSOGS

PAS SPRAS PA'I KHRI ZHIG GI STENG NA, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU
STON RIN PO CHE YIN ZER

BA'I BLA MA'I RNAM PA CAN ZHIG BZHUGS 'DUG PA DES, DPAL GSANG
BA 'DUS PA'I

RTZA RGYUD KYI GLEGS BAM ZHIG GNANG NAS 'DI'I BDAG PO GYIS
SHIG CES GSUNG BYUNG BAR,

MJUG NAS CUNG MA TSANG BA MED DAM DGONGS NAS GZIGS PAS THAMS
CAD TSANG 'DUG ,

DE NAS BLA MA DES PHYAG GNYIS KYIS GLEGS BAM DE BLANGS NAS,
H'AUm BADZRA AU TTIshthA ZHES

PA'I SNGAGS DANG PHYAG RGYAS LAN GSUM DBU'I STENG DU BTEGS NAS
BYIN GYIS BRLABS

PA'I TSE, KHA SANG NUB SNGON MA LA BUM PA CHUS BKANG BA STER
RTZIS BYED PA'ANG 'DI'I

LTAS SU 'DUG DGONGS PA BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS TE, NUB SNGON MA'I
MNAL LTAS SPYI TZAM

NI GONG DU SMOS PA LTAR MDO SDAGS YONGS RDZOGS KYI BSTAN PA'I
BDAG POR DBANG BSKUR

BA DANG, DE'I NANG NAS KYANG THEG PA THAMS CAD KYI YANG RTZE
NI RNAL 'BYOR BLA NA

MED PA DANG, DE'I NANG NAS RAB DANG PHUL DANG GTZO BOR GYUR PA
NI DPAL GSANG BA

'DUS PA YIN PAS DE NYID DMIGS GSAL GTZO BOR BTON NAS BDAG POR
DBANG BSKUR BA

STE; DON DU GSANG CHEN BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO RDO RJE 'CHANG NYID
DU DBANG BSKUR BA LTAR

RJE RANG NYID KYIS KYANG DE LTAR DU DGONGS SHING ZHAL GYIS
CHES PA'O, ,7 TSES LNGA

LA LHO BRAG MAR BA'I THUGS BCUD DAM PA BSRE 'PHO'I SKOR GYI
BRJOD DON LA NGES SHES

@367 'PHRIG TSUD CING, TSES DRUG PA LA BSRE 'PHO'I MAN NGAG DE
NYID RGYUD DANG 'PHAGS PA

YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS PA LA GNAS PA'I RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I MAN
NGAG YIN PAR NGES PA

RNYED, TSES BDUN NYIN SLOB DPON 'PHAGS PA LHA'I SPYOD BSDUS
GZIGS PAS GNYID

DANG, RMI LAM DANG, BSRE BA'I SKOR GYI MAN NGAG GI GZHI THAMS
CAD GTING YOD

PA GZIGS NAS SHIN TU NGES PA RNYED, NUB SNGON MA'I DUS SU BCOM
LDAN 'DAS 'KHOR

LO BDE MCHOG RTEN DANG BRTEN PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI BRIS SKU
ZHIG GI 'OG NAS BDE

MCHOG GI TSES BCU'I MCHOD PA BYED PA'I BKOD PA ZHIG BRIS 'DUG
PA, DE'I 'OG  

NA SHID ZAN GTONG BA YIN ZER BA'I YI GE ZHIG BRIS 'DUG ,DE LA
NUB BDUN PA'I

DUS BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI CHOS SKOR RNAMS DUS
PHYIS GANGS RI'I

KHROD 'DIR SHI BA LTAR GYUR PA LA, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NYID
KYIS LEGS

PAR GSAL BAR MDZAD PA NI MI SHI BA'I RJES SU SHID ZAN GTONG BA
LTAR SNGAGS KYI BSTAN

PA LA LHAG PAR PHAN PAR 'GYUR BA'I LTAS SU GO ZHES GSUNGS LA,
GDAN RDZOGS

KYI KHRID DANG, GSAL SGRON DU 'DOD PA'I MTSAN MA BRTAN PO
RNYED CES GSUNGS PA

NI DON 'DI NYID LA DGONGS PA'O, ,ZHES PA RNAMS MKHAS GRUB
THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PAS JI LTAR GSUNGS PA LTAR LA, SKABS 'GAR GSAL BYED KYI TSIG
PHRAN BU BSNAN

PA DANG BCAS TE BKOD PA'O, ,GONG GI MNAL LTAS DE DAG GSANG
RNAM TSIGS BCAD

MA LAS KYANG, 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE'I DKYIL 'KHOR GTZO BO YIS,
,'JAM

PA'I DBYANGS DANG RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA GNYIS, ,CHOS KYI BGRO BA
MDZAD PA'I CHUS BKANG

BA'I, ,RIN CHEN BUM BZANG STER BA GSAL BAR RMIS, ,DPAL LDAN
BLA MA'I X

RIN CHEN DU MAS SPRAS PA'I KHRI STENG NA, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
BU STON RIN CHEN

@368 GRUB, ,'DUS PA RTZA BA'I RGYUD KYI GLEGS BAM NI, ,GNANG
NAS 'DI YI BDAG

PO GYIS SHIG GSUNGS, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I X GLEGS BAM BTEGS NAS

SNGAGS DANG PHYAG RGYA YIS, ,LAN GSUM DBU YI STENG DU BYIN
BRLABS PAS, ,

LHO BRAG MAR PA'I DGONGS PA BSRE 'PHO'I GNAD, ,RGYUD DANG
'PHAGS PA'I MAN

NGAG YIN PAR NGES, DPAL LDAN GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES GSUNGS  

SO; ;DGUNG LO NGA BZHI BA LCAGS STAG LO ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES
LNGA LA 'BROG RI BO

DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU PHYAG PHEBS NAS RAB TU
GNAS PA'I RIM PA SOGS

KYANG RGYAS PAR MDZAD CING, LAM RIM, GSANG 'DUS SGRON GSAL RIM
LNGA

DANG BCAS PA DANG, MNGON PA KUN LAS BTUS DANG, SA SDE LA SOGS
PA

MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS 'GANGS CHE DU MA'I RNAM BZHAG GI BSHAD PA
DANG, TSANG MA'I

DKA' GNAS KYANG MANG DU BKA' STZAL, DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I
BSHAD RGYUD

LHA MO BZHIS ZHUS DANG, YE SHES RDO RJE KUN LAS BTUS PA GNYIS
KYI RNAM BSHAD

RGYAS PA'I RTZOM PA'ANG MDZAD, DE'I PHYI LO RIM PA LNGA RAB TU
GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA

BA'I LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I GTER CHEN PO DE NYID DANG, RIM LNGA
GDAN RDZOGS KYI KHRID

YIG DANG BCAS PA RNAMS LEGS PAR GRUB PAR MDZAD DE, GSANG CHEN
THEG PA CHEN

PO'I CHOS KYI 'BYOR PA DPAG TU MED PA'I BKA' DRIN STZOL BA
SOGS GDAN SA KHYAD PAR

CAN DE NYID DU MDO SNGAGS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I BSTAN PA'I
RMANGS TSUGS PAR MDZAD LA,

DE LTA BU'I RTEN 'BREL RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I MTHU LAS GANG GI
RING LUGS PHYOGS DANG PHYOGS

BRAL KUN TU KHYAB PA MTHA' DAG LA'ANG RI BO DGE LUGS PA ZHES
'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I SNYAN

PA'I GRAGS PAS YONGS SU KHYAB PA 'DI NYID BYUNG BA YIN NO,
,YANG RNAM PA GCIG TU NI,

@369 GDAN SA 'DI'I MTSAN LA DGA' LDAN ZHES SU'ANG GRAGS PA YIN
TE, GRUB CHEN

LAS KYI RDO RJE LUNG BSTAN DU, DGON PA'I MING LA RTEN 'BREL
GYI SGRA DON YOD PAS,

KHYED RANG 'DI NAS DGA' LDAN DU BYAMS PA'I DRUNG DU 'BYON
ZHING DER BZHUGS PAS DGON

PA'I MING YANG DGA' LDAN DU BYAMS PA'I DRUNG DU KHYED RANG
BZHUGS PA DANG 'DRA BA'I RTEN

'BREL YOD CES LUNG GIS GSAL BA BCAS, DES NA DGE LDAN ZHES PA
DANG, DGA'

LDAN ZHES PA GNYIS CHAR LHA DANG BLA MA'I LUNG GIS ZIN PA LTAR
GANG DU 'BOD KYANG 'GAL

BA MED PA'I 'DAMS NGA CAN DU SHES PAR BYA DGOS TE, MKHAS GRUB
THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PAS MDZAD PA SOGS RNAM THAR PHAL MO CHER DGE LDAN RNAM PAR
RGYAL BA'I GLING ZHES 'KHOD

PA DANG, YANG RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SOGS DANG, DGA'
LDAN

CHOS 'BYUNG, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSUNG SOGS LO RGYUS MANG
BAR DGA'

LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG PA RNAMS 'GAL
BA MED PA'I RGYU MTSAN

GYIS YIN NO, ,DE NAS DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA BDUN PA'I STENG DU
SKU TSE'I BAR CHAD CHEN

PO YOD PAS DE'I GONG LNGA BCU LNGA BZHI PA'I DUS NAS RJE BLA
MA RANG NYID KYI DGONGS PA JI

LTA BA BZHIN DU 'KHOR GYI THOG MA 'GA' ZHIG LA ZHAL TA GNANG
STE, LCAGS YOS DGUNG

LO LNGA BCU NGA LNGA'I DGUN STOD NAS RJE NYID KYIS GTZO MDZAD
PA'I DPO SLOB SUM CU RTZA

GRANGS KYIS, SKU TSE 'PHEL BA DANG BAR CHAD BZLOG PA'I THABS
SU DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS

BYED KYI RGYAS PA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR MANG DU MDZAD NAS SKU MTSAMS
DAM PAR BCAD DE SNGA DRO

RGYAS PA'I BZLAS SGOM DANG, PHYI DRO BZLOG GI BZLAS SGOM SHUGS
DRAG LA RGYUN  

RING BAR MDZAD, DE'I TSE RJE'I BKA' LAS, DA DUNG LAN MANG BYAS
NA DGA'

RAB YONG BA AE YIN GSUNGS, LO 'DI NANG RIM LNGA GSAL GYI BKA'
RTZOM YANG

@370 MDZAD, CU PHO 'BRUG GI LO DGUNG LO NGA DRUG PA'I STENG DU
PHEBS PA NA'ANG, DPON

SLOB BZHI BCU RTZA GRANGS KYIS SNGAR BZHIN MDZAD NA'ANG BAR
CHAD BZLOG PA'I MTSAN MA

GSAL BA RANG NI MA BYUNG ZHES BKA' STZAL, DE LTAR SKU MTSAMS
SHIN TU DAM PAR

BZHUGS BA'I DUS LAN GCIG THUGS DAM LA BZHUGS PA'I TSE, STENG
GI SNA RTZE'I

PHYOGS LA AA WA DHU TI'I YAR SNA'I THAD NAS MAR, AE WAm GZUGS
'OD KYI THAG

PA LTA BU SKYA NA RA RA 'ONG BA ZHIG MNAL LAM DU BYUNG, DUS DE
NAS THUN MONG MA YIN

PA'I ZHU BDE KHYAD PAR CAN DANG STONG BA NYIS SBYOR BA'I BDE
STONG GI YE SHES DGA' BA BZHI

DANG STONG PA BZHI'I BDAG NYID CAN THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS PAR
SNANG ZHING, DE LA MKHAS

GRUB THAMS CAD MKYEN PA'I GSUNG LAS, DE NI DENG SANG PHYI ROL
PA DANG NANG PA GNYIS

KA'I TING NGE 'DZIN THUN MONG BA'I CHAR GTOGS TZAM RE LA BOD
STONG GI YE SHES SU MING

BTAGS PA DE LTA BU MA YIN PAR, BDE STONG GI YE SHES DGA'BA
BZHI DANG STONG PA

BZHI'I BDAG NYID CAN 'KHRUNGS NAS, DE PHYIN CHAD BDE STANG GI
YE SHES KHYAD PAR CAN

NAR MAR BSKYANGS PAS, MNYAM BZHAG TU BDE STONG GI YE SHES
RGYUD SDE NAS GSUNGS

SHING, GRUB CHEN GYI GZHUNG LAS JI LTAR BYUNG BA LTAR GYI TING
NGE 'DZIN LA MNYAM PAR

BZHAG CING, RJES THOB TU GANG SHAR LHA'I 'KHOR LO BDE STONG GI
ROL PAR 'CHAR BAS

DUS 'DA' BAR GYUR TE, TSUL 'DI NI RGYUD SDE DANG GRUB CHEN GYI
MAN NGAG LA BLO'I 'KHRIG

TSUD PA ZHIG GIS BSAMS NA DPAG PAR DKA' BA'I MNGON PAR RTOGS
PA'I YON TAN,

RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO TSE 'DI NYID LA STER BA'I LAM GYI RIGS
THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS PA

YIN PAR SHES PAR GYIS SHIG, ,CES GSUNGS SHING, DE DAG NI GSANG
RNAM GSOL

'DEBS LAS, THA MAL SNOD BCUD SNANG STONG SGYU MA DANG, ,ZAB GSAL
GNYIS

@371 SU MED PA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYIS, ,BDE CHEN LHA YI RNAM PAR SHAR
BA'I TSE, ,SKU YI

RDO RJE'I RNAL 'BYOR CHOS KYI RJE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I + SNYING
GA'I PADMOR SKU GSUM

RDO RJE YI, ,'BYUNG 'JUG SNGAGS KYI GDANGS SU BZLAS PA NA,
,ZHUGS GNAS

THIM PA'I 'OD GSAL PHYAG RGYA CHE, ,GSUNG GI RDO RJE'I RNAL
'BYOR CHOS KYI RJE, ,

DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I + LTE BA'I 'KHOR LO'I GTUM MO TZAndA LIS,
,SPYI BO'I

HAm YIG DBU MAR ZHU BA LAS, ,LHAN SKYES BDE CHEN DPAL LA RNAM
ROL BA'I, ,

THUGS KYI RDO RJE'I RNAL 'BYOR CHOS KYI RJE, ,DPAL LDAN + GSOL
BA 'DEBS, ,

ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS KYI DON TE, RDZOGS RIM GYI RTOGS PA KHYAD
PAR CAN THUGS

RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS PA'O, ,'DI LO STON GYI DUS LA BAB PA NA BKA'
PHEBS SU,

DA YANG YANG BSHAD PA AE YONG MI SHES PAS DA LAN RGYUD SDE
BZHI'I GTZO BO RNAMS KYI

BSHAD PA RE SMON LAM GYI STENG DU BYED PA YIN CES GSUNGS PA LA,
'KHOR GYI GTZO

BO RNAMS BKA' BGROS NAS, DA MTSAN MA NGAN PA'I LO DUS KYIS GTUGS
PAS

RJE'I ZHAL SNGA NAS SKU MTSAMS LA DAM PAR BZHUGS PA THUGS RJES
BZUNG 'TSAL ZHING,

BDAG CAG RNAMS KYIS KYANG SKU'I RIM GRO 'BAD NAS BSGRUB PAR BGYI
ZHES NAN CHER

GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS, 'BRUG LO ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I TSES
BDUN GYI NYIN

NAS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYIS GTZO MDZAD PA'I DPON SLOB
SUM CU RTZA GRANGS SKU

MTSAMS LA BZHUGS SHING, DE NAS SLOB MA'I GTZO BO GZHAN RNAMS
KYANG RIM GYIS

SKU MTSAMS LA BZHUGS NAS SNGAR BZHIN SKU'I RIM GRO BSGRUB PAR
MDZAD NA'ANG, ZLA BA

BCU GCIG PA'I NANG NAS SKU KHAMS CUNG MI BDE BA ZHIG BYUNG
ZHING, DE NAS BZUNG

STE SKU KHAMS BSNYEL BA YUN RING DU BYUNG BA'I GNAS SKABS
SU'ANG, MNAL GTAN

@372 NAS MED PA ZHAG NYI SHU TZAM RE 'THUD PA DANG, SKU'I SMAD
KYI CHA LA SNYUN ZUG TU MNGON

PA RES 'GA' 'DUG CES GSUNG PA MA GTOGS, THUGS DAM ZAB MO LA
MNGA'

BRNYES PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN LAS G-YO BA MI MNGA' BA'I DBANG GIS,
GSOL ZAS CHER

'GAG PA DANG, THUGS DAM LA SBYOR MI BZOD PA SOGS YE MED PAS PHYI
NAS

MNGON PA'I SKU MI BDE BA MNGON MTSAN CAN RANG NI MED LA, ZLA BA
BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES

BCU GSUM GYI MTSAN MO MTSAN MA BRTAN PO ZHIG BYUNG BAS DA 'BUNGS
NA LEGS PO 'ONG

BA 'DRA ZHES BKA' PHEBS, DE'I SKABS SU SRAS KYI THU BO SLOB DPON
DKA' BCU

BAS GTZO MDZAD PA'I DGE 'DUN BYINGS DANG, NANG DU SKU LA NYE BAR
GNAS PA 'GA'

ZHIG DAN BCAS PAS LO NGO SBREL GYI BAR DU CUNG ZAD KYANG G-YEL
BA MED PAR SKU'I RIM

GRO NYIN MTSAN 'KHOR YUG TU BSGRUBS PA LA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB
CING, SNGON

CHAD GANGS RI'I KHROD DU BLA MA'I SKU'I RIM GRO BSGRUB PA LA 'DI
LTA BU GZHAN MA BYUNG ZHES

MTHUN PAR GLENG LA, DE DAG GI SKABS SU BU SLOB DANG SBYIN BDAG
THAD THAD NAS RJE

BLA MA 'DI NYID MA BZHUGS NA BDAG CAG THAMS CAD MGON DANG BRAL
BAR 'GYUR RO SNYAM..

PA'I GDUNG SHUGS DRAG POS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, BLA MA'I SKU'I RIM
GRO 'BA' ZHIG

LA DMIGS NAS DGE 'DUN GYI MANG JA DANG, GDUGS TSOD KYI BSNYEN
BSKUR BSGRUB

PA SOGS TSAD MED DE, SKU RIM GYI SKABS SU DGE 'DUN GYI MANG JA
'DREN PA PHYI NANG KUN

BSGRIL BA LA JA DKAR ZHO STONG DANG DRUG BRGYA LHAG TZAM SONG
BAR GRAGS SO, ,DE LTAR DGUNG

LO NGA BDUN PAR SKU KHAMS BSNYEL TSUL BSTAN PA'I SKABS DER NANG
DU SKU MTSAMS KYI

KHONGS SU SGRUB GROGS 'GA' ZHIG KYANG SHOG GSUNG BA LTAR, DAM
TSIG DANG SDOM PA

LA GNAS SHING LHA'I RNAL 'BYOR LA GOMS PAR BYAS PA, BSNYEN SGRUB
DANG BZLAS PA

@373 TSAD DU PHYIN PA'I RTZA BA'I RDO RJE'I SLOB MA BDUN GYIS
NYIN MTSAN DU ZHABS DRUNG DU NYE BAR

BSNYEN NAS, LHA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG PHYIR BZLOG DANG, SRUNG BA'I
'KHOR LO

SOGS LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD CING, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO RANG NYID
KYIS NI NYIN PAR

BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG, 'KHOR LO CHEN PO'I THUGS
DAM GTZO

BOR MDZAD LA, MTSAN MO BDE STONG DBYER MED KYI TING NGE 'DZIN LA
MNYAM PAR 'JOG

PA 'BA' ZHIG LHUR MDZAD, SNGAR RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'OL DGA'
STAG RTZER BYON

PA'I SKABS SHIG TU, RJE RIN PO CHES BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA
PHAN PA RGYA CHEN

PO MDZAD PA LA BAR CHAD BYED PA'I GTZO BO BZHI YOD PA NAS GCIG
GIS SROG SNYING PHUL

TE DAM LA BTAGS, BKA' BSDOD BYED PAS GTOR MA ZHU ZER BA LA,
RGYUN DU MI

LCOGS, STAG RTZER 'BYON PA'I NUB SNGA MA LA LAN RE STER ZHES
GSUNGS 'DUG CING,

'DI LO SKU BSNYUN PA'I TSE GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR DPON SLOB DU
MAS BSNYEN SGRUB LA BRTZON

PAR MDZAD PA LAS BAR CHAD KYI MTSAN MA SHIN TU RTZUB PA'I SKABS
SHIG TU, YANG GNOD

BYED BZHI'I GTZO BO GCIG GIS DA LAS SBYOR GLOD PAR ZHU, BKA'
BZHIN BSGRUB ZER

TE MNA' PHUL BA NI, RJE RIN PO CHE SKU 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA
GNOD PA BYAS NA DPAL

RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED, DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE, DPAL YE SHES KYI MGON
PO PHYAG DRUG PA,

SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS RNAMS KYIS BDAG GI MGO AARDZA KA'I
DOG PA LTAR KHOS

SHIG ,SLOB DPON RNAM GNYIS LA GNOD PA BYAS NA'ANG DE LTAR KHOS,
SKU RIM PA

BDUN LA GNOD PA BYAS NA'ANG DE LTAR KHOS, LEGS BZANG LA SOGS SU
GNOD PA BYAS

NA'ANG DE LTAR KHOS, GDAN SA 'DI'I BLA RABS BCU GSUM GYI BAR DU
GNOD PA BYAS

THUGS DAM GLOD NAS

@374 GTOR MA RE MA CAG PA DANG, 'DU KHANG DU NGA'I GZUGS ZHIG
KYANG BRIS, BKA' BZHIN

BSGRUB PA LAGS ZER BA LA, KHYOD KYIS GNOD PA MA BYAS NA NGED KYI
DGE SBYOR GYIS

KHYOD LA GNOD PA'I DON MED, GTOR MA STER BA DANG GZUGS 'BRI BA
MI 'ONG, GZHAN

GYI RIM GRO MI BYED PA DGOS ZER BA'I CHA LA KHYOD KYI NGO YOD
BYAS NAS GNOD PA CHEN

RIM GRO BYED

DGOS PA 'ONG ZHES GSUNGS TSUL DANG RTZIGS 'BUL TSUL RNAMS RJE
BLO GROS LEGS BZANG

GIS MDZAD PA'I GSANG RNAM LAS BYUNG, DE NAS SNGAR LAS KYANG
THUGS DAM LA

BAR MNGON PA ZHIG BYUNG BA

BZANG

'DZIN BRTAN

SU RJE'I GZIGS SNANG LA,

SHIN TU BRJID PA GZI BYEN

CHEN

DE'I TSE TING NGE

'DZIN GYIS SPYAN DRANGS PAS RJE RANG NYID LA DNGOS SU THIMS MA
THAG BDUD SDE MTHA' DAG

BRNYES SHING, DE

TING NGE 'DZIN

@375 BRTAN POS SPRUL PA'I 'BRUB KHUNG GI NANG DU BCUG PA DANG
DUS MNYAM DU, PHYI ROL

NAS NAG PO'I PHYOGS KYI GZA', RGYAL PO, KLU, SHA ZA BZHI SDE
DANG BCAS

PA'I DMAG PHAM MO ZHES PA'I CHO NGES CHEN PO MI BZAD PA NGUD
MO'I SGRA DANG BCAS NAS

PHYOGS BCUR BYER BA 7ZHABS DRUNG NA 'KHOD PA DAG GI MTHONG SNANG
LA YANG BYUNG ZHING,

DE'I PHYI NYIN YANG DU TSOD DE KHA LA LAS MKHAN GNYIS KYIS GNOD
BYED KYI GTZO BO GZHAN

ZHIG KYANG SNGAR BZHIN BTUL BA'I SNANG BA BYUNG, MDOR NA ZHAG
NYI SHU RTZA GCIG GI

BAR NYIN PAR BZLAS SGOM DANG, MTSAN MO BDE STONG GI TING NGE
'DZIN 'BA' ZHIG GI

THUGS DAM MDZAD PAS GSOL DANG 'GAGS PA DANG, SKU SHES CHUNG DU
'GRO BA SOGS

SKU LA GNOD PA'I MTSAN MA GTAN NAS MA BYUNG, STON PA'I GZIGS
SNANG BYUNG BA'I

MTSAN MO NAS MNAL YANG PHEBS, DE'I TSE SNYUNG BA DANG MNAL MI
'ONG BA SOGS

GNOD BYED DE DAG GI 'PHRUL DU MNGON ZHING, DE NAS SNGAR LAS
SNYUN ZUG CHUNG DU SONG

BA'I RNAM PA DANG, SKU MDUN DU BSDOD MI RNAMS LA YANG GSUNG GI
BKUR STE STZAL

ZHING, GSUNG GI GTZO BO NI RANG RE RNAMS TSE LHAG GANG YOD SGRUB
PA LA BSGRIL DOGS

RGYU YIN, 'KHOR BA'I BDE 'BYOR LA SNYING PO MED, GTAN GYI 'DUN
MA

TSUGS MI TSUGS TSE 'DI'I BYA SBYOD LA RAG LAS PA YIN SOGS YANG
YANG DU BKA'

STZAL, GZHAN YANG DE'I TSE BAR CHAD KYI MTSAN MA RTZUB PA 'ONG
RES KYES BCOM LDAN

'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SKU GZI BYIN BZOD PAR DKA' BA
DANG, 'KHOR

LO CHEN PO'I SKU RAGS LA SBOM PA SPYAN 'BRAS NYI MA BYE BA LTA
BU, BSKAL PA'I

ME'I 'OD CAN, SKU TSAD TSE BA TSANGS PA'I 'JIG RTEN DU SLEBS PA
LTA BU'I GZIGS

SNANG RE NGES CAN 'ONG ZHING, DE'I STOBS KYIS BAR CHAD KYI MTSAN
MA DE'ANG MYUR DU

@376 ZHI 'GRO BA ZHIG 'DUG CES GSUNG NGO, DE DAG NI GSANG RNAM
TSIGS BCAD MA LAS,

BDUD DPUNG GZHIL BA'I THUGS DAM MDZAD PA'I TSE, ,GSER SBYANG
BTZO MA'I MDANGS

LTAR RAB GSAL ZHING, ,NYI MA BYE BA'I 'OD KYI 'KHOR YUGS CAN,
,BDUD

'DUL CHEN PO 'I THUB PA MNGON SUM GZIGS, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I
+RJE YI THUGS

DANG RGYAL BA'I SKU GSUNG THUS, ,DBYER MED MDZAD NAS BDUD SDE
ZIL MNAN TSE, ,

BSTAN SRUNG RNAMS KYIS BDUD RIGS TSAR BCAD PAS, ,BDUD KYI DMAG
DPUNG PHAM

PA'I SGRA CHEN GRAGS, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I X ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS
KYI DON YIN

LA; DE BZHIN DU BCOM LDAN 'DAS RNAM PAR RGYAL MA DANG, SGROL MA
DANG,

GDUGS DKAR DANG, 'OD ZER CAN DANG, RGYAL BA SMAN GYI BLA DANG,
DE BZHIN

GSHEGS PA TSE DPAG TU MED PA RNAMS KYI SKU'I SNANG BA DNGOS SU
GZHIGS PA NI RGYUN DU'ANG

NAR MAR BYUNG ZHING, SKU BSNYUN PA'I TSE SKABS 'GAR SANGS RGYAS
BYANG SEMS NAM MKHA'I

KHAMS KHYAB PA GZIGS PA'ANG BYUNG LA, CHOS SKYONGS YE SHES KYI
MGON PO PHYAG

DRUG PA DANG, GRU GYI MGON PO, DPAL MGON PHYAG BZHI PA, RNAM
THOS

SRAS RNAMS KYI GZIGS SNANG YANG NAR MAR 'ONG ZHING, DE'I NANG
NAS DPAL MGON

PHYAG DRUG PA 'DI NI SNGAR SE RA CHOS SDINGS SU ZHAL GZIGS PA
NAS BZUNG 'DU 'BRAL

MED CES GSUNGS TE MGON PO RNAMS KYI MCHOG TU 'DZIN PAR MDZAD,
BKA' BSDOD

GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG, GNOD SBYIN KshE dA PA LA GNYIS
NI RNAM KUN BRAN

BZHIN DU BKA' BSGRUB PAR BYED DE ZHIB PA 'GA' ZHIG 'OG TU 'CHAD
DO, ,DE DAG

KYANG GSANG RNAM LAS, DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS RJE BTZUN SGROL MA
DANG, ,

GTZUG TOR RNAM RGYAL 'PHAGS MA 'OD ZER CAN, ,BAR CAD KUN SEL
GTZUG TOR

@377 GDUGS DKAR SOGS, ,LHAG PA'I LHA RNAMS YANG YANG GSAL BAR
GZIGS, ,

DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I + ZHES DANG, BSTAN SRUNG RGYA MTSO'I TSOGS
KYIS MNGON SUM

DU; ;SNGON TSE RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' STZAL BZHIN, ,KHYOD KYI
BSTAN PA 'DZIN

DANG SPREL BA LA, ,LHAG PAR GUS PA'I YID KYIS TSUL BZHIN BSGRUB,
,DPAL

LDAN BLA MA'I + ZHES SUNGS SO, ,DE DUS SKU KHAMS BSNYEL BA CUNG
ZAD DRANGS

PA'I SKABS SHIG TU, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DNGOS SU BYON
PA'I ZHAL NAS, DA

PHYIN CHAD GTZO BOR BSKYED RDZOGS KYI RNAL 'BYOR THUGS NYAMS SU
BZHES PA LA 'GRUS PAR

MDZAD NA SNGAGS BLA MED KYI RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN MYUR DU THUGS
RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS SHING,

SLOB MA SKAL LDAN BDUN LA'ANG LAM GYI RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN RE
SKYE BAR 'GYUR RO

ZHES PA'I LUNG BSTAN BYUNG ZHING, 'DI BYUNG BA'I DUS NI RNAM
THAR GZHAN RNAMS SU

SNYUN CUNG ZAD DVANGS PA'I DUS ZHES PA LAS GSAL CHA MI 'DUG
KYANG, PAn CHEN

BLO GROS LEGS BZANG GIS MDZAD PA'I GSANG RNAM DU, SHING RTA LO
ZLA BA DANG PO'I

NANG YIN PAR GSUNGS 'DUG ,GZIGS SNANG DE LA RJE'I ZHAL NAS, NGED

KHAMS MA SNYOMS PA'I SKABS KYI SNANG BA LA GTAD PA CHER MED DAM,
RTOGS LDAN

PA LA'ANG 'DRI DGOS GSUNGS NAS BKA' GNANG BAS, RTOGS LDAN PA'I
ZHAL NAS,

DE SKYAR DU ZHU DGOS PA MED, TSE BLOS BTANG GI SLOB 'KHOR SNOD
DU RUNG BA RNAMS LA

MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM RDZOGS PAR BSTAN NAS SGOM DU BCUG ,RJE NYID
RANG NAS GTZO BOR

SKU MTSAMS KYI NGANG NAS SGRUB PA LHUR MDZAD NA THUGS RGYUD LA
LAM DE MYUR DU 'KHRUNGS

PA'I NANG GI RGYU BDE STONG GI YE SHES KHYAD PAR CAN LA SOGS PA
SNGAR THUGS RGYUD LA

'KHRUNGS TSE ZHING, PHYI'I RKYEN ZHING SKYES KYI PHO NYA MO
RNAMS KYIS GROGS KHYAD PAR

@378 CAN MDZAD PA SOGS KYANG MYUR DU 'ONG, LHAG PA'I LHAS BYIN
GYIS RLOBS PA'I RGYU

TSOGS RNAMS KYANG TSANG BAS LAM DE MYUR DU THUGS RGYUD LA
'KHRUNG NGO ZHES RJE BTZUN GYIS

BKA' STZAL TO ZHES ZHU BAR MDZAD, TSUL DE DAG LA 'JAM DBYANGS
KHA CHES,

DAM CHOS BKA' DRIN THOB PA'I 'KHOR MANG YANG, ,LHUN PO'I DRUNG
NA GSER GYI RI

BDUN LTAR, ,'GRAN ZLAS DBEN PA'I THUGS SRAS BDUN 'BYUNG ZHES,
,YI DAM

LUNG BSTAN THOB PA'I TSONG KHA BA, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,DE SKABS
NUB GCIG

RTOGS LDAN PA'I MNAL LAM DU, RJE RIN PO CHE'I MCHOD RTEN YIN
ZHES BA CHA TSAD

YONGS SU RDZOGS PA RIN PO CHE'I TOG SPRIN GYI SEB NA SLEB PA KHA
DOG SHIN TU DKAR ZHING,

'KHREGS LA KAR YOL GYI RNAM PA LTA BUR BYAS PA ZHIG LA MKHA'
'GRO MANG PO 'DUS PA'I

LA LA NI MI'I BU MO LTA BU DANG, LA LA NI LHA'I BU MO LTA BU
RUNG PA DANG RIN PO CHE'I

RGYAN SNA TSOGS 'CHANG BA, LAG NA RIN PO CHE'I BUM PA BDUD RTZI
DKAR POS GANG

BA 'THOGS PA DPAG TU MED PAS BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN GYIS KHRUS GSOL
ZHING 'DUG ,MCHOG

RTEN DE'I DRUNG NA DE'I SENG KHRI DANG MNYAM PA'I MCHOD RTEN
DRUG 'DUG PA LA, 'GA' ZHIG

NA RE BDUD RTZI GSOL BA DRAG CES ZER BA LA, LA LA NA RE 'DI
RNAMS DA DUNG BCOS

DGOS PAR 'DUG PAS DA LTA MI GSOL, BCOS TSAR NAS GSOL BAR BYED
ZER,

YANG MCHOD RTEN GCIG GI GO SA ZHIG 'DUG PA DER GSOL ZER BA LA,
DA LTA MCHOD

RTEN MA BYUNG BAS MI GSOL, BYUNG NAS GSOL ZER RO, ,DE NAS MNAL
SAD PA DANG RJE

BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA SNGAR 'DI 'DRA BA'I RMI LAM MI 'ONG
BA LA DAD LAM 'DI LTAR

BYUNG BA JI LTA BU LAGS ZHUS PAS, RJE'I THUGS RGYUD LA SNGAGS
MTSAN NYID KYI GO

BA THAMS CAD LEGS PAR RDZOGS, RDZOGS RIM GYI RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR
CAN THUGS

@379 RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS PA RNAMS KYI LTAS YIN CES GSUNG NGO, ,RJE
NYID RANG LA 'DI RNAMS

KYI GO RTOGS THAMS CAD YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR THUGS RGYUD LA
'KHRUNGS PA JI TZAM NAS

LAGS ZHUS PAS, SNGAGS KYI GNAD THAMS CAD LA THE TSOM GYI LHAG MA
MED PAR

YONGS SU RDZOGS PA DGUNG LO NGA DRUG NAS YIN, PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA'I GNAD RNAMS

SNGA MO NAS RDZOGS RGYU YIN NA'ANG, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I YANG
DAG MTHA' MNGON

SUM DU BYED TSUL DPYIS PHYIN PA ZHIG GO BA NI SNGAGS KYI SPYOD
PA'I SKABS SHIG LEGS

PAR RO BA LA RAG LAS PAR 'DUG CES GSUNG NGO, ,SKABS 'DIR RJE
RTOGS LDAN

PAR MNAL LTAS BYUNG TSUL SKOR, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS
MDZAD PA'I

GSANG RNAM SOGS SU GONG DU BKOD PA LTAR BYUNG ZHING, RJE BLO
GROS LEGS BZANG

GIS MDZAD PA'I GSANG RNAM DU 'KHOR GYI MNAL LTAS GONG GI DE DAG
DANG CUNG ZAD MI

'DRA BA 'DI LTAR BYUNG STE, RTOGS LDAN PA'I MNAL LAM LA, RJE RIN
PO CHE'I

MCHOD RTEN YIN ZER BA CHA TSAD YONGS SU RDZOGS PA RTZE MO SPRIN
GYI SEB LA SLEB PA,

KHA DOG SHIN TU DKAR ZHING 'KHREGS PA KAR YOL GYI RTZI LTAR
DVANGS PA ZHIG LA, SPRIN

GYI SEB NAS MKHA' 'GRO MA YIN ZER BA LHA MO 'I RNAM PA LTA BU
DANG, BUD MED

PHAL BA'I RNAM PA LTA BU RUS PA DANG RIN PO CHE'I RGYUN SNA
TSOGS GSOL BA, PHYAG NA

RIN PO CHE'I BUM PA DKAR PO BDUD RTZI DKAR POS GANG BA 'THOGS PA
MTHA' YAS PAS

BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN GYIS SKU DKAR RDZOGS PAR GSOL, MCHOD RTEN DE'I
MTHA' NA 'BUM

PA MANG DU SNANG ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU BYANG PHYOGS NA MCHOD RTEN
DE LA NYE BAR BSKOR BA'I

MCHOD RTEN BDUN SNANG, DE THAMS CAD CHA TSAD LDAN PA GANG ZAG
'DI DANG 'DI'I YIN

ZER ZHING BDUN KA LA SKU DKAR GSOL, MCHOD RTEN KYI GO SA GCIG
'DUG PA DER

@380 GSOL BYAS PAS DA LTA MCHOD RTEN MI 'DUG PA ZER, GZHAN MANG
PO LA GSOL BYAS

PAS BCOS DGOS PAR 'DUG PAS MI GSOL ZER, DE NAS MNAL SAD PA DANG
RJE

BTZUN GYI DRUNG DU, SNGAR 'DI LTA BU'I MTSAN MA KHYAD PAR CAN MI
'ONG BA LA DA LAN BYUNG

BA JI LTAR LAGS ZHUS PAS, MTSAN MA DE RNAMS RJE'I THUGS RGYUD LA
SNGAR MTSAN NYID

KYI LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG MED MI RUNG THAMS CAD KYI GO BA PHU THAG
CHOD PAR RDZOGS PA DANG,

BDE STONG GI TING NGE 'DZIN KHYAD PAR CAN THUGS RGYUD LA
'KHRUNGS PA RNAMS KYI LTAS YIN

GSUNGS, RJE NYID LA BDE STONG GI TING NGES 'DZIN THUGS RGYUD LA
'KHRUNGS PA'I GLENG SNGA

MO NAS YOD, GO RTOGS RNAMS JI TZAM NAS RDZOGS PA LAGS ZHUGS PAS,
SNGAGS

KYI MED MI RUNG RNAMS NGA DRUG NAS RDZOGS, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I
SKOR SNGA MO NAS RDZOGS

RGYU YIN NA'ANG, YANG DAG MTHA' MNGON DU BYED TSUL DPYIS PHYIN
PAR GO BA SNGAGS

KYI SPYOD PA'I SKABS SHIG GO BA LA LTO GOS PAR SNANG BAS DE YANG
NGA DRUG NAS RDZOGS

ZHES GSUNGS, ZHES DANG, YANG DE'I DUS SU THUS DAM SHIN TU 'PHEL,

CHOS KYANG GSUNG SPRO BA'I SKABS SU SNANG BAS NGED GROGS MCHED
BDUN LA YANG SNGAGS DANG

PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I RNAM BZHAG MED MI RUNG GI NGO BO, GO RIM,
GRAGS

NGES, SO SO'I BYED LAS KHYAD PAR DU BLA MED KYI RGYUD DANG
DGONGS 'GREL TSAD LDAN RNAMS

NAS BSKYED RDZOGS KYI RNAM BZHAG GTZO BOR GSUNG TSUL, GCIG TU
TSIG DON MI

GSAL BA DON THOB YOD PA RNAMS GZHAN GYIS 'CHAD DGOS LUGS DANG,
DE RNAMS

SO SO RTZAL DU BA TON NAS JI LTAR 'CHAD, BLA MED KYI RTZA BSHAD
SO SO NAS 'JUG

SGO MI 'DRA BA DU MA GSUNGS KYANG DE THAMS CAD KYI LAG RJES 'ONG
TSUL, BDE

DGYES GSANG GSUM SBYOR DRUG RNAMS KYI LAM GYI DBYE BSDU ZHAR
BYUNG DANG BCAS PA,

@381 SROG RTZOL GYI BOGS 'DON BTZAN THABS KYI SBYOR BA, PHYAG
RGYA BZHI LA BRTEN PA'I RDZOGS

RIM SGRUB LUGS KHYAD PAR CAN GSAL SGRON DANG KHRID YIG GNYIS KYI
ZHAL SHES BSRE BA'I

GNAD DANG BCAS PA RNAMS RDZOGS PAR GSUNGS, YANG DE DUS THUGS DAM
GYI SKABS SU

SKU MDUN DU 'GRO CHAG SOGS CI BYED KYANG THUGS BCUG NAS GTAD NA
MA GTOGS GTAN

MI NGES PAR SNANG BA 'DI CI TZAM NAS BYUNG ZHUS PAS, BYAMS PA
GLING NAS YIN, DA

DGE SBYOR DANG BLTA RTOG GANG BYED KYANG 'DRA BAR SNANG GSUNG,
GSUNG RAB KYI DKA' BA'I

GNAD MTHAR THUG PA RNAMS GZIGS RTOG CHEN PO MI DGOS PAR DGONGS
PA 'DI RJE BTZUN

GYIS GSUNGS PA YIN NAM JI LTAR LAGS ZHUS PAS, SEMS LA SHAR 'ONG
BA YIN,

DE'I SHES BYED DU YID CHES PA'I KHUNGS MANG DU MA RNYED KYI BAR
DU 'TSOL DGOS PA YIN

GSUNGS, GZHAN YANG BOD DU BLA MED KYI GDAMS NGAG BRGYUD PA MI
'DRA BA BYUNG TSUL,

DE RNAMS KYI 'KHRID LUGS 'DRA MI 'DRA'I NANG NAS GCIG TZAM MA
GTOGS GZHAN RNAMS

RNAM DAG YIN LUGS, RNAM DAG RNAMS LA'ANG 'CHAD PA POS 'CHAD TSUL
JI LTA BA BZHIN DU

MA BYUNG LUGS DANG BCAS PA MANG DU GSUNGS, MCHOD RTEN NYE BA
DANG SKU DKAR GSOL

BA RNAMS LA RJE BTZUN GYI GSUNG GIS BKRAL BA MANG DU YOD NA'ANG
'DIR MA BRIS SO,

ZHES GSUNGS LA, DES NA 'KHOR GYI MNAL LTAS BYUNG TSUL CUNG MI
'DRA TZAM MCHIS

PA LA DOGS PA BYED MI DGOS TE, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI 'DI 'DRA
BA'I RNAM THAR

GSANG BA'I GNAS RNAMS GZHAN LA BSGRAGS PA DANG, YI GER SPEL BA
SOGS LA

SHIN TU BKA' DOG PA'I DBANG GIS MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE SOGS KYIS
RAGS BSDUS

MTSON TZAM LAS 'GOD PAR MA MDZAD PA YIN LA, RJE BLO GROS LEGS
BZANG

GIS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI SPYAN SNGAR SPYAN MCHI MA
DANG BCAS TE GSOL BA DRAG

@382 TU BTAB PA'I NGOR CHOS THUN NYER GCIG GNANG BA KUN BZUNG
ZHING THUGS LA BSAM PA

RNAMS SGRUB PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS 'DZIN PA RNAMS KYI NANG NAS ZLA
DANG BRAL BA SGRUB PA DPAL

GYIS NAN GYI BKA' STZAL BA'I NGOR ZIN BRIS SU BTAB NAS RJE'I
SPYAN SNGAR GZIGS PHUL

NAS DAG THER MDZAD, BRJED PA RNAMS BSOS, SNGAR MA GSUNGS PA
RNAMS

GSAR DU GSUNGS PA DANG, MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA LA YANG
GZIGS

NAS PHAN TSUN GUNG BSGRIGS TE SHIN TU GAL CHE BA RNAMS KYI SA
BON MA LUS PA TSANG BAR

BKOD PA YIN CES GSUNGS PAS NA, RJE BLO GROS LEGS BZANG GIS MDZAD
PA 'DI

NYID ZHIB CING RGYAS PA YOD PAR SNANG BAS GZHAN DAG TU MA GSAL
BA RNAMS 'DI NYID

GZHIR BZUNG BAR BYA DGOS SO, ,DES NA MNAL LTAS 'DI DAG NI RJE
BDAG NYID

CHEN PO YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI THUGS RGYUD LA SNGAGS KYI RTOGS PA
KHYAD PAR CAN MNGA' BA

DANG, LHAG PAR RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI RDZOGS RIM GYI RTOGS PA
SHIN TU MTHON

POR PHEBS PA'I BRDA' MTSON TE, 'DI DAG GI SGRUB BYED ZHIB PA NI
'OG TU 'CHAD

RTZOD RTZOM GSUM DANG, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM, GRUB PA'I GO
'PHANG

ZLA MED PA BRNYES TSUL SOGS RE RE NAS RTZAL DU BTON NAS SDOM
BSHAD KYI TSUL DU 'GOD

PAR BYA BA LAS SHES PAR 'GYUR ZHING, YANG, RNAM THAR 'GA' ZHIG
TU

KHYED RANG GI

BRNYES PA DU MA 'BYUNG BAR

'DUG  ,KHYAD PAR DU GTZANG RANG NAS 'BYUNG ZHING 'PHAGS PA'I
'KHOR MANG DU 'DU BAR
