'GYUR GYI MCHOD RTEN

DANG BDUN PO DE 'JAM DBYANGS GTZANG PA BDUN BRGYUD LA DGONGS PA
DANG, MNAL LTAS

@383 'DI BYUNG DUS SBRUL LO'I NANG LA YIN CING, DE'I PHYI LO
SHING PHO RTA LA GTZANG PA

BDUN GYI PHYI MA RIN PO CHE SMON LAM DPAL BA SKU 'KHRUNGS PA YIN
PAS DE SKABS MCHOD

RTEN GCIG BYUNG MA TSAR BA RJE DE NYID SKU BLTAMS MA GRUB PA'I
DON DANG, MCHOD RTEN

RNAMS DA DUNG BCOS DGOS PAR GSUNGS PA NI DA DUNG RGYAL BA GNYIS
PA'I CHOS KYI RGYAL

SRID LA GZHI NAS MNGA' GSOL DGOS PA'I DON YIN, ZHES SOGS GSUNGS
PA'ANG

MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS MNAL LTAS KYI DON 'GREL TSUL MI 'DRA BA'I
RNAM GRANGS YIN PAS

MI 'THAD PA NI MA YIN MOD, 'ON KYANG YONGS GRAGS LTAR 'KHOR KYI
MCHOD RTEN

BDUN SOGS BYUNG BA'I BSHAD PA MI 'DRA BA RNAMS 'OG TU GSUNG
SKYES SLOB MA BYON TSUL

GYI SKABS SU 'GOD PAR BGYI'O, ,DE LTAR BDUD DPUNG GI NYER 'TSE
YONGS SU GZHIL

BA'I SLAD DU BLA SLOB TSANG MAS RIM GNYIS ZAB MO'I RNAL 'BYOR LA
GCIG TU BRTZON ZHING,

PHYI NANG GI ZHABS BRTAN RIM GRO RGYA CHE 'BYAMS KLAS SU MDZAD
PA SOGS KYI MTHU LAS

NAG PHYOGS KYI G-YUL LAS YONGS SU RGYAL TE, RING POR MA LON PAR
ZLA BA SGRA

GCAN GYI GZEBS LAS GROL BA BZHIN DU SNYUN GZHI MED SING DVANGS
SU GYUR NAS LHA DANG

BCAS PA'I 'GRO BA MTHA' DAG YONGS SU DBUGS PHYIN PA THOB PAR
MDZAD DO, ,SNYUN

DVANGS PA'I DUS KYANG RNAM THAR GZHAN RNAMS SU GSAL KHA CHER MA
BYUNG YANG RJE BLO GROS

LEGS BZANG GIS MDZAD PAR, RTA LO ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES LNGA NAS
BSNYEL SANGS

SO; ;ZHES DANG, RJE RIN PO CHE'I TING NGE 'DZIN GYI MTHU RMAD DU
BYUNG BA'I ZIL GYIS MNAN

CING DPA' BKONG BA DANG, GNOD BYED RNAMS KYIS RTZIGS RIM PAR
PHUL BA DE'I

CHOS SKYONG GI BSKYED

GNOD PA'I BSAM

BYA SLA BAR YANG SHES PAR

LAS G-YO

TE ZHUM MED

LAS, ,RNAM

@385 PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING ZHES BSNGAGS PA NI, ,DON LDAN LHAG
DANG BCAS PA NYID DU GYUR, ,

NGO MTSAR 'BYAMS

KLAS PAS, ,GDUL BYA'I TSOGS RNAMS SKAL BZANG MDZAD PA'I TSUL,
,'OG

MIN GNYIS PA JI LTA BA BZHIN NO, ,DE 'DRA'I RTEN 'BREL RMAD DU
BYUNG BA'I MTHUS, ,

GANG GI CHOS TSUL 'PHEL BA'I RING LUGS LA'ANG, ,RI PO DGE LDAN
ZHES SU

SNYAN PA'I DBYANGS, ,'KHOR YUG RI BA'I KHYON YANG BRGAL BAR
GYUR, ,DE

LTA'I TSUL LA MA BZOD NAG PHYOGS KYIS, ,BAR DU GCOD PA'I 'DU
'GOD RTZOM NA

YANG, ,GANG GI BYIN MTHU BSKAL PA'I ME CHEN GYIS, ,BDUD RIS SDER
BCAS

MING GI LHAG MAR BSREGS, ,BDE STONG ZUNG 'JUG LHAN SKYES BDE BA
CHES, ,

GANG GI THUGS LA 'KHYUD PA'I RTZE DGA' YI, ,RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I
RGYAL MTSAN SRID

PA'I RTZER, ,BSGRENGS PA'I GO 'PHANG MCHOG DE MNGON SUM MDZAD,
,'DI NI

BCOM LDAN SH'AKYA SENG GE YIS, ,BYANG CHUB SHING DRUNG BDUD SDE
NYER BCOMS NAS, ,

ZHI BA BLA NA MED PA'I BDUD RTZI'I PHUL, ,MNGON DU MDZAD DANG
KHYAD PAR GA LA ZHIG  ,

CES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI DON BSDU'I TSIGS BCAD DO, ,SHING RTA LO
DE KHA'I DBYAR

GNAS LA MI DBANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN PAS GSOL BA BTAB NAS, 'ON
GYI BKRA

SHIS DO KHAR GDAN DRANGS PA LTAR PHEBS NAS DBYAR ZHAL BZHES
MDZAD, DUS DER

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB PA DPAL BZANG POS KYANG RJE'I
ZHABS THOG MAR ZIN

CING, SEMS DPA' CHEN PO KUN BZANG BA DANG, SHES RAB SENG GE SOGS

KYIS RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB KYI THUGS RAB LA BSNGAGS PA PHUL BAS RJE
THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PAS KYANG MJAL MA KHAD NAS THUGS SHIN TU DGYES SHING GSUNG CHOS
THAMS CAD KYANG THOB

@386 PAR MDZAD, GNAS DER SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA BRGYA PHRAG MANG PO
LA LAM RIM, DBU

TSAD, SPYOD 'JUG LA SOGS PA ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA
CHER BSKOR BAS

GDAN SA'I SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHES THAG DRANGS, MI DBANG GRAGS PA
RGYAL MTSAN 'KHOR

DANG BCAS PA THAMS CAD MCHOG TU DAD CING DGE BA'I SA LA BKOD PAR
MDZAD, BKRA

SHIS DO KHA MAR GRAGS PA'I SKU BRNYAN BYIN RLABS CAN YANG DE DUS
BYUNG BA YIN TE, 'DI'I

LO RGYUS LA DUS DER LHA BZO BA SPRUL PA'I GANG ZAG ZHIG GIS NYI
MA GCIG LA RJE'I SKU

BRNYAN BDUN RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS BZHENGS PA NA, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN
POS KYANG RDZU 'PHRUL

GYIS NYIN GCIG PO DE RANG LA DBU SKRA LAN BDUN BSIL BA'I DBU LO
BUB RE RE NANG

ZHUGS SU 'BUL BAR MDZAD PAS BYIN RLABS KYI TSAN KHA 'GRAN ZLA
MED PA NYID DU NGES PA

YIN NO, ,RNAM THAR LO RGYUS GZHAN DU BKRA SHIS DO KHAR BZHUGS
SKABS 'JAM DBYANGS

CHOS RJER 'BRAS SPUNGS CHOS SDE 'DEBS DGOS PA'I BKA' PHEBS PAR,
DNGOS GRUB

KYI DANG PO BLA MA'I BKA' YIN PAS BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PAR ZHUS, DE
NUB CHOS RJE'I

MNAL LAM DU, CHU CHEN PO ZHIG GI 'GRAM NA SKYE BO DPAG TU MED
PA CHU LA MA THAR

BAR 'DUG PAS SNYING RJE CHEN PO ZHIG SKYES NAS CHU DE LA 'CHONGS
PAS PHAR 'GRAM DU

SLEB BYUNG BAR ZAM PA ZHIG BTZUGS PAS SKYE BO DPAG TU MED PA DE
RNAMS NYES MED DU THON

PA BYUNG BAS CHOS SDE KHYAD PAR CAN TSUGS PA'I THUGS NGES
'KHRUNGS, GZHAN YANG

'DI DAG GI SNGA PHYIR CHOS RJE RIN PO CHER CHOS SDE TSUGS PA'I
MNAL LTAS NGO MTSAR CAN

MANG DU BYUNG TSUL LO RGYUS GZHAN DU GSAL, DE NAS SLAR YANG GDAN
SA CHEN PO DGE LDAN

RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU PHYAG PHEBS, DE NAS BZUNG STE RIM
PA BZHIN DU DPAL

'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U HI PA'I tI KA CHEN MO DANG, RDZOGS RIM
RNAL 'BYOR BZHI LDAN

@387 GYI KHRID YIG CHE CHUNG, SGRUB THABS, DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS
PA'I RTZA RGYUD

DANG, 'GREL BA SGRON GSAL BCAS LA DAG THER NAN CAN MDZAD NAS
TSIG DON SHIN TU

ZHIB PAR 'CHAD PA'I MCHAN BU DANG, LE'U SO SO DANG SPYI'I DKA'
BA'I GNAS RNAM PAR

GTAN LA 'BEBS PA'I MTHA' GCOD DANG, DON TSAN SO SO'I DMIGS 'BYED
PA'I

BSDUS DON DANG BCAS 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS SU GRAGS PA MDZAD CING,
RGYUD SDE BZHI

DANG 'GREL PA'I BSHAD PA MTHA' DAG RGYUN MA CHAD PAR GSUNGS PAS
RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I

SNYING PO GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I GNAD DON MTHAR THUG PA
RNAMS BAR SKABS SU SA

'OG GI GTER BZHIN DU MI MNGON PAR GYUR PA DE NYID GZHI NAS
BSLANGS TE LEGS PAR

GSAL BAR MDZAD PAS RGYAL BA LAS KYANG BKA' DRIN CHE BAR GYUR PA
YIN NO, ,DE

SKABS RJE'I BKA' LAS, SGRUB MCHOD SOGS TSOGS KHANG DU BYAS NA
DBANG MA THOB

PA RNAMS KYIS DKYIL 'KHOR SOGS MTHONG BA'I DGAG BYA CHE BAR 'DUG
PAS SNGAGS KYI

SGRUB MCHOD KHANG PA 'GOL BA ZHIG LOGS SU BYED DGOS PAR 'DUG CES
GSUNGS PA

BZHIN DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA DGU PA SHING LUG LO'I DBYAR YANGS PA
CAN GYI RMANGS GTING,

DE'I MTHUN RKYEN DAD BSKUL SOGS KYI THUGS 'DUN MDZAD PAS PHYOGS
PHYOGS NAS 'BUL

BA DPAG TU MED PA BYUNG, RTEN BZHENGS KYI RGYU ZANGS KYI DNGOS
PO THOG MAR CUNG ZAD

DKON TZAM BYUNG NA'ANG, MNYAL SOGS NAS ZANGS RU MANG DANG RU
GNYIS MA YAN

CHAD CHE CHUNG 'DRES PA BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD DANG, ZANGS BAN MANG
POS THOG DRANGS PA'I

ZANGS KYI DAD 'BUL YANG MTHA' YAS PA BYUNG BAS RTEN DANG BRTEN
PA MTHA' DAG GI RGYU

TSOGS LHUN GRUB KYI TSUL DU GYUR, SNGAR BKA' RTZAM MDZAD PA'I
BYANG CHUB LAM RIM

CHEN MO HA CANG RGYAS PAS BLO DMAN RNAMS KYI BLOR CHUD DKA' BAS,
SLAR YANG DE LAS

@388 BSDUS PA RTOGS SLA BA ZHIG RTZOMS ZHES RJE BTZUN 'JAM
DBYANGS KYI BKAS BSKUL BA LA

BRTEN NAS LO 'DI NANG LAM RIM CHUNG BA BKA' RTZOM MDZAD CES DAM
PA'I GSUNG RGYUN

LAS BYUNG, DE NAS RIM GYIS YANGS PA CAN GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG
'KHYAMS GTZANG KHANG

DANG BCAS BA KA BA BDUN CU RTZA GNYIS KYI SA ME SPRE LO LEGS PAR
'BYONGS, ME BYA

LO ZLA BA GSUM PA NAS BZO RIG PA'I 'DU BYED LA SHIN TU MKHAS PA
DU MA BSAGS NAS

RTEN KHYAD PAR CAN RNAMS BZHENGS PA'I DBU TSUGS, DE YANG DBUS
KYI GTZANG KHANG

DU STON PA THUGS RJE CAN GYI SNANG BRNYAN LHA SA'I JO BO RIN PO
CHE'I SKU TSAD LAS CUNG ZHIG

GIS CHE BA THUB PA TSUL KHRIMS MAR GRAGS PA DANG, STENG GI
GTZANG KHANG DU DPAL

GSANG BA 'DUS PA LHA SUM CU RTZA GNYIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR BLOS
BSLANGS DANG, DPAL

'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U HI PA'I LUGS LHA DRUG CU RTZA GNYIS KYI
DKYIL 'KHOR, DPAL

RDO RJE DBYINGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN PO BCAS KYI BLOS BSLANGS
RTEN DANG BCAS PA RNAMS

RGYU RIN PO CHE 'BA' ZHIG LAS GRUB PA, DE YANG GZHAL YAS KHANG
DANG 'KHOR GYI

LHA GZHAN RNAMS KYI SKU RGYU ZANGS TSA GSER MA DANG, GTZO BO
RNAMS DANG, PHYOGS

KYI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DANG, SNYING PA'I RNAL 'BYOR MA RNAMS KYI
SKU RGYU DNGUL

BZANG PO 'BA' ZHIG LAS GRUB CING, GTZO BO YUM DANG BCAS PA RNAMS
KYI SKU

BRNYAN RE RE LA'ANG RGYA DNGUL BRE CHEN GNYIS RE LHAG PA DANG,
RDOR DBYINGS KYI GTZO

BO LA DNGUL BRE CHEN GNYIS MA LONG TZAM DANG, 'KHOR GYI LHA BCU
GNYIS RE RE

LA'ANG DNGUL BRI CHEN PHYED GNYIS MA LONG TZAM GYI RGYU TSOGS
DANG, DE DAG LA G-YU

RNYING BZANG PO SOGS RIN THANG CAN GYI RIN PO CHE DPAG TU MED
PA'I 'PHRA RGYAN GYIS YONGS

SU PHYUG PA DANG, GZHAN YANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DANG,
RGYAL

@389 BA TSE DPAG MED, RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL

RDO RJE 'ZIGS BYED ZHAL PHYAG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA RNAMS KYI GSER
SKU MDA' TSAD RE DANG,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS GTZUG TOR RNAM PAR RGYAL MA DANG, GTZUG TOR GDUGS
DKAR

GNYIS KYI GSER SKU KHRU TSAD RE DANG, GOS DAR BZANG PO MTHA' YAS
PA BRDUNGS

PA'I DAR 'DAM LA BYIN RLABS KYI RTEN DANG, RIN PO CHE BRDAR BA
DANG, SMAN

SNA TSOGS BSRES PA LAS GRUB PA'I BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE 'JIGS
BYED ZHAL PHYAG

YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I SKU BRNYAN RGYAB MTHO BCU BDUN YOD PA RNAMS
BZHENGS PAR MDZAD,

DE DAG THAMS CAD KYI LHA BZO'I BZO THIG DANG CHA TSAD SOGS PHAL
PA'I RIG BCOS MA

YIN PAR, SH'A RI'I BU DANG TSANGS PA AE dA'I BUS ZHUS PA SOGS
KYI PHYAG TSAD

KYI YI GE DANG, GTZO BOR DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG SDOM PA 'BYUNG
BA'I RGYUD KYI

LE'U GCIG NAS LHA'I PHYAG TSAD ZHIB PAR BSTAN CING, DE'I RGYA
CHER 'GREL RATNA

RAKshI TAS KHYAD PAR ZHIB TU GTAN LA PHAB PA DANG, DPAL GSHIN
RJE GSHED DMAR

PO DANG NAG PO'I RGYUD GNYIS KYI LE'U RE RES LHA'I PHYAG TSAD
BSTAN PA RNAMS GUNG LEGS

PAR BSGRIGS PA'I THIG KHOG NAS DRANGS TE, RGYAL BAS JI LTAR
GSUNGS PA'I PHYAG

TSAD DANG LDAN PAR BZHENGS SHING, DE DAG LA'ANG RGYU'I BYIN
RLABS DANG, BZO

BO RNAMS LHAR BSKYED PA DANG, LAG CHA BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA SOGS
TSUL BZHIN

DU MDZAD PA LAS SLA BCOS DANG 'OL TSOD SOGS KYIS CHA TZAM MA GOS
PAR MDZAD,

RJE NYID KYI THUGS RJE DANG BYIN RLABS TSAD MED PA'I MTHU LAS
SNGON CHAD LUGS BTANG BA LA

'DI 'DRA BA'I LUGS 'DREN BDE BA DANG NGO MTSAR BA 'ONG MA MYONG
ZHES LHA BZO BA DAG GLENG

BAR BYED, SKU BRNYAN LA SOGS PA THAMS CAD BLTAS PA TZAM GYIS YID
'PHROG

@390 PAR BYED PA MIG GI BDUD RTZIR CHE BA 'BA' ZHIG NYE BAR BYON
TO, ,TE DAG LAS KYANG

KHYAD PAR DU GZHAL YAS KHANG GSUM BZHENGS PA'I LUGS SNGA MA
BTANG BA'I LUGS PHUD

LA DPA' BO KHAndA KA P'A LA 'JA' TSON MA BYON TE, DE YANG SKU
RGYU ZANGS YIN KYANG LUGS

KONG NAS BYON MA KHAD LA ZANGS KYI KHA DOG YUNG 'BRU'I RJES TZAM
YANG MI MNGON PAR SKU

THAMS CAD 'OD ZER LNGA'I GONG BUR GYUR PA'I SNGON PO RNAMS NI
RGYA MTHING BZANG PO'I

MDANGS KYIS BSGRUN DU MED PA DANG, DMAR PO DAG NI MTSAL COG LA
MA BZANG

PO'I KHA DOG LAS BDUN 'GYUR KYIS LHAG PA, DMAR SER DAG NI LI
KHRI'I MDANGS

MOG MOG POR BYED PA, SER PO DAG NI GSER BZANG PO'I RGYAN GYI
MDANGS

KYANG RAG RGAN LTAR BYED PA, GZHAN YANG DKAR PO DANG, LJANG KHU

DANG, BTZOD KYI KHA DOG SOGS DU MA SPEL BA NAM MKHA'I 'JA' TSON
SKU LA 'KHYUD

PA'I RNAM PA LTA BU MIG GIS BZOD PAR DKA' BA'I 'OD ZER GYI PHUNG
PO CHEN PO ZHIG

BYON TE, BRAD BRDAR SOGS CUNG ZAD KYANG MA BYAS PAR SHIN TU 'JAM
ZHING GTZANG BA

YID DU 'ONG BAR GYUR PAS BZO BA SOGS LHAG PAR NGO MTSAR DU GYUR
TE, 'DI LTA BU

CI ZHIG CES GZIGS SU PHUL ZHING DAG BYED KYI RDZAS DU MAS SHIN
TU DAG PAR BYI DOR BYAS

KYANG SNGAR LAS KYANG 'OD ZER RNAMS CHES CHER KHA DOG GSAL BAR
GYUR NAS LUGS KHA

BCAD PA'I MTSAMS LA BLTAS PAS ZANGS KYI MDOG THAMS CAD KYANG DE
'DRA BA 'BA'

ZHIG TU SONG STE BCAD MTSAMS 'OD ZER SNA LNGAR KHRIG GER SNANG
BA DE LTA BUR DER YOD

KUN LA MNGON SUM DU GYUR, RJE'I ZHAL NAS, RTEN 'DI LA RGYAN DANG
NA BZA'

KHYAD PAR CAN PHUL LA GSOL BA THOB, BRAD BRDAR MA BYED CES BKA'
STZAL ZHING,

GSOL 'DEBS KYANG 'DI LTAR MDZAD DE, HE RU KA YI PHO BRANG NAS,
,'KHOR

@391 LO BDE MCHOG YAB YUM NI, ,'GRO BA'I BSOD NAMS ZHING MCHOG
TU, ,

THOD PA'I DUM BU YAB YUM GYI, ,SKU MDANGS NGO MTSAR LTAS MANG
GIS, ,

BRGYAN PA 'DIR NI BYON PA LEGS, ,AE MA HO BDAG CAG GDUL BYA
RNAMS, ,

SHIN TU TSOGS BSAGS SKAL BAR LDAN, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNGS SO, ,GZHAN

YANG RNAM THAR CHEN MO SOGS SU MI GSAL YANG, ,RJE RTOGS LDAN PAS
MDZAD PA'I

RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS SOGS SU, DAR 'DAM LAS GRUB PA'I
RDO RJE

'JIGS BYED MTHO BCU BDUN PA BZHENGS DUS RTZA ZHAL RANG 'BYON DU
BYON PA DANG, BLOS

BSLANGS RNAM GSUM BZHENGS DUS RDOR DBYINGS DANG, MI BSKYOD RDO
RJE, BDE

MCHOG STE GTZO BO GSUM YANG RANG 'BYON LTA BUR BYON CING, BDE
MCHOG GI THUGS

KAR DROD RTA RNGA TZAM YOD PA DANG, GZUGS CAN LA SOGS PA'I LHA
MO BZHI YANG RANG

'BYON DU BYON PA YIN LA, GZIMS KHANG NA BZHUGS PA'I BDE MCHOG GI
DAR SKU KHRU

GANG TZAM PA'I ZHAL BZHI KHA DOG DANG BCAS PA YANG RANG 'BYON DU
BYON PAR GSUNGS LA,

RDOR DBYINGS KYI RDO RJE RGYAL PO DANG, RDO RJE CHAGS PA GNYIS
KYANG 'JA' TSON MAR

BYON PA RNAM THAR GZHAN LAS GSUNGS, DE LTAR GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG
RTEN KHYAD PAR

CAN RAGS RIM ZHIG LO DE KHA'I KHONGS SU GRUB PA LA, DPAL RDO RJE
'JIGS BYED

CHEN PO'I SGO NAS RAB TU GNAS PA'I RIM PA RGYUD SDE NAS JI LTAR
GSUNGS PA BZHIN GYI

CHO GA PHYAG LEN RNAM PAR DAG PA SBYOR DNGOS RJES GSUM TSANG BA
RGYAS SHING PHUN SUM

TSOGS PAR MDZAD, DE DANG 'BREL BAR NYE SKOR GYI DGE 'DUN GYI SDE
RNAMS DANG,

LHAS KYI GRONG PA SKYE BO 'I TSOGS DANG BCAS PA BSAGS TE RAB
STON BZANG PO GYA NOMS

PA BKA' DRIN CHE BAR GYUR, DE LTAR RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I NYIN NAM
MKHA' DVANGS

@392 PA'I DKYIL NAS SGRA CHEN PO 'BRUG GI SKAD LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG
NAS MCHOD KHANG DU ZHUGS PA DER

'DUS KUN GYIS GO ZHING TSER BA DANG, DE DANG MTSUNGS PAR GSANG
'DUS RIM LNGA DANG,

BDE MCHOG RIM LNGA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA GANG ZAG KHYAD PAR CAN 'GA'
ZHIG GI GZIGS SNANG

LA; RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI DKYIL 'KHOR NAM MKHA' GANG BA TZAM
PHYOGS BZHI

GA NAS BYUNG STE SKU RNAMS LA THIM PAR GZIGS PA SOGS DAM TSIG PA
RNAMS LA YE SHES

PA RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA DNGOS SU ZHUGS PA'I NGO MTSAR
BA'I DGE MTSAN BSAM

LAS 'DAS PA MNGON DU GYUR TE, DON DU GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN GSUM
DANG BCAS PA

MTHA' DAG JI SRID 'GRO BA'I BSOD NAMS KYI ZHING DU DAG PA RAB
'BYAMS KYI 'KHOR LOR

'BYAMS SU KLAS PA'I BYIN MTHU'I PHUNG PO NYID DU GRUB PAR MDZAD
DO, ,YANG DUS DE'I

TSE BDE MCHOG GI BLOS BSLANGS LA BRTEN NAS SGRUB MCHOD MDZAD PA
NA BDE MCHOG GI

DKYIL 'KHOR GYI LHA TSOGS RNAMS ZHAL GZIGS SHING, NAM MKHA' NAS
MKHA' 'GRO MA'I

TSOGS KYIS MCHOD PA BSTOD DBYANGS BYED PA THUGS LA BZUNG NAS,
DE'I TSUL TSIGS SU

BCAD PA TING 'DZIN PIR LEGS MA DANG, DPYID KYI RGYAL MO'I GLU
DBYANGS SU GRAGS

PA'I MCHOD BSTOD RNAMS DBYANGS DANG BCAS PA MDZAD PA STE, 'DI'I
TSIG DANG DBYANGS

RNAMS DUS DER LHA MO RNAMS KYIS 'THEN PA DNGOS SU GZIGS SHING
GSAN PA YIN PAR

SNANG ZHES RJE RTOGS LDAN PA'I GSUNG LAS BYUNG, YANG DE'I GSUNG
LAS, RJE'I DRUNG

DU BUD MED MDZES MA GOS YID DU 'ONG BA GYON PA, ZHVA DMAR MO LEB
'JOG BYAS

PA ZHIG RGYUN DU 'ONGS TE, LHA'I RNAM PAR MI 'ONG BA DE SNOD MIN
LA SNGAGS KYI GSANG

BA BSTAN PA'I SKYON YIN PAR SNANG, L'U HI PA'I 'GREL PA 'DOD 'JO
BRTZAMS PHYIN

CHAD RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA LA SOGS PA'I RNAM PAR 'ONGS, GROGS
KHYAD PAR CAN

@393 MDZAD BA YIN BAR 'DUG CES GSUNGS, DE DAG GI DON GSANG RNAM
TSIGS BCAD MA

LAS, BDE MCHOG 'KHOR LO'I SGRUB PA MDZAD BA'I TSE, ,DKYIL 'KHOR
PA

RNAMS MNGON SUM GSAL BAR GZId, ,PHYI NANG GNAS GSUM MKHA' 'GRO'I
TSOGS

RNAMS KYIS, ,RDO RJE GLU YI MCHOD BAS DGYES PAR MDZAD, ,DPAL
LDAN BLA

MA'I ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,'DE DAG GE DON GYIS RANG CAG RJES 'JUG
RNAMS NAS

NYAMS LEN CHER MA BYUNG YANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN MA NYAMS PAR BYAS
NA BYIN RLABS SHIN TU

MYUR BA YIN TE, SNGON SMON LAM GNANG DUS SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD
KYIS BYIN GYIS

BRLABS PAR BSHAD PAS SO, ,ZHES RJE TZUN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS
GSUNGS SO, ,

DE LTAR RAB GNAS MDZAD PA NAS BZUNG DBU RU STOD SMAD KYIS MTSON
BA'I PHYOd KUN TU

CHAR CHU DUS SU 'BAB PA DANG, LO LEGS PA DANG, BSHAD SGRUB RGYAS
BA

LA SOGS BA'I DGE MTSAN GYI KHYAD PAR SNGAR LAS PHUL DU BYUNG
BA'I NGO MTSAR DANG LDAN

PAR GYUR TO, ,'DI DAG GI SNGAR PHYIR DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU,
SNE'U RDZONG

PHYI BA NAM MKHA' BZANG PO DANG, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS
DPAL LDAN PAS

RIG GROL GYI SDE DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS GZHI THINGS PA ZHABS
KYIS BCAGS SHING CHOS

RJE DGUNG LONG DGU THOG THEBS, SE BA'I RVA BA YOD PA'I SE RA
CHOS SDINGS SU THEG

CHEN BSHAD SGRUB MA LUS PA'I GLING 'BYUNG BA'I RTEN 'BREL MDZAD
PA LTAR BYAmS CHEN CHOS

RJE DGUNG LO RE GNYIS BZHES DUS BTAB, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR NA
'BRAS SPUNGS

SHING LUG LO DANG, SE RA SA KHYI LO LA PHYAG 'DEBS PAR SNANG BAS
SE 'BRAS DGE

GSUM PHYAG BTAB PA'I LO SNGA PHYI PHRAN BU MA GTOGS DON DU KHYI
LO TSUN LA GDAN SA CHEN

PO GSUM CHAR GRUB BA STE RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I THUGS BSKYED
NANG 'PHRIN LAS RMAD

@394 DU BYUNG BA'I MTHU NI DE LTA BU'I, ,YANG DGA' LDAN CHOS
'BYUNG GI LUNG GONG GI 'PHRO

LAS, 'DUL BA DANG THAL GYUR GYI LTA BA GTZOR GYUR GYI RGYAL BA'I
BSTAN PA SPYE BYE

BRAG LA BKA' DRIN CHE ZHING, KHYAD BAR DU DRI MED BLA MAS SPRA
LA BA GCIG

NI RGYA GAR GNAS CHEN 'GRIMS, ,ZHES BA'I JO BO D'I BAm KA RA
DANG, 'BROM

RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS, RNGOG LEGS BA'I SHES RAB YAB SRAS KYI
LHA CHOS BDUN

LDAN BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA SOGS STONG NYID KYI DON RGYAS
BAR SPEL BA'I RING LUd BAR

SKABS NYAG PHRA BA BSOS PA DANG, 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA SA DKAR SOGS
DAR RGYAS

CHE NA'ANG LAG LEN GYI CHA BCAS BA PHA MO RNAMS YUL DUS KYI
DBANG GIS JI BZHIN PHYOd

'DIR MA DAR BA PAn CHEN SDOM RGYUN RNAM DAG LA BRTEN NAS BCAS BA
RNAM PA GSUM GYIS

GTAN LA PHAB, TSIG TZAM MA YIN PAR LAG LEN DU BTAB PA SOGS KYIS
KHYAD PAR

DU STONG NYID KYI LTA BA DANG 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PAR BKA' DRIN CHE,
'ON KYANG RAB BYUNG

RNAMS DRAS DRA BA MA DANG, 'DING BA LHUNG BZED SOGS YO BYAD
DANG, PHYI ROL

SA'I RDUL MA SPANGS TE ZLA GAM GYON BA LAS ZHVA DANG LUGS KA
SGER 'DZIN THUGS LA MED

BA NI NYID KYI GSUNG LAS, BSTAN PA THAMS CAD 'GAL MED RTOGS PA
DANG, ,

GSUNG RAB MA LUS GDAMS PAR 'CHAR BA DANG, ,ZHES SOGS MTSUNGS PAR
SPYIR

NANG PA'I CHOS TSUL LA BLANG BYA DANG DOR BYA ZHES PHYOGS 'DZIN
MI 'THAD BAR MA ZAD,

GZHAN GYIS PHRAG DOG DANG, DE LA BRTEN NAS RANG GZHAN MANG POS
RNAM SMIN GYI LAS

'THUG PO GSOG BAR DGONGS DE, 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG
PAn CHEN

DGE 'DUN GRUB YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS PAR MED KYANG, SLOB 'KHOR
GZHAN GYI 'DOD

PA LTAR ZHA MDOG KYANG ZUR PA GSER BTZO MA LTA BU SGER 'DZIN
BYED DU 'JUG PA GNANG,

@395 ZHES DANG, RANG PHYOGS RNAMS DE SKABS GANG DAG SOR BZHAG
MDZAD NA, MTSAN NYID

SA LUGS, LTA BA DBU MA THAL 'GYUR, SDOM PO PAn CHEN BRGYUD
SNGAGS BU LUd DANG

KHYAD BAR SGRON GSAL, YI DAM RVA LUGS KYI 'JIGS BYED RONG PA
SHER SANG YAN

KHYAD MED PA DE NAS PHRAN BU MI 'DRA BA DANG, BRGYUD PA GNYIS
LAS CHOS RJE DON RIN

PAR RING BRGYUD GSAN, NYE BRGYUD STOD LUNG DGA' BA GDONG DU
DNGOS SU ZHAL

GZIGS, CHOS SKYONG SHANGS LUGS KYI PHYAG DRUG BAR BKA' MI 'DRA
BA BCU GSUM

YOD PA NAS RJES GNANG BAR CHAD KUN SEL SNAR THANG LO TZA BA DOM
'GRUB BZANG POR

GSAN CING, RNAM SRAS TSAR LUGS LA BKA' MI 'DRA BA BCU DRUG YOD
PA LAS,

ZHI BA BDE BYE LHA DGU'AM SER CHEN DANG, DRAG BYED MTHING GA BU
STON GYI THUGS

SRAS SGRA TSAD PA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL LA GSAN, LAS GSHIN PHYI
NANG GSANG GSUM

GRUB CHEN DPA' BO RDO RJE'AM, BLA MA DBU MA PAR GSAN BA RNAMS
GTZO BOR

MDZAD RIGS, ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS KYANG RJE RIN PO CHE'I RNAM
THAR GTZANG MA SGRO

SKUR MED BA STE DA DUNG ZHIB PA 'OG TU 'CHAD DO, ,SA KHYI LO LA
SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA

BRGYA PHRAG DU MA PHYOGS THAD THAD NAS BYON PA DANG, GNYUG MAR
GNAS PA'I DGE

'DUN DANG BCAS BA LA DGE LDAN NYID DU CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYUN MA
CHAD BAR BSKOR ZHING,

KHYAD PAR DU DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I 'GREL BA SGRON GSAL MCHAN
DANG BCAS PA

DANG, BSHAD RGYUD 'GA' ZHIG ,RIM LNGA'I KHRID RGYAS PA, SBYOR BA
YAN LAG DRUG

GI KHRID RGYAS PA DANG, DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I 'GREL CHEN DRI MA MED
PA'I 'OD RNAMS

KYI GSUNG BSHAD CHES ZHIB PA DANG, GZHAN YANG DBU TSAD, BDE
MCHOG ,

LAM RIM LA SOGS PA'I CHOS ZAB CING RGYA CHE BA DPAG TU MED PA
GSUNGS, DE'I

@396 DBYAR DANG STON LA GTZUG LAG KHANG GI KHYAMS KYI LOGS BRIS
KYANG GRUB BAR MDZAD CING,

DBU MA LA 'JUG PA'I RNAM BSHAD CHEN MO BRTZAMS BA'ANG LEGS PAR
RDZOd PAR MDZAD,

LO 'DI'I DGUN SMAD ZHIG LA BKA' PHEBS SU, CHOS SKYONGS 'DI RNAMS
LA GTOR

MA 'BUL BA'I DUS, DBYANGS KYI NGA RO DANG BCAS NA SHIN TU DGYIS
BAR 'DUG PAS,

'DI BZHIN BYEN PA YIN GSUNGS NAS, GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO
SPYAN 'DREN PA DANG,

BSTOD CING BSKUL BA SOGS KYI DBYANGS BZHI MDZAD, DE DUS NUB GCIG
SKU DRUNG NA

GNAS PA BSNYEN SGRUB LA BRTZON PA ZHIG GI RMI LAM DU, GSHIN RJE
CHOS KYI RGYAL BO

SKU SHIN TU BRJID CING CHE BA ZHIG PA TSAD NAS BYON TE, BSTOD
BA'I DBYANGS 'DI LTAR

GYIS LA 'THEN CIG CES KHONG RANG GIS 'THEN GYIN 'DUG BAS SA DANG
RE BO THAMS CAD

BE RE RE 'ONG BA ZHIG RMIS 'DUG CING, GZHAN YANG DE 'DRA BA'I
RMIS LTAS 'GA' RE

LA BYUNG BAR SNANG, RGYU MTSAN DE LA BRTEN NAS BSTOD BA'I
DBYANGS 'DI LA GSHIN RJE'I

NGAR DBYANGS SAM, THEN DBYANGS ZER PA'ANG DON 'DI 'DRA YIN SNYAM
ZHES RJE 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PAS GSUGNS, DE NAS DBYANGS BYA MI RUNG BAR 'DUG
PAS MA BY7ED GSUNGS, SKABS

MA MA BSHAMS PAR DBYANGS BYA MI RUNG BAR 'DUG PAS MA BYED
GSUNGS, SKABS

SHEG TU DE DAG GI RGYU MTSAN JI LTA BU MCHIS ZHUS PAS, LAR GSHIN
RJE CHOS RGYAL

'DI KHO RANG GI SKU'I RNAM PA JI LTA BAS KYANG MANG DU 'ONG,
KHYAD PAR SKU DRUNG NA ZHABS

TOG LA RGYUN PAR YOD PA GANG YANG RUNG BA'I GZUGS SU BYAS NAS
GZIMS KHANG NANG

DU PHAR 'GRO TSUR 'GRO DANG, SKU MDUN SOGS SU BYA BYED MANG BO
BYED, SNYAN

DRUNG DU SHAB SHUB KYI ZHAL TA ZHU BA'I RNAM PA BYAS NAS GTAM
MANG PO SMRA BA ZHIG NAR MAR

'ONG, DE 'DRA BA GZIMS KHANG NA NAR MAR GNAS PA MANG POS MTHONG
BA 'ONG YANG GANG GI

@397 GZUGS SU BSGYUR BA DER 'KHRUL NAS GZHAN TSOS NGO MI SHES PA
ZHIG 'DUG ,KHA

SANG NAS DBYANGS BYED PA'I DUS THAMS CAD DU DE 'DRA BA ZHIG 'ONG
NAS LAB LAB RANG BYED,

GTOR MA GTER DGOS PA 'DUG ,GTOR MA BYAS NAS DBYANGS KYI NGA RO
BYAS PA'I

TSE DGA' BA'I RNAM 'GYUR SNA TSOGS BYED PAR 'DUG CES BKA' STZAL
TO, ,GZHAN

YANG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'DI RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS RJE BTZUN 'JAM
DBYANGS KYI BSNYEN SGRUB

DANG POR MDZAD PA'I DUS NAS RJE NYID KYI 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB PA
LTA CI SMOS, DE'I THUGS

LA SHIN TU NYE BA'I SLOB 'KHOR 'GRO 'ONG BYED PA RNAMS KYI
BSKYEL BSU DANG, KHYAD PAR

DU RJE LA SNYING THAG PA NAS GUS PA RNAMS LA LHAG PAR 'GO BA YIN
CES GONG MA RNAMS

KYI GSUNG LAS BYUNG BAS, RANG CAG RJE THAMS CAD MKYEN PA'I RJES
'JUG RNAMS KYIS

KYANG CHOS SKYONG 'DI LA BSNYEN CING MCHOD NA DNGOS GRUB RNAM
GNYIS BDE BLAG TU STZOL BA

DANG, 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI SGRUB PA LA THOGS PA MI MNGA' BAR
SHES PAR GYIS SHIG ,

LO 'DI'I MJUG NAS THUGS KYI DGONGS PA LTAR STA GON MDZAD NAS
DPAL GSANG BA

'DUS PA'I RTZA RGYUD 'GREL PA SGRON GSAL DANG BCAS PA PAR DU
BRKO BA'I SBYOR BA NYE BAR

RTZOM PAR MDZAD PA LAS, 'BAD RTZOL MED PAR SA PHAG LO'I NANG DU
LEGS PAR

MTHAR PHYIN PAR GYUR, PHAG LO LA SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA MTHA' YAS PA
LA DPYID DANG

DBYAR GYI RING DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI RTZA BA'I RGYUD LA
SOGS PA'I CHOS DPAG

TU MED PA GSUNGS SHING, BDE MCHOG RTZA RGYUD KYI tI KA RMAD DU
BYUNG BA'I BKA' RTZOM

YANG RDZOGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,RNAM PAR THAR PA'I TSUL DE DAG LA
MKHAS GRUB THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PAS 'DI LTAR GSUNGS TE, MDOR NA BDAG CAG RNAMS KYI
'DREN PA,

'JIG RTEN MA LUS PA'I MIG GCIG PU 'DI NI, LHAG PA'I LHAS DNGOS
SU RJES SU

@398 BZUNG BAS DGE LEGS THAMS CAD KYI RTZA BA THEG PA CHEN PO 'I
YONGS SU 'DZIN PAS NYE

BAR BZUNG BA'I TSUL LA 'GRAN PA'I ZLA DANG BRAL ZHING, SDOM PA
GSUM GYI BCAS

PA PHRA ZHING PHRA BA YANG MIG GI 'BRAS BU LTAR GCES PAR 'DZIN
PAS THUB PA'I BRTUL

ZHUGS 'DZIN PA THAMS CAD KYI COD PAN, RTAG TU BSTAN PA DANG SEMS
CAN 'BA' ZHIG

LA DGONGS PA'I THEG PA CHEN PO'I LHAG BSAM RNAM PAR DAG PA'I
RGYAL SRAS KYI SNYING

STOBS RLABS PO CHE'I GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR PAS SGO GSUM GYI KUN TU
SPYOD PA PHRA ZHING PHRA

BA TZAM YANG DON DU MI 'GYUR BA'I GO SKABS MI MNGA' BA, RIG PA'I
LAM DU NGAL

BA BRGYA PHRAG LHUR BYAS PA'I MANG DU THOS PA BLO'I NUS PA MCHOG
TU GYUR PA JI TZAM GYIS

LEGS PAR BRTAGS KYANG GTING DPOGS PAR RNGO YANG MI THOGS PA'I
BLO GROS KYI LUS

YONGS SU RDZOGS SHING, RIG PA DRI MA MED PA'I LAM LA LEGS PAR
SBYANGS PA'I NYER

LEN DAM PA BSAGS SBYANGS MTHA' YAS PA'I GROGS KYIS RGYUN LDAN DU
BSKYANGS SHING,

MANG DU THOS PA'I LHAN CIG BYED RKYEN BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PAS ZIN
PAR MDZAD PAS,

RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS PA RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA 'GREL BAR
RGYAL BA NYID KYIS LUNG

BSTAN BRNYES PA'I SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS JI
LTAR BKRAL BA'I DGONGS

DON 'BYED PA LA 'KHRUL PA'I DRI MA TZAM YANG MI MNGA' BA, BSTAN
PA RIN PO CHE MI

NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN PA THAMS CAD KYI NANG NA STON PA
GNYIS PA LTA BUR GYUR PA YIN

TE; DE YANG TSUL 'DI GCAM BU'I NGAG GAM SNYAN DNGAGS KYI GTAM
GYIS RAB TU

BTAGS NAS BRJOD PA MA YIN GYI KHO BO CAG GIS MA 'KHRUL BA'I TSAD
MAS LEGS PAR

GRUB PA YIN NO, ,ZHES DANG, SLAR TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I SGO NAS
KYANG 'DI

LTAR, DPAL LDAN GSUNG RAB KUN LA LTA BA'I MIG ,DRI MED RIG PA'I
'DREN BYED STONG

@399 LDAN PA, ,KHYOD KYI DNGOS STOBS RIG PA'I LAG NYAL GYIS,
,MTHAR 'DZIN RI BO MING

GI LHAG MAR MDZAD, ,BZOD DKA' RIG PA'I DRI BZHON RLUNG SHUGS
KYIS, MA

LUS PHYOGS KYI GO SKABS LA GNAS PA'I, ,LOG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS
SPRIN TSOGS KUN

BCOM STE, ,PHAN BDE SBRANG RTZI'I GNYEN GCIG MKHA' LA MDZES,
,DRI MED RIG PA RNON

PO'I MTSON 'CHANG BA, ,KHYONG KYIS RTZUB MO'I SBYOR BA RGYAN
BSRINGS KYANG, ,SMRA BA'I

SENG GE KUN GYI NGA RGYAL GYI, ,RAL PA MA LUS CIG CAR SA LA
LHUNG, ,BDE GSHEGS

BSTAN PA'I SA CHEN KHYOD KYIS NI, ,LEGS BSHAD DPUNG PA KHA BA LA
BRTEN NAS, ,

THEG MCHOG 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA KHYOD KYI BKA', ,DPAL LDAN MKHAS
PA KUN GYI

MGO BOS 'DZIN, ,MI DMAN RGYAL BA'I SA BON SNYING RJE'I KHAMS,
,SHES

RAB YUM GYI LTO BAR BSAM GTAN GYI, ,BDE DROD SNYOMS PAR BRTEN
PAS LEGS

SMIN PA, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I GDUNG 'TSOB SRAS 'DI BSKRUN,
,SNYING RJE'I

ZLA BA RDZOGS PA'I GZHON NU NI, ,LHAG BSAM KUN GSAL MDZES PA'I
PHANG PA LAS, ,

RMAD BYUNG BRTZON PA'I 'GYOGS 'GROS RAB BLANGS TE, ,GZHAN DON
SHAR RI'I BA GAM

RTZE LA 'DZEGS, ,DE TSE DAM CHOS KU MUD BZHAD PA DANG, ,MNYAM DU
THUB

BSTAN GOS DKAR GYON PA'I LUS, ,GZIGS NAS SA GSUM 'GRO 'DI MUN
BRAL CES, ,

DGYES LDAN RGYAL BA KUN NI BTANG SNYOMS MDZAD, ,RTZOD DUS 'PHROG
SLAD CHED DU

,MA

BA DANG BZHIN

DU BTZUGS, ,DE PHYIR DUS MTHAR LEGS BSHAD SBRANG RTZI'I GNYEN,
,THUB PA'I

NYI MA MA LUS ZIL MNON PA'I, ,SA GSUM 'OD MDZAD 'GRO BA'I BLA MA
GANG, ,KHYOD

@400 DANG MTSUNGS PA'I SNANG BA GZHAN YOD MIN, ,CHES PA'I TSIG
BCAD LHUG 'DI RNAMS KYIS

MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI RNAM PAR THAR PA'I LUS YONGS SU RDZOGS
PA SDOM BSHAD KYI

TSUL DU GSUNGS PA STE, BSHAD GZHI SHIN TU CHED YANG YI GES 'JIGS
PA MA ZAD RNAM

DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DAG GIS NI GONG 'OG RNAM PAR THAR PA'I TSUL
RNAMS LA ZHIB TU

BRTAGS NA SHES PAR SNANG BAS MA SPROS SO, ,YANG RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I RNAM THAR GYI

NANG TSAN MDZAD CHEN BZHIR GRAGS PA DE GANG DANG GANG ZHIG SNYAM
NA, SNGAR GONG DU BKOD PA

DE DAG LAS DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR 'OL KHA RDZING PHYI'I BYAMS PA'I
SKU SHIN TU 'O BGYAL BA

GZIGS NAS RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS LA ZHIG BSO BLA NA MA MCHIS
PAR MDZAD CING,

RAB TU GNAS PA'I TSE SANGS RGYAS RAB BDUN DNGOS SU BYON TE BRIS
SKU LA THIM PA DANG MAR

ME 'DZIN PA SOGS LTAS NGO MTSAR BA DU MA BYUNG BA DANG BCAS PA
NI MDZAD CHEN DANG PO

DANG, DGUNG LO SO DGU PA LA GNYAL GYI GSER PHYE 'BUM PAR MCHOD
PA CHEN PO DANG

'DUL BA'I CHAS MANG DU GSUNGS SHING, LTUNG BYED NYES BYAS DANG
BCAS PAR BSHAGS PA

DANG, SKYE BO'I TSOGS RNAMS KYANG BSNYEN GNAS DANG SKYABS 'GRO'I
SDOM PA LA SBYAR

ZHING, SKYA SER THAMS CAD KYIS SA TSVA 'DEBS PA SOGS LUNG RA
CHEN MOR GRAGS PA

MDZAD PA NI MDZAD CHEN GNYIS PA DANG, DGUNG LO NGA GNYIS PA'I
NANG LHA LDAN GTZUG LAG

KHANG RTEN GSUM DANG BCAS PAR ZHIG BSO PHUL PHYIN DANG, NGA GSUM
PAR CHO 'PHRUL

DUS CHEN DANG 'BREL BAR JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS SOGS LA DBU RGYAN,
NA BZA',

MCHOD RDZAS SOGS BZANG ZHIG PHUL DU PHYIN PA DANG, TSES GCIG NAS
BCO LNGA'I

BAR RTEN RNAMS LA MCHOD PA RGYA CHEN PO DANG, DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA'I
SDE LA BSNYEN

BKUR, SKYE BO PHONGS PA'I TSOGS LA SBYIN GTONG SOGS RNAM DKAR
MCHOD SBYIN

@401 RGYA CHEN PO DANG, ,MTHA' DBUS KYI 'GRO BA BGRANG BA LAS
BRGAL BA THAR PA DANG

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAM LA 'GOD PA SOGS 'PHAGS PA'I YUL GYI
BYUNG BA DANG MTHUN

PA'I LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MOR GRAGS PA 'DZUGS PAR MDZAD PA NI
MDZAD CHEN GSUM

PA DANG, DGUNG LO NGA DGU PA LUG GI LO LA YANGS PA CAN GYI GTZUG
LAG KHANG

BSKRUN CING GSANG 'DUS, BDE MCHOG ,RDOR DBYINGS RNAMS KYI DKYIL

'KHOR BLOS BSLANGS RIN PO CHE 'BA' ZHIG LAS GRUB PA GSAR DU
BZHENGS PA'I TSE

'JA' TSON MA DANG, RANG 'BYON LA SOGS PA'I RTEN NGO MTSAR CAN DU
MA BYON ZHING,

RAB TU GNAS PA'I TSE LTAS NGO MTSAR CAN MANG DU BYUNG BA DANG,
DKYIL 'KHOR DE

DAG DANG 'BREL BA'I SGRUB MCHOD KYI CHO GA RGYUD SDE'I DGONGS PA
BZHIN GYI PHYAG LEN RNAM

PAR DAG PAS BRGYAN PA DGA' LDAN SGRUB MCHOD CHEN MOR GRAGS PA
'DZUGS PAR MDZAD

PA NI MDZAD CHEN BZHI PA YIN NO, ,GZHAN YANG RNAM LEGS BSHAD KUN
'DUS

SOGS LAS, RJE RIN PO CHE 'DI'I THUGS DAM GYI RIM PA NI, NAM
PHYED YOL TZAM

NAS GSANG 'DUS MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I BDAG 'JUG RGYAS PAR MDZAD NAS
RIM LNGA YUN

RING DU BSGOM PAR MDZAD, NAM LANGS NAS NYI SHAR BAR LA 'JIGS
BYED KYI RIM

GNYIS RGYAS PA DANG, NYI MA SHAR NAS TSA BZHES LA THUG GI BAR LA
MDO RGYUD GANG

RUNG GI SHOG 'DEBS SUM CU TZAM LJAGS KLOG DANG, GRA LNGAS THOG
DRANGS PA'I

BYA SPYOD KYI GTOR MA DU MA'I MJUG TU ZAS KYI RNAL 'BYOR DANG
LDAN PA'I GSOL BA MDZAD

RING DGE BSHES RNAMS LA BKA' RTZOM GYI 'PHRO DANG, DON GNYER BA
RNAMS KYI THE TSOM

GCOD, DE NAS ZAB MO MDO GSUM THUGS THOG NAS BTON TE BSNGO BA
DANG BCAS

PA MDZAD, SA TSVA BCU RE, TSE DPAG MED, SMAN BLA, 'JAM DBYANGS,

@402 SGROL MA RNAMS KYI SKU PAR BDUN BDUN, NYIN GUNG LA BKA'
'GYUR BSTAN 'GYUR

GANG RUNG NAS GSUNG SGROG JI LTAR 'TSAMS PA RE DANG, BKA' RTZOM
GYI 'PHRO,

NYIN PHYED YOL NAS SROD KYI BAR LA DMAR NAG 'JIGS GSUM, GDONG
DRUG RNAMS

KYI SBYIN BSREGS, 'KHOR CHEN DANG, MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA, PHYAG
DRUG

PA RNAMS KYI MNGON RTOGS, GTOR BSNGOS, GUR MGON, SENG GDONG,

GRI GUG DANG, DUD SOL MA LA SOGS PA'I GTOR BSNGOS RGYAS PA, BDE
MCHOG

LA'U HI PA'I BDAG 'JUG DANG, BDE MCHOG GI RIM LNGA BSGOM PA
RNAMS GO RIM

NGES PA CAN YIN, GZHAN YANG ZHAG GCIG LA HR'I shI KHRI TSO, BDE
MCHOG GI

YI GE BDUN PA SUM STONG, AA RA PA TZA NA BDUN STONG, SKU MTSAMS
KYI

KHOG NAS KYANG MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS THUN GNYIS GSUM RE GSUNG BA
MTHUN SNANG BA YIN,

CHOS GSUNGS BZHIN DU GTOR BSNGOS DANG, LHA BSGOM PA, RDZOGS RIM
GYI

TING NGE 'DZIN RNAMS LAS MI G-YO BA SOGS THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I
CHOS SPYOD KYANG MTHA'

YAS SO, ,ZHES GSUNGS TE, DES NA THUN MONG BA'I SNANG NGOR YANG
SKAD CIG

DANG SKAD CIG LA GZHAN PHAN GYI MDZAD PA RLABS CHEN 'DI LTA BU
RGYUN CHAGS SU GRUB PA NI,

SA CHEN PO YAN CHAD LA GNAS PA'I BDAG NYID CHEN PO RNAMS KYI
NGANG TSUL YIN GYI SO SO

SKYE BOS BSGRUN PAR NUS PA NI MA YIN LA, DE'I PHYIR MKHAS GRUB
SMRA BA'I NYI MAS KYANG,

MGON PO KHYOD KYI ZHAL GYI DBUGS TZAM YANG, ,MTHA' DAG 'GRO LA
SMAN PA'I RGYUR

GSUM

SKYE RGU'I GNYEN LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA YIN NO,
,YANG,

@403 GIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR DU, SNGAR LAN MANG DU BSHAD PA'I
SKU DANG GSUNG GI SNANG

BA DE RNAMS LA DBANG SHES LA RANG MTSAN PA DNGOS SU SNANG BA
DANG, NYAMS DANG RMI

LAM GYI YID SHES LA RNAM PA SNANG BA GNYIS YOD PA LAS, DANG PO
NI, LHA'I

MIG DANG RNA BA'I MNGON PAR SHES PA MA THOB PAR LHA'I SKU DANG
GSUNG RANG MTSAN PA DBANG

SHES LA MI SNANG BAS DA LTAR GYI GANG ZAG LA SHIN TU DKA', YID
SHES LA SNANG BA

LA RANG GI SEMS DER SNANG BA DANG, PHYI ROL NAS RNAM PA GTOD
BYED YOD PA GNYIS,

PHYI ROL NAS RNAM PA GTOD BYED YOD PA LA YANG MI MTHUN PHYOGS
KYI RNAM PA GTAD PA DANG,

MTHUN PHYOGS KYI RNAM PA GTAD PA GNYIS, MTHUN PHYOGS LA'ANG 'JIG
RTEN LAS 'DAS

PAS GTAD PA DANG, 'JIG RTEN PAS GTAD PA GNYIS, 'JIG RTEN LAS
'DAS

PAS GTAD PA LA'ANG RNAM PA KHYAD PAR CAN DANG PHAL PA GNYIS YOD
PA RNAMS ZHIB TU

BSHAD DGOS PAR YOD NA'ANG TSIG MNGAS SU DOGS PAS 'DIR RNAM DPYOD
'JUG PA'I SGO

TZAM ZHIG BSTAN PAS SHES LDAN DAG GIS TSUL DE KHONG DU CHUD PAR
GYIS SHIG ,CES

GSUNGS PA RNAMS DPYOD LDAN DAG GIS MKHYEN PAR BYA PHYIR 'DIR
YANG BKOD PA STE, DON

BSGRIL NA, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN POR GZIGS SNANG DANG,
LUNG BSTAN

BYUNG BA RNAMS NI LHA'I MIG DANG RNA BA'I MNGON SHES KYI YUL
DANG, DRI MA MED PA'I

YE SHES GZIGS PA YONGS SU DAG PA'I SPYOD YUL NYID DU SHES PAR
BYA'O, ,'DIR

PA'I

RIN CHEN KHAMS

@404 PA DANG MTSUNGS PA'I, ,SPRUL PA'I BZO BO'I 'DU BYED RTZAL
GYIS BZHENGS, ,

BRIS 'DRAR

BYON

KYI, ,

DAG PA YE SHES

KYI; ;SGYU 'PHRUL BKOD PA MNGON SUM NYID DU NGES, ,YE SHES DNGOS
KYI ROL

PA NYID NA'ANG, ,GZHAN NGOR MTHA' KLAS RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO YI,
,BYIN CHEN SLAR

TSE, ,RAB 'BYAMS

TSOGS

PA'I

'KHOR LO'I

,RDO RJE

DGUR ROL, ,

BRAN DU

'KHOL NA MGON PO KHYOD, ,'JAM DBYANGS DNGOS SU LUNG DANG RIG PA
YIS, ,

BSGRUB PA'I NGAL BA GZHAN DU CI ZHIG BSTEN, ,GZHAN DAG LO ZLAR
'BAD KYANG MI

PA ZAD MI SHES

,DE SOGS

GANG GI MDZAD PA'I PHUNG PO YI, ,PHA MTHA' SPYAN DANG MNGON SHES
MNGA' BAS KYANG, ,

'DZIN MI NUS NA BDAG CAG TSUR MTHONG GIS, ,CHA TZAM 'JAL BA'I GO
SKABS GA LA

@405 ZHIG ,DE LTA NA'ANG RGYA MTSO'I 'JINGS ZAB NAS, ,SKRA RTZE
BYE BA'I CHU THIG JI

BZHIN DU, ,NYUNG ZAD BRJOD PA'I SKAL BZANG THOB PA'ANG, ,GANG GI
THUGS

RJER SHES NAS SLAR YANG GUS, ,ZHES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU
BCAD PA'I

'PHRENG BA'O, ,ZHES KHYAB BDAG RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA THUB
DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG

NGO BO DBYER MA MCHIS PA 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA
PA CHEN PO'I RNAM PAR

THAR PA THUB BSTAN MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I
'PHRENG BA LAS, RGYAL

BA'I BSTAN LA THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM MDZAD PA'I LAG RJES LAS LUNG
DANG MNGON PAR

RTOGS PA'I YON TAN MTHA' DAG LA MNGA' BSGYUR BA'I MKHAS GRUB
'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I GO

'PHANG MTHAN POR GSHEGS NAS, BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MA RTOGS LOG
RTOG GI DRI MA

BSAL TE BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO BSHAD SGRUB RNAM PAR DAG PA'I RING
LUGS KYI SROL BTOD

PA'I SGO NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON RLABS CHEN MDZAD TSUL LAS BRTZAMS
NAS BRJOD PA'I

SKABS TE DRUG PA'O,, ' ,,SA BCAD LNGA PA, MDZAD

PA DE DAG GI NANG NAS KYANG GTZO BOR GYUR PA NI 'CHAD RTZOD
RTZOM GSUM DANG, MKHAS

BTZUN BZANG GSUM, GRUB PA'I GO 'PHANG BRNYES PA DANG BCAS PA'I
SGO NAS BSTAN

'GRO'I DON MDZAD TSUL NYID YIN PAS, DE DAG SLAR YANG SDOM BSHAD
KYI TSUL DU

RTZAL DU BTON NAS GO BDER BRJOD PAS MCHOG DMAN KUN LA NGES PA
BSKYED PAR BYED PA NI,

DE YANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I MDZAD PA NI MKHAS GRUB GNYIS
LDAN GYI SGO NAS BSTAN

'GRO'I DON MDZAD RGYU KHO NA LAS, BSTAN DON DU MING BTAGS NAS
CHEN PO'I GOS DANG,

ZANG ZING GI GSOGS 'JOG ,SA ZHING DANG TSONG KHE'I BSKYED 'PHEL,
'KHOR

G-YOG DANG MDZO RTA'I SKYONG BRAN, DGRA 'DUL GNYEN SKYONG SOGS
LA NI RANG NYID DU MA

@406 ZAD SLOB 'KHOR DU GTOGS PA MTHA' MA TSUN CHAD KYIS KYANG MI
'JUG PAS, CI MDZAD

THAMS CAD RGYAL BA DGYES PA'I LAM 'BA' ZHIG LA GNAS PA NI RMONGS
ZHEN GYI RAB

BTAGS TZAM MA YIN PAR DNGOS PO'I GNAS TSOD KHO NA YIN CING, DES
NA SNGAR GONG

DU CHE LONG RAGS BSDUS TZAM BKOD PA DE THAMS CAD KYANG GTZO BOR
'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM

GSUM DANG, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM, GRUB PA'I RNAM THAR BSAM GYIS

MI KHYAB PA DANG BCAS PA LAS BRTZAMS TE BRJOD PA SHA DAG YIN PA
NI ZHIB MO'I BLOS

BRTAGS NA SHES PAR NUS MOD, 'ON KYANG DA DUNG DE DAG TU MA GSAL
BA'I CHA 'GA'

ZHIG 'THOR BA BSDUS PA'I SDOM BSHAD KYI TSUL DU 'GOD CING, LHAG
PAR 'CHAD

RTZOD RTZOM GSUM SOGS KYI MDZAD PA RE RE'I THAD LA'ANG MKHAS
GRUB GZHAN LAS LHAG

PAR KHYAD DU THON PA'I NGO MTSAR BA'I PHUL RNAMS RTZAL DU BTON
NAS BSHAD NA, RANG

GZHAN GYI GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN PA GANG SU YANG RUNG BA THAMS CAD DAD
PA DANG GUS PA GONG

'PHEL DU GYUR NAS RNAM THAR GTZANG MA DE LTA BU LA SMON LAM TSUN
CHAD KYIS SLOB PA SOGS

BKOD PA'I DGOS PA DON LDAN DU 'GYUR BSAM NAS, SLAR YANG GAL PO
CHE LA

NAN TAN GYI TSUL DU NGES PAR 'GOD PAR RNGO THOGS SO, ,DE LA DANG
POR 'CHAD

RTZOD RTZOM GSUM LAS BRTZAMS TE BRJOD NA, THOG MAR 'CHAD PA'I
RNAM THAR LTA BU

LA MTSON NA, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO NI 'GA' ZHIG LTAR CHOS BSHAD
PA LA DPA' BA TZAM

MA YIN PAR CHOS 'CHAD PA'I SLOB DPON DU 'OS PA'I MTSAN NYID DAM
YON TAN THAMS

CAD TSANG BA YIN TE, DE YANG SLOB DPON GYI MTSAN NYID MDO RGYUD
BSTAN BCOS RNAMS LAS

MANG PO ZHIG GSUNGS TE, SUM BRGYA PA LAS, TSUL KHRIMS LDAN ZHING
'DUL

BA'I CHO GA SHES, ,NAD PAR SNYING BRTZE 'KHOR NI DAG PA DANG,
,CHOS DANG ZANG

@407 ZING PHAN 'DOGS BRTZON PA DANG, ,DUS SU 'DOMS PA DE LTAR
BLA MAR BSNGAGS, ,

ZHES DANG, SLOB DPON KLU SGRUB KYIS, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DE DAG
GI ,

MTSAN NYID MDOR BSDUS MKHYEN PAR MDZOD, ,CHOG SHES SNYING RJE
TSUL KHRIMS LDAN, ,

NYON MONGS SEL BA'I SHES RAB CAN, ,DE DAG LA NI KHYOD BRTEN NA,
,KHYOD KYIS

MKHYEN GYIS GUS PAR MDZOD, ,CES DANG, MDO SDE RGYAN LAS, BSHES

GNYEN DUL BA ZHI BA NYER ZHI BA, ,YON TAN LHAG PA BRTZON BCAS
LUNG GIS PHYUG ,

DE NYID RAB TU RTOGS PA SMRA MKHAS LDAN, ,BRTZE BA'I BDAG NYID
SKYO BA SPANGS LA BRTEN, ,

ZHES TSUL KHRIMS DANG LDAN PAS DUL BA DANG, TING 'DZIN DANG LDAN
PAS ZHI BA DANG,

SHES RAB DANG LDAN PAS NYON MONGS PA NYE BAR ZHI BA DANG, YON
TAN GZHAN LAS KHYAD

PAR 'PHAGS PAS LHAG PA DANG, GZHAN DON LE LO MED PAS BRTZON
'GRUS DANG BCAS

PA DANG, THOS PA CHE BAS LUNG GIS PHYUG PA DANG, SHES PAR BYA
BA'I DE KHO NA

NYID RAB TU RTOGS PA DANG, TSIG SMRA MKHAS PA DANG, ZANG ZING LA
MI LTA

BAS BRTZE BA DANG, CHOS STON PA LA SKYO BA MED PA STE CHOS BCU
LDAN DANG, YANG

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' THOS MANG DANG, ,BDEN MTHONG SMRA MKHAS
BRTZE BA CAN, ,

SKYO MED SKYES BU DAM PA NI, ,CHEN PO YIN PAR SHES PAR BYA,
,ZHES LUNG GI

YON TAN THOS PA MANG BA, RTOGS PA'I YON TAN BDEN PA MTHONG BA,
TSIG SMRA

MKHAS PA, BSAM PA ZANG ZING LA MI LTA BAS BRTZE BA CAN, BSAM
SBYOR

SNYOM LAS MED PAS SKYO MED CHOS LNGA LDAN NAM, YANG, RGYA CHE
THE TSOM SBONG

BA DANG, ,BZUNG 'OS DE NYID GNYIS STON PA, ,'DI NI BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA'

YI; ;STON PA PHUN TSOGS YIN ZHES BYA, ZHES MANG DU THOS PAS THOS
PA

@408 RGYA CHE BA DANG, SHES RAB CHE BAS GDUL BYA'I THE TSOM
SPONG BA, SGO GSUM

DGE BAS BLA MAR BZUNG BAR 'OS PA, NYON MONGS DANG RNAM BYANG GI
DE KHO NA NYID STON

PA STE CHOS BZHI LDAN DU BSHAD LA, BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYE NA
PAS, DE DAG

PHAL CHER 'PHAGS PA'I CHOS YIN PAS LDAN PAR DKA' ZHES GSUNG
YANG, RJE TZONG

KHA PA CHEN PO LA NI GONG DU SMOS PA DE DAG THAMS CAD LAS GCIG
TZAM YANG MA TSANG ZHES

SUS KYANG SMRAR MED PAS MTSAN NYID DE THAMS CAD LHAG DANG BCAS
PA MNGA' BA YIN LA,

GZHAN YANG MDO RGYUD KYI CHOS GANG 'CHAD PA'I YAN LAG TU NGES
PAR DGOS PA'I SHES

RAB, BRTZE BA'I BSAM BA, SBYOR BA BZOD PA DANG LDAN PA GSUM,
MKHAS

PA'I ZHES RAB LA YANG, BSHAD BYA LA MKHAS PA SPYIR SDE SNOD KUN
LA MKHAS PA

DANG, BYE BRAG TU GANG 'CHAD PAR BYA BA'I TSIG DON LUNG RIG MAN
NGAG DANG BCAS

PAR MKHAS PA DANG, 'CHAD BYED LA MKHAS PA BRJOD BYED KYI BRDA'
DAG PA DANG,

GANG NAS BSHAD KYANG 'BREL, JI TZAM BSHAD KYANG RAN, JI LTAR
BSHAD KYANG

'THAD PA GSUM GYIS NGAG 'BREL BA, GZHAN DGA' BAR NUS PA'I
DBYANGS SNYAN

PA DANG, KUN SPYOD LA MKHAS PA NI, SGO GSUM DGE BAS KUN GYIS
BKUR

BAR 'OS PAS RANG GI KUN SPYOD LA MKHAS PA DANG, GDUL BYA'I KUN
SPYOD LA MKHAS

PA NI, KHAMS DANG DBANG PO DANG BAG LA NYAL JI LTA BA BZHIN DU
GZIGS PAS DE

DANG MTHUN PA'I CHOS BSTAN NA DON DU 'GYUR GYI, GZHAN DU NA SA'I
SNYING PO 'KHOR LO

BCU PA LAS, BYIS PA DBANG PO ZHAN CING LE LO ZHAN, ,THEG PA
GNYIS LA NAN

TAN MI BYED PA, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I 'KHOR LO LDAN MI 'GYUR, ,DE
NI RGYA CHEN

THEG CHEN SNOD MA YIN, ,ZHES DANG, DE BZHIN SNOD MIN NYAN THOS
THEG PA DAG,

@409 THEG CHEN BSHAD PA THOS NA RMONGS 'GYUR ZHING, ,CHAD PAR
LTA LA NGAN SONG LTUNG 'GYUR

BAS, ,DES NA DBANG PO BRTAGS TE CHOS BSTAN TO, ,ZHES DANG, RGYA

CHEN CHOS KYI SNOD GYUR PA, ,DMAN PA'I CHOS LA SBYAR MI BYA,
,ZHES SOGS

GSUNGS PA LTAR THEG PA CHE CHUNG GI CHOS GANG STON PA'I SNOD DU
RUNG BA DANG, THEG

CHEN LA YANG MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS GANG STON PA'I SNOD DU RUNG BA
STE, GDUL BYA'I KUN

SPYOD DAM MTSAN NYID LA MKHAS PA DGOS PAR GSUNGS PA DANG BCAS
PA'I MKHAS BYA'I

GNAS DE THAMS CAD KYANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO LA MNGA' ZHING, DE
BZHIN DU MDO SDE

RGYAN LAS, BSTAN PA RNAMS NI SROG DANG LONGS SBYOD TSEGS CHEN
RNYED CING SNYING PO MED

PA DAG ,RAB DGA'I YID KYIS SEMS CAN SDUG BSNGAL RNAMS LA SBYIN
RNAMS RGYA CHEN RTAG

BTANG BA, ,CHOS YANG SKYE DGU RNAMS LA RNAM PA KUN TU PHAN BYED
TSEGS CHEN RNYED MIN ZHING,,

SHIN TU BTANG YANG ZAD MED 'PHEL 'GYUR BA LTA LAN CIG MA YIN
SMOS CI DGOS, ,

ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA LTAR SPYIR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB
CHEN PO LA BZHAG

'DOD KYI SNYING RJE DANG, GANG 'CHAD PAR BYA BA'I CHOS KYI DON
DE LEGS PAR SHES

SHING PHAN PAR 'DOD PA'I LHAG BSAM KHO NAS ZANG ZING LA LTOS MED
DU 'CHAD PA'I THUGS

RJE CHEN PO DANG NGES PAR LDAN LA, CHOS 'CHAD PA'I NGAL DUB DANG
DKA' LAS LA

SKYO BA MED PA'I BZOD PA DANG, SLOB MAS JI TZAM DRI BAR BZOD PA
DANG, GZHAN

GYIS BRTZOD PAR BZOD CING LAN 'DEBS NUS PAS GDUL BYA RJES SU
'DZIN NUS PA

SOGS KYI YON TAN KUN LA MNGA' BRNYES SHING, SNGAGS KYI DBANG DU
BYAS NA YANG,

SGO GSUM LEGS BSDAMS BLO CHEN BZOD LDAN DRANG, ,G-YO DANG SGYU
MED SNGAGS

DANG RGYUD SHES SHIN, ,DE NYID BCU BZUNG 'BRI DANG 'CHAD MKHAS
PA, ,RDO RJE

@410 'DZIN PA'I GTZO LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES SOGS RGYUD SDE NAS
BSHAD PA'I RDO

RJE SLOB DPON DU 'OS PA'I MTSAN NYID KUN TSANG BA STE, BSHAD MA
THAG PA'I MTSAN

NYID DE DAG RE RE NAS TSANG TSUL GONG DU BKOD ZIN GYI RNAM PAR
THAR PA RNAMS DANG SBYAR

NAS BSHAD DU YOD MOD KYANG YI GES 'JIGS PAS MA BKOD KYANG, DPYOD
LDAN

DAG GIS NI SNGAR BSHAD PA'I RNAM THAR RNAMS LA ZHIB TU BRTAGS NA
RE RE NAS ZHES PAR

NUS SO, ,DE LTAR RANG NYID LA SLOB DPON DU 'OS PA'I YON TAN NAM,
MTSAN

NYID THAMS CAD TSANG BA'I GANG ZAG KHYAD PAR CAN YIN PA TZAM
RGYU MTSAN DU BYAS NAS CHOS

'CHAD NYAN GYI KUN SPYOD BZANG NGAN SOGS LA JI MI SNYAM PA'I GZU
LUM SPYI BRTOL SOGS

GTAN NAS MI MDZAD PAR, JI SKAD DU DAM CHOS PAD DKAR LAS, GTZANG
ZHING

YID DU 'ONG BA'I SA PHYOGS SU, ,YANGS PA'I STAN NI RAB TU BSHAMS
BTING STE, ,

BZANG PO'I TSON GYIS LEGS PAR KHA BSGYUR BA'I, ,CHOS GOS GTZANG
MA DE NI

TSOGS

,RKANG PA

NI RAB SNUM

DMA'

LDAN

PA'I MIG GIS BLTA, ,TSIG GI BDUD RTZI 'THUNG BA BZHIN, ,RIM GRO

CHOS NYON CIG  ,CES SOGS GSUNGS PA LTAR MCHIL LHAM PHUD CING,
KHRUS

SPONG BA DANG, DMA'

SHES DRUG

BSTEN PA SOGS CHOS NYAN PA'I KUN SLONG KUN SPYOD RNAM PAR DAG PA
'DZIN DU 'JUG PA

SOGS RJE TZONG KHA PA BLA SLOB KYI RNAM THAR GTZANG MA'I PHYAG
BZHES NI DA LTA'I BAR DU'ANG

KUN GYI MTHONG CHOS

SU GYUR PA 'DI DAG GIS SHES PAR NUS SO, ,GANG 'CHAD PAR MDZAD
PA'I CHOS NI,

THA NA BKLAGS LUNG TZAM ZHIG YIN NA'ANG, TSAR GANG RKYEN DANG
'GRO GANG CHE GTZOR

'DON MI MDZAD PAR TSIG ZUR TSUN CHAD NYAMS PA MED PA'I GSAL DAG
SNYAN GSUM GYI

SGO NAS NYAN PA PO'I RNA BAR 'BAB CING, YID LA GO BA BSKYED NUS
PA GTZO BOR

MDZAD LA, DE LTAR MDZAD KYANG GZHAN DAG GIS 'BAD RTZOL CHEN POS
NGAL MED KYI

TSUL DU KLOG PA BAS CHOD CHE ZHING GRUB RKYEN PA'I NGO MTSAR GYI
PHUL CHEN PO MNGA' BA DANG,

BOR MI MDZAD PAR BSHAD

GTZO BOR MDZAD LA,

DE YANG 'CHAD BYED KYI GZHUNG GANG DANG GANG YIN KYANG DE DANG
DE'I TSIG DON RNAMS MA

@412 'DOD TSUL DANG, KHAS LEN GYI KHYAD PAR MI 'DRA BA, DRANG BA
DANG NGES PA'I

DON GYI 'BYED LUGS, SNGON BYON RGYA BOD KYI MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI
BSHAD SROL MI 'DRA

BA YOD LUGS, DE DAG LAS GANG 'THAD PA'I PHYOGS RANG LUGS SU KHAS
LEN TSUL,

GO BA'AM DON GYI SNYING PO RNAM PAR DAG PA 'TSOL DGOS LUGS, DE
THAMS CAD

GTZO BOR RANG RGYUD LA BSKOR NAS NYAMS SU LEN DGOS TSUL SOGS
ZHIB CING MTHA' CHOD

PA'I SGO NAS 'DOMS PAR MDZAD PAS CHOS LAN CIG GSUNGS PAS KYANG,
GDUL

BYA RNAMS KYI RGYUD LA RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I MYONG BA THON PA'I
KHYAD CHOS DANG LDAN ZHING, TSUL

DE LTA BU'I SGO NAS CHOS KYI RNAM GRANGS GANG DANG GANG 'CHAD
PAR MDZAD PA NI PHAL MO CHE

GONG DU BKOD ZIN PA NYID NA'ANG, MDZAD PA RNAM THAR GZHAN GYI
KHONGS SU KHA 'THOR

DKYUS GCIG TU

SDOM GYI TSUL DU BKOD NA, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA'I DUS DGUN GNAS
RNYING DU BZHUGS

SKABS DON GNYER BA DANG, PHYAG PHYI LA BYON PA 'GA' ZHIG NAS
GSOL BA NAN CHER

BTAB PA'I NGOR, MNGON PA KUN LAS BTUS LA RTZAL BSHAD TSAR GCIG
MDZAD PA

'DI GZHUNG CHEN MO LA BSHAD PA GNANG BA'I THOG MA YIN TSOD DU
SNANG, DE NAS RIM

PAR 'ON GYI LHA KHANG KE RUR CHOS DBAR LA BYON SKABS, TSA KHO
DPON PO SOGS SDE

SNOD 'DZIN PA MANG POR PHAR TSAD DBU MA SOGS KYI BSHAD LUNG MANG
DU GSUNGS, DE'I

DGUN CHOS LA BDE BA CAN DU'ANG SDE SNOD MANG DU GSUNGS, DE'I
PHYI LO DPYID CHOS LA

DBUS STOD BYA YUL DU DGE BSHES BDUN CU TZAM LA PHAR PHYIN, TSAD
MA, DBU MA 'JUG PA,

MNGON PA KUN BTUS RNAMS KYI BSHAD PA RGYAS PAR STZAL, DBYAR CHOS
LA YANG BDE

BA CAN DU BLO GSAL BA RNAMS LA SDE SNOD MANG PO GSUNGS, PHYI LO
SOS RIGS LNGA

@413 LHA KHANG DU SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA BDUN CU LHAG TZAM LA PHAR
TSAD, MNGON PA KUN BTUS,

MNGON PA MDZOD, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA BA, DBU MA 'JUG PA SOGS ZHIB
PAR GSUNGS,

YAR LUNG DU BYON NAS SMON MKHAR DU'ANG SDE SNOD MANG PO'I BSHAD
PA GSUNGS ZHING,

DE DAG GI BAR SKABS RNAMS SU RGYUD SDE GONG 'OG GI DKYIL 'KHOR
CHEN PO RNAMS SU SNOD

LDAN GYI GDUL BYA DBANG GIS SMIN PAR MDZAD PA DANG, LHA SO SO'I
RJES GNANG,

LUNG MAN NGAG SOGS GANG LA GANG 'TSAMS PA'I CHOS KYIS GDUL BYA
DPAG TU MED PA

SMIN GROL MDZAD, LHAG PAR MON MKHAR BKRA SHIS GDONG DU BZHUGS
SKABS RGYA GZHUNG

YANG DAM CHOS PADMA

ZHUGS

BLTA, ,

TU GNAS

PAR 'GYUR, ,BDE LA 'DUG NAS DE BZHIN CHOS KYANG STON, ,ZHES
GSUNGS

PA DANG DON GCIG TU MTHUN PAR, ZHAG NYER GCIG GI BAR SKU MTSAMS
BCAD NAS

RGYA BOD KYI 'GREL PA SOGS LA GZIGS RTOG MDZAD, DE NAS PHYAG DPE
TSANG MA SKU

RAGS BCINGS TE, RGYA GAR SKAD BCO LNGA'I DBU NYIN GCIG LA BTZUGS
NAS NYIN LTAR

THO RENGS NAS SROD KYI BAR LA CHOS THUN BCO LNGA RE CHAG MED
DANG, DE'I NANG NAS

GNYIS BTZUGS PA DANG BCAS,

@414 GSUM LA RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, DE YANG 'GREL BA SOGS LA SNGAR
GONG DU GZIGS

PA DE GA LAS GSUNG CHOS DNGOS GZHI'I TSE 'GREL BSHAD TSANG MA
THUGS THOG 'BA' ZHIG

NAS 'CHAD PA LAS PHYAG DPER ZHAR YANG GZIGS MA DGOS SHING, DE
LTAR MA

GZIGS KYANG TSIG DON TSANG MA THUGS LA MNGA' BAS GZHUNG CHEN
'GA' ZHIG BOD dIK

CHEN MO RE GZHIR BZHAG PA'I THOG TU 'GREL PA GZHAN GYIS 'CHAD
TSUL DU MA DGAG SGRUB

DANG BCAS PAS GTAN LA PHAB, GZHUNG GZHAN RNAMS RANG RANG GI
'GREL PA GANG

YANG RUNG BA'I STENG NAS GZHUNG PHRA RAGS MA LUS PA LA BSHAD PA
RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA STE,

DES NA DUS PHYIS DKA' BZHI BA SHER SENG GIS CHOS THOG GCIG LA PO
TI BCU GCIG

GSUNG BA BOD DU PO TI DUS GCIG TU GSUNGS PA LA MANG SHOS YIN
'DUG NA'ANG,

DE BAS KYANG LHAG PA'I SKABS 'DIR BOD BCO? LNGA DUS GCIG TU
'CHAD PA DANG, DER

MA ZAD DUS GZHAN DU'ANG POD BCU DANG, POD NYI SHU RTZA GCIG
DANG, POD NYI SHU RTZA DGU

SBREL NAS GSUNGS TSUL SNGAR GONG DU BKOD PA LTAR TE, 'DI DAG NI
BOD DU MA ZAD RGYA GAR

DU YANG MA BYUNG BAR MNGON TE, RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR GYI GTAM
BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA LAS,

'DI NI BOD DU MA ZAD SNGON RDO RJE GDAN GYI PAntI TA RNAMS KYIS
KYANG 'GRAN DU MED PA'I BRJOD

PA STE, GZUNGS LA DBANG THOB PA'I RNAM ROL STON PAR MDZAD PA NI
RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I GTAM

PHYIN PA'I GANG ZAG

MA GTOGS GZHAN DAG GIS CHA TZAM YANG BSGRUN DU MED PA'I MDZAD PA
CHES RMAD DU BYUNG

MO LUNG DU SDE SNOD 'DZIN

MANG DU GSUNGS,

GSUM GYI

@415 GDAN SA PA RNAMS KYIS THOG DRANGS PA'I SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA
BRGYA PHRAG MANG PO LA DBU MA

DGA' BA GDONG DU BYANG SA'I TSUL KHRIMS LE'U, BLA MA LNGA BCU
PA, RTZA LTUNG BCU

BZHI RNAMS KYI BSHAD PA RGYAS PAR STZAL, DE'I DBYAR RVA SGRENG

SDE RGYAN, DBUS MTHA', KUN BTUS, NYAN SA SOGS GUNG BSGRIGS

NYAMS BZANG PO

SKYES PA'ANG BYUNG, GNAM RTZE LDENG DU 'DUL BA'I PHYAG LEN LA
ZHUS DAG PHUL PHYIN

DU MDZAD DE 'DUL BSTAN RMANGS NAS BSOS SHING, DBU TSAD SOGS KYI
'CHAD NYAN

DU MA LA TSAD MA RNAM

GZHUNG DON

LAM GYI RIM PAR BSGRIGS NAS NYAMS LEN LA SBYAR BA'I SNGON MED
KYI LEGS BSHAD RGYAS

PAR GSUNGS, ,'ON BDE CHEN STENG DU LAM RIM DANG DBU TSAD KYI
DKA' BA'I GNAD

'GROL BA'I CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, 'OL DGA' BYAMS PA GLING DU LAM
RIM DANG,

BSKYED RDZOGS KYI CHOS DU MA DANG, SLOB DPON KLU BYANG GIS MDZAD
PA'I RNAM BZHAG

RIG PA'I tI KA MDZAD PA'I THOG NAS DON GNYER CAN RNAMS LA RIM
LNGA'I GNAD DON SPYI

DANG, KHYAD PAR DU RIM PA GSUM PA'I SGYU LUS BSGRUB TSUL GYI ZAB
GNAD THUN MONG

MA YIN PA RNAMS ZHIB PAR GSUNGS SHING, SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO MDZAD
PA'I STENG

NAS SNGAGS KYI RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DKA' GNAD RNAM BZHAG KYANG RGYAS
PA STZAL, BYANG

CHUB LUNG DU DGUN BZHUGS SKABS SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA BRGYA PHRAG DU
MA LA GSANG SNGAGS KYI

LAM RIM GSUNGS, DE'I PHYI LO DBYAR GNAS SE RA CHOS SDENGS SU
MDZAD SKABS GSANG

@416 'DUS RIM LNGA DANG, MA RGYUD KYI RDZOGS RIM 'GA' ZHIG DANG,
GZHAN YANG

SE RAR RTZA BA SHES RAB, DRANG NGES RNAS 'BYED, BZHI BRGYA PA,
SNGAGS

RIM CHEN MO'I THOG NAS SNGAGS KYI LAM RIM, RTZA LTUNG RNAM BSHAD
DANG, BLA

MA LNGA BCU PA, LAM RIM SOGS KYI BSHAD KHRID ZHIB PAR GNANG,
SKYID SMAD

GRUM BU LUNG DU DGUN BZHUGS SKABS DGE 'DUN STONG LONGS PAR LAM
RIM DANG, BDE

MCHOG L'U HI PA'I SGRUB THABS, MA RGYUD KYI RDZOGS RIM SOGS
RGYAS PAR STZAL, LHA LDAN

SMON LAM CHEN MO GSAR 'DZUGS SKABS DE'I RING NYIN LTAR BZHIN
SLOB DPON DPA' BOS

MDZAD PA'I SKYES RABS NAS CHOS THUN RE CHAG MED GSUNGS, SMON LAM
GROL NAS

DPYID SNGON MA LA SE RA CHOS SDINGS SU SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DRUG
BRGYA TZAM LA RTZA SHE, TSUL

KHRIMS LE'U, SGRUB THABS KUN BZANG, LAM RIM LA SOGS PA'I BSHAD
PA RGYAS

PAR STZAL, DPYID RTING MA LA ZANGS RI'I PHU CHIN DU SPYAN SNGA
BSOD BZANG PA DANG,

MKHAN CHEN RGYAL BZANG PAS GTZOS PA'I THEL BA'I RI PA MANG PO
DANG, GZHAN YANG

SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA MANG DU 'DUS PAR LAM RIM LA SOGS PA'I CHOS DU
MA GNANG, 'OL

GAR DBYAR GNAS SKABS DVAGS PO SOGS KYI RAB BYUNG MANG PO DANG
BCAS PA LA CHOS

BKA' DU MA STZAL, DE'I PHYI LO DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I
GLING DU LAM RIM DANG,

GSANG 'DUS 'GREL PA SGRON GSAL RIM LNGA DANG BCAS PA'I BSHAD PA
ZHIB RGYAS DANG,

MNGON PA KUN BTUS DANG SA SDE LA SOGS PA GZHUNG 'GANGS CHE DU
MA'I RNAM BZHAG DANG,

TSAD MA'I DKA' GNAS SOGS THEG PA CHEN PO'I CHOS KYI 'BYOR PA
DPAG TU MED PA

STZAL, DE'I PHYI LO SOGS LA 'ON GYI BKRA SHIS DO KHAR SDE SNOD
'DZIN PA BRGYA PHRAG

DU MA LA DBU TSAD DANG LAM RIM SOGS MANG DU GSUNGS, SLAR YANG
DGE LDAN DU

@417 PHEBS SHING, DE NAS BDE MCHOG L'U HI PA'I dIK CHEN DANG,
RDZOGS RIM

RNAL 'BYOR BZHI LDAN GYI KHRID YIG CHE CHUNG, SGRUB THABS SOGS
MDZAD PA RNAMS DANG,

GSANG 'DUS RTZA RGYUD DANG, 'GREL PA SGRON GSAL LA ZHUS DAG NAN
TAN DU MDZAD

NAS TSIG DON SHIN TU ZHIB PAR 'CHAD PA'I MCHAN BU RANG, MTHA'
GCOD, BSDUS

DON DANG BCAS PA BZHI SBRAGS SU GRAGS PA MDZAD PA'I STENG NAS
RGYUD KYI BSHAD PA MTHA'

DAG ZHIB CING RGYAS PAR STZAL, KHYI LO LA YANG DGE LDAN DU SDE
SNOD 'DZIN PA BRGYA

PHRAG DU MA PHYOGS NAS 'DUS PA DANG, GNYUG MAR GNAS PA'I DGE
'DUN DANG

BCAS PA LA CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYUN MI CHAD DU BSKOR, KHYAD PAR
DU DPAL GSANG

BA 'DUS PA'I 'GREL PA SGRON GSAL MCHAN DANG BCAS PA BZHI SBRAGS
SU GRAGS PA DANG,

BSHAD RGYUD 'GA' ZHIG DANG, RIM LNGA'I KHRID RGYAS PA, SBYOR BA
YAN LAG

DRUG GI KHRID RGYAS PA DANG, DUS 'KHOR GYI 'GREL CHEN DRI MED
'OD KYI BSHAD PA

CHES ZHIB PA DANG, GZHAN YANG DBU TSAD, LAM RIM, BDE MCHOG

LA SOGS PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS ZAB CING RGYA CHE BA DPAG TU
MED PA GSUNGS, PHAG

LO LA SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA MTHA' YAS PA LA DPYID DANG DBYAR GYI
RING DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE

MCHOG GI RTZA BA'I RGYUD KYI BSHAD PA SOGS CHES RGYA CHE 'BYAMS
KLAS SU BKA' DRIN CHE BAR

GYUR TE SPYIR MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA MTHA' DAG DANG, KHYAD PAR
DU GSANG CHEN RDO

RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA NYIN MO LTAR GSAL BAR MDZAD PA LA RGYAL
BA RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS

SU BYON PA DANG SGO THAMS CAD NAS MI GNYIS PAR GYUR TO, ,GONG DU
BKOD PA DE DAG

KYANG CHE LONG RAGS PA RNAMS YIN GYI GZHAN DU NI GDUL BAR BYA
BA'I 'GRO BA GCIG

GNYIS TSUN CHOD LA'ANG RANG RANG GI BLO DANG SKAL BAR 'TSAMS
PA'I DAM PA'I CHOS 'DOMS

@418 PAR MDZAD PA'I TSUL MTHA' KLAS TE MA LUS PA NI BRJOD PA'I
YUL LAS 'DAS SO, ,

GSANG SNGAGS ZAB MO'I DBANG RJES GNANG SOGS KYANG YONGS GRAGS SU
BKA' DOG PAR

MDZAD PA LAS SNOD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG DAG LA SHIN TU GSANG BA'I
SGO NAS STZAL BA NI SNGAR

SMOS PA LTAR, RDZING PHYI'I RAB GNAS SKABS SNOD LDAN GYI SLOB MA
BCU LA 'JAM DPAL

GSANG LDAN GYI DBANG CHEN STZAL BA DANG, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA LA 'JIGS

BYED KYI DBANG CHEN GNANG BA DANG, GZHAN YANG ZANG ZANG NE RING
PAS RJE'I 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM

GSUM GYI RNAM THAR DU, LA LA ZER DUS, CHOS RJE RONG PO BLO BZANG
GRAGS

PA ZHES PA'I MKHAS GRUB DE NYID KYIS, RI BO DGE LDAN SOGS SU RDO
RJE 'PHRENG BA'I

NANG GI DKYIL 'KHOR BZHI BCU ZHE GNYIS LHAG GI DBANG LUNG YONGS
RDZOGS GNANG BA'I

BRGYUD PA PHAL MO CHE YANG RJE RING PO CHE NAS BRGYUD PA YIN CES
SRENG BA LTAR NA, RDO

RJE 'PHRENG BA'I DBANG LUNG YANG GSUNGS PA'AM, 'CHAD PAR MDZAD
PA 'DUG STE,

ZHES DANG, YANG, DE NYID LAS, NE RING BUM 'DZIN TSUL KHRIMS BKRA
SHIS

BAS RONG PO CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA LA, RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA'I
DBANG DU MA ZHIG THOB

'DUG PA DANG, DE LTA BU'I LO RGYUS CUNG ZAD BRJOD KYIN 'DUG PA'I
PHYIR BDEN NAM

BSAM PA 'DUG GO  ,CES DANG, BSHAD PA SOGS MDZAD PA'I SKABS KYI

KHYAD CHOS LTA BU LA MTSON NA YANG, DE NYID LAS, MDOR NA DBANG
LUNG MAN

NGAG GANG GNANG RUNG SHIN TU MKHAS PA DANG, KHRID GANG GNANG
BA'I TSE YANG DMIGS

RIM DANG GO NYAMS SOGS SHIN TU GSAL BAR 'CHAD PA DANG, RGYUD
GZHUNG SOGS

KYI BSHAD PA MDZAD PA'I DUS SU NI DE BAS KYANG 'BYAMS KLAS PA
DANG, BSHAD SROL

MI 'DRA BA DU MA'I SGO NAS GSUNGS PA YIN TE, DPER NA BDE MCHOG
GI THAD DU

@419 BSHAD SROL YOD TSUL RJE RANG GIS MDZAD PA'I BDE MCHOG 'DOD
'JO'I NANG GI MCHAN

YIG TU GSUNGS PA LTAR DANG, DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RGYUD LA YANG
BSHAD SROL

MI 'DRA BA BCU BDUN GSAN CING GSUNG BA LTA BU YIN, YANG, RJE
NYID MDO

SNGAGS KYI CHOS GANG GSUNG RUNG BLA MA GZHAN GYIS TSAR MANG PO
RE GSUNGS PA LAS, RJE

NYID KYIS TSAR RER GSUNGS PA SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA LA PHAN PA
DANG, BSHAD

PA'I KLONG ZAB PA YIN TE, DE YANG RJE RIN PO CHE YID BZANG RTZA
BA'I BKA' LAS,

RJE RIN PO CHE TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RGYUD LA
BSHAD PA TSAR GCIG

GSUNGS PA DE, BLA MA GZHAN GYIS BSHAD LAS BSHAD PA BRGYA PHRAG
LAS LHAG PA'I BSTAN PA LA

PHAN THOGS BYUNG TSUL DEB THIR SNGON PO SOGS LAS BSHAD PA LTAR
GO DGOS PA YIN NO

ZHES DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS, GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR MDO SNGAGS
KYI BSHAD

PA RNAM DAG MDZAD PA LA BRTEN NAS, DBUR STOD PHYOGS SU RGYUD PA
GONG 'OG TU GRAGS

PA'I SNGAGS KYI GRVA SA RNAM DAG YOD PA DANG, GTZANG GI SRAD
LUNG PAR YANG SRAD RGYUD

DU GRAGS PA'I SNGAGS KYI GRVA SA RNAM DAG TSUGS PA DANG, YANG
GTZANG GI LHUN PO

RTZE DANG, DBUS KYI GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR DANG, SE 'BRAS GNYIS SOGS

SU GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM, DUS 'KHOR, KUN RIGS SOGS KYI SGRUB
MCHOD

RNAM DAG TSUGS PA DANG, YANG 'BRAS SPUNGS DANG SE RA SOGS SU MDO
PHYOGS

KYI PO STI MANG PO'I 'CHAD NYAN GYI GRVA SA TSUGS PA DANG, RI BO
DGE LDAN RANG DU

SNGAGS KYI BSHAD SGRUB CI RIGS PA BTZUGS PA DANG, GZHAN YANG
DGON PA CHE

CHUNG MANG POR 'DUL BA'I RNAM BSHAD DANG, 'DUL GRVA RNAM DAG
'DZUGS PAR MDZAD

PA SOGS MDOR NA MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN RNAM DAG YOD PA THAMS
CAD, PHYOGS

@420 GCIG NAS BU CHEN MKHAS GRUB MANG PO ZHIG GI MDZAD 'PHRIN
RNAM PAR DKAR BA LA BRTEN

NAS BYUNG BA YANG YIN KYANG, GTZO BOR RJE RANG GIS 'CHAD NYAN
GYI GRVA SA RNAM

DAG BTZUGS PA DANG, TSUGS PA LA BRTEN NAS BYUNG BA YIN, CES
GSUNGS

PA RNAMS NI NGES PAR DE DE BZHIN TE, DA LTA YANG GDAN SA CHEN PO
SE 'BRAS DGE

GSUM DANG, RGYUD GRVA STOD SMAD, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO SOGS SU MDO
SNGAGS

KYI 'CHAD NYAN NYAMS LEN RNAM PAR DAG PA'I RGYUN MA NYAMS PAR
GNAS PA DANG, DES

MTSON PA'I DBUS GTZANG DVAGS KONG, MDO KHAMS STOD SMAD, RGYA SOG
GI

YUL GRU SOGS THAMS CAD DU RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I DGON SDE CHE CHUNG
GRANGS MED PAS

KHYAB CING, DE THAMS CAD DU'ANG RANG RANG GI BGO SKAL DU BAB
PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI

BSHAD SGRUB DANG, 'DUL BA'I BCAS KHRIMS SOGS BSTAN PAR SMAN PA'I
BYA BA DUS

KYI MTHAR YANG NYAMS MI DMA' BAR YOD PA 'DI THAMS CAD GANG LAS
'BYUNG BA'I GZHI

MA DROS GNYIS PA LTA BU NI, RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYIS
BSTAN PA 'BA' ZHIG

LA DGONGS PA'I THUGS BSKYED TSAD MED PA KHO NAS MAD SNGAGS KYI
'CHAD NYAN RNAM PAR

DAG PAR MDZAD PA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI MTHU 'BA' ZHIG LAS BYUNG BA
YIN NO, ,YANG, NE

RING PAS MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR LAS, GSUNG SKAD KYI RTZA BA
KHAMS SKAD RE GYONG

ZHIG YOD ZER YANG DBUS GTZANG DU PHEBS PA SOGS KYI RANG SHUGS
YIN NAM, GSUNG

CHOS GNANG BA'I TSE GZHAN LAS GSUNGS 'JEBS SHING GDANGS SKAD
SNYAN PA DANG, 'BOL

BA ZHIG YOD ZER LA, YANG MDO SNGAGS KYI TSIG DON LA MI BDE BA
CHEN PO BYUNG BA DANG,

NYAMS RTOGS LA THE TSOM DANG, DOGS PA BYUNG BA RNAMS KYI DRI BA
CHE CHUNG CI ZHUS

KYANG KHYAD GSOD SOGS MI MDZAD CING, KHYED RNAM PA'I GO RTOGS DE
TSO DANG,

LA YANG BSHAD RGYU YOD,

DOGS PA RNAMS SEL

NGES KYI LEGS BSHAD DANG BKA' LUNG GNANG BA LA BRTEN NAS, MI
THA MAL PA'AM,

SPRO BAR 'GYUR BA DANG,

MTHA' DBUS GNYIS

GSUNG SKAD 'JAM ZHING

KHAR SGOG GCOGS

PA CHES MANG BA

ZHIG SDE SNOD LA

'THAS PAR GYUR PA,

LEN PA LA NYE

BAR 'KHO BA'I TSE RANG GI RGYUD 'DUL BAR BYED PA'I TSUL,
GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO DAG

BA NI CUNG ZAD KYANG

SHANG GI RING LUGS

LA GNAS BZHIN DU GSUNG RAB CHEN PO RNAMS 'CHI BA'I TSE DGOS PA

RJES SU MTHUN

PAR GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS PAR RLOMS PA LA LA ZHIG GI SEMS LA
YANG, RTZOD

PA'I RIG PA 'DIS GNAS SKABS SU GZHUNG LUGS KYI GO DON TZAM LA
PHAN CING, RTZAD

PA DANG LAN SOGS KYI TSE RIG PA RNO MYUR DANG, DAM BCA' BRTAN
PA SOGS LA PHAN

NGES KYANG LAM NYAMS SU LEN PA LA PHAN MI THOGS PAS NYAMS LEN
GYI GNAD DE DE LAS

BA, DE DAG NI RTZOD PA'I

RTZOD PA'I

CHED TZAM ZHIG TU NGES

CHUNG THAMS CAD

DU MI RUNG BA YIN PA'I

JI TZAM BZANG YANG,

@425 GRUB PAS RIG PA LA MA SBYANGS PA'I 'JIG RTEN PA SOGS KYI

GANG LA YANG

THOG MAR LAN CIG TZAM DRIS PA'I TSE GA DON MA LUS PA LEGS PAR

GO BA DE SPYI BRTOL DANG

BCAS TE SMRA PA'I KHUL BYED MOD KYANG, DE LA YANG SKYAR ZHIB
TU LAN CIG DRIS NA

BSHAD MA THAG PA'I DAM BCA' PHAL CHER ZHIG NAS LAN ZER NGO MI
'DOD PAR 'GYUR LA,

DA DUNG ZHIB CHA BRTZAD CING DRIS NA SNGAR LAB PA RNAMS BRJED
PA BZHIN DU GYUR NAS RANG TSIG

SNGA PHYI 'GAL BA DANG, DAM BCA'I RTZA BA RMANGS NAS ZHIG PA
SOGS KYIS BLUN PO'I

RANG MTSANG GSAL BOR STON PAR 'GYUR BA NI RIG PA LA MA SBYANGS
PA'I SKYON YIN CING,

NYE LA KHO NA RE, BRGAL ZHING BRTAGS PA SOGS KYI TSE GZHUNG
LUGS LA ZHIB TU MA

NYAMS LEN GYI GNAS

CHOG GA ZHE NA,

LEN BYA'I CHOS GANG

PA

SOGS PHRA ZHING PHRA BA

NYAMS RTOGS

TSIG SPYI'I GO BA YAM ME

GO RTOGS SOGS KYANG

BYAS PA'I, ,

NAS 'DUS BYAS

BYAS ZHES PA'I DON

DANG, DE SKAD CIG DANG SKAD CIG LA 'GYUR BA'I MI RTAG PA YIN
LUGS SOGS LUNG

PHAB CING, MI RTAG

PA LA'ANG RAGS PA DANG PHRA BA'I MI RTAG PA YOD LUGS SOGS
MTHA' CHOD PA'I NGES SHES

TZAM ZHIG GIS

KYANG MI RTAG PA RGYUD LA SKYE BA'I GO MI CHOD PAS DE'I DON
BCOS MA MA YIN PA RGYUD LA SKYE

TSOGS GSOGS

PA DANG, SDIG SGRIB SBYONG BA DANG, DON LA SEMS PA SOGS ZUNG
'BREL

DU BYAS NAS NYAMS SU BLANGS NA NAM ZHIG NA GO YUL TZAM MIN
PA'I MI RTAG PA'I DON JI

LTA BA BZHIN RTOGS PA'I NGES SHES RGYUD LA SKYE ZHING, DA DUNG
SGOM PA LAS MI RTAG

PA MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I SHE RAB SKYE BA YIN LA, DE BZHIN DU
ZAG BCAS THAMS

CAD SDUG BSNGAL BA DANG, CHOS THAMS CAD STONG ZHING BDAG MED
PA DANG, MYA

NGAN LAS 'DAS PA THAMS CAD ZHI BA'O, ,ZHES PA'I LTA BA BKA'
RTAGS KYI PHYAG RGYA

BZHI PO RE RE LA DE 'DRA BA'I GNAD YOD PAR SHES DGOS LA, DES
MTSON TE NYAMS

LEN GYI GNAD 'GAG GANG LA YANG MTHA' CHOD PA'I NGES SHES SKYE
BA LA RTZOD PA'I RIG PA

NGES PAR GAL CHE BA YIN, DE LA KHO NA RE, SNGON GYI GRUB THOB
GONG MA MANG PO ZHIG

GZHUNG LUGS 'DZIN RTZOD SOGS KYI SBYANGS PA MANG PO MA MDZAD
KYANG BLA MA'I MOS GUS

@427 DANG, DKA' SPYAD, SNYING RUS, SDUG RGUR SOGS LA BRTEN NAS

LAM ZAB MO NYAMS SU BZHES PA LAS GRUB PA'I GO 'PHANG MTHON POR
GSHEGS PA JI

SNYED CIG BYUNG SNANG BAS, 'TSANG RGYA BA LA NGES PAR THOS
BSAM SNGON DU 'GRO BA LA

LTOS DGOS PA MA YIN NO ZHE NA, DE LTA BU'I GRUB BRNYES RNAMS
NI SKU'I SKYE BA SNGON MA

RNAMS SU RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA LA THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM DANG,
TSOGS BSAGS

SGRIB SBYONG SOGS RGYA CHER MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA'I RGYUD TSOD
MTHON POR PHEBS ZIN PAS,

SKU TSE 'DIR THOS BSAM SOGS RGYA CHER MA MDZAD KYANG GSUNG RAB
KYI DON RNAMS DKA' BA

MED PAR THUGS RGYUD LA RTOGS SHING 'KHRUNGS LA, DE'I STENG DU
GANG ZAG PHAL DANG

PHAL GYI SEMS LA BSAM PAR YANG MI NUS PA'I BLA MA BSTEN TSUL
DANG, DKA'

SPYAD SNYING RUS TSAD MED PA MDZAD PA'I MTHU LAS GRUB PA'I GO
'PHANG BRNYES PA STE, DE

DAG LA GRUB MTHA' GZHAN GYI CHOS SKAD LA DBANG RNON CIG CHAR
BA DANG, DBANG BRTUL

RIM GYIS PA ZHES PA GNYIS BSHAD PA'I NANG GI DBANG RNON CIG
CHAR BA STE RIN PO CHE LTA

BU'I GANG ZAG DANG MTSUNGS PA'I RIGS YIN LA, DE DAG KYANG SKYE
BA SNGON MA RNAMS

SU THOS BSAM DANG, TSOGS BSAGS PA SOGS MDZAD PA'I MTHU LAS
BYUNG BA YIN

PA LAS THOG MAR LAS DANG PO PA'I DUS NYID NAS, GANG YANG MA
BSLAB CI YANG MI

SHES PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS KHO NA BZUNG NAS NYAMS LEN THAN THUN
'GA' ZHIG TZAM MDZAD PAS

GROL BA NI GTAN NAS MIN CING, DES NA SNGAR GYI DUS SU SBYANGS
PA SNGON DU SONG ZIN

GYI GANG ZAG KHYAD PAR CAN DBANG RNON GYI RIGS CAN MANG DU
MCHIS PAS, DE DAG

TSE 'DIR GZHUNG LUGS LA CHED GNYER GYIS SBYANGS PA SOGS KYI
NGAL BA LA CHER LTOS MA

DGOS PAR, BLA MA'I MOS GUS DANG, DKA' SBYAD SDUG RGUR SOGS KYI
SGO

@428 NAS NYAMS LEN LA 'BAD PAS RTOGS PA MTHON POR GSHEGS NUS
PA DE DANG DE 'DRA BA'I

GANG ZAG RNAMS LA DGONGS NAS, JO BO CHEN POS KYANG, TSE 'DI
YUN THUNG

SHES BYA'I RNAM PA MANG, ,TSE YI TSAD KYANG JI TZAM MI SHES
PAS, ,NGANG PAS

CHU LA 'O MA LEN PA LTAR, ,RANG GI 'DOD PA DANG DU BLANG BAR
BYA, ,ZHES DANG,

RNAL 'BYOR DBANG PHYUG MI LA RAS PAS, SH'AKA THUB BSTAN PA'I
SNYIGS MA LA, ,MI

RNAMS TSE THUNG LONGS SPYOD DBUL, ,BDUD RIGS BAR GCOD MANG
BA'I PHYIR, ,

BU RGYUD SDE'I MKHYEN RGYA MI 'TSAL GYI, ,SGRUB PA SNYING POR
LONGS SHIG GSUNGS, ,

ZHES PA LTA BUS THOS BSAM LA CHED GNYER GYIS MA BSKUL BAR
SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA

BSKUL BAR MDZAD LA, TSUL DE LTAR DU NYAMS SU BLANGS PA LAS
GROL BA THOB PA YANG

JI SNYED CIG BYUNG MOD KYANG, RIM GYIS DUS SNYIGS MAR GYUR PA
NA SBYANGS PA SNGON

SONG GI GANG ZAG DBANG RNON NI SHIN TU NYUNG ZHING, DBANG PO
RTUL PO'I RIGS CAN

KHO NA SHAS CHE BAR GYUR NA'ANG, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS
GANG ZAG GI RGYUD TSOD

DANG BSTUN NAS GSUNGS PA DE DBANG PO RNO RTUL THAMS CAD LA
RGYAS 'GEBS KYI SGRA JI

BZHIN PAR BZUNG NAS, THOS BSAM BYED PA NI SNYING PO MED PA'I
SBUN PA 'PHYAR BA DANG

MTSUNGS PAS 'TSANG RGYA BA LA CI YANG MI PHAN NO ZHES THOS
BSAM RTZA LTAR DOR TE NYAMS

LEN 'GA' ZHIG LA 'BAD KHUL BYAS KYANG, GONG MA RNAMS LTA BU'I
NYAMS RTOGS

KYANG MA SKYES, THOS BSAM GYI SHES RAB KYANG MED, THUN MONG
LAS SBYANG GI

CHOS SNA GCIG TZAM LA'ANG MYONG BA MTHON PA'I NAG THOM ME BAR
LUS PA'I NGANG DU MI TSE

ZAD PA'ANG 'GA' DANG 'GA' MTHONG ZHING, TSUL DE DANG DE 'DRA
BA DAG LA DGONGS NAS

'JAM MGON SA PAn GYIS, SGOM NA THOS PA MI DGOS ZHES, ,BLUN PO
BLO RGYA

@429 CHUNG RNAMS SMRA, ,THOS PA MED PA'I SGOM PA DE, ,'BAD
KYANG DUD 'GRO'I SGOM

THABS YIN, ,CES GSUNGS PA DANG, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PAS,

DE BZHIN DU GSANG SNGAGS LA RIG PA'I DPYAD PA DOR BAR BYA BA
YIN NO, ,ZHES BYA

BA'I BLUN GTAM TSOGS SU BSGRAGS PAS SDE SNOD LA BLO KHA CUNG
ZAD KYANG MA PHYOGS PA'I

GSANG SNGAGS PAR KHAS 'CHE BA DAG ,BLUN PO RANG DANG MTHUN PAS
MGU ,

ZHES BYA BA'I TSUL GYIS SHIN TU YA MTSAN PAR GYUR TE, GSANG
SNGAGS LA RTOG GE'I

DPYAD PA BYAR MED DO ZHES BYA BA'I TSIG 'DI TZAM LA SKYABS SU
BZUNG NAS PHYI ROL PA'I

GRUB MTHA' LAS KYANG DMAD PAR BYA BA'I LUGS, LUNG RIG LA BLO
KHA MA PHYOGS

PA'I BLUN PO DAG GIS BSAM NAS RNYED PA'I DON LA BLA MA'I MAN
NGAG LAS 'ONGS PA'I

GSANG SNGAGS KYI LAM GYI GNAD MTHAR THUG PA'O, ,ZHES BSGRAGS
PAS PHAL CHE BA

DAG RTOG DPYOD MI BYED PAR TSUL 'DI NYID LA YID BRTEN PAR BYED
CING, DE'I MTHUS

RGYUD SDE'I DGONGS PA GRUB CHEN GYIS BKRAL BA'I LAM GYI GNAD
MTHAR THUG PA DAG MING

TZAM YANG MA LUS PAR BYED DO, ,ZHES DANG, DE BZHIN DU BSAM
GTAN LHUR LEN PA

NANG LA GZHOL BAS NI GSUNG RAB DANG DGONGS 'GREL GYI BSTAN
BCOS DAG LA BLTA BA

DANG NYAN PA LA SOGS PA NI SPANG BAR BYA BA YIN TE, DE DAG NI
PHYI'I GO RGYA GCOD PA TZAM

MA GTOGS NANG SEMS KYI GNAS LUGS SEMS PA'I TSE RNAM PAR
G-YENG BA'I RGYU YIN

CING, DE DAG MED KYANG BLA MA'I MAN NGAG LAS GNAS LUGS RTOGS
PAR 'GYUR BAS

DANG, GZUNGS SNGAGS KHYAD

BA LA SOGS PA

LUGS KYI DON 'BA'

@430 ZHIG BSGOM PAR BYA LA, GNAS LUGS KYI DOM SGOM PA LA NI
RIG PA'I RJES SU 'BRANGS

GCIG TU SMRA BAR

BA LA LA DAG KYANG,

TSE RGYAL BA'I

TU SGRUB PA BYED PA

LA CIR YANG

MI RTZI BAR THOS BSAM LTAR SNANG TZAM 'BA' ZHIG LA ZHEN NAS
'CHIB 'I TSE 'GYOD MED KYI

GDENGS SNA GCIG KYANG MED PAR RANG RGYUD SKAM THAG GE BA'I NGANG
NAS TSE'I DUS BYED PA

GRANG LTAR

'GAL BAR BZUNG NAS LAM LOG PAR GOL BA MANG DU BYUNG BA NA, YANG
MKHAS GRUB

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS, DE LTAR RGYAL BAS TSUL KHRIMS GZHIR BYAS
NAS GNAS LUGS

THOS BSAM GYIS GTAN LA PHAB CING, DE'I DON SGOM BYUNG GIS YID LA
BYED PA'I

BSLAB PA GSUM GYI GO RIM RJES SU 'GRO LDOG MI 'KHRUL BAR GSUNGS
PA DE NYID 'BAD

PA'I 'GOG CING, SNGAGS DANG PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, THOS PA
DANG SGOM

LA SOGS PA PHAN TSUN TSA GRANG LTAR 'GAL BAR BSAMS NAS SUN 'BYIN
PA DANG,

THAMS CAD KYIS KYANG DAM PA'I CHOS 'DUL BA'I BSLAB KHRIMS RNAM
PAR DAG PA LA SNYING

THAG PA NAS SUN 'BYIN PAR BYED PA'I SGO NAS KHA BA CAN GYI
LJONGS 'DIR RGYAL PA'I BSTAN

PA GZUGS BRNYAN TZAM ZHIG LHAG MAR GYUR PA'I TSE, RJE BTZUN RIN
PO CHE 'DI NYID DAM

PA'I CHOS 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM RLABS PO CHE YONGS SU GRUB PA'I
MTHUS BYANG PHYOGS KYI

RGYUD 'DIR BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE GSO BA'I SLAD DU NYE BAR BYON DE,
ZHES GSUNGS

PA LTAR 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA 'DI NYID SNYIGS MA'I GDUL
BYA RNAMS LA LHAG

PAR BRTZE BA CHEN POS BSAM BZHIN DU SRID PA NYE BAR BZUNG NAS
RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA JI

BYUNG BA 'DI NYID KYI SROL

@432 BTOD PAR MDZAD LA, 'DI NI SPYIR GDUL BYA DBANG PO MCHOG
DMAN THAMS CAD KYIS

NYAMS SU BLANG BYA'I GNAS THUN MONG BA MED DU MI RUNG BA YIN PAR
MA ZAD, NANG TSAN

RANG CAG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I 'GRO BA BLO DMAN ZHING DBANG PO
RTUL BO SHAS CHE BA RNAMS

LA NI LAM LA DKRI BA'I THABS MKHAS RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I BKA' DRIN
STZAL BA YIN TE,

JI LTAR ZHE NA, RANG CAG LAS DANG PO BA RNAMS KYIS THOS BSAM
DANG THUN MONG LAM

GYIS RGYUD SBYANGS PA TZAM SNGON DU MA SONG BAR, SNGAR GYI GANG
ZAG KHYAD PAR CAN SBYANGS

PA SNGON SONG DBANG PO MCHOG GI RIGS CAN RNAMS KYI BRTUL ZHUGS
BZUNG STE DANG PO NAS

RDZOGS RIM LA SOGS PA'I LAM MTHO MTHO MO DANG, CHOS ZAB ZAB MO
LA 'JUG

KHUL BYAS NA ZUNG ZAD KYI NAD PAS ZAS BCUD CAN BSTEN PA LTAR MI
PHAN PA'I STENG DU NYES

BA DU MA BSKYED PA YIN PAS RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS JI LTAR BSTAN
PA LTAR, THOG

MAR NYAMS SU LEN BYA'I CHOS RNAMS THOS BSAM GYIS LEGS PAR GTAN
LA PHAB CING,

THOS BSAM BYED PA'I DUS NYID NAS JI LTAR THOS PA'I DON RNAMS
RGYUD STENG DU BKAL BA'I

NYAMS LEN LA SBYOR GANG THUB KYIS MGO BSHES GNYEN BSTEN TSUL NAS
BZUNG THUN MONG

LAM SBYANGS KYI RIM PA RNAMS LA MYONG BA THON NGES SU BYAS, DE
NAS DBANG THOB CING

DAM TSIG DANG SDOM PA TSUL BZHIN DU SRUNG BA'I SGO NAS LAM
BSKYED RDZOGS KYI NYAMS LEN LA

RIM GYIS 'BAD NA BGEGS DANG GOL SA CHUNG ZHING, LAM GYI RIM PA
RNAMS 'DI

DANG PHYI MA'I GNAS SKABS SU TSUL BZHIN DU RGYUD LA SKYE BAR
'GYUR BA YIN LA, LAM

LA SLOB TSUL 'DI NI RI BO DGE LUGS PA KHO NAR MA ZAD SA RNYING,
KAR 'BRUG

SOGS GRUB MTHA' GZHAN GYI LAM SROL LA YANG THUN MONG DU YOD PA
ZHIG YIN NA YANG,

DENG SANG GI DUS SU THUN MONG LAM SBYANGS SOGS LA SNANG CHUNG DU
BYAS NAS DANG PO NAS

@433 LAM MTHON PO'I NYAMS LEN LA 'JUG BLO BYED PA MANG BAR SNANG
MOD, DE LA BRTEN NAS

SNGAR GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR BSAGS SBYANGS SOGS KYIS RGYUD
SBYANGS PA YANG MED, SGOM

PA'I NYAMS MYONG YANG MED, THOS BSAM GYI SHES RAB DANG YANG BRAL
BA MANG BAR SNANG

BAS GRUB MTHA' GZHAN DAG 'DZIN PA RNAMS KYIS KYANG LAM LA SLOB
TSUL 'DI BZHIN DU BYAS

NAS RANG RANG GI CHOS LA NYAMS LEN BYAS NA SA CHOD CHE ZHING DAL
'BYOR DON DANG LDAN PA

'ONGS RIS SU SNANG NGO, ,YANG GANG ZAG GI RIGS LA LA ZHIG DBANG
PO RTUL BAS TSE

'DIR GZHUNG LUGS RGYA CHEN PO LA SLOB PA SOGS MA NUS NA RANG
RANG GIS KHAS BLANGS

PA'I TSUL KHRIMS DAG PA GZHIR BZUNG BA'I SGO NAS SO SO'I BLO
DANG SKAL BAR 'TSAMS

PA'I PHYAG SKOR MAndAL SOGS BSAGS SBYANGS DANG, LHAG PA'I LHA'I
BSNYEN SGRUB

SOGS SGO GSUM GYI DGE BA GANG 'GRUB DANG, ZANG ZING GI RNAM DKAR
SOGS JI

LTAR 'OS PA BGYIR MI RUNG BA NI MA YIN TE, STON PA THUGS RJE CAN
GYIS GDUL BYA

LAM LA DKRI BA'I SGO MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, 'ON
KYANG DE 'DRA BA'I

GANG ZAG RNAMS KYIS KYANG TSE 'DIR GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS BSAM SOGS
MA NUS NA YANG

TSE RABS PHYI MA RNAMS SU NGES PAR SLOB NUS PA'I SMON LAM RNAM
DAG TSUN CHAD LA 'BAD

DGOS TE, MTHAR 'TSANG RGYA BA LA THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM TSANG LA MA
NOR BA'I SGO

NAS LAM GYI LUS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA LA MA BSLAB PAR, BSAGS
SBYANGS DANG,

THAMS CAD MKHYEN

BA'I RMONGS ZHEN GYIS

ZHUGS MI BZUNG

DANG, SGRA

@434 JI BZHIN PA DANG, SGRA JI BZHIN PA MA YIN PA DANG, DNGOS
BSTAN DANG SHUGS

BSTAN SOGS KYI DGONGS PA LEN LUGS LEGS PAR SHES PAR BYAS NAS DON

,YANG

GRONG MCHOG TU, ,

BLANG DOR GYI

RNAM DAG BYA DGOS PA

RES 'GA' BA TZAM

YIN TE, KUN SLONG BYANG

MI 'GRO BA'I THABS MED LA,

PO DMA' DBAB

CHOS RNAMS

PAR RANG

PA NI TSUL 'DI LTA

PAR CAN DE DANG

DE LTA BU LA BRTEN NAS RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS KYANG GDUL BYA
RNAMS LAM RNAM PAR DAG PA

PA'I

@436 MDO SDE RGYAN SOGS BYAMS CHOS RNAMS LA RTZOL BA CHEN POS
'DZIN RTZOD THUGS SBYONG

MDZAD PAS LO GNYIS TZAM LA PHAR PHYIN GYI TSIG DON LA SHIN TU
MKHAS PAR GYUR NAS,

DGUNG LO BCU DGU'I STENG DU GSANG PHU DANG BDE BA CAN LA SOGS PA
RNAMS SU PHAR PHYIN

GYI GRVA SKOR MDZAD PAS BLO GROS DANG CHOS SKAD PHUN SUM TSOGS
PA'I BDAN RING DU SKYONG

BAR GYUR, DE NAS GTZANG DU BYON TE SA SKYAR PHAR PHYIN GYI GRVA
SKOR MDZAD, DE

GA'I 'PHRO 'THUD DE LA STOD BYANG LA BYON NAS 'DAR BZANG LDAN,
NGAMS RING, 'GA'

RONG CHOS SDE RNAMS SU'ANG GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DE NAS CHOS GRVA
CHEN PO AER GRVA SKOR

MDZAD NAS SNAR THANG DU PHEBS, SNAR THANG GI MKHAS PA BLA MA LO
TZA BA DON BZANG LA

BSAM BZANG GI dI KA'I STENG NAS MDZOD KYI BSHAD PA GSAN, NYANG
STOD DU PHEBS NAS

GNAS RNYING DU BZHUGS SHING, GNAS RNYING PA'I GZUNG SGRUB KYI
STENG DU PHAR PHYIN GYI GRVA

SKOR MDZAD, DBYAR CHOS LA RTZE CHEN DU PHEBS NAS MKHAS PA'I
DBANG PO NYA DBON KUN

DGA' DPAL BA LAS PHAR PHYIN GYI GZABS BSHAD GSAN, DE DUS RJE
BTZUN RED MDA'

PA'ANG DBYAR DE RTZE CHEN DU PHEBS 'DUG PA LA THOG MAR MNGON PA
MDZOD RANG 'GREL GYI

STENG NAS MDZUB KHRID DU CHOS THUN KHA SHAS GSAN, RJES SU 'CHAD
NYAN GYI LUGS SU

MDZAD NAS KYANG GSAN, STON DE RJE BTZUN PA DANG DPON SLOB GNYIS
KAS NYANG STOD BSAM

GTAN GLING DU CHOS DBAR LA BYON NAS RJE BTZUN PA LA DBU MA 'JUG
PA'I BSHAD PA GSAN,

STON MJUG NYANG STOD NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SKYOR MO LUNG PA'I
MKHAN PO DKA' BZHI BA BLO

GSAL ZHES PA 'DUL BA LA SHIN TU MKHAS PA DE LAS 'DUL BA MDO RTZA
BA 'GREL PA CHA

LAG DANG BCAS PA RDZOGS PAR GSAN TE KHONG GI THUGS LA MNGA' BA'I
BSHAD SROL MTHA'

DAG THUGS SU CHUD CING KHYAD PAR LHAG PAR RTOGS, DE'I DGUN
GTZANG DU BYON NAS

@437 GNAS RNYING DU BZHUGS, DPYID DUS SA SKYAR BYON NAS RJE
BTZUN RED MDA' PA CHEN

PO LAS LAM 'BRAS SOGS GSAN PA'I NGANG NAS KUN BTUS KYI GZABS
BSHAD GSAN,

DE'I TSE GTZO BOR TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD CING
DBU MA 'JUG PA SOGS KYI

BSHAD PA'ANG GSAN, RJE BTZUN PAS MNGON PA KUN BTUS KYI tIKA CHEN
MO RTZOM PA'ANG

RJE 'DIS THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD CING, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI
RGYAS BSHAD KYANG

TSAR GCIG GSAN, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE DE'I DGUN CHOS BDE BA
CAN DU

BZHUGS, DPYID CHOS SNGON MA LA GTZANG DU GRVA SKOR MDZAD BZHED
KYIS PO STI 'GA'

LA GZIGS RTOG MDZAD NAS GTZANG DU BYON, SNAR THANG DU BLA MA LO
TZA BA DON BZANG

BAS TSAD MA'I dI KA ZHIG MDZAD 'DUG PA GSAN, DBYAR CHOS LA SNAR
THANG DU RNAM

'GREL, MNGON PA GONG 'OG GNYIS, 'DUL BA DANG BCAS PA'I GRVA SKOR
MDZAD,

STON CHOS LA BLA MA RJE BTZUN PA CHEN PO CHOS DBAR LA AER BYON
PA GSAN PAS DER

BYON TE GTZO BOR DBU TSAD MNGON PA RNAMS GSAN CING, PHAR PHYIN
DANG 'DUL

BA YANG TSAR RE GSAN, DE NAS SA SKYAR BYON NAS GONG DU SMOS PA'I
DKA' CHEN RNAMS

KYI GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU BYON NAS SOS KA GUNG THANG
TSES BCU'I GNAS

SKABS NAS BZUNG STE RIM PA BZHIN GSANG PHU, RTZES DANG LA SOGS
PA'I GRVA SA CHEN

PO RNAMS SU PHAR PHYIN SNGAR NAS MDZAD TSAR BA'I 'PHROS DKA'
CHEN LHAG MA BZHI'I GRVA SKOR

MDZAD LA, DE LTA BU'I GRVA SKOR SNGA PHYI'I GNAS SKABS DANG,
GZHAN YANG GNAS

DUS NGES MED DU DBUS GTZANG GI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN POR
RLOMS PA MANG PO

DANG BRGAL ZHING BRTAGS PA'I RTZOD PA MDZAD PA GANG GI TSE
NA'ANG, NGA RGYAL DANG DREGS

PA DANG, KHENGS RLOMS BSUN 'BYIN SOGS GTAN NAS MI MDZAD CING,
TSAD LDAN

@438 GYI GSUNG RAB DANG, BSHES GNYEN BZANG PO DPANG DU BZHAG NAS
DKA' GNAD JI

'DRA ZHIG LA RTZOD PA MDZAD KYANG RJE NYID KHO NA RTZOD PA BZANG
BA DANG, MKHAS PA'I SNYAN

GRAGS KYI RGYAL RNGA KUN TU KHYAB STE GDUL BYA GANG SU YANG RUNG
BA THAMS CAD DAD PA DANG

GUS PA'I DPAL LA DBANG MED DU SBYOR BAR MDZAD PA YIN TE, RNAM
THAR NGO MTSAR

GYI GTAM BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA LAS, DE LTAR CHOS KYI RNAM PAR
DBYE BA KUN LA RANG NYID

DPYIS PHYIN KYANG PHYI RABS MIG RGYAN BZANG PO'I SROL BZHAG GI
LUNG GI CHOS 'KHOR LA

ZOL GYIS MA BSLAD PA'I DGOS DON GYIS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU'I THOG
GSANG PHUR

BYAMS CHOS KYI GRVA SKOR GCIG ,BDE BA CAN DU PHAR PHYIN GYI GRVA
SKOR GCIG ,

SNAR THANG DU 'DUL BA, MNGON PA, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GSUM LA GRVA
SKOR,

RTZES DANG DU PHAR PHYIN MA GTOGS PA'I DKA' CHEN PHYI MA RNAMS
KYI GRVA SKOR, SA SKYAR GRVA

SKOR GCIG STE, MDOR NA DE DAG GI TSE LHAG PA DANG, CHAD PA DANG,
'KHRUG

PA DANG, NOR PA DANG, ZLOS PA DANG, MA 'BYOR BA SOGS SKYON

GYI CHA TZAM YANG MED PAR GLEGS BAM SO SO'I SPYI SKAD, GRUB
MTHA' SO SO'I

'JOG TSUL DGAG SGRUB KYI GNAD SOGS SNGAR MA GRAGS PA'I LEGS
BSHAD BDUD RTZIS

GZU BOR GNAS PA'I DPYOD LDAN RNAMS DGA' ZHING NGO MTSAR BA'I
BCUD KYIS TSIM PA DANG,

GRAGS PA'I SENG GE'I NGA ROS BOD YUL GYI KHENGS LDAN GNYIS THUNG
SUN 'BYIN GYI SNA ZHAGS

CAN MA LUS PA ZHUM PA DANG 'JIGS PA'I KHUR GYIS NON PAR MDZAD PA
NI RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I

GTAM NYER BDUN PA'O, ,ZHES DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS MDO KHAMS NAS

PHEBS PHRAL NAS SBYOR BA RTZI BA'I GNAS SKABS DANG, PHYIS KYANG
RIG PA ZLA MED DU

GRAGS PA'I STON PA SU ZHIG DANG BRGAL YANG, GANG GZHIR BZHAG
PA'I GRUB MTHA'I

@439 GDOD LAS MI 'DA' ZHING, RANG GI ZHAL 'DZIN LA LDOG 'JUG GI
GLAGS SKABS

MI RNYED PA DANG, PHA ROL PO'I PHYOGS LA DNGOS SHUGS KYI GNOD
PA'I MTSON THOG

LTAR 'BEBS PA DANG, DE YANG RANG LUGS KYI CHA RNAM PAR DAG PA'I
CHE 'DON DU

PHYOGS LAS YONGS SU RGYAL BA'I 'KHOR GSUM KHRIMS KYI DHU NDHU
BHI'I SGRA SNYAN POR SGROG PA

LAS, GZHAN DU RLOMS SEMS KYI CHO NGES MGRIN PA 'DRAL 'DRAL DU
'DEBS PA

SOGS MI MDZAD PAS RTZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU SON PA STE RMAD DU BYUNG
BA'I GTAM SO BDUN

PA'O, ,ZHES DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS, DE'I DUS NA GTZANG PHYOGS
KYI DGON

GRVA RNAMS SU SA DGE'I CHAGS SDANG DANG, LHAG PAR DAM PA 'DI'I
LEGS BSHAD

GSAR PA RNAMS RIN PO CHE'I MUU GU LTAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I DBANG
GIS SA SKYA'I RIG SMRA'I

DVANG MA PHAL CHER 'DI NYID KYI SLOB MAR ZHUGS PA DANG, JO NANG
BO DONG SOGS KYI

YIG GZHUNG RNYING PA LA YOD PA'I MA DAG PA DANG, MA YIN PA, MA
NGES PA'I TSIG DON

DU MA LA'ANG RANG SHUGS KYI DGAG PA GNAD DU PHOG PA MANG DAG
BYUNG BA'I RKYEN MA BZOD

PA'I LE LAN ZHE LA BRNAGS NAS SUN 'BYIN PAR BRTZAMS BA'I TSE,
'JAM DBYANGS

KYIS THOG MAR 'DRA ZHAL MJAL BAR BYOS SHIG CES GSUNG BAS BSKUL
TE, RDO RJE NAG

PO CHEN PO'I BSE ZHAL LA GZIGS PAS DAndA DKAR PO'I STENG DU GSER
GYI YI GE 'DUG

PA TSAD MA'I GZHUNG GI TSIGS SU BCAD PA GCIG TU GZIGS SHING, DE
NYID RTAGS

CAN DU MKHYEN NAS DPYAD PA NA, DE'I SKABS KYI RGOL BA SNGA PHYI
DANG, TSUL GSUM

PA'I GTAN TSIGS KYI RIGS LAM, SGRUB DANG SUN 'BYIN GYI CHA,
BRGAL ZHING

BRTAG PA LA NGES PA'I DBANG MTHO BA'I SPOB PA DANG LDAN PAR GYUR
PA NA, MI SRUN PA'I

SKYES BU DES 'BEL GTAM GYI TSUL DU DA LTA'I TSIG DE NYID GZHUNG
SKYUR DU BYAS TE LAN MED

@440 DU RE BA LA, DAM PA 'DI'I CHOS MTHUN GYI SGO NAS DE'I DON
'DI DANG 'DI LTA BU YIN

ZHES RGYU MTSAN RTZAD NAS PHYUNG BAS BRTUL BA NI RMAD DU BYUNG
BA'I GTAM DRUG CU PA'O, ,

ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, SNGAR GONG DU BKOD ZIN LTAR RGYAL TSAB DAR
MA RIN CHEN

DBUS GTZANG GNYIS KAR RTZOD PA BZANG BA'I DPER GRAGS PA YIN
NA'ANG, RJE THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA DANG THOG MAR MJAL NAS RTZOD PA'I TSE RJE'I ZHAL
NAS LUNG RIG NYUNG ZAD

TZAM RE GSUNGS PAS KYANG RGYAL TSAB RJE'I KHAS LEN DANG DAM BCA'
RNAMS RANG ZHIG LA

SONG STE SMRA BA'I SPOBS PA RMEG MED DU MDZAD PA DANG, GZHAN
YANG ZANG ZANG NE RING

PA'I GSUNG LAS, GLANG GI LO LHA SAR SMON LAM CHEN MO MDZAD DUS
DGE 'DUN

STONG PHRAG DU MA SOGS 'DUS SHING, BON PO'I YOG THANG DGON PA'I
RIN PO CHE

DPON SLOB MANG POS KYANG ZAS NOR STOBS CHE BA PHUL BA SOGS LONGS
SPYOD BSAM GYIS

MI KHYAB PA BYUNG BA'I TSE, MI PHAL MO CHES 'DI NI CHOS RJE 'DI
NYID SPRUL PA'I SKU YIN

PA LA BRTEN NAS BYUNG BA YIN ZER BA DANG, GRUB THOB YIN PA'I
RTAGS SU 'DUG ZER

BA DANG, MKHAS GRUB YIN PA'I RTAGS SU 'DUG ZER BA BYUNG YANG,
BLO CHUNG

BA DANG, TSOGS MA BSAGS PA DANG, LOG LTA CAN KHA CIG NA RE, CHOS
RJE

TZONG KHA PAS DBANG BSDUD KYI THABS ZHIG MDZAD PA YIN ZER BA
BYUNG BA BZHIN, DPAL

SA SKYA PA'I DGE BSHES CHEN PO RATNA SHRI RU GRAGS PA DE NYID
KYI THUGS LA YANG LOG RTOG

DE GA SHAR NAS, DGE 'DUN DANG BCAS PA'I DBUS SU RJE RANG LA ZHU
BA 'DI LTAR

PHUL BA YIN ZER TE, RJE RIN PO CHE LAGS DBANG BSDUD RNAMS KYI
NANG NAS GANG

ZAB PAR GDA' LAGS ZHUS PAS, RJE'I BKA' LUNG LA, BLA MA PA DBANG
BSDUD

RNAMS KYI NANG NAS CHOS BZHIN BYAS PA DE GA ZAB PAR BYUNG GSUNGS
PA'I TSE, MKHAS

@441 PA'I THUGS LA 'JIGS SNANG DANG DAD SNANG GNYIS KA RANG
DBANG MED PAR BYUNG BA YIN ZER

ZHING, MKHAS PA GZHAN THAMS CAD RGOL BA RANG ZHIG LA 'GRO BA
DANG, SGROG

RANG GDAL LA 'GRO BA BYUNG ZER BA'I DPES MTSON TE BRGAL LAN NAM,
THAL 'GYUR

DANG, RIG PA RNAMS LA GSUNG TSIG TSAN PA RE RES PHYIR RGOL 'JIGS
SO COG

THAMS CAD SKAD CIG LA 'JOMS NUS ZHES PA MKHAS GRUB SNGA MA MANG
PO'I GSUNG LAS

BYUNG BA YANG RJE RIN PO CHE'I RTZOD PA BZANG BA'I RNAM THAR ZAB
MO GCIG TU BZUNG ZHIG ,

CES DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS, RJE'I GSUNG RAB RNAMS LA THOS BSAM
DANG,

RIGS GRVA MDZAD PA DANG, BGRO GLENG MDZAD PA PHAL CHE BA YANG
RTZOD PA BZANG BA DANG,
