DOGS PA BZANG

BA'AM, ZAB PA'I RANG SHUGS DANG, RTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN NAS BYUNG
BA YIN NO, ,

ZHES GSUNGS TE GONG DU SMOS PA'I KHYAD CHOS DE DAG NI MDO SNGAGS
GANG GI THAD LA YANG

MTSUNGS SHING, LHAG PAR SNGAGS KYI RGYUD SDE KUN LA SBYANGS PA
PHUL PHYIN DU MDZAD

PA NI SNGAR GONG DU RGYAS PAR BKOD PA RNAMS KYIS SHES LA, DMIGS
GSAL SNGAGS KYI

DAM BCA' SOGS MDZAD TSUL NI RNAM THAR RNAMS SU GSAL BAR 'KHOD PA
MI SNANG ZHING,

MDOR NA MDO SNGAGS RIGS GNAS SOGS GANG GI THAD LA YANG RJE BDAG
NYID CHEN POR

TSUL BZHIN DU RGOL BAR NUS PA NI SU YANG MA BYUNG STE, DE DAG NI
RTZOD PA'I YON

TAN PHUL DU PHYIN PA MNGA' TSUL MDO TZAM CHED DU BRJOD PA'O,
,SMRAS PA, RGYA CHEN GZHUNG

GZHAL NA, ,

BSAM PA'I TSUL LA

PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS

@442 BZUNG NA YANG, ,KUN MKHYEN 'BRAS BU 'BYIN PAR MI NUS PAS,
,MANG DU THOS PA

@443 LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' MDO RGYUD JI SNYED CIG GSUNGS PA DANG,
DE'I DGONGS PA

'GREL BA'I BSTAN BCOS SNGON BYON 'PHAGS BOD KYI MKHAS GRUB RNAMS
KYIS MDZAD PA

LAS LHAG PA'I DON GSAR DU STON RGYU MED NA, DUS PHYIS SLAR YANG
BSTAN BCOS MANG DU

BRTZAMS PA LA DGOS PA LHAG PO MED DO ZHES MGRIN PA GZENGS BSTOD
NAS SMRA BA DAG

MCHIS MOD, DE DAG NI RNAM PAR MA BRTAGS PA'I GTAM KHA NA MA THO
BA CHEN PO YIN

TE; SANGS RGYAS KYI DGONGS PA LAS LHAG PA'I DON STON RGYU MED PA
RGYU MTSAN DU BYAS NAS

BSTAN BCOS BRTZAMS PA DON MED PAR 'DOD NA, SANGS RGYAS NYID KYIS
LUNG BSTAN

PA'I 'PHAGS YUL GYI SHING RTA CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS DGONGS 'GREL
GYI BSTAN BCOS

BRTZAMS PA DON MED PAR 'GYUR TE, SANGS RGYAS KYI DGONGS PA LAS
LHAG PA

ZHIG 'CHAD RGYU MED PA'I PHYIR, DE BZHIN DU SHING RTA CHEN PO
RNAMS KYI RJES SU ZHUGS

PA'I 'PHAGS YUL GYI MKHAS GRUB RNAMS DANG, BOD 'DIR YANG SA DGE
RNYING MA

KAR 'BRUG SOGS KYI BSTAN 'DZIN DU MAS BSTAN BCOS MAN NGAG SOGS
JI SNYED CIG

RTZOM PA MTHA' DAG DON MED PAR 'DOD DGOS PAS HA CANG THAL LO,
,TSUL DE LTAR

DU SMRA BA RNAMS NI GANG YANG MA BSLAB CI YANG MI SHES PA'I RANG
RTAGS GSAL BAR NGOMS

PA YIN TE, DE DAG LA BKA' MDO RGYUD KYI DON CHEN GCIG SMOS NAS
DE'I DON 'CHAD

LUGS SANGS RGYAS KYI DGONGS PA JI LTA BA DE GANG YIN DRIS NA
TSIG SPYI TZAM GYI LAN YANG

'DEBS RGYU MED PAR SHES SO, ,DES NA DON GYI GNAS TSOD SANGS

RTA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI BZHED PA LAS BRGAL BA MED NA YANG, GDUL
BYA RNAMS RIM

BRJEN

@444 CHER PHYUNG BA DANG, DKRUGS PA RNAMS 'KHRIGS SU SDEBS PA
DANG, DRANGS NGES

KYI KHYAD PAR LA SOGS PA GDUL BYA'I DBANG PO DANG 'TSAMS PA'I
BSTAN BCOS MAN NGAG

SOGS DU MA ZHIG MDZAD DGOS TE, DPER NA SANGS RGYAS KYIS CHOS KYI
'KHOR LO

THOG MAR BSKOR BA'I DUS SU GDUL BYA RNAMS DBANG PO RNON PO
GZUNGS DANG SPOB PA THOB

PA SHA DAG PAS SANGS RGYAS KYIS ZHAL NAS GSUNGS PA'AM, RJES SU
GNANG BA'AM,

BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I BKA' GANG YIN KYANG LAN RE RE GSUNGS PA
TZAM GYIS TSIG RNAMS

MI BRJED PAR 'DZIN NUS PA DANG, GSUNGS PA'I MOD NYID LA DON YANG
JI LTA BA

BZHIN RTOGS SHING KHONG DU CHUD PAS PO STI DANG GLEGS BAM LA
'GOD PA SOGS MA DGOS

NA'ANG, RJES 'JUG RNAMS DE LTAR MI NUS PA SHAS CHE BAS PHYI RABS
KYI GDUL

BYA LA DGONGS NAS DGRA BCOM PA RNAMS KYIS BKA' BSDU RIM PA GSUM
LA SOGS PA

MDZAD NAS RIM GYIS GLEGS BAM DU BKOD PA LAS DA LTA'I DUS NA'ANG
RANG CAG RNAMS

KYIS NYAN SEMS KLOG PA'I SPYOD YUL DU GYUR PA 'DI LTAR BYUNG BA
DANG, SANGS RGYAS

MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS SHING BKA' BSDU LA SOGS PA MDZAD ZIN NAS KYANG
RGYAL BA'I BKA' LA

DGONGS PA LEN TSUL THA DAD PAS NYAN THOS SDE BA BCO BRGYAD LA
SOGS PA GYES SHING,

LHAG PAR THEG PA CHEN PO BKA' MA YIN NO ZHES BSUN 'BYIN PAS THEG
CHEN GYI MING YANG

NUB PAR NYE BA NA, RGYAL BAS LUNG BSTAN PA'I SHING RTA CHEN PO
MGON PO KLU SGRUB YAB

SRAS DANG, THOG MED SKU MCHED LA SOGS PA BYON STE ZAB PA DANG
RGYA CHE BA'I THEG CHEN

GYI BSTAN PA NYIN MO LTAR GSAL BAR MDZAD LA, SANGS RGYAS NYID
KYIS AYON GYI

YUL DANG DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNG SOGS SU GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG
PA'I CHOS 'KHOR

DE DAG GI

@445 DON PAndI TA DANG GRUB CHEN RNAMS KYIS BKRAL TE PHYI RABS
KYI DON DU BSTAN BCOS RGYA

CHER MDZAD PA SOGS KYI BKA' BSTAN RNAMS MKHAN SLOB CHOS GSUM GYI
SKU RING LA LO

PAn RNAMS KYIS BSGYUR ZHUS GTAN LA PHAB PA LAS BKA' 'GYUR DANG
BSTAN 'GYUR DU

GRAGS PA BYUNG BA DANG, RAB BYUNG DANG SNGAGS KYI SDE 'DZUGS PA
SOGS KYIS BSTAN

PA RGYA CHER SPEL BA LTAR GDUL BYA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANGS PA
LAS GROL BA THOB PA'ANG

JI SNYED CIG BYUNG MOD KYANG, SLAR YANG BSTAN PA 'PHEL 'GRIB SNA
TSOGS LA BRTEN

PAS PHYI DAR GYI MGO TSUGS PA'I DUS SU 'DUL BA DANG SNGAGS KYI
BSTAN PA RNAM DAG NI

NYAMS, GANG ZAG 'GA' ZHIG GI RANG BZO LAS GSANG SNGAGS SGRA JI
BZHIN PAR

ZHEN NAS SBYOR SGROL DU BSNYAD PA, 'TSE BA CHOS SU SMRA BA'I MU
STEGS KYI GRUB MTHA'

DANG MTSUNGS PA'I CHOS LOG DAR BA NA LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO
SOGS KYIS SNGAGS

LOG SUN 'BYIN PA'I BSTAN BCOS MDZAD PA DANG, LHAG PAR LHA BLA MA
YE SHES 'OD

KHU DBON GYIS MNYAM MED JO BO CHEN PO D'I BAm KA RA BOD DU SPYAN
DRANGS PAS BSTAN PA LA

MA RTOGS PA DANG LOG PAR RTOG PA'I DRI MA BSAL ZHING, SNGON CHAD
GSANG SNGAGS

KYI CHOS SKAD MTHON PO KHAR 'KHYER BA'I RTZING SPYOD LHAG PAR
DAR BA'I RKYEN GYIS 'BROM

CHOS KYI RGYAL POS JO BO RJE LA, BOD GYI MI RNAMS LA CHOS ZAB
ZAB MO DANG, MTHO

MTHO MO MI GSUNG BAR LAS RGYU 'BRAS KYI CHOS GSUNGS 'TSAL ZHES
ZHUS PA LTAR,

CHOS LOG LA 'JUG PA NI LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM DBYE MA SHES PA NYID
LA THUG PAR GZIGS

NAS GTZO BOR LAS RGYU 'BRAS KYI CHOS ZHIB TU GSUNGS SHING, SKYES
BU GSUM GYI

LAM GYI RIM PA'I GNAD KUN TSANG BA'I GZHUNG BYANG CHUB LAM GYI
SGRON MA SOGS MDZAD NAS

BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG PA'I GZHUNG BTZUGS PA DANG, GANG ZAG SNOD
LDAN 'GA'

@446 ZHIG LA GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS RNAMS SHIN TU GSANG ZHING
LKOG TU GYUR PA'I TSUL GYIS

GDAMS PA LAS KHROMS CHOS SU MI MDZAD LA, BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA 'DUL
BA YIN PAR

DGONGS NAS 'DUL KHRIMS LA GCES SPRAS SU BYED PA'I BKA' GDAMS LHA
CHOS BDUN

LDAN GYI RNAM THAR GTZANG MA'I PHYAG SROL BTOD PA DANG, DE BZHIN
DU SGRA BSGYUR 'BROG

LDAN GYI RNAM THAR GTZANG MA'I PHYAG SROL BTOD PA DANG, DE PA
BZHIN DU SGRA BSGYUR 'BROG

MI LO TZA BA DANG, MNGA' BDAG MAR PA LO TZA BA, RVA LO, MNYAN LO
LA

SOGS PAS RGYA GAR DU BYON NAS GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS KYI SKYES
BSNAMS NA BOD DU DAR

BAR MDZAD PA LAS SA SKYA, BKA' BRGYUD SOGS KYI GRUB MTHA' BYUNG
BA DE DAG KYANG

DAM PA GONG MA'I BRGYUD PA BAR MA CHAD PA LAS 'ONGS PA'I RANG
RANG GI LUGS KYI LTA SGOM

SPYOD GSUM RNAM PAR DAG PA'I NYAMS BZHES DANG, RJES 'JUG RNAMS
KYI DON DU

MAN NGAG BSTAN BCOS DU MA ZHIG MDZAD PA DE LTAR DANG, RNYING MA
TSAD LDAN RNAMS

KYANG BKA' GTER TSAD MAR GYUR PA NYAMS SU LEN PA LAS ZOB CHOS SA
CHOS RDO CHOS SNA

TSOGS PA LA YID BRTAN 'CHA' BA MIN 'DUG NA'ANG, DE NAS KYANG DA
DUNG BSTAN

PA RIM GYIS 'GRIB PA LA PHYOGS PAS GANG ZAG RNAMS DBANG PO JE
BRTUL DU GYUR PAS

LEGS NYES 'BYED PA'I MIG NI LDONGS, CHOS PAR RLOMS PA RNAMS
KYANG RANG RANG

GI GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN KHUL GYIS BDAG CAG GI CHOS LUGS 'DI KHO NA
MCHOG YIN GYI

GZHAN NI DE LTA MA YIN NO ZHES RMONGS ZHEN AA 'THAS SU 'THEN
KYANG, DON DU RANG

LUGS KYI LTA SGOM SPYOD GSUM DANG, GZHI LAM 'BRAS GSUM GYI RNAM
BZHAG JI

BZHIN KHONG DU MA CHUD PAS RMONGS TSOD DANG SPYI BRTOL KHO NAS
BSTAN 'DZIN DU RLOMS,

ZOG DANG, RDZUN DANG, RANG BZO DANG, 'CHAL SPYOD MKHAN RNAMS
SPOBS PA MTHO BAS

PHAL MO CHE ZHIG DE DAG GI RJES SU ZHUGS PA MANG BA SOGS KYIS
BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG

@447 PA'I SROL NYAMS TE, LA LA NI GSANG SNGAGS PA YIN ZHES SHA
CHANG DANG, BUD MED

LA BYUNG RGYAL DU SPYOD DE BU DANG BU MOS MTHA' BRTEN CING, GLU
BRO GZHAS SOGS KHYIM

PA DANG GNYIS SU MA MCHIS PAS SNGAR DUS KYI SBYOR SGROL DU GRAGS
PA'I BSTAN PA SLAR

YANG SPEL BA DANG, LA LA GSANG SNGAGS PA YIN ZHES GRONG CHOG
MDOS DANG GTOR MA,

BZLOG PA GLUD RDZONG SOGS DKOR CHOG KHO NAR GZHOL BA LAS SRUNG
SDOM DANG NYAMS LEN

LA CIR YANG MI RTZI BA DANG, LA LA 'DUL BA SOGS BA NI THEG PA
DMAN PA'I CHOS YIN ZHES

DGE TSUL SLONG GI TSUL KHRIMS LA DMAD CING, LHA MED 'DRE MED
DANG, DUG

LNGA YE SHES LNGA DANG, 'DOD YON LAM DU 'KHYER BA SOGS LTA SPYOD
MTHO MTHO MO'I CHOS

SKAD DANG, RTZING SPYOD GTZO BOR BZUNG STE GZHAN DAG BSTAN PA LA
RIM GYIS SLOB

PA SOGS LA DE DANG DE TZAM DU BAS ZHES KHYAD GSOD BYED KYANG,
RANG LUGS KYI LTA

SGOM SPYOD 'BRAS 'DI ZHES 'DZUB MO 'DZUGS RGYU MED BZHIN DU ZOG
RDZU KHO NA'I NGANG DU MI

TSE BSKYEL BA DANG, LA LA BSAGS SBYANGS SOGS THUN MONG LAM
SBYANGS LA CIR

YANG MI RTZI BAR CI YANG YID LA MI BYED PA 'BA' ZHIG MCHOG TU
'DZIN PA'I MUN SGOM NAG

YOR RE BA'I NGANG DU MI TSE YOL BAR BYED PA DANG, LA LA THA
SNYAD TSIG SPYI TZAM GYI KHA

BSHAD KHO NA MCHOG TU BZUNG NAS TSUL KHRIMS DANG NYAMS LEN LA
CIR YANG MI RTZI BA DANG

DE BAS CUNG DRAG PAR RLOMS PA 'GA' ZHIG 'DUL KHRIMS SNA KHA SHAS
SRUNG KHUL DANG,

GTOR MA BSUR SOGS CHOS SPYOD 'GA' LA SLOB PA TZAM LAS GSANG
SNGAGS ZAB MO'I

NYAMS LEN LA SNANG CHUNG DU BYED PA SOGS BSTAN PA DRI BCAS SU
BYED PA PO NI SNGAR DANG DA

LTAR GYI DUS SU BYUNG DANG BYUNG BZHIN PA MA ZAD, DA DUNG 'BYUNG
BAR 'GYUR BA'ANG 'GOG

PAR MI NUS PAR SNANG LA, DES NA BSTAN PA GZUGS BRNYAN TZAM DU
GYUR PA NA SNGAR

@448 GONG DU'ANG LAN CIG MA YIN PAR BRJOD PA LTAR RJE BDAG NYID
CHEN PO TZONG KHA PA BYON NAS

DRI MA MED PA'I RING LUGS GSER SBYANGS BTZO MA LTA BU 'DI NYID
DAR BAR MDZAD PA YIN

NA'ANG, DENG SANG GI DUS SU 'DI YANG NYAMS JE DMAR GYUR TE DA
LTA'I GNAS SKABS

SU GTZO BOR GDAN SA SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM DANG, SDE DGON 'GA' ZHIG
BCAS

SU GZHUNG LUGS KYI THOS BSAM 'CHAD NYAN DANG, 'DUL KHRIMS RNAM
DAG GI RGYUN

MA NUB TZAM DANG, RGYUD GRA STOD SMAD SOGS SU SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD
NYAN DANG, CHO

GA PHYAG LEN GYI RGYUN MA NYAMS PAR GNAS TZAM LAS, RJE THAMS CAD
MKHEN PA'I BZHED

DON GYI GTZO BO NI, DANG POR RGYA CHEN THOS PA MANG DU BTZAL,
,BAR DU GZHUNG

LUGS THAMS CAD GDAMS PAR SHAR, ,MTHA' MAR NYIN MTSAN KUN TU
NYAMS SU

BLANGS, ,KUN KYANG BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I CHED DU BSNGO, ,ZHES
GSUNGS PA LTAR

YIN NA'ANG, BDAG DANG BDAG 'DRA BA RNAMS NI DE LTA BU'I RNAM
THAR GYI RJES SU ZHUGS

KHUL TZAM LAS, GZHAN DU THOG MAR THOS PA BTZAL BA NA YANG RANG
RANG GI GRVA SA GRVA

TSANG GI YIG CHA SPYI MTHA' DPYOD TZAM LA SKYABS SU 'TSAL NAS
DAM BCA'I KHAS LEN 'DZIN

THUB TZAM DANG, RIG LUNG BGRO GLENG MA CHAD TZAM NAS MING BTAGS
CHE CHUNG ZHIG THON

NA THOS BSAM MTHAR PHYIN KHUL BYED PA LAS RGYA CHEN PO'I GZHUNG
LUGS LA MTHA' CHOD

PA'I THOS BSAM NI BLO GROS KYIS MA DPOGS SHING BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS
MA LCOGS PA DANG,

DE LA BRTEN NAS GZHUNG LUGS GDAMS PAR SHAR RGYU YANG DE 'DRA
ZHIG TU ZAD LA,

MTHA' MAR NYIN MTSAN DU NYAMS SU LEN RGYU NI THAR PA DON DU
GNYER BA'I GANG ZAG KHYAD

PAR CAN 'GA' ZHIG TZAM LAS BDAG LTA BU PHAL CHE BA NI TSE 'DI'I
GO SA DA NGA, GTAM

SNYAN GRAGS, ZANG ZING GI 'DU 'GOD SOGS KYI NGANG DU LANG TSO
YOL BAR GYUR PA

@449 CHES MANG BA LAS THOS DON SGRUB LA GZHOL BA NI NYIN MA'I
SKAR MA LTAR GYUR LA, 'ON

KYANG GZHAN DAG GI DBANG DU BYAS NA RJE TZONG KHA PA YAB SRAS
KYI THUGS RJE DANG BKA' DRIN

KHO NA'I MTHU LA BRTEN NAS GZHUNG LUGS KYI THOS BSAM, TSUL
KHRIMS KYI SRUNG SDOM,

NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD 'GAG SOGS GANG LA'ANG RI BO DGE LUGS PA RANG
DRAG SHOS SU

'DUG PA NI GZU BO'I BLOS BRTAGS NA SHES LA, KHO BOS 'DI LTAR
SMRA BA YANG

BDAG NYID RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I BSTAN PA LA ZHUGS PA'I PHYOGS ZHEN
GYIS KUN NAS

BDAG NI

,GANG ZHIG

DANG,

GROGS PO RNAMS, ,

DPYOD KYIS, ,

PHYOGS LHUNG

CING, SA RNYING KAR

'BRUG SOGS KYI GRUB MTHA'I 'GRO LUGS DANG, ZAB MO'I GNAD DON,
CHOS

'JUG RNAMS KYIS

@450 GYI LAD MO SNA TSOGS ZHIG BKAB PAS GANG ZAG GIS CHOS MDZAD
PA LTAR DU SONG BA YANG

KYI BZHED DON THUN

MONG DANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I GNAD RNAMS SBYANGS PA DMAN PAS

'DI DANG 'DI

MA GYON MA, DBYANGS CAN MA, SME BRTZEGS RNAMS KYI SGRUB THABS,
SANGS

RGYAS SO LNGA'I MNGON RTOGS, SGRA MI SNYAN PA'I TSE SGRUB, RAB
GNAS RGYAS BSDUS,

7BCU GNYIS PAR BLA MA LNGA BCU PA'I tI KA ,SNGAGS KYI SPYAD PA
DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA,

SDOM PA GONG MA GNYIS KYI PHYIR BCOS, RTZA SHE'I RNAM BSHAD RIG
PA'I RGYA MTSO, LTA KHRID,

RGYAN GYI ZIN BRIS, 7BCU GSUM PAR DBU MA 'JUG PA'I RNAM BSHAD
DGONGS PA RAB

GSAL, RGYAN GYI BRJED BYANG, RIG PA DRUG CU PA, SHES RAB LE'U

RNAMS KYI ZIN BRIS, THAL RANG GI KHYAD PAR, BDEN GNYIS, DKA'
GNAD

BRGYAD KYI ZIN BRIS, 7BCU BZHI PAR MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI LEGS
BSHAD GSER

'PHRENG LAS SKABS DANG PO GSUM GYI RNAM BSHAD, 7BCO LNGA PAR
SKABS PHYI MA LNGA'I

RNAM BSHAD, BYANG CHUB SEMS SDOMS RNAM BSHAD BYANG CHUB GZHUNG
LAM, 7BCU

DRUG PAR BYANG CHUB LAM RIM CHEN MO LAS SKYES BU CHUNG 'BRING GI
THUN MONG BA'I LAM GYI

RIM PA LAS RGYAL SRAS GYI SPYOD PA SPYI LA BSLAB PA DANG, ZHI
LHAG GI SKABS RNAMS,

7 BCU BDUN PAR BYANG CHUB LAM RIM CHUNG BA, SKYES BU CHEN PO'I
RNAM BZHAG ,

DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO, DGE 'DUN NYI SHU,
YID KUN 'GREL PA,

7 BCO BRGYAD PAR BSLAB BTUS KYI ZIN BRIS, TSAD MA'I BRJOD BYANG
CHEN MO, MNGON

LE'I BRJED BYANG, tIKKA ,'DUL BA RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA,
,tIKKA ,BSLAB BYA

GNAM RTZE LDENG MA RGYAS BSDUS, TSUL KHRIMS RNAM BSHAD, YONGS
SBYONG GZHI GSUM

DUM BU, CHA

@459 TSAD BLTA BA'I ME LONG, CHAB SHOG LE TSAN GNYIS, GSUNG THOR
BU PA RNAMS DANG

BCAS PA DANG, PAR DU MA 'KHOD CING DENG SANG DPE RGYUN YANG SHIN
TU DKON PA RGYAN DANG

NYI MA SBAS PAS RNAM 'GREL THAL 'GYUR DU 'GREL TSUL, DRANG NGES
RNAM 'BYED KYI RNAM

RIG PA'I SKOR GYI ZIN BRIS, BSAM GZUGS KYI DKA' GNAD CHE LONG
TZAM GTAN LA

PA, MNGON RTOGS

RGYAN GYI DKA' GNAD KYI BSHAD PA DANG, DGE 'DUN NYI SHU'I SKOR
DANG, BYAMS

BSGRIGS TSUL,

BRIS RJE RANG NAS MDZAD

MDZAD PA, SLOB

MA GZHAN DAG GIS ZIN BRIS BTAB PA DUS 'KHOR SPYI DON, SBYOR DRUG
,'PHO

KHRID SOGS DU MA ZHIG YOD PAR SNANG YANG PHAL CHE BA DPE RGYUN
DKON PAS DENG SANG SA

'OG GI GTER LTA BUR GYUR TSOD DU SNANG, DE LTA BU'I GSUNG DE DAG
THAMS CAD LA'ANG

MA BRTAGS PA DANG GYA TSOMS SU SMRA BA DANG, LUNG RIG DANG 'GAL
BA SOGS KYI

'KHRUL BA'I CHA NI TSIG GCIG LA YANG MI MNGA' BA'I 'PHAGS PA
RNAMS DGYES PA BSKYED

PA'I LEGS BSHAD 'BA' ZHIG YIN PA NI, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA'I GSUNG

LAS, JI LTAR RGYAL BAS LUNG BSTAN BRNYES PA'I SHING RTA'I SROL
'BYED CHEN PO DAG

GI GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA RIG PA'I DBANG PHYUG DAG GIS JI TZAM

LTAR, BDAG NYID

BSHES KYI GSUNG

SHES KYIS SGRO 'DOGS PA

PAR 'DOD

KYANG, RGYUD

RIG PA 'DIS MNGON NO

BA'I NYES PA

PHYIR TSUL 'DIS NI

PAR DPYAD NA, LUGS

@467 BZANG PO, RNYING MA'I CHOS RJE DAR YUL PA, SPYI BO LHAS PA,
'BRI KHUNG

RTOGS LDAN YE SHES

DKON MCHOG

SKYABS, BLA MA DBU MA PA, GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE STE BCU BZHI
NI BKA'

RJE DON GRUB RIN

KYI RDO RJE DANG BZHI NI 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL BA'I BLA MA YIN PAR
GSUNGS, GONG DU CHOS

'BREL GSAN GRAS GDAN SA THEL GYI SPYAN SNGA BA'I MTSAN LA CHOS
GRAGS ZHES PA DGA'

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG DU GSAL BA LTAR BKOD PA YIN KYANG, CHOS KYI
SPYAN LDAN GZHAN DAG

SPYAN SNGA GRAGS PA BYANG CHUB

MDZAD YUL DE YIN PAR

GSUNG BA MA ZAD, 'DI MJUG DE MA THAG TU 'GOD PAR 'GYUR BA'I RNAM
THAR NGO MTSAR

BA'I GTAM BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA DANG ZANG ZANG NE RING PA'I GSUNG
RNAMS LAS KYANG, THEL

ZHES PA YIG SKYON ZHIG

DAM PA 'DI'I

GRUB RIN CHEN PA,

BKRA SHIS SENG GE AO

RGYAL MTSAN,

PA PHYOGS LAS

DPAL,

@468 LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO, SKYOR MO LUNG DKA' BZHI BLO
GSAL BA, SNAR THANG

PA KUN RGYAL, DKA' BZHI TSUL RIN PA, 'DUL 'DZIN SHES RAB MGON,

GDAN SA THEL GYI SPYAN SNGA GRAGS BYANG BA, RDOGS LDAN YE SHES

CHOS LUNG GI GRAGS PA BSHES GNYEN, GRAGS RGYAL BA, GONG GSUM BDE
CHEN

PA CHOS DPAL, DKA' BZHI YON TAN RGYA MTSO, LO CHEN DON GRUB PA,
RJE

BTZUN KHYUNG PO LHAS PA, GRUB CHEN NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN, RJE
BTZUN M'A RA MA TI,

RNAL 'BYOR DPA' PO RDO RJE STE, DE DAG NI GDUL BYA'I MTHUN SNANG
DU MTHONG BA'I BLA

MA STE RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I GTAM BCO LNGA PA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS
SHING, DE LTA BU'I

PA DANG, RANG

SU CHUD CING MKHAS PAR

SHING, DA DUNG

GSAN TSUL SOGS

BRGYAD PA LAS, DBUS

RGYUD BZHI'I DON 'OL SPYI

PA'I SKYE DGU'I

CHEN PA LA KA TZAN GYI

DU 'JUG PA DANG, ME

RGYA CHOD PA'I

KUN SPYOD DANG,

GZHAN DANG SNGAGS

PHYOGS LA DAG SNANG GSAN BZHES CHER MDZAD PA ZHIG MIN 'DUG SNYAM
PA DANG, YANG

LA LA ZHIG NI, SNGAGS PHYOGS SPYI TZAM LA GSAN BSAM NYAMS BZHES
SOGS JI LTAR

'OS PA TZAM MDZAD KYANG, BSKYED RDZOGS ZAB MO'I SKOR DANG, NANG
TSAN RTZA

THIG RLUNG GSUM GYI NYAMS LEN ZAB GNAD DANG, SEMS KYI GNAS LUGS
GTAN LA

'BEBS PA'I PHYAG RDZOGS KYI SKOR SOGS LA GSAN GZIGS TZAM MA
MDZAD CING, DE

LA BRTEN NAS DE DAG LA DAG SNANG SOGS MDZAD PA LTA BZHAG DNGOS
SHUGS NAS SDANG

SHUGS KYIS GRUB MTHA'I PHYOGS RIS DAM PAR MDZAD PA ZHIG YIN 'DUG
SNYAM PA DANG,

DE'I RJES SU ZHUGS PA'I RI BO DGE LUGS PA RNAMS KYANG DE 'DRA BA
SHA STAG ZHIG GO SNYAM

NGOS LKOG CI RIGS PA'I SGO NAS DMOD CING BSHUNG BA DANG, RANG
DANG GRUB MTHA'

GCIG PA'I KHA MNYAM LAG MNYAM TSUN CHOD LA LUNG RIG GTAN TSIGS
SOGS KYI SGRUB BYED

RNAM DAG CI YANG MED BZHIN DU 'DRA 'DRA 'GRIG 'GRIG SNA TSOGS
KYIS MGO BO BSKOR

ZHING BLO BSGYUR TE DGE LUGS PA'I CHOS NI KHA BSHAD TZAM DU ZAD
PAS PHYI MA PHAN CHOD LA

PHAN PA MED PAR NGAG NAS KYANG SMRA ZHING, SEMS LA'ANG BSAM PA
SOGS RANG

SNANG DGRAR LANGS NA, KHYI RGAN BRAG LA ZUG PA LTAR BYED PA NI
CI RIGS MTHONG

ZHING THOS PAS, DE DAG GI LOG RTOG 'BYUNG RKYEN GYI RTZA BA NI,
RJE BDAG NYID

CHEN POS RNYING MA KAR 'BRUG SOGS KYI CHOS LA DAG SNANG GIS GSAN
BZHES MDZAD

LUGS 'DI DAG PHYOGS TZAM MA GO ZHING, LTA GRUB RNAM THAR SHIN TU
GTZANG BAR

MDZAD PA DE PHYOGS 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA ZHIG GO SNYAM PA'I MA GO
BA YUS CHE BA'I DPE KHO

@478 NAS LAS GSOGS PAR SNANG BAS DE DAG GI LOG RTOG SEL PHYIR
RIS MED KYI GRUB

MTHA' TSANG MAR DAG SNANG GSAN BSAM GYIS MKHAS PAR MDZAD PA
DANG, DE DAG DANG

RJES SU 'BREL BA'I BSTAN BCOS KYANG CI RIGS BRTZAMS PAR MDZAD
TSUL SOGS CUNG

RLOMS PA

'GA' ZHIG LA BRTZE BA CHEN POS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, RJE NYID KYI
GSUNG LAS,

'BRAS BU MTHO NA 'DU SHES MED PA DANG, ,DMA' NA DUD 'GRO'I RGYU
LA NYIN MTSAN

DU; ;'BAD PA'I SGOM CHEN RNAMS LA MA BZOD PAR, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA
LTAR,

PHYAG RDZOGS SOGS KYI LAM GYI GNAD SGOM TSUL JI BZHIN MA SHES
PAS BLUN SGOM GTZOR

'DON BYED PA RNAMS LAM LOG PAR GOL BA THUGS KYIS MA BZOD PAS DRI
BA LHAG BSAM

RAB DKAR ZHES PA MDZAD PA NI, GRUB MTHA' DE DANG DE DAG GI MA
DAG PA'I SKYON SEL

NAS RANG RANG GI SGOM TSUL PHYIN CI MA LOG PA'I GNAD STON PAR
MDZAD PA MA GO BAR,

NGES PAR PHYAG CHEN DANG, RDZOGS CHEN ZHES PA'I SGOM TSUL TSANG
MAR MI 'THAD CES

DGAG PA MDZAD DO SNYAM, PHYOGS SNGA'I NAM MA LANGS PAR, DGAG
SGRUB KYI

NYI MA 'CHAR RTZIS BYED PA YANG CI RIGS BYUNG ZHING, 'DI DANG
TSUL MTSUNGS PAR

SA SKYA PAndI TAS, BLUN POS PHYAG RGYA CHE SGOM PA, ,PHAL CHER
DUD 'GRO'I RGYU RU

'GYUR, ,YANG NA NYAN THOS 'GOG PAR LHUNG, ,MIN NA GZUGS MED
KHAMS SU SKYE, ,

ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA YANG BLUN POS PHYAG CHEN SGOM TSUL MA SHES
PAR CI YANG YID LA

MI BYED PA TZAM GYI MUN SGOM LA PHYAG CHEN BSGOM PAR RLOMS PA
RNAMS KYI 'BRAS BU NI

MTHO NA NYAN THOS 'GOG PA DANG GZUGS MED SOGS DANG, DMA' NA DUD
'GROR SKYE'O ZHES

GONG DU RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO TZONG KHA PAS GSUNGS PA DANG DON
GCIG PA YIN PA LAS,

@479 MKHAS BLUN LA MA LTOS PAS PHYAG CHEN SGOM TSAD DUD 'GRO
SOGS SU SKYE ZHES GSUNGS RGYU

MIN 'DUG NA'ANG, TSIG GI DNGOS SHUGS KYI DON LA MA DPYAD PAR
PHYAG CHEN GYI CHOS

KHO NA MI 'THAD PA'I DGAG PA MDZAD PAR 'DUG SNYAM PA DANG, DE
DAG GI BSAM TSOD

DANG BSTUN NAS MKHAS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS KYANG DGAG LAN CI RIGS
MDZAD 'DUG KYANG

TSIG DON LA DPYAD SHES NA LOG RTOG GI RE 'KHANG 'BYUNG BA'I RGYU
MED CING, SGOM MA SHES

NA SKYON DE DANG DE DAG TU 'GYUR BA NI SA SKYA PAndI TA DANG,
RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG

DU MA ZAD PHYAG CHEN SOGS KYI SGOM RIM RNAMS SU YANG BDE BA LA
ZHEN NA 'DOD KHAMS SU

GOL, GSAL BA LA ZHEN NA GZUGS KHAMS SU GOL, MI RTOG PA LA ZHEN
NA GZUGS

MED DU GOL, 'DU SHES BKAG PA'I TSOR BA LA YANG DAG PAR 'DZIN NA
LHA TSE RING PO'I

'DU SHES MED PA'I SNYOMS 'JUG DNGOS YIN ZHES SO SO'I RING LUGS
KYI GZHUNG LAS

BYUNG BA RNAMS KYANG MI 'THAD PAR 'DOD DGOS PA SOGS GNOD PA DU
MA ZHIG 'BAB KYANG

ZUR TZAM LAS MA SPROS SO, ,DES NA RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SOGS
KYI DGONGS

PA NI DE LTAR YIN PA LAS PHYAG CHEN DANG, RDZOGS CHEN ZHES PA'I
CHOS THAMS CAD

MA DAG ZHES BSUN 'BYIN PAR MDZAD PA NI MA YIN TE, DE LTAR YIN NA
GONG DU SMOS

PA'I PHYAG RDZOGS KYI GDAMS PA RNAMS GSAN PA'I DON MA MCHIS PAR
'GYUR BA'I PHYIR,

DES NA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS NI RIS MED KYI GRUB MTHA' RNAM DAG
KUN LA MKHAS SHING

BYANG CHUB PAR MDZAD NAS DE DAG GI GNAD DON PHYOGS RE BA DANG
RAGS PA TZAM RES CHOG

PAR MI 'DZIN PAR TSANG LA MA NOR BA'I LAM GYI RIM PA'I GNAD
MTHA' DAG YONGS SU

'GRIL BA THUN MONG BA BYUNG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA CHE CHUNG DANG,
THUN MONG MA YIN PA

GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE BZHI'I SNGAGS KYI RIM PA, DE'I NANG NAS
SNGAGS KYI GNAD DON

@480 MTHAR THUG PA DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA DANG, 'KHOR LO BDE
MCHOG LA SOGS

PA'I BSKYED RDZOGS KYI ZAB GNAD MA LUS PA GSAL BAR PHYUNG BA'I
GSUNG MAN NGAG BSTAN

BCOS RNAMS SU PHYAG CHEN SOGS KYI GNAD MTHAR THUG PA MTHA' DAG
KYANG 'DUS PA NI

MKHAS PA GANG ZHIG PHYOGS LHUNGS SPANGS PA'I GZU BO'I BLOS LEGS
PAR BRTAGS NA

SHES PA YIN TE, SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN NAM
LHA GZIGS RAS

PA'I GSUNG LAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I GSANG
SNGAGS KYI

GNAD MANG PO DANG, BYE BRAG TU GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I MAN NGAG RNAMS
MTHONG BAS,

SPYIR GSANG SNGAGS DANG KHYAD PAR RJE BTZUN N'A RO PA YAB SRAS
KYI GDAMS PA LA'ANG THUN

MONG MA YIN PA'I GNAD DU MA RNYED, RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG GNYIS SU
MA MCHIS PA'I

MOS PA DRAG PO SKYES, SPYIR BLA MA 'DI LO BCU DGU'I STENG NAS
MJAL TE CHOS KYANG

THOB NA'ANG, GSUNG RAB RNAMS LA CHER MA BLTAS, DGONGS PA BSKYAR
MI

RNAMS KYIS KYANG THA SNYAD GTZO CHER BSHAD PAS MKHAS PA CHEN PO
ZHIG YIN PAR 'DUG

BSAM PA TZAM LAS MED, DUS PHYIS KYANG GSANG SNGAGS KYI SKOR
RNAMS NI LEGS

PAR MTHONG, DBU MA'I SKOR RNAMS GYI THA SNYAD DU YOD TZAM 'JOG
PA SOGS PHYAG

CHEN PAS SPROS BRAL LAS RO GCIG KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS CHOS SU 'JOG
PA'I SKABS DANG,

STONG NYID RTEN 'BREL DBYER MED DANG, GANG SHAR GYI SNANG BA
GRVA MA NYAMS PA SGOM DU

'JOG PA SOGS DANG MTHUN CHE BAR BYUNG BAS MOS PAR YOD NA'ANG,
LHAG MTHONG

GI SGOM TSUL LA CUNG ZHIG THE TSOM YOD, BLA MA'I DGONGS PA MDOR
BSDUS PA'I ZHI

GNAS KYI SKOR ZHIG MTHONG BAS GNAS PA SGRUB TSUL 'DI LA LHAG
MTHONG SGOM TSUL PHYAG

CHEN PA DANG 'DRA BA ZHIG 'ONG THANG PA LA BSAM PA BYUNG, PHYIS
MJAL BA'I TSE LHA

@481 MTHONG GI GNAD RNAMS KYANG PHYAG CHEN PA DANG JI LTA BA
BZHIN MTHUN PAR 'DUG ,CES

DANG, KHYAD PAR DU BDAG GI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I BLA MA MCHOG TU
GYUR PA NI,

SLOB DPON CHEN PO SHER GZHON PAS RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS KHONG DU
CHUD PAR MDZAD CING

MAN NGAG KYANG DU MA GNANG BA DANG, MTSUNGS PA MED PA'I THUGS
RJE MNGA' BA BLA MA RIN

PO CHE RIN GZHON PAS SEMS NYID SANGS RGYAS SU NGO SPRAD, 'KHOR
BA LA MI 'JIGS

PA'I SPOB PA BYIN PA DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG GRAGS
PA'I DPAL GYIS

BKA' MDO RGYUD MA LUS PA'I DON KHONG DU CHUD PAR NUS PA'I BLO
GROS BYIN PAS 'DI

GSUM LA GTZO BOR BYED PA YIN, ZHES GSUNGS PA RNAMS KYI SHES SO,
,

DES NA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BGROS DANG SGOM RIM RNAMS
SU CI YANG YID LA

MI BYED PA SGOM GYI MCHOG YIN GSUNGS PA TZAM GYI SPAM TSIG LA
'KHRUL NAS PHYIS KYI

SGOM CHEN PAR RLOMS PA DAG GIS TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB SBYONG DANG,
SDAM PA'I

SRUNG SDOM SOGS LA MA 'BAD PAR DANG PO NYID NAS KUN RTOG BZANG
NGAN THAMS CAD

BKAG NAS DMIGS PA GANG YANG YID LA MI BYED PA'I RTZOM 'JOG BYAS
PA KHO NA LAS

MCHOG TU GYUR PA MED 'DUG SNYAM DU SEMS PA MANG LA, DE LTAR SGOM
NA HVA SHANG GI

SGOM DANG GNYIS SU MA MCHIS PA'I GOL SA CHEN POR 'GYUR BA LA
DGONGS NAS RJE YAB

SRAS SOGS KYIS SKYON SPONG MDZAD PA YIN CING, DAM PA GONG MA
RNAMS KYIS CI

YANG YID LA MI BYED PA ZHES GSUNGS PA'I DGONGS DON GYI GTZO BO
NI, MNYAM

BZHAG GI TSE CHOS THAMS CAD KYI GNAS LUGS STONG PA NYID SPROS
PA'I MTHA' THAMS CAD

DANG BRAL BA'I RNAM PAR MI RTOG PA'I NGO BO NYID LAS GZHAN DU
BZANG NGAN GYI DMIGS

SNGON MA RNAMS SU LAM

@482 THUN MONG BAS RGYUD LEGS PAR SBYANGS SHING, THUN MONG MA
YIN PA'I RIM PA GNYIS

KYI RNAL 'BYOR YANG PHAL CHE BA SNGON DU SONG BA'I DBANG RNON
SBYANGS PA CAN GYI GANG ZAG GIS

TSE 'DIR DANG PO NAS DE LTAR DU BSGOM NA'ANG 'BAD MED DU GROL
BAR NUS PA YIN GYI,

LAM 'OG MA RNAMS SNGON DU MA SONG BA'I LAS DANG PO PAS DANG PO
NAS PHYAG CHEN SGOM PA

SKAD BYAS NA JI SKAD BSHAD PA'I NYAMS MYONG RGYUD LA MI SKYE
BA'I KHAR SGOM MI SHES PA'I

BYING BA BSAGS PA SGOM DU 'KHRUL NAS DUD 'GRO DANG, 'DU SHES MED
PA SOGS SU SKYE

BA NI NGES PAR YIN, YANG, ZHI GNAS LA SOGS PA SGOM PA'I SKABS
SU'ANG

YID LA MI BYED PA ZHES PA 'BYUNG BA NI, DMIGS PA GANG RUNG GCIG
DAG LA, ,

GTAD

LTAR,

LAS DANG PO PAS ZHI GNAS SGOM PA'I TSE DMIGS PA GANG YANG RUNG
BA ZHIG LA SEMS

GTAD NAS DE LAS GZHAN DU BZANG NGAN GYI RTOG PA YID LA MI BYED
PA DANG, DE BAS

BLO MCHOG TU GYUR PA DAG GIS DMIGS RTEN SOGS MED PAR SEMS RNAM
PAR MI RTOG

MI RTOG PA'I NGO BO

CHA BRTAN PO RNYED

GRANGS MTHA' YAS PAS

DON DE LAS CHOS

MI BYED PA

GANG GI TSE NA'ANG,

@483 MI RTOG PA'I NGO BO DE LAS GZHAN DU SEMS G-YENG BA'I RGOD
PA'AM, MI GSAL BA'I

BYING BA DANG BRAL BA ZHIG DGOS PAS NA DRAN SHES BZHIN GYI BYA
RA DANG MA BRAL BA ZHIG NGES

PAR DGOS RGYU YIN 'DUG PA LAS, CI YANG YID LA MI BYED PA ZHES
PA'I TSIG ZIN TZAM

LA 'KHRUL NAS GANG ZAG THA MAL PA BRGYAL BA'AM, GNYID LOG PA LTA
BU'I BSAM

RGYU RIG RGYU GANG YANG MED PA LA SGOM DU 'DZIN PA NI HA CANG
'KHRUL TSAB CHE ZHING, DE

BZHIN DU RJES KYI GNAS SKABS SU DA DUNG TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB
SBYANGS LA LHAG PAR DU

'BAD DGOS PA LAS CI YANG YID LA MI BYED PA YIN ZHES 'DUS BYAS
KYI DGE RTZA KHYAD DU

BSAD PA NI DE BAS KYANG LOG PAR LTUNG TSAB CHE'O, ,DES NA PHYAG
CHEN SOGS KYI SGOM

TSUL RNAM PAR DAG PA 'DI DAG NI GONG DU BSHAD MA THAG PA LTAR
DBANG RNON SBYANGS PA SNGON

SONG GI SGOM TSUL YIN PAS SU RUNG RUNG GIS DANG PO NAS DMAR 'JUS
SU BYED MI RUNG

PA LAS MA DAG PA'I CHOS LOG TU 'DZIN MI RIGS PA NI, GONG GI
SPYAN SNGA LHA GZIGS

RAS PA'I GSUNG RNAMS DANG, DER MA ZAD RI BO DGE LUGS PA'I BSTAN
'DZIN GYI

GTZO BO MKHAS GRUB NOR BZANG RGYA MTSOS GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I
BSKYED RIM DU 'DI LTAR

GSUNGS TE, BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA SOGS NI SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI
RGYUD LA DANG

PO NAS GZHI LA GNAS PA'I RLUNG SEMS SHIN TU PHRA BA GNYIS KYI
NANG NAS RLUNG LA GTZO BOR

MI MDZAD PAR SEMS NYID LA GTZO BOR MDZAD CING, SEMS DE'I MING GI
RNAM GRANGS

LA GNYUG MA'I SEMS DANG, LHAN CIG SKYES PA'I BDE BA CHOS SKU
PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO,

'OD GSAL GYI SEMS SOGS DU MA'I SGO NAS BSNYAD LA, DE'I NGO BO LA
GDOD MA NAS

DANG, STONG

@484 SANG GI RNAM PA MA GTOGS PA'I YUL SNANG CI YANG MED PA'I
SEMS SHIN TU PHRA BA ZHIG

THABS LAM

SOGS

KYI SGO NAS RTZA THIG RLUNG SOGS LA GNAD DU BSNUN TE KUN RTOG GI

NAS RGYU BA DBU MAR BKAG NAS RLUNG DE'I BZHON PA CAN GYI KUN
RTOG MI RGYU BAR BYAS PAS

'OD GSAL GYI SEMS NYAMS SU MYONG BAR BYED PA YIN LA, PHYAG RGYA
CHEN PO BSGOM

MI BYED PAR SEMS LA

ZHAN JE ZHAN DU SONG STE,

RO, ,'DI NI

PHYAG CHEN KHO NAR MA ZAD SGOM RNYING PA BA RNAMS KYIS SNGAGS

PA'I DMIGS PA GZHAN YID LA MI BYED PAR MI RTOG PA NYID YID LA
BYED PA LAS MTHAR

TE, GSUNG

ZHES PA DANG, DMIGS

GSUNGS PA

GI RGYU BA BKAG

LA 'KHRUL

@485 PHYAG CHEN BSGOM PA NI SHIN TU ZAB PA'I RDZOGS RIM DANG,
GTUM MO SOGS BSGOM

PA'I RDZOGS RIM NI MI ZAB PA'I RDZOGS RIM YIN, DES NA RDZOGS RIM
GYI SNOD LDAN

GYI GANG ZAG LA RIM GYIS PA DANG, CIG CHAR BA GNYIS LAS RIM GYIS
PAS MI

ZAB PA'I RDZOGS RIM DANG, CIG CHAR BAS ZAB PA'I RDZOGS RIM PHYAG
RGYA CHEN PO

'BA' ZHIG BSGOM PAR BSHAD CING, CIG CHAR BA NI, GANG ZAG SBYANGS
PA'I

'PHRO CAN LA, ,CIG CHAR PA NI BSTAN PAR BYA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA
LTAR SKYE BA

SNGON MA SOGS SU MI ZAB PA'I RDZOGS RIM BSGOM NAS 'OD GSAL CUNG
ZAD NYAMS SU MYONG

BA ZHIG YIN LA, DES NI PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO 'BA' ZHIG BSGOMS PAS
LAM THAMS CAD

BDE BLAG TU 'GRUB PA SOGS MTHA' YAS TE RE ZHIG DE TZAM MO, ,ZHES
GSUNGS SO, ,

DES NA RANG CAG SNYIGS DUS KYI GANG ZAG NGA DANG NGA 'DRA BA
RNAMS NI RDZOGS RIM GYI 'OD

GSAL SOGS LA MYONG BA THON PA'I DBANG RNON LTA BZHAG ,BSKYED RIM
RAGS PA TZAM

DANG, NGES 'BYUNG, BYANG SEMS, YANG DAG PA'I LTA BA SOGS LA'ANG
MYONG BA MA THON

ZHING, MTHA' NA DAL 'BYOR DANG, MI RTAG PA'I CHOS SKOR LA'ANG
NGES PA MA TSUD BZHIN DU,

DANG PO NAS DBANG RNON GYI SGOM TSUL LA 'JUG PA NI, 'JIG RTEN
GYI KHA GTAM LA,

YA RUR MA SLEB GONG NAS MDZO 'GROS RGYAB PA ZHES PA'I DPE DER
SONG NAS GCONG CAN

DU MAR BRJOD PA

THUN MONG LAM SBYANGS

NAS BZUNG NAS RIM BZHIN 'BAD PA NYID GNAD DU CHE' ZHES DA DUNG
GAL PO CHE LA NAN

THUGS BSKYED TSAD MED PAS

DAG THER MDZAD NAS

@486 LUGS DE DANG DE'I LTA SGOM SPYOD GSUM RNAM DAG GANG YIN
GSAL BAR MDZAD PA MA SHES

PAR, RTA RGAN RGAL BCOS BYAS PA NGAN LA MNGON PA LTAR, 'DI NI
BDAG CAG GI

GRUB MTHA' LA NGES PAR SDANG SHUGS KYIS 'GOG PAR MDZAD DO SNYAM
PA'I LOG RTOG PHRA MO

TZAM BYAR MI RUNG BA'I KHAR DA DUNG BKA' DRIN RJES SU DRAN PA'I
MOS GUS KYIS SNYING NAS

THAL MO SBYOR BAR RIGS SHING, GZHAN PHYOGS SU MA ZAD RI BO DGE
LUGS PA RANG

GI RJES 'JUG TU RLOMS PA DAG GIS KYANG RJE YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG
RNAMS KYI DGONGS PA

JI BZHIN MA LON PA'I KHAR, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SOGS
KYIS BLUN SGOM

BYED PA'I SGOM CHEN PA SOGS LA BKA' SKYON CHES LCI BAR MDZAD PA
SOGS LA BRTEN NAS,

NGES PAR PHYAG CHEN DANG RDZOGS CHEN ZHES SOGS KYI CHOS YIN TSAD
NI MA DAG PA'O SNYAM

NAS DMAD PAR BYED PA'ANG SNANG NA, DE LTAR YANG MDZAD MI RIGS
PAS BDAG NYID

CHEN PO RNAMS KYI GSUNG GI DNGOS SHUGS KYI DON RNAMS LA LEGS PAR
BRTAGS NAS

BSTAN PA RNAM DAG GANG YIN LA PHYOGS LHUNG SPANGS PA'I DAG SNANG
GIS KHYAB PAR MDZAD

RIGS SHING, 'ON KYANG DUS PHYIS SNYIGS MA'I RANG RTAGS BDO BAS
CHOS MIN CHOS

LTAR BCOS PA'I BSRE LHAD RNYOGS MA CAN GYI ZOG CHOS KYANG SHIN
TU MANG BAR MCHIS PA RE

LUGS DAM PA GONG

NA LEGS PA LAS,

GSAR 'GROGS DANG GZHAN ZER GYI RJES SU 'BRANGS NAS GANG THOD
THOD LA MI 'JUG PAR

KUN LA GSOL BA 'DEBS

BYE BRAG PA 'GA'

RANG DANG

@487 GZHAN GYI GRUB MTHA'I GNAS KUN LA, ,PHYOGS RIS SPANGS PA'I
THOS BSAM LHUR

CHU YI

,RNAM

MDZAD PA NA, ,

RTA BDUN

BZHAD PAR

NYES

PA'I LOG SMRA'I

SGRA; ;MUN PA'I MAL DU KHUN BU 'BYIN BZHIN SGROG ,TSUL BZHIN
DPYOD PA'I

BLO GROS DANG LDAN NA, ,'DI DAG RANG RANG GRUB MTHA'I GNAD DON
RNAMS, ,

JI BZHIN GSAL BYED SGRON ME NYID YIN PHYIR, ,LHAG PAR BKA' DRIN
DRAN PAS THAL

PA'I CHOS TSUL JI SNYED GSUNGS PA RNAMS, ,RGYUD TSOD DANG SBYAR
NYAMS SU LEN SHES

NA; ;THAD KA'I LAM LAS GZHAN DU GOL MI SRID, ,DBANG BRTUL SA LA
'GRE

LDOG BRTZEN BZHIN DU, ,THUN MONG LAM SBYANGS TZAM LA'ANG MA 'BAD
PAR, ,

DBANG RNON MTHON PO'I NYAMS LEN LA 'JUG PA, ,GLANG LTO BE'US MA
CHUN 'CHI

BA BZHIN, ,DES NA 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO NI, ,RANG GZHAN
GRUB

MTHA'I GNAD BZANG MA LUS PA, ,THUGS SU CHUD NAS RJES 'JUG GDUL
BYA LA, ,

RGYAL BAS BSNGAGS PA'I LAM BZANG 'DOMS PAR MDZAD, ,DE LTA BAS NA
LEGS SU

@488 'DOD PA KUN, ,MGON 'DI'I GSUNG LA THOS BSAM GYIS DPYAD
CING, ,DE DON

TSUL BZHIN NYAMS SU BLANGS BYAS NA, ,RING MIN GTAN GYI BTZAN SA
ZIN NO KYE, ,

ZHES PA NI BAR GYI NGAL BSO'I TSIGS BCAD DO, ,7 DE BZHIN DU
BTZUN PA'I YON TAN

NAM RNAM PAR THAR PA JI LTAR MNGA' BA'I TSUL NI, 'DI YANG PHAL
CHE BA NI GONG DU

RNAM PAR THAR PA'I DKYUS SU 'KHOD ZIN CING, DA DUNG GAL PO CHE
LA NAN TAN GYI TSUL

DU 'GA' ZHIG ZUR DU BKOL TE CUNG ZAD BRJOD NA, DE LA RJE BDAG
NYID CHEN PO NI

SKU TSE DER 'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD GTZANG BA TZAM GYI BTZUN PA MA
YIN PAR SDOM PA GSUM

GYI BCAS MTSAMS PHRA RAGS GANG GI THAD LA NYES LTUNG GI DRI MAS
ZHAR YANG MA GOS PA'I

BTZUN PA'I PHUL DU GYUR PA YIN PA NI, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG

LAS, RGYAL BA'I MKHYEN PAS JI TZAM LEGS DPYAD KYANG, ,KHYOD KYI
THUGS

LA RNAM DAG BSLAB PA'I KHRIMS, ,LHOD PAR GYU PA'I NYES PA PHRA
MO NI, ,CHA TZAM

GZIGS PA SPANGS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR YIN LA,
DE

YANG SO SO NAS RAGS TZAM BRJOD NA, SO THAR GYI BCAS MTSAMS LA
MTSON NA

SNGAR GONG DU BKOD PA LTAR, PHA YUL DU BZHUGS SKABS RJE KARMA PA
ROL PA'I RDO

RJE LAS YONGS RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BZHES NAS RTZA BZHI
CHANG DANG LNGA SOGS SRUNG

SDOM DANG, CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN LAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES NAS BLANGS 'DAS

SO DRUG GIS MTSON PA'I SPANG BLANG GI GNAS KUN LA NYES PA'I DRI
MAS MA GOS PA RGYUN

'KHYONGS SU SRUNG SDOM MDZAD CING, LHAG PAR BOD DU BYON NAS
TSOGS MKHAN CHEN PA LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA DGE SLONG GI DNGOS PO BZHES TSUN CHAD NAS
PHAM LHAG ,LTUNG BYED,

SOR BSHAGS BCAS KYI NYES LTUNG GI DRI MAS MA GOS PA LTA CI SMOS,
NYES BYAS PHRA

@489 MO TSUN CHAD KYI DRI MAS KYANG MA GOS SHING BRGYA LA NYES
BYAS PHRA ZHING PHRA BA 'GA' RE TZAM

YUL DUS KYI DBANG GIS BYUNG NA'ANG ZHAG DANG ZA MAR MI 'GROGS PA
NAN RE NUB RE

BSHAGS SDOM SOGS PHRAL PHRAL DU MDZAD DE, JI LTAR 'PHAGS PA DGRA
BCOM PA

NYE BA 'KHOR DANG, RTA THUL LA SOGS PA BZHIN DU TSUL KHRIMS KYI
PHUNG PO YONGS SU

RDZOGS PA YIN LA, DE YANG THOS BSAM DANG NYAMS LEN SOGS KYI GNAS
SKABS GANG GI

TSE NA'ANG RNAM KUN MIG GI 'BRAS BU BZHIN DU SRUNG SDOM BAR MA
CHAD DU MDZAD PA LAS,

'GA' ZHIG LTAR DA LTA THOS BSAM GYI SKABS YIN PAS CIR YANG MI
LTO ZHES THOS BSAM

LA KHAG 'DOGS KYIS BSLAB KHRIMS BAG YANGS SU SPYOD PA DANG,
YANG, 'GA'

ZHIG NI GSANG SNGAGS KYI NYAMS LEN GYI SKABS YIN PAS CHANG DANG
BUD MED SOGS 'DOD

YON LAM DU 'KHYER BAS GANG YANG MI LTO ZHES 'DUL BSTAN RMANGS
NAS 'JIGS PAR

BYED PA'I TSUL DE DAG LA RANG NYID 'JUG PAR MDZAD PA LTA CI,
GANG LA BLO GTAD 'CHA'

BA'I GANG ZAG GSAR BU BA TSUN CHAD KYANG NGAN SPYAD DE DANG DE
DAG LAS BZLOG NAS BAG

YOD PA'I TSUL LA 'GOD PAR MDZAD PA YIN TE, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I

GSUNG LAS, DE LTAR RJE BTZUN RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID KYIS KHA BA CAN
GYI LJONGS 'DIR

SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD
NAS RNAM PAR DAG

PA'I SROL CHEN PO RMAD DU BYUNG BA GZHI NAS BTZUGS SHING CHES
CHER RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA

YIN TE, DE YANG SNGON CHAD BOD 'DIR RAB TU BYUNG BA DAG GIS
SGRUB CING LAG TU BLANG BAR

BYA BA'I TSUL NI 'DI LTA STE, GANG ZHIG KLOG PA KHA TON GYI TSUL
LA ZHUGS NAS BSTAN BCAS

CHEN PO DAG GI TSIG BLO LA LEN PA DANG, SLOB DPON LAS LUNG NOD
PA SOGS KYI TSE

DUS MA YIN PA'I KHA ZAS DANG, BAG MED PA'I RTZED MO SNA TSOGS PA
DAG DANG GLU

@490 DANG GZHAS DANG BRO GAR LA SOGS PA KHYIM PA YA RAB KYI
NGANG TSUL LA BRTEN PA DAG GIS

KYANG LAG TU BLANG BA LA NGO TSA BA'I GNAS SU BYED PA GANG CI
YANG RUNG BA THAMS CAD LONGS

SPYOD CING LAG TU LEN PA NI, THOS BSAM LA NAN TAN LHUR LEN PA'I
LUS BSO BA

DANG, KHAMS BSNYOD PA'I PHYIR SKYON MED PA YIN NO ZHES BYA BA'I
GTAM 'DI BSHES

GNYEN CHEN POR RLOM PA DAG NAS BYIS PA NGUR SMRIG GSAR DU BLANGS
PA DAG YAN CHAD LA

RLUNG LTAR GRAGS PA YIN NO, ,DE BZHIN DU THOS BSAM LHUR LEN PA'I
TSE 'THAB PA DANG,

RTZOD PA DANG, G-YUL 'GYED PA NAS DMAG GI BYA BA LA GNAS KYI
BAR THAMS CAD

NYAMS SU LEN PA LA'ANG, 'DI NI BYA BA MA YIN PA, CHOS MA YIN PA,
RAB TU

BYUNG BA'I TSUL NYAMS PAR BYED PA'O ZHES SMAD PAR BYED PA SU
YANG MED KYI, GZHAN DU

NA KLOG PA THOS BSAM GYI GRVAR ZHUGS TZAM NAS PHAL CHE BA BYA BA
MA YIN PA DE DAG LA THE

TSOM TZAM YANG MED PAR NGANG GIS 'JUG PA LA SU YANG YA NGA BA
MED DO, ,ZHES DANG,

YANG, GANG ZHIG GSANG SNGAGS RDO RJE THEG PA BAR KHAS CHE BA
ZHIG YIN NA NI, MYOS

PAR 'GYUR BA'I BTUNG BA DANG, DUS MA YIN PA'I KHA ZAS LA SOGS PA
LONGS MA

SPYAD PA LAS LTUNG BAR 'GYUR ZHING DAM TSIG DANG 'GAL BA YIN NO,
,ZHES BYA BA LA

SOGS PA LOG PA'I GTAM GYI SBYOR BA RGYA CHER SPEL BAS 'DOD YON
LA CHES CHER SRED

PA DAG RANG GI 'DOD PA DANG MTHUN PAS YID SHIN TU RANGS PAR GYUR
CING, DE'I

STOBS KYIS GSANG SNGAGS KYI TSUL LA ZHUGS PHYIN CHAD RAB TU
BYUNG BA'I TSUL KHRIMS RTZVA

LTAR DOR NAS, GDUL BYA DU MA'I 'DREN PAR RLOMS PA CHEN PO DAG
GIS BKUR BA

YIN DU ZIN KYANG, NGUR SMRIG GI RGYAL MTSAN DANG BCAS BZHIN DU
BU DANG BU MO DANG CHUNG

MA'I TSOGS CHEN PO MNGON SUM DU BAB PA LA RANG NYID KYANG YA MI
NGA ZHING, SUS KYANG

@491 SMOD PAR MI BYED LA, DE LTA NA'ANG RANG GI SRID DU GTOGS PA
DAG GIS RAB TU BYUNG

BA DANG BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PAR 'DOD PA DAG THE MI TSOM PAR BSGRUB
PAS, RGYAL

BA'I BSTAN PA CHED DU NYAMS PAR BYED PA'I SBYOR BA NGAN PA LHUR
LEN PAS KHYAB PAR GYUR BA

NI GSANG SNGAGS LA 'DOD PA SPYOD PA SKYON MA YIN NO, ,ZHES BYA
BA'I TSIG GIS 'JIG

RTEN BSLUS PA YIN NO, ZHES DANG, YANG GANG ZHIG RI KHROD DGON PA
DAG

TU SONG STE DBEN PA'I GNAS LA BRTEN NAS BSAM GTAN LHUR LEN PAR
'DOD PA DAG NI

'DOD PA DAG NI 'DI SKAD DU, MYOS PA'I BTUNG BA DANG, PHYI DRO'I
KHA ZAS SPONG BA

LA SOGS PA 'DUL BA LAS GSUNGS PA DAG NI NYAN THOS PA'I DBANG DU
BYAS PA DANG THEG

PA 'OG MA DMAN PA LA MOS PA DAG GI DBANG DU BYAS PA YIN GYI,
THEG PA GONG MA DANG

SEMS KYI RANG NGO SHES PA LA DE 'DRA BA 'CHING BYED YIN PAS DGOS
PA MED DO, ,ZHES

GLENG ZHING, RAB TU BYUNG BA'I KUN TU SPYOD PA DAG YUL PAR 'DOR
BA LA JI MI SNYAM

PAR MA ZAD KYI, KHA CIG NI BLA GOS DANG, THANG GOS LA SOGS PA'I
RTAGS

KYANG CHED DU 'DOR BAR BYED DO, ,ZHES SOGS NAS, DE LTAR KHA BA
CAN GYI

LJONGS 'DIR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA GZUGS BRNYAN TZAM ZHIG LHAG MAR
GYUR PA'I TSE,

RJE BTZUN RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID DAM CHOS 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM RLABS
PO CHE YONGS SU GRUB

PA'I MTHUS BYANG PHYOGS KYI BRGYUD 'DIR BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE BSO
BA'I SLAD DU NYE BAR

BYON TE, GONG DU JI SKAD BRJOD PA'I TSUL GYIS RANG GZHAN GYI DON
BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB

PA DAG LA RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I BRTZON PA DRAG PO LHUR MDZAD PAS,
DENG SANG GI DUS THOS

BSAM PA DAG GIS THOS BSAM LA BRTZON PA LHUR BYED PA'I TSE YANG
BSLAB PA'I GZHI LA

GCES SPRAS SU BYED PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU YANG SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA
CUNG ZAD DRAG PAR

@492 RLOMS PHYIN CHAD CHANG DANG DUS MA YIN PA'I KHA ZAS SOGS
'CHOL NYOG TU SPYOD PA LA NGO

TSA BA'I GNAS SU BYED PA DANG, SNGON DUS GRA SA CHEN PO DAG GI
RAB TU BYUNG BA PHAL

CHE BAS KYANG GDING BA DANG, LHUNG BZED LA SOGS PA'I DGE SBYONG
GI YO BYAD DAG NGO

SHES PA'ANG DKA' BAR GYUR CING, BLA GOS DANG THANG GOS SNAM
PHRAN GLEGS BU SBYAR

BA LA SOGS PA NI RNA BAS KYANG THOS PAR MA GYUR PA LA, DENG SANG
KHA CHE DANG RGYA NAG

GI BAR THAMS CAD DU DGE SBYONG GI RTAGS DANG CHA LUGS RNAM PAR
DAG PA DE LTA BU DANG,

CHANG DANG PHYI DRO'I KHA ZAS SPONG BA DANG, BYIN LEN DANG, RUNG
CHU DANG, NUB

LHAG NYAL SRUNG BA SOGS BSLAB PA'I GZHI PHRA MO TSUN CHAD LA NAN
TAN DU BYED PA'I DGE

SBYONG TSUL DANG MTHUN PAS KHYAB PAR GYUR PA 'DI 'DRA BA NI,
BDAG CAG GI DPAL

LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN RIN PO CHE 'DI 'BA' ZHIG GI BKA'
DRIN MA YIN NA, GZHAN

GANG ZHIG LA BRTEN NAS BYUNG BAR GYUR PA SOMS SHIG ,CES DANG,
'DI DANG

'DRA BA GNAS RNYING PA KUN DGA' BDE LEGS KYI GSUNG LAS BYUNG BA
SNGAR GONG DU DRANGS

ZIN PA LTAR DANG, YANG MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG LAS, DENG
SANG

GI TSE NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD MTHAR THUG PAR STON PA NI GZHUNG LUGS
CHEN PO DAG YIN PAR

YID CHES NAS CUNG ZHIG NYAMS SU LEN PAR 'DOD PA NA'ANG TSUL
KHRIMS LA GCES SPRAS

SU BYED PA GZHIR BYAS NAS, BSAGS SBYANGS LA 'BAD DE GSUNG RAB
CHEN PO DAG GI

DGONGS PA SHING RTA CHEN PO DAG GIS BKRAL BA DANG MTHUN PAR
NYAMS SU LEN PA DGOS KYI,

GZHAN DU NA NGAL BA LHUR LEN PA'I DKA' BA JI TZAM ZHIG DPYAD DU
ZIN KYANG 'BAD PA

'BRAS BU MED PA YIN NO SNYAM PA'I GO BA RNAM PAR DAG PA CHAGS PA
DANG, TSUL

DE DANG MTHUN PAR NYAMS SU LEN PA'I BSHES GNYEN DAM PA MTHA' YAS
PA ZHIG GIS KHA

@493 BA CAN GYI MTHA' GRU KUN TU KHYAB PAR GYUR TE, CHOS MA YIN
PA CHES CHER NYAMS

DMAS PAR GYUR PA 'DI YANG, BDAG CAG GI RJE BTZUN 'DI NYID 'BA'
ZHIG GI BKA'

DRIN MDZAD PA MA YIN NA, YOD KYANG SNANG DU MI RUNG BA SU ZHIG
GI BKA' DRIN RJES

SU DRAN PAR BYA, ZHES GSUNGS PA 'DI RNAMS NI DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN GYI MCHOG

MTSANG THOG TU BRGOL BA YIN, GDAMS NGAG GI MCHOG MTSANG THOG TU
'BAB PA

YIN, ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, RANG BZHIN DRANG POR BRJOD PA'I SGO
NAS TSUL

BZHIN MA YIN PA'I BYA BA LA 'JUG PA RNAMS KYI MTSANG THOG TU
'BAB PA'I GSUNG DAM PA

YIN LA, TSUL MIN DE DANG DE LTA BU NI DA DUNG SNYIGS MA'I RANG
MDANGS BOD BA'I

DBANG GIS DUS PHYIS SNGAR BAS KYANG CHES CHER MANG BAR MCHIS TE,
RAB TU BYUNG

BA'I DGON SDE RNAMS NAS KYANG DENG SANG GRVA SA SE 'BRAS DGE
GSUM DANG, RGYUD GRVA

STOD SMAD KYIS GTZOS DBUS GTZANG GI GZHI 'DIR 'KHOD PA'I RI BO
DGE LUGS PA'I

DGON SDE CHE CHUNG RNAMS SU 'DUL BA'I BCAS KHRIMS DANG, GZHI
GSUM GYI PHYAG

LEN SOGS MA NYAMS TZAM GNAS PA DANG, DE BZHIN DU MDO STOD MDO
SMUD DANG,

RGYA HOR GYI YUL GRU RNAMS SU'ANG GDAN SA PA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI
RJES SU ZHUGS PA'I DGE

DGON MANG TZAM YOD 'DUG PA LAS, GZHAN LUNG LKUG DANG, SA MTHA'
RNAMS

SU 'KHOD PA'I DGE LUGS PA'I DGON SDE 'GA' ZHIG NI PHYI KHUL GYI
MIG LAM TZAM DU

CHOS GOS THANG SHAM SOGS 'CHANG KHUL TZAM LAS NAG CHANG SOGS LA
'DZEMS MED DU

SPYOD PAS SER KHYIM PAR GRAGS PA DANG KHYAD PAR MED PA YANG MANG
DU MCHIS SHING, DE

LAS GZHAN DU RNYING MA SOGS KYI DGON SDE PHAL CHE BAR NI BLA
SLOB TSANG MAS 'DUL KHRIMS

LA CIR YANG MI RTZI BA'I KHAR 'DUL BA'I BCAS PA NI THEG DMAN GYI
LUGS DANG, DE

@494 LA DAD CING RTZIS SU BYED PA'I GANG ZAG DE YANG THEG DMAN
PAR 'JOG PA DANG, NANG

DU RTOGS PA'I GDENGS TSAD GANG YANG MED BZHIN DU GZHAN NGOR SMIN
RU ZENGS ZENGS DANG,

SNA SHU HUR HUR GYI NGANG NAS DKOR ZAS DANG NAG CHANG SOGS LA JI
MI SNYAM PAR SPYOD PA DE

THEG PA CHEN PO'I YANG RTZER SLEB PA'I KHUL BYED MI SHIN TU MANG
BAR MCHIS PA DANG,

DE LA BRTEN NAS DGON SDE DE DAG TU PHAL CHE BA DGE TSUL SLONG GI
SDOM PA ZHU BAR MI MOS

SHING, GAL TE RE GNYIS NAS ZHU KHUL DANG, BLA MAS GNANG KHUL
BYAS NA

YANG, DON DU SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I MKHAN SLOB NAS LAS KYI CHOG
RNAMS TSIG

GCIG KYANG MA 'KHRUL BAR BLO NAS THON PA DGOS ZHES 'DUL BA NAS
BSHAD BZHIN DU,

BLOR MA ZIN PAR DPE THOG NAS 'BOGS PA DANG, ZHU BA PO NAS KYANG
SNAM SBYAR BLA

GOS SOGS KYI RGYU'I BYIN RLABS BYED PA'I GZHI TZAM YANG RTZOL
SGRUB MI BYED PAR GNAS

SKABS DER CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM SOGS GZHAN LA G-YAR TE SDOM PA
ZHUS PA'I SKAD

CIG GNYIS PA NAS SNAM SBYAR BLA GOS SOGS MI DGOS GZHIR BZHAG GIS
SPONG BA DANG,

SDOM PA ZHU BA'I TSE PHAM LHAG LTUNG BYED SOGS BSRUNG BAR KHAS
BLANGS KYANG DON DU SRUNG RGYU

LTA BZHAG LTUNG BA RNAMS KYI GRANGS DANG MING TZAM YANG MI SHES
PA DANG, DGON 'GA'

ZHIG TU BUD MED LA MI TSANGS SPYOD BYAS PA'I GLENG NGAN BYUNG NA
DNGOS PO'I BSHAGS PA

'BUL SROL TZAM LAS, GZHAN DU PHAM LHAG LTUNG BYED SOGS CI BYUNG
YANG BSHAGS

SDOM SOGS KYI SNANG BA CHA TZAM MED PA DANG, 'GA' ZHIG TU NI
TSOGS KYI SKABS

SOGS LA RAB BYUNG GI CHAS BYED PA TZAM LAS RGYUN DU BLA SLOB
TSANG MAS KHYIM PA'I RTAGS

CHA LUGS 'CHANG ZHING, NAG CHANG LA JI MI SNYAM PA'I BYUNG RGYAL
DU SPYOD PA DANG,

DUS MIN GYI KHA ZAS SPONG BA SOGS NI SNGAGS KYI DAM TSIG DANG
'GAL BA YIN ZHES DA

@495 DUNG CHED GNYER GYIS LONGS SPYOD PA SOGS BSTAN PA'I GZUGS
BRNYAN TZAM YANG MED

PAR GTONG BA MANG ZHIG MCHIS PA DE DAG RNAMS LA 'DI LTAR 'DRI
BAR BYA STE, THEG

PA CHE CHUNG GI KHYAD PAR DE SEMS BSKYED RGYA CHE CHUNG GI SGO
NAS MI 'JOG PAR, 'DUL

BA'I BCAS PA SRUNG BA DE THOG DMAN PA DANG, CHANG DANG BUD MED
DANG, DUS

MIN GYI KHA ZAS LA LONGS SPYOD PA SOGS THEG CHEN PAR 'JOG PA'I
KHUNGS 'DI NANG PA

SANGS RGYAS PA'I GZHUNG GANG LAS RNYED, 'DUL BA'I CHOS THEG DMAN
GYI CHOS DANG,

DE LA GNAS PA'I GANG ZAG RNAMS THEG DMAN PAR 'DOD DGOS NA, DGE
TSUL SLONG

SOGS SO THAR RIS BDUN GANG RUNG GI SDOM LDAN YIN NA THEG DMAN PA
YIN PAS KHYAB

PAR 'DOD DGOS LA, DE LTAR NA DGE SLONG SOGS YIN PHYIN DE'I RGYUD
LA BYANG CHUB

KYI SEMS DANG SNGAGS SDOM SOGS MED PAR 'DOD DGOS PA DANG, THEG
CHEN PA

YIN NA DE'I RGYUD LA SO THAR GYI SDOM PA MED PAS KHYAB PA DANG,
DGE SLONG BYANG

SEMS RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I GZHI MTHUN SOGS MED PAR 'DOD DGOS NA, 'DI

'DRA BA'I GTAM SMRA BA LAS THA CHAD PA SU ZHIG YOD, YANG DE NI
MA YIN TE, DGE

SLONG DANG SNGAGS KYI RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I GZHI MTHUN SOGS YOD MOD
KYANG, SNGAGS

KYI THEG PA LA ZHUGS PA'I DGE SLONG DES CHANG DANG DUS MIN GYI
KHA ZAS SPONG BA DANG,

CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM GYI 'BRAL SPANG DANG, CHAB LEN, LHAM PHUD
SOGS

LA RTZIGS SU BYED MI DGOS TE, DE DAG LA RTZIGS SU BYED PA DE
THEG DMAN GYI GNAS

SKABS SU YIN GYI, SNGAGS LA ZHUGS NAS BZA' BTUNG TSOGS KYI 'KHOR
LO DANG,

GANG SNANG LHA DANG BDE STONG GI RNAM ROL SOGS SU 'CHAR BA YIN
PAS CHANG DANG DUS MIN

GYI KHA ZAS SOGS TSOGS SU BYIN GYIS RLABS NAS ROL BAR NYES PA MI
BSKYED PA'I KHAR

@496 PHAN YON KHYAD PAR CAN THOB PA DANG, BUD MED BSTEN PA YANG
BDE BA CHEN PO'I

YE SHES BSKYED PA'I GROGS SU 'GYUR BA LAS PHAM PA SOGS MI BSKYED
CING, DES

MTSON TE LUS NGAG GI SPYOD PA CI BYAS KYANG LHA SNGAGS YE SHES
KYI ROL PA LAS MA 'DAS

PA YIN PAS 'DUL BA NAS BSHAD PA LTAR GYI GU DOG BYA MI DGOS SO
ZHES SMRA 'DOD KYI

KHA PO'I GTZO BO NI 'DI 'DRA ZHIG YIN PAR SNANG MOD, DE LA YANG
'DI LTAR 'DRI STE,

CHANG DANG DUS MIN GYI KHA ZAS SOGS LA LONGS SPYAD NA TSOGS
'KHOR DU 'GYUR BA DANG,

BUD MED BSTEN PA LAS KYI PHYAG RGYAR 'GYUR BA DANG, GANG SNANG
LHA SNGAGS DANG BDE STONG

GI RNAM ROL TU 'CHAR BA SOGS KYI DUS MTSAMS DE SNGAGS LA MA
ZHUGS PA'I GONG NAS

YOD PA ZHIG SNGAGS LA ZHUGS PA LA BRTEN NAS HA GO BA ZHIG YIN
NAM, YANG DE

GONG NAS MED KYANG SNGAGS LA ZHUGS PA TZAM GYIS DE LTAR RANG
SHUGS KYI 'BYUNG BA ZHIG

GAM, SNGAGS LA ZHUGS NAS RTOGS PA MTHON POR SLEB PA LA LTOS DGOS
PA RNAMS

GANG ZHIG YIN, DANG PO LTAR NA, KHYIM PA'I SKYE BO PHAL MO CHE
NAS KHYI PHAG SOGS

DUD 'GRO RNAMS KYIS KYANG TSOGS 'KHOR DANG, LAS KYI PHYAG RGYA
LA SPYOD PAR 'GYUR

TE; DE LTAR 'GYUR BA SNGAGS LA ZHUGS PA LA LTOS MI DGOS PAR DANG
PO NAS YOD PA

YIN PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA LTAR NA, SNGAGS LA ZHUGS PA'I THOG MA
NI DBANG

THOB PA NAS 'JOG PAS, DBANG ZHUS PA TZAM GYIS DE LTAR 'BYUNG NA
LAM BSKYED

RDZOGS KYI GNAS RNAMS 'BAD PA CHEN POS BSGOMS PA DON MED PAR
'GYUR TE, DBANG

ZHUS PA TZAM GYIS GROL BAR 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR, YANG DE LTAR NI MA
YIN KYANG SNGAGS

LA ZHUGS RJES BZA' BTUNG SOGS SNGAGS RGYA TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS
BYIN GYIS BRLABS NA

BDUD RTZIR 'GYUR BAS, DE LA LONGS SPYOD NA 'DUD RTZI LA LONGS
SPYAD PA'I PHAN YON

@497 THOB PA DANG, RANG DANG PHYAG RGYA GNYIS LHA DANG LHA MOR
MOS PA'I NGA RGYAL GYI SGO NAS

SNYOMS PAR 'JUG NA RJES CHAGS KYI BDE BA CHEN PO LA ROL PA'I
PHAN YON THOB PA YIN

NO ZHE NA, BZA' BTUNG SOGS SNGAGS DANG, PHYAG RGYA DANG, MOS
PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS

BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA TZAM GYIS BDUD RTZI DNGOS GNAS PAR 'GYUR BA
DANG, RANG DANG

PHYAG RGYA GNYIS LHA YAB YUM DU MOS PA TZAM GYIS ZAG MED KYI BDE
BA LA ROL PA'I PHAN

YON THOB NA, 'O NA, LAS DANG PO PAS SGOM BZLAS SOGS LA 'JUG PA
NA, SNOD

GZHAL YAS KHANG DANG BCUD LHA DANG LHA MOR MOS PA TZAM GYIS DE
DANG DER DNGOS GNAS LA

'GYUR BA DANG, RANG NYID RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS YIN SNYAM PA'I NGA
RGYAL BYAS PA TZAM

GYIS RDO RJE 'CHANG DU 'GYUR BA SOGS DOD DGOS LA, DE LTAR NA
YANG BSKYED RDZOGS

KYI LAM RNAMS 'BAD PA CHEN POS MTHAR MA PHYIN BAR DU BSGOMS PA
DON MED DU 'GYUR TE,

MOS PA TZAM GYIS GROL BAR 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR, DE LA KHO NA RE, LAS
DANG PO

PAS MOS PA TZAM GYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PAS BZA' BTUNG SOGS BDUD
RTZIR DNGOS

GNAS LA 'GYUR MA THUB RUNG, YID KYIS BDUD RTZIR MOS NAS BLA MA
DKON MCHOG

DANG, RANG NYID KYI PHUNG KHAMS SKYE MCHED LHAR GSAL BA LA PHUL
NA TSOGS KYI MCHOD

PA PHUL BA'I PHAN YON THOB PA'I PHYIR SKYON MED DO ZHE NA, SPYIR
BTANG ZAS LA LONGS

SPYOD PA'I TSE DE LTAR DU MOS PA'I SGO NAS PHUL NA PHAN YON
KHYAD PAR CAN THOB PA NI NGES

PAR YIN CING, RGYU MTSAN DE LA BRTEN NAS SNGAGS KYI SKABS SU
BZA' BTUNG RNAMS

BDUD RTZIR BYIN GYIS BRLABS NAS BLA MA DKON MCHOG LA 'BUL BA
DANG, RANG NYID

LHAR GSAL BA LA NANG GI SBYIN BSREGS KYI TSUL DU 'BUL BA SOGS
ZAS KYI RNAL 'BYOR

NGES PAR DU DGOS PAR GSUNGS PA LTAR, SNGAGS LA ZHUGS PA'I RAB TU
BYUNG BA RNAMS

@498 KYIS KYANG 'DUL BA DANG MI 'GAL BA'I ZAS LA LONGS SPYOD
PA'I TSE ZAS KYI RNAL 'BYOR DE

LTA BU BSTEN DGOS PA YANG YIN MOD KYANG, 'DUL BA DANG 'GAL BA'I
CHANG DANG,

DUS MIN GYI KHA ZAS SOGS LA LAS DANG PO PAS 'DRA DPE RGYAS 'GEB
KYIS DE LTAR LONGS

SPYOD DU MI RUNG STE, CI'I PHYIR NA, DA LTA RANG CAG RNAMS KYIS
SNGAGS RGYA

TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS NA YANG MOS PA TZAM LAS
DNGOS GNAS LA 'DUD

RTZIR BSGYUR MI THUB PA'I KHAR, MOS PA DANG LHA'I NGA RGYAL SOGS
KYANG THOG MAR RIB

TZAM ZHIG LAS ZAS BZA' BA'I MGO MJUG 'KHYONGS PA YANG GNAS MI
THUB PA RANG GI

MYONG BAS GRUB PAS, DES NA THOG MAR MOS PA YUD TZAM BYAS PA'I
PHAN YON TZAM

LAS GZHAN DU THA MAL PA ZAS LA LONGS SPYOD PA'I NGANG TSUL KHO
NA LAS MA 'DAS PAS NA,

DE LTA BU'I SGO NAS CHANG BTUNG BA DANG PHYI DRO'I KHA ZAS SOGS
ZOS NA 'DUL BA DANG 'GAL

BA'I NYES PA CHEN PO THOG TU 'BAB PA LAS TSOGS LA LONGS SPYOD
PAR MI 'GYUR BA'I

PHYIR TE, DPER NA, DA LTA RANG CAG RNAMS KYIS DUG ZHIG SNGAGS
RGYA TING NGE

'DZIN GYIS BDUD RTZIR BYIN GYIS BRLABS SHING RANG NYID LHA'I NGA
RGYAL LA GNAS PA'I KHUL

GYIS LONGS SPYAD NA TSOGS LA ROL BA'I PHAN YON 'BYUNG NGAM, DUG
ZAS PA'I SDUG

BSNGAL 'BYUNG RIG PAS DPYAD NA SHES PAS GANG ZAG RANG GA BAS
LONGS SPYOD MI NUS PA

DANG, DE BZHIN DU MI GTZANG BA DRI CHEN DRI CHU SOGS KYANG DE
LTAR DU LONGS SPYOD MI NUS

LA; GAL TE LONGS SPYAD NA DRI NGA BA DANG, SKYUG PA LDANG BA
SOGS MI GTZANG

BA'I MTSAN NYID MNGON DU 'GYUR BA LAS BDUD RTZI'I YON TAN CHA
TZAM YANG MI 'BYUNG BA

SHES SAM, DE BZHIN DU RTOGS PA'I RGYUD TSOD MTHON POR MA SLEB
PAR BUD MED BSTEN

PA NI DGE SLONG DGE TSUL SOGS YIN NA PHAM PA DANG, PHAM 'DRA
SOGS BSKYED PAS

@499 DGOS PA SGRUB NUS KYI SDOM PA GTONG BA DANG, RAB BYUNG MIN
MA YANG CHANG DANG BUD

MED LA DGA' BA TZAM GYIS CHOS PAR RLOMS PA DE NI KHYIM PA'I SKYE
BO DANG GNYIS SU MA

MCHIS PA'I THA SHAL KHO NA LAS, LAS KYI PHYAG RGYA BSTEN PA'I
MTSAN NYID TSANG BA NI

RMI LAM NA YANG MED PA'I PHYIR, YANG KHYED CAG THEG CHEN GSANG
SNGAGS PAR KHAS

CHES PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS DGE TSUL SLONG GI SDOM PA LTAR SNANG TZAM
ZHIG BLANGS NAS BCAS

PA SNA GCIG TZAM YANG SRUNG MI DGOS PA'I 'DUL BA DE GANG NAS
BSHAD PA YIN, SDOM

PA BLANGS NAS BCAS PA SRUNG MI DGOS NA 'DUL KHRIMS NYIS BRGYA
LNGA BCU SOGS KYI BCAS

PA MDZAD PA LA DGOS PA GANG ZHIG YOD, DE THEG DMAN PA LA DGONGS
PA YIN NO

ZER NA, 'O NA, DGE TSUL SLONG GI SDOM PA 'BOGS PA YANG THEG DMAN
PAR DGONGS

PA YIN NGES LA, KHYED CAG THEG CHEN PA'I YANG RTZE RNAMS KYIS DE
DAG BLANGS NAS GANG

BYED, DENG SANG 'JIG RTEN LA GRAGS PA'I KHA GTAM LTAR SKAL BA
BZANG BZANG YIN

ZER NA, THEG CHEN PA THEG DMAN PA'I CHOS LA ZHUGS PA NI SKAL BA
BZANG BZANG MA

YIN TE, SKAL BA NGAN NGAG YIN PA'I PHYIR DANG SDOM PA BLANGS NAS
BCAS PA LA MI

RTZI BA DE YANG SKAL BA NGAN NGAN CHED DMIGS KYIS BSGRUB PA YIN
PA'I PHYIR, DE BZHIN

DU GSANG SNGAGS PAS RAB TU BYUNG BA LA CING YANG RTZI MI DGOS NA
SNGAGS PA'I DGON SDE

RNAMS KYANG KHYIM PA'I CHA LUGS SAM, SGRUB PA BA'I CHA LUGS SHA
DAG BYAS CHOG

RIGS LA MGO RIL DANG, GZAN BSHAM SDOD 'GAG SOGS RAB TU BYUNG
BA'I

RTAGS CHA LUGS TZAM LA NGES PAR SKYABS BCOL BA MANG DU 'DUG PA
DE GANG ZHIG YIN,

DE NI 'JIG RTEN GYI MIG SNGAR MDZES SHING DANG BA 'DREN PA'I
CHED DU YIN NO ZER NA,

'JIG RTEN GYI MIG SNGAR MDZES SHING DANG BA 'DREN PA ZHIG BYUNG
NA SNYAM PA'I KUN SLONG DE,

@500 SKYE BO RNAMS DAD PA 'PHEL BAS DE DAG GI BSOD NAMS KYI
ZHING DU 'GYUR BA'I CHED YIN

NAM, DAD PA 'PHEL BA LA BRTEN NAS ZANG ZING GI RNYED BKUR TZAM
'BYUNG BA'I CHED

GANG ZHIG YIN, DANG PO LTAR NA, DE BAS LHAG PA'I DGE SBYONG LA
'OS PA'I

YO BYED RNAMS TSUL BZHIN DU 'CHANG ZHING, SRUNG SDOM RNAM PAR
DAG PA BYAS NA SKYE

BO 'GA' ZHIG TZAM DU MA ZAD 'GRO BA LHA DANG BCAS PA'I BSOD NAMS
KYI ZHING SA BLA NA MA

MCHIS PAR 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA LTAR NA NI, RAB BYUNG GI
CHA LUGS

TZAM BGOS KYANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG MI LDAN BZHIN DU DAD ZAS LA
LONGS SPYOD PA NI,

JI SKAD DU, LCAGS GONG ME LCE 'BAR BA ZOS CHOG STE, ,TSUL 'CHAL
YANG

DAG MI SDOM DE LTA MIN, ,ZHES LCAGS GONG ME LCE 'BAR BA ZOS PA
LAS LHAG PA'I

SDUG BSNGAL CHES CHER BSKYED PAR GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DER MA ZAD
RAB TU BYUNG BA'I

RTAGS CHA LUGS GYON NAS BCAS PA MTHA' DAG KHYAD DU GSOD CING,
CHANG DANG

BUD MED DANG, BU BU MO'I TSOGS DANG BCAS TE RKANG BRO GLU GZHAS
SOGS KHYIM PA'I

CHOS LA BAG MED DU SPYOD PA DANG, NGAN SKYUG KYANG SOS MI ZIN
PA'I SMYON PA DANG

KHYI PHAG GI BRTUL ZHUGS LA GNAS PA DAG LA NI SKYE BO BCOL CHUNG
LRE GNYIS TZAM GYIS

RNYED BKUR STOB NA LAS, GZHAN DU KHYIM PA THA SHAL PA TSUN CHOD
KYIS KYANG DMAD

PA'I GNAS SU BYED PA LAS BKUR STI SOGS MI BYED PA MNGON SUM GYIS
MTHONG BA'I PHYIR,

DE LTA NA YANG RAB TU BYUNG BA'I RTAGS TZAM ZHIG LA NGES PAR
SKYABS BCOL DGOS PA

RNAMS KYI 'DUN MA'I GTZO BO NI, RAB BYUNG GI GOS TZAM ZHIG GYON
NAS 'DU KHANG

ZHIG TU TSOGS PA SKAD BYAS NA DMA' MTHA' GZHAN GYIS SHI GSON GYI
RIM GROR BSNYEN

BKUR JA THUG ZHIG LAS MA BYUNG KYANG GTONG MI YONGS THABS DANG,
MGO RIL

@501 LUS BSGYUR BYAS NAS GRVA PA'I GRAL LA TSUD TZAM ZHIG BYUNG
NA DPON KYI KHRAL SOGS

'THEN MI DGOS PA'I BSAM BLO TZAM LAS, THAR BA DANG THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA DON

DU GNYER BA DANG, BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI BDE SKYID LA PHAN
PA SOGS NI NAM

DU YANG MA YIN TE, TSUL DE LTA BUS NI RANG NYID THAR PA DANG
THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR

'GRO BA'I SROG RTZA GCOD CING, BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA'I BDE SKYID
LA LHAG PAR GNOD

PA LAS PHAN PAR 'GYUR BA'I GNAS MED PA'I PHYIR, DE LTAR 'CHAL
SPYOD MKHAN RNAMS

LA LUNG RIG DRI MA MED PAS MTHA' BKAG PA NA, MTHAR GYI 'JOG SOR,
LAS DANG

PO PAS 'DUL BA DANG 'GAL BA SOGS KYI KHA NA MTHO BA'I LAS LA
'JUG NA SPYIR BTANG

LA NYES PA DE DANG DE LTA BU BSKYED PA YIN NA YANG, SNGON GYI
GRUB CHEN GONG MA SOGS

KYI RNAM THAR LA DAD PA'I SGO NAS DE DAG GI PHYI RJES SKYONG BA
LA NYES PA MED DO ZHES BSNYON

HAM DANG 'BREL BA'I GTAM DE TZAM ZHIG SMRA NA LAS RIGS PA DON
MTHUN GYI LAN GANG

YANG SMRA RGYU MED MOD, DE LA YANG 'DI LTAR SMRA STE, SNGON GYI
GRUB BRNYES GONG

MA RNAMS RTOGS PA'I RGYUD TSOD MTHON PAR PHEBS PAS 'DOD YON SOGS
LAM DU 'KHYER

BAR MDZAN RIGS KYANG, DE LTA BU'I RGYUD TSOD LA SLEB PA LA SNGAR
LAN MANG DU BSHAD

PA LTAR LAM THUN MONG BAS RGYUD LEGS PAR SBYANGS, THUN MONG MA
YIN PA GSANG

CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSKYED RDZOGS KYI LAM RNAMS LA DKA' BA
DANG 'BAD PA DU MAS MA

'BAD PAR MOS PA YID BYED TZAM GYIS RGYUD TSOD MTHON POR SLEB MI
NUS LA, DA

MA SLEB BZHIN DU RGYUD TSOD MTHON POR PHEBS PA RNAMS KYI LAD MO
BYAS NA RANG NYID PHUNG BA

YIN TE, RJE BTZUN MI LA RAS PA LHO BRAG MAR PA'I ZHABS DRUNG NAS
RANG YUL DU PHEBS

SKABS, SNGAR KLOG SLOB PA'I SLOB DPON GYI SRAS ZHIG YOD PA DE'I
DRUNG DU PHEBS

@502 PA NA, SRAS DES BLA MA DANG CHOS KYI LO RGYUS DRI BZHUS PAR
LAN DRANG POR GSUNGS

PA LAS, DE LTAR YIN NA NGO MTSAR CHE, DES NA KHYED RANG YANG
MDZES SE KHAB

TU BZHES, KHANG ZHING RNAMS KYANG BDAG GIR MDZAD NAS BLA MA'I
RNAM THAR SKYONG BA

DRAG CES ZHUS PA LA, RJE BTZUN GYI ZHAL NAS, SKYES MCHOG MAR PA
LO TZA

KHONG NI 'GRO BA'I DON DU YUM BZHES 'DUG ,DE LTA BU'I YON TAN
DANG NUS PA BDAG

LA MED PAS, STAG GI 'PHYONG SAR WAS 'PHYONGS NA, WA SKED PA CHAG
PA

LAS 'OS MED PAS DKA' SPYAD SNYING RUS DANG SDUG RGUR DRAG POS
SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

SNYING POR BYED PA YIN CES GSUNGS MI 'DUG GAM, DBANG PHYUG MI LA
RAS PA LTA

BU'I SBYANGS PA SNGON SONG GI SKYES BU CHEN PO DE 'DRA BAS KYANG
DANG PO NAS DOGS ZON DE..

LTAR MDZAD NA, RANG CAG RNAMS KYIS DE LTAR RUNG MIN SMOS KYANG
CI DGOS,

DENG SANG DBANG RNON SBYANGS PA SNGON SONG GI GANG ZAG RGYUD
TSOD MTHON POR PHEBS PA 'GA'

ZHIG YOD PAR NGES KYANG, DE DAG NI SBRAS PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS 'DZIN
PA LAS MNGON

MTSAN DU MI MDZAD LA, GZHAN NI DUS DBANG GIS NGA DANG NGA 'DRA
BA PHAL MO CHE NI

SNGAR BSHAD PA LTAR, THUN MONG LAM SBYANG GI RIM PA SNA GCIG LA
YANG MYONG BA MA

THON PA'I CHOS PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN TZAM 'DZIN PA KHO NAR BAS NA,
GRUB DBANG GONG

MA RNAMS KYI BRTUL ZHUGS KYI MDZAD PA'I RJES SU DA LTA NAS 'JUG
RUNG BA'I SPYI BRTOL

MA BSKYED PAR KHAS BLANGS PA'I DAM TSIG DANG SDOM PA SPYI DANG,
NANG TSAN RAB TU BYUNG

BA RNAMS KYIS NI 'DUL BA'I BCAS PA GTZANG SING NGE SRUNG BA NYID
GZHIR BZUNG BA'I STENG

DU RANG RANG GI KHA TSOD BSTUN PA'I SNGAGS KYI NYAMS LEN LA 'BAD
NA 'DI PHYI'I LEGS

TSOGS KYI TZA BA TSUGS SHING BSTAN PA LA YANG DE RANG PHAN CHE
BA YIN LA, DE YANG RI BO

@503 DGE LUGS PA GCIG PU'I BGO SKAL LTA BU MA YIN PAR, SA RNYING
'BRI LTAG KAR

'BRUG SOGS SANGS RGYAS PA'I GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN PA THAMS CAD KYIS
DE LTAR MDZAD NA

RANG RANG GI BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN
RING DU GNAS PAR 'GYUR

RO; ;ZHES DA DUNG YANG DANG YANG DU GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING, DER MA
ZAD GANG

ZAG RANG NYID RGYUD TSOD MTHON POR SLEBS PA ZHIG YIN NA YANG
SNYIGS MA'I DUS NGAN 'DI

LTA BUR DNGOS SU PHYAG RGYA BSTEN PA SOGS BYAS NA RANG NYID LA
'CHING BA'I RGYUR MI 'GRO

NA YANG, RJES 'JUG RNAMS KYIS GDENGS TSAD GANG YANG MED BZHIN DU
MIG LTOS

DE KHA'I RJES SU ZHUGS NAS BSTAN PA LA GNOD TSAB CHE BAR 'GYUR
PAS, DE LA

DGONGS NAS JO BO RJES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA LAS, GSANG
DBANG SHES RAB

YE SHES NI, ,TSANGS PAR SPYOD PAS BLANGS MI BYA, ,ZHES TSANGS
SPYOD LA

GNAS PA'I DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA RTOGS PA MTHON POR SON PA
ZHIG YIN NA YANG,

GSANG DBANG DANG SHES RAB YE SHES KYI DBANG GNYIS DNGOS DBANG DU
BLANGS MI RUNG BAR

GSUNGS PA YIN LA, DES NA RJE TZONG KHA PA'I RNAM THAR GTZANG MA
SNGAR GONG DU BSHAD

PA RNAMS DANG, DA DUNG 'OG NAS KYANG 'CHAD PAR 'GYUR BA LTAR
'DUL KHRIMS

PHRA RAGS LA NYES PAS MGOS PA'I SGO NAS BSTAN PA 'BA' ZHIG GCES
PAR BZUNG BA NI

BSTAN PA 'JIGS PA LA MNGON DU PHYOGS PA 'DI LTA BU'I DUS SU PHAN
YON LHAG PAR DU

CHE BA THOB PA YIN TE, MDO TING 'DZIN RGYAL PO LAS, BSKAL PA BYE
BA GANG

G'A'I BYE SNYED DU, ,DVANG BA'I SEMS KYIS ZAS DANG SKOM RNAMS
DANG, ,GDUGS

DANG BA DAN MAR ME'I 'PHRENG BA YIS, ,SANGS RGYAS BYE BA KHRAG
KHRIG RIM GRO BYAS, ,

GANG GIS DAM CHOS RAB TU 'JIGS PA DANG, ,BDE GSHEGS BSTAN PA
'GAGS

@504 PAR GYUR PA'I TSE, ,NYIN MTSAN DU NI BSLAB PA GCIG SPYOD
PA, ,BSOD NAMS

'DI NI DE BAS CHES KHYAD 'PHAGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DES NA
BSTAN

PA'I RTZA BA MED DU MI RUNG BA NI DAM PA'I CHOS 'DUL BA KHO NA
YIN LA LA DGOS NAS

THUB PA'I DBANG PO NYID KYIS KYANG CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM SOGS DGE
SBYONG LA 'OS PA'I

YO BYAD RNAMS 'CHANG BAR MDZAD CING, 'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD RNAM
PAR DAG

PAS SKU TSE'I MTHA' BRTEN PAR MDZAD PA DANG, 'KHOR BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA'I DGE

'DUN DANG, NYAN THOS KYI DGE 'DUN RNAMS KYIS KYANG DE LTA BU'I
RNAM THAR LA BRTEN

NAS MOD SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS SU
YUN RING DU GNAS PAR

MDZAD PA YIN LA, STON PA THUGS RJE CAN GYI RNAM THAR BZHIN DU
RJE BDAG NYID

CHEN PO TSONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BZHED DON GYI GTZO BO YANG MDO
SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA 'DI

NYID 'JIG RTEN NA 'PHEL RGYAS YUN RING DU GNAS BZHIG BYUNG NA CI
MA RUNG DGONGS PA KHO

NA YIN PA NI RJE NYID KYI THUGS SMON TSIGS BCAD LAS, RANG GIS JI
BZHIN RTOGS

PA'I LAM GYI GNAD, ,SHUGS DRAG BRTZE BAS DRANGS PA'I THABS MKHAS
KYIS, ,

'GRO BA'I YID KYI MUN PA SEL BYAS NAS, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN
RING 'DZIN

GYUR CIG ,BSTAN PA RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS MA KHYAB PA'AM, ,KHYAB
KYANG NYAMS

PAR GYUR PA'I PHYOGS DER NI, ,SNYING RJE CHEN POS YID RAB BSKYOD
PA YIS, ,

PHAN BDE'I GTER DE GSAL BAR BYED PAR SHOG ,CES GSUNGS PA YIN, DE

LTA BU'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA THAMS CAD 'PHEL BA DANG, YUN DU
GNAS PA'I

RTZA BA NI GONG DU LAN DU MAR BZLAS PA LTAR 'DUL BSTAN RIN PO
CHE KHO NA YIN PA LA

'DI NYID BAR SKABS SU HA CANG NYAMS DMAS PAR GYUR BA THUGS KYIS
MA BZOD NAS

@505 GONG DU RNAM THAR GYI DKYUS SU BKOD ZIN LTAR THOG MA'I RTEN
'BREL GYI SLAD DU MKHAN CHEN

PHYAG RDOR BA DANG, RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GSUNGS GIS
BSKUL BA BZHIN

RDZING PHYI'I JO BO LA BSTOD PA TSANGS PA'I COD PAn ZHES PA'I
BKA' RTZOM DANG BCAS CHOS

GOS RNAM GSUM, MKHAR SIL, LHUNG BZED, GDING BA, CHU

TSAG SOGS DGE SBYONG GI YO BYAD TSANG MA PHUL BA'I SGO NAS 'DUL
BSTAN RMANGS NAS

BSO BA'I THUGS BSKYED RGYA CHEN POR MDZAD PA DANG, MNYAM DU
BZHUGS SKABS

GSER PHYE 'BUM PAR MCHOD PA ZHEN PO PHUL ZHING GDUL BYA RNAMS LA
'DUL BA'I

CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS PA DANG, DER YANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I
DBYANGS KYI GSUNG

GIS BSKUL BA BZHIN, DE PHYIN CHAD 'DUL BA'I BCAS MTSAMS PHRA
ZHING PHRA BA THA

NA RUNG CHU 'DEBS PA TSUN CHAD MA NYAMS PA PHYAG LEN DU BSTAR
ZHING, DPON SLOB

TSANG MAS PHEBS BZHUGS KYI GNAS SKABS KUN TU CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM
GYIS GTZOS

PA'I DGE SBYONG LA 'OS PA'I RTAGS CHA LUGS TSANG MA 'CHANG BAR
MDZAD PAS 'DUL BA

'DZIN PA'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB CING, DE NAS
BZUNG STE RTAGS CHA

LUGS PHUN SUM TSOGS PAS RIM GYIS SA STENG THAMS CAD KHYAB PAR
GYUR PA DANG,

GNAM RTZE LTENG DU CHOS RJE RNAM PA GSUM ZHAL 'DZOMS PA'I SGO
NAS 'DUL BA'I PHYAG

LEN GZHI BCU BDUN NAS GSUNGS PA'I BCAS PA PHRA MO YAN CHOD DANG,
RNAM 'BYED

NAS BYUNG BA'I BCAS PA PHRA RAGS LA SOGS PA RNAMS KYI NGO BO, GO
RIM,

SRUNG TSUL LA SOGS PA ZHIB CING PHRA BA DANG, BCAS PA DE DAG LAS
'DAS TSE

GANG 'DAS BA'I LTUNG BA THAMS CAD RANG RANG GI MING RIGS KYIS
PHYIR 'CHOS PA'I CHO GA

'DUL BA NAS JI LTAR BSHAD PA BZHIN GYI PHYAG LEN RNAM PAR DAG
PA'I SROL LEGS PAR

@506 BTZUGS PA DANG, GZHAN YANG DUS DANG GNAS SKABS GANG GI TSE
NA'ANG 'DUL BA'I

BCAS PA RIN PO CHE LA NYES LTUNG GI DRI MAS ZHAR YANG MA GOS PA
SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG

PA'I TSUL 'BA' ZHIG LA SBYOR BA GTZO BOR MDZAD PA'I MTHU LAS DUS
KYI MTHAR YANG

'DUS PA DANG PO SLAR YANG BYON PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR 'DUL BSTAN
CHES CHER RGYAS PA'I

BKA' DRIN DE LTA BU STZAL ZHING, DE BZHIN DU BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA'I BSLAB BYA DANG,

RIGS PA 'DZIN PA SNGAGS KYI DAM TSIG PHRA RAGS RNAMS LA NI DE
BAS KYANG GAL PO CHER

'DZIN PA'I SGO NAS NYES PAS CHA TZAM MA GOS PA MIG 'BRAS BZHIN
DU SRUNG BA GTZO BOR

MDZAD PA LAS, DENG DUS KYI SNGAGS PAR KHAS CHE BA 'GA' ZHIG LTAR
GSANG SNGAGS

KHAR 'KHYER NAS THO CHO DANG RTZING SPYOD LA 'JUG PA NI NAM YANG
MI MDZAD PA SOGS MDOR

NA SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI RNAM THAR GANG LA YANG 'CHAL SPYOD KYI
DRI TZAM MI MNGA' BA NI,

ZANG ZANG NE RING PA 'CHI MED RAB RGYAS KYI GSUNG LAS, RIN PO
CHE TZONG KHA PA DE

NYID MKHAS PAR MA ZAD BTZUN PA'I YANG MCHOG TU GYUR PA ZHIG YIN
TE, DE YANG

SO SOR THAR PA'I NANG NAS KYANG DGE SLONG GI BSLAB BYA TSO BZHES
PHYIN CHAD CHOS GOS

GSUM DANG, MKHAR SIL DANG, LHUNG BZED SOGS NYER LDAN GYI YO BYAD

RNAMS 'BRAL MED DU BSTEN PA DANG, CHAB LEN PA DANG, RUNG CHU
'DEBS

PA SOGS MDOR NA 'DUL BA 'BUM SDE'AM, GZHI BCU BDUN GYI PHYAG LEN
SOGS

LA SNGAR DUS TSOGS PA SDE BZHI'I MKHAN SLOB RNAMS BZANG BA DANG
BA DANG 'DAMS PAR BYED KYANG,

DUS DE'I TSE RJE RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID KYI DRUNG DU SLEBS PA LA
PHO SKYES SU BYED PA DANG,

PHO LAS BYAS PAR 'DZIN CING 'DAMS PA BYUNG 'DUG LA, THA NA DE
DUS RI BO DGE

LDAN GYI CHU BSKYEL MI DANG, THAB KHA BA DANG, JA MA TZAM GYIS
KYANG PHYIS KYI

@507 CHOS RJE DANG, BLA MAR MING BTAGS NAS 'DUL KHRIMS SRUNG
RLOM MANG PO LAS

LHAG PA'I BSLAB KHRIMS BSRUNG ZHING, BTZUN TSUGS KYANG BZANG BA
BYUNG 'DUG PA'I

RGYU MTSAN DU MA YOD KYANG MA SPROS TE, SHES RIG CAN DANG GZU
BO'I BLO CAN RNAMS

KYIS BSAMS SHING BLTAS NA CUNG ZAD SHES PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES
DANG, YANG

RIN PO CHE SKU BTZUN TE KHYIM PA'I SPYOD PA DANG RTAGS SNA GCIG
KYANG MI 'DRES PA'I 'DUL

'DZIN RNAM DAG TU BZHUGS LA, GSUNG BTZUN TE THA MAL GYI TSIG GAM
PHAL TSIG

PHAL CHE BA SPANGS PA MA ZAD, CHOS LDAN GYI THAD RE RE TZAM MA
GTOGS PA THUGS

DAM SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR YI DAM GYI BZLAS BRJOD KHO NA GTZO BOR
MDZAD PA YIN,

YANG MI DRAG ZHAN SU BYUNG YANG DE RNAMS LA CHOS 'JIG RTEN GYI
ZHAL TA GNANG BA THAMS

CAD CHOS DANG MTHUN ZHING, YA RABS SU GYUR PA'I TSIG GIS BRDA'
SPROD RNAM DAG

MDZAD PA DANG, CHE BRJOD MDZAD PAR 'OS PA RNAMS LA YANG SNYOM
LAS DANG RAS

CHOD MI MDZAD PAR DON MTHUN GYI CHE BRJOD MDZAD PA YIN TE, DE
YANG MTSAN NYID

KYI YON TAN 'DZIN PA DAG LA SLOB DPON DKA' BCU BA ZHES DANG,
SLOB DPON DKA'

BZHI BZHES SOGS KYI BSNGAGS TSIG SKABS DANG MTHUN PAR GSUNG BA
DANG, DGON PA

LA BRTEN PA'I BTZUN PA MTSAN NYID KYI YON TAN DANG MI LDAN PA
SNGAGS PHYOGS CUNG ZAD SHES

PA LA YANG DGE BSHES ZHES PA'AM, BLA MA ZHES SOGS KYI SNYAN TSIG
DANG BCAS TE

GSUNG BA YIN, ZHES DANG, YANG, RJE RIN PO CHE DE NYID 'BRI PHAG

GNYIS KYI RIN PO CHE DU MA DANG, GSANG BDE GUNG GSUM GYI MKHAN
PO DANG, DGA'

SKYOR ZUL GSUM GYI MKHAN PO RNAMS KYI BLA MA MDZAD PA MA ZAD,
DBUS KYI GONG

MA CHEN PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS KYI YANG BLA MA MDZAD PA LA
BRTEN, RI BO

@508 DGA' LDAN DU YANG SDE DGON SHIN TU CHE BA GCIG GI 'DZIN
TSUGS RANG SHUGS KYIS BYUNG

'DUG PA DANG, PHYOGS KYI MI PHAL MO CHE'I SEMS LA, RIN PO CHE
'DI

NYID RTZA BA KHAMS PA'I DGE BSHES YIN PAS LTAG TSUGS BZANG BA'I
STENG DU GONG MA

MCHOD YON SOGS KYI 'DEGS BZANG SNYAM PA'I 'JIGS ZIL LA BRTEN,
LAN RE

TZAM LA RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG DU SLEBS PA LTA CI SMOS, SKOR LAM GYI
KHONGS SU SLEB PA

TZAM DANG, GZIMS KHANG MTHONG BA TZAM DANG, SGO NANG DU SLEBS PA
TZAM

LA YANG 'DAR SIL SIL YONG BA DANG, 'JIGS ZHUM YONG BA SOGS BYIN
RLABS

KYI ZIL LAM, GZI BRJID KYI ZIL SHIN TU CHE BAR 'ONG BA ZHIG YIN
'DUG KYANG,

RIN PO CHE RANG GI DRUNG DU SLEBS TE BKA' LUNG GNANG BA'AM,
BRDA' SPOD LEGS

PO MDZAD PA'I RJES SU MI DRAG ZHAN PHAL MO CHE DAD PA RANG DBANG
MED PAR SKYE BA DANG,

BLO BAG PHEBS PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU PHYIN CHAD SKU DRUNG DU
BSDOD 'DOD PA DANG, GZHAN

DU 'GRO MI 'DOD PA SOGS YOD PAR SNANG, ZHES DANG, MDOR NA SKU
BTZUN

PA SOGS GZHIR BZHAG ,GSUNG YANG BTZUN ZHING YON TAN MANG PO DANG
LDAN PA

ZHIG BYON PAR 'DUG ,THUGS NI DE BAS KYANG BTZUN TE, THUGS LA
NYON MONGS

PA SPYI SHAS CHUNG BA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU CHAGS SDANG GI KUN
SLONG MI MNGA' ZHING,

BYAMS SNYING RJE DANG, DAG SNANG CHE TSUL SOGS DU MA 'DUG STE
NGA RANG NA BA 'DIS

ZHIB CHA SPRO MA THUB PAS YIG CHA GONG 'OG DU MA LAS SHES DGOS
SO, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA LTAR TE, DE DAG NI BTZUN PA'I YON TAN LAS BRTZAMS PA'I
RNAM PAR

THAR PA 'PHROS BSHAD DGAG SGRUB DANG BCAS PA MDO TZAM CHED DU
BRJOD PA'O, ,SMRAS PA,

RNAM DAG 'DUL KHRIMS GTZANG MA'I SDONG PO'I GZHIR, ,BYANG CHUB
SEMS KYI LO

@509 'DAB KHUR GYIS BRJID, ,RIM GNYIS 'BRAS BU G-YUR DU ZA BA
YI, ,GSUM

LDAN DPAG BSAM LJON PA 'GRO BA'I DPAL, ,GANG GI THUGS RGYUD ME
LONG GTZANG

MA'I NGOS, ,BCAS DANG RANG BZHIN NYES PAS CHA TZAM YANG, ,GOS
PA'I NGANG

TSUL RGYAL BA'I YE SHES KYIS, ,BSGRIMS TE BSKAL PAR GZIGS KYANG
DMIGS

SU MED, ,LEGS LAM KUN GYI GZHI DANG RTZA BA NI, ,DAM CHOS 'DUL
BA NYID

DU RNAM 'DREN GYIS, ,LAN CIG MIN PAR LUNG DU BSTAN NA YANG,
,RANG GAR

DOR BA RMONGS PA'I RTAGS SU NGES, ,DOM PA BLANGS NAS TSUL KHRIMS
MI SRUNG ZHING, ,

RAB BYUNG RGYAL MTSAN 'CHANG NAS KHYIM PA YI, ,BRTUL ZHUGS SPYOD
RNAMS NYES LTUNG  KHUR CHEN PO, ,'BAD NAS BSGRUB PA'I TSUL LAS
GZHAN DU CI, ,SO THAR KHRIMS

KYI RMANGS GZHI MI BRTAN PAR, ,GSANG CHEN LAM GYI KHANG BZANG
BRTZEGS NA YANG, ,

RTZA BA RUL PA'I LJON SHING JI BZHIN DU, ,'GYEL BAR GYUR LAS
BSLANGS THAMS SHIN

TU DKA', ,RMAD BYUNG 'DUL BA'I KHRIMS GTZANG ZHING SA LA, ,BYUNG
CHUB SEMS

DANG RIG PA 'DZIN PA YI, ,SA BON BSKRUN NA RING MIN DON GNYIS
KYI, ,'BRAS

BU LAG RTZER 'BYIN LA BSLU BA MED, ,DE LTAR PA'I GNAD GSANG MA
LUS PA, ,

THUGS SU CHUD PAS THOG MAR 'DUL BA'I BSTAN, ,'PHEL RGYAS YUN DU
GNAS PA'I

MDZAD PA LA, ,MGON PO KHYOD KYIS NYIN DANG MTSAN DU BRTZON, ,DE
YI MTHU

LAS THAR PA DON GNYER KUN, ,GANG GI BSTAN PA'I TSUL LA RAB ZHUGS
NAS, ,

GNANG BKAG BCAS PA'I MTSAMS LAS MI BRGAL BA'I, ,TSUL KHRIMS DAG
PA'I

PHUNG PO KHUR DU 'KHYER, ,DZA TI'I DRI BSUNG 'THUL BA'I YUL GRU
NAS, ,ZA 'OG

THAGS SU BSKRUN PA'I NOR 'DZIN BAR, ,LI KHRI'I CHAB KYIS CHED DU
BRAN PA BZHIN, ,

@510 NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I MDANGS KYIS KHYAB PAR GYUR, ,DA DUNG
SNYIGS MA'I YANG MTHAR

GYUR NA YANG, ,BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA TSUL KHRIMS GCES 'DZIN PA'I,
,GANG ZAG

MTHA' DBUS KUN TU KHYAB PA 'DI, ,MGON PO KHYOD KYI DRIN LAS
GZHAN NA GANG, ,

ZHES PA NI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I 'PHRENG BA'O, ,:
YANG PHUL DU BYUNG

BA'AM BZANG PO'I YON TAN JI LTAR MNGA' BA'I TSUL NI, DE YANG
BZANG PO'I YON

TAN ZHES PA THUGS RGYUD RANG BZHIN BZANG BA TZAM LA BYED PA MA
YIN ZHING, SPYIR NA

RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I YON TAN MTHA' DAG BZANG PO'I YON TAN YIN MOD
KYANG, 'DIR  MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM ZHES PA'I NANG TSAN GYI
BZANG PO'I YON TAN NI, THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG LAS, NGES
'BYUNG SNYING RJE

MCHOG GIS RGYUD DUL ZHING, ,SHES BYA'O GNAS KUN MTHONG BA'I BLO
GROS RGYAS, ,

KHYAD PAR MTHA' BRAL GNAS LUGS DE BZHIN NYID, ,RTOGS PA'I YE
SHES STZOL ZHIG

'JAM DPAL DBYANGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, THUGS RGYUD NGES 'BYUNG
DANG,

SNYENG RJE CHEN PO DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS KYIS YONGS SU DUL
ZHING, SHES

BYA'I GNAS KUN LA THOGS PA MED PAR 'JUG PA'I SHES RAB DANG, YANG
DAG PA'I

LTA BA'I GDENGS DANG LDAN PA DE LTA BU ZHIG LA BYED PA YIN, DE
YANG THUGS RGYUD NGES

'BYUNG KHYAD PAR CAN GYI GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR TSUL NI, LAS DANG
PO PA LTAR 'KHOR

BA SPYI DANG BYE BRAG GI SDUG BSNGAL RNAMS YANG YANG CHED DU
GNYER NAS BSAMS PA DANG

BSGOM PA SOGS LA LTOS MI DGOS PAR, SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NYID NAS
'KHOR BA

MTHA' DAG ME 'BAR BA'I KLONG LTAR GZIGS PA'I NGES 'BYUNG BCOS MA
MA YIN PA NGAM

NGAM SHUGS KYIS THUG RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS PA YIN TE, MKHAS GRUB
THAMS CAD MKHYEN

@511 PAS, KHYOD SKU'I NYIN BYED YUM GYI CHU 'DZIN LAS, ,GSAL BAR
BYON TSE SRID

PA'I PHUN TSOGS LA, ,KUN NAS SRED PA'I GLOG GI ROL RTZED DANG,
,NAM YANG

'GROGS PA SPANGS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,GZHON NU NYID NAS RGYAL BA'I
BRTUL

ZHUGS KUN, ,MA SMAD TSUL KHRIMS MCHOG GIS LEGS BSDAMS SHING,
,SKYE

BA KUN TU GCIG TU BAG YOD LA, ,GOMS PA'I MTHU LDAN KHYOD LA GSOL
BA 'DEBS, ,

ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR YIN LA, DE LTA BU'I NGES 'BYUNG GIS THUGS
RGYUD BSKUL BAS

KHYIM GYI 'DU 'DZI GDUG SBRUL GYI MTSANG LTAR DU DGONGS PAS
DGUNG LO GSUM PA'I

DUS NYID NAS KARMA PA ROL PA'I RDO RJE LAS YONGS RDZOGS DGE
BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BZHES

SHING, LO DE KHA'I NANG NAS KHYIM DU MA BZHUGS PAR CHOS RJE DON
GRUB RIN CHEN

GYI DRUNG DU BCAR BZHUGS SU MDZAD DE KHYIM GYI 'DU 'GOD MCHIL
MA'I THAL BA BZHIN DU

DOR BA MDZAD PA SOGS, MDOR NA NGES 'BYUNG RNAM DAG THUGS RGYUD
LA RANG CHAS

SU MNGA' BA'I TSUL NI, SNGAR GONG DU BKOD ZIN PA LTAR RJE THAMS
CAD MKHYER PA RANG

NYID KYI GSUNG LAS, DE YANG KHO BO LA GZHAN GYIS BSTAN BZANG PO
BSHAMS PA DANG,

GUS PA'I BSNYEN BKUR SOGS JI TZAM BYAS PA TZAM GYIS CHED DU BSAM
MI DGOS PAR

DE'I SKABS RANG DU, 'DI THAMS CAD MI RTAG CING YID BRTAN DU MI
RUNG BA SGYU MA'I BSLU

BRID DANG 'DRA BA YIN SNYAM PA'I SKYO BA SHUGS DRAG PO SNANG BA
BUN LONG DU THONGS BA, YID

GTING NAS 'GYUR BA RGYUN RING POR SKYE BA ZHIG DANG PO NAS RANG
CHAS SU YOD PA YIN,

ZHES DANG, NYAMS MGUR LAS, SDUG BDEN NYES DMIGS BSAMS LA MA 'BAD

NA; ;THAR PA DON GNYER JI BZHIN MI SKYE ZHING, ,KUN 'BYUNG 'KHOR
BA'I 'JUG

RIM MA BSAMS NA, ,'KHOR BA'I RTZA BA GCOD TSUL MI SHES PAS,
,SRID

@512 LAS NGES 'BYUNG SKYO SHAS BSTEN PA DANG, ,'KHOR BAR GANG
GIS BCINGS PA SHES PA

GCES, ,RNAL 'BYOR NGAS KYANG NYAMS LEN DE LTAR BYAS, ,THAR 'DOD
KHYED KYANG DE

BZHIN BSTEN 'TSAL LO, ,ZHES RANG GI THUGS RGYUD NYAMS MYONG GI
STENG NAS BKA' STZAL

PA RNAMS KYIS SHES LA, DE DAG LA MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PAS, 'DI NI 'DI'I

SKYE BAS THOB PA'I LHAN SKYES KYI YON TAN YIN GYI, SKU TSE 'DI
NYID LA GNYEN POS GSAR

DU BSKYED PA'I SBYOR BYUNG NI MA YIN TE, ZHES DANG, 'DI NI SHIN
TU MTHO BA'I RTOGS

PA KHYAD PAR CAN DU BOD LA GRAGS PA MANG PO ZHIG GIS CHA TZAM
YANG BSGRUN PAR MI NUS

PA'I MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I YON TAN YIN TE, ZHES DANG, TSUL 'DI NI
MKHAS

PA MGU PA BSKYED PA'I RNAM PAR THAR PA CHES NGO MTSAR RMAD DU
BYUNG BA YIN NO, ,ZHES

GSUNGS SO, ,DE BZHIN DU SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA MA BU GCIG PA LA
BRTZE BA LTA

BU'I BYAMS PA DANG SNYING RJE CHEN PO YANG SKU TSE 'DIR 'BAD
RTZOL LA LTOS MI DGOS PAR

RANG SHUGS KYIS THUGS RGYUD LA MNGA' BA NI NGES PA'I DON DU RJE
BTZUN 'JAM DPAL

DBYANGS DANG NGO BO GCIG PAS NA LUNG RIG GIS BSGRUB MI DGOS PA
MA ZAD, THUN

MONG GDUL BYA'I SNANG TSUL LTAR GYI DBANG DU BYAS NA YANG BDAG
NYID CHEN PO 'DI SNYIGS

MA'I DUS MTHAR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RNAM PAR DAG PA 'DZIN CING
SPEL BA'I SLAD DU BSAM

BZHIN DU SRID PA NYE BAR BZUNG BA 'DI YANG SPYIR MKHA' KHYAB KYI
SEMS CAN THAMS CAD

DANG, NANG TSAN KHA BA RI PA'I GDUL BYA RNAMS LA SHAS MI BZOD
PA'I SNYING RJE CHEN

POS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE BYON PA YIN LA, DE YANG DENG DUS KYI BLA
MAR GRAGS PA

PHAL CHE BA LA GZHAN DAG GIS KHYOD NI 'GRO BA'I DON DU BSAM
BZHIN DU BYON PA YIN NO

ZHES CAM BU'I NGO BSTOD BYAS PA DANG MI MTSUNGS TE, NGO BSTOD DE
LTAR BYAS PA RNAMS

@513 LAS 'GA' ZHIG BSTOD PA LTAR DON LA GNAS PA'I BDAG NYID CHEN
PO'ANG MCHIS MOD,

LA LA NI BSTOD PA LTAR GYI YON TAN GYI CHA 'GA' DANG 'GA' ZHIG
TZAM YANG MED PA'I

BLUN PO DAR BSTUMS PA'ANG MANG DU SRID LA, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO
NI NGO BSTOD

LA LTOS MI DGOS PAR THOG MAR RANG YUL DU BZHUGS PA'I GZHON NU'I
GNAS SKABS

DANG, BAR DU DBUS GTZANG GI LJONGS SU PHEBS NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN
PA LA THOS BSAM

SGOM GSUM RNAM PAR DAG PA MDZAD PA DANG, DE THAMS CAD KYANG
RNYED BKUR SNYAN

GRAGS SOGS KYI DBANG DU MA SONG BAR BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE KHO NA
MI NYAMS SHING RGYAS LA

YUN DU GNAS PA 'BA' ZHIG GI RGYUR 'GYUR BAR MDZAD PA NI GONG DU
RIM PAR ZHIB CING

RGYAS PAR BKOD PA RNAMS KYI SHES LA, DE LTAR MDZAD PA'I THUGS
BSKYED KYI GTZO BO

NI 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD 'KHOR BA SDUG BSNGAL GYI 'DAM LAS
DBUGS PHYUNGS TE

THAR PA CHEN PO'I GLING DU BGROD PA ZHIG BYUNG NA CI MA RUNG
DGONGS PA KHO NA DANG, DE LTAR

DU BGROD PAR BYED PA LA NI, LUNG LAS THUB RNAMS SDIG PA CHU YIS
MI 'KHRU ZHING, ,

'GRO BA'I SDUG BSNGAL PHYAG GIS SEL MIN LA, ,NYID KYI RTOGS PA
GZHAN LA SPO MIN TE, ,

CHOS NYID BDEN PA BSTAN PAS GROL BAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES SDIG PA CHU
YIS 'KHRU BA DANG,

SDUG BSNGAL PHYAG GIS TSER MA 'DON PA LTAR BYAR MED CING, RANG
NYID KYI RTOGS

PA GZHAN LA BGO BSHAR YANG BYAR MED PAS, DAM PA'I CHOS BSTAN PA
DE'I DON NYAMS

SU LEN PA NYID LA RAG LAS SHING, DE LA BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE TSANG
LA MA NOR BA

'JIG RTEN DU GNAS PA ZHIG MED NA THAR PA 'DOD KYANG DMUS LONG
THANG LA 'KHYAMS PA

LTAR DON MI 'GRUB PAR GZIGS NAS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MA RTOGS
PA DANG, LOG

PAR RTOG PA DANG, RANG BZO DANG, LTAR SNANG TSUL 'CHOS SOGS KYI
DRI MA

@514 MTHA' DAG SBYANGS TE RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA JI LTA BA DE NYID
SGO THAMS CAD NAS RNAM PA

THAMS CAD DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PA'I THABS 'BA' ZHIG LA NYIN DANG
MTSAN DU LUS SROG

LA MA LTOS PAR BRTZON PAR MDZAD PA NI, RJE NYID KYI GSUNG LAS,
RTEN NAS

'BYUNG BA'I DE NYID GSAL MDZAD PA'I, ,THUB PA'I LUGS BZANG SKYE
BA THAMS CAD DU, ,

LUS DANG SROG KYANG BTANG NAS 'DZIN PA LA, ,SKAD CIG TZAM YANG
LHOD PAR MA GYUR CIG,

'DREN PA MCHOG DES DKA' BA DPAG MED KYIS, ,NAN TAN SNYING POR
MDZAD NAS

BSGRUB PA 'DI, ,THABS GANG ZHIG GIS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR SNYAM PA'I,
,RNAM

PAR DPYOD PAS NYIN MTSAN 'DA' BAR SHOG ,CES GSUNGS PA LTAR YIN
LA, DE

LTAR DU MDZAD PA YANG RANG GI DON DU NI CHA TZAM MA YIN PAR 'GRO
BA LA GCIG TU BRTZE

BA'I BYAMS SNYING RJE TSAD MED PA KHO NA'I GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR
PA YIN LA, DE'I PHYIR

MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS, RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS CHU YI
PHUNG PO BZHIN, ,

KHYOD THUGS SNYING RJE'I GTING MTHA' JI TZAM ZHES, ,YE SHES
SPYAN LDAN KUN GYI YUL

LAS 'DAS, ,RJE BTZUN THUGS RJE'I GTER LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA YIN, DE LTA BU'I BYAMS PA DANG SNYING RJE CHEN PO'I
GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR

BA'I BDAG NYID CHEN PO RNAMS NI, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE'I
GSUNG LAS, SRID

PA'I 'BROG TU NYAMS THAG 'GRO RNAMS LA, ,THUGS RJES PHYAG RING
SKYONG BAS DBUGS

'BYIN PA, ,DPAL LDAN THUB PA KUN GYI MDZAD PA'I KHUR, ,GCIG TU
BSNAMS

PA KHYOD LA MGOS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR GZHAN NGOR
RGYAL BA'I SRAS KYI

TSUL BZUNG NA YANG, SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI MDZAD PA'I NGO MTSAR NI
RGYAL BA KUN GYI 'PHRIN

LAS KYI PHUNG PO GCIG TU BSDUS PA DANG MTSUNGS PAR 'JUG PA YIN
NO, , ' BYAMS

@515 PA DANG SNYING RJE DE LTA BUS BSKYED PA'I BYANG CHUB KYI
SEMS RIN PO CHE GANG GI THUGS RGYUD LA

RGYUN MI CHAD DU MNGA' BA NI, SNGON RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS
'KHOR LOS

BSGYUR BA'I RGYAL PO RTZIBS KYI MU KHYUD KYI SRAS DBANG PO'I
TSOGS SU GYUR PA'I THUGS

BSKYED PA'I SMON LAM JI LTAR MDZAD PA GONG DU ZUR TZAM BKOD ZIN
PA LTAR DANG, YANG,

SNGON 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I RGYAL PO NAM MKHAR GYUR PA'I TSE DE
BZHIN GSHEd PA 'BRUG

SGRA'I DBYANGS KYI RGYAL PO'I SPYAN SNGAR THUGS BSKYED PA'I TSE
SMON LAM JI LTAR MDZAD PA NI,

'PHAGS PA DKON MCHOG BRTZEGS PA LAS, 'KHOR BA'I THOG MA MED PA
YI, ,SNGON

GYI THA MA JI SRID PA, ,DE SRID SEMS CAN PHAN DON DU, ,SPYOD PA
DPAG YAS SPYAD

PAR BYA, ,'JIG RTEN MGON PO'I SPYAN SNGA 'DIR, ,BYANG CHUB MCHOG
TU SEMS

BSKYED DO, ,'GRO BA THAMS CAD MGRON GNYER TE, ,DBUL ZHING PHONGS
LAS SGROL BAR

BYA; ;DE RING PHAN CHAD GAL TE YANG, ,BDAG GIS 'DOD CHAGS SEMS
BSKYED NA, ,

PHYOGS BCU DAG NA GANG BZHUGS PA'I, ,SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD BSLUS
PAR 'GYUR, ,

BYANG CHUB NAM ZHIG THOB BAR DU, ,THA BA'I SEMS DANG GNOD SEMS
DANG, ,PHRAG

DOG DANG NI SER SNA YANG, ,DE RING PHYIN CHAD MI BYA'O, ,TSANGS
PA'I SPYOD PA BDAG GIS

SPYAD, ,SDIG PA'I 'DOD PA YONGS SU BTANG, ,TSUL KHRIMS SDOM DANG
DES PA LA, ,

SANGS RGYAS RJES SU BSLAB PAR BYA, ,BDAG NI BYANG CHUB RING TSUL
DU, ,'TSANG

RGYAR MOS SHING SPRO BA MED, ,PHYI MTHAR THUG GI BAR DU YANG,
,SEMS CAN GCIG

PHYIR SPYOD PAR BYA, ,TSAD MED BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA'I, ,SANGS
RGYAS ZHING NI SBYANG

BAR BYA, ,PHYOGS RNAMS BCU PO THAMS CAD DU, ,BDAG GI MING NI
THOS PAR BYA, ,

BDAG GIS BDAG LA LUNG BSTAN TE, ,SANGS RGYAS 'GYUR BA DOGS PA
MED, ,BDAG

@516 GI LHAG BSAM RNAM PAR DAG ,BDAG DBANG 'DI NA 'DREN PA
RNAMS, ,LUS

DANG NGAG GI LAS RNAMS KYANG, ,RNAM PA KUN TU BDAG GIS SBYANGS,
,YID KYI

LAS KYANG SBYANG BAR BYA, ,MI DGE'I LAS NI SPYAD MI BYA, ,MA
'ONGS DUS NA

SANGS RGYAS TE, ,'JIG RTEN MGON DU 'GYUR ZHE NA, ,BDEN PA DES NI
SA 'DI

YANG, ,RNAM PA KUN TU G-YOS GYUR CIG ,BDAG GIS BDEN TSIG GANG
BRJOD

PA; ;MA NOR YANG DAG SMRA SHES NA, ,BDEN PA DES NI MKHA' DBYINGS
LAS, ,

SIL SNYAN DAG KYANG SGRA GRAG SHOG ,BDAG LA GAL TE G-YO MED
CING, ,DE

BZHIN THA BA MED CE NA, ,MANDA RA BA'I ME TOG BZANG, ,BDEN PA
DES NI CHAR

DU PHOB, ,YANG DAG DON DU NGES PA YI, ,TSIG BDEN DE SKAD BRJOD
PA DANG, ,

PHYOGS BCU MTHA' YAS THAMS CAD KYI, ,BYE BA'I ZHING RNAMS RAB TU
G-YOS, ,

DE YI MOD LA MKHA' DBYINGS NAS, ,SIL SNYAN BYED BA'I SGRA YANG
BYUNG, ,ME TOG

MANDA RA BA DAG ,MI 'GRENG BDUN SRID BAB PAR GYUR, ,RGYAL PO DE
YI RJES

BSLABS TE, ,SROG CHAGS BYE BA NYI SHU YIS, ,'DREN PAR BDAG CAG
'GYUR

SMON ZHES, ,YID DU 'ONG BA'I SGRA YANG BSGRAGS, ,DE LTAR SROG
CHAGS BYE BA

PHRAG ,NYI SHU PA RNAMS THAMS CAD KYANG, ,RGYAL PO MCHOG GI RJES
SLOB CING, ,

BYANG CHUB MCHOG LA ZHUGS PAR GYUR, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA DE LTA BU'I
TSUL GYIS BYANG

CHUB TU THUGS BSKYED CING SMON LAM MDZAD PA LTAR, ,'KHOR BA MA
STONG GI BAR DU

RGYAL SRAS KYI SPYOD PA RLABS PO CHE LA RGYUN MI CHAD DU SLOB
PAR MDZAD PA MA ZAD, DRANG

DON THUN MONG BA'I MOS NGO DANG 'TSAMS PA'I RJE BDAG NYID CHEN
PO'I SKU TSE 'DI KHA'I

DBANG DU BYAS NA YANG BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS BCOS MA MA YIN PA THUd
RGYUD LA RGYUN CHAd SU

@517 MNGA' BA NI, RJE NYID KYI NYAMS MGUR LAS, SEMS BSKYED THEG
MCHOG LAM GYI

GZHUNG SHING STE, ,RLABS CHEN SPYOD PA RNAMS KYI GZHI DANG RTEN,
,TSOGS GNYIS
