CHOS LUNG DU BZHUGS

@573 SKABS RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS SLAR MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS
NAS SKU GDUNG RIL POR

ZHOG CES LUNG BSTAN MDZAD PA THUGS SRAS BU SLOB KYI DVANGS MA
'GA' LA BKA' GNANG

BA'I DON THUGS LA BZHAG PA NYID DU NGES LA, YANG, LUNG BSTAN
DER LO SUM

LO BZHI BRGYA DANG NYI

'DIR BZHUGS PAS

DUS MA 'GRIG GO SNYAM NA, DE LTA BU LA NI

'GYUR

DAM PA RNAMS KYI

THUGS BSKYED SMON LAM GYI MTHU DANG, SKYES 'GRO DMANGS KYI
RNAM DKAR BSAGS

RGYAB KYI MTHU LAS DUS RING DU 'GYANGS PA JI SNYED CIG 'BYUNG
BA DANG, SKU TSE RING

THUNG GI LUNG BSTAN GYI DBANG DU BYAS NA YANG RJE RAS CHUNG PA
LA BLA MA WA LA TZANDRAS ZHAG

BDUN GYI TSE LAS MI 'DUG CES GSUNGS PAR, GRUB PA'I RGYAL MO LA
BRTEN PA'I TSE

'PHEL TE BRGYAD BCU

RANG LA YANG CHOS

LTAR RO, ,ZHES

ZHAL BSTAN NAS SKU TSE SPEL BAS DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM GYI
BAR DU BZHUGS PA LTAR,

BZLOG PAR MA BYAS

@574 NA DE LTAR YIN NGES SU ZIN KYANG, GTZO BOR RJE THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA NYID GANGS  

RI'I LJONGS KYI SKYO BO RNAMS LA LHAG
PAR THUGS BRTZE ZHING, BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE

PA'I DBANG GIS

THUGS BSKYED BYIN RLABS RGYA CHER MDZAD PA DANG, RJES 'JUG
SRAS KYI THU BO RNAMS

KYIS GTZOS DA LTA'I BAR ZAM MI CHAD DU BYON PA'I BDAG NYID
CHEN PO RNAMS KYI THUGS

BSKYED DANG, GANGS CAN 'GRO BA DMANGS KYI RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I
DGE MTHU SOGS

LA BRTEN NAS SNGON CHAD KYANG DUS RING DU 'GYANGS BA MA ZAD,
DA DUNG KYANG RE ZHIG NI

ZHE NA, RANG

KHA TSON GCOD PAR DKA'

RGYAL PO'I

PHYOGS SU DAR ZHING,

SLAR YANG DBUS SU DAR BAR GSUNGS PA'I DBUS NI RGYA GAR YIN LA,
DE NAS RTZIS

PA'I BYANG NI BOD DANG, BYANG NAS BYANG DU DAR BA NI BOD NAS
HOR SOG GI YUL GRU

CHEN PO RNAMS SU DAR BA DANG, DE NAS RIM GYIS SLAR YANG YUL
DBUS RGYA GAR NYID

DU DAR BAR GSUNGS PA LAS, DA LTA BSTAN PA'I GTZO BO 'JAM MGON
BLA MA'I BSTAN

PA 'DI NYID BOD NAS RGYA HOR GYI YUL DU DAR BA'I SKABS YIN LA,
DE NAS SLAR RGYA

NYID CHEN PO'I SKU GDUNG

PO'I SNYAN PA CHES CHER DU

SLAR YANG

BRGYAD TZAM LAS GRUB PA'I GDUNG RTEN CHEN MO, RIN PO CHE RIN
THANG GZHAL BAR

DKA' BA'I PHRA SNA TSOGS BKOD PAS MDZES PAR BYAS PA BZHENGS
TE, DE'I BUM

PA'I SNAM SBYAR SOGS KYIS

BCUG NAS YI DAM GYI

LHAR BSKYED DE TSUL KHRIMS KYI DRI NGAD DPAG TSAD DU LDANG
BZHIN PAR, ZHAL 'BRI

LHA MI KUN GYI BSOD

CHE'I ZHAL BYANG SHAR

GYI NGOS SU GZIGS PA LAS MDO KHAMS STOD SMAD NAS RGYA HOR GYI
YUL GRU CHEN PO'I

BAR DU ZHVA SER GYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I RTEN 'BREL
DANG, SKU RGYAB NUB TU

'BYUNG BA'I RTEN

'BREL LA DGONGS PA'O, ,DE'I RJES SU SNE'U GDONG DANG 'BRI GUNG
NAS THOG DRANGS

PA'I SBYIN BDAG BU SLOB RNAMS KYIS GSER DNGUL ZHO BRGYA PHRAG
DANG, STONG PHRAG LONGS

PA'I GDUNG 'BUL BYUNG BA RNAMS LA GZHI MDZAD, GZHAN YANG
PHYOGS PHYOGS SU ZANGS

BYUNG BA RNAMS LA BRTEN

TE, NANG RTEN GYI

GYIS CHE BA, SHIN

@576 TU BYON LEGS SHING RMAD DU BYUNG BA BZHENGS SHING, SKU
GDUNG DANG SKU BRNYAN SOGS

NANG RTEN RNAMS BZHUGS PA'I YUL DU GTZUG LAG KHANG SHIN TU CHE
ZHING LEGS PA GSAR

BSKRUN DANG BCAS PA'I RTEN BRTEN PA RNAMS LA LCAGS BYI LO'I
NANG RAB TU GNAS PA YAN

CHAD YONGS SU RDZOGS PA GRUB PAR MDZAD, SKU GDUNG RIN PO CHE
GTZUG LAG KHANG GSAR

PAR GDAN DRANGS PA'I TSE NAM MKHA' 'JA' TSON GYIS KHYAB CING,
ME TOG GI CHAR BAR

SNANG GANG BA BABS PA DANG, GZHAN YANG BYI LO HOR ZLA BCU PA'I
NANG DGA' LDAN DU RDO

RJE SLOB DPON DANG BCAS PA'I DGE 'DUN BRGYA PHRAG DU MAS GSANG
BDE 'JIGS GSUM,

KYEE RDOR, DUS 'KHOR, 'KHOR CHEN, TSE DPAG MED KUN RIG SOGS
DKYIL 'KHOR

CHEN PO MANG PO SGRUB CING MCHOD PA'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA ZHAG DU
MA'I BAR DU BSGRUBS PA NA,

NYIN DANG PO DANG RJES MA LA ME TOG GI CHAR BAB PA NI, MU TIG
GI MDOG LTA BU CHUNG NGU

'DAB MA DRUG PA SOGS YU BA DANG BCAS PA BABS PA DANG, NYER
LNGA'I SKU MCHOD DNGOS

GZHI'I NYIN ME TOG CHUNG NGU DE LTA BUS SA LA KHA BA LTAR
CHAGS PA DANG, GZHAN YANG

ME TOG 'DAB MA DRUG PA LA SOGS PA KHA CIG GI MDOG NI DUNG
DANG, KHA CIG NI

GSER BTZO MA DANG, KHA CIG NI LI KHRI LTA BU DANG, KHA CIG NI
RGYA MTHING BZANG POS

BYUGS PA LTA BU MI CHEN PO'I LAG PA'I KHYON TZAM DPAG TU MEN
PA BABS PA DANG, DE DANG

DUS MTSUNGS SU SNE'U NAS DPON NAM MKHA' BZANG PO KHU DBON GYIS
RA KHA BRAG TU BYAMS

CHEN CHOS KYI RJE SHAKYA YE SHES GDAN DRANGS TE DGE 'DUN MANG
PO'I TSOGS DANG BCAS

DUS KYI MCHOD PA RGYA CHER MDZAD DE GSOL BA BTAB PA'I TSE
NA'ANG ME TOG GI CHAR CHEN PO

BAB PAR SNANG ZHING, DE NAS BZUNG STE DENG SANG GI BAR DU'ANG
DGA' LDAN LNGA MCHOD CHEN

MO ZHES HOR ZLA BCU PA'I NYER LNGA LA RGYA BOD HOR SOGS SKYA
SER, GRUB MTHA' RIS SU

@577 MA CHAD PA THAMS CAD KYIS GLING ME SBAR BA SOGS RNAM DKAR
LA BRTZON PA RGYUN MI CHAD PA

'DI DAG KYANG RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI 'PHRIN LAS KYI
MTHU KHO NA STE, RGYU MTSAN

DE DAG GI PHYIR MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS KYANG, MDOR NA
MYA NGAN LAS

'DAS PA'I MDZAD PA BSTAN PA'I RJES SU'ANG, NYID KYI NGO MTSAR
BA'I MDZAD PA DAG

GIS GDUL BYA DPAG TU MED PA SMIN GROL GYI LAM LA BZHAG PAR
MDZAD DO, ,ZHES

GSUNGS SO, ,DE LTAR ZHING 'DIR SKU TSE GCIG GI MDZAD PA MTHA'
MA BSTAN NAS ZUNG

'JUG GI SKU MNGON DU MDZAD DE MKHA' KHYAB KYI ZHING RAB 'BYAMS
RNAMS SU SPRUL PA'I

BKOD PA MTHA' MED PAS 'GRO BA'I DON MDZAD TSUL MA LUS PA NI
BRJOD PAR GA LA NUS

SHING, RAGS RIM RANG CAG RNAMS KYI MIG DANG RNAM BA'I YUL DU
GYUR PA DAG

KYANG PHAL CHE BA SNGAR GONG DU BKOD ZIN NA'ANG, DA DUNG DE
DAG TU MA GSAL BA MYA

NGAN LAS 'DAS RJES SU MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA GZIGS
PA LNGA'I SGO NAS

DNGOS SU ZHAL BSTAN CING, GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI STZAL BA'I TSUL
LA SOGS PA RNAMS

KYANG DAD PA'I BSOS SU RAGS TZAM BRJOD NA, DE YANG LAN GCIG
MKHAS GRUB

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GSUNG CHOS GNANG SAR BYON NAS GZIMS KHANG
DU PHEBS PA'I SKABS

SHIG THUGS DGONGS LA, LAR SEMS CAN 'DI RNAMS SNGON BSOD NAMS
CHEN PO

MA BSAGS PAS YONGS 'DZIN MTSAN NYID DANG LDAN PA NI MED, 'DUS
BYAS MI

RTAG PAR BSTAN NA RTAG PAR 'DZIN, CHOS RNAMS KYI GNAS LUGS
STONG PAR BSTAN

NA BDEN GRUB TU 'DZIN, LONGS SPYOD SNYING PO MED PAR BSTAN NA
'BAD RTZOL CHER

BTANG NAS SGRUB, TSE 'DI'I SNYAN GRAGS BRAG CHA LTAR BSTAN NA
THOB BYA MTHAR THUG TU

'DZIN, MDOR NA RJE BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I SNGAGS
MTSAN NYID KYI LEGS BSHAD,

@578 RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GSANG BA'I GNAD RNAMS LA 'KHRUL PA'I
CHA PHRA MO TZAM MED PA'I MTHA'

CHOD PA 'DI LTA BU RNAMS NYIN MTSAN DU 'BAD NAS BSHAD KYANG,
SKAL BA DANG MI LDAN  PAS GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON 'DI
LTA BU MI MYANG BAR, BSHES GNYEN NGAN

PA GLEN ZHING GTI MUG PA GANG YANG MA BSLAB PAS CI YANG MI
SHES PA, BLANG DOR GYI

GNAS LA RMONGS PA DUD 'GRO LTA BU ZHIG GI MDUN DU KHA BSAGS
DANG GZHOGS SLONG,

RNYED BKUR SNYAN GRAGS, NGAG 'KHYAL KU CO, DMAG DANG CHOM RKUN
GYI GTAM, BDAG

BSTOD GZHAN SMOD SOGS KYI TSIG RE NYAN, KUN SPYOD KHYI PHAG
LTAR ROL BA 'DI LTA

BU LA BLANG DOR GYI GNAD SHES PA ZHIG GIS SEMS MNAL DU PHOB LA
LTOS DANG, LAR

'CHI BA NI MA DRAN, TSE 'DI'I RNYED BKUR GYIS NI G-YENG, LOG
PA'I LAM LA 'JUG

PA'I SEMS CAN 'DI RNAmS LA GZId DANG ZHES THUd SHIN TU SKYO
BAS SPYAN CHAB MANG PO SHOR,

DE'I TSE MCHOD PA BZANG POR BSHAMS NAS RJE LA GSOL BA DRAG PO
BTAB CING BSHUMS

PAS, RJE BLA MA GLANG PO CHE SPU MDOG GANGS RI LTAR DKAR BA,
CANG SHES YAN

LAG DANG LDAN PA, MCHE BA DRUG YIN PA, LUS GSER GYI DRA BAS
G-YOGS SHING,

GSER GYI DRIL BU BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PAS SPRAS PA, SGA RIN PO
CHE'I RGYAN GYIS BRGYAN

PA ZHIG LA CHIBS PA, RJE BLA MA RANG GI RNAM PA CAN DU BYON
NAS NGA'I BU SEMS MI BDE

BA MI DGOS, BLA MA DRAN PAR BYAS PAS SNGAR BSAGS SDIG PA STOBS
CHEN 'DAG

CING, BSOD NAMS KYI TSOGS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA GSOG NUS PA
YIN, NGED

RANG DPON SLOB KYI 'DUN MA RTZA BA NAS LEGS PA YIN, RNAL 'BYOR
DBANG PHYUG

MI LAS KYANG BLA MA DRAN NAS BLA MA DRAN DRUG GI MGUR SOGS
MDZAD PA DANG MTSUNGS,

DA PHYIN CHAD NGA'I BSTAN PA 'DI RGYAS PAR GYIS SHIG ,CES
GSUNGS, ' YANG

@579 LAN CIG ,GSUNG RAB KYI DKA' GNAD KHYAD PAR CAN 'GA' ZHIG
DANG, KHYAD

PAR BSKYED RDZOGS KYI GNAD KHYAD PAR CAN 'GA' LA DOGS PA BYUNG
BAR, BDAG

GI BLA MA DE BZHUGS NA ZHU BA YIN PA LA RJE BLA MA NI MA
BZHUGS, THAG CHOD PA'I

KHUNGS GZHAN NI MED, RJE BLA MA DE BZHUGS NA DGA' BA LA, NGA'I
BLA MA DE GANG

NA BZHUGS SNYAM DU DGONGS NAS THUGS SKYO ZHING PHYOGS GZHAN DU
CHOL CHOL BYUNG BAS,

YANG MAndAL DANG BCAS PA'I MCHOD PA BZANG BA ZHIG BSHAMS NAS
PHA RIN PO CHE, RJE

BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO ZHES CHO NGE CHEN POS GSOL BA BTAB
CING SPYAN CHAB BTON PAS,

RJE BLA MA DE NOR BU MU TIG LA SOGS PAS SPRAS PA'I GSER GYI
KHRI LHA'I BU MANG POS

BTEGS PA ZHIG GI STENG DU BYON NAS, DKA' BA'I GNAD THAMS CAD
MA LUS PAR

BCAD, BKA' RJES GNANG MANG PO DANG, GZHAN YANG CHOS MANG DU
GSUNGS

BLA

MA'I GSUNG RAB RNAMS LA GZIGS SHING, YIG CHA GZHAN RNAMS LA
YANG GZIGS

PAS SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI SOGS MDOR NA SNGAGS
MTSAN NYID KYI GSUNG RAB

DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA'I DON BSTAN TSUL DANG, DE DAG GI DON
THAMS CAD

GANG ZAG GCIG 'TSANG RGYA BA'I NYAMS LEN DU 'KHYER LUGS, 'GO
BSHES GNYEN

BSTEN TSUL NAS BRTZAMS TE LAM THUN MONG BAS RGYUD SBYANGS PA
NAS ZUNG 'JUG TSE GCIG

LUS GCIG LA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MNGON DU BYED PA'I BAR
GYI LAM GYI LUS YONGS

SU RDZOGS PA 'DI LTA BU LA NGA'I BLA MA RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS
GYI RNAM SPRUL RJE TZONG KHA PA...  MA GTOGS RGYA GAR 'PHAGS
YUL DANG, BOD KYI BKA' GDAMS PA DANG, PHYAG RGYA

PA GNYIS KA LA MA BYUNG 'DUG SNYAM DU RJE'I SKU CHE BA'I YON
TAN DRAN NAS DAD PA CHEN PO

@580 BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA 'KHRUNGS, SPYAN CHAB NA BZA' BANGS
PA TZAM BTON, PHA

RIN PO CHE SKU DRIN CAN, SKU DRIN 'KHOR MED, DZAM BU GLING GI
SEMS CAN THAMS

CAD KYIS KHYED KYI SKU DRIN GSAB TU MED, RJE TZONG KHA PA ZHES
GSOL BA DRAG PO BTAB

PAS, RJE BLA MA SENG GE DKAR MO 'JIGS SU RUNG BA RIN PO CHE'I
RGYAN BSAM GYIS MI

KHYAB PAS SPRAS PA ZHIG LA CHIBS PA, SKU MDOG DMAR SER RAL GRI
DANG GLEGS

BAM 'DZIN PA GZHON NU'I TSUL CAN, RIN PO CHE'I RGYAN SNA TSOGS
PAS SPRAS PA,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I TSUL DU BYON NAS NGA'I BU NGU MI DGOS,
NGAS CHOS ZHIG 'CHAD

PA YIN NO GSUNGS TE, SPYIR SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU SEMS CAN GYI
RIGS LA SNA

TSOGS 'ONG, KHYAD PAR DA LTA'I DUS SU 'CHI BA MI RTAG PA DANG,
NGAN SONG

GSUM GYI SDUG BSNGAL MA DRAN PAS RNYED BKUR SNYAN GRAGS LTO
GOS KYI BYA BA PHAL PA LA

ZHEN, TSE 'DI'I BYA BA SGRUB SGRUB NAS SKYE BA PHYI MA 'DI
LTAR 'GYUR SNYAM PA'ANG DKON PAR

GDA', ZHES SOGS MANG DU CHOS GSUNGS PA'I MTHAR, KHO BOS BLA MA

YI DAM LA GSOL BA DRAG TU BTAB, TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB SBYANGS
BYAS, GZHUNG

LUGS CHEN MO RNAMS LA BRGAL ZHING MTHA' DPYAD PA'I LEGS BSHAD
'DI RNAMS BLTAS

TE; YID CHES PAR BYAS NAS DBEN PAR RTZE GCIG TU NYAMS SU
BLANGS NA SANGS RGYAS

LAG MTHIL NA YOD PA YIN TE BYED MKHAN DKON, DE LTA NA'ANG SNOD
RUNG GI GDUL

BYA 'GA' RE SRID PAS DE DAG LA PHAN PAR GYIS, KHYAD PAR DU
NGA'I SNGAGS KYI LEGS

BSHAD 'DI RNAMS RGYAS PAR GYIS SHIG SKYE BA PHYI MA LA MYUR DU
'PHRAD PA YIN NO, ,

ZHES GSUNGS SO, , ' YANG, SKABS SHIG RJE BLA MA DRAN NAS NGA'I
BLA

MA DE GANG NA BZHUGS YOD, NAM ZHIG MJAL NA SNYAM DU SPYAN CHAB
MANG PO BTON CING,

@581 THUGS MNAN PAS MI NON PA TZAM DU SKU LUS 'DAR ZHING BA SPU
G-YO BA DANG BCAS, RJE

BLA MA TZONG KHA PA KHYED KYIS NGA LA RANG GZIGS DANG, SEMS CAN
RMU RGOD KYI SPYOD

PA 'DI RNAMS LA GZIGS DANG, KHYED KYI BSTAN PA 'DI YANG BAR
SNANG GI GLOG GAM

DRI ZA'I GRONG KHYER LTAR MYUR DU RANG BSDUD PA 'DRA, NGA YANG
KHYED KYI ZHABS DRUNG DU NAM

ZHIG 'ONG NA ZHES GSOL BA DRAG TU BTAB PAS, RJE BLA MA STAG CHEN
PO 'JIGS SU

RUNG BA ZHIG LA CHIBS NAS RNAL 'BYOR PA'I CHA LUGS SU MDZAD, SKU
MDOG DMAR

PO SPYAN DANG SHANGS CHE BA, PHYAG G-YAS RAL GRI 'BAR BA NAM
MKHA' LA 'PHYAR,

G-YON PA BDUD RTZIS GANG BA'I KA P'A LA THUGS KAR BZUNG, RAL PA
DMAR PO'I THOR

COG LA DAR SNGON BCINGS PA, RUS PA'I RGYAN GYIS BRGYAN PA, SHIN
TU 'DZUM ZHING

BKRAG CHE BA LA GRUB CHEN BRGYAD BCUS BSKOR NAS DGYES BZHIN DU
BYON TE, BU SHES PA

'PHYO MI DGOS, NGA LA'ANG KHYOD MIN PA BSAM RGYU MED, KHYOD
KYANG NGA MIN PA SU BSAM,

KHYOD BZHAG NAS GANG DU'ANG MI 'GRO ,NGA DRAN NA SNGAGS MTSAN
NYID KYI LAM RIM GNYIS

KYIS GTZO BYAS PA'I YIG CHA 'DI RNAMS NGA'I KHA CHEMS YIN PAS
'DI RNAMS LTOS, SPYIR

SEMS CAN RNAMS BSOD NAMS SHIN TU CHUNG DU SONG, NYON MONGS PA
RAGS, BSTAN

PA'I MJUG BSDUD PA'I MGO YANG RTZAM 'DUG ,KHYOD RANG MKHA' SPYOD
DU 'ONG BA'I

'DUN PA THONGS GSUNG NGO, , ' DE NAS SKABS SHIG TU MKHAS GRUB
RIN

LEGS PA 'DRA,

LA RE, DES NA

RJE BLA MA GANG NA BZHUGS KYANG ZHU LA, ZHU RGYU GZHAN YANG 'GA'
ZHIG YOD DGONGS

YUL DU MI SHONG BA

@582 TZAM GYI MTHA' YAS MU MED PA CIG BSHAMS TE PHUL NAS, PHA
DUS GSUM GYI

SNGAR GYI RAB TU BYUNG

BDAG

GIS BSU MKHAN GTONG GSUNG BA LA, RJE BLA MA DA LTA GANG NA
BZHUGS PA LAGS,

SPYOD, DGA'

LDAN, DZAMBU GLING LA SOGS PA MANG POR YOD PA YIN, DA LTA RGYA
NAG RI BO RTZE LNGAR

RANG YANG DER

TSOGS JI LTAR LA

PA'I GDUL BYA MANG BA

PHYI BAR GSUM DU

GNANG BA DANG,

SGOS CHOS SU

NGES NGES BRJOD

THU BO

PA 'GA' DANG 'GA'

DU BYAS NA, RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR GYI GTAM BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA
LAS, DAM PA 'DI'I

'KHOR NI CHOS 'BREL 'DZIN PA'I BLA MA DPA'O RDO RJE SOGS GSUM,

@588 LEGS DPAL BZANG PO DANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB
PA SOGS 'PHRIN

LAS NAM MKHA' DANG MNYAM PA'I SRAS CHEN BZHI, HOR STON NAM RGYAL
BA SOGS

DBUS GTZANG BSTAN PA'I SNANG BYED BCU, BYANG SEMS SH'AKYA BSOD
NAMS SOGS

GZHAN DON LHUN GRUB KYI SEMS DPA' BCU, BYAMS CHEN SH'AKYA YE
SHES SOGS MI

DBANG GI TI SHRI GNYIS, YAR RGYAB BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL SOGS MANG
DU THOS PA'I

DPON SRAS GNYIS, CHOS RJE LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SOGS SBYANGS YON
'DZIN PA'I

COG CHEN COG CHUNG GNYIS, ZHANG ZHUNG PA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA
SOGS RNAM DPYOD

PHUL BYUNG GNYIS, SHES RAB BZANG PO GNYIS SOGS BSTAN PA PHYOGS
MTHAR SPEL

BA'I DAR CHEN DRUG ,'GOS LO TZA BA GZHON NU DPAL SOGS SKAD GNYIS
SMRA BA GNYIS,

'BRI KHUNG RIN PO CHE DON GRUB RGYAL PO SOGS SA SKYONG GI CHOS
RJE DRUG ,MNGA'

RIS PA BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN SOGS GSUNG RAB MANG DU MKHYEN PA'I
BSTAN 'DZIN BRGYAD,

RONG PO LJAGS NAG SOGS MDO RONG GI MKHAS PA BZHI, KRE ZHING
BYANG DPAL BA

SOGS MKHA' SPYOD GRUB PA'I GDUNG BRGYUD GNYIS, SKYES MCHOG SMON
LAM DPAL

BA SOGS YA MTSAN CAN GYI SKYES BU GNYIS, SPYAN MNGA' BLO GROS
RGYAL MTSAN PA

SOGS SKYE RGU'I GTZUG RGYAN BRGYAD, TE'U RA PA YE SHES DPAL SOGS
KHRI CHEN 'DZIN

PA'I BLA MA BZHI, MKHAN CHEN CHOS RGYAL BA SOGS SA SKYONG BA'I
MKHAN PO BZHI, CHEN

PO GRAGS BZANG SOGS CHEN PO LNGA, 'BRI KHUNG CHOS SGO BA BKRIS
RIN CHEN SOGS

DBANG BZHI BSKUR BA'I CHOS SGO GNYIS, DKA' BCU DAR BZANG SOGS
LUNG RIGS

DON 'DZIN PA'I

DKA' BZHI BA BCU, JO GDAN BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB SOGS BRTUL BZHUGS
'DZIN

@589 PA BZHI, GNAS BRTAN CHOS BZANG SOGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM PAR
DAG PA'I GNAS BRTAN

DRUG ,RGOD PHRUG RTOGS LDAN GRAGS PA 'BYUNG GNAS SOGS TSE BLOS
BTANG GI RTOGS

LDAN LNGA, GZHAN YANG RGYA STON CHOS BZANG BA SOGS SKU DNGOS KYI
SLOB MA YONGS SU

GRAGS PA NI PHYED KYIS LHAG PA'I NYIS BRGYA TZAM STE, ZHES
GSUNGS LA, DGA'

LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG LAS KYANG GRANGS SDOM 'GA' ZHIG LA MANG NYUNG
GI KHYAD PAR LAS PHAL

CHE BA GONG DANG MTSUNGS PA NAS, SDOM SO SO'I BU SLOB RNAMS KYI
MTSAN GSAL

BA DANG BCAS 'GOD PAR MDZAD 'DUG PA DE NANG LTAR NA, SRAS KYI
THU BO GSUM NI

RGYAL TSAB, MKHAS GRUB, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB PA
BCAS

LA NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD CING, CHOS 'BREL GSAN PA'I DBANG GIS BLA MA
DBU MA BA,

PHYAG RDOR BA, RJE RE MDA' BA GSUM KYANG SLOB KHONGS SU GTOGS,
SNGA TSAR

BZHI NI, TSA KHO DPON PO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA, MDO STOD GRAGS PA
BLO GROS,

STONG STON DZNYA NA SHRI, DGE BSHES SHA STON DANG BZHI, PHYI
TSAR BRGYAD LAS DBUS

PA BZHI NI 'JAM DKAR BA, BZANG SKYONG BA, RIN RGYAL BA, BYANG SE
BA BZHI,

MDO KHAMS PA BZHI NI, RJE RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO, SHES
RAB

GRAGS PA, 'JAM DPAL BKRIS, DPAL SKYONG BA BZHI STE, BRGYAD PO

'DI BYA BRAL LA BYON DUS KYI PHYAG PHYI BA 'KHOR DAG PA RNAM
BRGYAD DU GRAGS, 'PHRIN

LAS CHE BA LNGA NI, 'DUL 'DZIN PA, 'JAM DKAR BA, CHOS RJE BKRIS
DPAL

LDAN, MTSUNGS MED RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO, RJE BTZUN SHES RAB SENG
GE LNGA, BSTAN

PA'I SGRON ME BCU NI, RJE DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS, MKHAS PA RGYAL
DBANG KHA CHE,

RAB RGYAL

KYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU

BDUN SNANG BAR MKHA'

'GRO MA RNAMS KYIS DE THAMS CAD GANG ZAG 'DI DANG 'DI'I YIN ZER

SKU DKAR GSOL, YANG MCHOD RTEN GCIG GI GOS ZHIG 'DUG PA DER GSOL

DKAR GSOL BA'I MCHOD RTEN BDUN NI GONG GI LUNG BSTAN BRNYES PA'I
BU CHEN BDUN PO

DGE 'DUN

'ON BKRA SHIS DO

YOD PA'I BU CHEN

RNAMS YIN,

YIN CES GRAGS, 7BZHI PA GDAN SA'I LUGS GNYIS SPEL BA'I BU CHEN

GRUB BRGYAD NI, RGYAL TSAB CHOS RJE, MKHAS GRUB CHOS RJE, ZHA LU
COG

CHUNG BA CHOS RJE LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, BYANG RTZE CHOS RJE BLO
GROS BRTAN PA, ZAB

SBYOR BA CHOS RJE BLO GROS CHOS SKYONG, BA SO CHOS RJE CHOS KYI
RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS

RJE SMON LAM DPAL 'BYOR BLO GROS, CHOS RJE DBON BLO BZANG SNYE
MA RNAMS LAS DANG

PO BDUN LA 'JAM DBYANGS GTZANG PA BDUN BRGYUD DU GRAGS SHING, YI
DAM GYI

LUNG BSTAN YOD PAR SNANG, BRGYAD PA 'DI RJE 'DI NYID KYI GDUNG
CHOS GNYIS KA'I

THAD NAS BU CHEN GYI GTZO BO BGRANG CHOG PA YIN PAR GSUNGS, YANG
'GA' ZHIG

GIS GONG GI GDAN SA MDZAD PA DE THAMS CAD KYIS RJE NYID LA CHOS
DNGOS SU GSAN PA'I

NGES PA MED PAS CHOS 'BREL MA GSAN PA RNAMS BU CHEN DU MI BGRANG
GSUNGS YANG,

BYANG RAB CHOS RJER GRAGS PA RJE SMON LAM DPAL BA MA GTOGS PA'I
GZHAN RNAMS KYIS

RJE NYID LAS DNGOS SU CHOG GSAN CING, RJE SMON LAM DPAL BAS
KYANG MNAL LAM

DU GSUNG CHOS GSAN PA DANG, GDAN SA'I LUGS GNYIS RNAM DAG BZUNG
BAS BU CHEN

DU BGRANG CHOG CES NI RING 'CHI MED PA NYID KYIS GSUNGS, 7LNGA
PA YI GES THUGS

@596 ZIN PA'I BU CHEN GSUM NI, GRVA DGON DKA' BZHI BA RIN CHEN
DPAL, G-YAG SDE

PA BSOD NAMS DPAL BZANG, SDOM BRTZON BLO GROS GRAGS PA GSUM YIN,
THUGS

ZIN ZHES PA'I DON, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDO SNGAGS KYI YIG
CHA THUGS RTZOM

CHE CHUNG STOBS CHE BAR MDZAD PA RNAMS KYI RTZOM STAN RNAMS THOG
MAR 'BRI BA DANG, DE

LA YANG ZHAL SHUS DU MA MDZAD DE 'GA' ZHIG GZIMS KHANG DU 'JOG
CING, LA

LA BU CHEN SO SOR GNANG BA SOGS RANG RANG GI THUGS BZHED BZHIN
NGAL MED DU 'BRI BAR

MDZAD PA DANG, YIG RIS KYANG DU MA MKHYEN PA MA ZAD BRDA' DAG
DANG, GCOD

MTSAMS 'BRI LUGS SOGS SHIN TU MKHAS PA LA BRTEN NAS RJE YANG
LHAG PAR THUGS

MNYES PAS ZAB CHOS DU MA GNANG BA YIN PAR GRAGS, 7DRUG PA 'PHRIN
LAS RTZOD

MED KYI BU CHEN GSUM NI, BYAMS CHEN CHOS KYI RJE SH'AKYA YE
SHES, PAn CHEN RIN

PO CHE DGE 'DUN GRUB, 'DUL 'DZIN CHOS RJE GRAGS PA DPAL LDAN
GSUM YIN LA,

RTZOD PA MED TSUL NI, CHOS RJE SH'AKYA YE SHES NI, SHAR RGYA NAG
RGYAL PO DPON

BLON SOGS LA DBANG BSKUR ZHING CHOS GSUNGS TE RJES SU BZUNG BA
DANG, DBUS

SU SE RA'I DGON PA 'DEBS SKABS RGYA'I RGYAL PO RANG GIS SBYIN
BDAG MDZAD PA DANG,

GTZUG LAG KHANG DU BKA' 'GYUR RNAMS PAR YONGS RDZOGS DANG, RGYA
'PHAN KHYAD

TSAR RING THUNG BRGYA SKOR, MGON KHANG DU MDA' DAR MANG PO SOGS
PHUL BA DANG,

CHOS RJE RANG LA GOS CHEN SOGS LAS GRUB PA'I RGYA GUR YA MTSAN
CAN PHUL BA RJE BLA MA'I

DNGUL GDUNG CHEN MO'I BZHUGS KHEBS SU PHUL RJES, YANG CHU SHEL
RNAM DAG

LAS GRUB PA'I GUR PHUL BA SOGS SRI ZHU BKUR STI TSAD MED DU ZHUS
SHING, DUS

PHYIS KYANG RGYA YUL NA CHOS RJE DE NYID KYI SLOB BRGYUD DANG,
CHOS BRGYUD, DGON

@597 GNAS SOGS MANG PO YOD PAR GRAGS, 7THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE
'DUN GRUB

KYIS NI GDAN SA BKRA SHIS LHUN PO BTAB STE DE NYID DU DGE 'DUN
STONG PHRAG RE TZAM NAS,

BRGYA PHRAG GNYIS TZAM GYI BAR LA PHAR TSAD DBU GSUM DANG, 'DUL
MNGON GNYIS

SOGS KYI BKA' POD CHE CHUNG MANG PO'I tI KA DANG, THAL 'PHRENG,
SPYI DON LA

SOGS PA ZHIB RGYAS SU GSUNGS PA'I SGO NAS 'CHAD NYAN DANG, RTZOD
GRVA RNAM DAG

'DZUGS PAR MDZAD, GZHAN YANG BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM DANG, RJE

YAB SRAS KYI RNAM THAR, GSUNG 'BUM SOGS KYI LUNG DANG, BLO
SBYONG GI

KHRID SOGS TSOGS CHOS DANG ZUR CHOS CI RIGS SU GNANG ZHING,
SNGAGS KYI DBANG

LUNG KHRID SOGS GDAMS PA MANG PO YANG BU CHEN DU MA LA ZUR CHOS
SU STZAL, RJE

BTZUN BYAMS MGON GYI SKU BRNYAN THOG TSAD MA SOGS SKU RTEN DANG,
BKA' 'GYUR

SOGS GSUNG RTEN, LOGS BRIS CHE CHUNG SOGS RTEN GSUM MANG DU
BZHENGS

SHING, DE DAG LA MCHOD RDZAS RGYA CHER 'BUL SBYOR MDZAD, TSOGS
CHEN DU LUNG

RIG GI SLOB GRVA DANG, 'DUL BA'I PHYAG LEN SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR
DU GZHI

GSUM GYI CHO GA SOGS 'DZUGS PAR MDZAD PA LA BRTEN NAS CHOS RJE
RIN PO CHE STOBS

'BYOR GNYIS LA SOGS PA'I ZUR CHEN BZHI DANG, GRVA TSANG BZHI,
SLOB CUNG MANG

PO DANG BCAS PA 'PHEL TE, STOD SMAD KYI CHEN PO PHAL CHE BA YANG
THUGS DAD PA'I

SGO NAS BSNGAGS BRJOD RGYA CHER MDZAD PA SOGS 'PHRIN LAS 'BYAMS
SU KLAS, 7RIN

PO CHE 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA DPAL LDAN GYIS NI, MTHO BA MANG YUL
DANG NUB RA

NAS, DMA' BA TZ'A RI'I BAR GYI SA CHA MANG POR PHEBS TE SDE BDAG
DANG, DPON

CHEN DU MA DANG, GRVA DGON GYI BLA DPON MANG PO, CHOS KYI RJE
CHEN PO DU MA DANG,

@598 BLA PHRAN RAB 'BYAMS DKA' BCU 'DZIN PA MANG PO STE, MDOR NA
SER MO BA DANG SKYA

BO'I TSOGS DU MA LA RANG RANG GI 'DOD PA DANG MTHUN PA'I CHOS
DANG BYIN RLABS GNANG

ZHING, STOD SMAD BAR GSUM DU 'DUL BA'I BSLAB KHRIMS DANG LAG LEN
DAR SO

CHE BAR MDZAD PA DANG, SGRUB SDE DANG 'DUL GRVA DU MA BTZUGS PAR
MDZAD PA LAS

'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA DPAL LDAN LTA BU'I 'DUL 'DZIN SHIN TU DKON
ZHES DANG,

MKHAS GRUB RNAM DAG YIN PA'I SNYAN GRAGS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB PA
SOGS BSTAN PA LA

MDZAD PA PHYAG RJES CHES SHIN TU CHE BA ZHIG GO ,7BDUN PA SGRUB
PA GTZO BOR MDZAD

PA'I BU CHEN RTOGS LDAN GYI MTSAN CAN BZHI DANG, RI SGRUB GNYIS
LAS, RTOGS LDAN

BZHI NI, RTOGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO, RTOGS LDAN BYANG SENG
PA, RTOGS

LDAN NAM MKHA' SHOG RAL, RTOGS LDAN SGRUB PA DPAL TE BZHI YIN,
RI SGRUB GNYIS NI,

RI MI 'BAB PA'I BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN DANG, SGRUB BRTZON DAR MA RIN
CHEN GNYIS YIN,

DE DAG LAS RTOGS LDAN SGRUB PA DPAL NI NE RING GI ZUR CHEN GCIG
YIN PA DANG, SGRUB

PA RGYUN RING MDZAD TSUL, NE RING PA'I MES PO RNAMS KYI BLA MA
BKA' DRIN CHE SHOS

YIN TSUL SOGS NE RING RJE 'CHI MED PA'I GSUNG LAS BYUNG, BRGYAD
PA GZHUNG

LUGS RAB 'BYAMS MKHYEN PA'I MKHAS MCHOG GNYIS NI, GZHUNG LUGS
MTHAR

THUG SMRA BA 'BRAS SPUNGS 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DPAL
LDAN PA DANG, GZHUNG

LUGS BRGYA PHRAG SMRA BA CHOS RJE SHAR STON DPAL LDAN RIN PO CHE
GNYIS YIN, DE'I

NANG NAS 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE NI 'BUM RGYAS PA RANG LA PO STI
GCIG TU BYAS PA'I PO

STI BRGYA DANG DRUG RDZOGS PAR THUGS THOG NAS 'CHAD PA DANG,
YANG PO STI CHE CHUNG

BRGYA DANG BRGYAD THUGS THOG NAS 'CHAD THUB PA SOGS YOD PAR
SNANG, DGU PA

@599 STOD SMAD KYI SHES RAB BZANG PO GNYIS LAS STOD KYI CHOS RJE
SHES RAB BZANG POS NI

MNGA' RIS SKOR GSUM SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR MANG YUL, NUB RA SOGS

SU DGON PA MANG PO BTAB CING GRVA PA BZANG PO TSUGS NAS DA LTA
YANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI RGYUN

YOD PA DANG, RGYAL PO MI CHEN MANG PO'I BLA MA MDZAD PA YIN,
SMAD KYI

CHOS RJE SHES RAB BZANG PO NI RGYA BOD GNYIS KYI BAR DU 'PHRIN
LAS CHE ZHING, RGYA LAM

LA KHA'I DGON ZHES PA DA LTA CHAB MDO DGON PAR GRAGS PA BTAB
CING, GRVA TSOGS

KYANG SHIN TU CHE BA RTEN GSUM SOGS 'DZIN DBANG BZANG PO DANG,
MANG JA BSKOL RE

LA YANG JA SIG RE 'DEBS PA SOGS LONGS SPYOD KYANG CHE BAR GRAGS,
BCU PA BYANG

SEMS RNAM GNYIS NI, BYANG SEMS BDE MO THANG PA BLO GROS RGYAL
MTSAN DANG, BYANG

SEMS CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA GNYIS YIN, DANG POS NI BDE MO THANG DU
DGON PA

BTAB STE 'DUS GRVA RNAM DAG BTZUGS PA DANG, RJE RANG BUGS SGO
DAR YOL MA LA

BRTEN PA'I SKU TSE RIL PO BSKYEL ZING, THUGS MKHYEN YANG THOGS
MED DU MNGA' BAR

SNANG, GNYIS PAS NI MDO SMAD PHYOGS SU SGAR TSUGS RGYUN DU BCAS
NAS BYON

ZHING, 'KHOR DU SPRANG PO NGAN LONG KHO NAS BSKOR TE BYON, GUR
MO CHE'I NANG

DU BZHUGS GRAL MDZAD DUS GUNG GRAL DANG SKU THAG NYE BAR SPRANG
PO'I NANG NAS KYANG KHA

ZHAN PA DANG, DBANG CHUNG BA SOGS SKYO BA RNAMS 'JOG PA DANG,
MDOR NA DE THAMS

CAD LA ZAS NOR GOS GSUM GYI SGO NAS 'TSO SKYONG DANG PHAN 'DOGS
BZANG PO MDZAD,

MI RNAMS KYIS SKYUGS BRO TSUL SOGS ZHUS KYANG MDO LUNG SOGS NAS
DRANGS PA'I LO

RGYUS DANG BSHAD PA DU MA MDZAD CING, DA DUNG RTAG PAR THUGS
RTZIGS CHE BAR MDZAD

PA ZHIG YIN, BCU GCIG PA SEMS DPA' GNYIS NI, SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

@600 GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG DANG, SEMS DPA' CHEN PO KUN BZANG PA
GNYIS YIN, DANG

POS NI LA STOD BYANG DU BYON, BYANG BDAG PO DKON MCHOG LEGS PA
SKU MCHED KYI MCHOD

GNAS DANG BLA MA MDZAD, NGAMS RING BYAMS CHEN GYI LHA KHANG 'DU
KHANG DANG BCAS PA

BZHENGS PA'I BDAG RKYEN DANG, BYAMS PHRUG TU GRAGS PA'I BTZUN
GSAR LNGA BRGYA

NYIN GCIG LA 'DZUGS PA'I MKHAN PO MDZAD, CHOS SDE SMON LAM CHEN
MOR GRAGS

PA'I CHOS SPYOD KYI KHRIGS DANG, 'DUL BA'I GRVA DANG BSLAB
KHRIMS, PHAR TSAD

DBU GSUM GYI RTZOD GRVA BZANG PO 'DZUGS PA'I ZHAL BKOD DANG
PHYAG LEN RNAM PAR DAG PA

MDZAD, DUS DER BSOD NAMS CHEN PO MKHAS BTZUN PAR GRAGS PA DANG,
SA DGE

GNYIS KO LONG CHUNG BA LA BRTEN NAS NGAMS RING CHOS SDE'I SMON
LAM CHEN MO'I ZHAL 'DON

DU YANG RJE TZONG KHA PAS MDZAD PA'I LAM RIM BRGYUD 'DEBS DANG,
BYAMS BSTOD

ZAB YANG MA DANG, SMON LAM THOG MTHA' BAR DGE RNAMS 'DZUGS PAR
MDZAD, CHOS

RJE RANG GIS KYANG TSOGS SU CHOS SPYOD KYI MJUG LA SA DGE GNYIS
KHYAD MED DU MDZAD PA

YUN RING PO'I BAR DU BYUNG, PHYIS SU GO RAB PA BYON PA MAN CHAD
NGAMS RINGS PA

KO LONG DAM DU SONG BAS CHOS SPYOD DE TSO CHAG 'DUG CES RJE 'CHI
MED PAS GSUNGS,

GZHAN YANG SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DES BKA' GDAMS LAM RIM DU GRAGS
PA'I BLO SBYONG

CHEN MO PO STI CHE BA GNYIS GSUNG RTZOM MDZAD, DBUS GTZANG STOD
SMAD BAR GSUM DU

GRAGS CHE ZHING RJE TZONG KHA PA'I DGONGS PA DANG YANG SHIN TU
MTHUN PA SOGS MDOR NA

LUGS GNYIS MNGA' THANG MTHO ZHING, DON GNYIS RNAM DAG 'GRUB PA'I
SKYES BU CHEN

PO YIN PAR 'DUG ,SEMS DPA' DE RI BO DGA' LDAN DU BZHUGS MUS NAS
STOD

PHYOGS LA 'BYON GRAB YOD PA'I DUS NYIN GCIG THUGS DGONGS LA,
NGAS BLA MA

@601 RJE RIN PO CHE 'DI LTA BU DANG YANG YANG MJAL BA DKA', 'DI
LTA BU RNYED PAR DKA'

BA'I BLA MA YIN DGONGS BKA' DRIN RNAMS DRAN NAS 'BUL BA CHE
CHUNG DU MA MDZAD CING,

KHYAD PAR DGA' LDAN DU TSOGS CHOS GSUNGS PA'I CHO SA RDO DANG
'BYIMS PA LAS GRUB

PA'I MAndAL CHEN PO SA 'BYAR MA ZHIG YOD PA LA BCOS DANG ZHAL BA
LEGS PO BYAS NAS,

RI MO MKHAN MKHAS PA ZHIG LA, GSER ZHO BTUL MA BRGYA TZAM GYI
GSER BZANG

PO SRA RTZI DANG BCAS GSOL DU BCUG NAS PHUL BA'I TSE, GSER LJANG
BRDUNGS LAS

GRUB PA'I MAndAL LTA BU SHIN TU LEGS PA ZHIG BYUNG BAS RJE'I
THUGS LHAG PAR MNYES TE,

RTEN 'BREL BZANG, BLA MA DKA' BCU PA LA STOD PHYOGS SU DON GNYIS
KYI 'PHRIN

LAS RGYA CHEN PO 'GRUB PAR 'DUG CES LUNG BSTAN BZANG PO MDZAD PA
DE DE BZHIN DU BYUNG

BAR SNANG, GNYIS PA NI SEMS DPA' CHEN PO KUN BZANG PA NI RTZES
DANG SOGS SU

'PHRIN LAS CHE ZHING, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB KYIS
KYANG BLA MAR BKUR

BA SOGS RTZOD MED KYI SKYES BU YIN PAR SNANG, 7BCU GNYIS PA
GRAGS PA RNAM GNYIS

NI; STOD KYI NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA DANG, SMAD KYI NGAG DBANG GRAGS
PA GNYIS

YOD TSUL GSAL YANG, STOD KYI 'DI LA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA ZER BA
LAS, NGAG

DBANG GRAGS PA MI ZER ZHES LA LA GSUNG BA LTAR ZHANG ZHUNG CHOS
DBANG GRAGS PA ZHES PA

DE YIN PAR MDZAD KYANG 'GA' ZHIG GIS ZHANG ZHUNG PAS MNGA' RIS
SU BYON PA'I LO RGYUS

MI GSAL BAS GU GE NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA YIN 'DRA ZHES GSUNGS, DE
NI STOD PHYOGS

SU GU GE RGYAL PO SOGS KYI BLA MA MDZAD PA SOGS 'PHRIN LAS SHIN
TU CHE ZHING, NE

RING PA BDE LEGS MGON PO GRUB LA YANG CHOS 'BREL SOGS GSAN PAR
GRAGS, GNYIS

PA SMAD KYI NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA NI TSA KHO MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG
GRAGS PA DE NYID YIN,

@602 'DIS NI RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POR 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I
MNGON RTOGS MDZAD

PA'I BSKUL BA BO YANG MDZAD, KHAMS PHYOGS SU 'PHRIN LAS CHE
ZHING DGON PA KHYAD PAR

CAN LNGA BTAB, DE DAG TU MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN DANG 'DUL
BA'I BSLAB KHRIMS RNAM

DAG 'DZUGS PAR MDZAD, 'GA' ZHIG GIS DGON PA'I GRANGS 'DI LAS
MANG BA YANG

BTAB PAR BSHAD LA, DA LTA RGYAL RONG KHUL DU YOD PA'I DA TSANG
DGON PA ZHES PA 'DI

DGON PA BTAB RGYU'I GRANGS TSANG BA'I MTHA' MA DE LA DA TSANG
ZHES 'DOGS PAR MDZAD PA

YIN CES ZER RGYUN LA 'DUG ,7BCU GSUM PA BKA' BABS KYI BU CHEN
DRUG NI,

RGYAL TSAB RIN PO CHE LA PHAR TSAD SOGS MDO PHYOGS KYI SKOR DU
MA DANG, SNGAGS

CHOG DUS 'KHOR DANG, BDE MCHOG GI RDZOGS RIM GTZO CHE BA'I BKA'
BAB, 7 'DUL

'DZIN RIN PO CHE LA 'DUL BA'I BSHAD PA DANG LAG LEN, GSHIN RJE
GSHED DMAR

NAG SOGS KYI BKA' BAB, MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE LA DPAL DUS KYI
'KHOR LO'I RTZA  RGYUD 'GREL CHEN DANG BCAS PA'I BSHAD BKA' SOGS
BKA' BAB, MKHAS GRUB SHES

RAB SENG GE LA DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD KYI BSHAD PA BZHI
SBRAGS SU GRAGS PA

DANG, GZHAN YANG GSANG BDE'I BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS BKA' BAB, LA
STOD

BHU dA'I CHOS RJE KUN MKHYEN KUN DGA' DPAL LA RJE NYID KYIS TZ'A
RIR 'KHOR LO BDE

MCHOG NYID LAS DNGOS SU GSAN PA'I DRIL BU LUS DKYIL GYI DBANG
BZHI YONGS RDZOGS

KYI BKA' BAB, RVA SGRENG GI RJE BTZUN RGYAL MTSAN GRAGS BZANG LA
RJE SA SKYA PA DANG, BU

STON SOGS NAS BRGYUD PA'I BDE MCHOG DRIL BU LUS DKYIL GYI DBANG
BZHI DANG, DRIL

BU RIM LNGA'I KHRID GYI BKA' BAB PA STE DRUG PO DE DAG YIN NO,
,7BCU BZHI PA SDE

DPON GRUB THOB RTZOD MED KYI BU CHEN GSUM NI, 'BRI KHUNG RIN PO
CHE DON GRUB RGYAL PO,

@603 PHAG GRU SPYAN MNGA' BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA DANG, BSOD NAMS
RGYAL MTSAN GSUM

LAS 'BRI KHUNG RIN PO CHES NI, RJE TZONG KHA PA LA BLA MA LNGA
BCU PA'I tI KA MDZAD DGOS

KYI BSKUL MA GNANG ZHING, GSUNG CHOS KYANG LA LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI
CHOS DU MA KHROMS

CHOS SU GSAN ZER BA DANG, LA LAS GSANG THABS SU GSAN ZER BA CI
RIGS YANG

DON DU GSUNG CHOS DU MA ZHIG GSAN CING, DE BZHIN DU SPYAN MNGA'
BSOD NAMS

GRAGS PAS KYANG CHOS BKA' DU MA GSAN, RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS NI

DBANG LUNG KHRID MANG PO DANG, KHYAD PAR DU N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI
KHRID ZAB RGYAS GSAN

CING, NYID RANG GIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS DRUG GI KHRID YIG BDE CHEN
GSAL BA'I NYI MA

'OD ZER STONG LDAN ZER BA'I DBU DANG MJUG NA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN
POR BSNGAGS BRJOD TSAD

MED DANG, DRIS LAN BEEd'URYA'I 'PHRENG BAR, BKA' DRIN CHE SHOS
KYI BLA MA

GSUM GYI NANG NAS GCIG RJE TZONG KHA PA YIN CES GSUNG BAR GRAGS,
BCO LNGA PA

RIGS RUS KHUNGS BTZUN GYI MKHAS GRUB GSUM NI, RNGOG PA RIN PO
CHE RIN CHEN

DPAL BZANG, GNAS RNYING RIN PO CHE RIN CHEN DON GRUB, NE RING
RIN PO CHE BDE LEGS

MGON PO GRUB RNAMS YIN, DANG PO NI, RNGOG CHOS SKU RDO RJE'I
GDUNG BRGYUD RNAM

DAG STE, GDUNG RABS BCU GSUM GYI BAR RDO RJE DRIL BU 'DZIN SHES
PAS CHOG PAR

LUNG BSTAN PA'I NANG TSAN BCU GCIG PA TZAM YIN TSOD KYI MKHAS
GRUB RNAM DAG ZHIG BYON

PAR SNANG, 'GA' ZHIG GIS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS KYANG RNGOG
PA'I RIN PO CHE DE NYID

LA RNGOGS LUGS KYI CHOS SKOR MANG PO GSAN NAM GSUNG BA YOD PAR
'DUG ,GNYIS

PA DANG, GSUM PA GNYIS NI NE RING GI CHOS BRGYUD KYI RNAM THAR
RNAMS SU LO RGYUS

GSAL BAR YOD PAR SNANG LA, NANG TSAN NE RING BDE LEGS MGON PO
GRUB KYIS RJE

@604 TZONG KHA BA DANG MJAL TSUL DANG, STON PA'I GSER SKU MI
TZAM ZHIG BZHENGS PA'I THUGS

KAR RJE TZONG KHA PA'I BUR RTAGS SHANGS SBUGS NAS BYANGS SEMS
DKAR DMAR BYON PA SKU

LA BKAB PA'I STAN KHEBS BZANG BA ZHIG LA GOS PA BZHUGS TSUL SOGS
BDE LEGS

MGON PO'I RNAM THAR RANG RTZOM NA GSAL TSUL NE RING PA RJE 'CHI
MED PAS GSUNGS,

BCU DRUG PA RGYAL TSAB BSTAN 'DZIN GYI BU CHEN RTZOD MED RIN PO
CHE GSUM NI, RGYAL

TSAB RIN PO CHE, 'DUL 'DZIN RIN PO CHE, MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE
GSUM

YIN, 7BCU BDUN PA SDE DPON THUGS GROL GYI BU CHEN GCIG NI, SDE
DPON BYANG

BDAG PO'I ZHAL NGO DANG, YUM GCIG NGES PA'I BDAG PO NAM MKHA'
DPAL LAM,

MA GCIG DBON POR GRAGS PA DE YIN, CHOS RJE 'DI NYID MKHAS PAR
GYUR NAS BZANG

LDAN CHOS SDE'I MKHAN PO MDZAD, RJE TZONG KHA PAS NGAMS RING DU
RJE RE MDA' BA LA CHOS

GSAN PA SOGS KYI TSE MA CIG DPON POS KYANG RJE LA CHOS MANG DU
GSAN, DE DAG

LA BRTEN NAS RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM THOR BUR, MA GCIG DPON PO DE LA
'DI SKAD

GDAMS, ,ZHES SOGS ZHAL GDAMS YANG STZAL BAR SNANG LA, CHOS RJE
'DI

NYID RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I CHOS LA YANG MKHAS PA ZHIG YIN PAR
GRAGS SO, ,7BCO

BRGYAR PA BYA BTANG SBYAS PA'I GRUB THOB GCIG NI, KHAMS PA GRAGS
BZANG BA ZHES

PA DE YIN LA, 'DI NI PHUG SGO 'DAG SBYAR DU BRTZIGS PA'I SKU
MTSAMS DAM PO'I

NGANG NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR RJE BDAG NYID
CHEN POS BSTAN

PA'I SNGAGS BLA MED KYI RIM GNYIS LA NYAMS LEN RNAM DAG MDZAD PA
LA BRT4EN NAS DNGOS

GRUB RNAM GNYIS SKU TSE 'DIR 'GRUB TSUL RJE 'CHI MED PAS MDZAD
PA'I CHOS DRUG DANG,

RGYUD KYI GSUNG BGROS RNAMS SU YOD PAR GSUNGS, 7BCU DGU PA MKHAS
GRUB

@605 YONGS GRAGS KYI CHOS RJE GNYIS NI, CHOS RJE RIN PO CHE YID
BZANG RTZE BA DANG,

'DUL 'DZIN CHOS RJE NGAG GI DBANG PO GNYIS YIN PA'I DANG PO NI,
DBUS PHYOGS

SU 'PHRIN LAS CHE ZHING, RI RTZE ZHIG TU SGRUB GNAS BTAB NAS
BZHUGS PA'I TSE,

GZHAN GYIS GNAS 'DI LA MTSAN JI SKAD ZER LAGS ZHUS PAS, SA 'DIR
BSDAD

CING BSGOM PA SKAL BA BZANG BAS SKAL BZANG RTZE RU THOGS ZHES
DANG, YANG, YID

LA BSAM PA BZHIN RI RTZE 'DIR BSDOD GNAS BZANG BA ZHIG BYUNG BAS
YID BZANG RTZE RU

THOGS ZHES GSUNGS PA LAS, MTSAN CHOS RJE SKAL BZANG RTZE PA'AM,
YID BZANG RTZE

PAR GRAGS PA YIN KYANG, DUS PHYIS DPE LA LAR YE BZANG RTZA PA
ZHES BKOD PA NI BRDA'

SKAD NOR BAR MNGON, YANG PHYOGS GCIG NAS GDUNG 'GOS YIN PA DANG,
LO TZA BA

MKHAS PAR MKHYEN PAS 'GOS LO TZA BAR GRAGS SHING, GZHAN YANG
CHOS RJE GZHON DPAL

BA DANG, CHOS RJE 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN DANG, RNAL 'BYOR 'JAM
DBYANGS RIN CHEN

DU YANG GRAGS, ZHAL RAS SPOB HRIL LE BA YOD PA DANG, ZHABS BRDAR
BA LA BRTEN

NAS MKHAN CHEN SPOB BRDAR BA YANG ZER, 'DIS NI RJE BDAG NYID
CHEN PO LA GSUNG CHOS

GSAN ZHING, TZA BA'I BLA MAR 'DZIN PA YIN STE KHO RANG GI GSUNG
MGUR LAS KYANG,

SKYABS GNAS YID BZHIN NOR BU, ,RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA,
,RTZE GCIG GSOL

BA 'DEBS SO, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNG PA YIN, GNYIS PA 'DUL 'DZIN CHOS

RJE NGAG GI DBANG PO NI, RJE MI LA'I SGRUB GNAS LA PHYI, MNYA'
RNAM SOGS

SU BZHUGS SHING STOD PHYOGS SU 'PHRIN LAS CHE, RJE 'DI LA MNYAM
MED SHAR RAB

'BYAMS PAR GRAGS PA'I GRUB THOB DE NYID KYIS KYANG RAS CHUNG
SNYAN BRGYUD KYI KHRID LUNG

MAN NGAG DANG BCAS PA GSAN PA DANG, GTZANG SMYON PA SANGS RGYAS
RGYAL MTSAN SOGS

@606 KYI'ANG BLA MA MDZAD NAS SNYAN BRGYUD YI GE BZHI PA SOGS
GSUNG STE BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS

SU MDZAD, RJE TZONG KHA PA'I SLOB MA YIN LUGS NI, 'DUL 'DZIN
RANG GI

RNAM THAR NA, BLA MA RIN PO CHE RNAM BZHI ZHES PA PAn CHEN
PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL,

RGYA MTSO'I DBANG PHYUG CHOS SKYONG RGYAL MTSAN, RJE TZONG KHA
PA CHEN PO, RJE'I

SLOB MA RTOGS LDAN SGRUB PA DPAL DANG BZHI LA NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD
PAS SO, ,7NYI SHU

PA BYA BTANG YONGS GRAGS KYI GRUB THOB GCIG NI, RGOD PHRUG RAS
PA'AM, RGOD

PHRUG CHOS RJE GRAGS PA 'BYUNG GNAS SU GRAGS PA DE YIN, DE YANG
RJE TZONG KHA PA

DGE LDAN GZIMS KHANG NA BZHUGS DUS NYIN GCIG SKU 'KHOR RNAMS LA,
DE RING

SKYES BU KHYAD PAR CAN ZHIG 'BYON PA YOD PAS SO TSUGS SHIG
GSUNGS PA LA, JI

LTAR LAGS ZHUS PAS, RGYAL BA RGOD TSANG PA CHEN PO'I RNAM SPRUL
'BYON PA YOD

GSUNGS, SKU 'KHOR RNAMS KYIS NYIN GANG SO BTZUGS PAR MTHONG RGYU
CI 'DRA 'DUG

GSUNG PA LA, NYI MA RI RTZER 'GRO BA TZAM GYI BAR 'BYON MI SU
YANG MA BYUNG, SHAR

RI MANG PO'I RTZE LA NYI MA SER LHAG LHAG 'GRO BA'I TSE, DGE
BSHES BYA BRAL BA'I

TSUL CAN, GZAN NYIS SPRUG DANG SHAM THABS GYON PA, DKA' BA SPYAD
PAS SKU

SHA RNAMS SER SING NGE, SRAB TSOM MER SONG BA ZHIG THOGS MED DU
GZIMS KHANG

SGO DRUNG DU PHEBS PA SKU 'KHOR TSOS RIG STE RJE LA ZHUS PAS, DE
LTAR NA KHONG LA CUNG

ZAD CIG BZHUGS PAR ZHUS LAS SPOS SNA RTZOM SHOG GSUNGS, RJE NYID
RANG YANG NA

BZA' GZAN RKYANG MDZAD NAS MYUR STABS SU PHEBS TE, SGO PHYI NAS
SPOS SNA DANG

BCAS BSU BA MDZAD DE NANG DU SPYAN DRANGS, BZHUGS GDAN MTHON PO
LA 'JOG PA

SOGS BKUR STI CHE BRJOD SHIN TU CHE BAR MDZAD, RJE'I DRUNG DU
BYA BRAL DE NYID KYIS

@607 GSUNG CHOS DU MA ZHUS TE SLAR THEG ,RJES SU RTZAD BCAD PAS
RGOD PHRUG RAS

PAR GRAGS PA DE NYID YIN PAR NGES SHING, DE GONG NAS MKHYEN
RTOGS DANG 'PHRIN

LAS CHE BAR YOD KYANG, DE PHYIN CHAD DA DUNG MKHYEN RTOGS SHIN
TU RGYAS SHING 'PHRIN

LAS TSAD MED PAR BYUNG, YAR LUNG SHEL BRAG SOGS SU GCOD KYI
THUGS DAM GTZO

BOR MDZAD CING SLOB MA YANG MANG DU 'DUS, GCOD KHRID CHEN MOR
GRAGS PA THUGS

RTZOM MDZAD PA PAR DU GRUB PA LAM KHRID CHEN MO ZHES STOD SMAD
BAR GSUM DU SHIN TU

DAR, SDE BDAG DANG DPON CHEN DU MA'I BLA MA DANG MCHOD GNAS
MDZAD, GCOD

GRVA GNANG BA'I TSE COG PU PHUB PA RANG YANG BRGYA PHRAG DU MA
BYUNG BAR GRAGS, LO

RGYAS 'DI RNAMS GONG DKAR GRUB CHEN KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS SAM, RAS
CHEN KUN

DGA' BKRA SHIS SU GRAGS PA DE NYID NI RINGS SU BYON TE, RJE 'CHI
MED PA'I GCEN

PO CHOS RJE MTSO SKYES RDO RJE DANG PHAN TSUN CHOS GSAN RES
MDZAD DUS KHONG RANG GIS RJE

'CHI MED PA LA ZHIB PAR GSUNGS SHING, GZHAN GYIS GSUNGS PA YANG
CHA TZAM TSOR

ZHES RNAM THAR GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG NA GSAL, DE YAN GYIS BU SLOB
SDE TSAN SA

BCAD DU MDZAD PA RNAMS KYI LO RGYUS MDOR BSDUS SONG NAS, GZHAN
YANG RNAM THAR

GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG LAS, YANG 'BRI KHUNG GI CHOS SGO BA BKRA
SHIS RIN CHEN DANG,

PHAG GRU'I CHOS SGO BA 'JAM DBYANGS KHA CHE'AM, 'JAM DBYANGS
BSOD NAMS DPAL

DU GRAGS PA DE GNYIS KYANG RJE TZONG KHA PA'I BU CHEN YIN PA LA
BRTEN NAS CHOS SGO BA GNYIS

SU GRAGS SHING, BU CHEN GYI GRANGS SU'ANG 'DREN PA DANG, 'BRI
KHUNG CHOS SGO BAS BLA MA

LNGA BCU PA'I tI KA MDZAD PA'I BSKUL MA ZHUS SHING, 'JAM DBYANGS
KHA CHES RJE TZONG KHA

PA LA, KA LA PA DANG TZONG KHA RING MO SOGS BSTOD PA CHE CHUNG
BRGYAD CU PHUL TSUL DANG,

@608 DES MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR SHIN TU RGYAS PA ZHIG KYANG
'DUG TSUL THOS, ZHES DANG,

YANG DE NYID LAS, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN DANG,
GNAS BRTAN SHES

RAB BKRA SHIS GNYIS KYANG RJE'I SLOB MA YIN TSUL DANG, DGE LDAN
PAn CHEN DU GRAGS PA

CHOS RJE SH'AKYA SHR'I DANG, RONG PO CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA
DANG, SDE PA DPON

PO RNAMS KYI YANG BLA MA YIN TSUL DANG, YANG MAD PHYOGS KYI PHYE
TSUL LA BRTEN

NAS DBYE NA PHAR TSAD DBU GSUM MKHYEN PA'I DGE BSHES RANG YANG
BRGYA PHRAG DU MA BYON

PA DANG, TSAL MIG DKA' BZHI PA DANG, GRA DGON DKA' BZHI PA SOGS

DKA' BZHI'I MTSAN CAN MANG PO DANG, RGYAL TSAB DKA' BCU DAR MA
RIN CHEN DANG,

DKA' BCU GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG ,DKA' BCU DGE 'DUN GRUB, LHU LA BA
DKA' BCU

LEGS PA SOGS DKA' BCU'I MTSAN CAN MANG PO DANG, SGOM PA GUNG RU
DANG, SGOM

PA GRAd RIN SOGS SGOM CHEN KU S'A LI MANG PO DANG, GZHAN YANG
DGA' SKYOR ZUL GSUM

GYI MKHAN PO DANG, GSANG BDE GUNG GSUM GYI MKHAN PO, DE DAG GI
GRVA TSANG SO SO'I

CHE BGRES SLOB DPON LA SOGS TE DGE BSHES DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN DANG,
GNAS

BRTEN CHE CHE MOR GYUR PA MANG PO YANG RJE'I SLOB MA YIN TSUL
DANG, YANG CHOS RJE RIN

PO CHE RDO RJE 'CHANG CHOS LDAN RAB 'BYOR DU GRAd PA DE NYID LA
YANG DBANG LUNG DU MA GNANG

BA'I SLOB MAR GYUR PA LA BRTEN NAS G-YAS RU BYANG DANG, MNGA'
RIS SOGS SU RI BO

DGA' LDAN PA'I BSTAN PA SPEL BA DANG, NE RING ZUR CHEN DBU MA PA
SANGS RGYAS DPAL

GYIS RJE RIN PO CHE TZONG KHA PA LAS SPYIR GSUNG CHOS DU MA
DANG, KHYAD PAR DBU MA'I LTA

KHRID SOGS GSAN PA LA BRTEN NAS DBU MA PAR GRAt PA DANG, RJE
RANG GI BLA MAR GYUR PA

LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LA'ANG GSUNGS CHOS DU MA GSUNGS PA NGES CAN
DANG, DE LA BRTEN NAS

@609 LHO BRAG PA'I GRUB CHEN PHAL MO CHE YANG RJE'I SLOB MAR
GYUR TSUL, YANG NGED KYI MES POR

GYUR BA BDE LEGS MGON PO GRUB KYIS RJE DANG MJAL BA SOGS LA
BRTEN NAS NE RING BUM

'DZIN RTOGS LDAN RIN PO CHE SMON LAM BKUR SHIS DANG, DKA' BCU
'JAM DBYANGS

BZANG PO SOGS KYANG SLOB MAR GYUR PA DANG, YANG, RJE RANG GI BLA
MA RJE BTZUN

RE MDA' BA CHEN PO DANG, RTOGS LDAN DPA' BO RDO RJE GNYIS LA
YANG CHOS DU MA

PHUL BA DANG, YANG JO GDAN BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB CES PA KHRID
GNYER DU BSKOS NAS

SLOB MA RNAMS LA KHRID DU MA MDZAD PA DANG, GUNG RU RGYAL BZANG
ZHES PA'I MKHAS

PA DE NYID LA DBU MA'I LTA KHRID GNANG BA LA BRTEN NAS DGE LDAN
PA NANG DU LTA KHRID MI 'DRA

BA CUNG ZAD BYUNG BA DANG, CHOS RJE NGOR CHEN PAS KYANG RJE
TZONG KHA BA LA CHOS GSAN TSUL

DANG, SGRA PA CHOS BZANG PA LA SOGS PA YANG SLOB MA YIN TSUL YOD
DE ZHIB CHA MA

SPROS, MDOR NA SLOB MA CHE CHUNG GI RIM PA BYON TSUL SPYI DANG,
KHYAD PAR DU

BU CHEN GRAGS CAN BYON TSUL DANG, DBUS GONG MA CHEN PO SOGS SDE
DPON CHE CHUNG

MANG PO YANG SLOB MAR GYUR PA DANG, LUGS GNYIS KYI CHE THANG
BYUNG TSUL SOGS YA

MTSAN PA MANG PO ZHIG 'DUG STE, NAD PA 'CHI MED PA NA YUN RING
ZHING NA ZUG CHES

PAS MA NUS PA DANG, BLO RGYA CHE BAR 'GRO BAS SPROS PA BZHAG
,GONG GI BU

CHEN TSO LA ZLOS PA LTA BU'I SKYON 'DUG SNYAM PA SRID NA, PHRAL
SNANG DU 'DRA MO 'DUG

KYANG DUS TSOD DANG GNAS SKABS LA BRTEN NAS THA DAD DU 'DREN
LUGS BYAS PAS SKYON

MED PA DANG, GRANGS KYI 'DREN LUGS SO SO BA YANG SNGON DUS SU
BYUNG BA DPE NA 'DUG

PA DANG, THAMS CAD KYI GO GCIG GIS CHOD PA'I DPE DANG, GSANG BDE
'JIGS GSUM

SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG BRGYUD PA DU MA LA'ANG GRUB THOB RE RES GO
SA DU MA 'DZIN CING,

@610 CHOS SO SO SPEL TSUL YOD PA LTAR YIN PAS LOG RTOG NGAN PA
BYED MID GOS SO, ,ZHES

DANG, YANG 'DI LTAR GSUNGS TE, DE LTAR MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RJE
BTZUN TZONG KHA PA CHEN

PO DE NYID KYIS, BSTAN PA'I KHANG BZANG DAM PA LA, ,RGYAL TSAB
RJE LA SOGS PA YI, ,BU

CHEN RNAM GRANGS BYON PA LA, ,RIN CHEN BKRIS TOG LTAR MDZES,
,BKA' BABS YOD RNAMS

DAR TSUL 'DRA, ,RTOGS LDAN BRGYAD PO PHYOGS MTSAMS SU, ,DAR GYI
'PHAN GDUGS

RGYAL MTSAN DANG, ,MCHOD SPRIN SNA TSOGS BKOD PA 'DRA, ,'PHRIN
LAS RTZOD MED

GSUM LA SOGS, ,RGYAL BO MNGA' THANG GSHAMS PA 'DRA, ,MDOR NA ZUR
CHEN

CHEN PO DANG, ,LAS 'DZIN BU SLOB MANG PO YIS, ,LOGS LA ZHON PA'I
RGYAN BTZAL

DES, ,KHANG BZANG LA NI DKRIGS PA 'DRA, ,DE LTAR BSTAN PA'I
KHANG BZANG MCHOG ,

'DZIN PA'I BU CHEN THAMS CAD KYANG, ,LHA YIS SPRUL PA'AM MI YIS
BSGRIGS, ,

SANGS RGYAS KYIS NI SPRUL PA'AM, ,GANG LTAR YIN KYANG YA MTSAN
NI, ,CHE CHE THAMS

CAD BSDUS PA BZHIN, ,GYUR PA'I NGO MTSAR KHANG BZANG NGO, ,BSTAN
DANG BSTAN NYI'I

KHANG BZANG 'DI, ,SHES RAB CAN GYIS MTHONG GYUR NA, ,LEGS LEGS
'DRA STE LEGS

KYANG LEGS, ,DAD GUS CAN GYIS MTHONG GYUR NA, ,MDZE MDZES 'DRA
DANG DRO DRO 'DRA, ,

YIN YANG DE GA BZHIN DU YIN, ,SHES RAB MED DANG DAD PA MED, ,LOG
LTA CAN DANG

PHYOGS RIS CAN, ,RNAMS KYIS BLTAS KYANG MI MTHONG ZHING, ,LEGS
MDZES

LA SOGS MED MED 'DRA, ,DE LTAR 'DUG PA'I SKAL MED DANG, ,DAM
NYAMS RNAMS

KYIS MIG BLTAS KYANG, ,LOG RTOG BAD KYI LING TOG GIS, ,RANG GI
MIG

SGRIBS MA MTHONG BA, ,MKHRIS NAD MIG GIS DUNG MTHONG BZHIN,
,RANG SKYON

YIN PAS LOG RTOG SPANG, ,NGA NYI NAD PA YUN RING PO, ,SKYON CAN
GYA NYES SDUG

@611 THAG CHAD, ,KHA ZHAN DBANG CHUNG GNOD PAS GTZES, ,YIN KYANG
SHES RAB MIG

LA BCINGS, ,BLO GROS DAG SNANG YOD PA YIS, ,KHANG BZANG DAM PA
DE MTHONG ZHING,,

GTAM BZANG DE RNAMS TSOR MTHONG RIG ,DE PHYIR TSIG BZANG 'DI DAG
BKOD, ,

SKAL LDAN THAMS CAD DGA' BA DANG, ,DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS BYED PAR
SHOG ,

LOG RTOG CAN RNAMS NGAN BLO SANGS, ,DAG SNANG PHYOGS MED 'CHAR
GYUR CIG ,

CES GSUNGS SO, ,YANG DE NYID LAS, DUS PHYIS KYANG RGYA NAG YUL
DU BKA'

BRGYUD PA DANG, SA DGE GNYIS DANG, BON PO SOGS KYI GRUB MTHA'
'DZIN

PA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MA YOD PA RNAMS NGA LHAG LA MA 'CHAM PAR
RTZOD PA'I DUS, GRUB

MTHA' GZHAN RNAMS MI MANG ZHING PHYOGS GCIG TU 'GRIL BA DANG, RI
BO DGA'

LDAN PA PHYOGS LA BLA MA GRAGS CHE BA GCIG LAS MED PAS, DRAG
GZHAN THAMS CAD

KYIS DGE LDAN PA LTA GRUB GNYIS KA NGAN ZHES RGYAL PO SOGS
BSKYOD THABS LA BRTEN,

DGE LDAN PA'I DGE BSHES BLA MA CHEN PO DE KHANG PA ZHIG TU BCUG
NAS ME TSA MO RGYAB KYANG..

KHANG PA THAMS CAD TSIG RJES SU BLA MA'AM CHOS RJE DE NYID SKU
LA NYES PA CI YANG MA BYUNG

BAR BZHUGS PA MI MANG POS MTHONG ZHING, RGYAL POS KYANG DGONGS
PA LA BRTEN NAS

CHOS RJE DE NYID LA ME THUB MAR BTAGS SHING, DE PHYIN CHAD CHOS
LUGS KYANG ME

THUB MA'I CHOS LUGS LTAR GYIS ZHES GSUNGS TE, CHOS LUGS DANG
GANG ZAG GZHAN

LA MTHONG CHUNG ZHING ME THUB PHYOGS LA MTHONG CHE BA DANG, DE
LA BRTEN NAS DGE

LDAN PA'I BSTAN PA DAR CHE BA BYUNG TSUL SOGS BON GYI DGON PA
SMAN GONG GI BLA MA ZHIG..

RGYA YUL SOGS SU PHEBS PAS GSAN TE, NGA RANG GI SLOB MA DGE
SLONG BKRA SHIS

DPAL BZANG ZER BA LA BSHAD 'DUG PA'I DGE SLONG DE NYID GLONG
NANG PA NAS YIN CING,

@612 SA SKYA DANG NGOR PA'I GRUB MTHA' KHO NA LA GTZO BOR BYED
PA DANG, CHOS RJE GO RAM PA

SOGS KYI ZHAL SLOB YIN KYANG, TSUL 'DI LA YA MTSAN SKYES TE SA
STAG LO NGA RANG

DANG SBAR BA'I DGE 'DUN MANG PO BYANG DU PHYIN DUS CHED GTAD
KYIS MA DRIS KYANG BSHAD BYUNG

BA YIN, ZHES DANG, YANG DE NYID LAS, DE LTAR CHOS RJE TZONG KHA
PA CHEN PO'I BU

CHEN BYON TSUL GYI RNAM THAR CUNG ZAD TZAM 'PHROS DU MA DANG
BCAS PA 'DI, NE RING

NAD PA 'CHI MED RAB RGYAS KYIS NA BA SHIN TU THU BZHIN PAR LO
NGO BRGYAD SONG BA'I LCAGS

STAG LO'I DPYID NYIN MTSAN MA 'KHYOL BA'I SEMS KYI 'CHAR SGO LA
'DI LTA BU BYUNG BA

YIN, DE YANG NGA RANG CHUNG NGUR YOD PA MAN DU YAB MES KYI CHOS
LUGS RNYING MA

DANG, DVAGS PO BKA' BRGYUD PA'I NANG NAS STOD 'BRUG LA GTZO BOR
MOS

SHING, JO ZHAL SA DGE LA SOGS PA'I GRUB MTHA' GZHAN LA YANG DAD
PA KHYAD MED DU

BYED PA ZHIG YOD DE, NGA RANG GI GCEN PO MTSO SKYES RDO RJE LA
SOGS PA GONG MA 'GA'

DANG, NYE RING MANG PO ZHIG MTHONG LOG GIS PHYOGS 'PHUL CHE BAR
BYAS PA DRAN ZHING,

YANG RANG GI RJE GONG MA DU MA RI BO DGA' LDAN PA LA THUGS DKAR
BA DANG SNGA 'BREL ZAB..

PA YANG DRAN PA LA BRTEN RTZAM CHOS 'DI LA GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG
DU MTSAN GSOL, STAG

LO NAG PA ZLA BA'I TSES BCU BDUN YAN LA NE RING 'DU KHANG STENG
GI G-YAB ZHAL DMAR

MOR BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI NGA RANG DANG NE BTZUN DKON MCHOG BKRA
SHIS KYIS BYAS PA

MA ZAD, RANG GI SLOB BU TSAD LDAN GZHAN GYIS KYANG 'BAD RTZOL
GYI SGO NAS BYAS PA

YIN NO, ,BLA MA'I BYIN RLABS ZHUGS PA'AM, ,DAG SNANG BYIN RLABS
BYUNG

BA'AM, ,LAS 'BRAS BDEN RTAGS YIN PA'AM, ,GANG LTAR YIN KYANG
'CHI

MED PA'I, ,BLO RIG RANG LA YA MTSAN NI, ,DA DUNG YOD KYANG 'DI
GA LA, ,

@613 TSED 'DZIN BYAS SO DGE BAR SHOG ,CES GSUNGS SO, ,YANG RJE
'DIS MDZAD

PA'I RNAM THAR GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG GI KHA SKONG GSER GYIR MYU
GU ZHES PA NYUNG NGU ZHIG

LAS 'DI LTAR GSUNGS TE, RJE RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA LA BU
CHEN BYON TSUL

GYI RNAM THAR GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG CES PA 'CHI MED PA RANG GIS
BRTZAMS PA DE NYID DU

BSHAD PA LAS GZHAN PA'I BU CHEN DRAG PA AE YOD SNYAM NA CIS
KYANG YOD DE, DE

YANG RJE BTZUN MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GAM, SMAR KHAMS GRAGS PA
BZANG PO ZHES

PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO DE NYID SPYIR RJES SKYA PA'I CHOS LA
THUGS ZHEN CHE BA TZAM DANG,

RJE RONG PA DANG, CHOS RJE NGOR PA SOGS KYI SLOB MA YIN CING,
RJE TZONG

KHA PA'I DRUNG DU YANG PHAR TSAD DBU GSUM DANG, 'DUL BA SOGS KYI
PO STI CHE CHUNG

MANG PO'I BSHAD PA DANG, ZAB DON RNAMS GSAN PA LA BRTEN NAS BLA
MA BKA' DRIN

CHE SHOS GCIG TU 'DZIN CING, DUS PHYIS CHOS RJE SMAR KHAMS PAS
G-YAS RU

BYANG DU GTOGS PA'I SA MTSAMS SU BZHUGS NAS 'PHRIN LAS BSKYANGS
NAS GRVA TSANG CHEN

MO BA DANG, DGON PA ME LUNG PA SOGS BTAB PA LAS CHU BYANG PA
ZHES PA'I GRUB

MTHA' 'DZIN PA'I GRVA SA CHEN POR GRAGS PA BYUNG, CHOS RJE DE
NYID KYI GSUNG RTZOM

DANG GSUNG RGYUN DU MAR YANG RJE TZONG KHA PA'I GSUNG MANG PO
DRANGS TE BSHAD PA MDZAD, DE

LA BRTEN NAS MI DPYOD LDAN LA LAS NI, CHOS RJE SMAR KHAMS PA'I
GRUB MTHA' 'DI SA

DGE GNYIS KA LA DBYE BA MED PAS ZAB PA YIN ZER BA DANG, KHYAD
PAR GZHIS BYANG GI

DGE BSHES MKHAS GRUB MANG POS NI, CHU BYANG DU SLOB GNYER BA
MANG PO RDZONG BA SOGS

GRUB MTHA' ZAB PAR BYED PA KUN GYIS SHES PA 'DI GA YIN, 'ON
KYANG PHYOGS 'DZIN

CAN LA LAS NI, CHU BYANG PA'I GRUB MTHA' 'DI 'BAL SRAN MA YIN
ZER BA DANG, SA

@614 DGE 'DRES PA'I SKYON CAN YIN ZER BA SOGS NI MTHONG SNANG MA
DAG PA KHO NA YIN NO, ,

7 YANG, MA nI BA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN LA YANG RJES GSUNG CHOS DU
MA GNANG BAS BU

CHEN DU GYUR, 'BRAS SPUNGS SOGS DGE LDAN PA'I DGON PA RNAMS DANG
'BREL CHE ZHING,

MA nI 'UR MO CHER GRAGS PA BTZUGS DUS KYANG RJE LA BSTOD PA SOGS
RGYA CHER MDZAD,

'BRAS SPUNGS 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE LA YANG MCHOG TU GUS PAS DUS
MCHOD CHEN MO'I

TSE GSUNG CHOS NU MA GSAN CING, TSOGS CHEN LA MAR KHU PHOR 'DREN
YANG LAN

MANG DU ZHUS PAR GRAGS, 7 YANG, GSANG PHU'I ZUR CHEN GRVA CHUNG
YON TAN

RGYA MTSO'AM, CHOS RJE YON TAN RGYA MTSO ZHES PA DE YANG RJE
TZONG KHA PA'I BU CHEN YIN,

RJE 'DIS CHOS RJE SHAR RAB 'BYAMS PA LA PO STE BRGYA TZAM GSUNGS
TSUL YOD, YANG,

SHAR DVAGS PO PAndI TA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL YANG RJE TZONG KHA
PA'I BU CHEN YIN CING DBANG

LUNG BRGYUD TSUL YANG DU MA MTHONG STE MA SPROS LA, YANG, MDUNG
RTZE RAS CHEN DU

GRAGS PA YANG RJE'I SLOB MAR GYUR TE CHOS GNANG TSUL DU MA YOD
PA DANG, RAS CHEN

'DI RJE LA DAD PAS DMIGS BRTZE MA'I MTSON SRUNG MDZAD PAS MTSON
YANG THUB NGES SU

'DUG CING, MDUNG RTZE'I SRAS RNAMS KYANG DGE LDAN PA LA DAD 'DUN
CHE, YANG,

GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR GYI RTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN NAS CHU BYANG DU
BYON PA'I BSHES GNYEN

GDAN SA 'DZIN PA CHOS RJE KUN MKHYEN NAM MKHA' BSOD NAMS SAM,
CHOS RJE NAM

BSOD CHEN MOR GRAGS PA DANG, CHOS RJE NAM YE BA DANG, BSOD YE BA
SOGS

KYANG SA DGE DBYER MED KYIS GRUB MTHA' 'DZIN CING RJE TZONG KHA
PA LA MCHOG TU DAD, YANG

CHOS RJE BLO GROS RIN CHEN PAS NI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO PAn CHEN
DGE 'DUN GRUB PA LA YANG..

GSUNG CHOS GSAN, YANG DVAGS PO BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI DPON
BRGYUD CHOS RJE

@615 KARMA PA YANG RJE LA MCHOG TU GUS TSUL NGA RANG LHA SAR
YONGS SKABS ZHAL DNGOS SU

MJAL BA LAS THOS PA YIN, YANG NGA RANG GI SLOB MA YIN PA DENG
SANG BYANG BDAG

CHEN YAB SRAS SOGS KYI BLA MA DANG, NGAMS RING CHOS SDE'I MKHAN
CHEN DU GYUR PA

CHOS RJE RIN PO CHE SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO YANG CHU BYANG PA'I
GRVA SAR BYON CING, MKHYEN

RAB DBANG PHYUG DPON SLOB KYI GSUNG RAB RNAMS LA THOS BSAM RNAM
DAG MDZAD PA LA

BRTEN NAS, SA DGE GNYIS KYI GRUB MTHA' PHAL MO CHE GNAD GCIG PAR
DGONGS PA

DANG, RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I PHYOGS LA THUGS DAD CING DKAR BAR
BZHUGS SO, ,

ZHES GSUNGS, RNAM THAR 'DI'I BSHAMS NAS DA DUNG SHOG BU KHA SHAS
YOD TSOD

SNANG RUNG, SNGAR PHAN MIG LAM DU SON PA'I DPE RNAMS LA MJUG
TSANG BA MI SNANG BAS

GANG GSAL BA RNAMS LAS 'BRI BAR RNGO MA THOGS SHING, YANG, RJE
BDAG NYID

CHEN PO'I RNAM THAR MKHAS GRUB GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA RNAMS SU, BU
SLOB BYON TSUL

RNAMS DANG MTSUNGS

BAR SNANG BAS NYIS ZLOS SU MA BKOD, GZHAN YANG RJE THAMS MKHYEN
PA CHEN PO LA

CHOS 'BGREL SOGS DNGOS SU MA GSAN RUNG, DUS SKABS DE DANG PHYIS
SOR BYON PA

BCAS KYI SA RNYING KAR 'BRUG ,JO NANG, BO DONG SOGS GRUB MTHA'
RIS SU MA CHAD

PHYOGS LAS RNAM

@617 BRTAN PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, STAG TSANG LO

SOGS MA YIN PAR..

,THUB PA'I

SU SLOB PA'I SLOB MA KUN, ,THEG CHEN LAM GYIS DBUGS DBYUNG GZHAN
DON DU, ,

LUS SROG CHOS NOR GTONG 'JUG TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA' LDAN +
KHYOD BSTAN TSUL

'DIR SDANG BAS ZHUGS 'GA' LA, ,BKA' SRUNGS DRAG PO'I CHAD PA
BTZAN PO YIS, ,

CHOS BZHIN SKYONG BA'I RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA' LDAN x
BSAGS SBYANGS

SONG DANG MA SONG SKYE BO 'GAS, ,DRAN PA TZAM GYIS DNGOS DANG
RMI LAM DU, ,

BYON NAS THUGS RJES GZIGS PA'I TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA' LDAN +
BYANG NAS BYANG

PHYOGS HOR SOG MDO KHAMS YUL, ,MI DANG MI MIN CHOS 'DUL RIN CHEN
GYIS, ,

GDUL DKOD PAR MA NUS RNAMS, ,SNGON GYI LAS NGAN SDIG SGRIB ZAD
PHYIR DU,

@621 BSAGS SBYANGS MYUR DU SGRUB 'JUG TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA'
LDAN + KHYOD LA SNYING

NAS SKYABS SU SONG BA RNAMS, ,'DI PHYI'I DPAL 'BYOR GZHAN DRIN
MA YIN PAR, ,

JI LTAR BSAM BZHIN RE SKONG TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA' LDAN +
GANG GIS LEGS

PAR BSHAD PA'I CHOS TSUL LAS, ,'DA' BA ZHING 'DIR GNAS PA BKAG
MDZAD

NAS, ,'JIGS MED BSTAN PA 'DZUGS PA'I TZONG KHA PA, ,RI BO DGA'
LDAN +

KHYOD KYI BRTUL ZHUGS BZANG PO NYER BSTAN PA, ,MTSUNGS MED GZUGS
DANG DRI

MCHOG NGAD LDAN PA'I, ,MNYES SHING DUL BAR MDZAD PA'I TZONG KHA
PA, ,RI BO

DGA' LDAN X DE LTAR DAD PAS MCHOD BSTOD DGES, ,NYID BSTAN SPEL
BAR MDZAD

RNAMS KYANG, ,BU RAM SHING PA'I 'PHRIN LAS PA'I, ,RING LUGS RJES
SU

'JUG PHYIR BSNGO, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI TZ'A RI tA'I RI SUL LHA'I
MCHOG NOR BU'I ME TOG

THAL MO SNYING GAR SBYAR BA'I GNAS SU, GZHAN DRING MED PA'I RJE
DE NYID LA MI PHYED PA'I

DAD PA DANG LDAN PA, DPAL KARMA PA'I MTSAN GYIS 'JUG PA MING
GZHAN KARMA PA MI

BSKYOD RDO RJES SBYAR BA'O, ,ZHES DANG, YANG, DE NYID KYIS, BOD
KHA BA CAN

GYI RGYAL KHAMS 'DIR, ,RTAGS TZAM GYIS 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA'I DUS,
,RJE BLO

BZANG GRAGS PA BYA BA DES, ,BCOM LDAN SHAK THUB KYI TSUL BZUNG
NAS, ,

NGUR SMRIG GI RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN MDZAD PAS, ,SNGON SH'A RI'I BU
'DRA BGRANG YAS

KYIS, ,'DZAM GLING GI RGYAL KHAMS GANG BAR MDZAD, ,RJE DE LA MI
DAD SU LA DAD, ,

SNGON PHRAG DOG GI DRI MAS SDANG ZHEN SKYE, ,DUS DE RING 'GYOD
PAS MTHOL ZHING BSHAGS, ,

SDIG GROGS KYI ZIN PA MA SHES PAR, ,GTI MUG GIS BGYID PA GNONG
ZHING 'GYOD, ,

SKYE BA NAS TSE RABS SU RJES 'DZIN MDZOD, ,CES DANG, YANG RJE
KARMA PA 'DIS

@622 SE RA RJE BTZUN PA LA BKA' LAN PHUL BA'I NANG DU'ANG, KHYED
KYI DGAG BZHAG DE

KUN GO SHAK GI PHYOGS SU LEGS PAR SONG 'DUG ,SA SKYA PA'I MKHAS
RLOMS

RNAMS BLO GZU BOR GNAS NA BLO BSKYED THON PAR MCHIS, KHO BO NI
RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN

PO LA 'JIG RTEN 'DI'I NGO 'DZIN TZAM MA YIN PA'I DAD PA BRTAN PO
YOD PA'I STOBS

KYIS, GO SHAK LTAR LUGS 'DI NOR BA YIN SNYAM PA GTAN NAS MED, DE
LTA

NA'ANG NGED KYI SLOB MA RNAMS LA DA LTA BOD SNGA RABS PA DAG GI
'KHRID LUGS LAS RJE'I

LUGS LTAR SKYONG GI MED, DE'I RGYU MTSAN YANG LUGS DE SHIN TU
PHRA BAS PHYI RAB

PA DAG GIS TSUL BZHIN DU GO DKA' ZHING, LHAG PAR SA KAR GYI
PHYOGS 'DI GRUB

MTHA' KUN SLONG TSA BAS 'CHAD MA SPOBS, ZHES DANG, KARMA PA DGU
PA DBANG

PHYUG RDO RJES KYANG, KUN MKHYEN BU RAM SHING PA'I BSTAN PA
'DIR, ,NGUR SMRIG

GOS 'DZIN MTHA' BRAL DBU MA'I DON, ,CHOS KUN KUN RDZOB TU YOD
DON DAM DU, ,

KUN NAS LUNG BSTAN

ZHING, ,THUGS RJES DUS LAS MI G-YOL GZIGS PA CAN, ,'BREL BA
THOGS

PA TZAM GYIS RANG NYID KYI, ,GO 'PHANG STZOL MDZAD ZLA BRAL DE
LA 'DUD, ,BCAS

DANG KHA NA MA THO'I NYES PA YIS, ,CUNG ZAD MA GOS 'DUL BA'I
SROL CHEN 'DZIN, ,

ZHI DUL BAG YOD 'PHRIN LAS BZHI LA SPYOD, ,MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO
TZONG KHA PA

LA 'DUD, ,CES GSUNGS, ZHVA DMAR BA BZHI PA CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS

RJE TZONG KHA PA'I LTA BA 'DI NYID KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PAR BSTAN
PA NI, DUS PHYIS

MKHAS PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL ZHES PA, ,MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA
GSAL BAR

@623 MDZAD PA BYUNG, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNGS, N'A RO'I RNAM SPRUL
'BRUG PA THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA MI PHAM PADMA DKAR POS KYANG, CHOS KYI RGYAL PO
CHEN PO SHAR TZONG

KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYI 7ZHABS KYI PADMO DRI MA MED
PA LA PHYAG 'TSAL

LO; ;DGE LEGS CHU GTER CHEN POS 'JIG RTEN LA, ,BLOo BZANGo NYIN
MOR BYED PA KHYOD

BYON TSUN, ,SA 'DI RMONGS PA'I MUN LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHING, ,GRAGSo
PA'Io GZHIR

GYUR DE LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,GANG DANG RGYAL BA KUN GYI YON TAN
NI, ,SRANG LA GZHAL

TSE LCI YANG MA MCHIS PAS, ,LNGA BRGYA PA YI GTZUG RGYAN DU 'OS
PA, ,THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA KHYOD LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,SENGGE'I KHRI LA SENGGE'I
SGRA BSGRAGS PAS, ,SMRA BA'I

KHRIMS HA RI'I TZAN

DAN BSUNG, ,KHYOD DRIN DRI ZHON GYIS 'DIR 'ONGS PAS SU, ,'KHOR
BA'I TSA

GDUNG MING TZAM LHAG GYUR PA, ,SLOB MAR BCAS PA BSNGAGS 'OS DER
PHYAG 'TSAL, ,

ZLAR BGYI BA'I

MKHAS RLOMS MANG NA YANG, ,'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA KHYOD NYID GCIG PU
ZHES, ,

'GRAN ZLAR MI BYED PADMA DKAR POS BSTOD, ,CES GSUNGS SHING, DE
LA

SOGS PA MKHAS GRUB DU MAS BSTOD BSNGAGS KYI 'PHRENG BA SPEL TSUL
MTHA' KLAS TE,

SU KHYAB PAS NA, GDUL BYAR GYUR PA DANG, DAD GUS KYIS GSOL BA
'DEBS

@624 PA DANG, BSTOD BSNGAGS KYI ME TOG 'THOR TSUL SOGS MTHA' DAG
PA BRJOD PA'I

,7SMRAS

PA; SRID PA 'DI NA SNGON MED DGE BA'I BSHES, ,'JAM DPAL DBYANGS

BZHIN DU, ,

PA DANG, ,'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM LA 'JIGS PA BRAL BA DANG, ,MNGON PAR

TZAM LAS KUN TU

DANG BDE'I, ,

,THUGS

YID LCAGS KYUS DRANGS PA BZHIN GYUR NAS, ,BSNGAGS PA'I ME TOG
'THOR LA KUN

TU BREL, ,DENG SANG RTZOD DUS DGU YI MTHAR GYUR KYANG, ,BSTAN
PA'I SNYING PO

@625 TSANG LA MA NOR BA, ,BGO SKAL YONGS SU SPYAD BYAR YOD 'DI
YANG, ,'JAM

MGON BLA MA'I DRIN LAS GZHAN NA GANG, ,DE PHYIR MGON 'DI'I GSANG
GSUM YON

TAN LA, ,PHYOGS LHUNGS SPANGS PA'I BLO MIG GIS BLTAS NA, ,BYIN
RLABS 'JUG PHYIR

GSOL BA 'DEBS PA DANG, ,SKYE KUN RJES SU 'DZIN LA SMON PAR RIGS,
,ZHES PA NI

BAR SKABS KYI NGAL BSO'I TSIGS BCAD DO, ,ZHES KHYAB BDAG RJE
BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA THUB

DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG NGO BO DBYER MA MCHIS PA 'JAM MGON
CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA

PA CHEN PO'I RNAM PAR THAR PA THUB BSTAN MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG
NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG

BA LAS GSUNG SKYES SLOB TSOGS JI LTAR BYON TSUL 'PHROS DANG BCAS
PA MDO TZAM BRJOD

PA'I SKABS TE DGU PA'O,, ' ,,RTZA BA'I SA BCAD GSUM PA, RJES
BSNGO

BA DANG SMON LAM RNAM PAR DAG PA DANG BCAS PAS MJUG BSDU BA NI,
DE LTAR 'JAM

MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I RNAM PAR THAR PA
NAM MKHA' LTAR MTHA'

KLAS SHING, RGYA MTSO LTAR 'JINGS ZAB PA, SA CHEN PO'I RDUL LTAR
TSAD DANG BGRANG DU

MED PA, SAR GNAS KYI SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DAG GI SPYOD YUL LAS 'DAS
PA DE LTA BU,

TSUR ROL MTHONG BA'I MOS NGO DANG 'TSAMS PAR BSTAN PA RAGS RIM
TZAM SNGON GYI BDAG

NYID CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS SA BON GYI TSUL DU 'GOD PAR MDZAD PA DAG
'THOR BA BSDUS

PA'I TSUL GYIS 'DIR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA STE, DE YANG GONG DU
THOG MAR GLENG

BSLANG BA'I SKABS NAS JI LTAR BSHAD PA BZHIN GTZO CHE BA MKHAS
GRUB SMRA BA'I NYI MA DGE

LEGS DPA' BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I THUN MONG BA'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I
'JUG NGOGS DANG,

GSANG RNAM RIN PO CHE'I SNYE MA GNYIS GZHIR BZUNG BA MA ZAD, DE
GNYIS LAS BYUNG

BA'I TSIG RIS PHAL CHE BA BYIN RLABS KYI RGYUN KHYAD DU BSAMS DE
RANG SOR BZHAG PA'I SGO

@626 NAS YONGS SU TSANG BAR BKOD, DE'I THOG TU RJE RTOGS LDAN PA
CHEN PO 'JAM DPAL

RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS, RJE BLO
GROS LEGS BZANG

GIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR RAB GSANG RMAD BYUNG GTAM GYI DGA'
STON, MNGA' RIS

SH'AK BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS NYI MA BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR SKAL

LDAN PAD TSAL RGYAS PA'I 'OD STONG, RJE GNAS RNYING PA KUN DGA'
BDE LEGS KYIS

MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS, RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD
PAS MDZAD

PA'I RNAM THAR RAS BRIS 'BRI TSUL BRGYA NGA GSUM PA, RTA TSAG
RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG

THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BA'I
GTAM BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD PA

RNAMS DANG, 7THOR BU'I GRAS, ZANG ZANG NE RING PA 'CHI MED RAB
RGYAS KYIS

MDZAD PA'I RJE RIN PO CHE'I 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI RNAM THAR
DAD LDAN DGA' BYED,

DES MDZAD PA'I MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM GYI RNAM THAR NOR BU'I
BANG MDZOD, DES

MDZAD PA'I BU CHEN BYON TSUL GYI RNAM THAR GSER GYI MCHOD SDONG
DANG, DE'I KHA SKONG

GSER GYI MYU GU ,RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I RNAM THAR MKHAR NAG
LO TZA BAS MDZAD

PA DANG, MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE ME TRE PAS MDZAD PA, THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I RJE'I BSTOD PA DPYID KYI
RGYAL MO'I GLU DBYANGS KYI

'GREL BA DBYAR GYI RNGA GSANG, MI DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS SANGS RGYAS
MTSOS MDZAD PA'I

DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG GI NANG TSAN GYI RJE'I RNAM THAR, RJE BRAG
SGO RAB 'BYAMS PAS

MDZAD PA'I RJE'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR LUNG BSTAN GYI ROL MO, GUNG
RU RGYAL MTSAN BZANG

POS MDZAD PA'I 'DUN LEGS MA'I 'GREL PA, RONG PA NGAG DBANG CHOS
GRAGS RGYA

MTSOS SNYAN DNGAGS KYI LAM LAS DRANGS PA ME TOG 'CHUN PO SOGS
DANG, NAL

@627 MAL WANG GI THON CHOS KYI SPYAN LDAN SGO MANG PA DON GRUB
BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RJE'I

RNAM THAR KHAG GI DON BSDU PHYOGS BSGRIGS SU MDZAD PA RNAM DKAR
DAD PA RGYA MTSOR ROL

PA'I 'JUG NGOGS, DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MA'I 'GREL PA 'JAM DBYANGS
SHES DAR

GYIS MDZAD PA, GLANG LO CHOS 'KHOR LHA SAR SMON LAM CHEN MO'I
DUS KYI MCHOD PA

PHUL BA'I RIM PA DANG, DGA' BA GDONG DU RJE BTZUN GYIS LUNG
BSTAN MDZAD PA DANG

TSEMS RING BSREL GNANG BA'I SKOR, LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR
BA DANG MJAL TSUL

DANG, RGYA NAG RGYAL POS CHAB SHOG PHUL BA'I ZHAL BSHUS BCAS
SNGON CHAD MIG LAM

DU SON PA DE DAG GI NANG DU MDZAD PA'I RNAM GRANGS MI 'DRA BA JI
LTAR GSAL BA RNAMS,

SKABS SU BAB PA DE DANG DE'I THAD DU LUS PA MED PA TSANG BAR
BKOD, GZHAN YANG

RGYAL TSAB MKHAS GRUB RNAM GNYIS SOGS SRAS KYI THU BO 'GA' ZHIG
GI RNAM THAR SAGS

NAS 'GOD PAR 'OS PA DAG GIS KYANG ZUR BRGYAN, DE DAG LA KLAN KA
DANG 'GAL BA SPONG BA DANG, DOGS PA'I MTHA' GCOD PA SOGS KYI
SLAD DU LUNG DANG RIG PA'I SGRUB BYED

JI LTAR 'OS PA BKOD CING, BAR BAR DU DON BSDU BA DANG, NGAL BSO
BA'I

TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I RIM PA DAG KYANG SPEL BA DANG BCAS MKHAS PA
MGU BA BSKYED PA'I

CHA RKYEN, DAM PA DGYES PA BSKYED PA'I MCHOD SPRIN, DAD LDAN MOS
GUS 'PHEL

BA'I GSOS SU 'GYUR BA'I LHAG PA'I BSAM PAS BKOD PA LAS, BDAG
NYID MKHAS

'DOD DANG, RNYED BKUR, SNYAN GRAGS SOGS DON DU GNYER BA'I BSAM
PAS

MA YIN TE, DA DUNG ZHIB TU SMRA NA, 'JAM MGON BLA MA TZONG KHA
PA CHEN PO 'DI LTA

BU NA SNYAGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL BA'I MDZAD PA BSGRUB PA LA
THUGS BSKYED DANG 'PHRIN

LAS KYA MTHU PHUL DU BYUNG BAS RANG CAG RNAMS LA SANGS RGYAS
BYANG SEMS GZHAN LAS

@628 KYANG THUGS RJE DANG BKA' DRIN LHAG PAR DU CHE BA YIN
NA'ANG, RMONGS PA DAG DAM PA'I

YON TAN JI BZHIN MA SHES PAS BKA' DRIN RJES DRAN GYI GUS PA
BSKYED PA LTA BZHOG ,

DA DUNG PHYOGS LHUNG SDANG SHUt KYIS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE SNA TSOd
SU SMRA BA'I SGO NAS CHOS

DANG GANG ZAG LA SKUR 'DEBS KYI LAS NGAN TSAB PO CHE GSOd PA
RNAMS LA SEMS KYIS MA

BZOD CING, RI BO DGE LUd PA'I RJES 'JUG TU RLOMS PA 'GA' ZHIG
KYANG BSTAN PA'I

GNAD 'GAG JI LTA BA MA RTOGS PAS RNYED BKUR SNYAN GRAGS RI BO
DGE LUGS PA CHE BA

LAS, CHOS KYI ZAB GNAD GZHAN DAG CHE'O SNYAM PA SOGS MDOR NA MI
SHES PA NI SHIN

TU SDUG BSNGAL LO, ,ZHES PA'I LUNG GIS ZIN PA RNAMS PHYIN CHAD
LAM DRANG POR ZHUGS

PA ZHIG BYUNG NA CI MA RUNG SNYAM PA'I GZHAN PHAN GYI BSAM PA
DANG, BDAG NYID KYANG 'DI

NAS BZUNG STE TSE RABS KYI 'PHRENG BA KUN TU 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I
MDO SNGAGS GYI BSTAN

PA RIN PO CHE DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS PA
'DZIN PA SOGS

RJE BLA MA'I RNAM THAR GYI PHYI RJES SKYONG BA'I SGO NAS RANG
GZHAN GYI DON GNYIS 'GRUB PA'I

RNAM DKAR GYI SA BON BSKRUN PA'I PHYIR DU BKOD PA STE, 'DI LTAR
BRTZAMS PA GEGS MED

MTHAR PHYIN PA YANG 7 'JAM MGON BLA MA NYID KYIS RJES SU 'DZIN
PA'I THUGS RJE'I MTHU

LAS BYUNG BAR SHES NAS, SLAR YANG TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I SGO NAS
BSTOD PA DANG SMON

LAM GYIS MJUG BSDU BA NI, ' GANG GANG RGYAL DANG DE SRAS KUN LAS
THUGS BSKYED

'PHRIN LAS RGYU SKAR DBUS NA PA SANGS LTA BUR CHES DKAR BAS,
,GANG GANG PHYOGS

BCU'I 'DREN PA YONGS KYIS BSTOD CING BSNGAGS PA MANDA RA BA'I
'PHRENG BA CHAD MED SPEL

BRTZON PA, ,GANG GANG RGYAL SRAS 'JAM DPAL GZHON NU MTHON MTHING
ZUR PHUD DBYINGS

SU SBAS TE MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO'I ZLOS GAR CAN, ,GANG GANG
SNYIGS MA'I YID

@629 CAN KUN GYI SKYABS GCIG ZLA MED TZONG KHA PA ZHES SRID PA
GSUM NA SNYAN PAR GRAGS, ,

MGON KHYOD RGYAL BA NYID KYANG RGYAL SRAS TSUL, ,SRID PA SPANGS
KYANG SRID TSUL CI YANG

STON, ,MI SLOB NYID KYANG SLOB PA'I TSUL BZUNG NAS, ,MTHA' MED
'KHOR BA

MTHA' CAN NYID DU MDZAD, ,SRID PA 'DAM BU'I TSAL DANG MTSUNGS PA
'DIR, ,

SRED CING ZHEN PA'I YID CAN 'DI DAG RNAMS, ,SRED PA SPANGS BA'I
SA LA SBYOR SLAD DU, ,

SRID PA PA DANG 'TSAMS PA'I GZUGS SKUR SPRUL, ,SNGON BYON MKHAS
DANG GRUB BRNYES

MANG MOD KYANG, ,SNYIGS MA'I DUS MTHAR RGYAL BA'I LUNG RTOGS
KYI, ,DAM CHOS

'DZIN LA RGYAL BA NYID MTSUNGS PA, ,KHYED KYI DPE ZLA GANGS CAN
KHYON 'DIR DBEN, ,

GZUGS SKU'I ZLA BA MDO SMAD YUL NAS TSES, ,'PHRIN LAS 'OD DKAR
DBUS GTZANG

LJONGS SU 'PHRO, ,THUB BSTAN KUN DAS 'DZIN MA'I KHYON 'GENGS
PA'I, ,SNGON

MED BDUD RTZI'I GTER CHEN KHYOD MIN SU, ,SNGON TSE 'PHAGS YUL
SHING RTA CHE RNAMS

KYIS, ,LOG PAR SMRA BA'I GLANG PO'I KLAD 'GEMS PA'I, ,THEG CHEN
SENG

GE'I NGA ROS 'DZAM GLING GZHI, ,KHYAB PA'I GRAGS SNYAN DA
LTA'ANG RNGA BZHIN LDIR, ,

DE BZHIN KHA BA'I LJONGS 'DIR THUB BSTAN LA, ,MA RTOGS LOG RTOG
DRI MA DRUNG PHYUNG

STE; ,CHE BA BZHI LDAN RING LUGS NYIN MO LTAR, ,GSAL MDZAD ZLA
MED SHING RTA

CHEN POR GRUB, ,'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM DANG MKHAS BTZUN GRUB PA YIS,
,THUB BSTAN

SPEL ZHING 'GRO BA'I DON MDZAD PA'I, ,'PHRIN LAS GZUGS SU MCHIS
NA STONG GSUM

KHYON, ,SNOD DU BYAS KYANG CHA TZAM GSHONG NUS BRAL, ,BSHAD
SGRUB TSIG SPYI TZAM

DANG NGUR SMRIG GI ,RTAGS TZAM 'CHANG BAS THUB BSTAN 'DZIN RLOMS
DUS, ,MDO

SNGAGS LUNG RTOGS BSTAN PA MA LUS PA, ,TSUL BZHIN GSAL MDZAD
KHYOD LA SNYING

@630 NAS GUS, ,KHYAD PAR MTHA' BRAL DBU MA'I LTA BA DANG, ,ZAB
GSANG BLA MED

RIM PA GNYIS KYI DON, ,RGYAL BA'I DGONGS PA JI BZHIN GSAL MDZAD
PA'I, ,KLU

SGRUB GNYIS PAR SRID PA'I KHYON 'DIR GRAGS, ,DE SOGS GANG GI
RNAM PAR THAR PA'I

TSUL, ,CHA SHAS RE RE TZAM YANG YONGS RDZOGS PAR, ,BRJOD LA
BSKAL PA

BYE BAR RO 'DZIN GRANGS, ,STONG DU SPRUL KYANG GLENG NUS GO
SKABS PHRA, ,DES NA

BDAG LTAS GANG GI RNAM PAR THAR, ,BRJOD PAR RTZOM 'DI KUN GSAL
NAM MKHA'I

MTHA', ,'DOMS KYIS GZHAL BA'AM RGYA MTSO'I GTING MTHA'I TSAD,
,SOR

MOS 'JAL LTAR SPYI RTOL NYID DU CHE, ,DE LTA NA'ANG BDAG 'DRA'I
GDUL BYA'I KHAMS, ,

MANG PO'I RGYUD LA GANG GI BYIN RLABS MTHU, ,'JUG PHYIR SNGON
BYON DAM PA'I GSUNG

RGYUN RNAMS, ,PHYOGS SU SDEBS PA'I NGAL BA TZAM ZHIG BSTEN, ,'DI
YANG

MKHAS 'DOD GRAGS PHYIR MA YIN LA, ,RNYED DANG BKUR STI'I PHYIR
MIN KHENGS RLOMS

KYIS, ,MA YIN DAM PA'I GSANG GSUM YON TAN LA, ,SNYING NAS MOS
GUS

THOB PA'I BYED LAS YIN, ,'ON KYANG BLO NGAN 'KHRUL RTOG DBANG
GYUR PAS, ,'GAL

'KHRUL NONGS PA LA SOGS MCHIS SRID NA, ,DE KUN MCHOG GSUM BLA
MAR BCAS

PA DANG, ,DRAN DBANG MKHAS GRUB RNAMS KYI SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS,
,'DI LTAR

'BAD PA'I DGE TSOGS STON ZLA DANG, ,DUNG DANG KUNDA LTA BUR CHES
DKAR BAS, RGYAL

BSTAN SPYI DANG BYE BRAG 'JAM MGON BSTAN, ,SRID MTHA'I BAR DU
YUN RING GNAS GYUR

CIG ,BSTAN 'DZIN MTHA' DAG SKU TSE RAB BRTAN CING, ,MKHAS BTZUN
BZANG DANG

'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM LA SOGS, ,BSHAD DANG SGRUB PAS BSTAN PA 'DZIN
PA LA, ,'JAM

MGON NYID MTSUNGS SA STENG KHYAB GYUR CIG, ,'DUS PA'I SDE RNAMS
THUGS MTHUN

@631 KHRIMS GTZANG ZHING, ,MDO SNGAGS NYAMS LEN DBYAR MTSO'I
GANG BAR 'GRAN, ,

KHRIMS LDAN NGUR SMRIG MDANGS KYIS NOR 'DZIN KHYON, ,MTSAMS
SPRIN ZHUN MAS

G-YOGS LTAR MDZES GYUR CIG ,YANGS PA'I BOD LJONGS 'DIS MTSON
'JIG RTEN

KUN, ,DGE BCU'I SNANG BAS YONGS SU KHYAB GYUR CING, ,PHRAL YUN
BDE BA'I SBRANG

RTZI MNGAR PO'I RO, ,CHAD MED MYONG BAS 'GRO TSOGS TSIM GYUR CIG
,BDAG

SOGS DENG NAS KUN MKHYEN MA THOB BAR, ,DAL BA'I RTEN BRGYUD DAM
PA'I BSHES KYIS

ZIN, ,RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA DANG, ,MI 'BRAL
THOS

BSAM SGOM PA MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,SDOM GSUM TSUL KHRIMS NYES PA'I
DRIS MA

GOS, ,CHOS RAB RNAM 'BYED MIG GIS GSUNG RAB DON, ,GSAL POR LEGS

MTHONG TSUL BZHIN 'DOMS PA YIS, ,'GRO RGYUD RMONGS MUN SEL BA'I
BYED POR

SHOG ,THUN MONGS LAM GYIS SHES RGYUD LEGS PAR SBYANGS, ,BSKYED
DANG

RDZOGS PA'I RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS BLANGS PAS, ,ZUNG 'JUG RGYAL SA
RING MIN

MNGON GYUR NAS, ,YID CAN MGON DANG SKYABS SU 'GYUR BAR SHOG ,DUS

GSUM BYON PA'I RGYAL DANG DE SRAS DANG, ,KHYAD PAR CHOS KYI
RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PAS,,

BSTAN 'GROR SMAN PA'I THUGS BSKYED GANG MDZAD PA'I, ,BZHED DON
JI BZHIN BDAG

GI'ANG 'GRUB PAR SHOG ,'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM BSAGS PA'I DGE RTZA
KUN, ,

RANG GI DON DU CHUD 'DZAR MI 'GYUR PAR, ,MKHA' KHYAB 'GRO RNAMS
KUN MKHYEN

MYUR THOB PA'I, ,RGYU RU SMON NA DE BZHIN 'GRUB PAR SHOG ,MCHOG
GSUM

RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I THUGS RJE DANG, ,CHOS NYID RTEN 'BREL MI
BSLU'I BDEN PA DANG, ,

LHAG BSAM RNAM PAR DAG PA'I MTHU STOBS KYIS, ,SMON PA'I GNAS KUN
BDE BLAG

@632 MYUR 'GRUB SHOG ,CES KHYAB BDAG RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA
THUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG

DANG NGO BO DBYER MA MCHIS PA, 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG
KHA PA CHEN PO'I

RNAM PAR THAR PA THUB BSTAN MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG NGO MTSAR NOR
BU'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA

BA 'DI NI, 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME KONG YUL THEG CHEN
GLING GI GRUB DBANG

BLA MA RIN PO CHE YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA
NAS DE NYID KYIS,

'DI LTAR RANG CAG GI 'DREN PA DAM PA RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO
'PHRIN LAS NAM MKHA' DANG

MNYAM PA DE LTAR LA RNAM PAR THAR PA SNGON YOD RNAMS CUNG ZHIG
BSDUS PA'I SKYON DU SNANG

BAS, PHYI RABS GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI DAD PA'I GSOS SU RNAM THAR
RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAMS

SHING MCHOG DMAN KUN GYIS GO BDE BA ZHIG CIS KYANG BSGRIGS DGOS
ZHES RAB TU DKAR

BA'I LHA RDZAS SRID DU RING BA DANG BCAS RING MO ZHIG NAS BKA'
LUNG SPYI BOR BKOD PA DANG,

THEG CHEN GLING GI SPONG BA PA SPYI NAS KYANG MAndAL RTEN GSUM
LHA REG DANG BCAS BSKUL BA

DANG, DBUS PHYOGS KYI GDAN SA CHEN PO'I BKA' RAM DGE BSHES PHAL
MO

CHE NAS KYANG YANG YANG BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, SER SMAD THOS
BSAM NOR BU'I

GLING GI GRVA RIGS, 7 GONG SA RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO'I SKU BCAR
DANG HAN MKHAN

SPRUL MING 'DZIN BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL DU 'BOD PA BDAG
GIS RANG NYID LA SKYES

SBYANGS KYI YON TAN DMAN YANG, KHYAB BDAG RVA SGRENG KHRI CHEN
RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO

SOGS BDAG NYID CHEN PO DU MA'I GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI BLO'I YOL GOR
CUNG ZAD SIM PA

DANG, GZHUNG LUGS DANG RIG GNAS SOGS LA SBYANGS PA PHRAN BU BYAS
KHUL TZAM

LA BRTEN PA'I SPYI BRTOL BSKYED DE 'GOD PA'I BSAM PA RING MO
ZHIG NAS YOD KYANG,

BAR LAM RNAM PAR G-YENG BA BZLOG TU MED PA 'GA' ZHIG GI GZHAN
DBANG DU GYUR PAS

@633 RIM 'GYANGS SU SONG RUNG, DAM BCA'I MDUD PA MI LHOD PAR RAB
BYUNG BCU BZHI

PA'I NANG TSAN CHU YOS LO KONG PHYOGS SU 'KHOR ZHAG LA PHYIN
SKABS MGO BRTZAMS,

SHING 'BRUG DBUS SU SLEB NAS RE ZHIG GZUGS KHAMS BDE MIN BYUNG
RUNG BAR CHAD KYI

DBANG DU MA BTANG BAR 'GOD GANG THUB BGYIS PA LAS RJE BDAG NYID
CHEN PO GANG GI

THUGS RJES BGEGS MED MTHAR SON TE, SNA TSOGS DBYIG TU 'BOD PA
SHING SBRUL HOR

ZLA BZHI PA'I YAR NGO'I TSES BDUN, STON PA THUB PA'I DBANG PO
BKRA SHIS LUM BI'I

TSAL DU SKU BLTAMS PA'I DUS CHEN, RES GZA' BKRA SHIS, RGYU SKAR
RGYAL DANG

'GROGS PA LAS 'BYUNG 'PHROD DANG 'PHROD CHEN GNYIS KA 'PHEL
'GYUR GYI SBYOR BA DANG

LDAN PA SOGS MCHOG TU DGE ZHING SHIS PA'I NYIN, LHA LDAN SPRUL
PA'I GTZUG LAG

KHANG GI NYE 'DAB RANG NYID KYI BSTI GNAS SU MJUG YONGS SU GRUB
PAR BGYIS PA'I DGE

BAS, BDAG SOGS SKYE DANG SKYE BA THAMS CAD DU 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI
RGYAL POS MNYES

BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I MTHU LAS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RIM PA
PHRA RAGS MTHAR PHYIN

NAS ZUNG 'JUG SKU BZHI'I RGYAL SA RING MIN MYUR DU THOB PA'I
RGYUR GYUR CIG, ,,

' NA MO GU RU SU MA TI KIRTI YA, BLOo GTER KUN BZANGo RIG PA'I
SGYU

'PHRUL GYIS, ,MTHA' BRAL ZHI BA'I RGYAL THABS DAR BA'I MGON,
,GRAGSo

PA'I SPRIN PHRENG MKHA' DANG MNYAM BRDAL BA'I, ,CHOS KYI 'KHOR
BSGYUR TZONG KHA PA

LA 'DUD, ,THUB BSTAN GSER GYI PADMO'I 'DZUM GROL DPYID, ,DAG
GTZANG GZI 'OD

'BAR BA'I YE SHES GTER, ,STON PA'I RNAM THAR RDZOGS PA'I NYIN
BYED DU, ,

BDEN GSUNG GSANG BA'I LUNG GIS RING NAS ZLO, ,THUBo

TSUL THUBo PA'I RJES BRJOD

ZAB MO'I GTAM, ,ZLAo BRAL ZLAo BZHIN RDZOGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD
TSOGS, ,

@634 RANGo GAR RANGo SNANG MTSAN MAS MA REG PAR, ,SMRA NGAN
SMRAo SGO'I 'DAM SKYES ZUM

BYED NYID, ,MTSUNGS MED BDE GSHEGS GANGS RI'I LTO BA LAS, ,THA
DAD

SKAL BAR RGYU BA'I CHOS KYI SGO, ,MDO DANG RGYUD SDE'I CHU KLUNG
RO GCIG TU, ,SKYIL

MKHAS GANG DES BSTAN PA'I MTSO CHEN BSKRUN, ,CHOS 'DUL TSANGS
PA'I THIG GI

RJES SPYOD CING, ,RTAG CHAD PHYOGS KUN YONGS 'JIG LTA BA'I
KLONG, ,SRID NYON

GZHIL BYED DPYAD 'JOG RES KYIS SGOM, ,'DI KO DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I
'PHAGS

CHOS NYID, ,'DI NA DAD GSUM 'O MTSO 'PHEL BA'I GNYEN, ,BRJOD
DKA'I

GSANG BA RJOD BYED BDUD RTZI'I GTAM, ,CHA RDZOGS ZLA BA GZHON
NUR 'DZUM PA'I RIS, ,

DPAR GYI RDZING BUR BKOD PA'I BSOD NAMS KYIS, ,PHYI NA ZHI DUL
TSANGS SPYOD

BRTUL ZHUGS MDZES, ,NANG DU GSANG CHEN LAM GYI SNYING PO LCI,
,'PHRUL ZAD

DAG GTZANG 'DAB STONG GTZANG MA'I SBUB, ,BLO BZANG SNYAN BRGYUD
PHYOGS KUN KHYAB

PAR SMON, ,SMRA NGAN GNYIS 'THUNG SROG LA GZIR BA'I MTSON,
,BSNYENGS DANG

BRAL BA'I LUNG RIGS MCHE SDER CAN, ,GSER MDOG RAL KLUNG G-YO
BA'I GDONG

LNGA'I KHYU, ,BSHAD SGRUB RANG RTZAL RDZOGS PAS SHIS GYUR CIG
,KUNo KHYAB

PHYOGS BRAL GSER LDAN YANGS PA'I LJONGS, ,KUNo BZANG 'DAB
BRGYA'I TSAL DU

BSREL BA'I SLAD, ,KUNo DGA'I CHOS SPRIN BDE BA'I GRU CHAR GYIS,
,KUN PHAN

RDZOGS LDAN BSIL BA 'BEBS GYUR CIG, ,RANG GSHIS RANG DON NYE
TSES MA BSLAD

PAR, ,RANG SRID RANG BYUNG TSANGS BA'I SROL BZANG GIS, ,RANG
DBANG RANG

GIR SPYOD BZHIN BSIL LDAN LJONGS, ,RANGo RIGS RANGo TSUL BSRUNG
BAS SHIS GYUR

CIG ,RGYU SBYOR 'BREL THOGS LTOS BCAS YID CAN KUN, ,BLO GTER
MKHA'

@635 LDING DBANG PO'I BSHUL LAM DU, ,MA 'PHRUL LTA SBYONG DAG
PA'I GSHOG RLABS KYIS, ,

ZHI DBYINGS THAR PA'I MKHA' MTHAR BGROD GYUR CIG ,CES PA 'DI
YANG YONGS

'DZIN KHRI BYANG SPRUL MING PAS SMON PA'O,, ,,

' GONG GSAL RNAM THAR CHEN MO'I ZHAL 'DEBS SU YONGS 'DZIN KHRI
BYANG SKYABS RJE RDO

RJE 'CHANG NAS HIN SGOR CHIG STONG THAM PA, SKU GSHEGS PHYAG
MDZOD LHA BU DE NYID KYI

CHED DU HIN SGOR CHIG STONG THAM PA, 'BRAS BLO GLING TRE HOR
BKA' 'GYUR RIN PO

CHE DGONGS PA GZHAN DON DU MA GSHEGS GONG GSUNG RAB DPAR BSKRUN
GYI ZHAL 'DBES

SU KHRI BYANG BLA BRANG DU 'JOG GNANG MDZAD PA HIN SGOR NYIS
STONG BRGYAD BRGYA NI SHU THAM PA,

SKYID GRONG BSAM GTAN GLING GI PHYAG MDZOD DGE SLONG BKRA SHIS
RGYAL MTSAN NAS HIN SGOR

DRUG BRGYA BCO BRGYAD, DGA' SHAR DZE SMAD RIN PO CHEN NAS HIN
SGOR LNGA BCU THAM PA,

DGA' SHAR NYAG RE DGE SLONG BYAMS PA CHOS GRAGS NAS HIN SGOR
LNGA, 'JIG MED

TSE RING NAS NYIN SGOR GCIG, ,SER HRE HOR THUB BSTAN SPRUL SKU
NAS HIN SGOR BCU,

TSE 'DAS SOG PO DGE LONG SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO DE NYID KYI CHE
DU HIN SGOR BRGYAD CU THAM

PA BCAS KHYON BSDOMS HIN SGOR, 5584 BYUNG,

SPAR THOG TU SONG BA,

' LHA BRIS PA'I RI MO'I GLA DANG, BHU LOG BZOS PA'I GLA CHA DANG
DPAR GLA,

RNAM THAR CHIG STONG THAM PA'I SHOG RIN DANG DPAR GLA, ZHU DAG
PA'I PHOGS, DEB

KYI RGYAB SHA DANG BZO GLA, YIG 'BRU BSHIGS BSGRIGS KYI GLA CHA
BCOS GONG GSAL

KHYON BSDOMS HIN SGOR 10975 DANG 75 BCAS,,
